40001001	Aiki kitabu kya oshari lo Yesu Kristo ichu ai mana o Dawidi, ichu ai mana o Abrahamu.
40001002	Abrahamu alefee Isaki, Isaki kafee Yakobo, Yakobo kafee Yuda na wanawamae.
40001003	Na Yuda kafee Paresi na Sara ipfo ko Tamari. Na Paresi kafee Hesironyi, na Hesironyi kafee Aramu.
40001004	Na Aramu kafe Aminadabu, Aminadabu kafee Nahashonyi, Nahashonyi kafee Salmone.
40001005	Salmone kafee Boasi ifo ko Rahabu, Boasi kafee Obedi ipfo ko Ruti, Obedi kafee Yese.
40001006	Yese kafee mangi Dawidi, Dawidi kafee Solomon ipfo ko mka o Uria.
40001007	Na Solomon kafee Rehoboamu, Rehoboamu kafee Abia, Abia kafee Asa.
40001008	Asa kafee Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati kafee Yoramu, Yoramu kafee Usia.
40001009	Usia kafee Yotamu, Yotamu kafee Ahasi, Ahasi kafee Hezekia.
40001010	Hezekia kafee Manase, Manase kafee Amonyi, Amonyi kafee Yosia.
40001011	Yosia kafee Yekonyia na wanawamae mandi ha wupfungo wo Babilon.
40001012	Ili numa ya wupfungo wo Babilon Yekonyia kafee Shealtieli, na Shealtieli kafee Serubabeli.
40001013	Serubabeli kafee Abihudi, Abihudi kafee Eliakimu, Eliakimu kafee Asori.
40001014	Asori kafee Sadoki, Sadoki kafee Akimu, Akimu kafee Eliudi.
40001015	Eliudi kafee Eleasari, Eleasari kafee Matanyi, Matanyi kafee Yakobo.
40001016	Yakobo kafee Yosefu ai mii o Maria ichu mofee Yesu chu ai Kristo.
40001017	Nahong'u, marika halya hose kiwokia Abrahamu ushike Dawidi, nyi marika ikumi na haana; na kiwokia Dawidi shika wupfungo wo Babilon, nyi marika ikumi na haana; na kiwokia wupfungo wo Babilon, shika Kristo nyi marika ikumi na haana.
40001018	Na alya mafeonyi ha Yesu Kristo nyi kuwehendekie kuile: Maria ulya mae, lya mandi a-weikoso nyi Yosefu, indi walamesanzo, naalyo Maria kamanyika nyi ai mlemo kui pfinya ya Mumuyo Mwele,
40001019	Na ili tindi yake awei mndu o wusumhanyi, nalakunde imhutsia sonu, kahia kelekana nao kui kiṟika.
40001020	Ili awerie ado mdo̱nyi, adi aichu msu o Mndumii akulora nao kilodionyi kambia, “Iyo Yosefu, ui mana o Dawidi, ma kulahinge-hinge iduo tindi-i yapfo Maria kipfa iki ki-kimohe ipfo koke nyi kiwukie ko Mumuyo Mwele.
40001021	Nao nyekaa nafee mana, na rina lyake nomlahe nyi Yesu; kipfa nyio ekaa nakiṟe wandu madeko hawo!”
40001022	Na kimaduma kikashika kido nyi kundu kuhoye kilya ki-dede nyi Mndumii kui dumbu lya mwikimbi kehamba,
40001023	“A mbuya, kukae mana aikoso nakapike, nafee mana o womi, na rina lyake wamlahe nyi Imanueli.” Imanueli nyi cha ili ohamba: Ruwa ai naso.
40001024	Yosefu kekikure madonyi, kawewuta kilya alewawaso nyi msu o Mndumii; kaduo Maria kawa mka oke,
40001025	Indi Yosefu ma nalakuwashe nao itane afee mana o womi; kamlaha rina lyake nyi Yesu.
40002001	Yesu kekifeo kulya Betlehemu, fuwei mṟi fo Yudaya, mandi ha mangi Herode, wadi a-walya wandu walaanyi wacha na kulya Yerusalemu, wawuka kya kulya ora la ngamenyi, wakahamba,
40002002	“Mangi-i ya Wayuda ilefeo nyiku ikerimbo? Kipfa nyi lulewona wuṟingishi wo nyenyeri yake kulya kya ora lo ngamenyi, naso lukacha lumwindie-wo!”
40002003	Mangi Herode kekiicho ado, kawuko nyi madima, handu hamu na wandu wa Yerusalemu wose.
40002004	Kadumia wakohanyi wanene wache sanzia handu hamu wose, hamu na walaanyi wa shitabu wa kulya sangenyi, kawaso̱ra kundu Kristo echifeeyo.
40002005	Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi kulya Betlehemu ya kulya Yudaya, chakipfa nyi wudi mwikimbi ahambie,
40002006	‘Na iyo Betlehemu ukeri ya oruka lo Yuda, ukeri mtutu konyiia wamangi wo Yuda-pfo, kipfa kopfo iyo nyi kochikaa kuwuke mwitoṟi molisiṟa wandu wako Israeli!’ ”
40002007	Naho Herode kalaha walaanyi walya kui kirika kawasoṟa̱soṟa kiheri walewona nyenyeri iya.
40002008	Kawasama ke wahende Betlehemu kawawia, “Kehenda tumenyi mnu mbonyi tsa kimana kilya mutsiṟingishie; mukammaa ikiwona muwuye munjiwie mbehenda ikiindya.”
40002009	Kyasia wameicho kilya kya mangi wakakuhendia, na nyenyeri iya waleiwona kulya kya ora lo ngamenyi, wadi aiya yamecha iwasongoya ikatana yawashitsa alya handu mana akeri, ikatirimaho.
40002010	Wekiwona nyenyeri iya, wakachihio mnu.
40002011	Wakaida na mba, wakawona mana ulya akeri na mae Maria. Wakakuhutsa wanda na kyamu, wakampfiria ndi. Wakawuya wakapfunguo shindo shawo wawerie sha kisa, wakamwimaya nasho; nyi sahabu, na uvumba, na manemane.
40002012	Indi Ruwa, kawawawasa kui ndodo, wakawuya na kanyi, walakiide ko Herode.
40002013	Wekimaa-ihenda, wadi a-ichu msu o Mndumii kakulora na Yosefu kui ndodo kambia, “Kure, noire mana-chu na mae, nohende dichia kulya Misiri nokukaye-fo itane ngakuamtsa-se, nyi kifa Herode akundi iwaaha mana-chu.”
40002014	Nao kakure kadichiṟa mana na mae kui kio, kahenda kulya Misiri.
40002015	Kakaa Misiri itane Herode apfa. Nyi kundu kuhoye kilya ki-kihambe nyi Mndumii kui dumbu lya mwikimbi kehamba, “Nyi kulya Misiri njilahie-pfo mana ako!”
40002016	Kyasia Herode amewona ke amesolo nyi walaanyi walya, karihinyika mnu nyashi, kaduma kuwooho shiwana shoose sha kulya Betlehemu na sha kulya mṟasenyi kuitumanyi napfo, shilya shimaiye maka iwi na shilya shiwuuye numa ya kiheri kilya etuma walaanyi walya.
40002017	Nalyo kilya kiwei kidede nyi dumbu lya mwikimbi Yeremia kikawehoya kehamba,
40002018	“Kulya Rama kuleichio ṟu ofuho sa lunene na shilio, nyi Raheli akeri ikapia wana wake shilio, ma nalaidikie iwihiṟio moo, nyi kipfa walaiho-se.”
40002019	Kyasia Herode kekipfa, msu o Mndumii kacha ikulo̱ra na Yosefu kui ndodo kulya Misiri.
40002020	Kambia, “Kureng'u, noduo mana na mae, nohende kulya Israeli, kifa walya wawekeri itengetia mana-chu walemepfa!”
40002021	Nao kakure, kaweduo mana na mae, kahenda kulya oruken lo Israeli.
40002022	Indi kekiwio ke Arkelao nyi ai mangi ya Yudaya, handu ha ndee Herode, kaowuo ihenda-pfo. Indi Ruwa kambawasa kui ndodo, kahenda kulya shihongonyi sha Galilaya.
40002023	Kacha ilaa kulya m̱rinyi fo Nasareti, kundu kuhoye kilya ki-kidede kui dumbu lya mwikimbi, ke nyi echilaho nyi Mnasarayo.
40003001	Kyasia, mafiri na halya kukakure Yohane Mpatisi, kawa moongoya wandu mbonyi kulya nuka ya Yudaya.
40003002	Kehamba, “Dumbuyenyi, kyamba wumangi wo Ruwa womeafukia kufui!”
40003003	Nao nyi ichu a-mhambe nyi mwikimbi Yesaya, kehamba, “Ṟu lya moedia kundu ko nuka: -- Kesungusienyi njia ya Mndumii, muwetembecheṟa na njomongo tsake!”
40003004	Kyasia, na Yohane-chu nyi awekeṟaa nguwo tsa mafufuta ha ngamia, kawewa mokupfunga na okowa lo njonyi ipfo kitsinyi kyake; na shelya shake nyi nzihe na wuki wo mbakonyi.
40003005	Nalyo wandu wa Yerusalemu woose na wa oruka lo Yudaya na Yordanyi lose wakamchea.
40003006	Wakahenda ipatisio alya mṟingenyi fo Yordanyi wechitochia-ho njonyamaṟo tsawo.
40003007	Nao lyandi alewona Wafarisayo wafoi na Wasadukayo wechicha na wupatisonyi kawawia, “Nyo mui malea ha njoka, nyi mndu o ku alemlosha idicha nyashi iya iriiye icha?
40003008	Kekusumuhantsyenyi-ng'u mbuka njicha tsedumbuya!
40003009	Ma mulakusire wongo mrimenyi mochihamba, ‘A-chi luwode ndeadu nyio Abrahamu?’ Indi nyi ngambia, ‘Ma maho-ha Ruwa na echiidima yalutsia-ho Abrahamu luwa.’
40003010	A-lilya soka li-iwike tsindenyi ya ikidi, orio ikidi lyada lilakumbia ndunda, na lyi manyo lyikumbo modonyi.
40003011	Kyako inyi nyi njekepatisa na mṟinga kya idumbuya, indi ichu echicha numa yako, nao nyi anjing'anyie, njilasumhanyi ma iduo shadu shake, icho nyi echimpatisa na Mumuyo Mwele na modo.
40003012	Nyi awerie na kindo kyake kyeela na owoko loke, na-weahia na alya kiwuhehu kyake namae, mbeke-tso nasanyie alya kikumbinyi, indi muulu-fo nafuko̱re na modo fulechiruma.”
40003013	Nalyo Yesu kacha na alya nuka handu Yohane awei kulya wambaṟa ya Yordanyi, awuka kulya Galilaya akundi ipatiso nyio.
40003014	Yohane kamlehialehia kahamba, “Nyio inyi njiwechiwona njechipatiso nyi iyo, indi iyo kowuya icha na koko?”
40003015	Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Ikyo kudee wulalu, nyi wudo kiluwaṟi, kundu luawutsie mbon tsa wusumhanyi tsose.” Nalyo kakumdeea.
40003016	Kyasia Yesu amedima ipatiso, kado alya mṟingenyi. Naho kudi kulya ruwehu kukaṟuhuka; kawona Mumuyo o Ruwa kesoka akeri cha mbeta, ikakaa huyake.
40003017	Oweṟe ṟu likalaha liwuka ruwehu likahamba, “A-ichu mana oko a-mkunde ichu njii mchihie kyake.”
40004001	Nalyo Yesu kadao kundu ko nuka nyi Mumuyo, kundu nahende heshio-fo nyi Satana.
40004002	Kyasia ammaa ikuotoya mfiri makumi haana na shio makumi haana, kafurumia iwa̱do nyi njaa.
40004003	Mheshi kacha naho kammbia, “Kokoya na iyo Mana o Ruwa, kewia-ngu maho-ha hawe kando.”
40004004	Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Nyi ki-kiṟehie kyehamba: Kindo mndu echitawulia nakyo moo chi kando tupu̱pfo, shile nyi orio kidedo kyewuka dumbunyi lya Ruwa kyose.”
40004005	Na Satana kawuya kamduo kulya mṟinyi mwele, kacha mhoṟotsa alya owerihu lo hekalu, oo chunju.
40004006	Kambia, “Kokoya na ukeri Mana o Ruwa, kekuolotsenu iya, kipfa nyi ki-kiṟehie kyehamba: Nyi echiwawasa wasu wake kimaduma kyapfo wache kuambia na mahi, kundu ulawone koikapa ma kudende ihohu.”
40004007	Yesu kambia, “Na kiwei kiṟehie-se kyehamba: Ma ulawone ohesha Ruwa Mndumii opfo!”
40004008	Kyasia Satana kawuya kamduo kundu ko fumvu lileshe, kamloṟa masanga ha wuyana hose na wusuṟi woho.
40004009	Kambia, “Aiho, nyi njechikuinenga hose, komekekunjiolokya ndenyi na interewa.”
40004010	Nalyo Yesu kambia, “Wuka iya koko Satan, kifa nyi ki-kiṟehie kyehamba: Mndumii ofo Ruwa, nyio amonyi ochimwolokia ndenyi na imterewa.”
40004011	Naalyo mheshi kamda-ho, kudi wasu wa Ruwa wakacha ipfuṟukanya Yesu.
40004012	Kyasia ammaa iwio ke Yohane alemmaa ikumbo kipfungonyi, nao kahenda kuleshe kulya Galilaya.
40004013	Kawuka kulya Nasareti, kahenda kulya Kapernaumu, nyi kundu ko mawambao ha ipalipali, kulya shihongonyi sha Sebulon na Naftali.
40004014	Nyi kundu kuhoye kilya ki-kidede kui dumbu lya mwikimbi Yesaya.
40004015	Kyehamba, “Oruka lo Sebulon na lo Naftali kwidie njia ya ipalipali, na kulya mataya ya Yordanyi na Galilaya kui kundo ko mbaṟi njihenu.
40004016	Wandu wadamie memenyi wawona ngeela ing'anyi, na walya wadamie orukenyi lo maṟishe ha opfu, wawonekio nyi ngeela.”
40004017	Wokya mandi halya, Yesu kawooka yonguo kahamba: “Kedumbuyenyi, kyamba wumangi wo Ruwa nyi hafui wui.”
40004018	Kyasia kekichumia-chumia kulya mawambao ha ipalipali, kawona wana wa mka wawi, nyi Simon ewio Petro, na manomae nyi-we Andrea; nawo nyi wawekeri yolotsa mdeho fodeha makunga alya ipalipalinyi, kipfa nyi wawei wadehi.
40004019	Nao kawawia, “Kenjonyi muoshane na inyi njimtane wadehi wa wandu.”
40004020	Kudi wakada-ho mdeho iya, wakamwosha.
40004021	Nao kekihenda-henda, kawewona-se wana wa mka wawi, nyi Yakobo na Yohane, wai wana wa Sebedayo, wai ngalawenyi, na ndea-wo nyi aweipfuma mdeho iya yawo handu iwerandukie, kawalaha.
40004022	Nawo wakada-ho ngalawa iya, na ndeawo-da, wakamwosha.
40004023	Nao kawa moida-ida kulya Galilaya kose kelosha kulya sinagogenyi tsawo, na yonguo mbonyi tsa sia tsa wumangi, na ichiṟa orio ndaaṟe tsoose na wufari woose wui ipfo wandunyi.
40004024	Na kiṟumi kyake kikahenda dung'ana kulya Siria koose. Wakamwendie wandu waluo wose, walya wai warohie nyi ndaaṟe tsa orio mbaṟi kawachiṟa woose.
40004025	Kyasia wandu wakaduana nao mamwingi fung'anyi wawuka kulya Galilaya na Yudaya na kulya mataya Ya Yordanyi.
40005001	Kyasia nao ili alewona wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi, kado kundu ko fumvu-hu. Amiidima idamia, walya wa kiloshio kyake wakacha ihoṟoka handu ai.
40005002	Nao kairia ṟu kawalosha kahamba,
40005003	“Nanga iwo wai wakiwa kui mrima, cha kifa nyiwo wumangi wo ruwehu woiwa wowo.
40005004	Nanga iwo wawodo nyi fowa, cha kifa nyiwo wechika wawihiṟio moo.
40005005	Nanga iwo wai wahoo, cha kifa nyiwo wechikaa waku̱daae oruka luwawiie kyoṟa kyawo.
40005006	Nanga iwo wawodo nyi njaa na nyoda yelanga wusumhanyi, cha kipfa nyiwo wechika waihutso.
40005007	Nanga iwo wesaṟia, cha kipfa nyiwo weka wasaṟio.
40005008	Nanga iwo wai waharami kui mrima, cha kipfa nyiwo wechika wawone Ruwa.
40005009	Nanga iwo wechiitsa-pfo ofoṟo, cha kipfa nyiwo weka wasendo nyi wana wa Ruwa.
40005010	Nanga iwo wechiitso kiterengionyi kipfa kya wusumuhanyi, kyamba nyiwo wumangi wo Ruwa woiwa wowo.
40005011	Nanga nyo ili mochiwona wemruma na imwamtsia shiterengio na imdeda-deda orio kindo kiwicho kyoose kii kya wongo, indi kikawa kifa kyako inyi.
40005012	Kechihiyonyi mbekeseka, kipfa woṟunda wonu nyi wufoi kulya ruwehu, kifa na wudo waleweterengia waikimbi walya wa-wemsongoye.”
40005013	“Nyo nyi mui monyo fo wuyana, indi komkooya monyo fu-mporu, nyi wuda fochitanose monyo? Fuwode-se kindo fochiṟundapfo, shile nyi ikumbo na ichumo-chumo nyi wandu.
40005014	Nyo nyi mukeri sa ya wuyana, mri fumbike kundu ko fumvu-hu fochiwa iṟikishofo.
40005015	Ma kuipfo mndu echiatsa taa kaiwika shi-ya kisoṟopfo, indi nyi handu hehekia taa, nayo ikalimikia walya wai ipfo mmba woose.
40005016	Nyi wudo na sa yanu iwewaa oshangunyi lo wandu wose, wawuteho ikulesha mawuto hanu mecha, kundu wang'anyi she naho Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu.”
40005017	“Ma mlawone mochihamba ke kindo njicheye nyi ngaluko, ote; chi ngaluko njicheyepfo indi nyi yawutsia.
40005018	Kipfa nyi kya lohi ngambia, na kuwede kulya ruwehu kunyamaṟo na sanga, indi ipfo wuwawasonyi kochinyamaṟika-fo ma kichano kimu ma kimcharie kimupfo na shiwede shiinutsio shoose.
40005019	Kyasia-ng'u mawawaso-ho, ma iho matutu ya hoose ichu mopfuluo-ho ma limu kalosha ado wandu, nyi etano mtutu o woose o ipfo wumangi wo ruwehu.
40005020	Kipfa nyi ngamuwia, wusumuhanyi-wo wonu wukameda wulaida wo walosha wa wuwawaso na wo Wafarisayo-da, mochiwona wumangi wo Ruwa muide napfopfo!”
40005021	“Nyi muichi walya wa kacha nyi walewio, ma kulawahe, na orio mowaaha nyi mti, nyi mndu mohenda dao ko wachili wedumbuo kya wandu wanyamaṟie!
40005022	Indi inyi nyi ngambia, orio mndu ose moṟikia manomae nyashi mrimenyi nyi mndu mohenda dao ko wachili wedumbuo kya wandu wanyamaṟie!
40005023	Kyasia-ng'u ichu echiwia manomae, iyo nyi kichoi, mti, nyi mndu mohenda dao kulya ko wachili wanene wedumbuo kya wandu wanyamaṟie king'anyi. Na ichu echiwia manomae, nyi ui msese, mti; nyi mndu modao modonyi fo Gehena Kyasia-ng'u koshika yende kindo kyapfo kya odambiko na alya rasionyi ko Ruwa, kuiho kokumbuo manomayo awode mondu na iyo,
40005024	da-ho odambiko lulya lopfo oendie Ruwa, nokemmbooka ihenda-sanza na manomayo; numa njong'u udambike kindo kyafo!
40005025	Wa mndu moidikiana na mkituwa opfo owinyi ili mui kyaṟo-ki kya wanda-ii kundu nalache kudambikia mchili, na mchili nakudambikie watuuri nokumbo kipfungonyi.
40005026	Nkya lohi ngakuwia, ochikiwuka-se-hopfo, na itane otaa na njoko iya yemarisia.”
40005027	“Mmbeichi nyi kikihambe, ‘Ma kulaṟuhuye ma iṟuhuyo.’
40005028	Indi inyi nyi ngambia, ‘Orio mundu oose echiambuya mndu mka womlanga, nyi ama iruhuya nao mrimenyi.’
40005029	Indi iyo kowona ma riso lyafo lya kulyo lyechikuendie wusutsu, lituhuopfo, nolikumbe kuleshe, nanga ili odetsa kiwungo kyafo kimu, mbihu fopfo fukaashuka fulamkumbe Gehena.
40005030	Ma kokooya nyi kuwoko ko kulyo kuikuendie wusutsu, kudumbuo nokukumbe kuleshe; nanga iyo kodetsa kiwungo kyapfo kimu, mbihu fopfo fukaashuka fulamkumbe modonyi.”
40005031	“Na kingi-se nyi kiwei kihambe wai, ‘Mndu molekana na mka oke, namnenge baruo yemsama.’
40005032	Kyaindi inyi nyi ngambia ke, ‘Orio mndu molekana na mka oke kulawode kitewe kya isokombo, nyi amtana mokisokombo; na mndu kaalika ichu amde nyi aruhuya.’ ”
40005033	“Mbeichuo walya wa kacha nyi walewio, kulawone kochilya nyamu tsa wongo, indi kuwode kindo uteṟie Ruwa kui nyamu, wuta kudo tichi.
40005034	Kyaindi inyi nyi ngambia, ‘Ma mulalye nyamu ma nta muhambe, so ruwehu, kipfa nyipfo loṟika lo Ruwa lodamia.’
40005035	Ma so oruka, kipfa nyi kiteeyo kyehekia madende hake. Ma so Yerusalemu, kipfa nyi mṟi fo mangi ing'anyi.
40005036	Ma kulalye nyamu nohambe, so mdo foko, kipfa kulechiidima ihaluo ma ochui lumu luile ang'u luiwuo.
40005037	Indi kidedo kyanu kiwe nyi, ‘Ee, Ee,’ anu, ‘Ote, Ote!’ Kidie ikyo, nyi ko mbicho kicheye.”
40005038	“Muichi nyi ki-kihambe, ‘Riso litao na riso na heho litao na heho.’
40005039	Kyaindi inyi nyi ngambia, ma mularekiane na mndu ai mbicho! Kyaindi ichu echikukapa nguchu-yo ya kulyo, kewemhaluye iyo ya kumoso.
40005040	Na ichu akundi icha anduo na iyo kundu naduo nguwo yapfo, mdeye na iyo ya kawi.
40005041	Na ichu echikuitikia mchumie fo kenga kya saa, kuhendie nao saa yose!
40005042	Ichu mokuterewa, mnenge, na ichu mocha kuakuo, ma kulamkumbe mhongo!”
40005043	“Mbeichuo nyi kikihambe, ‘Kunda odoo, na mkituwa opfo msuo!’
40005044	Indi inyi nyi ngambia, Kekundenyi wakituwa wanu, na iwo wemterengia, kewaterewienyi!
40005045	Nanyo kundu mukuwie wana wa Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu, kipfa o nyi ekedosa mnengeṟi foke fukawaaya ichu mbicho na ichu mcha, na mvuo yake kaweolotsya ko ichu o wusumhanyi na ko ichu alai o wusumhanyi.
40005046	Kipfa kokooya mokunda walya wamkundi, na nyo nyi kiki mochiwona-ho kya woṟunda wonu? A wasanyi wa okamba cha wudo wekewuta?
40005047	Na wandu mochiiṟikiṟana nawo, kokooya nyi wanawamaanu tupu, kindo mowuta kya ngoseṟa nyi kiki? Ma wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu na wudo wekewuta!
40005048	Kyasia, wenyi wandu waholokie wucha, chando na Nde-anuo ipfo ruwehu aholokie wucha!”
40006001	“Kekuṟisenyi mulawone mochiwuta sha wusumuhanyi wonu oshangung'u lo wandu muwonyo nyiwo; mulakuṟise mudo, ma mochiwona-se kya woṟunda wonu ipfo ko Nde-anu o ruwehupfo!
40006002	Na iyo koshika ilekia shindo shapfo shesaṟia, ma kulakape ombe lukusongoye chando makulembetsere halya hekewuta wai ifo sinagogenyi ipfo kikumbuhananyonyi kya njia tsa mṟinyi nawo nyi kundu waṟumisho nyi wandu! Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wo walemmaa iduo kya woṟunda wowo!’
40006003	Kyaindi iyo koshika ilekia kindo kyesaṟia, ma kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso kulamanye ikyo ko kulyo kindo kukeri iwuta.
40006004	Kundu isho shapfo shesaṟia shiwe sha kiṟika; na Ndeo ichu echiwona kiṟikenyi nakutae amonyi.”
40006005	“Ma iterewa na wudo; ma mlawe cha makulembetseṟe halya! Wo nyi wakundi iterewa wahoṟoki ipfo sinagogenyi na alya kikumbuhananyo kya njia tsa mṟi kundu wakuloṟe na wandu. Nkyi lohi iki njiimbia wo walemmaa iduo kya woṟunda wowo!
40006006	Indi iyo koshika iterewa, ida na ipfo kiṟihenyi kyapfo kya kiidi uweshinga na mongo, notereweng'u Ndeo ui ipfo moowionyi; na Ndeo-chu echiwona na moowionyi na ekaa nakutae.
40006007	Ili mwiterewa, ma mulakape-kape ata kwi mbaṟi ya wahenu; kipfa nyi wakusaṟie kulako kindo wechiadanyio nyi maanuka yawo ya ata!
40006008	Ma mlafanane nawo! Kifa Ndeanu o ipfo ruwehu na aichi shilya muwuṟie ma ili mulamemterewa.
40006009	Indi terewenyi mule, ‘Nde-yadu ukeri ipfo ruwehu, Rina lyafo litano yele.
40006010	Wumangi wopfo wuche. Isho ukundi chando shekewutika kulya ruwehu, na kunu orukenyi shiwewa shido.
40006011	Kando kadu kalufoi uluinenge inu.
40006012	Uludeye sile tsa̱fo luwode, chaso luwedeya wasile wadu.
40006013	Ma ulaluduo kitewionyi indi ulukiṟe shindo shiwicho!
40006014	Kipfa komkoya nyo mokeho̱oria wandu, na Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu na echeemhoṟia nyo.
40006015	Indi nyo mkada mlahoṟia wandu shilya walemdekio, ma Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu echimhoo̱ṟia-nyofo.’ ”
40006016	“Nanyo mkashika ikuotoya, ma mulakufananyishe na makulembetseṟe-ho hekesuruwanyisha masineeri kipfa nyi wekeshimbiṟa shamu kundu wakuloṟe na wandu. Nyi kya lohi ngambia, wo walemmaa iduo kya woṟunda wowo.
40006017	Indi koshika ikuotoya, shia mdo-fo mafuda, na oshangu lopfo nowesanja!
40006018	Indi, ma kulakuloṟe na wandu ili ukuotoye shile na ko Ndeo o kiṟikenyi na Ndeo-chu echiwona sha kiṟika na ekaa nakutae.”
40006019	“Ma mulakusuṟumie shisa shanu kunu wuyana kundu mui handu kiwiro na ngama shechinyamaṟa kuwewode na manyinyi heiwa.
40006020	Kyaindi surumenyi shisa shanu kulya ruwehu kundu kulawode shiwiro ma ngama, ma manyinyi halechiidima iiwa.
40006021	Kundu handu uṟikie kisa kyapfo, na mrima fuwekaa-ho.”
40006022	“Kiinengie mbihu sa nyi riso; na riso komkoya nyi licha, na mbihu fose nyi fochiwa sa.
40006023	Kyaindi komkooya riso liiwicho, mbihu da na fochiwada meema foose. Kyasia na sai ii na iyo kommbona yamhaluka meema, apa ṟimbaha lya ime̱ma lilemie.”
40006024	“Kwipfo mndu echi̱idima ifuṟukanya wanene wawipfo; kipfa kumu nyi echisuo ulya umu, nakunde ulya o kawi; ang'u nahalukie ichu, nainyale ulya ungi. Ma mochiidima isanza mupfuṟukanye Ruwa hamu na Mamonapfo.”
40006025	“Kyasia, kyamba nyi wudo na inyi nyi ngambia, ‘Ma mulawado nyi makusaṟo kya moo yanu kya kindo mochilya, anu kya mbihu yanu kindo mochiṟaa Aka moo chi fung'anyi fukaida kando; na mbihu cha fuweidie nguwo?
40006026	Keṟisenyi ma shilehe sha ruwehu shilekekumba mbeu ma isanya shikumbinyi indi nyi Nde-anu ipfo ruwehu ekeshiinenga shelya; aka nyo chi mushing'anyie.
40006027	Ale? Kunu konu nyiu aipfo echidima yengeṟa wuku woke wuengeṟeke handu ha oweṟe lo mkonu fumu ma ikusaṟa ikyo?’
40006028	A nguwo tseraa nyi kiili muwodo mudo nyi makusaṟo kyatso? Kyeṟisenyi ipfo shiwaṟonyi sha mbaṟi tsoose sha manjawuhenyi; shekewina na iyoka nguwofo.
40006029	Indi nyi ngambia ke, ma Solomon na wusuṟi woke woose awemṟike chasho ma kimu-hopfo!
40006030	Kyasia, komkooya ma̱ra ha njawuhenyi hakeri-ho inu na ngama hakahenda ikoṟio mawiwenyi, komkooya Ruwa nyi ahachopie ado, aka nyo mui mudo na kiidikio kitutu, kyanu chi kikiengere?
40006031	Ori muwado nyi makusaṟo muhambe, a kindo lochikulia ang'u kindo lochikunyooya nyi kiki; ma kya mbihu yanu kindo mochikuṟaaya.
40006032	Kifa isho shoose nyi wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu wekeshilalakia; indi Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu na aichi ke nyi kimuwaṟi ishiwona.
40006033	Kyaindi songuonyi ilalakia wumangi wo Ruwa na wusumuhanyi wowo, na shingi nyi mochiinengo cha shannga.
40006034	Kyasia, ma mulawado nyi makusaṟo ha kya ngama, kipfa ngama nyi yesaṟa kyayo injenyi Orio mkonu nyi fui na kyafo nahong'u.”
40007001	“Ma muladumbuo kyewonya mndu owingo muwone na kyanu kyedumbuo kido; kifa mdumbuye fulya modumbuo, na kyanu na wudo kyechudumbuo!
40007002	Na wudo kiheo kilya moheshia wengi, na wudo na kyanu.
40007003	Aiyo, nki ili okeambuya kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo na iyo kulawonyi mriti risonyi lyapfo iyo?
40007004	Anu nyi wuda ochi̱idima iwia manomayo, keleka njikueke iwuta kinana risonyi lyafo, ate na iyo aifo mriti risonyi lyapfo?
40007005	Lyo mkulembetseṟi, kemesonguo ikuwuta mriti risonyi lyafo nomanyeng'u yambuo nowute kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo!
40007006	Ikyo kii-kyele ma mlakumbie makite, na mṟao fonu fo kiweṟe ma mlakumbie nguwe fuchumo-chumo nyi madende hatso numa tsifurumie ihaluka tsimtufuo-tufuo.”
40007007	“Keterewenyi, nyi mochiinengo kepfulenyi nyi mochiwona, hekapekapenyi mongo nyi mochifunguyo.
40007008	Kifa moterewa nyi einengo, na mopfula kawewona, na mokapakapa mongo kawepfunguyo.
40007009	Ang'u kunu kidi kyanu nyiu aipfo mana kamterewa kando nao namnenge iho?
40007010	Ang'u kamterewa ikunga, namnenge njoka?
40007011	Kyasia nyo mui wawicho kokooya na mochiidima iinenga shiwana shanu shiinengo shicha, aka-wo Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu chi echiengeṟa imwinenga shicha ili momterewa?
40007012	Kyasia orio kindo kyoose chando mukundi muwutio nyi wandu, nanyo kewewutienyi mudo, cha kifa nyiho mapfundo ha wuwawaso na waikimbi.”
40007013	“Keidenyi alya kichuminyi ki kisise, kifa nyi kuipfo kichumi kikualiye na njia yakyo njilandari, kitsitsionyi kyayo nyi kidekionyi, na weida napfo nyi wafoi.
40007014	Na wudo kuipfo kichumi kya kiṟoṟowo na njia nyi njisise, nayo nyi yekooya moonyi na wandu wechiiwona nyi-sa waangu.”
40007015	“Kekuṟisenyi na waikimbi wa wongo weecha na konu waṟee makata ha machoondi indi ipfo kidi nyi wai mashite ha ngeṟenyi malang'a.
40007016	Nyi mkao yawo mochiwamanya nayo, Alae na ochi̱idimma ihaa ndunda tsa msabibu oshehu, na nduonyi na ochidima ihaa ho makuyu heloda?
40007017	Nyi wudo mdi mcha nyi fechikumbia ndunda njicha, na mdi mbicho fukawekumbia ndunda njiwicho.
40007018	Ma kuifo ikidi licha lyechiidima ikumbia ndunda njiwichopfo, ma ikidi lyiwicho lyechiidima ikumbia ndunda njichapfo.
40007019	Orio ikidi lyoose lyada lilakumbia ndunda njicha, nyi lyechimanyo na ihenda ikumbo modonyi.
40007020	Kyasia nyi wudo kii, nyi mawuto hawo mochiwamanya naho.”
40007021	“Ma chi orio mndu ose monjiwia, ‘Mndumii Mndumii echiida wumanginyi wo Ruwapfo, shile nyi ichu mowuta shichihianyi na Wande o ifo ruwehu!’
40007022	Kipfa mfiri fulya nyi kochikaapfo wafoi wenjiwesa wehamba, ‘A Mndumii, Mndumii, chi lulehamba shisuku kui rina lyafo, na rina lyafo lukawefuna nalyo waṟufu wawicho, na rina lyafo lukavetana nalyo maṟunda manene?’
40007023	Indi inyi nyi njechiwawia na pata njihambe, ‘Njilememmanye-nyofo, kenyiwukenyi mui wandu muwutie sha mkika!’ ”
40007024	“Kyasia, mndu akeri-pfo ma o ku ma o ku, ichu echiadanya madedo hako na ihawuta kawehawuta, nyi afananyi na mndu awode wuṟango wucha alewika mba yake kundu kukualie iho.
40007025	Naho mwuo ikaoloka, mamṟinga hakasoka, njotanu tsikakuma tsikakapa mba iya ilaho, kipfa lyandi iwenjiilike handu hakualye iho.
40007026	Kyasia na ichu aipfo ma o ku ma o ku moadanya madedo hako kada alahawuta, nyi afananyi na mndu tondo alewika mba yake ko teri ya kimamile.
40007027	Naho mvuo ikacha, mamṟinga hakasoka, na njotanu tsikakuma tsikakapa mba iya, nayo ikawunduka wundu, na mbundukie foyo fukawa fo kiṟiha.”
40007028	Yesu ammaa ideda madedo-ha, mamwingi fulya fo wandu fuwekeri-ho fukawuko nyi madima kifa kya mloshie fulya foke, chando aweilosha.
40007029	Kikawa cha mndu awode pfinya, kilawe cha kya walosha wa wuwawaso.
40008001	Kyasia kekisoka kulya fumvuhu wandu wakaduana nao mamingi sa fufoi.
40008002	Naho adi a ulya mndu awodo nyi saka amcha naho kamolokya ndenyi kambia, “Mndumii kokukundya na ochiidima inyiheṟemtsa!”
40008003	Naho Yesu kahoṟwo owoko kampaya, kahamba, “Na ngakunda keheṟemka!” Naalyo li yenyi kaheṟemka saka iya imbode.
40008004	Yesu kambia, “Ambuya, kulawie ma mndu ma kindo! Kya indi uhende ikuloṟa alya ko mkohanyi nowewika na mwano chando Mose awawasye kiwe kiṟingishyo kyawo.”
40008005	Kyasia amiida na kulya Kapernaumu, kukacha napfo mchili mnene o siṟi ya wasikari ihana.
40008006	Kamfuhya wukiwa kehamba, “Hoi Mndumii, msoṟo oko alee kulya kanyi atiliwanyi shiwungo-sho aiwawyo mnu iki kiwicho-wicho.”
40008007	Nao kambia, “Leka njiche njimchiṟe!”
40008008	Mchili ulya kamhaluo kambia, “Alewo Mndumii! Njii o wusumuhanyi notane oida ipfo shia mhamba ya kai lyakofo. Kya indi kuhambie-ho idedo tupu, na msoṟo cho oko nechichia!
40008009	Kipfa na inyi nyi nji mndu nji mwitoṟye nyi wuchili, indi na inyi na njiwode wasikari wai shi-ako. Na inyi njechiwia-ho ichu, ‘Henda!’ Nao kahenda. Ngawia ichu ungi, ‘Kenjo!’ Nao kacha. Ngawia na isinga lyako, ‘Henda wuta wuliwe!’ Nao kawewuta!”
40008010	Yesu amiicho a̱do kaṟihio, kawia walya ahendesanyi nawo, “Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Ma kunu ko Waisraeli ndemewone iidikya linanyi lidipfo.’ Kya indi inyi ngambia,
40008011	‘Kukae kuche napfo wafoi wawuka kya kulya ora lo ngamenyi na kya kulya ora lo kyukanyi, wache damya kiliyonyi kya choonga na Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa.
40008012	Kya indi wana wa wumangi wedao nja wahende kumbo kulya memenyi fo kulya nja. Napfo kukae pfo ilia na iimadya ngamru.’ ”
40008013	Na Yesu kawia mchili ulya, “Kuhendye na chando oveidikya na wudo ochiwona!” Na msoro ulya oke kachia saa na iya.
40008014	Kyasia Yesu amcha na ipfo mba ko Petro kawona mamka oke amlaṟe awodo nyi modo.
40008015	Nao kambada owoko, modo fukambuka. Kakure alyando avei mlaṟe, kawafurukanya.
40008016	Kyasia komshika ili kyukanyi wakamendye wafoi wawodo nyi mṟufu mbicho. Nao kafuna mṟufu mbicho na kidedo kya dumbu lyake. Na walya waiwawyo kawewakiṟa wose.
40008017	Nyi kundu kishike kilya kiwei kidede nyi mwikimbi Yesaya kahamba, “Nyio aleduo wunyonge wodu, kawekudika na mawawyo hadu.”
40008018	Kyasia Yesu amewona wandu wache ikuwumbia nao mamwingi sa fung'anyi kawawasa wakiloshyonyi kyake wahende ambadya kya kulya ora lo kawi lo ipalipali.
40008019	Naho kukacha nafo mlosha o mawawaso umu kambia, “Marya, njeoshana na iyo kundu omekuhendya kose!”
40008020	Na Yesu kambia, “Mapaara nyi hawode mruma na shilehe sha ruwehu shikawewada sungu tsasho, kya indi Manomndu awode ma handu heonyonyia-pfo.”
40008021	Kyasia mndu o kiloshyo ungi kacha imbia, “Mndumii, kennenga momu fokuhendya iṟika mnying'a fo wande!”
40008022	Nao kambia, “Nde nooshane na inyi node wapfu wakuṟikye wapfu wawo.”
40008023	Kyasia amiidima idoya alya ngalawehu, wa kiloshyonyi kyake waka-mosha-pfo.
40008024	Naho wadi ailu owira sa lwapfinya lukaida kulya ipalipalihu na ngalawa iya ikatana yashikyo nyi masinanu halya. Nao alee mado.
40008025	Nawo wakacha horoka oo handu ai wakahamba, “Keluletse-wo hoi Mndumii, nyarisika lui!”
40008026	Nao kawawia, “Nyi kili mui mudi waowu mui wandu wa idikya lyitutu?” Naho kakure katukya otanu na ipalipali kukahutsa olele wyaa.
40008027	Wandu walya wakaṟihio wakahamba, “Nyi mndu ada ichu, otanu na ipalipali shikatana shamidikya?”
40008028	Kyasia amambadya kulya mataya kulya orukenyi lo Wagadara kawona wandu wawi wawodo nyi mṟufu mbicho wecha imkumbuhana wawuka mbangenyi kundu wapfu weṟiko wai walang'a mnu, ma mndu nalakarie iida na njia iya.
40008029	Naho wakakalahatsa wakahamba, “Nyi kiki kyadu na iyo Mana o Ruwa? A nyi ucheye naho kiheri kyandu kilamshika kyehenda tuuro?”
40008030	Kyasia kukeri-fo poo lya nguwe sa tsifoi tsikeri kuleshe na kundu wakeri tsechilya mara.
40008031	Kyasia mṟufu iya mbicho ikamterewa-terewa ikahamba, “Kolufuna uludume-wo luhende lukwidye ipfo kiidi kya poo lyo lya nguwe!”
40008032	Nao kawawia, “Kuhendyenyi!” Naho kudi mṟufu iya ikawuka-fo, ikahenda ikaida kiidi kya poo lilya lya nguwe. Oweṟe cha ili, aili poo lyapufukaho pufu lyose likasoka na msaṟi fulya likakwolotsa kulya ipalipalinyi likapfa kulya mṟingenyi.
40008033	Kyasia walisi walya wakadicha, wakahenda kulya mṟinyi, wakaongwo-pfo mbonyi tsilya tsose, na tsa wandu wawodo nyi mṟufu mbicho.
40008034	Naho kudi awalya wandu wakakure mṟi fulya fose, wakahenda kumbuhana Yesu. Wamembona wakamterewa nawuke kulya mṟasenyi kowo.
40009001	Naho kadoya alya ngalawenyi kaambada kacha na mrinyi koke.
40009002	Nao keambuya wakacha meendye mndu a muumu shiwungo a mlaṟe kitaṟenyi Na Yesu ambona kiidikyo kyawo kawia mndu ulya a muumu shiwungo, “Kewuyo nyi moo mana oko, madeko hapfo nyi hamewuto-ho.”
40009003	Naho kudi walosha wa wuwawaso walya maata wakadeda na mrima yawo wehamba, “Ichu nyi aruma Ruwa!”
40009004	Naho ili Yesu kewona mahio hawo kawawia, “Nyi kyaki muihia kiwicho mrimenyi konu?
40009005	Kipfa iki kii kyangu ihamba nyi kihya, ngesa nyi ihamba, ‘Madeko hapfo hamewuto-ho,’ anu nyi ihamba, ‘Kure uhende?’
40009006	Kya indi kundu muidime imanya kee Mana o mndu nyi awode pfinya kunu orukenyi yehooṟia madeko.” Amshika iya kawia ulya muumu shiwungo, “Kekure-ng'u uire kitaṟa kyapfo nohende kanyi kopfo!”
40009007	Nao kahoṟoka chimu, kahenda kulya mba koke.
40009008	Kyasia wandu walya wakeri-ho mamwingi wamewona wado wakaowuo wakang'anyisha Ruwa ainengye wandu pfinya ing'anyi ido.
40009009	Kyasia Yesu amewuka alya kaida mbele kawona mndu adamye alya kisanyonyi kya okamba, ewio nyi Matayo. Nao kambia, “Kenjo nooshane na inyi!” Nao kakure kahenda oshana nao.
40009010	Kikashika ili adamie kelya shelya ipfo mba, adi a iwa wasanyi wa okamba sa wafoi na wandu wanyamaṟi wakacha napfo wakadamya na Yesu na wa-kiloshyonyi kyake alya kilionyi kya shelya.
40009011	Naho Wafarisayo wamewona wado wakacha iwia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “A nyi kili mlosha onu alya shelya na wesana okamba na wetehya?”
40009012	Kyasia ameicho wededa wado, nao kahamba, “Iwo wai wecha chiwo wawode weshiha mhangapfo, chila na iwo waluo.
40009013	Kekumbuonyi mutawuke imanya nyi kiki iki kii kihambe, Kindo njikundi nyi isaṟya ma chi idasapfo. Kipfa wandu njicheye ilaha ma chi iwo wa wusumuhanyipfo, chila na wandu wanyamaṟye.”
40009014	Nalyo wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wakacha na handu ai wakahamba, “Nkyili so lochekekwotoya na Wafarisayo, kya indi wa kiloshyonyi kyafo wakada walakwotoya?”
40009015	Na Yesu kawawia, “A wandu wa walinyi waidime iwado nyi fowa ili menyi-wali akeri nawo? Na kukae kushike mafiri iliindi menyi wali echiondwo kowo, nyilyo wechikwotoya.
40009016	Ma kuwode mndu echipfumya kidami kya nguwo njihya nakisanze na nguwo ya kachapfo, kipfa kilya kihya kyewuta-ho ikyo kiku na handu harandukye hakaengeṟa ing'ana.
40009017	Ma kwipfo mndu echiwika mvinyo fo kipfuo selelenyi njikupfo, kipfa kokoya awika-pfo selela-tso nyi tsechidwika na mvinyo fukapusukya wanda na selelatso tsikanyamaṟika. Indi mvinyo mhya nyi wefuletsya selelenyi njihya nasho shikakia shi shiwi.”
40009018	Ili kewawia ado adi aichu mndu o wuitoṟi kacha naho kamolokya ndenyi kahamba, “Mana oko o waka wulalu anenuka. Indi ukucheye-wo nomhekye owoko lopfo naho nyi echiwada moo!”
40009019	Na Yesu kakure-ho wakaduana nao na wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
40009020	Naho adi a ichu mka aluo iwuka samu kusiie-ho maaka ikumi na iwi, kimatsika amewoko. Kacha kya numa kapaya mambo ya nguwo yake.
40009021	Nyi ili alehia mrimenyi foke kahamba, “Ma ngapaya nguwo yake tupu na njechichia!”
40009022	Kyasia Yesu kaindukya numa kambia, “Kewuyo nyi moo manoko, kidikyo kyapfo kyamekukiṟa.” Naho mka ulya kachia kiwokya saa na iya.
40009023	Naho Yesu amshika kulya mmba ko mchili ulya amewona-pfo na walya wekapa mtoṟiṟo na mamingi fo wandu fofahya, kahamba, “Kekurenyi-ho, mana chu o waka ma chi apfiepfo, nyi alee mado.”
40009024	Nawo wakamseka.
40009025	Kyasia wandu walya wamidima ifuno, kaida na mba kambada owoko. Naho mana ulya o waka kahoṟoka.
40009026	Na mbonyi tsilya tsikahenda dung'ana kulya orukenyi kose.
40009027	Kyasia Yesu ambuka alya naho wandu wawi wakacha numa yake, wai wapfu meso, wakairya ṟu wakahamba, “Kelusaṟye-wo wukiwa wodu iyo Mana o Dawidi!”
40009028	Kyasia amiida na mba walya wapfu meso wakacha na handu ai. Na Yesu kawawia, “Na muweidikye ke na njechiidima iwuta iki?” Wakambia, “Ee-wo Mndumii!”
40009029	Nalyo kapaya meso hawo kahamba, “Kiidikyo kyanu chando mwidikye na wudo mochiwona!”
40009030	Meso hawo hakatambaṟuka. Na Yesu kawakekedya kahamba, “Ambuyenyi ma kulakae ma mndu echimanya ma umu!”
40009031	Kyasia nawo wakawuka-pfo wakahenda mduo ṟamba kulya orukenyi koose.
40009032	Kyasia walya wechihenda kudi wakamendye mndu ai pipi awodo nyi mṟufu mbicho.
40009033	Naho mṟufu fulya mbicho fomefuno, ulya ai pipi kawuya ideda. Na wandu walya wakeri-ho mwamwingi wakaṟihio wakahamba, “Kunu kidi kya Israeli kulemewoneke kindo kidopfo.”
40009034	Kya indi Wafarisayo wakahamba, “Nyi mnene o mṟufu mbicho nyio awa mofuna nao mṟufu mbicho.”
40009035	Na Yesu kawa motengetatengeta kelosha kulya sinagogenyi tsawo kyechionguo mbonyi tsa sia tsa wumangi wo Ruwa kekiṟa na orio ndaṟe yose na wunyonge wose.
40009036	Kya indi ili kewona wandu walya mamwingi nao kawalilia makulili nyi ili wai warohye wai wahutse wanda cha machondi halawode mlisi.
40009037	Nalyo kawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Shesambuo nyi shifoi indi weṟunda wakanyia-ho,
40009038	Keterewenying'u Mndumii o kisanyionyi nadume waṟundi wafoi alya kisanyionyi kyake.”
40010001	Naho kalaha wa kiloshiyonyi walya ikumi na wawi kawainengya pfinya yeng'anya mrufu mbicho kundu wechiifuna na ikiṟa ndaṟe tsose na wunyonge wose.
40010002	Na wasu walya marina hawo nyiho iha, o kuwoka nyi Simon ewio nyi Petro na Andrea manomae, na Yakobo ai mana o Sebedayo, na Yohane ai manomae.
40010003	Filipo na Bartolomayo, Toma na Matayo ichu awei msanyi o okamba, Yakobo ai mana o Alifayo na Lebayo,
40010004	Simon o kulya ya Kana na Yuda Iskariote nyio ichu alemṟingya.
40010005	Iwa ikumi na wawi nyiwo Yesu alewaduma kawawawasa kahamba, “Manya mlahende ko wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu, ma mrinyi ko Wasamaria mlaide napfo.
40010006	Indi mwengeṟe ihendya machondi hadekye ha mba ya Israeli.
40010007	Kya indi ili muihenda keongwonyi muhambe, ‘Dumbuyenyi kyamba wumangi wo ruwehu womeafukya kufui!’
40010008	Kiṟenyi iwo waluo, ṟutsenyi iwo wapfu, heṟemtsenyi iwo wawodo nyi iwawe, funenyi mṟufu mbicho. Nyi mleambya kya wulya, keveinengyenyi kya wulya.
40010009	Ma mlakuwonye sahabu na shilingi ma pesa sheṟika ipfo kikuchunyi kya ngowa mukupfungye natso.
40010010	Ma kichoṟe kya kyaṟo ma kanzu tsiwi ma shadu ma kidi kechumia. Kipfa moṟunda nyi asumuhanye na shelya shake.
40010011	Kya indi mṟinyi ko wandu wafoi kundu momeida napfo mṟinyi ko wandu watutu ketumenyipfo mndu akeri-ho asumuhanyi Napfondo mochikukaya mtane mokure muhende kungi.
40010012	Indi mukaanga mba ya mndu keiṟikiṟenyi!
40010013	Na mba-yo kokoya nyi isumuhanyi na ofoṟo lonu luisokye huye yayo. Kya indi ikada ilasumuhana na ofoṟo lo luwembuuya nyo.
40010014	Na mndu alamondwo na kanyi koke alaadanye ma madedo hanu, nanyo mkashika wuka kulya mba ang'u mṟinyi kekutekutenyi madende kiluli-kyo kiwuke-pfo.
40010015	Na kya lohi ngambia, kilya kya oruka lo Sodoma na Gomora nyi kyechyiangwo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kya mṟifo.”
40010016	“Ambuyenyi inyi njiimduma cha machondi hai kiidi kya makite ha ngeṟenyi Kyasia-ng'u kekaenyiho mui na wuṟango cha njoka mlai na mtambo mui cha mbeta.
40010017	Kya indi kuṟisenyi na wandu Kipfa nyi wechihenda mduo kulya mba wededya shama shawo na kulya sinagogenyi tsawo wawemkapa na ngowa-tso tsii njitochye msha.
40010018	Na oshangunyi lo wachili na wamangi muwedao kipfa kyako, kiwe nyi kya kiṟingishyo kyawo na wa mbaṟi njihenu.
40010019	Indi mkamkoya wehenda mdambika wado, nanyo ma mlawado nyi makusaṟo chando mochideda-ho ke nyi wuda anu ke nyiki, cha kifa saa iya nyi mochinengyo ishi shehamba-ho.
40010020	Nyi ili wededa-ho chi nyofo, nyi Mumuyo o Ndeyanu ededa ai nanyo.
40010021	Kya indi kukae manomae o wandu nadambike manomae kya opfu na ndee o mndu nawedambika mana, na wana wa wandu waamkye iwo wawafeye na ihenda iwashihiya ofu!
40010022	Nanyo muwe nyi mochisukya wandu wose kipfa kya rina lyako. Kya indi ichu mokarishya-ho kaweda kushike ili masiyonyi echikiṟo.
40010023	Kya indi mkamkoya wemterengya kunu mṟinyi ifu kedichyenyi fulya fungi. Kifa nyi kya lohi ngambia ma mochimaa mamṟi ha Israeli Manomndu alachapfo.
40010024	Molosho neida moloshapfo, ma isinga lyekaa huye ya Mndumii olyopfo.
40010025	Nyi kyashika molosho ili awa cha mlosha oke, na isinga ili lyawa cha mndumii olyo. Wamtana wamlaha menyi nyi Belsebuli, a wana wa kanyi koke kyawo chi kya wue̱ra?”
40010026	“Kyasiang'u manya mulawone mochiwaowuo. Kipfa kwipfo kindo kii kipfinyike kide kilapfunuka numapfo, ma kindo kii kiṟike kide kilapfunuka numapfo, ma kindo kii kirike kide kilamanyikapfo.
40010027	Iki ngambia meemenyi kekihambenyi senyi na kindo moicho mowewedyo madunyi kekyongwonyi na pata.
40010028	Nanyo ma mlaowuo walya wewaha mbihu kya indi mrima-fo walaidime ifuwaha. Keengeṟenyi yowuo ichu moidima idetsa na mrima na mbihu handu hamu ii iwi idekye kulya Gehena.
40010029	A njoṟiwu tsiwi chi tsekekumbo senti imu? Natso ma imu-ho yemanya iho wanda kulawode Ndeyanu akundipfo.
40010030	Ma njui tsa kunu mdonyi konu na tsiwenjiitale tsose.
40010031	Kyasia-ng'u ma mlaowuo, na nyo chi mung'anyi kota njoṟiwu ma tsikafo chi muweng'anyi nyo?”
40010032	“Nahonu orio mndu ose ichu echinjihamba oshangunyi lo wandu, na inyi mbemhamba oshangunyi lo Wande o ipfo ruvehu.
40010033	Kya indi orio mndu ose ichu echinjikana oshangunyi lo wandu, na inyi mbemkana oshangungi lo Wande o ipfo ruwehu.”
40010034	“Ma mlawone mochihamba kindo njicheye iwika kunu masangenyi nyi ofoṟo. Chi ofoṟo njicheye yende napfopfo, nyi oshu.
40010035	Nyi njicheye njiletsane mndu na ndee, na mana o waka na mae, na mali o mana na mamii oke.
40010036	Na wakituwa wa mndu kiwe nyiwo wana wa kanyi koke.
40010037	Ulya akundi ndee ang'u mae kawakunda kota inyi, nanjiwaṟi-pfo. Na ulya akundi mana o womi anu o waka kawakunda kota inyi nanjiwaṟipfo.
40010038	Na mndu ada alakudika msalaba foke na icha oshana na inyi kunu numaako nanjiwaṟipfo.
40010039	Na mndu mowona moo foke nyi echiwuya ifudetsa; na mndu modetsa moo foke kikawa nyi kipfa kyako inyi nyi echiwuya ifuwona.”
40010040	“Mndu echimuambya ipfo kanyi koke nyi inyi anjiambya. Na monjijambya inyi nyi aambya ichu anjidumye.
40010041	Mndu echambya mwikimbi kikawa nyi kya rina lya mwikimbi, nyi echiwona kya woṟunda wo waikimbi. Na ichu echiambya mndu o wusumuhanyi, kikawa nyi kya rina lya mndu o wusumuhanyi nyi ewona kya woṟunda wo mndu o wusumuhanyi.
40010042	Na ichu echirutsa iwa watutu ya wose ma umu-ho kamrutsa na mṟinga mcheleri na kirahu kimu, kikawa nyi kya rina lya mndu o kiloshyonyi na kya lohi ngambia mndu-cho kyake kya woṟunda ma kyekaa kidekesepfo.”
40011001	Naho kikashika Yesu amidima iwawasa walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake ikumi na wawi, nao kakure kulya kundo akeri kahenda losha na yonguo kulya mamṟinyi hawo.
40011002	Kyasia Yohane nyi kulya kipfungonyi avekeri kaicho mawuto ha Kristo, kamdumya wa kiloshyo kyake kambia,
40011003	“Nyio iyo ichu a mhambe nekaa nache ang'u luwedye ungi?”
40011004	Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Hendenyi mushitsye Yohane mbonyi tso moicho na iwona.
40011005	Wapfu meso a-iwang'u waiwona, na shiricheche aiwa waihenda. Na waluo saka waiheremka, wapfu madu a iwa waicho, na wapfu nyi waṟuka, na wakiwa a iwa waiongoyo mbonyi tsa sia.
40011006	Nanga ulya alesukyo nyi inyi.”
40011007	Kyasia walya wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wahenda Yesu kawoka iwia wandu walya mamwingi mbonyi tsa Yohane kahamba, “A nyi kiki mulehenda ambuya kulya nuka? Ngesa nyi iṟeṟe lisingitso-singitso nyi otanu?
40011008	A nyi kiki mlehenda ambuyawo? Ngesa nyi mndu aṟee nguwo tsa kimamile? Walya waṟee nguwo tsa kimamile a walya wai mbenyi tsa wamangi.
40011009	A kilawe nyi kiki kilemnenga ihenda-pfo? Nyi kundu mochiwona mwikimbi ngesa? Ee ngambia na kota mwikimbi.
40011010	Kifa nyio amṟehye kyehamba kyake, ‘Ambuya na njekaa njidume msu oko mosonguo oshangu lopfo nao nakweke achikya njia yapfo ipfo mbele yapfo.’
40011011	Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Kiidi kya iwa wa wafee nyi mka kulemekure mndu ang'anyiye Yohane Mpatisipfo. Indi ichu a mtutu o wose ipfo wumangi wo Ruwa nyi ang'anyi kota o.
40011012	Kiwokya mafiri halya ha Yohane Mpatisi koshika wulalu wumangi wo ruvehu nyi wokewado na pfinya, na waafinya nyiwo wewurakwo-ho.
40011013	Kipfa waikimbi wose nyi walehamba shisuku na wuwawaso, nawo wakashika Yohane.
40011014	Na kokoya nyi mochikunda iidikya, o nyiong'u Elia ichu a mhambe nache.
40011015	Mndu awode madu headanya naweadanya.’
40011016	‘A nyi mfanano fo iki njewika mbaṟi i ya wandu?’ Nyi wafanana na shiwana shidamye tumo shechilaha wodoyawo shikahamba,
40011017	‘A ili lowemkapya mtoṟiṟo, nanyo ma mlashine. Nyi lomekapa shilio, nanyo ma mlafuhe?’
40011018	Nyi kulecha napfo Yohane mpatisi, ai mndu alelya, ma inyo, nawo wakahamba, ‘Nyi awodo nji mṟufu mbicho.’
40011019	Kukakaa kukacha napfo Mano-mndu, ai mndu echilya, na inyo, nawo wakahamba, ‘A ichu ai makilya na makinyo mvinyo, nyi mbuya ya wesana okamba na wenyamaṟa.’ Na wuṟango wo Ruwa wukaṟingishyo ilyi wuiṟunda.”
40011020	Nalyo Yesu kawooka dedya mamṟi halya kundo kuwutikye shilya shake awutye sha kiṟiha shifoi kipfa lyandi walaledumbuya kahamba,
40011021	“Ochia lopfo iyo Korasinyi ochia lopfo iyo Betisaida! Nokoe nyi kulya Tiro na Sidon kulewutika shindo sha kiṟiha cha isho shiwutikye kunu kiidi kyanu nawo nyi wawechidumbuya wunyamaṟi wowo lya kacha wakuṟaaye na shisaṟa sha wukiwa na ifu iloṟa idumbuya.
40011022	Kya indi nyi ngambia, kilya kya Tiro na Sidon nyi kyechianguo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kyanu.
40011023	Na iyo Kapernaumu, chi kuwemdosye kokoya ruvehu? Nyi ochikaa noolotso ushike Gehena. Kipfa kulya Sodoma nokoye nyi kulewutika-ho shindo sha kiṟiha cha isho shiwutikye kidi kyapfo, na mṟi fulya nokoe fuledeo-pfo fushike mfiri fo inu.
40011024	Nahonu ngamuwia, Kilya kya Sodoma nyi kyechianguo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kyapfo iyo.”
40011025	Kyasia mandi na halya Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Ngakuana, hoi Wande, kui mnene o ruwehu na oruka, kipfa ili mbonyi tsi utsiṟikye iwo waṟango na iwo waamtsu kowuya idambuya shikoku.
40011026	Na wudo kikeri-wo, hoi Wande, nyi kipfa kiwekuchihie kihende kido.
40011027	Shindo shose njiledambikyo nyi Wande. Ma kuipfo aichi Manapfo chila na Wande, ma kuipfo aichi Wandepfo chila na Mana na ichu Mana echikunda imdambuya.
40011028	Kekucheenyi na koko nyo, mukeri iwina muwei walemye nyi maṟio malemeri; na inyi njimuwihiṟye moo.
40011029	Kekudikenyi ngada njioke nyi inyi muche kuloshyo nyi inyi! Kyamba inyi nyi mhoo njikeri na mokunyinyiṟa kui mrima. Naho mochiwona koonyonya ko mrima yanu.
40011030	Nyi ili ngada njioke nyi inyi nyi nyioloṟu na iṟio lyako likaanguo.”
40012001	Mandi halya Yesu aleida kidi kya mdemi ya ngano ili mfiri fo Sabato. Kyasia walya wa kiloshyo wawodo nyi njaa naho wakawoka itowa mahaa wakalya.
40012002	Kyasia Wafarisayo wamewona wado wakacha imbia, “Ambuya wa kiloshyon kyapfo nyi wawuta kindo kilakiwikye momu kiwuto ili mkonu fo Sabato.”
40012003	Nao kawawia, “Nyimlasomye kilya Dawidi alewuta lyandi wawodo nyi njaa na walya wavekeri nao?
40012004	Chando aleida na mba ya Ruwa wakalya mkate iya yeṟihichya oshangunyi lo Ruwa, ilanjiwikye momu ilio ma nyio ma walya wakeri nao chila na wakohanyi wawenyi.
40012005	Ag'nu nyi mulasomye ipfo mawawasonyi, kya wakohanyi ke nyi vekewichuṟa mfiri fo Sabato nawo ma walawute-ho owingo?
40012006	Kya indi ngambia, ‘Ke iya na hawode ang'anyie hekalu.’
40012007	Kya indi kidedo kilya kyehamba ke, ‘Kindo njikundi nyi isaṟya, ma chi idasa.’ Nokoe muwekiichi ke nyiki, ma iwa walanyamaṟye kindo muwechiwahutsya owingofo.
40012008	Cha kifa Mana o mndu nyi akeri mnene na o Sabato.”
40012009	Naho kakure alyando awekeri kahenda-henda kashika ipfo sinagogenyi yawo. Naho adi aichu mndu akeri-fo o owoko luumu.
40012010	Nawo wakambesa wakahamba, “Nawo kiwesumuhanyi ikiṟa mndu ili mfiri fo Sabato ngesa?” Nawo nyi kundu wawone mwaanya fo mkumba.
40012011	Nao kawawia, “Kunu konu nyi o ku awode ichondi lyake limu. Kakoya liolokye ṟungunyi ili mfiri fo Sabato. Nao nade alacha iliwada na ilidosapfo?
40012012	Ashika-ng'u-wo mndu kyake mwidime ihamba nyi aidye ichondi kashika hanga? Kyasia kyamba nyi wudo ki na kiwesumhanyi iwuta sha wuoloṟu ili lya Sabato.”
40012013	Nalyo kawia mndu ulya, “Kehoṟuo owoko lofo!” Nao kaluhoṟuo lukawuya ichia lukawa cha lulya lungi.
40012014	Kyasia Wafarisayo wakahenda nja wakamdedya kyama kundu wambahe.
40012015	Yesu kekimanya, kakure-pfo kahenda kuleshe. Wandu wakaduana nao mamwingi sa funganyi Nao kawakiṟa wose.
40012016	Nao kawakekedya walahende imduo ṟamba.
40012017	Nyi kundu kushike kii kidede nyi mwikimbi Yesaya kehamba:
40012018	“A ichu msoṟo oko ndesambuṟa, a mkunde nyi inyi, ichu mrima foko fu mchihie nyio. Njechimbikya Mumuyo oko nakae huye yake nao nahende ongoya wandu wa masangenyi mbonyi tsa wusumuhanyi.
40012019	Echiloya ma ifahyafo. Ma kochikaapfo mndu echiicho ru̱ lyake kulya njienyi tsekyama mṟinyipfo.
40012020	Iṟeṟe likonoki echilifunjafo, ma orusu lo taa lui kenga echilurumishafo. Na natane aduo mbonyi tsa wusumuhanyi tsido-ho tsiwinshye.
40012021	Na rina lyake nyi lyo wandu wa masanga wawekusihya nalyo.”
40012022	Naho kaendyo mndu awodo nyi mṟufu mbicho a mpfu meso kavewa na pipi. Nao kamkiṟa. Ulya ai pipi kaidima ideda na yambuo.
40012023	Wandu walya wawekeri-fo mamwingi wakauma mkahai wakahamba, “Alae ichu chio mana o Dawidi?”
40012024	Kyasia Wafarisayo wamicho kihambo kido wakahamba, “Ichu nyi aifuna mṟufu mbicho kui pfinya ya Belsebuli ichu ai mnene o mṟufu mbicho.”
40012025	Kyasia Yesu amemanya mahio halya hawo kawawia, “Orio oruka lose ilu lulekanyi wenyi na wenyi nyi lochihaluka mrapu.
40012026	Na kokoya Satan kefuna Satan chi awa nyi alekanyi nao amonyi.
40012027	Na inyi kokoya nyi ngafuna mṟufu mbicho kui Belsebuli, ashika wana-wo wanu nyi kiki wefuna nakyo? A wumangi woke wuidime iwanga? Nahonu kyamba nyi wudo nyi nawo wechiwa nyi wemuwonya owingo.
40012028	Na inyi kokoya nyi Mumuyo o Ruwa nyefuna nao mṟufu mbicho, aiwung'u wumangi wo Ruwa womidima imuchea.
40012029	Ang'u ipfo mba ko mapfinya, njii wuda mndu echida napfo na iduo-pfo nzohoṟa tsake na pfinya, kulawode nyi echiwoka ipfunga mafinya cho? Lyondi echiiduo shindo sha kulya mba koke.
40012030	Mndu alakeri na inyi nyi asuanyi na inyi, na moda alasanya na inyi nyi erahanja.
40012031	Kyasiang'u nkyondo ngambia, ‘Orio wunyamaṟi wose wo mndu echehoṟyo na orio kirumo kyose, kya indi kirumo kyeruma Mumuyo Mwele kyakyo echihoṟyofo.
40012032	Na mndu echideda dedo kya isuana na Manomndu nechihoṟyo kyakyo. Kya indi mndu echideda dedo kya isuana na Mumuyo Mwele nechihoṟyo kyalyopfo ma ili akeri kunu wuyana wu, ma kashika wulya wochikaa wuche.’ ”
40012033	“Kokoya mowaya mdi fo ndunda njicha, na ndunda na njicha mochiwona. Anu mkawaya mdi fo ndunda njiporu, kyasia na ndunda tsafo na njiporu. Cha kipfa orio ikidi nyi lyechimanyika kui ndunda-tso tsalyo.
40012034	Nyo mui malea ha njoka, mumanye ideda kindo kicha, mui wawicho? Kifa ikyo kiichuo mrimenyi na dumbu lyo nakyo lyechihamba.
40012035	Mndu cho ai mcha ipfo kisenyi aṟikye kii kicha nyi echiendepfo kicha, na mndu chu mbicho ipfo kisenyi aṟikye ki kiwicho kawende-fo shindo shiwicho.
40012036	Kya indi inyi ngambia, ‘Ke orio mbonyi njiwicho iyo wandu wechideda nyi wekaa wawuwuyo ili mfiri fo mondu.
40012037	Kipfa ili madedo hapfo nyiho ochiwutaho iwiko wusumhanyi, na madedo hapfo nyiho ochiwuta-ho iwonyo owingo.’ ”
40012038	Walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo, maataho wakahalwo wakahamba, “Maarya, lukundi iwona kiṟingishyo kopfo iyo!”
40012039	Nao kahalwo kawawia, “Mbaṟi-i ya wandu i mbicho idahye na iṟuhuya nyi ipfula kiṟingishyo. Nayo ma yechinengyo kiṟingishyopfo chila na kiṟingishyo kya mwikimbi Yona.
40012040	Cha kipfa Yona chando awekeri kulya ndewunyi ya mkunga fulya handu ha mfiri iṟaṟu na shio shiṟaṟu, na Manomndu na wudo echikaa wusunyi wo oruka handu ha mfiri iṟaṟu na shio shiṟaṟu.
40012041	Nyi wandu wa kulya Niniwe wechikaa wahoṟoke alya kya moondu fofurumya kyanduyonyi handu hamu na mbaṟi i ya wandu waweiwutya owingo kipfa lyandi waledumbuya weongoyo nyi Yona. Na iki kii iya nyikinene kikaida Yona.
40012042	Nyi mangi mka ulya awukye kulya kya ora lo nuka echika̱a nahoṟoke alya kyanduyonyi kya mondu fofurumya, nahoṟoke-pfo handu hamu na mbaṟi i ya wandu naweiwutya na owingo, kipfa lilyaindi alecha awuka kishingonyi kya oruka, nache yadanya wuṟango wo Solomon. Na iya kuiho ang'anyie Solomon.”
40012043	“Kyasia iliindi mṟufu mbicho fochiwuka mndu nyi fochiida handu kuhadutsu, koonyonya fulawone.
40012044	Naho fokehamba, ‘Keleka njikuwuye na mba koko kundu ngawuka! Ili fochicha naho nyi fokoya kulawode menyi indi nyi kundo kui kwahye kui kusungusie.
40012045	Nalyo fukahenda fukaonduo mṟufu mbicho ingi mfungade i mbicho ikafuida fo fumenyi fukacha fuirie, ikasamya-ho ikakaa-ho. Naho mbonyi tsefurumya tsa mndu ulya tsikawa nyi mbicho kota na tsa kuwoka. Na mbaṟi i ya wandu i mbicho ido kyayo na wudo yehenda.’ ”
40012046	Kyasia kechideda ado na wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi, adi a ulya mae na wanawamae wahoṟoki kulya nja wakundi ideda nao.
40012047	Kyasia mndu umu kambia, “A walya mayo na wanawamayo wahoṟoki nja wakundi ideda na iyo.”
40012048	Nao kahalwo kawia ichu amongoya kahamba, “Nyi ohamba wama nyi wu? Na wanawawama nyi ohamba nyi waki?”
40012049	Kahoṟoya mawoko hake kya alya huye ya wa kiloshyonyi kyake kahamba, “A iwa wanawawama!
40012050	Kipfa mowuta shechihia Wande kulya ruwehu, nyi-ong'u anjikerye manowama na mshiki ang'u wama.”
40013001	Kyasia mfiri fukeri na fulya Yesu kawuka ipfo mba, kahenda damya alya hambehu lya ipalipali.
40013002	Naho wandu wakacha kuwumbya nao mamwingi sa funanyi Katana adoya alya ngalawehu kadamya-ho. Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu fuhoṟoki kulya hambehu.
40013003	Nao kadeda nawo mbonyi tsifoi tsikeri tsa mfanano kahamba, “Ambuya mndu mbaai alehenda waya mbeu.
40013004	Na ili kewaya tsilya maata tsikaoloka oo mbai ya njia Na shilehe shikacha shikatsimaa-ho.
40013005	Tsingi tsikaoloka hando hawode maho naho tsilawone-ho teri imoṟi. Natso kudi tsikakambiṟa ido owinyi kifa lya tsilawode teri ifo wanda.
40013006	Mnengeṟi fomedo tsikahya mu, natso kyamba tsilasotsye mri tsikauma.
40013007	Kya indi tsingi tsikaoloka kiidi kya msha. Na msha iya ikado ikatsipfumba.
40013008	Kya indi tsingi tsikaoloka ifo terinyi njicha. Tsikakumbya kilimu. Iya imu ikakumbaya ihana, iya ingi makumi haṟandaṟu, na iya ingi nyi makumi haṟaṟu.
40013009	Ichu awode madu headanya naweadanya!”
40013010	Walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakacha na hando ai wakambia, “Nyi kili odeda nawo kui mbonyi tsa mfanano?”
40013011	Nao kawavia, “Wandu wa wainengye imanya mbonyi tsa wumangi wo ruvehu tsii njiṟike nyiwo nyo, kya indi walya wa wanengyepfo.
40013012	Kipfa ichu awode nyi echinengo na yengeṟa kaveengeṟyo-engeṟyo. Kya indi ichu alawode na shilya awode echisoko da.
40013013	Nkyondo ngadedya nawo ku mbonyi tsa mfanano, kyamba nyi wechiambuya na meso walechiwona, nyi vechileshya-ho na madu walechiicho ma itawuka.
40013014	Nyi kundu kuhoye ipfo kowo kisuku kilya Yesaya ahambye kehamba, ‘Kya iicho mochiicho, mlemanya ma kindo, na yambuo mochiambuo mlewona ma kindo.
40013015	Nyi ili mrima ya wandu wa oruka-lu ii mumiṟe. Na madu hawo hakawa nyi malemeri yadanya Na meso hawo nyi watsingiṟi. Nawo kundo walewona na meso ma iicho na madu, ma imanya kindo na mrima wawone wewuya na numa, na inyi njiche iwakiṟa.’
40013016	Kya indi sia na yanu nyo meso hanu, kyamba nyi haiwona ishi mokewona na madu hanu hakaicho ishi mokeicho.
40013017	Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Kuwepfo waikimbi wafoi na wandu wa wusumuhanyi wailanga iwona ishi mokewona, nawo na ma walawone, na iicho ishi mokeicho, nawo ma walaicho.’ ”
40013018	“Keadanyenyi ng'u nyo mbonyitsi tsa mfanano tsa mndu mbaai o mbeu.
40013019	Orio mndu ose ili ekeicho dedo-lyo lya mbonyi tsa wumangi nalamanye, nyi ichu mbicho acha napfo karakuo-ho kilya kii kiwaaye ipfo mrimenyi koke Nyio ichu ambaye oo mbarinyi ya njia.
40013020	Na ichu ambaaye handu hawode maho nyio ichu echiadanya dedo lilya naho kakambiṟa iliidikya na sia.
40013021	Kya indi alawode mri asotsye ipfo kiidi kyake, nyi akeri nyi mokaa-ho oweṟe. Indi kambona kuiho wukiwa na iterengyo kipfa kya idedo-lyo nahonu kakambiṟa isukyo owinyi.
40013022	Na ichu a mbaaye kiidi kya msha nyio ichu echiadanya idedo-lyo. Kukakaa-pfo mawina ha kunu orukenyi na wulembi wolembo nyi masaa shikapfumba idedo-lyo lilakikumbye-se kilimu.
40013023	Kya indi ichu a-mbaaye ipfo terinyi njicha nyio ichu echiadanya idedo-lyo na ilimanya naho kahenda ikumbya kilimu. Ichu umu kawika ihana, na ichu ungi makumi haṟandaṟu, na ichu ungi makumi haṟaṟu.”
40013024	Kawuya kawaloṟa mbonyi tsingi tsa mfanano kahamba, “Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mndu alekumba mbeu njicha ipfo demehu lyake.
40013025	Ili wandu walee mado kukacha napfo mkituwa oke, kaengeṟa ikumbapfo mbeu tsa mambuṟo ipfo kiidi kya mbeke tsilya. Kakuhendya.
40013026	Kyasia mbeke tsamedo na ikumbya mahaa naho mamburo̱ hakawewoneka.
40013027	Kyasia masinga ha menyi kanyi hakacha naho hakambia, ‘Akashika-wo Mndumii, chi ulewekumba mbeu njicha kulya demehu lyafo. A nyiku-se lyawada-se mamburo?’
40013028	Nao kawawia, ‘Nyi mndu mkituwa aletana ado.’ Masinga halya hakambia, ‘Ngesa nyi ukundi luhende luhakuṟuo?’
40013029	Nao kahamba, ‘Ote,’ ili muikuṟuo mambuṟo-ho nyi mochiwona mokuṟuo na mbeke tso mutsisanze naho.
40013030	Kelekenyi shing'anyishane shi shiwi shishike iya mawehyenyi Komshika iya masanyonyi na inyi njiwie walya wesana, ‘Kesongwonyi isanya mambuṟo-ho muhafunge na shikonde kundu mochihakoṟa, kya indi mbeketso muhende itsisanya ipfo kikumbinyi kyako.’ ”
40013031	Kawuya kawaloṟa mbonyi tsa mfanano tsingi kahamba, “Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mbeu ya haradali iwekeri-fo. Mndu kaiduo kaiwaya kulya demehu lyake.
40013032	Nayo ii njitutu ikaida mbeu tsingi tsose. Kya indi kombona yamedo ikang'ana ikaida huye ya shindo shii shiwaye kulya demehu shose isho shitutu-tutu. Ikawa mdi fung'anyi. Na shilehe sha ruwehu shikatana shacha shikalaa marambenyi hayo.”
40013033	Kawuya kawaongoya mbonyi tsa mfanano tsingi, “Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mdi foshimbiṟa mso. Mka kafuduo kafusanganya msonyi ipongo kaṟaṟu. Fukatana fotarang'a fose piu.”
40013034	Mbonyi-tsi Yesu alededa ku mfanano tsose. Ma naladede nawo ma kindo kulawode nyi mbonyi tsa mfanano.
40013035	Nyi kundu kuinukye kilya ki kidede nyi mwikimbi Yesaya kehamba, “Njechitambaṟuo dumbu lyako kui mbonyi tsa mfanano, njechyedya shilya shiwei shirike kiwokya oruka lombiko.”
40013036	Nalyo Yesu kasama wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi. Kahenda ipfo mba koke. Walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakacha na handu ai wakahamba, “Kelutambahaluye-wo mbonyi tso tsa mfanano tsa mambuṟo ha alya demehu!”
40013037	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Ichu mowaya mbeu njicha nyi Manomndu.
40013038	Na dema nyi wuyana-wu. Na mambuṟo-ho nyi wana wa ichu mbicho.
40013039	Na mkituwa aletsiwaya nyi Satana. Na ili masanyonyi nyi iya masiyonyi ha wuyana. Na iwo wesana nyi wasu wa Ruwa.
40013040	Nahong'u chando mambuṟo hekesanyo na ihenda ikoṟo na modo na ili kochishika iya masiyonyi ha wuyana kiwe nyi wudong'u.
40013041	Manomndu nadume wasu wake ipfo wumanginyi woke wasanye mando haendye wusutsu hose na iwo wawutye sha mkika wawewasanya.
40013042	Wahende iwakumba kulya nungunyi ya modo Napfo kukae-pfo nyi ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.
40013043	Walya wa wusumuhanyi wawewaa ngeela cha mnengeṟi ipfo wumanginyi wo Nde-awo. Ichu awode madu naveadanya.”
40013044	“Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na kisa kya shindo sha wuitoṟi kiwei kiṟike wanda demenyi Mndu kakiwona kahenda kakiṟika. Nao lyandi awodo nyi sia kahenda kumba shilya awode shose piu, kacha ihuṟa dema lilya.”
40013045	“Kingi-se wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mndu mokapa mbucha echipfula lulu njicha.
40013046	Kyasia amewona lulu imu iwode mnu wuhuru wung'anyi, kahenda, kakumba shilya awode shose, kacha kaihuṟa.”
40013047	“Kingi-se wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na kindo kyedeha makunga kyeolotso alya ipalipalinyi kikadeha orio mbaṟi yose.
40013048	Kyameichuo wakakikuruya hambehu. Wakadamya-ho. Halya mecha wakahawiluya ipfo matelenyi. Na halya mawicho wakahakumba kuleshe.
40013049	Ili koshika masiyo ha wuyana na wudong'u Nyi wasu wa Ruwa wechicha wahende waweletsana iwo wawicho na iwo wa wusumhanyi.
40013050	Iwo wawicho wawehenda ikumba kulya nungunyi ya modo. Napfo kukae-pfo ifuha na imadya ngamru.”
40013051	Yesu kawawesa, “Ngesa nawo mowemanya mbonyi-tso tsose?” Wakambia, “Ee!”
40013052	Nao kawawia, “Kyasiang'u orio mlosha o mawawaso ose ichu a mloshe kya wumangi wo ruwehu nyi afananyi na mndu menyi kanyi awode kisa kyake aṟikye kawa moende-ho shindo shihya na sha kacha.”
40013053	Naho kikashika Yesu amidima ilosha mbonyi tsilya tsa mfanano tsose kakure kulya-ndo akeri.
40013054	Kacha na kulya mṟinyi kundu awukye. Kawaloshia kulya mba kundo wekumbuhananyia. Wakatana wawa mkahai. Wakahamba, “A mndu-chu kundu awutye wurango-wu na mawuto-ho ha finya nku?
40013055	Ichu chi mana o ichu mopacha shidi? Na Mae chi ewio nyi Maria na wanawamae chi Yakobo na Yosefu na Simon na Yuda?
40013056	Na washiki wake chi hondo wakeri wose kunu kodu? Alae mbonyi tso nku tsimbukya ngesa?”
40013057	Wakasukyo nyio. Na Yesu kawawia, “Nyi kipfa kuwode kundu mwikimbi amenekye-menekyepfo kulawode na kulya mṟinyi kundu awukye na kulya kanyi koke.”
40013058	Nao ma alawute mawuto ha pfinya hafoi kulya kipfa lyaindi walaidikye.
40014001	Kyasia mandi halya kuwepfo mangi tsa oruka tsiina, ulya umu-ho nyi Herode. Eleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu tseehambo wandunyi.
40014002	Kawia wasoṟo walya wake, “Ichu nyio Yohane Mpatisi. Nyi aleṟuka awuka ko wapfu wai! Nkyo kyainenga pfinya tsing'anyi tsikawoneka ipfo koke.”
40014003	Nyi kipfa Herode amewada Yohane kampfunga kamshingya mba ya wapfungo kipfa kya Herodia ai mka o manomae Filipo.
40014004	Kipfa lyandi Yohane alewa mombia, “Kikusumuhanye imduofo.”
40014005	Nao kakunda imbaha, kawuya yowuo wandu kipfa lyaindi waichi nyi ai mwikimbi.
40014006	Kyasia komeshika mfiri fokumbuo alya mafeonyi ha Herode, naho mana o Herodia o waka kahomia makidi hawi ha wandu. Katana achihiṟa mnu Herode.
40014007	Nakyo kikamnenga kambia kye nyi echimnenga kindo amekuterewya kelia-ho nyamu.
40014008	Nao kahenda kuloshyo nyi mae kahamba, “Ngaterewa ukunnengye mdo fo Yohane Mpatisi na ipalu!”
40014009	Na mangi kawado nyi fowa, kya indi nyi kipfa kya nyamu tsilya na wandu wadamye nao kimu kilionyi kya choonga nkyo kyamnenga kawawasa nainengo.
40014010	Naho kaduma mndu kahenda idumbuo Yohane mdo kulya kipfungyonyi.
40014011	Naho mdo foke fukaendo naho furio nyi ipalu. Fukainengyo mana ulya. Nao kahenda fudaya mae.
40014012	Na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakacha ira mnying'a fulya, wakafuṟika. Wakahenda wakaongoya Yesu mbonyi tsilya.
40014013	Yesu kaicho kakure pfo kahenda airo nyi ngalawa kahenda ikaa olele kuleshe na wandu. Wandu wakammanya wakambingya wechumia wawuka mṟinyi iya.
40014014	Kawuka-se kundu avei kawona mamwingi fulya kawaichyo wukiwa kachira wanyonge wawo.
40014015	Kyasia komshika iila walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na handu ai wakahamba, “Kundu ku nyi nuka na kiheri kyameidya Kesama-ng'u mamingi fu fo wandu, wahende kulya mamṟinyi wakuhuṟye-pfo shelya!”
40014016	Nao Yesu kawawia, “Wahende wada? Kewainenge shelya nyo muwenyi.”
40014017	Nawo wakambia, “Luwode kindo iyapfo chila na mkate itanu, na makunga hawi.”
40014018	Nao kahamba. “Njiendye-nyi na iya handu njii!”
40014019	Naho kawawasa wandu walya mamwingi wadamye alya maṟenyi. Kaira mkate iya itanu na makunga hawi. Kaambuya ruwehu kaidapfuma Ruwa. Kaifunja shifunjo kainengya walya wa kiloshyonyi mkate iya, Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakainengya wandu.
40014020	Wakalya handu hamu wose wakaihuda. Wakasanya mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu shilya wakaichuṟa shikunja ikumi na shiwi shiichuo pacha.
40014021	Na walya walelya wawefoi cha kufui na womi tupu shiku shitanu kulaipfo waka ma wana.
40014022	Naho kaitikya walya wa kiloshyon waide na alya ngalawenyi wahende ambadya kya kulya wamsongoe natane asama wandu walya mamwingi.
40014023	Nao amidima isama wandu walya mamwingi kado na kulya fumwuhu kui kuleshe na wandu nyi kundu naterewe. Kyasia komshika iila kakaapfo amonyi.
40014024	Na ngalawa iya ishikye kulya makidi hawi ha ipalipali ihataṟo mnu nyi masinanu kipfa lyaindi otanu luwasumuhanye oshangunyi.
40014025	Kyasia kuipfo iringa lya kamba lya kaana lya kio lyamshika nalyo kacha na kundu wai kechumia huya-ipalipali.
40014026	Wamembona kechumia huya-ipalipali wakaangalala wakahamba, “Nyi kiṟishe!” Wakafihiṟa kipfa kya wowu wulya.
40014027	Wadi Yesu kadeda nawo kahamba, “Kewuyonyi moo nyio inyi ma mlaowuo!”
40014028	Kyasia Petro kamhaluo kahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, kokoya nyi iyo kewawasa njiche na handu ui njiide kulya mṟingenyi!”
40014029	Nao kahamba, “Kucheye!” Na Petro kasoka kulya ngalawehu kachumia huyamṟinga kacha na handu Yesu ai.
40014030	Ili kewona otanu lulya kawuya yowuo kawoka isoṟowya mṟingenyi kafihira kahamba, “Hoi Mndumii kenletsa-wo!”
40014031	Nalyo liyenyi Yesu kahoṟuo owoko kambada kambia, “Ui mndu moidikya kitutu tupu! Nyi ki ili owuya iwado nyi mkeukeu?”
40014032	Kyasia wamdoya alya ngalawehu, naho otanu lukatsia.
40014033	Kyasia walya wa kulya ngalawenyi wakamolokya wanda wakahamba, “Na lohi na ukeri Mana o Ruwa!”
40014034	Naho wakaambadya kya kulya ora lo kawi wakaduo ngalawa mbarinyi ya oruka kulya Genesareti.
40014035	Kyasia na wasoṟo wa kundu kulya wamidima imanya wakaduma wasu kulya orukenyi kundu kutengye kose. Wakamendye wandu waiwawyo wose.
40014036	Na iterewa wakawa nyi imterewaterewa wapaye ma mambo tsa nguwo yake. Na walya wepaya wakawechia woose.
40015001	Naho kulya ko Mndumii Yesu kukacha napfo Wafarisayo na walosha wa wuwawaso wawuka kulya Yerusalemu wakahamba,
40015002	“Nyi kili wa kiloshyonyi kyafo wekeumbuya mbonyi luwadeye nyi waku? Kili welekesamba mawoko ili washika ilya mkate.”
40015003	Nao kawahaluo, “A kyanu nyo nyi kiili mokeumbuya iwawaso lya Ruwa kipfa kya mbonyi tsanu mu wadee tsa kacha?”
40015004	Cha kipfa Ruwa nyi awawasye kahamba, “India ndeo na mayo na moruma ndee anu mae nyi opfu napfe.”
40015005	Nanyo mukahamba kya ichu echiwia ndee ang'u mae, “Nyi kindo kehenda dasa ikyo muwechiwona koko.”
40015006	Kyake nyi mokehamba ke nalawone keindya-se nakyo ma ndee ma mae. Kikawa nyi mupfuluye iwawaso lya Ruwa kipfa kya mbonyi tsanu muwade tsa kacha.
40015007	Mui makulembetseṟe, na kicha kilya Yesaya alededa kyanu kehamba kisuku kahamba,
40015008	“Wandu wa oruka-lu nyi wekenjindya na madumbu hawo kya indi ngoo tsawo tsikahenda kuleshe na inyi.
40015009	Nyi wekenjio-lokyaolokya kya maai waipfunda njopfundo tsii mawawaso ha wandu.”
40015010	Nalyo kalaha wandu walya waiho mamwingi na ipfo koke kawawia, “Keadanyenyi imanya mumanye!
40015011	Kiteṟefutsie mndu wuwicho chi iki kehenda dumbunyipfo, nyi iki kyawuka dumbunyi nkyo kindo keterefutsa mndu wuwicho!”
40015012	Naho walya wa kiloshionyi wakacha na hando ai wakambia, “Na oichi ke Wafarisayo nyi wasukyo nyi idedo lyo waicho wado.”
40015013	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Orio kindo ki kidonge kulawode nyi Wande o ruwehu akidongye na kekuṟuo.
40015014	Lekanenyi nawo! Nyi wasongoru wai wapfu meso waisongoya wapfu meso. Kya indi mpfu-meso kasongoya mpfu meso njia nyi wechioloka ṟungunyi wa wawi.”
40015015	Kyasia Petro kahaluo kambia, “Kelutambahuye-wo mbonyi-tso tsa mfanano!”
40015016	Nao kahamba, “Ate na nyo momanya kindo?
40015017	Nyi mlaichi orio kindo kyose kyaida na dumbunyi nyi kehenda ndeunyi kikahenda wiko ṟungunyi kundu kovika mando?
40015018	Kya indi ishi sheuka dumbunyi nyi shekecha shiuka mrimenyi nasho nyisho shewikya mndu wuwicho.
40015019	Cha kipfa ipfo kiidi kya mrima nyi kokedo-pfo mahio mawicho na wuwahi na mbonyi tsa iṟuhuya na tsa wulala na wuiwi na madedo ha wongo hewonya mndu owingo na shirumo.
40015020	Nyi sho-ng'u shindo shewikya mndu wuwicho. Kya indi kolya kulasambie mawoko chikyo kyawikya mndu wuwichopfo.”
40015021	Naho Yesu kakure kulya kundu akeri kahenda kuleshe kulya shihongonyi sha Tiro na Sidon.
40015022	Naho adi a ulya mka o Wakananyia kacha napfo auka kulya mṟasenyi iya kakoṟoṟoma ilaha kahamba, “Kensaṟya-wo wukiwa woko hoi Mndumii ui Mana o Dawidi! Mana oko o waka aituro mnu nyi mṟufu mbicho fumbode.”
40015023	Nao ma nalahaluo ma kindo ma kimu. Naho wa kiloshionyi wakacha na hando ai wakamterewa wakahamba, “Kemsame-wo nyi aifihiṟa kunu numa-du.”
40015024	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Njii mdume kundupfo chila na ko machondi hadekye ha mba ya Israeli.”
40015025	Nao kacha naho kamwolokia ndenyi kahamba. “Hoi na hoi Mndumii njitarama-wo!”
40015026	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Chi kindo kisumuhanyi kosoka shiwana kando kokumbya makitepfo.”
40015027	Nao kahamba, “Ee-wo Mndumii. Kya indi ma makite na hekekuliya shipeṟengu sheoloka kitaṟenyi kya wenyi-sho.”
40015028	Nalyo Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Ee mka kiidikyo kyapfo nawo king'anyi. Na chando uwekundi nakyo kiwekushikya kido.” Naho mana ulya oke o waka kachia kiwokya saa na iya.
40015029	Kyasia na Yesu kawuka kulyando akeri kahenda kungi kashika kulya mawambao ha ipalipali lya Galilaya. Naho kado na kulya fumwunyi kadamia-ho.
40015030	Na wandu wakacha na hando ai mamwingi sa fung'anyi warie wandu wai shiricheche na wai ngokoṟo na wapfu meso na wai pipi na wengi wafoi. Wakawaleṟya oo madedenyi hake. Nao kawakiṟa.
40015031	Itane wandu walya wakeri-ho mamwingi waṟihio ili wawona walya wai pipi wewuya ideda na walya watiliwanyi maungo wakachia na walya wai shiricheche wakawuya ichumia na wapfu meso wakawuya yambuo. Nawo wakaidapfuma Ruwa o Israeli.
40015032	Kyasia Yesu kalaha wa kiloshionyi kyake na ipfo koke kahamba, “Ngasaṟa wukiwa wo mamwingi fo wandu-wa kyamba wamtsinda kunu koko mfiri iṟaṟu ma walawona kindo kelya. Na isama njikundi wasama walasusuopfo. Nyi wewona wearisikya njienyi.”
40015033	Na walya wa kiloshionyi wakambia, “A nku lochiwuta kando kafoi kadi kunu nuka wandu-wa wafoi wadi watane waihuda wose?”
40015034	Na Yesu kawawia, “Nyi mkate inga muwode?” Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi mfungade na shikunga shitutu.”
40015035	Nalyo kawawasa mamwingi fulya fo wandu wadamie wanda.
40015036	Kaira mkate iya mfungade na shikunga shilya. Kaana Ruwa. Kafunja-funja kainengya walya wa kiloshionyi. Na wa kiloshionyi wakainengya mamwingi fulya fo wandu.
40015037	Wakalya wakadung'ana wose wakaihuda. Na mtsuhaṟo fulya-fo shipeṟengu shilya wakadoduo. Shikunja mfungade shikaichuo.
40015038	Kya indi walya welya-ho nyi wasoṟo washikye shiku shiina, kouta wana na waka.
40015039	Naho kasama mamwingi fulya fo wandu. Kadoya kulya ngalawenyi. Kashika kulya mambatsana na kulya Magadanyi.
40016001	Kyasia kukacha napfo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo wecha mhesha wembesa nawaloṟe kiṟingishio kiwuka ruwehu.
40016002	Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Ili koila nyi mokehamba, ‘Ngama nyi kochiwaa kipfa ili ipfo ruwehu kofana samu.’
40016003	Na ngamenyi mukahamba, ‘Inu nlya nzinde nyi ili ipfo ruwehu kofana samu kukaṟiṟimaa fana ya ipfo ruwehu kyayo mukaidima iletsana, kya indi shiṟingishio sha maheri kyasho mulamanye.
40016004	Mbaṟi i ya wandu ii mbicho idahye na wameluki nyi ishiha kiṟingishio. Nayo ma yechiinengo kiṟingishioyo, chi kokoya nyi kiṟingishio kya Yona.’ ” Nalyo kawada-ho kahenda.
40016005	Naho walya wa kiloshionyi wakaambadya oruka lo kulya mbele ya ipalipali wahadimye iduo mkate.
40016006	Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Keambuyenyi mukuṟise mdi foshimbiṟa mkate ifu fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo.”
40016007	Nawo wakadeda-deda na mrima yawo injenyi wehamba, “Nyi kipfa ili luladuo mkate.”
40016008	Kyasia Yesu kekimanya kahamba, “Nyi ki ili mwideda na mrima yanu mui wandu wa iidikya litutu.
40016009	Nyi mulametawuka imanya ma mlakumburie mkate iya itanu ya wandu walya washikye shiku shitanu na mkunja iya muleiraho chando iwefoi?
40016010	Ma mulakumburie ma mkate iya mfungade ya wandu walya washikye shiku shiina na shikunja shilya muleira-se chando shiwefoi?
40016011	A nyi wuda kii-se ili mulakunda ma imanya ke chi kya mkate ngadeda nanyopfo. Kya indi kekuṟisenyi mdi foshimbiṟa mkate fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo.”
40016012	Nalyo wakamanya kilya awawia wakuṟise ke nyi kilakeri kya mdi fo mkate fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo chila na kya mloshie fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo.
40016013	Kyasia Yesu kashika kulya shihongonyi sha kulya Kaisaria ya Filipo. Kawesa wa kiloshionyi kyake kahamba, “A wandu wekededa wada kya Manomndu nyi akeri nyi wu?”
40016014	Nawo wakahamba, “Iwo wengi nyi Elia na iwo wengi nyi Yeremia ang'u nyi o waikimbi umu-ho.”
40016015	Kawawia, “A kyanu nyo mokehamba njikeri nyi wu?”
40016016	Naho Simon Petro kahaluo kahamba, “Iyo nyi ukeri Kristo Mana o Ruwa ichu menyi moo.”
40016017	Kyasia Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Ungusu iyo Simon Petro, kipfa manya chi nyama ma samu shakudambuya ishipfo chila na Wande o ipfo ruwehu.”
40016018	Kyasia na inyi ngakuwia, “Iyo nyi Petro (mndu ai iho) na iho nyilyo njechilihekya siṟi yako. Nayo na shichumi sha Gehena shechiidima ifoyapfo.
40016019	Njechikuinengya njopfunguo tsa wumangi wo ruwehu, na kindo opfunga kunu orukenyi kyoose kiwekaa kikipfunge; na orio kindo omepfunguo kunu orukenyi kyoose na kulya ruwehu na kyekaa kiwei kipfunguo.”
40016020	Nalyo kakekedya walya wa kiloshionyi walawie ma mndu ke nyi akeri Kristo.
40016021	Nalyo kiwokya-lyo Yesu kawoka iloṟa wa kiloshionyi kyake kye na nahende kulya Yerusalemu na ihenda iliso wukiwa wunyanyi nyi wasongoru wa wandu na Wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa mawawaso na imbaha wawembaha na ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu naṟuke.
40016022	Na Petro kamonduo na ndenyi koke kawoka imdedya kahamba, “Kyakyo Ruwa nakiitse kuleshe Mndumii, kiti kindo kido kechikuhoya!”
40016023	Nao kainduka kawia Petro, “Kewuya na numaa-ko, Satana, nyi onjiendye wusutsu. Nyi kipfa chando uihia chi kya Ruwapfo nyi kya wandu.”
40016024	Nalyo Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Ichu echikunda icha na inyi iya num-ko naa nakukane amonyi nakudike na msalaba foke nache oshana na inyi.
40016025	Kipfa ichu echikunda iletsa moo foke kikawa nyi kipfa kyako inyii nyi echifuwona.
40016026	Kipfa iki mndu echiira-ho kya wowina woke nyi kiki kokoya nyi awinyia wuyana wose kawuwona kadetsya-ho moo foke? Ang'u kindo mndu echiwika kiwe ndalai ya moo foke nyi kiki?
40016027	Kipfa nyi kochikaa Manomndu nache ai wusuṟinyi wo Nde arianyi na wasu wake wa ruwehu. Nalyo nainengye orio mndu ose kyake kimsumhanye ipfo mawutyenyi hake.
40016028	Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wandu-wa wahoṟoki iya kuwepfo sa waangu-ho wekaa walasaha opfu na watane wawona Manomndu kecha ai na wumangi woke.’ ”
40017001	Kyasia komida-ho mfiri iṟandaṟu nalyo Yesu kaduo-ho Petro na Yakobo na manomae Yohane. Kahenda nawo kado kundo ko fumwuhu lii lileshe hando ha kisekenyi.
40017002	Nalyo kailachika kawada fana ya sa wawonyi. Kyamu kyake kikawa ngeela cha mnengeṟi na nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu cha sa.
40017003	Naho kudi a walya Mose na Elia wakakuloṟa nawo wechiongoyana nao mbonyi.
40017004	Kyasia Petro kahaluo kawia Yesu, “Ale Mndumii. Iya nyi haluchihia hekukaya. Komkunda na inyi njiwike mahema haṟaṟu kunu, limu nyi lyapfo na limu nyi lya Mose na limu nyi lya Elia.”
40017005	Kededa kudi a ili ipuchi liwode ngela likacha wawikya maṟishe, nalyo a lilya na ṟu lyawuka alya kiidi kya ipuchi likahamba, “Aichu Manoko a mkunde ichu njii mchihie nyio! Nyio mochimwadanya.”
40017006	na walya wa kiloshionyi wameicho wado wakaho wanda na kyamu wakaowuo mnu muowoe ingi.
40017007	Nalyo Yesu kacha na hando wai kawapaya kahamba, “Kekurenyi ma mlaowuo!”
40017008	Wakairia meso hawo naho walakiwone-se ma mndu na Yesu amonyi.
40017009	Kyasia ili walesoka kulya fumvunyi Yesu kawatutuma kahamba, “Ma mlawone mochihamba kiwonesyo kyo na muwede Mana o mndu natane aṟuka awuka ko wafu.”
40017010	Nalyo walya wa kiloshionyi wakambesa wakahamba, “Kikeri-ng'u kida ili walosha wa mawawaso wehamba ke Elia na nasonguo icha kuwoka?”
40017011	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Macheenyi ha Elia na ekaa nache nawihiṟe shindo shose wuhya.
40017012	Kyaindi inyi ngambia, ‘Elia nyi alemecha, na wandu walamanye indi wakamtana chando wawekundi. Na Manomndu na wudo nawekaa naliso wukiwa nyiwo.’ ”
40017013	Nalyo walya wa kiloshionyi wakatawuka imanya ke nyi aideda nawo kya Yohane mpatisi.
40017014	Kyasia ili walekoya mamwingi fulya fo wandu naho mndu kacha napfo kampfirya-ndi.
40017015	Kahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, kesaṟya mana oko wukiwa, nyi awodo nyi osuko lo meri kawawio mnu iki kiwicho-wicho. Nyi kifa kafoi awa moho modonyi na kafoi nyi mṟingenyi.
40017016	Na inyi ngamende na ko iwo wa kiloshionyi kyapfo nawo walaidime ma imchiṟa.”
40017017	Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Mui mbaṟi ya wandu ilawode iidikya muhendye na mkika, akashika njekaa nanyo njishike indi? A njimduo njishike indi? Mendenyi na handu njii!”
40017018	Na Yesu kamdedya kya imwowesha nalyo mṟufu fulya mbicho fukambuka. Na mana ulya kachia kiwokya saa na iya.
40017019	Nalyo walya wa kiloshionyi wakacha na hando Yesu ai kundu kulai wandu wakahamba, “Nkyili so lulaidima ifufuna?”
40017020	Nao kawawia, “Nkipfa ili muwode mudo kiidikyo kyangu. Kifa nkya lohi ngambia, ‘Kokoya nyi muwode idikya ling'anyi cha mbeu ya haradali na mochiwia fumvu li, kure aa hando ukeri uhende alya. Nalyo na lyeteshuka. Naho ma kulekikaa-se ho kindo mlechiidima.’ [
40017021	Kyamba mbaṟi ii ya mṟufu mbicho yewukayo chila nyi kui pfinya ya iterewa na ikwotoya.]”
40017022	Kyasia wakeri iida-iida kulya Galilaya warianyi handu hamu wose nalyo Yesu kawawia, “Manomndu akeri ihenda idambikyo mawokonyi ha wandu.
40017023	Nawo iwaha wambahe, indi ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu naṟuke.” Nawo wakasokyo mnu nyi fowa ing'anyi.
40017024	Kyasia ili washika kulya Kapernaumu, nalyo walya wesana shilingi iya ya okamba lo hekalu wakachea Petro wakahamba, “Alae mlosha onu nekelekya shilingi ya okamba lo hekalu ngesa?”
40017025	Kahamba, “Na echiwika.” Kyasia amida na mba nalyo Yesu kasonguo imbesa kahamba, “Nyi uihia-ho kuda Simon? Wamangi wa masanga wandu wekewawesa njokamba na kodi nyi waki? Ngesa nyi wana wa kanyi kowo ang'u nyi iwo wa kundu kungi ngesa?”
40017026	Ili ahaluo, “Na iwo wa kundu kungi.” Yesu kambia, “Nahong'u wana wakawa-ng'u nyi wai wawute-pfo.
40017027	Kya indi nyi kundu lulawaendye wusutsu kehenda-ng'u kulya ipalipalinyi ukumbe kimenya kedeha makunga. Na ikunga-lyo lyechisonguo ido uliwade. Nalyo kotambaṟuo dumbu lyalyo nyi ochiwonaho fesa. Nayo uduo uhende iwainengya handu hako na iyo.”
40018001	Kyasia saa na iya walya wa kiloshionyi wakacha na handu Yesu ai wakahamba, “Alewo mnene o wodoe ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu nyi o ku?”
40018002	Nao kalaha naho kimana kakiwika oo kidi kyawo.
40018003	Kahamba, “Na kya lohi ngambia, ‘Mukada mulahaluka’ mukawa cha shiwana ma mochikoya wumangi wo ruwehu muide naho-pfo.
40018004	Kyasia-ng'u ichu mokunyinyiṟa amonyi kawada mbaṟi ya kimana-ki nyio awa mnene o wodoe ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu.
40018005	Na kimana kidi cha iki mndu kakyambya ipfo kanyi koke kikawa nyi kipfa kya rina lyako nyio inyi anjiumbya.”
40018006	“Na iwa watutu wakusirye koko inyi ma ichu umuho mndu kamendye wusutsu kyake iki kichakicha-ho nyi wei ihenda ipfungyo iseo nzingonyi nahende olotso kulya ipalipalinyi makidi hawi kundo kuṟungukye kukahenda wanda.
40018007	Ochia nyi lo wuyana kipfa kya mbonyi tsiendye wusutsu tsikeri-ho. Nyi kipfa mbonyi tsiendye wusutsu icha na tsiche. Kyaindi ochia nyi lo mndu-chu mbonyi tsa wusutsu tsechicha nao.
40018008	Kikuendye wusutsu kokoya nyi kuwoko kopfo ang'u kudende kopfo kumanye ukukumbe aleshe. Nanga iyo koida ipfo kwenyi moo kui kileta ang'u kui kiricheche kota ili owode mawoko hawi na madende hawi kohenda kumbo kulya modonyi fo mlungana.
40018009	Na kikuendye wusutsu kokoya nyi riso lyapfo likuṟuo nolikumbe aleshe. Nanga iyo koida na ipfo kwenyi moo kui njeche kota ili owode meso hawi kohenda kumbo kulya modonyi foaka mlungana.”
40018010	“Ambuyenyi ma mulamine iwa watutu ma ichu umu-ho. Kipfa ngambia, ‘Wasu wawo wa ipfo ruwehu nyi wailungana iwona kyamu kya Wande o ipfo rewehu. [
40018011	Nyi kipfa mana o mndu nyi achee nakiṟe iki kidekye.]
40018012	Nyi mwihia-ho muda? Kokoya ma mndu awode machondi ihana kawona limu lideka-ho chi echida-ho halya makumi kenda na kenda kulya shitonyohu kahenda pfula lilya lidekye?
40018013	Kokoya keliwona, na kya lohi ngambia kyalyo echiengeṟa ichihio kota na kya halya makumi kenda na kenda haladekye.
40018014	Na wudo kindo kilakikunde nyi Wande o ipfo ruwehu nyi iwa watutu kudekye-ho ma ichu umuho.’ ”
40018015	“Indi kokoya manomayo akunyamaṟye na iyo uhende umhoṟye deko lyake mukeri-ho nyo nao muwawi. Kokoya kekwadanya hoo nyi okuwonya manomayo.
40018016	Indi kada alakwadanya iyo uhende onduo mndu umu uche nao ang'u wawi, na orio kidedo kededo-ho kyose kundu kehoṟoka kiwange kui dumbu lya wakaṟa wawi ang'u waṟaṟu.
40018017	Indi kada alaadanya iwo nohende ikyongoya siṟi. Kada alaadanya siṟi naho nakuwie cha o mbaṟi njihenu na msanyi o okamba.”
40018018	“Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, ‘Orio kyose momepfunga kunu orukenyi na ipfo ruwehu na kikae-ho kiwei kipfunge. Na orio kindo kyose momepfunguo kunu orukenyi na ipfo ruwehu kekaa-ho kiwei kipfunguo.’
40018019	Na kingi-se ngambia, ‘Nyo mui wawi ang'u waṟaṟu-ho kombona wamidikyana kimu kya kindo ma kida ma kida wakiterewa na wechikiwona wainengo nyi Wande o ipfo ruwehu.
40018020	Cha kipfa kundu komsanza wawi ang'u waṟaṟu kuirina lyako inyi napfondo mbei ipfo kiidi kyawo.’ ”
40018021	Nalyo Petro kacha naho kammbesa, “Ale Mndumii! Manowama nyi echinjinyamaṟya-nyamaṟya nashike indii na inyi njimhooṟie shilya anyamaṟie?
40018022	Ngesa njishike kamfungade naho-ngu?”
40018023	Yesu kambia “Ngakuwia manya chi mfungade ochishikapfo shila nyi makumi mfungade ka mfungade.” Kyasia-ng'u kyamba nyi wudo kii wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wafananyi na mndu mangi awekundi itala na masinga hake sile tsake hawode.
40018024	Kewoka itala nao kaendyo mndu awode sile yake ya talanta shiku ikumi.
40018025	Nao alawode ketaa Mndumii ulya kawawasa wahende kumbo wuhuru na mka na wana na shose awode kuwoneke shetaa.
40018026	Kyasia msoṟo ulya kakuhutsa wanda kamolokya ndenyi kahamba, “Kenjile-heṟuo-leheṟuo-wo na inyi njikutae shose.”
40018027	Kyasia Mndumii ulya kalia isinga lilya makulili kalilekya katana amdea na sile iya piu.
40018028	Kyasia isinga lilya lyekihenda ipfo nja kawona msinga wodoe lilya limu-ho liwode sile yake ya dinari ihana. Kamchinga oṟoo kambia, “Njitaa sile yako uwode!”
40018029	Isinga lilya odoe likakuhutsa wanda na kyamu likamterewaterewa likahamba, “Kenji-leheṟuo-leheṟuo-wo na njekaa njikutae.”
40018030	Nalakunde. Kahenda kamkumba kulya kipfungonyi na namtae sile iya awode.
40018031	Kyasia masinga halya wodoe hekiwona kiwe kido naho hakasokyo mnu nyi fowa ing'anyi. Hakahenda ongoya Mndumii ulya oho kilya kyawa kido kyose.
40018032	Nalyo Mndumii oke kamlaha kambia, “Kui isinga iwicho. Sile iya yako uwewode na inyi ngakudea yose piu kipfa lyandi onterewa.
