40018033	A iyo chi kiwewekusumuhanye isaṟya isinga odoo na chando inyi ngawekusaṟya iyo?
40018034	Na Mndumii oke karihinyika nyashi kamdambikya walya wetu̱ura na natane ataa sile iya yake awode yose.
40018035	Na Wande o ipfo ruwehu na wudo echimbika nyo mkada mlahoṟyana kui mrima mndu na odoe shilya mnyamaṟyanyi.”
40019001	Kyasia Yesu amemaa ideda madedo halya kakure awuka kulya Galilaya kashika kulya shihongonyi sha Yuda kulya mataya ya Yordanyi.
40019002	Na wandu wakaduana nao mamwingi fung'anyi. Nao kawachiṟa akeri kundu kulya.
40019003	Nalyo Wafarisayo wakacha napfo wecha mhesha wakahamba, “Nawo kisumhanyi ngesa mndu nalekane na mka oke ma kokoya nyi kipfa kya iki ma iki ngesa?”
40019004	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Ma mlasomie ke ichu awawumbye nyi alewawumba wakawa nyi mndu msoṟo na mka?”
40019005	Kahamba, “Nkyondo kechiinenga mndu nalekane na ndee na mae na isanza na mka. Nawo wa wawi wawe nyi nyama imu.
40019006	Nahong'u walakiwe-se nyi wawi, nyi wai nyama imu. Kyasia-ng'u ikyo Ruwa alesangana amonyi ma mndu nalakiletsane.”
40019007	Wakambia, “Kikeri-ng'u kida ili Mose awawasie wandu wainengye mka baruo yemsama naho-ng'u wamsame-ng'u?”
40019008	Kawawia, “Mose nyi kipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanu nkyondo alembikya momu folekana na waka wanu. Manya chi wudo kiwekeri kiwokya lya mbokopfo.
40019009	Kyasia na inyi ngambia, ‘Ichu molekana na mka oke kulawode nyi kipfa kya wumbafu kahenda yalika mka ungi nyi ahaluka mbafu amonyi.’ ”
40019010	Walya wa kiloshionyi wakambia, “Mbonyi tsesungusia kya msoṟo na mka kokoya na wudo tsii nahong'u kichihiyese mndu naalikepfo.”
40019011	Kawawia, “Chi wose wechiidima iwada dedolipfo shila na iwa wa wainengye wechiliwada.
40019012	Cha kipfa nyi kuwode wasoṟo wai wahumba kui ifeo nyi mawo. Kukawekaa-pfo sa wai wahumba wa wawike wuhumba nyi wandu. Kukawekaa pfo sa wakuwikye wuhumba wawenyinyi kipfa kya wumangi wo Ruwa wawuwone. Moidima ikiwada nawekiwada.”
40019013	Nalyo wakamendie shiwana shitutu nashihekye owoko na ishiterewya. Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi wakawaima.
40019014	Yesu kawawia, “Kelekenyi shiwana shi ma mlashiime shecha na koko. Cha kipfa wandu wai wado chasho nyiwo wumangi wo ruwehu woewa wowo.”
40019015	Nalyo Kashihekya owoko kawuya kakure alya kahenda.
40019016	Naho adi aichu mndu kacha na handu ai kahamba, “Maarya, nyi kiki kicha njechiwuta njiwone moo fo mlungana?”
40019017	Nao kambia, “Nkyi ili ombesa kya iki kii kicha? Ichu a mcha nyi aiho umu tupu. Indi kokunda ida alya kwenyi moo kemanya mawawaso nohahendelye.”
40019018	Kahamba, “Maki?” Yesu kahamba, “Nyi iha, ma kulawahe ma kulaṟuhuye ma ulakunde iṟuhuyo ma kulaiwe ma kulahambe-ho shewonya odoo owingo lo wongo.
40019019	Indya ndeyo na mayo, nowekunda ma odoo chando ukundi moo fopfo kumonyi.”
40019020	Mndu ulya mleu kambia, “Kyasho na njileweshiinutsya. Aikyo njitsiheṟe nyi kiki-se-wo?”
40019021	Yesu kambia, “Kokunda uwe mndu moholotsya shose kehenda kumba shilya uwode ushiinenge wandu wakiwa naho ochiwada kisa kya shindo shifoi ipfo ruwe hu. Komeidima uche oshana na inyi.”
40019022	Kyasia mndu ulya mleu ameicho ado kahenda awodo nyi fowa. Nyi ili awode shichoṟe shake shifoi.
40019023	Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Mndu msuṟi nyi alemye ishika ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu.’
40019024	Na kingi-se ngambia, ‘Kyangu-ho nyi ngamia iide na ṟochenyi lya sindano kota mndu msuṟi naide na ipfo wumanginyi wo ruwehu.’ ”
40019025	Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wekiicho wado wakawuko nyi madima wakahamba, “Kokoya na wudo a nyi wu-se echiidima ikiṟo.”
40019026	Nalyo Yesu kawaambuya kahamba, “Kindo-kyo kunu ko wandu kechiwa iwutapfo, kya indi ipfo ko Ruwa shindo shose na shechiwutika tupu.”
40019027	Nalyo Petro kahaluo kambia, “Ambuya so nyi ludeye shindo shose lukakwituma iya numaa-pfo kyadu lochiwona-ho nyi kiki-wo?”
40019028	Yesu kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Nyo mui wandu weoshana na inyi ili koeshika iya mafeyonyi hewihiṟyo wuhya ilindi Mana o mndu echidamya loṟikehu lo wusuṟi woke nanyo mbedamya lorike-hu tsilya ikumi na tsiwi na idumbuo mondu ya mbaṟi tsa Israeli itsi ikumi na tsiwi.’
40019029	Na orio mndu ose ma oku ma oku ichu adeye ma wana wamae ma washiki wake ma ndee ma mae ma wana ma mhunda ma mba kikawa nyi kipfa kya rina lyako inyi orio kindo adee naweengeṟyo shipfoi naweoṟa na moo fokaa mlungana.
40019030	Kya indi kiwe wafoi wa wasongoru nyi wehaluka wafurumi na iwo wafurumi wawewa wasongoru.”
40020001	Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wafananyi na mndu menyi kanyi elelawa ikure kanyi ngamenyi nahende kushihya waṟundi weṟundya pesa wa kulya demehu lyake likeri lya msabibu.
40020002	Kyasia wamidikyana kimu na waṟundi walya kya dinari iwe nyi kya woṟunda wo mfiri fumu kawaduma kulya demehu lyake lya msabibu.
40020003	Kawuya kakure-se lingi kushikye kufui na saa ya kaṟaṟu. Kawona wengi wahoṟoki alya tumo walawode kindo wechiwuta.
40020004	Kawewia na wandu walya, “Kewehendenyi nanyo kulya demehu lya msabibu. Na kindo sa kisumuhanyi njechimwinenga.”
40020005	Nawo wakakuhendya. Kawuya kakure-se lingi kanyi kukeri kufui na saa ya kaṟandaṟu na saa kenda kawewuta ado.
40020006	Kushikye kufui na saa ikumi na imu kakure kanyi kawona wengi wahoṟoki-ho. Kawawia, “Nkyi ili motsinda muhoṟoki iya mlawode ma kindo mochiwuta?”
40020007	Wakambia, “Nyi ili lulawona molupfula kya iṟunda.” Kawawia, “Kewehendenyi nanyo alya demehu lya msabibu.”
40020008	Kyasia komshika iila menyi dema lya msabibu kalaha ulya mokalya-ho, “Henda lahang'u waṟundi wo nowewainenga kya woṟunda wowo uwoke iwo wafurumyeho ushike iwo wasongoe.”
40020009	Walya wacha kufui na saa ikumi na imu wakacha naho wakaambya orio mndu na dinari.
40020010	Kyasia walya wasongoe wamcha wakahamba kulako nyi wechyambya kya wueṟa. Nawo wakaweambya orio mndu na dinari mndu na dinari yake wose.
40020011	Wekyambya wakanunuwya menyi kanyi ulya.
40020012	Wakahamba, “Ashika-wo iwo wafurumya na saa imu tupu waṟundaho. Na iyo kowuya iwang'ang'anyisha naso. Natso nyi lotsinda lichikarishya mawina ha mfiri puti na mu fo.”
40020013	Nao kahaluo kawia ulya umu-ho, “Mbuya yako manya chi ngakuwia kilai kya sumhanapfo. Chi loweidikyana kimu kya dinari.
40020014	Kekudae iki kyapfo nokuhendye; na ngakukundya iinenga ichu afurumya kyake kifoyanyi na kyapfo.
40020015	Ngesa ishi shako nyi ohamba nyi kilanjisumuhanye iwuta nasho chando ngakunda? Ang'u nyi onjiambuya kinyeeri ili njii njido mwoloru?
40020016	Nyi wudong'u iwo wafurumya wechiwa wasongoru na iwo wesonguo wawe wafurumi.”
40020017	Kyasia Yesu kechido na kulya Yerusalemu, nalyo kaduo walya ikumi na wawi handu ha kiseekenyi. Wechihenda kawawia,
40020018	“Ambuyenyi lukeri-ng'u ihenda ido na kulya Yerusalemu. Na Manomndu nahende dambikyo wakohanyi wo wanene na walosha wa mawawaso. Nawo wambutye owingo lo opfu.
40020019	Wawehenda mdambikya na wandu wo wa mbaṟi njihenu kundo wechimtaluo na imkapa na ngowa tso tsii ntochye msha, wawembambya na msalabe-hu. Na ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu naṟuke.”
40020020	Nalyo mae o wana wa Sebedayo kacha na handu ai arianyi na wana walya wake. Kamolokya nndenyi kamterewa kindo nainengo nyio.
40020021	Nao kammbesa, “Nyi kiki uiterewa?” Mka ulya kambia, “Hamba ke wana wa wako wawi wadamye ichu ungi ora lo kulyo na ichu umu ora lo kumoso ipfo wumanginyi wopfo.”
40020022	Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Momanya iki muiterewapfo. Nyimochiidima inyo kirahunyi iki njikeri inyoya inyi?” Wakambia, “Na lochiidima.”
40020023	Kawawia, “Kirahunyi kyako na mochinyoya-ho. Kya indi idamya ora loko lo kulyo ma lo kumoso kyalyo chi kyako kyeinenga mndupfo. Nyi lyawa lya walya wai wasuṟumye nyi Wande.”
40020024	Kyasia walya ikumi na wawi wamicho wado wakapfuluko kya wana walya wa mka wa wawi.
40020025	Yesu kawalaha na hando hamu kawawia, “Muichi ke wamangi wa wandu wa masangenyi nyi wawaitoṟye na iwo wanene wakawaapfinya.
40020026	Kya indi kunu kiidi kyanu kilawe kido. Shile na orio mndu ose ichu echikunda iwa mnene kunu konu nawe nyi mompfuṟukanya.
40020027	Na ichu echikunda iwa mndu msongoru kunu konu nawe nyi isinga lyanu.
40020028	Na chando Mana o mndu alalecha kunu kepfuṟukanyo, nyi kundu o napfuṟukane-ho naweinengya-ho na moo foke fuwe ndalai yetalaa wafoi.”
40020029	Kyasia ili wewuka kulya Yeriko wandu wakamituma numa yake mamwingi sa fung'anyi.
40020030	Nalyo adi a walya wandu wapfu meso wawi wadamye oo mamba na njia. Wekiicho Yesu aida-ho wakakoṟoṟoma ilaha wehamba, “Kelusaṟye-wo wukiwa iyo Mana o Dawidi!”
40020031	Kyasia mamwingi fulya fukawatoloma kundu watsie. Nawo wakaengeṟa iirya ṟu wehamba, “Hoi Mndumii kelusaṟye-wo wukiwa kui Mana o Dawidi!”
40020032	Na Yesu katirima-ho kainduka kahamba, “A nyi kiki mokunda; ke njimbike njida?”
40020033	Wakambia, “Nyi kundu meso hadu hatambaṟuke.”
40020034	Yesu kawalilia makulili kapaya meso hawo. Nalyo wadi wakawuya ambuo. Wakaoshana nao.
40021001	Kyasia waiyafukya kufui na kulya Yerusalemu ili washika kulya Betifage kulya fumwunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu, nalyo Yesu kaduma wakiloshionyi wawi.
40021002	Kawawia, “Hendenyi alya mṟinyi fukeri mambatsana na iya hando mui. Mukeripfo mudi mochiwona nzoi ii njipfunge na ihache lya nzoi lii hamu nayo. Muipfunguo-ho munjiendye.
40021003	Na kokoya mndu kembia kindo muhambe, ‘Nyi Mndumii awode kindo aitsipfulya.’ Nalyondi echitsidika.”
40021004	Nakyo kikahenda kido kyose nyi kundu kuhoe kilya kii kidede nyi mwikimbi kehamba, “Henda-wienyi mana-chu Sionyi,
40021005	Ambuya, mangi yapfo nyi ikuchea na kopfo ai, amoloru ambawe nyi nzoi na ihache lii imana lya indo lyekudika.”
40021006	Walya wa-kiloshionyi wakahenda wakawewuta wado chando Yesu awewawasye.
40021007	Wakaende nzoi iya na ihache lilya lya nzoi. Na huye yatso wakahekya-ho nguwo tsawo tsilya tsa huye. Wakamdamiṟa-ho.
40021008	Kyasia mamwingi fulya fo wandu fung'anyi fukaala nguwo tsawo ipfo njiehu, tsilya tsa huye. Wengi wakamanya maṟamba alya makidihu wakahaanjaṟa alya njiehu.
40021009	Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu wasonguo na walya waituma numa wakakoṟoṟoma ilaha wehamba, “Hosana Mana o Dawidi. Ona nyi lo ichu acha kui rina lya Mndumii! Hosana kulya huye.”
40021010	Wamidima iida na kulya Yerusalemu mṟi fulya fukafuluka-fuluka fose. Wandu wakahamba, “A ichu nyiu?”
40021011	Na wandu walya mamwingi wakahamba, “Ichu nyi mwikimbi nyi Yesu awukye kulya Nasareti ya kulya Galilaya.”
40021012	Na Yesu kaida na ipfo hekalunyi lya Ruwa kafunapfo wekumba na wehuṟa wose wai ipfo hekalunyi. Kapfuluo na shitaṟa sha weilacha pesa na shidi shedamya sha wekumba mbeta.
40021013	Kawawia, “Mba yako nyi yewio nyi mba yeterewya, nanyo mukawuya ihaluo opanga lo weala njia loowa!”
40021014	Na ili akeri ado kulya hekalunyi, kukacha napfo wandu wa wapfu meso na wai shiricheche. Nao kawachira.
40021015	Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wakeri-pfo na walosha na wa mawawaso wamewona mawuto halya ha kiṟiha awuta na shiwana shechilaha ipfo hekalunyi shehamba, “Hosana Mana o Dawidi, nawo wakawichuyo.”
40021016	Wakahamba, “Na omeicho kindo iwa waihamba?” Yesu kawawia, “Ee, a mlasomye ke nyi madumbunyi ha shiwana na wakoku hoondo kukusungusie-ho kiṟumi kyafo keṟumisho?”
40021017	Nalyo kawadaho. Kawuka kulya mṟinyi kashika kulya Betanyia. Kalaa-pfo kio kilya.
40021018	Ili lya ngama kewuya naide na ipfo mṟinyi kaicho njaa.
40021019	Nalyo kawona mkuyu fukeri mamba na njia kacha na handu fudoe ma nalawone-ho ndunda, na mambale tupu. Kafuwia, “ma kulakumbie-se ndunda tsiwuka kunu kopfo!” Nalyo kudi mkuyu fulya fukauma ng'aa.
40021020	Na walya wa kiloshionyi wamewona wado wakaṟihio wakahamba, “Nyi wuda mkuyu-fu fouma fudi owinyii.”
40021021	Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, kokoya muwode idikya mkada mlawado nyi mkeu-keu ma chi ikyo kya mkuyu tupu mochiwutapfo. Indi ma kokoya nyi fumwu li nyi mochiliwia, kuṟuka ukumbo kulya ipalipalinyi, na kewutika kido.
40021022	Na orio kindo kyose mokipfula kiterewyonyi kui iidikya na mochi-kiwona.”
40021023	Kyasia amidima iida na ipfo hekalunyi wakohanyi walya wanene wakacha na handu ai na wasongoru wa wandunyi wakahamba, “A pfinya owuta nayo sindo-sho nyi ida? Na ichu akuwikye finya-yo nyiwu?”
40021024	Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Na inyi njimbesa kidedo kimu; mukamenjiwia mbembia pfinya ngawuta nayo shindo-shi ke nyi ida.
40021025	A wupatiso wo Yohane nyiku wuwewukye ngesa? Nyi ruwehu ngesa ang'u nyi wandunyi? Wakahaluyana-haluyana mrimenyi kowo wa wenyi wehamba, ‘Lukahamba nyi ruwehu nao naluwie, nyi kyawang'u kida ili mlamidikya.’
40021026	Ang'u lukahamba, ‘Nyi wandunyi nyi luwode lochiowuo wandu. Nyi kipfa wose waichi Yohane nyi mwikimbi.’
40021027	Nalyo wakahaluo Yesu wakambia, ‘Lomanyapfo.’ Nao kawewawia, ‘Ma inyi njembia pfinya ngawuta nayo shindo-sho ke nyi idapfo.’ ”
40021028	“A nyi muhie-ho muda? Mang'anya awewode wana wawi, kahendya ichu msongoru kambia, ‘Inu ochihenda uṟunde alya demehu lya msabibu.’
40021029	Nao kahaluo kahamba ngaleha, ‘Ili numa kawuya iwado nyi machenyede kakuhendya.’
40021030	Kawuya kahendya ulya ungi kawembia ado. Nao kahaluo kahamba, ‘Ee naakyo Mndumii.’ Ma nalahende.
40021031	A walya wawi ichu awekeri-ho kewuta shechihia ndee nyi uhya ngesa? Wakahamba, ‘Nyi ulya mosongoru.’ Yesu kawawia, Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wesana okamba nyi wechishika ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa na waka wameluki wamsongoe nyo.
40021032	Nyi kipfa Yohane alecha na konu kui njia ya wusumuhanyi nanyo ma mlamidikye, wesana okamba nyiwo welemidikya ili numa na waka wameluki. Nanyo mkakiwona ma mladumbuye lyandi mulelemidikya.’ ”
40021033	“Keadanyenyi mbonyi tsa mfanano tsingi. Kuwekeri-pfo mndu menyi kanyi, kadonga dema lya msabibu. Kaliiṟihya na oṟiho. Kasuma-ho na handu hekamya mpfinyo ipfo makidi hawi. Kawika-pfo mba yeringya idoe huye. Dema lilya kaliinengya wademi kilimu kilya nainengo-ho kyake wateṟyanyi nawo. Kawuya kahenda kyaṟo oruka lo kuleshe.
40021034	Komshika kufui na kiheri kekumbya ndunda kaduma masinga halya hake kulya ko wademi walya hahende inengyo nunda tsalyo.
40021035	Na wademi walya wakaduo masinga halya hake. Ichu umu wakamkapa, ichu ungi wakambaha, ichu ungi wakamkumbya maho.
40021036	Kawuya kaduma-se masinga hengi hafoi kota na halya ha kuwoka. Nawo wakawewawika wado.
40021037	Kafurumia iwadumya mana ulya oke o womi kehamba, ‘Mana-chu oko nyio wechimidikya.
40021038	Kyasia wademi walya wekiwona mana ulya wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi wehamba, ichu nyio muoṟi mooṟa-ho. Lanye ndenyi lumbahe luwade na kyoṟa kyake.
40021039	Nalyo wakamduo-pfo. Wakamkumbalya kulya mbele ya dema lya msabibu, wakambaaha.
40021040	Ashika mnene o dema lilya lya msabibu ilindi echicha napfo nyi kiki echiwutya wademi walya?’
40021041	Wakahamba, ‘Wandu walya wewuta wado owicho na wadetso iki kiwichowicho. Na dema lya msabibu nawelinengya wademi wengi wembutya ndunda tsilya ili tsishikye shiheri shatso shekumbya.’
40021042	Kyasia Yesu kawawia, ‘A ipfo shiṟehyonyi mlelemanyeho iki kii kihambe-ho ke iho lilya wewika mba waminye lyo nyi lyambuya iwa iho lya ndumba. Dedo-lyi nyi licheye liwuka ipfo ko Mndumii. Likawa nyi lya kiṟiha lya kunu mesonyi hadu.’
40021043	Kyasia-ng'u kyamba nyi wudo kii na inyi ngambia, ‘Wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wochikaa wuwuto kunu konu na inengyo oruka lochikumbya ndunda tsawo.’ [
40021044	Na moho huya iho li nyefunjika-funjika. Na mohoyo nyi iho li nyi lyemmamiṟa.]”
40021045	Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wameicho mbonyi tsilya tsa mfanano na Wafarisayo wakatawuka imanya nyi adeda kyawo wa wenyi.
40021046	Wakashika maanya chando wempfunga. Wakawuya yowuo wandu walya mamwingi kipfa lilyandi waichi nyi mwikimbi.
40022001	Na Yesu kahaluo kawawia se lingi mbonyi tsa mfanano kahamba,
40022002	“Wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na mndu mangi alealikya mana oke wali.
40022003	Kaduma masinga halya hake hahende ilaha wai walahe na kulya walinyi. Nawo walakunde icha.
40022004	Kawuya kaduma masinga hengi kahamba, ‘Kehenda wienyi iwo wai walahe, ambuyenyi ngammaa isungusia shelya shako. Pung'a tsako tsamba ishinja na shuma sho shiike. Shose shammba. Kekucheenyi-ng'u na walinyi.’
40022005	Nawo wakammina. Wakahenda kundo kowo, umu owo kahenda demehu lyake, na ulya ungi kiṟundyonyi kyake.
40022006	Walya wadeo-ho wakawada masinga halya wakawalisa wukiwa, wakawawaha.
40022007	Kyasia mangi karihinyika nyashi. Kaduma siṟi tsake tsa shidenyi. Kaarisya wawahi walya wanda. Na mṟi fulya fowo kakoṟa na modo.
40022008	Nalyo kawia masinga halya hake, ‘Wali na wuwemewa, kyaindi nyi ili wandu wa walaheho walasumuhanyi-ho.
40022009	Kehendenyi kulya njienyi kundu tsitsahanyi, na chando mochiwona wandu muwewalaha na kunu walinyi woose.’
40022010	Na masinga halya hakahenda kulya njiehu hakaende napfo wandu wawona woose. Na ichu mbicho na ichu mcha. Mba iya yelia wali ikaichuo wahenu.
40022011	Kyasia mangi kekiida napfo nache yambuya wahenu walya, kawona-pfo mndu alaṟee nguo ya walinyi.
40022012	Nao kambia, ‘Mbuya yako, nyi wuda oida na kunu ulaṟee ma nguwo ya walinyi?’ Nao katsia ndiṟi.
40022013	Naho mangi kawia walya wepfuṟu-kanyiaho, ‘Kempfungenyi madende-ho na mawokoho. Mumkumbe ipfo meemenyi fushingie ipfo nja. Napfo nyi kochika-pfo ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.
40022014	Nyi kipfa wandu walahe nyi wafoi, kyaindi iwo wawasambuṟe wakatitya.’ ”
40022015	Nalyo Wafarisayo wakahenda ideda kyama chando wemdeha na kidedo.
40022016	Wakamdumya wa kiloshyonyi kyawo warianyi na wa Herode wakahamba, “Maarya, na luweichi nyi ukeri mohamba sha lohi, na njia ya Ruwa kowelosha ya lohi, ma okesaṟa mndupfo, nyi kipfa ulekeambuya fana ya mndu ke nyi ida na ida.
40022017	Keluwieng'u-wo, nyi ohie-ho kuda. Iwikya Kaisari okamba na kindo kiwesumuhanyi ngesa ang'u ote?”
40022018	Kyasia Yesu aichi wuwicho wulya wowo kahamba, “Nkyi ili mocha inseenga mui makulembetseṟe!
40022019	Kenjiloṟenyi kindo ki kewika okamba!” Wakamendye dinari.
40022020	Na Yesu kawawesa, “A sanamu i ikeri-ho nyi yawu na kiṟehyo-ki?”
40022021	Wakahamba, “Na sha Kaisari.” Nalyo kawawia, “Kewikyenyi-ng'u Kaisari iki kii kya Kaisari. Mbewikya na Ruwa iki kii kya Ruwa.”
40022022	Wekiicho wado wakaṟihio. Wakamdaho wakahenda.
40022023	Kyasia mfiri na fulya Wasadukayo wakamchea. Nyi wandu wekehamba ke nyi kulaipfo iṟuka lya wandu wapfu. Wakambesa kya keleluo.
40022024	Wakahamba, “A lewo maarya, Mose nyi ahambye mndu kapfa alawode wana nyi manomae echialika mka oke nawedosya na mana o mae oshari.
40022025	Kyasia kunu kodu kuwekeri-pfo wanawamka mfungade. Na ulya msongoru kaalika mka kawuya kapfa. Nao ili alawode oshari kadea manomae mka ulya oke.
40022026	Na ulya o kawi na wudo na o kaṟaṟu. Wakatana wasia wose mfungade.
40022027	Nawo woose mndu mofurumya-ho ipfa nyi mka ulya.
40022028	Aka shika-ng'u-wo ili kochishika iya maṟukyonyi ha wapfu nyi echiwa nyi mka o wu o ipfo kidi kya walya mfugadde. Chi wawemrie wose?”
40022029	Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Nyi modeko kipfa ili mulaichi ma ishi shii shiṟehye ma pfinya ya Ruwa.
40022030	Nyi kipfa ili kochishika iya maṟukyonyi ha wandu wapfu ma kochikaa-se wealika na wealikopfo. Nyi wechiwa cha wamalaika wa ruwehu.
40022031	Kyaindi kya ipfo maṟukyonyi ha wandu wapfu nyi mulasomye iki muwawie nyi Ruwa kehamba,
40022032	‘Inyi nyio Ruwa o Abrahamu na Ruwa o Isaki na Ruwa o Yakobo.’ Ruwa chi akeri o wapfupfo shila na o iwo wai na moo.”
40022033	Kyasia na mamwingi fulya fo wandu wamwicho wado wakawuko nyi madima kipfa kya mbonyi tsilya tsake alosha ado.
40022034	Kyasia Wafarisayo wameicho nyi ahaluo Wasadukayo ndiṟi, nawo wakasanza handu hamu.
40022035	Nawo ulya umu-ho akeri mndu aichi mawawaso kacha imbesa kemseenga kahamba,
40022036	“Maarya na iwawaso inene ipfo kiidi kya mbonyi tsii njiwawase nyi lya iki ngesa?”
40022037	Nao kambia, “Nyi ochikunda Mndumii opfo Ruwa, umkunde na ngoo yapfo handu hamu yose, na mrima fopfo fose na mahio hapfo hose.
40022038	Nlyo iwawaso lisongoe hoose.
40022039	Na lya kawi lifananyi nalyo nyi likeri li-ile, kunda odoo chando ukukundi moo fopfo kumonyi.
40022040	Mawawaso-ho hawi ipfo kiidi kyaho nyi harie-ho mbonyi tsii njiwawase tsose na waikimbi.”
40022041	Kyasia ili Wafarisayo wasanzie kundu kumu, Yesu kawawesa mbonyi.
40022042	Kahamba, “A iki kya Kristo nyi muhie-ho muda? Nyi akeri mana o wu?” Wakahamba, “Nyi o Dawidi.”
40022043	Kawawia, “A ili Dawidi amlahye nyi Mndumii kededa kui Mumuyo kehamba,
40022044	Mndumii alewia Mndumii oko, ‘Kedamya kunu ora loko lo kulyo na inyi njitane ngawika wakituwa wapfo ipfo shia madende hapfo.’
40022045	Kyasia-ng'u komkoya Dawidi amlahye nyi Mndumii namanye-se iwa mana oke ada?”
40022046	Naho ma kulakikae-pfo mndu moidima imhaluo ma kindo ma mokarya imbesa kindo kuwokya mfiri fulya.
40023001	Nalyo Yesu kadeda na wandu walya wakeri-pfo mamwingi na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
40023002	Kahamba, “Ipfo loṟike-hu lo Mose loloshya nyi kudamyepfo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo.
40023003	Kyasia-ng'u orio shindo wamembia shoose mbeshiwuta na ishihendelya. Kyaindi ipfo mawutyonyi hawo mulawute musumuhane naho.
40023004	Nawo nyi wekepfunga maṟio malemeri wakahadika wandu makosohu. Kyaindi wo wawenyi walakunde ihapaanya manya na kimnyo kyo.
40023005	Mawuto hawo hose wakahawuta kundu wawono nyi wandu. Nyi ili wekelandaṟa shingowa shi sha ngumbu sheterewa nasho wakalesha na mambo tso tsa nguwo tsawo.
40023006	Wakakunda handu hedamya ha kusonguo ili wai walahye shelya nyi mndu na shidi shedamya isho shisongoru ipfo sinagoginyi.
40023007	Na shiiṟikiṟo sheiṟikiṟo nyi wandu handu halya halandari ha mṟinyi. Na ilaho nyi wandu wawalahe nyi Rabi.
40023008	Kyaindi nyo mulalekye wandu wamulahe nyi Rabi nyi kipfa nyi umu akeriho ai mlosha onu. Na nyo mukawa nyi wanawamka moose.
40023009	Ma mulawie ma wandu nyi wande wa kunu orukenyi. Nyi kipfa nyi umu akeripfo ai ndeyanu, nyi ichu o ipfo ruwehu.
40023010	Ma mlalekye wandu wamlahe nyi wasongoru wa njia. Nyi kipfa ichu ai msongoru onu nyi umu, nyi Kristo.
40023011	Kyaindi ichu ai mnene konu nawe nyi mopfuṟukanya.
40023012	Na mokudosa amonyi nyi echikaa nanyiiro. Na mokunyiiṟa amonyi nyi echikaa nadoso.”
40023013	“Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe. Nyi ilindi mokepfunga mongo fo wumangi wo ruwehu sumhana na oshangunyi lo wandu. Nanyo ma mlechiida napfo ma wandu wawechiida napfo mlawalekye waide napfo. [
40023014	Ochia na lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe. Nyii ilindi mokelya mmba tsa waka wakusu mkamaa naho mukalembetseṟa-ho na madedo hafoi heterewa. Kyamekaa kido nanyo mukae muwone owingo luumu-umu.]
40023015	Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe! Nyi ilindi moketengeta mukakyama ipalipali na oruka luhadutsu kundu mochikuwonya mndu umu mokunda idikya. Na kombona amba, mukawuya imhaluo mana o kulya Gehena mbicho kamwida nyo kawi.
40023016	Ochia lonu mui wasongoru wa njia wapfu meso. Nyi muhambye, ke mndu molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So hekalu lya Ruwa, chi kindopfo.’ Indi molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So sahabu ya ipfo hekalunyi nyio awodo-ho.’
40023017	Mui matondo muwei na wapfu meso. Nyi kipfa iki kineneho nyi kiki ngesa, nyi sahabu-yo ang'u nyi hekalu lyo lya Ruwa linengye sahabu yo ikawa njiele?
40023018	Na molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So kitaṟa kedasya chi kindofo.’ Kyaindi molya nyamu kahamba, ‘So kindo kyedasa kii huyakyo nyio awodo nyi nyamu yake.’
40023019	Mui wandu wapfu meso. A iki kineneho nyi kiki? Ngesa nyi kilya kedasa ang'u nyi kitaṟa kedasya ikyo kiinengye kindo kedasa kikawa kyele?
40023020	Kyasia nyi kikeri-ng'u ichu molya nyamu kehamba, so kitaṟa kyedasya nyi alya nyamu nakyo na shilya shii shihekye huyakyo kawelya nasho nyamu-ḏa.
40023021	Na molya nyamu na hekalu lya Ruwa nyi alya nyamu nalyo na ichu awodepfo handu hake hekukaya kawelya nao nyamuda.
40023022	Na molya nyamu na ruwehu nyi alya nyamu na loṟika lo Ruwa lodamya na ichu adamye huyalo kawelya nao nyamu daa.”
40023023	“Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe, nyi kyailyi mokewesa wandu okamba lo shindo shilawaṟi mukada mawawaso ha wulohi, isaṟia na mwidikye, isho nsho shiwaṟi mushiwade mulechihadima isho shingi.
40023024	Mui wasongoru wa njia ya wapfu meso, mokeshishina-ho shipanu mukawuya imeṟa ngamia.
40023025	Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo makulembetseṟe, nyi ilindi mokesanya ora lo kya nja lo kirahu na kitela, kyaindi ipfo kiidi kikaichuo shindo shii shisoke sha pfinya na shii shyole sha wuseṟeṟi.
40023026	Iyo Mfarisayo kui mndu a mpfu meso! Kesonguo isanja sha ipfo kiidi kya kirahu na kitela na ora lo patehu kundu luwewa nyi luusanje.
40023027	Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe, nyi ilindi mufananyi na shipfu kundo mnying'a yeṟiko shichope shikawada kiweṟe kyeambuya ipfo kya nja. Kyaindi ipfo kiidi shikaichuo mafuo ha mnying'a na shindo shiendye tsung'a orio mbaṟi yose.
40023028	Nanyo na wudo iya kya nja nyi mokeloṟa wandu fana cha nyi mui wa wusumuhanyi, kyaindi ipfo kiidi mukaichuo ikulembetseṟa na orio wunyamaṟi wose.”
40023029	“Ochia lonu nyo walosha wa mawawaso na Wafarisayo mui makulembetseṟe. Nyi ilindi mokewika handu heṟika mnying'a ya waikimbi mukawechopa na shipfu sha wandu wa wusumuhanyi kundu mnying'a yawo imṟike yende kiweṟe.
40023030	Mkahamba, ‘A kima lulekaawo mandi halya ha waku wadu nyi-ki?’ Nokoe so luwechisanza nawo lilyandi weola samu ya waikimbi walyapfo.
40023031	Mukatana mokuwutya owingo muwenyi ke na mukeri wana wa wewaha waikimbi walya.
40023032	Nahong'u keichuṟenying'u kiheo kya waku wanu!
40023033	Mui manjoka, mui malea ha njoka muidime muda idicha mude mulahutsio owingo lo Gehena?
40023034	Kyasia kyamba nyi wudo kii na inyi njiwe moduma konu waikimbi na wandu walaanyi na walosha wa mawawaso. Nanyo iwo maata muwawahe na iwawambia msalabenyi, na walya wengi muwakape na ngowa tsii njitochie msha ipfo kya mba kundo mokumbuhananya na iterengya mbewaterengya wawuke kunu mṟinyi ifu wadichye fulya fungi.
40023035	Nanyo kundu mochicheo nyi samu yose ii nyiole kunu masangenyi ya wandu walawode kindo wanyamaṟye, iche huye yanu iwokya samu ya mndu ulya o wusumuhanyi Abeli ukoe samu iya ya Sakaria ai mana o Barakia ulya mulewaha o makiidi hawi ha hekalu lya Ruwa na kitaṟa kyedasia.
40023036	Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Ikyo kyose nyi kekaa kiche huye ya rika-li lya wandu.’ ”
40023037	“Iyo Yerusalemu, iyo Yerusalemu, kui mowaha waikimbi na iwo wai wadume kopfo kowakumbya maho, na sa kafoi da mbekundi isanya shiwana shapfo na chando nguku yekesanya malea hayo ipfo shi ya makungo hayo nanyo ma malakunde.
40023038	Aii mba yanu momeideyo ilawode kindo.
40023039	Nyi kipfa ngambia, ‘Kuwokya wulalu mochikiwonana-se na inyipfo na mtane mohamba, ona nyi lo ichu mocha kui rina lya Mndumii.’ ”
40024001	Na Yesu kawuka ipfo hekalunyi kahendahenda mbele. Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na handu ai wakundi imloṟa mammba halya ha hekalu.
40024002	Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Nyi mulawonyi iho hose? Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Iya handu hakeri nyi koekaa kuleedeoho ma iho likuhekye huye ya iho lingi liḏe lilawunduo-hopfo.’ ”
40024003	Kyasia adamye alya fumwu-hu lya mashidi ha msinepfu naho walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na alyando awei hai handu ha kisekenyi wakahamba, “Keluwie-wo mbonyi tso tsekaa tsishike indi? Na kiṟingishyo kyeṟingishya ili koshika iya macheenyi hapfo na masiyonyi ha wuyana nyi kiki-wo?”
40024004	Na Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Kekuṟisenyi mulawone mndu kechimlemba.
40024005	Cha kipfa nyi kochikaa kuche sa wafoi wache kui rina lyako wahambe, ‘Inyi nyio Kristo. Wadetse wandu sa wafoi.’
40024006	Kyaindi nyi mochiicho shida na mbonyi tsihambo tsa shida. Ambuyenyi ma mulakangaṟike. Cha kipfa ma kikaki na kihende kido. Kyaindi kikamshika oo komkoya iya masiyonyipfo.
40024007	Nyi kipfa oruka lu lochiamkya oruka lungi. Na wumangi wuweamkya wumangi wungi. Kuwewada-ho na njaa na shiding'ashi shiweida-pfo kui handu kui handu.
40024008	Na shindo shi shose shikamewoneka nyi mawokyonyi ha mawukiwa halya.
40024009	Nalyo wahende imdambika wamiitse shiwirenyi na imbaha wawembaha. Nanyo mukoe musuikyo ko wandu wa masanga hose kipfa kya rina lyako.
40024010	Nalyo kukaepfo wandu sa wafoi wesukyo na iṟingyana na isuana.
40024011	Na waikimbi wehamba sha wongo wawekurepfo wafoi waduo wandu wafoi ipfo kidekyonyi.
40024012	Na ili wunyamaṟi wochipfumbuka wudo nkyo kechiinenga ikunda lya wandu wafoi lisie yololya.
40024013	Kyaindi ichu mokarishya-ho kaweda nashike ili masiyonyi nyio echikiṟo.
40024014	Na ndumi ii ya sia ya wumangi iweongoyo idung'ane kunu orukenyi kose kiwe nyi kiṟingishyo kya wandu wa masangenyi. Nalyo kushike iya masiyonyi.”
40024015	“Kyasia-ng'u kiwi kilya kya orumatso kii kihambe nyi mwikimbi ulya Danyieli ili mandi mochiwona-ng'u kiche ihoṟoka kundu kui kwele ichu mosoma namanye.
40024016	Nalyo walya wai kunu Yudaya wahende dichya kulya mafumvu-hu.
40024017	Na ichu echikoyo akeri ipfo mmbe-hu ma nalasokepfo nahende yonduo nzohoṟa tsa ipfo mba.
40024018	Na ichu echikoyo nyi ai alya demenyi ma nalawuye na numa nahende yonduo nguo yake ya huye.
40024019	Kya indi ochia nyi lo walya wekoyo wai wanene wapfe mana na walya weonza mafiri-ho.
40024020	Kyaindi terewenyi Ruwa ilindi mochidicha kilawe nyi ili kiheri kya mbeo ma ili mfiri fo Sabato.
40024021	Cha kipfa kukamshika mandi nalyo kuche shiwira sa shiingi sa shilalemewoneke kiwokya lilya mawokionyi ha wuyana itane mandi ha ha wulalu. Ma ili numa shechiwonekase shidopfo.
40024022	Na mafiri halya nokoe halawechiwihiṟowihiṟo numa hanyienyie, ma orio kindo kii na mbihu kyose kiwechiwona-se handu kechikiṟyopfo. Kyaindi nyi kipfa kya iwo wai wasambuṟe nyi kyondo mafiri halya hechiwihiṟyo-wihiṟiyo numa.”
40024023	“Nalyo mukakoya ma mndu ambia, ‘Kristo aichu kunu! Ang'u a ulya alya! Nanyo ma mlamwidikye.’
40024024	Nyi kipfa kochikurepfo Wakristo wa wongo na waikimbi wa wongo. Waweloṟa-ho na mawuto manene ha kiṟingishyo na ha kiṟiha. Nyi kundu watewe na iwo wai wasambuṟe nokoe nyi kiwechiwa.
40024025	Ambuyenyi nyi ngawoka imtutuma.
40024026	Kyasiang'u mkamkoya wembia, ‘A ulya kulya nuka! Nanyo ma mulawuke kanyi muhende-pfo. Acho ipfo shiṟihenyi sha mba sha kiidi, nanyo ma mlaidikye.’
40024027	Nyi kipfa chando mbawa yewaṟuka kulya ora lo ruwehu lo ngamenyi lukawaṟuka waṟu fukakoya kulya ora lo kiukanyi, na ili kochishika iya macheyenyi ha Mana o mndu nyi wudo kechewa.
40024028	Handu hai mnying'a na mamtonyi napfondo hekekuwumbia.”
40024029	“Indi kombona shiwiira shilya sha mafiri halya shamiida kukae handu hatutu nalyo mnengeṟi fuhaluke meema na meeri fulechikiloṟa-se ngela yafo na nyenyeri tsioloke tsiwuke ipfo ruwehu. Na pfinya tsi tsiirye alya ruwehu tsiwekupaya -- paya.
40024030	Mandi nalyo kiṟingishyo kya Mana o mndu kikuloṟe alya ruwehu. Na mbaṟi tsa wandu wa kunu orukenyi tsiwefihiṟa tsose. Nawo wawone Mana o mndu kecha akeri huya mapuchi ha ruwehu ai na pfinya ing'anyi na wusuṟi.
40024031	Nao naweduma wasu wake wa ruwehu wahende na ṟu ling'anyi lya membe na iwo wake akusambuṟye wawewasanya kundu kumu, wawawute kundu ko njotanu tso tsi tsiina wawoke ora lu lo ruwehu kundu lutsitsye washike lulya lungi kundu lutsitsye.”
40024032	“Kyaindi mkuyu-fu mukuloshe nafo mfanano kindo kifananyi nafo. Mkamkoya oṟuwe lofo luwiriwiri nanyo mukakuwutya-ho imanya ke nyi ipaṟika-ng'u kui.
40024033	Nanyo na wudo, mukamewona mbonyi tso tsiwe tsido tsoose nanyo mumanye ke amshika kufui na oo mongo.
40024034	Nyi kya lohi ngambia, mbaṟi ii ya wandu ikeri-ho yechisiapfo na kutane mbonyi tso tsawutika tsido tsose.
40024035	Kulya ruwehu kukae kunyamaṟike na kunu orukenyi, kyaindi madedo hako hawode mandi hechinyamarṟikapfo.”
40024036	“Kyaindi kya mfiri na saa iya kuipfo mndu aichi mbonyi tsayopfo ma wasu wa kulya ruwehu, manya o Mana shile na Wande amonyi.
40024037	Indi chando kiwekeri mandi halya ha Noe na ili kochishika iya macheyenyi ha Mana o mndu na wudo kechiwa.
40024038	Nyi kipfa chando wawekeripfo mafiri halya mbele ya mfu fulya fo mṟinga wechilya shelya na inyo, na ikualikia na ikualikio, washika mfiri lilyandi Noe keida na kulya isandukunyi linene.
40024039	Ma walamanye kindo mfu fulya fung'anyi fo mṟinga fukatana focha fukawakombetsa wose, na ili mandi kochishika iya macheyenyi ha Mana o mndu na wudo kechihenda iwa kido.
40024040	Nalyo wawi wakoye nyi wai alya demehu ichu umu nairo-ho na ichu ungi nadeo.
40024041	Waka wawi wakoe nyi waisa mso na iseo, ichu umu nairoho na ichu ungi nadeo.
40024042	Kelaenyi-ng'u dembo, kipfa mulaichi mkonu fulya Mndumii echicha.
40024043	Kindo mochikumbuo nyi le, mndu menyi kanyi nokoe nyi aweichi ke kamba lyeringa kio ke nyi lya indi mwiwi echicha nalyo nyi awechilaa dembo ma awechilekya mba yake isumopfo.
40024044	Kyasia kyamba nyi wudo kii nawo kewekaenyi-ho mukusungusye. Nyi kipfa Mana o mndu echicha na saa ilindi mle̱chikumbuo.”
40024045	“A nyi wu akeri-ho ai isinga lihendeli akeri na mṟango chu Mndumii ambikye mnene mokalya kulya kanyi koke nainengye na masinga wodoe shelya ili kiheri kishikye?
40024046	Sia na ya isinga lilya lyechikoya Mndumii olyo ache kambona kewuta ado.
40024047	Nyi kya lohi ngambia nyi echimbika mnene mokalya shichoṟe shake shose.
40024048	Kyaindi isinga lilya liwicho kokoya nyi lyechideda mrimenyi kolyo likahamba, ‘Mndumii nyi akeleo.’
40024049	Naho likawelya na ikapa masinga wodoe, likalya na shelya na inyo ashanganyi na iwo wananzi.
40024050	Na Mndumii o isinga lilya nyi echicha na mfiri ilindi alakumbuo na saa ilindi alaichi.
40024051	Na ipaṟa nawempaṟa makiidi hawi na ohawi loke nawemnenga namsanze na wandu wo wai makulembetseṟe. Napfo nyi kochikaa-pfo ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.”
40025001	“Nalyo wumangi wo ruwehu nyi wufananyi na wana wa waka ikumi walewuka kanyi wahende yambya mndu menyi wali warie na taa tsawo.
40025002	Na iwo watanu-ho nyi matondo, na watanu-ho nyi waṟango.
40025003	Nyi kipfa lilyandi walya wai matondo waleduo taa tsawo, walahende warie mafuda.
40025004	Na walya waṟango wakaduo mafuda ipfo shihienyi shawo wawerie na ipho taenyi tsawo.
40025005	Kyasia wamkoya menyi wali akeleo wakahombya wakalaa mado handu hamu wose.
40025006	Ili kio makiidi hawi kukaamka oṟenje kye menyi walyi a ulya alya kekurenyi mhende imaambya.
40025007	Nalyo wana walya wa waka wakakure madonyi handu hamu wose wakasungusya taa tsawo.
40025008	Walya wai matondo wakawia walya waṟango, ‘Mafuda-ho muwode, keluinengenyi-ho-wo, taa tsadu nyi iruma tsii.’
40025009	Walya waṟango wakahamba, ‘Ote nyi lowona halalushikye so na nyo. Kicha-kicha-ho nyi ihenda ko wekumba shindo mukuhuṟye-pfo hanu.’
40025010	Wahendye kihuṟyonyi menyi wali kacha na walya wakusungusie wakahenda warianyi nao wakaing'anya kulya walinyi. Mongo fukapfungo.
40025011	Ili numa numa wana wa waka walya wengi wakawecha naho wakahamba, ‘Hoi Mndumii, hoi Mndumii, kelufunguye-wo mongo.’
40025012	Nao kahaluo kawawia, ‘Njimwichi nyopfo.’
40025013	Kyasia-ng'u kelaenyi-ng'u dembo kipfa ili mulaichi mfiri fo ma saayo.”
40025014	“Nyi kipfa kyawa cha kya mndu alehenda kyaṟo. Kawoka ilaha masinga halya hake kahainenga shilya awode washikalie.
40025015	Ichu kamnengia talanta tsitanu na icho ungi tsiwi na icho ungi imu. Orio mndu ose kamnengia chando kisumuhanyi na pfinya yake. Naho kahenda kyaṟo.
40025016	Ulya aambia talanta tsitanu adi kakambiṟa ihenda owinyi. Kakapakapa natso mbucha. Kawona-ho tsingi tsitanu tsa mbucha.
40025017	Na ulya o tsilya tsiwi kawewona-ho tsingi tsiwi tsa mbucha.
40025018	Kyasia ulya aduo iya imu kahenda. Kasumasuma ipfo wanda. Kaṟika fesa iya ya mndumii oke.
40025019	Kyasia mndumii o masinga halya kakaapfo kiheri kileshe katana acha. Kahamba wamwitalie shindo shilya.”
40025020	Ulya adae talanta tsilya tsitanu kacha naho kaende talanta tsingi tsitanu. Kahamba, “Mndumii, nyi talanta tsitanu unnengye. A itsi talanta tsingi tsitanu njilewona tsa mbucha.”
40025021	Mndumii oke kambia, “Nyi kulewuta necha kui isinga sa licha lihendeli. Nyi uwekeri mnene o shindo shitutu koweshihendelya. Njekuwika mnene o shindo shifoi. Henda kuidye na sienyi ya Mndumii opfo.”
40025022	Na ulya o talanta tsilya tsiwi kawecha napfo kahamba, “Hoi mndumii, nyi talanta tsiwi ulenjinenga, a itsi-se tsingi tsiwi-se njilewona tsa mbucha.”
40025023	Mndumii ulya oke kambia, “Nyi ulewuta mecha kui isinga icha sa lihendeli. Nyi uwekeri mnene o shindo sa shitutu koweshihe-ndelia. Njekuwika mnene o shindo shifoi. Henda kuidye na sienyi ya Mndumii opfo.”
40025024	Kyasia na ulya aambie talanta iya imu kawecha napfo kahamba, “Mndumii, njiwekuichi nyi ui mndu muumu nokesambuo handu kulawaye-ho, kosana handu kulakumbie-ho mbeu.
40025025	Na inyi ngaowuo ngahenda iṟika talanta iya yapfof̱o wanda. A iki kindo kyapfo okiwadang'u wulalu.”
40025026	Na mndumii oke kamhaluo kambia, “Iyo ui isinga liwicho kowewa na mdoko ili uweichi njekesambuo handu njilawaye-ho ngawesana na handu njilakumbie ho mbeu.
40025027	Aka shika-ng'u-wo chi kiwekusumuhanyi-wo ihenda kumba rupia tsako ko weilacha rupia. Na inyi ili njecha kokoya nyi njiwechiende-pfo iki kyako kii kiengerye-ho na kyako kya woakuya.
40025028	Kemsokenyi-ng'u talantayo. Muinengie ichu awode talanta ikumi.
40025029	Nyi kipfa orio mndu ose ichu awode nyi echiinengo na yengeṟyo kawengeṟyo-engeṟyo. Kyaindi ichu alawode na ikyo awode kawesoko.
40025030	Na isinga li lya maai likumbenyi ipfo meemenyi fushingye ipfo nja. Napfo kukae-pfo ifihiṟa na imadya ngamru.”
40025031	“Kyaindi ilindi Manomndu echicha ai na wusumuhanyi woke arianyi na wasu wake wa kulya ruwehu wo wose, nalyo echidamya ipfo loṟike-hu lo wusuṟi woke.
40025032	Na ifo sumuhana na oshangu loke kuche sanyo-ho wandu wa masanga hose. Nao nawaletsane chando mlisi ekeletsana machondi na oṟo.
40025033	Na machondi halya nahawike ora loke lo kulyo na oṟo tsilya natsiwike ipfo ora loke lo kumoso.
40025034	Nalyo mangi echiwia walya wakeri ora loke lo kulyo, ‘Kenjonyi mui wawikei ona nyi Wande oko. Kehenda kaenyi kyoṟenyi kya wumangi kyanu muwasuṟumiye kuwokya masanga hambiko.
40025035	Nyi kipfa njiwewodo nyi njaa mukannenga shelya. Mbei mangari mukanjirutsa mṟinga. Mbei mhenu mukanjionduo na konu.
40025036	Mbekeri kitaṟe mukanṟika nguwo. Mbeluo mukacha njisahia. Mbei mbike ipfo mba ko wapfungo mkanjichyea.’
40025037	Nalyo wandu walya wa wusumuhanyi wechimhaluo wahambe, ‘Hoi Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona kuwodo nyi njaa lukakuinenga kando keihuda? Ang'u kui mangari lukakurutsa mṟinga?
40025038	A nyi indi lulekuwona kui mhenu lukakuonduo na kodu? Ang'u kui kitaṟe lkakuṟika nguwo?
40025039	A nyi indi lulekuwona kuluo ang'u kumbike ipfo mba ya ko wapfungo lukakucheya?’
40025040	Na mangi nahaluo nawawie, nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Orio kindo kyose chando mulewutya wanawawama wako iwo watutu ya wose ma ichu umu-ho nyio inyi mulenjiwutya.’ ”
40025041	“Nalyo mangi echiwia na walya wa ora lo kumoso nahambe, ‘Njiwukenyi nyo mui wasese, muhende ipfo modonyi foekaa mulangana ifo fui fusungusye fo Satan na wasu walya wake.
40025042	Na kipfa njiwewodo nyi njaa ma mlannenge shelya. Mbei mangari ma mlanrutse mṟinga.
40025043	Mbei mhenu ma mlanjionduo na kanyi konu. Na kitaṟe ma mlanjiṟike nguwo. Njiweluo mbei mbike na ipfo mba ko wapfungo ma mlache nsahya.’
40025044	Nalyo na wudo wechihaluo wahambe, ‘A Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona kuwodo nyi njaa ang'u kui mhenu ang'u kui kitaṟe ang'u kuluo ang'u kumkumbe ipfo mba ko wapfungo naso lukada lulakufuṟukanya?’
40025045	Nalyo echiwahaluo nahambe, ‘Nyi kya lohi ngambia, orio kindo kyose chando muleda mulawutya iwo watutu ya wose ma ichu umu-ho nyio inyi muleda mulanjiwutya.’
40025046	Nawo wahende malisyonyi ha wukiwa wokaa mlungana na walya wa wusumuhanyi wawehenda ipfo kiidi kya moo fo mlungana.”
40026001	Kikawa Yesu ammaa ideda madedo halya hose naho kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake,
40026002	“Na muweichi ke komtiṟa-se kawi ili lya kaṟaṟu nyi lyelya Pasaka. Na Manomndu nadambiko nahende wa-mbyo msalabenyi.”
40026003	Nalyo wakohanyi walya wanene wakasanza handu hamu na wasongoru wa ipfo wandunyi wakasanzia alya osehu lo mkohanyi mnene ulya ewio nyi Kayafa.
40026004	Wakadeda kyama chando wechiwada Yesu kui mtambo na imbaha wambahe.
40026005	Wakahamba, “Ma chi ili lya mfiri mnenepfo kuwone kochiamka kituṟu wandunyi.”
40026006	Kyasia Yesu akeri kulya Betanyia ipfo mba ko Simon ulya awewodo nyi iwawe.
40026007	O handu ai kukacha napfo mka arie chupa ya Alabasiteronyi iwode mafuda ha wuhuru wung'anyi. Kacha kampusuya oo mdonyi adamie ipfo kilionyi kya shelya.
40026008	Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi wekiwona kiwe kido wakasuo wakahamba, “A kindo-ki kyadetsyo kido wanda nyi kyaki?
40026009	Nakyo nyi kiwechiḏima ihenda ikumbo kya wuhuru wung'anyi na iinenga wandu wakiwa.”
40026010	Yesu kamanya nyi waihamba wado kawawia, “Itane mowinyisha-winyisha mkachu nyi ki? Nyi kipfa nyi kindo kicha anjiwutia.
40026011	Wandu wakiwa nyi mochikaa nawo mfiri yose, kyaindi kyako inyi mochikaa na inyi mfiri yosepfo.
40026012	Nyi kipfa ili anjipusuya mafuda-ha kunu mbihunyi koko nyi anjiwutia kya ihenda ṟiko.
40026013	Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Orio handu hose komeongoyo ndumi ii ya sia kunu orukenyi na kyake anjiwutie napfondo kyehambo kundu nakumbuo-pfo.’ ”
40026014	Nalyo umu akeri o ipfo kiidi kya walya ikumi na wawi ewio rina lyake nyi Yuda Iskariote kahenda ipfo ko wakohanyi walya wanene.
40026015	Kahamba, “Nyi kiki mokunda injiinenga na inyi njimueke imdambika konu?” Wakamteṟya-ho kiheo kya rupia makumi haṟaṟu.
40026016	Kuwokya-lyo kawa mopfula mwaanya chando echimdambika.
40026017	Kyasia ili kushikie mafiri halya helya mkate ilamtarang'ashe ili lya kuwoka nalyo walya wa kiloshyonyi wakacha na alyando Yesu ai wakahamba, “Nyi ku ukundi luhende ikusungusya shelya sha Pasaka?”
40026018	Nao kahamba, “Kehendenyi ipfo mṟinyi ko mang'anya. Mumbie, Maaria akuwia, ‘Kiheri kyako kyamshika kufui.’ Nyi kunu kopfo njewuta mṟumo fo Pasaka na iwo wa kiloshyonyi kyako.”
40026019	Na walya wa kiloshyonyi wakahenda iwuta chando Mndumii awawasye. Wakasungusia Pasaka.
40026020	Kyukanyi komeila wakacha damya kilionyi kya shelya na walya ikumi na wawi wa kiloshyonyi.
40026021	Wechilya shelya kahamba, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, umu o kunu kiidi kyanu echinjidambika-ho.”
40026022	Nawo wakasokyo mnu nyi fowa ing'anyi wakadeda nao kui umu kui umu wehamba, “A ngesa nyi inyi Mndumii?”
40026023	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “Nyi icho njechisotsya nao owoko ipfo kitelenyi nyio echinjidambika-ho.
40026024	Mana o mndu ihenda na ahende chando kiwei kiṟehye kyake. Kyaindi ochia nyi lo mndu ulya echidambika-ho Manomndu. Iki nyi kiwei kicha-ho nokoe mndu ulya alalefeo.”
40026025	Kyasia mṟingi ulya oke Yuda kamhaluo kahamba, “A ngesa nyio inyi, Maaria?” Yesu kamhaluo, “Nawo ohamba.”
40026026	Kyasia ili welya shelya Yesu kaira-ho mkate kaidapfuma Ruwa kafufunja shifunjo kainengya walya wa kiloshyonyi kahamba, “Ngenyi mlye. Iki nyi mbihu foko.”
40026027	Kawuya kawewada na kirahu kaidapfuma Ruwa kawainengya kahamba, “Nyonyi-ho mose.
40026028	Iki nyi samu yako ya mkundano mhya ikeri yolo kipfa kya wandu wafoi kya ihoṟyo nyonjamaṟo.
40026029	Na inyi ngambia. Kuwokya wulalu njechikinyo-se iki kiwukye kilimunyi kii kya msabibupfo, na njitane ngashika mfiri ili njechinyoya-ho wuhya njii nanyo ipfo wumanginyi wo Wande.”
40026030	Wamshika wakaimba shiimbo shilya wakawuka mba wakashika kulya fumwunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu.
40026031	Nalyo Yesu kawawia, “Kio-ki nyi mochikoya moendyo wusutsu nyi inyi moose. Nyi kipfa ili kii kiṟehye ke nyi njechikapa mlisi na machondi ha ipfo iponyi hawerahanyikya ipfo na ipfo.
40026032	Kya indi ili numa ngammaa njecha imusongoya njihende kulya Galilaya.”
40026033	Kyasia Petro kahamhaluo kambia, “Manya wakusukyo nyi iyo wose, inyi njechisukyo nyi iyo ma ngashika indi ma indifo.”
40026034	Yesu kambia, “Nyi kya lohi ngakuwia, kio na iki olong'onyi lulamekapa na iyo nyi ochinjikana kaṟaṟu.”
40026035	Petro kambia, “Kiti njikukane na njipfe njisanzo na iyo!” Na walya wa kiloshyonyi wakawehamba wado wose.
40026036	Nalyo Yesu kahenda nawo kashika alya kyungunyi kii kiiṟihye kundu kui kulahe nyi Getisemane. Kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi, “Kedamyenyi aa njitane ngashika ipfo njiterewe.”
40026037	Nao kahenda arie Petro na wana walya wa Sebedayo wa wawi kawoka isokyo nyi fowa na iṟeweṟewe.
40026038	Nalyo kawawia, “Mrima foko nyi fuwodo mnu nyi fowa fukatana fokoya opfu. Kaenyi iya mlae dembo na inyi.”
40026039	Kahenda-henda sa hatutu kaho wanda na kyamu kechiterewa kahamba, “Hoi Wande, kokoya na kechikuw̱ia kirahu ki kiide mbele yako kinjihyame. Kya indi ma kilawe nyi chando inyi ngakunda indi kiwe chando okunda iyo.”
40026040	Kacha na alyando wa kiloshyonyi wawei, kakoya wamelaa mado. Kawia Petro, “Nyi mlaidima ilaa na inyi dembo mushike ma saa imu?
40026041	Kelaenyi dembo na iterewa muterewe Ruwa mulawone mochiolokya handu ha kiheshyonyi. Ngoo yo kyayo nyi ii njilalutsu kya indi mbihu fo fukalehela.”
40026042	Kawuya kahenda lya kawi iterewa kahamba “Hoi Wande, kokoya kilechikuw̱iia kya kirahuki kiide kinjihyame ngamda ndamaa nyo-ho nahong'u kikuwiie chando ukundi iyo.”
40026043	Kacha-pfo kawekoya-se wamlaa mado lya kawi. Nyi kipfa ili meso hawo hawei malemeri.
40026044	Kawada-ho kahenda lingi-se katerewa lya kaṟaṟu. Na madedo ahamba na halya ha kuwoka.
40026045	Nao kacha na alyando wa kiloshyonyi wai kawawia, “Na mowekaa mochilaa mado na isiya moo? Aii saa yameshika Mana o mndu nahende dambikyo ipfo mawokonyi ha wandu wanyamaṟi.
40026046	Kekurenyi luhende. Mndu monjidambika-ho amcha.”
40026047	Ili aideda ado alamhutsya adi a ulya Yuda ai umu o ipfo kiidi kya walya ikumi na wawi. Kacha warianyi na wandu wafoi warie njoshu na shiṟeta wa wadume nyi wakohanyi walya wanene na wasongoru wa ipfo wandunyi.
40026048	Na ulya momdambikaho nyi awewateṟie kiṟingishyo kahamba, “Icho njemhekya momu nyio-ng'u. Nyio mndu mochimbada!”
40026049	Adi kakambiṟa ihenda alyando Yesu ai kahamba, “Ngakuiṟikiṟa Maarya!” Kawuya kamhekia momu.
40026050	Yesu kambia, “Mbuya yako a kimaduma kocha naa nyi kiki?” Nalyo wakacha naho wakaleshya Yesu mawoko wakambada.
40026051	Nalyo adi a ichu umu o ipfo kiidi walya wai na Yesu kahoṟuo owoko kasomuo oshu lulya loke kamanya nalo isinga lya mkohanyi ulya mnene kamdumbuo kudu.
40026052	Nalyo Yesu kambia, “Kewihiṟa oshu lopfo na ipfo kiṟandenyi. Kipfa orio wandu wewada oshu wose, na oshu wechidetso nalo.
40026053	A ngesa nyi ohamba njilawechiidima iwesa Wande nao nanjiwutye wasu wa ruwehu wafoi kota siṟi ikumi na tsiwi.
40026054	Kokoya nyi wudo a shilya shii shiṟehye nyi wuda shiwechiidima-se iyawukya ke na kihende kido?”
40026055	Saa na iya Yesu kawia mamwingi fulya fo wandu, “Nyi mowuka kanyi mui cha nyi ko mndu moala njia muihenda murie njoshu na shiṟeta muche injiwada. A ili njilewa modamya ipfo hekalunyi lya Ruwa mafiri hose njelosha nanyo ma mlanjiwade.
40026056	Nakyo kyose kimaduma kikahenda kido nyi shilya shii shiṟehye nyi waikimbi kundu shechiinukya.” Nalyo walya wa kiloshyonyi wakamda wakadicha wose.
40026057	Kyasia na walya walewada Yesu wakamduo kulya ko mkohanyi ulya mnene Kayafa. Na walosha walya wa mawawaso napfondo wasanzie na wandu walya wasongoru.
40026058	Na Petro kacha numa ai kuleshe katana ashika alya osehu ko mkohanyi ulya mnene kaida napfo. Kadamya handu hamu na wapfurukanyi wakeri-pfo naambuye handu kyeshika.
40026059	Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wasanganyi na wanjama wa kyamenyi kya Sinedrio wose wakashihya Yesu owingo lo wongo kundu wambonye opfu.
40026060	Ma walawone, na wehamba-ho njowingo tsa wongo wawehoṟoki-ho sa wafoi. Ili numa kukacha naho wawi.
40026061	Wakahamba, “Mndu-chu nyi elehamba, njechiidima isanja hekalu lya Ruwa njiliwike lya kawi mfiri iṟaṟu njimae.”
40026062	Na mkohanyi ulya mnene kahoṟoka kambia, “A nyi kulahamba ma shehaluo ishi sha wandu-wa waihamba-ho shekuwinga?”
40026063	Na Yesu katsia sau. Na mkohanyi ulya mnene kahaluo kambia, “Ngakulisa-ng'u nyamu so Ruwa chu menyi moo uluwie kokoya na ukeri Kristo kui Mana o Ruwa!”
40026064	Yesu kambia, “Naakyo ohamba. Na inyi ngambia, wokya wulalu mochiwona Mana o mndu adamye ipfo ora lo kulyo lo pfinya-ii itoṟye akeri icha ai huyaa mapuchi ha ruwehu.”
40026065	Nalyo mkohanyi ulya mnene karanduo nguwo tsake tsilya tsa huye kahamba, “Nyi aruma Ruwa! Nyi kiki luwode-se lochishiha wehamba-ho shewinga mondu foke. A iki-ng'u momiicho kirumo kyake kyeruma Ruwa.
40026066	Nyi muhiye-ho muda?” Nawo wakahaluo wakahamba, “Kindo kimsumuhanye na opfu!”
40026067	Nalyo wakamiselya mnyeri oshangunyi loke wakamkapa na nzina. Walya wengi wakamkapa na shidi.
40026068	Wakahamba, “kui Kristo malasha nyiu akukapa?”
40026069	Kyasia Petro kadamya ipfo nja alya osehu. Na mka isinga kacha na alyando ai kahamba, “Ne iyo na uwekeri na Yesu ichu o kulya Galilaya!”
40026070	Nao kakana wandu walya waiho woose kahamba, “Njichi ma ikyo ohambapfo.”
40026071	Kyasia akeri iwuka-ho nashike oo kichuminyi mka isinga ungi kambona-ho, kawia walya wakeripfo, “Mndu-chu nyi awekeri na Yesu-chu kulya Nasareti.”
40026072	Nao kakana lingi kelia-ho na nyamu kehamba, “Manya njichi mndu-chu inyipfo.”
40026073	Oweṟe kitutu walya wahoṟoki-ho wakacha naho wakawia Petro, “Na lohi na iyo nyi mndu o ipfo kiidi kyawo. Nyi kipfa kindo kyakuhamba nyi mdedye fopfo.”
40026074	Nalyo kawoka ikusesa na ilya nyamu kehamba, “Manya njichi mndu-chupfo.” naho adi olong'onyi lukakapa.
40026075	Na Petro kakumbuo kidedo kilya Yesu ambie ke olong'onyi lulamkapa nyi ochinjikana kaṟaṟu. Naho kawuka-ho kahenda kulya nja kalia kaingelea.
40027001	Kyasia komshika ngamenyi wakohanyi wanene wakadeda kyama wose na wandu wasongoru wa oruka kya Yesu chando wechimbutya opfu.
40027002	Wakampfunga wakamduo wakamdambikya ipfo ko mchili ulya o oruka Pontio Pilato.
40027003	Na Yuda ulya amdambikye-ho ili ambona nyi ambutyo owingo, nalyo kawuya iwado nyi mchenyede. Rupia tsilya makumi haṟaṟu awemnenge katsiwihiṟya wakohanyi walya wanene na wandu walya wasongoru.
40027004	Kahamba, “Ngamnyamaṟa lyandi njiledambika-ho samu ilai na mti.” Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi kii-se kida naso? Ambuya iyo kumonyi.”
40027005	Nao kakumba rupia tsilya kulya hekalunyi. Kasheṟuka-pfo. Kahenda ikuotsuo.
40027006	Kyasia wakohanyi walya wanene wakaira rupia tsilya wakahamba, “Chi kisumuhanyi lutsiwike ipfo kisenyi keṟika shindo sheinenga Ruwapfo kyamba nyi wuhuru wo samu.”
40027007	Wakadeda kyama wakahuṟa natso dema lilya liweho lya mndu mowumba nungu. Wakalihuṟa lyeṟika mnying'a ya wahenu.
40027008	Nakyo kikainenga dema lilya likadeo rina nyi dema lya samu itane inu.
40027009	Nalyo kilya kii kidede nyi mwikimbi Yeremia kikahoya-ho kido kehamba, “Nyi waleduo rupia tsilya makumi haṟaṟu tsii wuhuru wohuṟa ichu amambie wuhuru woke chando wushikye ichu wana wa Israeli waleambuya wuhuru chando ashikye.
40027010	Wakatsiwika tsehuṟa dema lya mndu mowumba nungu na chando Mndumii awenjiwawasye.”
40027011	Kyasia na Yesu awehoṟoki ipfo oshangunyi lo mchili moitoṟya oruka. Na mchili kambesa kahamba, “Iyo nyi mangi ya Wayuda?” Yesu kahamba, “Nakyo ohamba.”
40027012	Na ili kekumbo nyi wakohanyi walya wanene na wandu wasongoru ma nalahaluo kindo.
40027013	Nalyo Pilato kambia, “A nyi kulaichuo ishi waikukumba-ho nasho sa shifoi?”
40027014	Nao ma nalamhaluo ma kidedo ma kimu.
40027015	Itane mchili ulya moitoṟya oṟuka arihio mnu kyasia kya mchili ulya moitoṟia oruka ilyi kui mfiri mnene nyi echipfunguya wandu mndu ampfunge umu-ho ichu wechimkunda-ho.
40027016	Na mandi halya kuwewode mndu mpfunge umu ahendye ṟamba, ewio rina lyake nyi Baraba.
40027017	Kyasia wamidima isanza kundu kumu Pilato kawawia, “Nyi uhya mokunda njimfunguye, ngesa nyi Baraba a ngesa nyi Yesu chu ewio nyi Kristo?”
40027018	Nyi kifa lyandi aichi ke kindo wacha mdambikya-ho na wunyenyi.
40027019	Kyasia ili adamye alya loṟike-hu lodumbuya mondu, mka ulya oke kamdumya ndumi kahamba, “Ma kulawone kochilungyaho kyapfo na mndu chu o wusumuhanyi. Nyi kifa ngawona wukiwa wufoi inu kilodyonyi kipfa kyake.”
40027020	Na wakohanyi walya wanene wasanganyi na wandu wasongoru wakahaaya wandu kundu wechi-terewya Baraba, na Yesu wamdetse.
40027021	Kyasia mchili ulya moitoṟya oruka kahaluo kahamba “A wandu-wa wawi nyi uhya-ho mokunda njimfunguye?” Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi Baraba!”
40027022	Pilato kawawia, “A Yesu, ichu amhambe nyi Kristo kyake njimbike-ng'u njida?” Wakahamba handu hamu wose, “Nawambyo msalabehu!”
40027023	Nao kahamba, “A nkiki kiwicho alewuta?” Wakaengeṟa ifahya wakahamba, “Nawambyo msalabehu!”
40027024	Kyasia ili Pilato alewona alaidima iwuta-ho kindo na kitohyo kya wandu nyi ihenda keng'ana mnu kii, nao kahamba, “Inyi njii mharami na samu ya mndu-chu o wusumuhanyi. Ambuyenyi kyanu nyo!”
40027025	Naho wandu wakahaluo mhaluye fumu wose wakahamba, “Samu yake na ilusokye so na wana wadu.”
40027026	Nalyo kawapfunguya Baraba. Na Yesu kasonguo imkapa na ngowa itso tsii njitochye msha. Kawuya kamdambika-ho nahende wambyo msalabe-hu.
40027027	Nalyo wasikari wa mchili ulya moitoṟya oruka wakaduo Yesu mṟinyi kundo wasikari wekekaa. Na siṟi ya wasikari ikacha ikuwumbya nao yose.
40027028	Wakambuta nguwo. Wakawuya wakamṟika nguwo ya mawoko ifanyi king'aring'ari.
40027029	Wakaoka oṟo ya msha wakamṟika ipfo mdonyi koke. Wakamnengia na iṟeṟe ipfo owokonyi loke lo kulyo.
40027030	Wakampfirya ndi wakamtaluo wehamba, “Lokuiṟikiṟi iyo mangi ya Wayuda.”
40027031	Wakamiselya mnyeri. Wakawada iṟeṟe lilya wakamkapa nalyo ipfo mdonyi foke. Wakamduo nahende wambyo msalabehu.
40027032	Warie njia yehenda wakawona mndu awuka kulya Kirene ewio nyi Simon. Nawo wakamitikya nakudike msalaba fulya foke.
40027033	Wamidima shika kulyando kui kulahe nyi Goligota nakyo nyi kimu na ihamba nyi mbuonyi.
40027034	Wakamnenga mwinyo fumsangane na mṟinga fo nduu nanyo. Amefusaha nalakunde inyo.
40027035	Wameidima imbambya msalabehu wakahawana nguwo tsilya tsake wewika kuṟu kuhya.
40027036	Wakadamya-ho wemringa.
40027037	Na oo huyaa mdo foke wakaṟehya-ho kya owingo loke. Ke ichu nyio Yesu ai mangi ya Wayuda.
40027038	Nalyo kuiho weala njia wawi wakawawambya msalabehu handu hamu nao. Ulya umu kakaa oo ora lo kulyo na ungi kakaa oo ora lo kumoso.
40027039	Na walya waida-ho wakamruma wesingitsa-singitsa mdo yawo.
40027040	Wakahamba, “Kui mosanja hekalu koliwika lya kawi mfiri iṟaṟu likawa kekukiṟe-ng'u kumonyi; kokoya na uwekeri Mana o Ruwa kesoka-ng'u kunu msalabehu!”
40027041	Na wakohanyi walya wanene warianyi na walosha wa mawawaso na wandu wasongoru na wudo wakawemtaluo wakahamba, “A lyandi alekiṟa wengi nalaidime ma ikukiṟa-ng'u amonyi.
40027042	Chi ai mangi ya Israeli nakesokang'u kunu msalabehu naso lumidikye!
40027043	Nyi awekusirye na Ruwa nakemashuong'u-ho kokoya nyi amkundi. Nao nyi alehamba nyi ai Mana o Ruwa?”
40027044	Na walya weala njia walya wai wawambye msalabenyi handu hamu nao wakawemruma wado.
40027045	Kyasia kuwokya saa ya kaṟandaṟu kukaho meema kulya orukenyi kose fukashika saa kenda.
40027046	Kukeri kufui na saa kenda Yesu kalaha na ṟu ling'anyi kehamba, “Eli Eli lama sabakitanyi?” Kii cha ili kehambo, “Ruwa oko, Ruwa oko, nkili onjidea?”
40027047	Na wandu wahoṟokia-ho walya mata wameicho kechihamba ado wakahamba, “Nyi ailaha Elia.”
40027048	Naho kudi ulya umu-ho kahenda kedicha, kaende kindo keonga mṟinga. Kakiichuṟa mṟinga fotarang'aa. Kawika iwale-hu kamrutsa nalyo.
40027049	Na walya wengi wakahamba, “Leka luambuye Elia kokoya na echicha nache imkira.”
40027050	Kyasia Yesu amidima ilaha lya kawi na ṟu ling'anyi-se nalyo kalekya moo.
40027051	Nalyo ambuya, isulia lilya lyeshingya ipfo hekalunyi likaranduka ipfo makiidi hawi liwuka tsindenyi likapahukya mdonyi. Na wanda ikadedema na maho-ho manene hakapaṟika.
40027052	Na ipfo mbangenyi kundu mnying'a imṟike kukaṟuhuka. Na mbihu ya wandu waele wafoi walemepfa kacha ikaṟuka.
40027053	Wakakure kulya mbangenyi kundo wawei waṟike. Na ili numa amidima iṟuka wakacha na kulya mṟinyi mwele wakakuloṟa na wandu wafoi.
40027054	Kyasia mchili ulya o siṟi ya ihana wakeri-pfo na walya weringa Yesu wamidima iwona kiding'ashi kilya kyaida-ho na shindo shilya shawutika wakaowuo mnu wakahamba, “Na lohi ichu nyi awekeri mana o Ruwa.”
40027055	Kyaindi nyi kukeri-ho na waka sa wafoi wechiambuya-ho wai kuleshe. Nyi walya wechioshana na Yesu wawuka kulya Galilaya kundu wempfuṟukanya.
40027056	Na ipfo kiidi kyawo nyi kukeri-pfo Maria o kulya Magidala na Maria chu mae o Yakobo na Yosefu, na mae o wana wa Sebedayo.
40027057	Kyasia ili kushikye kyukanyi kukacha napfo mndu msuṟi awuka kulya Arimatia, ewio rina lyake nyi Yosefu. Nao nyi awekeri mndu o kiloshyonyi kya Yesu.
40027058	Nyio alehenda kulya ko Pilato kamterewa mnying'a fulya fo Yesu. Nalyo Pilato kawawasa nahende fuinengyo.
40027059	Na Yosefu kaduo mnying'a fulya. Kafuorowia nguwonyi tsa owiṟo tsikengemae.
40027060	Kahenda fuṟika rungunyi lyake lihya lilya atorongochye kulya ihonyi. Amiidima ipiṟimitsya iho sa inene oo momu-hu fo rungu lilya kakuhendya.
40027061	Indi alya kuweiho Maria o kulya Magidala warianyi na Maria ulya ungi wadamie oo sumuhana na rungu lilya.
40027062	Kyasia ili ngamenyi ya ili lya ngama lyeituma mfiri fulya foṟeheṟa kukasangana wakohanyi walya wanene na Wafarisayo ipfo ko Pilato.
40027063	Wakahamba, “Mndumii, lombuya ikumbuo mlembi ulya, lyandi i na moo, ke nyi alehamba, njetiṟa mfiri iṟaṟu njiwuye iṟuka.
40027064	Kewawasa-ng'u-wo opanga lulya luhende iringo itane mfiri fo kaṟaṟu. Walya wa kilsohyonyi walawone wechicha imiiwa-ho. Wawie na wandu, ke nyi amṟuka awuka ko wapfu. Na wulembi wo wofurumya wuwone wochiwichuo wuide na wulya wo kuwoka.”
40027065	Pilato kawawia, “Kiringo kyeringa-ho na mochiwona. Kekuhendyenyi muteesye-ho chando mbeichi muwenyi.”
40027066	Wakahenda wakateesya opanga lulya wakawika kiṟingishyo kiwode ofano lowo alya ihohu kukeri-pfo na kiringo kilya.
40028001	Kyasia mfiri fo Sabato fomiida ili kokya kushikye mfiri fo kuwoka fo mfungade nalyo Maria o kulya Magidala wakacha na Maria ulya ungi wakahenda sahia opanga lulya.
40028002	Naho kudi a iki kiding'ashi kyaida-ho sa kiapfinya. Nyi kipfa msu o Mndumii alesoka awuka ipfo ruwehu.
40028003	Na fana yake kafana cha mbawa, na nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu cha makuṟeṟa.
40028004	Na kipfa kya wowu, walya weringa-ho wakadosa mtara wakawa cha wapfie.
40028005	Kyasia msu ulya o Ruwa kahaluo kawia waka walya, “Ma mlawone mochiowuo. Na njichi nyi mukeri ipfula Yesu ichu awei mbambye msalabehu.
40028006	Nakeri iyapfo. Nyi amṟuka na chando alewehamba. Njonyi muambuye na handu awemlaṟe.
40028007	Na ihenda mkambiṟe ihenda owinyi mkewia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake ke nyi amṟuka awuka ko wapfu. Ambuyenyi nyi echimsongoya nahende kulya Galilaya. Mpfondo mochimbona. A ikyo-ng'u ngambia-ng'u.”
40028008	Nawo wakakambiṟa ikure owinyi alya opangenyi wawodo nyi wuowu wusanganyi na sia. Wakadicha wakahenda yongoya walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
40028009	Naho wadi a ichu Yesu acha wakumbuhana kehamba, “ngamwiṟikiṟa.” Wakacha naho wakambada madende wakamolokya ndenyi.
40028010	Nalyo Yesu kawawia, “Ma mlaowuo! Kehenda ongoyenyi wanawawama wahende kulya Galilaya. Mpfondo wechinjiwona.”
40028011	Kyasia warie njia yehenda kudi a walya wandu wa kiringo maata-ho wakacha na kulya mṟinyi. Wakahenda yongoya wakohanyi walya wanene shindo shilya shawutika shido shose.
40028012	Wakasanza handu hamu na wasongoru wakadeda kyama. Wakainenga wasikari walya rupia tsingiki.
40028013	Wakahamba, “Hambenyi nyi walya wa kiloshyonyi wacha na kio wakamiwa-ho lulee mado.
40028014	Nakyo kokoya kemanyikya ma ipfo ko mchili moitoṟya oruka na lochimanjaṟya-nja-ṟya luwembonya ikukaya kipuo.”
40028015	Nawo wakaduo rupia tsilya wakahenda wuta chando waa waloshe. Na idedo li likahambo ipfo kiidi kya Wayuda likadung'anana likashika itane inu.
40028016	Kyasia walya ikumi na umu wa kiloshyonyi wakahenda kulya Galilaya kulya fumvunyi kundu Yesu awewawawasye.
40028017	Wakambona wakamolokya wanda na walya maata wawodo nyi mkeukeu.
40028018	Na Yesu kacha na alyando wai kadeda nawo kahamba, “Nyi njimnengye pfinya yose ya ipfo ruwehu na ya kunu wuyana.
40028019	Kyasia kehendenying'u mukehaluo mkambo ya wandu yose wawe wa kiloshyonyi kyako muwewapatisya rina lya Wande na Mana na Mumuyo Mwele.
40028020	Mbewalosha wakae na mbonyi tsilya njimbawasye tsose. Nahong'u ambuyenyi njii nanyo mafiri hose na kuwede kushike ili masiyonyi ha wuyana.”
41001001	Mawookyenyi ha Ndumi ya Sia ya Yesu Kristo Mana o Ruwa.
41001002	Chando ki kiṟehye ko mwikimbi Yesaya, “Ambuya njekaa njidume msu oko mosonguo oshangunyi lopfo, nao nakuekye sungusia njia yapfo.”
41001003	Ṟu lya mndu moedia kundo ko nuka, “Keachikyenyi njia ya Mndumii mbedamiṟa na njomongo tsake.”
41001004	Kulewoneka Yohane Mpatisi kechipatisa kundo ko nuka na ionguo wupatiso wodumbuya, kundu Ruwa nawahoṟie njonyamaṟo tsawo.
41001005	Wakamhendia wandu woose wa isangenyi lyose lya Yudaya na Wa Yerusalemu wose wakapatiso nyio alya medenyi fo Yordanyi, wechitocha njonyamaṟo tsawo.
41001006	Nao Yohane aweṟee nguwo ya mafafuta ha ngamia na ngometa ya njonyi oo kitsinyi kyake, echilya nzihe na wuki wo mbakonyi.
41001007	Kaonguo kahamba, “Kuicha mndu numa yako sa anjing'anye, sa njilasumuhanye njiarame ipfunguo ngowa tsa shadu shakye.
41001008	Inyi njilemupatisa na mṟinga, kya indi o nyi echimupatisa na Mumuyo Mwele.”
41001009	Kyasia na mfiri iya Yesu kacha awuka kulya Nasareti ya kulya Galilaya kapatiso nyi Yohane medenyi fo Yordanyi.
41001010	Nalyo liyenyi kechido alya mṟingenyi, kawona ruwehu kochiṟuhuka, nao Mumuyo kechimsokya cha mbeta.
41001011	Ṟu likacha ruwehu likahamba, “Iyo nyi ui manoko mkunde, sa ngachihyo kyake.”
41001012	Naho kudi Mumuyo kamduo kundo ko nuka.
41001013	Kakaa kulya nuka mkonu makumi haana, kechihesho nyi Satana, akeri-pfo na mando ha nuka, wamalaika wakawa mompfuṟukanya.
41001014	Kyasia Yohane amhenda ikumbo kipfungonyi, Yesu kacha na Galilaya, kechionguo Mbonyi Njicha ya Ruwa.
41001015	Kahamba, “Kye kiheri kyamcha, na wumangi wo Ruwa womeafukya kufui. Kedumbuyenyi mbeidikya Mbonyi tso Njicha.”
41001016	Kyasia kyechiida mawambao ha nduwa ya lya Galilaya kawona wadehi wawi, Simon na Andrea manomae wechiolotsa mdeho wadehe makunga.
41001017	Yesu kawawia, “Kyenjonyi, mche ioshana na inyi na inyi mbemhaluo muwe wadehi wedeha wandu.”
41001018	Wadi wakadaho mdeho iya yawo wakaoshana nao.
41001019	Naho kahendahenda kitutu kawewona Yakobo na Yohane; wana wa Sebedayo, wakeri alya ngalawenyi yawo, wechisungusia mdeho iya yawo.
41001020	Nalyo kudi Yesu kawalaha; wakada ndeeyawo Sebedayo, ai ipfo ngalawenyi handu hamu na waekelei wakawuka-pfo wakaoshana nao.
41001021	Wakashika mṟinyi fo Kapernaumu; nalyo liyenyi kawoka ilosha mfiri fo Sabato ipfo sinagogenyi.
41001022	Wandu wose waimwadanyia wakawa mkahai kya mloshye fulya fokye; kipfa, chando ailosha, kikawa cha kya mndu awode chila, kilawe cha kya walosha wa wuwawaso.
41001023	Nalyo liyenyi kukacha naho mndu awodo nyi mṟufu o ngafu acha na sinagogenyi yawo kafihiṟa.
41001024	Kahamba, “Uwode-ki naso iyo, Yesu Mnasareti? Nyi ucheye nolurumatse? Lukuichi iyo nyio u, nyi ui Mwele o Ruwa.”
41001025	Yesu kamtoloma, “Tsia-ng'u, nombuke mundu-chu!”
41001026	Mṟufu fulya fo ngafu fukamrakwo-rakwo kafihiṟa na ṟu ling'anyi fukambuka.
41001027	Wandu wose wakaṟihyo wewesana wechihamba, “Ikyo nyi kiki? A ifu mloshye mhya? Mndu-chu nawode pfinya! Na waṟufu wa ngafu awawawasa, nawo wakamwidikya.”
41001028	Nahong'u mbonyi tsa Yesu tsikadung'ana owinyi kulya orukenyi lo Galilaya kose.
41001029	Wamewuka ipfo sinagogenyi wadi wakahenda ipfo mba ko Simon na Andrea warianyi na Yakobo na Yohane.
41001030	Kyasia mamka o Simon awelee kitaṟenyi awodo nyi modo, wadi wakambia kyake.
41001031	Yesu katikiria afui kamhoṟotsa kechimbada owoko, modo fukamlekya kawapfuṟukanya.
41001032	Kyasia ili kyukanyi mnengeṟi fochiolokya, wakamendye Yesu wandu wose wakeri iwawyo na sa wawodo nyi waṟufu wawicho.
41001033	Wandu wose wa mṟi fulya wakakuumbia alya mongonyi.
41001034	Yesu kachiṟa wafoi waweluo ndaṟe tsifoi kafuna waṟufu wawicho wafoi, nalawalekye wededa, nyi kipfa wawemwichi kye nyiu.
41001035	Kyasia ili lya ngama ngamenyi kilahala kilamedo kawuka-pfo kahenda handu ha kiseekenyi katerewia-pfo.
41001036	Simon hamu na wodoe walya wengi wakamwosha.
41001037	Wekimbona wakambia, “Orio mndu naikupfula.”
41001038	Yesu kawawia, “Ndenyi luhende mṟinyi ingi ya ipfo mṟasenyi kundu njiwe moonguo pfo mbonyi, cha kipfa kindo kienengye ngacha na ikyo.”
41001039	Nahong'u kacha na Galilaya kechionguo ipfo masinagonyi hawo hose na ifuna waṟufu wawicho.
41001040	Mndu umu awodo nyi iwawe kachea Yesu kamterewa kechimolokya ndenyi kambia, “Kokukundya, nochiidima njiheṟemtsa.”
41001041	Yesu Kamichyo wukiwa kahoṟuo owoko loke kampaya kahamba, “Na njikundi, heṟemka-ng'u!”
41001042	Nalyo liyenyi iwawe lilya lyikambuka kaheṟemtso.
41001043	Yesu kamkekedya adi kamfuna kambawasa,
41001044	“Ambuya kalawie ma mndu ma kindo, kya indi henda kuloṟe kulya ko mkohanyi nowewika mwano kya iheṟemtso lyapfo chando Mose awawasie shiwe kiṟingishyo kowo kye omechia.”
41001045	Kya indi mndu ulya kawuka-pfo kawoka yonguo kafoi na idung'anyitsa mbonyi tso, orio handu, Yesu alaidime-se iida na mṟinyi na pata, kya indi kakaa hando ha nuka. Ma kudo wandu wakacha na hando ai wakuwukye njora tsose.
41002001	Mfiri njiangu yamesia, Yesu kawuya-se na Kapernaumu, wandu wakaicho kye ipfo mba ai.
41002002	Wandu wafoi mnu wakakuumbia-pfo kulakeri-se handu ma oo mongo Yesu kawaoongoya mbonyi tsake,
41002003	wakacha wechimendye mndu a muumu shiwungo ariyo nyi wandu waana.
41002004	Walaidime imshitsa o handu Yesu ai kipfa kya mamingi fulya fo wandu. Wakahenda yatuoatuo mba iya alya huye ipfo sumhana na handu Yesu ai. Wakasanja-ho wakasotsya-pfo kitaṟa kilya, kirie mndu ulya a muumu shiwungo.
41002005	Yesu kekiwona kidikyo kyawo, kawia mndu ulya a muumu shiwungo, “Manoko, omehoṟio njonyamaṟo tsapfo.”
41002006	Kyasia kuwekeriho walosha wa wuwawaso maata wadamye-ho wechihiahia ipfo mrimenyi yawo,
41002007	“Nyi ki ili ichu akaria ideda ado? Nyi aruma Ruwa. Kuipfo mndu echiidima iwuta njonyamaṟo pfo shila na Ruwa amonyi.”
41002008	Nalyo Yesu kamanya makusaro hawo kawawia, Nkyi ili mukeṟi ihia mudo ipfo mrimenyiyi yanu?
41002009	Ikyi kii kyangu nyi kihya, ngesa nyi iwia mndu-chu muumu shiwungo. Njonyamaṟo tsapfo tsamewuto ang'u nyi imbia, “Kure noire kitaṟa kyapfo nokuhendye?
41002010	Kya indi njikundi mumanye, ke Mana o Mndu nyi awode pfinya kunu orukenyi yehoṟia wandu nyonyamaṟo.” Kawia mndu ulya amuumu shiwungo.
41002011	“Ngakuwia, kyekure noire kitaṟa kyapfo nokuhendye kanyi kopfo.”
41002012	Oweṟe kakure kaira kitaṟa kyake kawuka-pfo, wandu wawonyi wose. Wandu woose wakauma mkahai wakang'anyisha Ruwa wechihamba ke, “Lulembone shindo cha ishi manyale-pfo!”
41002013	Yesu kahendase kulya mawambayo ha nduwa. Mamingi fulya fose fo wandu fukacha na hando ai nao kawalosha.
41002014	Kechiida-ho, kawona Lewi mana o Alifayo adamye alya kisanyonyi kya okamba. Yesu kambia, “Kenjo nooshane na inyi.” Lewi kakure kahenda ioshana nao.
41002015	Lya ifurumia Yesu adamye kilionyi kya shelya ipfo mba ko Lewi, na Wasanyi wa okamba wafoi wawedamye na Yesu na wanyamaṟi handu hamu nao na wa kiloshyonyi kyake. Kipfa kuweipfo wafoi waweoshana nao.
41002016	Na wudo na walosha maata wa Mawawaso wawei Wafarisayo, wekiwona kye Yesu nyi ailya hamu na wasanyi wa okamba na wandu wanyamaṟi, wakawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Nkyi ili ailya na inyo handu hamu na wasanyi wa okamba na wandu wanyamaṟye?”
41002017	Na Yesu kekiwaicho ado kawawia, “Iwo wawode oru chiwo wasaṟye mhangapfo, shila na iwo waluo. Wandu njicheye iwalaha chi iwo wasumuhanyipfo, shila na wandu wanyamaṟye.”
41002018	Kiheri kyimu wa kiloshionyi kya Yohane na wa kiloshionyi kya Wafarisayo wawekyekuotoya. Wandu wakacha iwesa Yesu, “Nyikili wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wechekekwotoya na wa kiloshyonyi kya Wafarisayo, kya indi wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo welekyekuotoya?”
41002019	Yesu kawawia, “A wandu wa walinyi weidima ikwotoya mandi-ho menyi wali akeri nawo ngesa? Kiheri-ki kyose wakeri na menyi wali, weidima ikwotoyapfo.
41002020	Na kukae kushike kiheri iliindi menyi wali echiwuto kowo, ili wekoyo kiheṟi-kyo nlyondi wechikwotoya.”
41002021	“Kuwode mndu echipfumya nguwo njiku kidami kya nguwo njihyapfo; na koka awuta ado, kilya kihya kyewuka o nguwonyi njiku, na handu halya harandukye hakaengeṟa ing'ana.
41002022	Ma kuwode mndu echiwika mpfinyo fo kipfuo selelenyi njikupfo, kipfa kawuta ado mpfinyo fochiduitsa selela tso, mpfinyo fo na selela-tso shenyamaṟika Mpfinyo fo kipfuo fokewiko selelenyi njihya.”
41002023	Naho Yesu kechiida ipfo mademenyi ha nganu mkonu fo sabato, na wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakawoka itufuo mahaa halya ha nganu.
41002024	Wafarisayo wakambia, “Ambuya nykili wawuta kindo kilakiwikye momu mkonu fo sabato?”
41002025	Nao Yesu kawawia, “Ngesa mlalemesome kilya Dawidi alewuta lyandi walewuṟa kelya wakawado njaa na walya wawekeri nao?
41002026	Chando aleida na Mmba ya Ruwa, kiheri kilya Abiatari akeri mkohanyi mnene, kalya mkate iya yeṟihichya oo oshangunyi lo Ruwa, kyayo kulakeri mndu a mbikye momu fo ilya, shila na wakohanyi tupu. Dawidi aleilya kaenengya na walya wawei nao?”
41002027	Nao Yesu kawawia, “Mkonu fo Sabato fu mbike kipfa kya kiira kya mndu, ma chi mndu kipfa kya mkonu fo sabatopfo.
41002028	Ikyo kikaenenga. Mana o Mndu kawa na Mnene o Sabato.”
41003001	Yesu kaida-se na sinagogenyi, na kuwekeripfo mndu akachukye owoko.
41003002	Wandu waweiho Wakambikya meso, waambuye koka nyi echimchiṟa mfiri fo sabato, kundu wawonye Yesu owingo.
41003003	Nao Yesu kawia mndu ulya akachukye owoko, “Kure nokucheie na a makidi hawi.”
41003004	Kawayesa, “Ngesa kindo kisumuhanyi iwuta mkonu fo Sabato nyi iwuta kicha ang'u nyi iwuta kiwicho, nyi ikiṟa moo ang'u nyi iwaha?” Nawo wakatsia.
41003005	Kekiwaṟengutsya meso kawaichyo nyashi, akuinadie kya wuumu wo ngoo tsawo. Kawia mndu ulya, “Hoṟuo owoko-lopfo.” Kahoṟwo, owoko loke lukachia-se.
41003006	Kyasia Wafarisayo wamewuka-pfo wakakambia ideda kyama kyakye hamu na walya wa ko Herode, kundu wechirumatsa Yesu.
41003007	Kyasia Yesu kakusheṟwo na wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakahenda mawambayonyi ha nduwa, mamingi fung'anyi fo wandu fukaoshana nawo, Wacheye wauka Galilaya na Yudaya.
41003008	Na Yerusalemu na Idumaya na mataya ya meda fo Yordanyi na oruka lo kulya Tiro na Sidon. Nyi mamingi fung'anyi; wekiicho shilya Yesu alewuta, wakacha na koke.
41003009	Nao Yesu kawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, wamteseherie kingalawa kipfa kya kituṟu kya wandu kyembeda, kundu walampeṟehetse.
41003010	Kipfa walya alewachiṟa wawefoi; wandu waluo wakatana wamwolokya, kundu wampaye.
41003011	Wandu wawodo waṟufu wa ngafu wekimbona, wakamwolokya ndenyi wakafihiṟa wechihamba, “Iyo nyi ukeri Mana o Ruwa.”
41003012	Indi Yesu kawadedya kya pfinya, kundu walaongoye wandu.
41003013	Kyasia Yesu kado ifumvuhu kakulahya sa alekunda amonyi, wakahenda kokye.
41003014	Kasambuṟa wandu ikumi na wawi, kawadumbuya rina nyi “Wasu” kundu wakukaye nao na kundu nawadume wahende yongwo mbonyi,
41003015	na ihenda wawode pfinya yefuna waṟufu wawicho.
41003016	Walya ikumi na wawi alewasambuṟa nyiwo, Simon (rina lyingi nyi Petro.)
41003017	Yakobo na Yohane wana wa Sebedayo (Yesu kawadumbuya rina nyi Boanerge, nakyo kyahamba, wana wa ikuṟuṟuma.)
41003018	Andrea na Filipo na Bartolomayo, na Matayo, Toma Yakobo, mana o Alifayo, na Tadayo na Simon Mkananayo.
41003019	Na Yuda iskariote, nyi ulya aleṟingya Yesu.
41003020	Kyasia Yesu kaida na mba Kukasanzia-seho na kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu walawone mwanya folya kyela.
41003021	Walya wa kanyi kokye wekiicho wado, wakahenda imwonduo; cha kipfa walehamba nyi awodo nyi oṟuuṟe.
41003022	Nahong'u walosha wa wuwawaso wawewukye Yerusalemu wakasoka napfo wakahamba, “Nawodo Belsebuli na kui pfinya ya mnene chu o waṟufu wawicho nakeri ifuna waṟufu wawicho.”
41003023	Kyasia Yesu kawalaha kawawia ku mafanano, “Nyi wuda Satana aidima ifuna Satana ngesa?
41003024	Na kokoya wumangi wupaṟakanyi wenyi na wenyi, oruka ludo loidima iwangapfo.
41003025	Na kokoya Wandu wa mmba imu wapaṟakanyi wo wenyi kowenyi wechirumara.
41003026	Na kokoya Satana akuamkya amonyi apaṟakanyi, manya aidima iwangapfo, indi nyi echiarisika nakamu.
41003027	“Ma kuwode mndu echiidima iida na ipfo mba ya mwapfinya na iduo-ho nzohoṟa tsake alawoka ipfunga mwapfinya ulyai-pfo, kamma, nyi echitsiduo.
41003028	“Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Wandu wechihoṟio njonyamaṟo na shirumo shawo shoose wairuma nasho Ruwa.
41003029	Kya indi mndu karuma Mumuyo Mwele, echiwona ihooṟyo manya indipfo, kya indi na wunyamaṟi woke wochimbonyia owingo lo mlungana.’ ” (
41003030	Yesu nalehamba ado kipfa welehamba, “Ai na mṟufu o ngafu.”)
41003031	Mae o Yesu wakacha naho na wanawamae wakahoṟoka ipfo nja wakaduma mndu kokye wechimlaha.
41003032	Kuwedamye-pfo kituṟu kya wandu wakamṟingichia kiidi wakambia, “Ambuya mayo wakeri ipfo nja na wana wa mayo na washiki wapfo, wechikupfula.”
41003033	Nao Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Wama oko na wana wa wama wako nyi wu?”
41003034	Kawaṟengutsya meso walya wawedamyeho wawembikye kiidi kahamba, “Aiwa wama oko na wana wa wama wako.
41003035	Msa awuta shilya Ruwa akundi, nyio ai manowama oko na mshiki na wama.”
41004001	Yesu kawoka-se ilosha-se ai ohambehu lya nduwa. Kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu wakakuwumbia ipfo koke, katana aida na ngalawenyi kadamya alya nduwenyi, na kituṟu kilya kyose kikakaa kifui na nduwa hambehu.
41004002	Kawalosha shifoi kui mafanano, na ipfo kiloshyonyi kyake kawawia,
41004003	“Adanyienyi! Mndu mokumba mbeu alehenda kumba mbeu.
41004004	Na ili awekumba maata tsikaoloka mbai ya njia shilehe shikacha shikatsitola-ho.
41004005	Tsingi tsikaoloka hando hawode maho, naho tsilawoneho teri imoṟi. Natso kudi tsikakambiṟa ido owinyi, kipfa llyandi tsilawode teri ipfo wanda.
41004006	Mnengeṟi fomedo, tsikahya mu, kyamba tsilasotsye mri, tsikauma.
41004007	Tsingi-se tsikaoloka kiidi kya msha. Na masha iya ikado ikatsishingya tsilakikumbye kilimu.
41004008	Tsingi-se tsikaoloka ipfo terinyi njicha tsikado wanda tsikang'ana tsikakumbya imu ikakumbya makumi haṟaṟu na ingi makumi haṟandaṟu na ingi ihana.”
41004009	Kiidima kahamba, “Ichu awode madu headanya naweadanya!”
41004010	Kiheri Yesu awekeri amonyi, walya walemwadanyia warianyi na walya ikumi na wawi wakambesa kya mafanano iya.
41004011	Nao kawawia, “Nyo mu wainenge imanya mbonyi tsa Wumangi wo Ruwa tsi njiṟike, kyaindi walya wa nja wawio shose ku mafanano.
41004012	Kundu yambuya waambuye ma walawone, na yadanya waadanye ma walamanye, chila wudo wechihalukya Ruwa nao nawahorie.”
41004013	Yesu kawawesa, “Momanya ma ifananolipfo, Nyi wuda mochimanya mafanano ho hose?
41004014	Ulya mowaya awaya idedo lya Ruwa.
41004015	Walya wa mbai ya njia hando idedo lyawayo nyi walya wamicho, satana kacha owinyi kawuta idedo lyo li liwaye kiidi kyawo.
41004016	Wandu wengi nyi cha mbeu tsilya tsinjiwaye mahonyi. Nyi walya wekeicho idedo, wakakambiṟa iliambya na sia.
41004017	Kyaindi idedolyo lyilawade mri ipfo kiidi kyawo, kyaindi wakakaa-ho oweṟe. Nahong'u kiheri kocha wukiwa na iterengyo kipfa kya idedo lyo, wakahutsa macha.
41004018	Na wengi nyi cha mbeu tsilya tsileoloka ipfo kiidi kya msha. Nyi wo weadanya idedo lyo.
41004019	Kukaida-ho mawina ha kunu orukenyi na wulembi wolembo nyi masaa na lango tsa shindo shingi shikapfumba idedo lyo lilakumbye ndunda.
41004020	Kyaindi wengi nyi cha tsilya tsinjiwaye terinyi njicha. Nyi iwo wekeadanyia idedo lyo na iidikya wakakumbya ndunda; wengi makumi haṟaṟu, na wengi makumi haṟandaṟu na wengi ihana.”
41004021	Yesu kawawia, “Ngesa wandu wekeatsa mchumaa kundu fupfinyikyo kisoṟonyi ang'u fuwiko shia kitaṟa? Chi kundu fuhekyo handu ha huye?
41004022	Kipfa orio kindo ki kiṟike, kyechimanyika na kindo kya moowyonyi, kechiwono na pata.
41004023	Adanyienying'u kokoya na muwode madu!”
41004024	Kawawia, “Adanyienyi na mrima fose kindo mukicho! Kiheṟo ikyo chando mokeheṟia wandu wengi nkyo Ruwa echimuheṟya nakyo, nakyo mochiheṟyo nyo na yengeṟyo-se.
41004025	Kipfa ichu awode kindo nyi echienengo ngoseṟa; na ichu alawode, na kilya awode nyi echisoko.”
41004026	Yesu kaengeṟa kahamba, “Wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wukeri, cha ili mndu ahenda kumba mbeu terinyi.
41004027	Kio kahenda ilaa na yamka mfiri, kiherikyo mbeu ikatoluo na ing'ana alaichi, chando kii.
41004028	Kipfa teri yekeng'anyisha kilimu i njenyi, ikasongoṟa iṟa, ikaling'anyisha mbuwa, ikaiichuṟa mbeke ipfo mbuwenyi.
41004029	Kyilimu kyikambiṟa mnducho echikambiṟa ilesha kimndo, kipfa kiheri kyeweha kyamshika.”
41004030	Yesu Kahambase, “Lochifananyisha wumangi wo Ruwa na kyikii ang'u mfanano fo iki lochiwuwika?
41004031	Nyi wukeri cha mbeu ya karadali, mndu kaiwaya terinyi, nayo i ntutu kota mbeu tsingi tsose tsa kunu orukenyi.
41004032	Ikamewayo, ikado ikang'ana ikaida huye ya mashidi hoose ikakapa mbaha tsing'anyi, shilehe sha ruwehu shikatana shacha iwikapfo sungu na ilaa pfo mṟishenyi foyo.”
41004033	Kyasia Yesu na kui mfanano ifoi ido alewalosha nayo idedo lyake chando weleidima yadanya.
41004034	Alededa nawo kindo kyoosepfo chila kui mfanano tupu, kya indi walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake o kawa mowatambahaluya shose kyanya.
41004035	Mfiri fulya fulya komeila Yesu kawia wa kiloshionyi, “Luhende yambadya kya kulya.”
41004036	Wakada kituṟu kilya kya wandu, wakamduo Yesu, na ngalawa iya awekeri, kuwekeriho na ngalawa tsingi-da.
41004037	Kukaamka owira lo otanu lung'anyi, masinanu hakaolokya kulya ngalawenyi, ngalawa iya ikahenda yechiichuo mṟinga.
41004038	Nao Yesu nawekeri ngalawenyi alya numa nawelee mado kehekya mdo gondoṟonyi. Wa kiloshionyi wakamwamtsa wakambia, “Mlosha, nyi ulasaṟa-wo, ili luiiarisika?”
41004039	Kapang'uka katukya otanu lulya kawia masinanu ha nduwa, “Tsia, ukae kui ndiṟi!” Otanu lukahutsa kukaho olele wyaa.
41004040	Nao Yesu kawawia, “Nkyili mui mdi waowu? Nyiki ili mlawode idikya?”
41004041	Wakaowuo wuowu wung'anyi wakawiana mndu na odoye “Nyi u ichung'u-wo ili na otanu na masinanu shamidikya?”
41005001	Wakaambadya kya kulya mataya ya nduwa orukenyi lo Wageraseno.
41005002	Oweṟe lulya Yesu ambuka ngalawenyi, mndu awodo nyi mṟufu o ngafu kakambiṟa imkumbuhana acha awuka maṟungunyi ha wapfu.
41005003	Nao mndu cho nawekekaa maṟungunyi ha wapfu, ma kuipfo mndu aleidima impfunga manya na mshe-pfo.
41005004	Kipfa kafoi nawempfungie matima na ipfungo na mshe kadawuo mshe iya kawefunja na matima halya, ma mndu alaidime imlamiria.
41005005	Mfiri na kio echikaa maṟungunyi na mafumvunyi kyechipoṟohoṟa kechikukapa na maho.
41005006	Amewona Yesu ai kuleshe kakambya kamhoya ndenyi.
41005007	Kafihiṟa na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba, “Nyikiki kyako na iyo, Yesu ui Mana o Ruwa, Mwitoṟi? So hoi Ruwa ulanjiture.” (
41005008	Cha kipfa Yesu awemehamba, “Lekana na mndu chu iyo mṟufu o ngafu!”)
41005009	Nao Yesu kambesa, “Rina lyapfo nyi u?” Kambia, “Rina lyako nyi itorito (Legionyi,) kipfa lui wafoi.”
41005010	Kamterewa mnu, Yesu kundu nalawafune wawuke kulya orukenyi.
41005011	Kyasia na alya fumvunyi kukeri iliso ipoo lying'anyi lya nguwe.
41005012	Waṟufu walya wakamterewa wakahamba, “Keludume alya nguwenyi kundu luide na kiidi kyatso.”
41005013	Kawainenga momu. Waṟufu walya wa ngafu wakawuka-ho wakaida na kiidi kya nguwe. Ipoo lyo lya nguwe likapufukya msaṟihu likakwolotsa kulya nduwenyi tsikapufuka, na tsiweshikie cha shiku shiwi tsikapfumbikya kulya mringenyi.
41005014	Walya wetsilisa wakadicha wakashitsa mbonyi kulya mṟinyi na mhundenyi ya wandu; wandu wakacha iwona kilya kiwutikye.
41005015	Wakachea Yesu wakawona-ho mndu ulya awewodo nyi mṟufu mbicho, adamye aṟee nguwo amṟamtsu, wakaowuo.
41005016	Walya walewona mbonytso wakawaongoya wengi chando mndu ulya awewodo nyi mṟufu mbicho ambutyo na kya nguwe tsilya.
41005017	Wakawoka imterewa, nawuke kulya orukyenyi lowo.
41005018	Nahong'u Yesu kyechiida na ngalawenyi, mndu ulya awewodo nyi mṟufu mbicho kamterewa nahende nao.
41005019	Indi Yesu kamlehia, kya indi alembia, “Henda kanyi kopfo, ko wandu wapfo, nowaongoye chando Mndumii akuwutya shindo shing'anyi kakusaṟya.”
41005020	Nao mndu ulya kakuhendya kawoka yonguo kulya Dekapoli (mṟinyi ikeripfo ikumi,) chando Yesu ambutye shing'anyi wandu, woose wakaṟihio.
41005021	Kyasia Yesu amambadya kya kulya na ngalawa, Kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu kikakuwumbya kokye, akeri alya mbarinyi ya nduwa.
41005022	Kukacha mnene umuho o walya weambuya sinagoge, rina lyake nyi Yairo, Ambona Yesu kakuhutsa wanda madendenyi hake.
41005023	Kamterewa mnu kechihamba. “Manowaka oko nyi ineuka ai, Hoi kekuchee umhekye mawoko hapfo, kundu nachie nakae na moo!”
41005024	Kyasia Yesu kakure nao, Wandu wakaoshana nao kituṟu king'anyi wakampeṟehetsa.
41005025	Umu-ho nyi mndu mka awewoda nndaṟe kechiwuka samu maka ikumi na iwi.
41005026	Mka-cho awemlya mnu wukiwa wung'anyi wo wahanga wafoi. Amaiye masaa awewode hose, alawone achia, kya indi kawona, kechiengeṟa iwichwowichwo.
41005027	Awemiicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, kacha numa yake kakupeṟehetsia ipfo kituṟunyi kya wandu kapaya nguwo yake.
41005028	Kipfa nyi alehamba mrimenyi, “Ma kokoya njechipaya nguwo tsake tupu, na njechichia.”
