41005029	Oweṟe mra fo samu yake ikauma, kakuicho ipfo mbihu kokye, kye amechia ndaṟe iya iwembonde.
41005030	Yesu kamanya mrimenyi fokye, kye ambuko nyi pfinya, kaindukya kituṟu kilya kya wandu kahamba, “Nyiu anjipaya ṟao lyako?”
41005031	Wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakambia, “Uwonyi, kituṟu-kyo kya wandu kechikupeṟehetsa, kohamba, nyi u anjipaya?”
41005032	Yesu kaing'uṟung'uṟu iwona nyiu ambutia ado.
41005033	Nahong'u mka ulya ambona ambutyo ado, kacha, ikuloṟa kechiowuo na idedema, kaolokya Yesu ndenyi kambia shose sha sungusihu.
41005034	Nao Yesu kambia, “Manoko o waka, iidikya lyapfo lyamekukiṟa, kuhendie na kipuo nowechia na ndaṟe i iwekuwode.”
41005035	Yesu kyechideda ado wakacha wa kulya ko mnene ulya moambuya shinagoge wakambia, “Manopfo o waka ampfa, Nyikise owinyisha mlosha?”
41005036	Na Yesu nalasaṟe kilya amicho kihambo kido kawia mnene ulya moambuya sinagoge, “Kulaowuo kewekuidekye tupu.”
41005037	Alalekye mndu nahende nao shila Petro na Yakobo na Yohane, monomae o Yakobo.
41005038	Wakashika kanyi ko mnene ulya moambuya sinagoge Yesu kaicho kitohyo na ilia wechilia na ifihiṟa mnu.
41005039	Kaida-na mba kawawia, “Nyiki ili muitohya na ilia? Mana chu chi ampfapfo, nyi alee tupu.”
41005040	Kyaindi wo wakamseka. Nao kafunya wose nja kahenda warianyi na ndee o mana na mae na walya wa kiloshionyi wakaida napfo, alyando mana ulya akeri.
41005041	Kyasia kawada mana ulya owoko kambia, “Talita kumi,” ikyo nyi kihaluo, “Manoko o waka ngakuwia kure.”
41005042	Nalyo liyenyi mana ulya o waka kakure kachumya; (kipfa nyi aweshitsye maka ikumi na iwi.) Wadi wandu wakauma mkahi dang'a.
41005043	Yesu kawawawasa mnu, waladung'antse mbonyitso ko mndu, ma mndu nalakimanye, Kahamba mana-cho o waka nainengo kyela.
41006001	Yesu kakureho kahenda kulya mṟinyi kundu awukye, arianyi na wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
41006002	Mfiri fo sabato fomshika kawoka ilosha ipfo sinagogenyi. Na walya wafoi waleadanya wakaṟihyo wechihamba, “Mndu chu kundu awutye ishi nyiku? Na wuṟango wu awode nyi woku? Na mawuto hado ha finya hawuto ku mawoko hake?
41006003	Ichu chi ulya motsana shidi, ai mana o Maria na manomae o Yakobo na o Yose na o Yuda na o Simon? Na washiki wake chi wakeri iya kodu?” Wakawa kiṟuma ṟuma kipfa kyakye.
41006004	Yesu kawawia, “Kuwode kundu mwikimbi amenekyemenekyepfo, chila na kulya mṟinyi kokye na ko washari wakye na kulya kanyi kokye.”
41006005	Nao ma alaidime iwutia-pfo ṟiho shile wandu waluo maata alewahekya mawoko kawachiṟa.
41006006	Kaṟihio mnu kyawo, ili wai wado wandu walaidikye. Nao Yesu kawa motengetatengeta kulya mṟinyi ya kufui kechilosha.
41006007	Kalaha walya wa kiloshinyi ikumi na wawi kawoka iwaduma wawi wawi. Kawaenenga pfinya yefuna waṟufu wa ngafu.
41006008	Kawawasa, “Muladuo kindo njienyi shila ndichi tupu. Ma mkate ma kichoṟe ma mapesa ipfo shikuchunyi shanu.
41006009	Ṟaenyi shadu. Manya mlaṟae nguwo tsiwi tsa wanda.”
41006010	Kawawia-se, “Kokoya moambio na mba ko mndu, mkukaye-ho mtane mokure-pfo.
41006011	Mkakoya kundu walechimwambia ma imwadanya, wukyenyi-ho na itukatuka kululi kyii shia madende hanu, kiwe kiṟingishyo kowo.”
41006012	Wakakuhendya wakaongoya wandu wadumbuye.
41006013	Wakafuna waṟufu wawicho wafoi wakashia wandu wai mtengeṟi mafuda wakawachiṟa.
41006014	Kyasia mangi Herode kaicho isho shoose kiṟumi kya Yesu kiledung'ana orio handu. Wandu maata wawekehamba, “Yohane Mpatisi ameṟuka awuka ko wapfu, nkyo kitewe pfinya tsa ṟiho tsiṟunda kiidi kyakye.”
41006015	Wengi wakahamba, “ Mndu-chu nyio Elia.” Wengi wakahamba, “Nyi umuho o waikimbi walya.”
41006016	Herode ameicho mbonyitsi kahamba, “Ichu nyi Yohane! Njilemdumbuo mdo, nyio ichu aṟuka.”
41006017	Nyi ili Herode awedumie iwada Yohane na imshingya kipfungyonyi kipfa kya Herodia, mka o manomae o Filipo, nao amwalikie.
41006018	Kipfa Yohane alewia Herode, “Kikusumuhanye ukae na mka o manomayopfo.”
41006019	Kyasia Herodia kawadia Yohane kirumbo kakunda imbaha, nalaidime.
41006020	Nyi kipfa Herode nyaweowoe Yohane kammanya, ke nyi mndu o wusumhanyi na mndu mwele, kamringa. Herode kakunda iadanya Yohane; kawa morohio mnu mrimenyi kiheri amemwadanyia.
41006021	Nahong'u kukacha mfiri fokumbuo ifeo lya Herode, Herode kasungusia mfuho kalaha wanjama wake, na wasoṟo wa shidenyi na wanene walya wa Galilaya mfiri fokumbwo ifeo lyake.
41006022	Mana o Herodia o waka kaida-ho kashinyia-ho kachihiṟa Herode na walya waiho welya shelya. Mangi kawia mana ulya o waka, “Kenterewa kindo kyose okundi na njechikuinenga.”
41006023	Kamlia nyamu kambia, “Kindo amenjiterewa na njekuinenga, ma kokoya kishikie ma kifunjo kya wumangi woko.”
41006024	Mana ulya o waka kahenda ipfo nja kawia mae, “Nyikiki njechimterewa?” Nao kambia, “Na mdo fo Yohane Mpatisi.”
41006025	Mana ulya o waka kakambiṟa iwuya na ko mangi kamterewa kyehamba, “Njikundi mdo fo Yohane icho Mpatisi njiwikyo oo ipaluhu wulalu kudi.”
41006026	Mangi kawado mnu nyi fowa, alakikunde imlehya kipfa kya nyamu iya na wandu walya waiho welya shelya.
41006027	Mangi kakambiṟa iduma wasikari wake umu-ho kawawasa, kuendo mdo fo Yohane. Msikari kahenda kadumbuo mdo fo Yohane ipfo kipfungyonyi
41006028	kaende mdo fokye na ipalu kainengya mana ulya o waka na mana ulya o waka kainengya mae.
41006029	Wa kiloshyonyi kya Yohane wameicho mbonyitso, wakacha wakaira mnying'a foke wakafuṟika ṟungunyi.
41006030	Nahong'u wasu walya wakawuya wakakusanza ko Yesu wakambia mbonyi tsa shilya walewuta shose na ilosha.
41006031	Wandu wafoi wawekecha na ko Yesu na iwuya tane Yesu na wa kiloshianyi kyakye wawuṟa ma mweke folya kyelya. Yesu kawia wa kiloshionyi kyakye, “Nndenyi luhende handu ha kyaanya lusie ho moo kituntu.”
41006032	Wakakuhendya wawenyi kundu ko kisekyenyi wario nyi ngalawa, wakashika kundu ku kuleshe na wandu.
41006033	Wandu wafoi wakawawona wechihenda, wakawamanya wakawaituma na madende wa mṟi yose wakawasongoya ishika kulya kundu Yesu na wakiloshionyi waihenda.
41006034	Nawo wameshika, Yesu, kawona kituṟu kya wandu king'anyi kawaichio wukiwa, cha kipfa wakeri cha machondi halawode mlisi, kawoka iwalosha shifoi.
41006035	Mfiri fomeela, naho-ng'u wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakamchea wakambia “Iya nyi nuka na wulalu mfiri fomeela.
41006036	Kewasame, kundu wakuhendye ipfo mndenyi na ipfo mamṟinyi ha mṟasenyi, wakuhuṟye-pfo kindo kyekulia.”
41006037	Nao Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Wainengenyi nyo shelya.” Nawo wakambia, “Ngesa luhende ihuṟa mkate ya dinari mahana hawi, luwainenge kyekulia?”
41006038	Yesu kawawesa, “Mkate inga muwode? Hendenyi yambuya.” Wamemanya, wakahamba, “Nyi itanu na makunga hawi.”
41006039	Yesu kawawasa wakiloshionyi wadamiṟe wandu wose kui madembo ipfo maṟenyi hadoe-pfo.
41006040	Wakadamia wanda kui makamba, kui ihana ku ihana na makumi hatanu makumi hatanu.
41006041	Nahong'u Yesu kaira mkate iya itanu na makunga halya hawi kaambuya huye ruwehu kaidapfuma Ruwa kafunja mkate yo shifunjo kainengya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, kundu wawadaye, na wudo makunga halya hawi kawahawya wose.
41006042	Wandu wose wakalya wakaihuda.
41006043	Wakadodwo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu sha mkate na samaki wakaichuṟa shikunja ikumi na shiwi shiichwo pacha.
41006044	Na walya walelya mkate iya, waweshikye wasoṟo shiku shitanu.
41006045	Yesu kakambiṟa iitikya walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, waide na ngalawenyi, wamsongoye yambadya kya kulya Betisaida mataya ya nduwa, natane asama wandu walya wa mamwingi.
41006046	Amsamana nawo, kahenda ipfo ifumvuhu iteṟewa.
41006047	Komshika iila, ngalawa ikeri ipfo makidi hawi ha nduwa, nao ai handu hahadutsu amonyi.
41006048	Kyasia kekiwona wa kiloshionyi kyakye wahataṟo wekuruo ngalawa iya, kipfa otanu luwasumhyanye oshangunyi. Kufui na aheṟa Yesu kawahendya kechichumia huya mṟinga. Kakunda ikwidya mbele yawo.
41006049	Indi walembona, kechumia huya mṟinga, wakakusaṟa nyi kiṟishe wakafihiṟa.
41006050	Kipfa walya wawembonyi wose waleangalala. Wadi Yesu kadeda nawo kawawia, “Kewuyonyi nyi moo, nyio inyi Mlaowuo!”
41006051	Kadoya ipfo ngalawenyi kundu wawei, otanu lukahuma; wakauma mnu mkahai dang'a ipfo kidi kyawo.
41006052	Nyi ili mbonyi tsilya tsa mkate iya tsilawemewatambalukie na mrima yawo iwei nlemeri.
41006053	Wamambadya kya kulya mbai ya nduwa, wakashika kulya orukyenyi lo Genesareti wakapfungya-ho ngalawa iya.
41006054	Kyasia wambuka ipfo ngalawenyi oweṟe wandu, wakammanya Yesu.
41006055	Cha ili wakatengeta orukenyi lulya lose wakawoka yende walya wakeri iwawyo wario na shitaṟa na orio handu Yesu ai, kipfa waleicho kye nyi akyeri-ho.
41006056	Orio handu Yesu amehenda mrinyi ing'anyi ang'u ntutu, ang'u mndenyi wandu wakaende naho wandu waluo wakamterewa wapaye ma mambo tsa nguo yake. Na walya wose waletsipaya walechia.
41007001	Wakakusanza ipfo ko Yesu Wafarisayo na walosha wa wuwawaso maata-ho walewuka Yerusalemu.
41007002	Wakawona wa kiloshyonyi kyake maata wechilya mkate na mawoko hateṟefukye, nakyo nyi ili walawesanjie mawoko.
41007003	Kipfa Wafarisayo na Wayuda wose wekyelya walasamba mawoko-pfo, wekeringa mnu kido kya waku wawo.
41007004	Na wekyelya kindo wahuṟa tumo-shile wakisanjapfo. Kuwode na shingi shifoi waambye shelindia, na kya isanja shirahu na shiṟambo na shitela.
41007005	Wafarisayo na walosha wa uwawaso wakawesa Yesu, “Nyikili wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo walaiwuta kisumhanyi na shilya lui wadeye nyi waku wadu, wakalya shelya na mawoko hateṟefukye?”
41007006	Yesu kawawia, “Nyo makulembetseṟe na kilya Yesaya alededa kya lohi kyehamba kisuku kyanu, chando kii kiṟehye kyehamba, ‘Mbaṟi ii ya wandu; Ruwa ahamba, yecha injindya kui madedo ha wulya, kyaindi ngoo tsawo tsikeri kuleshe na inyi.
41007007	Ili wekenjiichika kya mai, ili waipfunda njopfundo tsii mawawaso ha wandu.’
41007008	Momda iwawaso lya Ruwa mkahenda iwada shilya mui wadeye nyi wandu.”
41007009	Yesu kaengeṟa ihamba, “Nyi wudo-ng'u, Mawawaso ha Ruwa nyi mutahachye kui wuṟango, mkawada shilya mui wadeye nyi waku wanu.
41007010	Kipfa Mose alehamba, ‘Keindya ndeo na mayo,’ na, ‘Moruma ndee ang'u mae, nyi opfu napfe.’
41007011	Kyaindi nyo mokyelosha, kokoya mndu awode kindo awechiidima itarama nakyo nde ang'u mae indi kahamba kye kindokyo nyi Korbanyi (kidaso ko Ruwa).
41007012	Kimbaṟi natarame-se wafee wakye-pfo.
41007013	Nyi wudong'u mokyepiṟa idedo lya Ruwa kipfa kya shilya shanu muiwadeye mkadeya. Na wudo na shindo shifoi shido mokewuta.”
41007014	Yesu kalaha-se kituṟu kilya kya wandu na handu ai kawawia, “Munjiadanye mose na imanya.
41007015	Kuwode kindo kii ipfo nja ya mndu kyechiida na ipfo kiidi kyake kechiidima imteṟefutsapfo. Kyaindi shilya shawuka ipfo kiidi kya mndu nyisho shii sheteṟefutsa.” [
41007016	“Ichu awode madu headanya naweadanya.”]
41007017	Kiheri amida na mba, awuka kulya kituṟunyi kya wandu, wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakambesa kya mfanano fulya.
41007018	Nao kawawia, “Nanyo na wudo-ng'u mlamanya kindo? A mlaichi, ke shose sha nja sheida na ipfo kiidi kya mndu shechiidima imteṟefutsapfo.
41007019	Nyi kipfa shilechiida na ngoonyi yakye, shila nyi ndewunyi yake shechiida napfo shikakuwukya-ho shewiko ṟungunyi kundu kowika mando. (Ili Yesu alehamba ado nyi aleharamisha shelya shoose.)”
41007020	Kaengeṟa ihamba, “Kilya kyekyeuka ipfo kiidi kya mndu, nkyo kyekyeteṟefutsa mndu.
41007021	Kipfa kyekyeuka ipfo ngoonyi ya mndu nyisho mahio mawicho; isokomba na isokombo; wuiwi na wuwahi.
41007022	Na iṟuhuya na iṟuhuyo; wununyi na wuwicho; ngeṟo na mpuria; riso linenyi na shirumo na ikushela na wutondo.
41007023	Shiwicho sho shose shekewuka ipfo kiidi kya mndu shikateṟefutsa mndu.”
41007024	Yesu kakure-pfo kahenda ipfo mṟasenyi ya Tiro. Kaida na mba kiṟika ma mndu nalamanye, indi nalaidime ikuowya-ho.
41007025	Oweṟe lulya mndu mka umu, kimana kyake kya waka kiwodo nyi mṟufu o ngafu kaicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, kaida-ho kamolokya ndenyi.
41007026	Na mka ulya awekeri mndu Mgriki o ipfo mbaṟinyi ya Wafoenyike wa Kisiria. Katerewa Yesu kye nafune mṟufu ulya o ngafu nauke mana-cho oke o waka.
41007027	Nao Yesu kambia, “Kyeleka shiwana shiihutso kuwoka; kipfa chi kicha osoke shiwana kando nokumbye mashitepfo.”
41007028	Indi mkacho kahaluo kambia, “Ee-wo Mndumii; kyaindi ma shite shekaa shia mesa shekyekulia na shipeṟengu sheolotso-olotso-ho nyi shiwana.”
41007029	Nao Yesu kambia, “Omtana omhamba kudo, kuhendye, Mṟufu cho ambuka mana chu opfo o waka.”
41007030	Amekuhendya kanyi kokye, kakoya manokye a mlaṟe ipfo kitaṟenyi, ambuko nyi mṟufu ulya.
41007031	Yesu ambukase ipfo mṟasenyi ya Tiro, kaida Sidon kashika kulya nduwenyi ya Galilaya, echiida makidi hawi ha mṟasa ya mṟi iya ikumi (Dekapoli).
41007032	Wakamendye mndu a mpfu madu apfungikye na olimi, wakamterewa, namhekye mawoko.
41007033	Yesu kambuta o kituṟunyi kya wandu kamduo kyanya kamhekya shimnyo kulya madunyi hake kapaya olimi loke kechipuchia mada.
41007034	Kaambuya ruwehu kasumukya kambia, “Efata”, ikyo nyi “Tambaṟuka!”
41007035	Oweṟe madu hake hakatambaṟuka, cha ili olimi loke lupfungikye lukatambahaluka, kawoka ideda necha.
41007036	Yesu kawawawasa walawie ma mndu mbonyi tso. Kyaindi chando alewawasa, nyi wudo nawo waleengeṟa yonguo.
41007037	Wandu wakawa mkahai dang'a, wechihamba, “Shose ashiwutye necha, katarama walya wapfu madu iicho, na walya walaideda kawainenga ideda.”
41008001	Mfiri iya kuwei-se ho kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu, walawode kindo kyela, Yesu kalaha wa kiloshyonyi kyake Wasanzye oo hando ai kawawia,
41008002	“Ngakusaṟa wukiwa wo wandu-wa, kyamba wamtsinda kunu koko mfiri iṟaṟu, ma walawode kindo kyelya.
41008003	Na kokoya ngawasama, wahende kanyi kowo, walasusuo, wechiariskya njienyi; nawo maata-ho wacheye wawuka kuleshe.”
41008004	Wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakamhaluo wakahamba, “A nyku mndu echiidima iwuta mkate yechiwaihutsa woose iya nuka.”
41008005	Yesu kawawesa, “Nyi mkate inga mbode?” Wakahamba, “Nyi mfungade.”
41008006	Kawawasa kituṟu kilya kya wandu wadamie wanda; Nahong'u kaira mkate iya mfungade kaana Ruwa kafunjafunja kaenengya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, kundu wawadaye; nawo wakadaya kituṟu kilya.
41008007	Wawode na shikunga shitutu; Yesu kaidapfuma Ruwa kawawasa shidaayo wandu.
41008008	Wandu wakalya wakaihuda Wakadodwo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu shikunja mfungade.
41008009	Na wandu walelya waweshikie cha shiku shiina; Yesu kawasama.
41008010	Nalyo lienyi kaida na ngalawenyi handu hamu na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakahenda wambaṟa ya Dalmanuta.
41008011	Wafarisayo wakacha, wakawoka iwesana na Yesu kui imhesha wakakunda nawawutie ṟiho iwe kiṟingishio kye nawode pfinya iwukie ruwehu.
41008012	Yesu kasokyo nyi fowa mrimenyi foke kahamba, “A nkyi ili mbaṟi ii ikundi kiṟingishyo? Nyi kya lohi ngambia, mbaṟi ii yechiloṟo kiringishio manyale-pfo.”
41008013	Kawada kaida-se na ngalawenyi kaambadya kya kulya mataya ya nduwa.
41008014	Wakiloshionyi wakahadima iduo mkate, nyi mkate fumu tupu wawerie ipfo ngalawenyi.
41008015	Yesu kawawawasa kechihamba, “Keambuyenyi mkuṟise mtarang'ao fo Wafarisayo na fo Herode.”
41008016	Wa kiloshionyi wakakusaṟa wo wenyi na wenyi. Nyi ahamba ado kipfa lulawode mkate.
41008017	Yesu kamanya kawawia, “Nyi kili muiwesana kya ili mlawode mkate? Nyi mlametawuka imanya ma mlamewada wuṟango? Na ngoo tso tsanu tsiwei ntumhari?
41008018	Nyi muwode meso, mlawone? Mbewode madu, mlaicho manya mlakumbuo?
41008019	Mukumburie lyilya njilefunjyafunjya shiku shitanu mkate itanu? Muledoduo mtsuhaṟo shipeṟengu shechiichuṟa shikunja shinga?” Wakambia, “Nyi ikumi na shiwi.”
41008020	“Na ili njilefunjyafunjya walya shiku shiina mkate iya mfungade, mledoduo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu sha shikunja shinga?” Wakahamba, “Nya mfungade.”
41008021	Nao kawawia, “Na mrasa wulalu. Mulamemanya?”
41008022	Yesu na wa kiloshionyi kyakye wakacha na Betisaida. Wandu wakamendye mndu a mpfu meso wakamterewa, kye nampaye.
41008023	Yesu kawada ulya mpfu meso kuwoko kambuta kulya mṟinyi kamduo nja ya mṟi fulya kamshia mada ipfo mesonyi hake na imhekya mawoko kambesa, oidima iwona kindo?
41008024	Kipfupfuṟe kechiambuo kahamba, “Njiwonyi wandu wechumya, njiwawonyi wai cha mashidi haichumia.”
41008025	Nahong'u Yesu kawuya imhekya se mawoko mesonyi hake, kawanza iambuo kawuya iwona, pfinya yake yeambuo ikamchea, kawona shoose necha.
41008026	Yesu kamduma nahende kanyi kokye, kechimbawasa, “Ma kulawuye na kulya mṟinyi.”
41008027	Yesu na wa kiloshionyi kyakye wakahenda mṟinyi ya Kaisaria Filipi. Wachihenda Yesu kawesa wa kiloshionyi, “A wandu wekededa wada kyako, ke inyi nyi wu?”
41008028	Wakambia “Wengi wekehamba iyo nyi Yohane Mpatisi, na wengi, nyi Elia, na wengi, nyi umu o waikimbi.”
41008029	Nao kawawesa, “A nyo mohamba kye inyi nyi u?” Petro kahaluo kambia, “Iyo nyi ukeri Kristo.”
41008030	Yesu kawakekedya, ma walawie mndu oose mbonyi tsake.
41008031	Yesu kawoka ilosha wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Mana o mndu, kimbaṟi naliso wukiwa wung'anyi na imino nyi wasongoru wa wandu na wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso Nechiwoho, na ili lya kaṟaṟu naṟuke.”
41008032	Yesu kawawia ado na pata. Petro kamduo kyaanya kawoka imdedya.
41008033	Nao Yesu aminduka, kechiambuya wa kiloshyonyi kyake kadedya Petro kahamba, “Kewuya na numa yako Satana, nyi kipfa chando uihia chi ha Ruwapfo, nyi ha kiwandu.”
41008034	Numa Kalaha kituṟu kya wandu handu hamu na wa kiloshyonyi kyake kawawia, “Kokoya mndu akunda oshana na inyi, kimbaṟi nakukane amonyi, nakudike na msalaba fokye, naoshane na inyi.
41008035	Kipfa mndu echikunda letsa moo fokye amonyi, nyechifudetsa. Na mndu echidetsa moo foke kipfa kyako inyi na kipfa kya Mbonyi tso Njicha nyi echifuletsa.
41008036	Kipfa kiira kiiho nyi kiki, ili mndu awinya wuyana wuwose, wukawa wokye, kadetsya-pfo moo fokye?
41008037	Ang'u kindo mndu echiwika kiwe ndalai ya moo foke nyikiki?
41008038	Mndu oose monjiwadia sonu inyi na madedo ha hako kunu kiidi kya mbaṟi ya wanyamaṟi na walasaṟie Ruwa, na Manomndu nyi echimbadia sonu ili echikaa nache na wusuṟi wo Nde handu hamu na wamalaika waele.”
41009001	Yesu kaengera iwawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, wandu wa wahoṟoki iya kukeri-ho maata-ho wekaa walasaha opfu, na watane wawona wumangi wo Ruwa wochicha na pfinya.”
41009002	Kyasia komida-ho mfiri iṟandaṟu, nao Yesu kaduo-ho Petro na Yakobo na Yohane kahenda nawo wawenyi kado kundu ko fumvu-hu li ileshe handu ha kisekenyi. Waipfo wechimwambuya, Yesu kailachika fana wawonyi,
41009003	nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu, kota chando mndu mosanja nguwo o iya orukenyi eketsiilisha.
41009004	Na Elia na Mose wakakuloṟa nawo, wechideda na Yesu.
41009005	Kyasia Petro kawia Yesu, “Mlosha, iya nyi handu haluchihie ikaa-ho. Nanga luwike-ho matengo haṟaṟu limu lyafo, na limu lya Mose na limu lya Elia.”
41009006	O na wodoye waleowuo mnu alamanye ma kindo aihamba.
41009007	Kyasia ipuchi lilya likacha lyikawashikia, ṟu likacha alya kiidi kya ipuchi lyehamba, “Ichu nyi ai Mana oko mkunde, kemwadanyenyi!”
41009008	Naho peṟeseng'u wa kiloshionyi wekiambuya-se, walakiwone-se ma mndu shila na Yesu amonyi nawo.
41009009	Kyasia ili wesoka kulya fumvuhu, Yesu kawawawasa, walaongoye ma mndu shilya waleshiwona, na mtano Manomndu aṟuka awuka wapfunyi.
41009010	Nahong'u wakaiṟicha iwawaso-lyo indi wakawa wechiwesana wo wenyi na wenyi, kilya kya iṟuka wapfunyi nyi kiki?
41009011	Wakawesa Yesu, “Nyiki ili Wafarisayo na walosha wa wuwawaso wahamba, ke Elia kimsumhanyi nasonguo icha?”
41009012	Nao kawahaluo, “Ee-da, Elia na echisonguo icha, naachikie shindo shose. Na kya Manomndu nyi wuda ki kiṟehye kyake ipfo Shitapunyi Shiele kye Mana o Mndu nechiliso wukiwa wufoi na iilo?
41009013	Kyaindi ngambia, ke Elia alemcha, nawo wakambutya shose, chando walekunda, chando ki kiṟehye kyake.”
41009014	Naho wekicha na ko wa kiloshyonyi kyake walya wengi. Wakawona-ho kituṟu king'anyi kya wandu kiiho. Na walosha wa wuwawaso, wechiwesana nawo.
41009015	Nalyo lienyi kituṟu kilya kya wandu wekimbona, woose wakawuko nyi madima wakambingya wakamiṟikiṟa.
41009016	Yesu kawawesa, “Kindo muiwesana nawo nyi kiki?”
41009017	Umu-ho o kituṟu kilya kya wandu kahaluo, “Mlosha, ngaende manoko o womi na kopfo, awodo nyi mṟufu aladeda.
41009018	Na kiheri amembada, kamduka na imwolotsa wanda, naidosa mawuruwuru kalya mkongoṟo kaoṟomoka. Ngaterewa wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo wafune mrufu fo walaidime.”
41009019	Yesu kawahaluo kahamba, “Nyo Mui mbaṟi ya wandu ilawode idikya, Njikae nanyo njishike indii? A njimpfirilie njishike indii? Mwendenyi na iya hando njikeri.”
41009020	Wakamendye na kokye. Mṟufu-fo fokiwona Yesu fukasingitsa mana ulya, kaho wanda kakuhalihatsa, kechidosa mawuruwuru. Nao Yesu kawesa ndeye,
41009021	“Kiheri kida ambokye ado?” Ndeye kahamba, “Wokya ututu wokye.
41009022	Na kafoi mṟufufo fokyemkumba modonyi na mṟingenyi, kundu namrumatse; Kyaindi koka kochiidima kindo kelutarame kochilusaṟya.”
41009023	Yesu kambia, “Kye wai, koka kochiidima! Shose shedimikya ko ulya aidikye.”
41009024	Adi ndee o mana ulya kafihiṟa naṟu lying'anyi kahamba, “Ngaidikya! Kyenjitarama iidikya lyako lilitutu.”
41009025	Yesu kekiwona, kye kituṟu kya wandu kyechikuwumbya ho, katoloma mṟufu ulya o ngafu kambia, “Aiyo mṟufu utewie mana-chu alaidima deda; ma iicho inyi ngakuwawasa. Wuka mana-chu, ma ulawuye-se na kokye.”
41009026	Mṟufu fulya fukakoṟoṟoma naṟu, fukamrakwo mnu fukamwolotsa wanda fukambuka; kawa cha ili apfie katana wafoi wahamba, “Ampfa!”
41009027	Kyaindi Yesu kambada owoko kamhoṟotsa, nao kahoṟoka.
41009028	Yesu amiida na mba, wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakambesya kisekenyi, “Nyiki ili so lulaidima imfuna?”
41009029	Nao Kawawia, “Waṟufu wa mbaṟi i wewa ifunopfo shila kui iterewa tupu.”
41009030	Yesu na wa kiloshionyi kyakye wekiwuka-ho, wakakuhendya waida Galilaya. Yesu alakunde wandu wamanye handu ai.
41009031	Kipfa nyi awelosha wa kiloshyonyi kyake Kawawia, “Manomndu echidambiko mawokonyi ha wandu wechimbaha, nao kamboho mfiri iṟaṟu nyi yechisia naṟuke.”
41009032	Wakiloshionyi walamanye, ili awawia ado, wakaowuo imbesa.
41009033	Wakacha na Kapernaumu. Akeri ipfo mba kawawesa, “Kindo muwei. Wesana kyakyo nyi kiki kulya njienyi?”
41009034	Nawo wakatsia, kipfa waweiwesana kya msa echiwa msongoru o wengi kiidi kyawo.
41009035	Yesu amdamia kalaha walya ikumi na wawi kawawia, “Mndu kakunda iwa msongoru, kimbaṟi nawe mfurumi nawewa mpfuṟukanyi o wose.”
41009036	Kaira kimana kitutu kambika ipfo makiidi hawi hawo kamchunguṟya kawawia,
41009037	“Msa echiambia mana cha ichu kui rina lyako, nyio inyi anjambya; mndu kanjiambya inyi chio inyi anjambyapfo, nyi aambia ichu anjidumye.”
41009038	Yohane kambia, “Mlosha, lulewona mndu kechifuna waṟufu wawicho ku rina lyapfo, alaioshana naso, lukamima, kipfa alaluosha.”
41009039	Yesu kahamba, “Mlamime; kipfa kuipfo mndu echiwuta ṟiho kui rina lyako naidime ideda owicho kyakopfo.
41009040	Kipfa sa alasuanyi naso, nyi aduanyi naso.
41009041	Kipfa mndu oose echimrutsa mringa fonyo na kirahu kui rina lyako, kipfa mui wa Kristo, nyi kya lohi ngambia, mndu chu echiwuṟa woṟunda wokyepfo.
41009042	“Na mndu ose echitewa iwa wanjiidikye ma ichu mtutu umu-ho nawute wunyamari, kyakye kiwei kichakicha-ho nyi ipfungyo iho lya iseo lying'anyi oo nzingonyi nahende kumbo ipalipalinyi.
41009043	Na kokoya kuwoko kopfo kukokudekesha kyekudumbuo-ho! Nanga iyo koida na ipfo kiidi kya moo kui kikonu, kota ili uwode mawoko hapfo hahawi koida na Gehena ipfo modonyi fulechiruma. [
41009044	Mpfo kundo kiwiro kyewawiṟa kilechitsia na modo fowakoṟa fulechiruma.]
41009045	Na koka kudende kopfo kokudekesha, kyekudumbwo-ho! Nanga iyo koida na ipfo kiidi kya moo, kui kiricheche, kota ili uwode madende hapfo hahawi kokumbo ipfo Gehenenyi. [
41009046	Mpfo kundo kiwiro kyewawiṟa kilechitsia na modo fowakoṟa fulechiruma.]
41009047	Na kokoya riso lyapfo lyakudekesha, kyelitufu-ho! Nanga iyo koida na wumanginyi wo Ruwa kui njeche kota ili uwode meso hawi kokumbo ipfo modonyi fo Gehenenyi.
41009048	Mpfondo mashinu haiipfo helekepfa, manya modo fulekerumisho manyale.
41009049	Kipfa orio mndu echiwikyo monyo na modo.
41009050	Monyo nyi kindo kicha, kyaindi monyo fukommba ifinda fochikoṟa-se ki? Wadenyi monyo ipfo kiidi kyanu mbekukaya na ofoṟo nyo wenyi na wenyi.”
41010001	Nahong'u Yesu kakure-ho kacha na kulya shihongonyi sha Yudaya na kulya mataya ya meda fo Yordanyi. Kituṟu kya wandu kikamchease kawalosha, chando aweichiwie.
41010002	Wafarisayo wakacha na kokye wakambesa, wechimhesha, “Na kisumhanyi mndu nalekane na mka okye?”
41010003	Yesu kawahalwo kawawia, “Kilya Mose amuwawasye nyi kiki?”
41010004	Nawo wakahamba, “Mose aleinenga momu mndu msoṟo nalekane na mka okye na imṟehia baruo yemsama.”
41010005	Yesu kawawia, “Mose alemuinenga iwawaso lyo kipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanu.
41010006	Kya indi wokya mawokyonyi, Ruwa nalewumba mndu msoṟo na mndu mka.
41010007	Ko ikyo msoṟo nechilekana na ndee na mae, nalungane na mka okye,
41010008	nawo wawawi wechiwa mbihu fumu. Wechiwa-se wawi-pfo indi nyi mbihu fumu.
41010009	Kyasia-ng'u ikyo Ruwa amekisanza, mndu o wandu nalakiletsane.”
41010010	Wameidase na ipfo mba walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambesa kya kindo kyo.
41010011	Nao kawawia, “Ichu alekana na mkokye kaalika ungi, nyi aṟuhuya kamdekyo.
41010012	Na mka kalekana na mii okye kahenda yaliko nyi uingi nyi aṟuhuyo.”
41010013	Kyasia wandu wakaende shiwana na ko Yesu, kundu nashipaye. Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakatukya walya washirie.
41010014	Yesu kekiwona ado, kasungulula kawawia, “Kelekenyi shiwana shikucheye na koko, ma mlashiime; cha kipfa wandu wado chasho nyiwo Wumangi wo Ruwa woewa wowo.
41010015	Nyi kya lohi ngambia. Mndu ada alaambya wumangi wo Ruwa ai cha kimana, echiida naho-pfo.”
41010016	Kawachunguṟya kawahekia mawoko kawawikya ona.
41010017	Kyasia Yesu ambuka-pfo ashikie njienyi, mndu kakambia na kokye kampfirya ndi kambesa, “Ui mlosha mcha, kindo njechiwuta, kundu njioṟe moo fo mlungana nyi kiki?”
41010018	Na Yesu kambia, “Nyikili onjilaha njii mcha? Kuwode mchapfo shila umu, nyi Ruwa amonyi.
41010019	Mawawaso na uhaichi, Kulaṟuhuye, Kulawahe, Kulaiwe, Kulairie mndu sha wongo, Kulasoke mndu kya pfinya, India ndeo na mayo.”
41010020	Nao kambia, “Mlosha, kyaho hose njihainutsie wokya wututu woko.”
41010021	Yesu kamambuya kamkunda kambia, “Utsuheṟe kindo kyimu, kehenda nokumbe isho uwode noenengye wakiwa, naho ochiwada kisa kya shindo shifoi ipfo ruwehu. Komidima, uche oshana na inyi.”
41010022	Nao ameicho ado kakuinadia kakuhendya awodo nyi fowa kipfa awewode masaa hafoi.
41010023	Yesu kaṟengutsya meso kaambuya njora tsose kewia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Ambuyenyi, chando kilemye, wasuṟi waide na ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa!”
41010024	Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakaṟihyo kya madedo halya hakye. Na Yesu kawawia-se, “Wana wako nkikiumu mnu iida na ipfo Wumanginyi wo Ruwa.
41010025	Kyangu-ho nyi ngamia ide na ṟochenyi lya sindano, kota mndu msuṟi naide na ipfo Wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
41010026	Wakiloshionyi kyakye wakaṟihio mnu wakawesana wo wenyi na wenyi, “A mndu echiidima ikiṟo nyi u?”
41010027	Yesu kawahaluya meso kawawia, “Kunu ko wandu nyi kindo kilechiidimika kyaindi ko Ruwa chi wudopfo, kipfa ko Ruwa shose shechiidimika.”
41010028	Petro kambia, “A so nyi wuda? Ludeye shose lukaoshana na iyo.”
41010029	Yesu kahamba, “Na kya lohi ngambia, orio mndu adeye ma mba ma wana wa mae ma washiki, ma mae, ma ndeye, ma mdemi kipfa kyako na kipfa kya Mbonyi tso Njicha.
41010030	Kiheri kyi kya wulalu elekaa nawihiṟyo ka ihana ngoseṟa mba na wana wa mae, na washiki, na mae, na mdemi, na wana, handu hamu na matuuro, na mfiri yechicha nawewona moo fo mlungana.
41010031	Kyaindi wafoi wasonguo nyi wechiwa wafurumi na iwo wafurumi wawewa wasongoru.”
41010032	Naho wakeri njienyi wechido na Yerusalemu, nao Yesu nawewasongoye Wa kiloshionyi kyakye wawewaowu, wandu wakamituma wechiowuo. Yesu kaduose kyanya walya ikumi na wawi, kawoka iwawia shilya shekaa shimhoye,
41010033	“Adanyienyi, Lukeri ido na Yerusalemu, na Manomndu echidambikyo wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso, nawo wambutye owingo lo opfu wawehenda mdambikya ko wandu wa mbaṟi njiehenu.
41010034	Nawo wamtaluo na imselya mnyeri wawemkapa na ngowa tsi ntochye msha, na iwaha, wechimbaha. Na ili mfiri fo kaṟaṟu nyi echiṟuka.”
41010035	Yakobo na Yohane wana wa Sebedayo wakamsembelya kufui wakambia, “Mlosha, lukundi uluwutye, chando lochikuterewa.”
41010036	Nao Yesu kawawia, “Kindo mokunda njimbutye nyi kiki?”
41010037	Wakambia, “Uluenenge, momu ludamie umu ora lopfo lo kulyo na ungi ora lopfo lo kumoso ipfo wusuṟinyi wopfo.”
41010038	Nao Yesu kawawia, “Muichi kindo muiterewapfo. Ngesa lohi na moidima inyo kirahu kya matuuro njechikunyoya inyi ang'u ipatiso chandu inyi; njechipatiso?”
41010039	Wakambia, “Na loidima.” Yesu kawawia, “Kirahu ikyo njechinyo inyi, nanyo mochinyo, na mochipatiso chandu inyi njilepatiso.
41010040	Kyaindi idamya ora loko lo kulyo na lo kumoso kyalyo chi iṟunda lyako inyi lyeinenga mndupfo, kyaindi weinengo walya wai wateseheṟye.”
41010041	Naho walya ikumi wekiicho isho wakawoka ipfuluko kya Yakobo na Yohane.
41010042	Yesu kawalaha kawawia, “Muichi, kye walya watano mangi tsa wandu wa masanga nyi wawaitoṟye kui wuapfinya na iwo wanene wakawaapfinyia.
41010043	Kyaindi kunu konu kilawe kido. Indi sa akundi iwa mnene kidi kyanu, kimbaṟi nawe mṟundi onu.
41010044	Na msa akundi iwa mosongoru kiidi kyanu, nyi kimbaṟi nawe isinga lya wose.
41010045	Kipfa na Manomndu acheye ipfuṟukanyopfo, kyaindi kundu napfuṟukane nawelekia moo foke fuwe ndalai yetalaa wandu wafoi.”
41010046	Wakashika Yeriko. Na ili wewuka kulya Yeriko Yesu na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye na kituṟu kya wandu king'anyi; kipfupfuṟe Bartimayo mana o Timayo adamye oo mbai ya njia, echyeṟeṟya wandu.
41010047	Kyekiicho nyi Yesu o Nasareti aiida-ho kawoka ikoṟoṟoma na ihamba, “Yesu u Mana o Dawidi, Kenjisaṟia-wo!”
41010048	Wandu wafoi wakamdedya kundu nakutsie; kyaindi o kaengeṟa mnu ikoṟoṟoma, “Mana o Dawidi, kenjisaṟyawo!”
41010049	Yesu katirima-ho kahamba, “Kemlahenyi.” Wakalaha kipfupfuṟe ulya wechimbia, “Kyewuuyo nyi moo! Kure, nyi akulaha.”
41010050	Nao kakumba nguwo tsake tsa huye katsung'tsuwuka kachea Yesu.
41010051	Yesu kambesa, “Kindo ukundi njikwutye nyi iki?” Kipfupfuṟe ulya kambia, “Mlosha ngaterewa njiidime-se iambuo.”
41010052	Nao Yesu kambia, “Kuhendye, idikya lyapfo lyamekukiṟa.” Nalyo liyenyi kaambwo kaitumana na Yesu orio handu.
41011001	Kyasia wekiafukya kufui na kulya Yerusalemu waleshika Betifage na Betanyia, kukeri alya Fumvunyi lya mashindi ha Mtsinepfu. Kaduma wa kiloshyonyi kyake wawi-ho.
41011002	Kawawia, “Hendenyi kulya mṟinyi fukeri mambatsana na iya handu mui. Mochiida napfo mdi mochiwona ihache lya nzoi li-pfunge handu lilalemewawe mndu manya limu. Lyipfunguo-ho mliende.
41011003	Na koka mndu kechimuwesa, ‘Nkyili mowika mdo?’ Mumbie, ‘Mndumii alikundi, na oweṟe nechiliwihiṟa na iya.’ ”
41011004	Wakahenda wakawona ihache lilya lya nzoi lipfunge oo mongonyi kya nja kulya njienyi. Wakalipfunguo-ho.
41011005	Na walya wahoṟoki-ho maata-ho wakawawia, “Nkyili muipfunguo ihache lyi lya nzoi?”
41011006	Wa kiloshionyi wakawawia, chando Yesu awehambye. Nawo wakawalekya.
41011007	Wakaende ihache lyo lya nzoi na ko Yesu wakalihekya nguwo tsawo tsa huye, nao Yesu kadamya-ho.
41011008	Wandu Wafoi wakaala nguwo tsawo tsa huye ipfo njienyi, wengi wakaala-ho masahawa, walehamanya ipfo mademenyi.
41011009	Na walya wamsongoe na walya waituma numa wakafunja ngahai wechihamba, “Ruwa naichiko!” “Nawone ona ichu mocha ku rina lya Mndumii!
41011010	Kuwewona ona na wumangi wo ndee yadu Dawidi, ili wuicha! Ruwa naṟumisho kulya huye ruwehu!”
41011011	Nao Yesu kaida na mṟinyi fo Yerusalemu kahenda ipfo hekalunyi kaambuya-pfo Woṟisa orio kindo. Kyaindi kipfa kuwemeila kahenda Betanyia arianyi na walya ikumi na wawi.
41011012	Kyasia ili lya ngama wekiwuka ipfo Betanyia, Yesu kaicho njaa.
41011013	Kawona mkuyu ai aleshe, fuwode mambale hafoi. Kacha, kye kulako kyechiwona-pfo ndunda; Amcha afui alawone-pfo manya ndunda shila mambale tupu. Kipfa kulawei kiheri kya ndunda tsa mkuyu.
41011014	Kahalwo kafuwia, “Kuipfo mndu echilya-se ndunda tsapfo manya indiipfo.” Wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakaicho madedoho ha Yesu.
41011015	Naho wakacha na Yerusalemu. Yesu amida na ipfo hekalunyi, kawoka ifunyia nja walya wekumba na wehuṟa wai ipfo hekalunyi kapfuluo na shitaṟa sha weilacha pesa na shidi shedamya sha wekumba mbeta.
41011016	Nalade ma mndu, naduo kindo awuka ipfo hekalunyi.
41011017	Kalosha kawawia, “Ki kiṟehye, kye mba yako nyi yeterewia kipfa kya wandu wa mbaṟi tose. Nanyo mkawuya iihaluo opanga lo wandu wasoki.”
41011018	Wakohanyi wanene wakaiicho iki na walosha wa wuwawaso wakakusaṟa, chando wechimdetsa. Indi walemwowuo, kipfa kituṟu kya wandu kyose kileṟihio kya mloshye fokye.
41011019	Nahong'u komeila, Yesu na wa kiloshionyi wakawuka kulya mṟinyi.
41011020	Kyasia wekiida-ho ngamenyi, otuko, wakawona mkuyu fulya fomeuma fose tane mrinyi.
41011021	Petro kakumbuo kawia Yesu, “Mlosha, ambuya! Mkuyu fulya kulefusesa fomeuma.”
41011022	Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Idikienyi Ruwa.
41011023	Nyi kya lohi ngambia, kye mndu kawia ifumvu li, kyekuṟuka, ukukumbe kulya ipalipalinyi, alawado nyi mkeukeu ipfo ngoonyi yakye, kyaindi kaidikya kilya ahamba na kyewutika, na echiwona kyechiwa.
41011024	Nahong'u ngambia, orio shindo shose mochiterewa na yomba, keidikyenyi, ke momambya, na mochishiinengo.
41011025	Na ili mohoṟoka iterewa, kehoṟyenyi orio mndu, koka muwode kindo na mndu, kundu na Nde yanu o ipfo ruewehu namhoṟye madeko hanu. [
41011026	Indi nyo mkada mulahoṟya wengi na Ndeyanu o ipfo ruwehu echimhoṟya ma madeko hanupfo.]”
41011027	Wakacha-se na Yerusalemu. Yesu Kechichumya ipfo hekalunyi, wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso na wasongoru wa wandu wakamchea.
41011028	Wakammbesa, “A pfinya owuta nayo shindo sho nyi ida? Na ichu akuinengye pfinya yo, kundu nowute isho nyi u?”
41011029	Nao Yesu kawawia, “Njimuwesa kidedo kyimu; mkanjihaluo na njechimbia, pfinya ii ngawuta nayo shindo shi nyiida.
41011030	Pfinya ya Yohane Mpatisi yepatisa iwewukye ruwehu ngesa ang'u nyi ko wandu? Kenjihaluonyi.”
41011031	Wakawesana wo wenyi na wenyi wehamba, “Lukahamba, nyi ruwehu, nyi echihamba, nyi kilewa-ng'u kida, ili mlalemwidikia?
41011032	Lukahamba, nyi ko wandu?” (Nyi waweowoe kituṟu kilya kya wandu; kipfa wose waleidikia kye Yohane awei mwikimbi o lohi.)
41011033	Wakahaluo Yesu wehamba, “Luichipfo.” Nao Yesu kawawia, “Ma inyi njembia pfinya ngawuta nayo shindo sho kye nyi ya wupfo.”
41012001	Yesu kawoka ideda nawo kui mfanano, “Mndu aledonga dema lya msabibu kaliiṟihya na oṟiho kasumya-ho ipo lyekamya-ho mpfinyo, kawika-pfo kitaanga kyeringya kidoe huye. Kalinengya wademi, kahenda kyaṟonyi kya kuleshe.
41012002	Na kiheri kya kilimu kadumya wademi walya isinga lyake kya mashido ha dema lyilya.
41012003	Wademi walya wakambada wakamkapa wakamsama alarie kindo.
41012004	Kawuya iwadumya isinga lingi, ichu nao wakamkapa oo mdo na iminyala.
41012005	Menyi Dema kaduma ungi; nao wakambaha. Na wengi wafoi wengise waledumo, walya maata wakawakapa, walya mata wakawawaha.
41012006	Awewode-se manoke kimumu amkundi. Kafurumya mduma o kowo kechihamba, nyio manako wechimwowuo.
41012007	Kyaindi wademi walya wakawiana, Ichu nyio mwoṟi mooṟa-ho; lanye lumbahe, na kyoṟa kyo kyechiwa kyadu!”
41012008	Wakambada wakambaha wakamkumbalya kulya nja ya dema lya msabibu.
41012009	A menyi ulya o dema lya msabibu kindo echiwuta nyi kiki? Echicha narumatse wademi walya, na dema lilya lya msabibu nalinengye wandu wengi.
41012010	Ngesa mlawemesome shiṟehyo shi? “Iho lilya wewika mba waliminye nyi lyambuya iwa iho linene lya ndumbenyi?
41012011	Mndumii nyio alewuta mbonyitsi, nyi tsa kiṟiha kunu mesonyi hadu.”
41012012	Wakohanyi wanene, walosha wa mawawaso na wameku wakamanya kye mfanano-fu fowahoya. Wakaruwa kyama kyembada, indi wakaowuo kituṟu kilya kya wandu wakamda wakakuhendya kowo.
41012013	Wakaduma kokye Wafarisayo na wa ko Herode maata ko Yesu kundu wamdehe na idedo lyake.
41012014	Wakacha wakambia, “Mlosha na luichi, kye iyo nyi ui mhendeli, mohamba sha lohi tupu, ma okesaṟa mndupfo. Nyi kipfa kulekeambuya fana ya mndu, ke nyi ida, kyaindi kowalosha njia ya Ruwa na ii ya lohi, Ngesa kisumhanyi iwikya Kaisari okamba ang'u ote? A ngesa lukawika ang'u lukada lulawika?”
41012015	Nao Yesu kyekimanya ukulembetseṟi wowo kawawia, “Nyi kiili mocha njiseenga? Njiendye-nyi dinari, kundu njiiwone.”
41012016	Wakaende. Nao kawawia, “A mfano fu fukeri-pfo nyi fo u na kiṟehyo ki?” Wakambia, “Nyi sha Kaisari.”
41012017	Yesu kawawia, “Keinengyenyi Kaisari ishi shii sha Kaisari muweinengya Ruwa ishi shii sha Ruwa.” Wakiṟihio mnu kyake.
41012018	Kyasia Wasadukayo wakacha na ko Yesu, wai wandu wehamba, ke nyi kulaipfo iṟuka, wakambesa wehamba,
41012019	“Mlosha, Mose nyi aluṟehye kye, ‘Mndu kapfa kada mka, alade mana, manomae kimbaṟi naduo mka chu mkusu, nawonye manomae ulya apfie luwa.
41012020	Kyasia kuwekeri wana wa mka mfungade; ulya o kuwoka kaduo mka, kapfa, nalade mana.’
41012021	Na ulya o kawi kamduo mka ulya mkusu kawepfa, alafee mana. Na ulya kaṟaṟu na wudo.
41012022	Nawo woose mfungade wakapfa walafee wana. Lyefurumia mka ulya mkusu kapfa.
41012023	Ili kochishika iya maṟukyenyi mka-chu, nyi echiwa o u ipfo kiidi kyawo? Kifa woose mfungade wawemwalikie?”
41012024	Yesu kawawia, “Modeko, mnu cha kipfa mlaichi Madedo ho Maele ma pfinya ya Ruwa.
41012025	Kipfa ili wapfu weṟuka wapfunyi, wechialikapfo manya yalikopfo, kyaindi wechiwa cha wamalaika wa ipfo ruwehu.
41012026	Kyaindi kya maṟukyenyi ha iwo wapfiiye a nyi mulasomie kyawo ipfo kitabunyi kya Mose ipfo ko osha lulya luweiaka modo? Ruwa kawia Mose, ‘Inyi nyio Ruwa o Abrahamu na Ruwa o Isaki na Ruwa o Yakobo?’
41012027	Ruwa chi akeri o wapfupfo, chila na o iwo wai na moo. Nyo modeko mnu.”
41012028	Naho umu o walosha wa wuwawaso kasembelia kufui nawo kaadanya, chando waiwesana. Kekiwona Yesu awahalwo necha, kambesa, “A iwawaso inene liidye hose nyi lihya?”
41012029	Yesu kahalwo kye, “Lilya inene nyi ili, Israeli keadanya, Mndumii Ruwa chu odu nyi akeri Mndumii umu amonyi.
41012030	Kunda Mndumii Ruwa opfo na ngoo yapfo yose, na mrima fopfo fose, na mahio hapfo hose, na pfinya yapfo yose.”
41012031	Lilya lya kawi nyi ili, “Kunda mndu o mṟasa opfo, chando okukundi kumony. Kuwode iwawaso lingi liidye ihapfo.”
41012032	Mlosha ulya o wuwawaso kambia, “Na necha, mlosha, nodeda kya sungusihu, ke Ruwa nyi umu, kulakeri ungi shila nyio.
41012033	Na kiwaṟi imkunda Ruwa na ngoo yose, na wuṟango wose, na pfinya yose, na ikunda mndu o mṟasa, opfo chando ukukundi kumonyi. Ikyo ki kicha na kamu kiidye shidaso shilya shekoṟo na shilya shingi shose shemaya modonyi.”
41012034	Nao Yesu kyekiwona kye mndu ulya nahaluo kui wuṟango, kambia, “Ukeri kuleshe na wumangi wo Ruwapfo.” Nahong'u kulakae ma mndu alekarya-se imbesa kindo.
41012035	Yesu kechilosha ipfo Hekalunyi kawesa, “A nyi wuda, ili walosha wa Wuwawaso wahamba, kye Kristo nyi akeri mana o Dawidi?
41012036	O Dawidi amonyi kahamba awodo nyi Mumuyo Mwele, ‘Mndumii alewia Mndumii oko, Kedamya kunu ora loko lo kulyo, na inyi njitane ngawika wakituwa wapfo wawe shi ya madende hapfo.’
41012037	Dawidi amonyi nyi amlahye, ‘Kristo nyi Mndumii,’ nyi wuda Kristo ai mana okye?” Na kituṟu kilya kya wandu kinganyi kikamadanya na sia.
41012038	Naho ipfo kiloshyonyi kyake Yesu kahamba, “Kekuṟisenyi na walosha wa wuwawaso, sa wakundi ichumia waṟee ikonya lya mkuruo na iiṟikiṟo ipfo tumo, wakundi iidaida na idamya shidembo sha kusonguo ipfo masinagogenyi.
41012039	Na handu hedamya ha kusonguo, ili wa walahye shelya.
41012040	Nyiwo wekelya mba ko waka wakusu na imaa, wechiterewa kui madedo hafoi kui ikulembetseṟa. Iwo nyiwo wechikaa wawonyo owingo lung'anyi kya ngoseṟa mkonu fulya fo mwanduye.”
41012041	Yesu Kadamya sumhana na kisoṟo kesanya mapesa. Kaambuya chando wandu wafoi waiwika mapesa ipfo kisoṟonyi. Kya Hekalunyi Wasuṟi wafoi wakawika-pfo pesa tsifoi.
41012042	Kukacha mka umu mkusu, ai mkiwa, kawikapfo senti tsiwi tsashika heleri tsitanu.
41012043	Yesu kalaha wa kiloshyonyi kyake kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, kye mka chu mkiwa na mkusu ambika shifoi kota wose wawika ipfo kisoṟonyi.
41012044	Kyamba wose wawikye kya shilya shiwatsuhae, kyaindi mka-chu kaende sha wukiwa wokye kalekia shilya awode shose, nyi shake shose shetolia moo.”
41013001	Yesu kechiwuka ipfo hekalunyi, umu o wa kiloshyonyi kyake kambia, “Mlosha, ambuya maho ho ha mba tso chando hai ha kiṟiha!”
41013002	Nao Yesu kambia, “Kuwonyi mba tso tsing'anyi? Manya kokaa kudeo-ho iho likuhekye huya iho lingi lide lilawundwohopfo.”
41013003	Yesu adamie ipfo fumvu-hu lya shidi sha Mtsinepfu ai sumhana na Hekalu, Petro, Yakobo, Yohane na Andrea wakambesa kyanya,
41013004	“Keluwie-wo, mbonyi tso nyi tsekaa tsiwe indii? Na kiṟingishyo, ki kii kechiloṟo ili isho shose shichikaa shiwe?”
41013005	Nao Yesu kawoka iwawia, “Kyekuṟisenyi, mlawone mndu kyemlemba.
41013006	Koekaa kuche sa wafoi, wache kui rina lyako, wahambe, kye, ‘Inyi nyio!’ Wadetse wandu wafoi.
41013007	Mkaicho shida na mbonyi tsa shida, mlakangaṟike. Mbonyi-tso kiwaṟi tsiche, kyaindi masiyonyi hamecha-pfo.
41013008	Kipfa mkambo fumu fochikapana na mkambo fungi, umangi wukapane na umangi wungi. Orio handu kochicha shiding'ashi na njaa. Mbonyi-tso nyi cha okooṟa lo mana aifeo.”
41013009	“Na mkuṟise muwenyi. Wandu wechimdambika mengenyi ya Synedrion na mochikapo ipfo ma sinagogenyi. Mochidao oshangunyi lo wachili na wamangi, kipfa kyako, kundu munjiṟingishie kowo.
41013010	Indi kiwaṟi kuwoka Mbonyi tsa Sia tsiongoyo mbaṟinyi tsa wandu tsose.
41013011	Nawo ili wechimduo wemdambike, mlawado makusaṟo chando mochideda, kyaindi nyi mochinengo kededa kiheri kyo kikamshika nyikyo mochihamba-ho, cha kipfa wededa-ho chi nyopfo nyi Mumuyo Mwele.
41013012	Manomae o mndu nechitwaṟa mana o mae, na wana wa wandu waamkye wafee wawo na iwawaha.
41013013	Nanyo muwenyi mochisuika ko wandu wose kipfa kya rina lyako. Kyaindi ichu mokarishya-ho tane masiyonyi, nyio echikiṟo.”
41013014	“Mochiwona ‘Kiwi kya Orumatso’ kii alyando kilakundikie iwono.” (Ichu Mosoma namanye mdambuye!) “Nalyo iwo wai kunu Yudaya wahende dichya kulya mafumvuhu.
41013015	Na ichu echikoya ai ipfo mbehu, nalasoke-pfo, ma nalaide na mba kokye kye ikuondoya-ho kindo.
41013016	Na ichu ekoya ai demenyi nalawuye na numa, ihenda kuondoya nguwo tsake tsa huye.
41013017	Ochia lo iwo wekoya nyi wakupfungye na iwo wekoya weonza mafiri ho!
41013018	Keterewenyi, kundu mbonyi tso tsilawutike kiheri kya mbeo.
41013019	Nyi kipfa mfiri yo kochikaapfo wukiwa wung'anyi sa wulalemewoneke kiwokya mawokyenyi ha shindo sho shi shiwumbe nyi Ruwa shika mandi ha wulalu. Ma ili numa wochikiwoneka-se wudopfo.
41013020	Na mafiri ho nokoe Mndumii alawechihaanguṟa, kuwechikiṟo mndu ma umu-pfo. Kyaindi nyi kipfa kya walya wa wasambuṟe, nyi kyondo Mndumii aleanguṟa mfiri-yo.”
41013021	“Nalyo mkakoya ma mndu kembia, ‘Kristo aichu kunu,’ ang'u, ‘a ulya alya.’ Nanyo ma mlaidikye.
41013022	Kipfa kochikure-pfo Wakristo wa wongo na waikimbi wa wongo na iwuta mawuto ha kiṟingishyo na ha kiṟiha, kundu watewe na walya Ruwa awasamburie, nokoe nyi kiwechiwa.
41013023	Kyaindi nyo mkuṟise! Ngamsonguo imbia shose, ili shilamehoya.”
41013024	“Nahong'u mafiri ho, kombona wukiwa wo womeida na mnengeṟi fochihaluka meema na meeri fochiloṟa ngela yafopfo.
41013025	Na nyenyeri tsechiwa molokya tsiwuke ipfo ruwehu, na pfinya tsa ipfo ruwehu tsechisingitsosingitso.
41013026	Mandi nalyo wawone Manomndu kechicha ipfo mapuchinyi ai na pfinya ing'anyi na wuitoṟi.
41013027	Na numa echiduma wamalaika wake; na isanya walya wasambuṟe wewuka njora tsiina tsa oruka, kuwokya kishingonyi kya oruka tane kishingo kya ruwehu.”
41013028	“Kuloshienyi mkuyunyi muwute-ho mfanano fu, Mkamkoya oṟuwe lofo luuwiriwiri lukadosa mambale, mkawuta-ho imanya nyi ipaṟika-ng'u kui.
41013029	Nanyo na wudo, mkamewona isho shechiwutika, mumanye, kye Mana o Mndu nyi amshika kufui.
41013030	Na kya lohi ngambia, kye mbaṟi i ya wandu ikeri-ho, yechisia manyale-pfo, na kutane isho shose shawutika.
41013031	Kulya ruwehu kukakye kunyamaṟike na kunu orukyenyi, kyaindi madedo hako hechinyamaṟika manyale-pfo.”
41013032	“Kyaindi mfiri fo na saa iyo kuipfo mndu aichi mbonyi tsashopfo, ma wasu wa ipfo ruwehu manya o Mana, shile na Wande.
41013033	Ambuyenyi muwekuṟisa na ilaa dembo kipfa mulaichi, indi kiheri kyo kyecha.
41013034	Nyi cha ili mndu ahenda kyaṟo kuleshe kada mba yake kadambikya shisinga shake ipfo kanyi orio mndu na iṟunda lyake, kawawasa ulya moikalya mongo kye nalae dembo.
41013035	Nahong'u mlae dembo kipfa mlaichi kiheri menyi mba echicha, kokoya nyi kyukany ang'u kio makidi hawi, ang'u kiheri kya aheṟa, ang'u ngamenyi otuko.
41013036	Laenyi dembo ili echicha peṟeseng'u nalakoye mui madonyi.
41013037	Kyaindi kindo ngambia nyo, ngawia wose, laenyi dembo!”
41014001	Kuwetsuheṟe mfiri iwi kushike mfiri fo Pasaka na fo Mkate Ilantarang'ashe. Wakohanyi wanene wasanganyi na walosha wa wuwawaso wakapfula, chando wechimbada na mtambo, wambahe.
41014002	Indi walehamba, “Lulambade mfiri fu mnenepfo kuwone kochiduka kituṟu kya wandu.”
41014003	Kyasia Yesu nawekeri kulya Betanyia mba ko Simon ulya awewodo nyi iwawe. Adamye-ho kechilya shelya, kukacha mndu mka, umu arie chupa ya alabastron iwode mafuda hapfama ha nardo mecha ha wuhuru wung'anyi, kampusuya o mdonyi ko Yesu.
41014004	Na kukakaa-ho wandu mata, walesuo wechikuwesa, “A mafuda ho hadetsyo hado wanda nyi ha ki?
41014005	Hakawekumbo haweende dinari mahana haṟaṟu tseenenga wakiwa.” Wakafuluko wakapomya mka ulya.
41014006	Kyaindi Yesu kawawia, “Kemlekenyi, nkyi ili muiwinyishawinyisha mka chu? Nyi kindo kicha anjiwutya.
41014007	Kipfa wandu wakiwa mui nawo mfiri yose, mkakunda na moidima iwawutya necha, kyaindi kyako inyi mokaa na inyi mfiri yosepfo.
41014008	Nyi awuta, chando akuidimya; nyi asonguo ishimbwo mbihu foko ifuṟeheṟa fuhende iṟiko.
41014009	Na kya lohi ngambia, Orio kundu kose komeongoyo Mbonyi tso Njiicha wuyaneny kose, na kyake anjiwutye napfondo kyehambo, kundu nakumbuo-pfo.”
41014010	Nao Yuda Iskariote ai umu o, walya ikumi na wawi kahenda ko wakohanyi wanene, kundo nadambike Yesu ipfo kowo.
41014011	Wakohanyi wanene wekiicho wado wakachihio, wakamteṟya kyemenenga fesa. Yuda kawoka ipfula mfiri mcha fomdambika.
41014012	Mfiri fo kuwoka fo mfiri iya yelya Mkate Ilantarang'ashe, kiheri kyeshinja huṟuwi lya Pasaka, wa kiloshyo kyake wakambesa, “Nyi ku ukundi luhende isungusia-ho, lukulie-ho Pasaka?”
41014013	Yesu kaduma wa kiloshyonyi kyake wawi kawawia, “Kehendenyi ipfo mṟinyi na mokumbuhanana na mndu umu akudikye kinungu kya mṟinga muitumane nao.
41014014	Na mba mochiwona aida-napfo muwie menyi mba, kye Mlosha akuwia wai, ‘Nyi kiṟiha kihya lochikulia-pfo Pasaka so na wa kiloshyonyi kyako?’
41014015	Nao echimloṟa kiṟiha king'anyi kya ipfo kai ki kyale nguwo ki kisungusie nyihondo mochilusungusia.”
41014016	Wa kiloshyonyi wakakure wakahenda kulya mṟinyi, wakawona chando Yesu alewawia, wakasungusia mfuho fo Pasaka.
41014017	Ili kyukanyi, Yesu kacha na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye walya ikumi na wawi.
41014018	Wai kiliiyonyi Yesu kahamba, “Na kya lohi ngambia, umu onu-ho, ailya na inyi, echinjidambika.”
41014019	Wa kiloshionyi kyakye wakawoka isokyo nyi fowa na imbesa umu kui umu, “Ngesa nyi inyi?”
41014020	Yesu kawawia, “Nyi umu onu nyo ikumi na wawi sa luikapa nao mkate kunu kitelenyi.
41014021	Nyi lohi Manomndu ihenda nyi ahenda, chando Madedo Maele hamaṟehie kyakye, kyaindi ochia lo mndu ulya, echidambika Manachu o Mndu! Kiwei kicha, okoe mnduchu alalefeo.”
41014022	Na ili wawelya shelya, Yesu kaira-ho mkate kaidapfuma Ruwa kafufunja, kawainengya wa kiloshionyi kyakye kahamba, “Ngenyi ifu nyi mbihu foko.”
41014023	Kawewada na kirahu kaana Ruwa kawainengya, wakanyoya-ho kirau kilya wose.
41014024	Kawawia, “Ikyi nyi samu yako iṟingishia mkundano fo Ruwa; samu ikeri ipusuo kipfa kya wandu wafoi.
41014025	Nyi kya lohi ngambia, ‘Njechikinyo-se kya ndunda tsa msabibusepfo, na njitane ngashika mfiri fulya, ilindi njechinyoyaho wuhya ipfo Wumanginyi wo Ruwa.’ ”
41014026	Wameimba, wakahenda kulya Fumvunyi lya shidi sha Mtsinepfu.
41014027	Yesu kawia wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Mochiendyo wusutsu nyi inyi mose, kipfa ki kiṟehye kirehio kiele, ‘Njechikapa mlisi na machondi hawerahanyika.’
41014028	Kyaindi ngamidima iṟuka, njechimsongoya, kulya Galilaya.”
41014029	Petro kambia, “Ma kokoya wose waendyo wusutsu na ilekana na iyo, inyi njechilekana na iyo ma ntapfo.”
41014030	Yesu kambia, “Nyi kya lohi ngakuwia, inu kio ki, olong'onyi lulamekapa kawi ochinjikana kaṟaṟu.”
41014031	Petro kaengeṟa ihamba, “Kiti njikukane na njipfe njisanzeo na iyo njechikuda-pfo.” Na wa kiloshionyi wakahamba wado wose.
41014032	Wakashika kyungunyi kii kiiṟihye kilaho Getisemane, Yesu kawia wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Kedamyenyi iya, ili njikeri iterewa.”
41014033	Nao kahenda arianyi na Petro na Yakobo na Yohane, kawoka iwuko mnu nyi madima na ieṟewe.
41014034	Kawawia, “Mrima foko fuwodo mnu nyi fowa, ngakiṟa ipfa. Kyekaenyi ya muwelaa dembo.”
41014035	Katikira mbele kitutu kaho wanda katerewa, kokoya na kyechikuwiia saa yo ya maturo imwidye.
41014036	Kahamba, “Wande oko, ipfo kopfo shindo shoose shechiidimika. Njiwutawo kirahu ki kya maturo Indi kilawe chando njikundi inyi kiwe chando iyo ukundi.”
41014037	Kacha kakoya wa kiloshionyi walya waṟaṟu walee mado. Kawia Petro, “Simon, nyi ulee mado? Oidima ilaa dembo ma saa imu?”
41014038	Kawawawia, “Kelaenyi dembo mbeterewa, mlashike iida kiheshonyi. Ngoo yo yako nyi injiṟamtsu, kyaindi nyama tsikalehela.”
41014039	Kawuya ihendase katerewa kechihamba madedo halya halya.
41014040	Kawuya kakoya walee-se mado; kipfa meso hawo hai malemie mado. Walamanye kindo wemhaluo.
41014041	Ili alewachea lya kaṟaṟu alewawia, “Nyi molaa mado na isia moo? Nahongu kyakushikya-ng'u, saa yamshika! Ambuya, Manomndu, aidambiko mawokonyi ha wanyamaṟi.
41014042	Kurenyi luhende, Ambuyenyi monjidambika a ichu aicha.”
41014043	Yesu kekideda-se ado, nalyo liyenyi Yuda Iskariote nyio umu o walya ikumi na wawi, kacha arianyi na kituṟu kya wandu, warie njoshu na shiṟeta, wai wadume nyi wakohanyi wanene na walosha wa wuwawaso na wasongoru.
41014044	Na Yuda mṟiingi ulya momdambika awewateṟye kichano, kyehamba, “Ichu, njechimhekya momu nyio-ng'u; mumbade na imduo kiringonyi.”
41014045	Adi Yuda kacha katikirya kufui na Yesu kambia, “Mlosha!” Kamhekia momu.
41014046	Wandu walya wakamleshya mawoko wakawada Yesu.
41014047	Umu o walya wahoṟoki-ho na Yesu, kasomuo oshu lokye kakapa isinga lya mkohanyi mnene kamdumbuo kudu.
41014048	Yesu kawawia, “Mowuka kanyi murie njoshu na shiṟeta mkacha injiwada, cha ili njii msoki?
41014049	Orio mkonu njiwekeri konu ipfo hekalunyi njichilosha-ho, mlanjiwade. Wulalu kiwaṟi Shiṟehiyo Shiele shiinukye.”
41014050	Nahong'u wa kiloshionyi wakamda wakadicha wose.
41014051	Kuwekeri-ho manake amwituma Yesu aṟee nguwo ya owiṟo alaṟee nguwo ya kya mmba. Wakaheṟia imbada.
41014052	Nao kasheṟuka kada-ho nguwo yo ya owiṟo kadicha ai kitaṟe.
41014053	Kyasia wakaduo Yesu kulya ko Mkohanyi Mnene, handu wakohanyi wanene na wasongoru na walosha wa wuwawaso wose wawesanzie.
41014054	Petro kaitumana na Yesu, ai kuleshe, katana ashika alya osehu ko Mkohanyi ulya mnene kadamia-ho handu hamu na waringi kechioda modo.
41014055	Nawo wakohanyi wanene na menge ya Sinedrio wose wakashihia Yesu owingo lo mbaha, walawone.
41014056	Wandu wafoi wawekeri ihamba-ho njowingo tsa Yesu tsa wongo njowingo tsilya tsilasumhanane.
41014057	Kukakure-pfo wandu wehamba owingo loke lo wongo wechihamba,
41014058	“Luleicho kechihamba, ‘Njechisanja hekalu lyo li liwike na mawoko ha wandu njiwike lingi ko mfiri iṟaṟu lilaliwike na mawoko.’ ”
41014059	Ma ili walehamba-ho wado ma shilasumhane shoose.
41014060	Naho Mkohanyi Mnene kahoṟoka o makidi hawi kawesa Yesu, “A nyi kiili kulahamba ma shehaluo ishi sha wandu wa wahamba-ho shekuwinga?”
41014061	Nao kakutsia sau, nalahaluo ma kindo. Mkohanyi Mnene kawuya imbesa-se kambia, “Iyo na ukeri Kristo, Mana o Ruwa ichu aidapfumo?”
41014062	Yesu kahamba, “Ee da inyi nyio. Nanyo mochiwona Manomndu adamye ipfo ora lo kulyo lo Menyi Pfinya, kechicha ipfo mapuchinyi ha ruwehu.”
41014063	Mkohanyi Mnene karanduo kanzi yake kahamba, “Nyi kiki-se luipfula wehamba-ho shewinga?
41014064	Na momicho kirumo kyake kyeruma Ruwa. Mokusaṟa muda?” Wakamkumbya owingo wose, kindo kimsumhanyi na opfu.
41014065	Kyasia maata ho wakawoka imiselya mnyeri wakamshikia kyamu wakamkapa ngofi wachimbia, “Kehamba malasha nyiu akukapa!” Na walya wapfuṟukanyi-ho wakamwambya, wechimkapa ngofi.
41014066	Nahong'u Petro akeri-ho o seri osehu, kukacha mana o waka, akeri umu o shisinga sha Mkohanyi Mnene.
41014067	Kawona Petro, kechioda modo, kamwambuya kambia, “Na iyo na kuwekeri na mndu cho Yesu o kulya Nasareti.”
41014068	Nao Petro kakana, kechihamba, “Ma ngamemanya-pfo, ma njiichi kindo ohambapfo.” Petro kawuka-pfo, kahenda nja ya mbele. Olong'onyi lukakapa.
41014069	Mana ulya o waka kisinga kawona-se Petro; kawoka-se lingi iwia walya wahoṟoki-ho, “Mndu-chu nyi umu o walya.”
41014070	Petro kawuya ikana-se. Oweṟe kitutu walya wahoṟoki-ho wakawia Petro, “Nyi kya lohi ukeri umu o walya, kipfa ui Mgalilaya.”
41014071	Nao Petro kawoka ikusesa na ilya nyamu ke, “Njiichi mndu chu mumhambapfo.”
41014072	Nalyo lienyi olong'onyi lukakapa lya kawi. Petro kakumbuo idedo lilya, chando Yesu ambie, ke olongonyi lulamekapa kawi, ochinjikana kaṟaṟu. Petro katamuo-ho kalia mchenyeṟe.
41015001	Kyasia ngamenyi kilawo wakohanyi wanene wakaruwa kyama hando hamu na wasongoru na walosha wa wuwawaso na walya wa menge Sinedrio wose wakapfunga Yesu na shiwoho wakamduo wakamdambikya Pilato.
41015002	Na Pilato kawesa Yesu “Iyo nyi Mangi ya Wayuda?” Nao kamhaluo kahamba, “Na ikyo ohamba.”
41015003	Wakohanyi wanene wakamkumbya Yesu na shifoi.
41015004	Pilato kawesase Yesu, “Ohaluo-ho idedo? Ambuya, chandu waihamba shindo shifoi wakukumba nasho.”
41015005	Kyaindi Yesu nalamhaluo-se ma kindo, Pilato kaṟihio.
41015006	Kyasia orio mfiri mnene fo Pasaka Pilato nawekewapfunguya umu o walya wa wapfunge ulya wamemterewa.
41015007	Kyasia kuwekeri-pfo umu elaho nyi Baraba, ampfunge handu hamu na walya waṟiingya wanene wawo, sa wawahie mndu ipfo wuṟinginy wowo.
41015008	Kituṟu kya wandu kikahenda ko Pilato wakawooka imterewa nawawutye chandu ekewawutya lingi.
41015009	Pilato kawawesa “Mokunda, njimpfunguye Mangi ya Wayuda?”
41015010	Kipfa nyi aweichi, na pata kye wakohanyi wanene wamdambikye Yesu kokye kipfa kya wunenyi.
41015011	Wakohanyi wanene wakatsutsuma wandu, kundu wakunde Pilato nawapfunguye Baraba.
41015012	Nao Pilato kawawesa-se, “A kindo mokunda, njiwutye ichu momhamba, nyi ai Mangi ya Wayuda, nyi kiki?”
41015013	Wakawuya ifahya, “Umbambye msalabehu!”
41015014	Pilato kawawia, Kitewe nkiki? “A kindo kiwicho alekiwuta nyi kiki?” Wakaengeṟa ifahya, “Mbambye msalabehu!”
41015015	Pilato kyekikunda ichihiṟa kituṟu kilya kya wandu kawapfunguya Baraba. Kawuta Yesu, nakapo na ngowa itso tsinjitochie msha, kamdambika nawambyo msalabehu.
41015016	Kyasia waskari wakawuta-ho Yesu wakamduo ipfo osehu, lo Praitorion, wakalaha naho siṟi ya waskari yose.
41015017	Wakamṟika nguwo ya king'aring'ari wakaoka oṟo ya msha wakamhekya mdonyi.
41015018	Wakawoka imiṟikiṟa, “Lokwiṟikiṟa iyo Mangi ya Wayuda!”
41015019	Wakamkapa mdo na iṟeṟe wakamiselya mnyeri wakampfiria ndi wakamolokya ndenyi.
41015020	Nahong'u wamemtaluo, wakambuta nguwo iya ya king'aring'ari wakamṟika nguwo tsake amonyi. Wakamduo, kundu wambambye msalabehu.
41015021	Wai njienyi wechihenda, wakaitikia mndu aida-ho, elaho Simon o Kirene, awuka demenyi. Nyio ndeye o Aleksandria na Rufo, wakamwitikya nakudike msalaba fulya fo Yesu.
41015022	Wakaduo Yesu handu halaho nyi Goligota, ikyo kikahaluo nyi “Handu ha Mbuonyi.”
41015023	Wakamwinenga mvinyo fu mlonge-longe na manemane, nalaambye.
41015024	Wakambambya msalabehu; wakahawana nguwo tsilya tsake, wechiwika kuṟu kuhya kyatso, chando wechitsiduo.
41015025	Nyi kuwei ngamenyi saa tsiṟaṟu, ili walembambya msalabenyi.
41015026	Na kiṟehyo kya owingo loke nyi kiṟehye-ho kye “Nyi Mangi ya Wayuda.”
41015027	Naho kuwei-ho weala njia wawi wakawawambya msalabehu handu hamu nao, ulya umu kakaa ora lokye lo kulyo na ungi kakaa ora lokye lo kumoso. [
41015028	Kukaawutsyo-ho kilya Maṟehyo Maele hahambie “Aii msanzie kambenyi lyimu na wanyamaṟi.”]
41015029	Na walya, waida-ho, wakamruma wesingitsasingitsa mdo yawo na ihamba, “Iyo kui mosanja hekalu koliwika lya kawi mfiri iṟaṟu, likawa.
41015030	Kyekukiṟe-ng'u kumonyi, ochisoka ipfo msalabehu!”
41015031	Na wakohanyi wanene na wudo wakawemtaluo hamu na walosha wa wuwawaso wehamba, “Nalekiṟa wengi indi nalaidime ikukiṟa o amonyi.
41015032	Kye wai ai Kristo, ichu Mangi ya Israeli, Nasokye-ng'u o msalabehu wulalu kundu lochiwona na idikya.” Na walya wawawambye msalabehu handu hamu nao wakawemmina.
41015033	Wokya saa ya kaṟandaṟu mfiri, kukaho meema kulya orukenyi kose itane foshika saa kenda.
41015034	Na kiheri kya saa kenda mfiri Yesu kakoṟoṟoma ilaha na ṟu ling'anyi, “Eli, Eli, lama sabakitanyi?” Ikyo kohaluo, Ruwa oko, “Ruwa oko, nyi kili omenjida?”
41015035	Walya maata wahoṟoki-ho wakaicho wakahamba, “Ambuya nyi alaha Elia.”
41015036	Nahong'u ulya umu-ho kahenda, kedicha, kaichuṟa ipfupfu mṟinga fotarang'a kawika iwalehu kamrutsa nalyo, kechihamba, “Lekyenyi luambuye, kokoya Elia kechicha imsotsa o msalabenyi.”
41015037	Nao Yesu kakoṟoṟoma na ṟu ling'anyi, kanenuka.
41015038	Nahong'u isulia lilya lyeshingya ipfo hekalunyi likaranduka njora tsiwi, likawokya huye likashika tsindenyi.
41015039	Mnene ulya o waskari awehoṟoki-ho sumhana nao, kekiwona chandu Yesu ailia kechinenuka ado, kahamba, “Na lohi mndu chu nyi awei Mana o Ruwa.”
41015040	Kuwekeri-pfo na waka waweambuya wakeri kuleshe, na Maria o kulya Magidala; Salome, na Maria, mae o Yakobo ulya mtutu na o Yose hondo wawei.
41015041	Sa wawei itumana na Yesu na impfuṟukanya, kiheri awei kulya Galilaya, na wengi wafoi, sa wadoe na Yerusalemu warianyi nao.
41015042	Nalyo komshika kyukanyi ili kuwei mfiri foṟeheṟa nyi mfiri fusongoe Sabato.
41015043	Kukacha naho Yosefu o kulya Arimatia, nyi mndu o mmenge ang'anyi. Nao kawewa mndu aweiwedia Wumangi wo Ruwa, kakarya Kahenda ko Pilato alawodo nyi wuowu katerewaho nainengo mbihu fo Yesu.
41015044	Pilato kaṟihyo, amiicho kye Yesu amepfa, Kakulahya mnene ulya o waskari kambesa, koka Yesu awempfa kiheri kileshe.
41015045	Pilato amewio nyi mnene ulya o waskari kye Yesu amepfa, kaenengya Yosefu momu naireho mnying'a fulya.
41015046	Nao Yosefu ahuṟye nguwo tsa owiṟo, kasotsia wanda mbihu fulya kamoṟowya nguwonyi tsilya tsa owiṟo Kambika opangenyi loṟika mpfu, lulya lu utorongoche kulya ihonyi, kapiṟinyitsiaho iho oo momu fo opanga lulya.
41015047	Nao Maria o Magidala na Maria (mae) o Yose waleambuya handu alaṟo.
41016001	Kyasia mfiri fo sabato fomeida, Maria o Magidala; Salome, na Maria mae o Yakobo wakahuṟa mdi yepfama kundu wache ishia mbihu fo Yesu.
41016002	Nalyo ngamenyi otuko mfiri fo Ruwa wakacha na kulya opangenyi, kiheri mnengeṟi fomedo.
41016003	Wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi, “Nyiu echilueka ipiṟing'itsa-ho iho lyo oo momu fo ṟungu lyilya?”
41016004	Wakairia meso wakawona, kye iho lyo lyampiṟing'itso-ho, (Nalyo nyi liweng'anyi mnu.)
41016005	Wakaida na opangenyi wakawona manake adamye-ho ora lo kulyo, aṟee ikonya lya mkuruo, Wakaṟihio mnu.
41016006	Nao manake ulya kawawia, “Mulaṟihio mnu. Nyi muipfula Yesu Mnasareti, ulya ambambye msalabehu; Amṟuka, nakeri iyapfo. Ambuyenyi handu wawemṟikie.
41016007	Kyaindi henda wienyi wa kiloshyonyi kyake na Petro, kye nyi echimusongoya echihenda kulya Galilaya. Mpfondu mochimbona, chando alembia.”
41016008	Wakawuka alya opangenyi wechidicha, kipfa wawodo nyidedema na makangao. Walawie na mndu ma kindo, kifa wawekeri yowuo mnu. [
41016009	Kyasia Yesu ameṟuka mfiri fo Ruwa ngamenyi otuko, kawoka ikuloṟa na Maria o Magidala, nyi ulya Yesu awembutie waṟufu wawicho mfungade wawembode.
41016010	Maria Magidala kahenda yongoya walya wakye wawekeri na Yesu wakuinadie na ilia.
41016011	Nawo wekiicho, kye Yesu nyi ai na moo kawono nyi Maria Magidala walaidikye.
41016012	Ili numa Yesu kakuloṟa na wawi wa kiloshionyi, wechichumya, kakuloṟa nawo ai na fana ingi, wechihenda ipfo patehu.
41016013	Nawo daa wakahenda wakaongoya walya walawei-ho, manya walawaidikye.
41016014	Numa wadamie ilya shelya, Yesu kakuloṟa nawo walya ikumi na umu Kawadedya mnu, ili walaidikye na ngoo tsawo ili tsi ntumhari walaidikye walya wawemembona ameṟuka.
41016015	Kawawia, “Kehendenyi wuyana kose, muongoye-pfo Mbonyi tso tsa Sia ko orio mndu.
41016016	Msa aidikye kapatiso, nechikiṟo, msa alaidikye, echiwonyo owingo.
41016017	Na shiṟingishyo sheimya iwo waidikye nyi shikeri shii-le, nyi kui rina lyako wefuna nalyo waṟufu wawicho, na ideda kui mdedie mhya.
41016018	Na mawoko hawo wechiira naho njoka, wakanyo kindo kyewaha kyechiwawutia ma kindopfo; walya wai mtengeṟi, wechiwahekya mawoko, nawo nyi wechisambuka.”
41016019	Na Mndumii Yesu amededa ado nawo, kairio huye ruwehu, kahenda idamya ora lo kulyo lo Ruwa.
41016020	Na walya wa kiloshionyi wakahenda wakaongoya-pfo kose, Mndumii kechiwatarama na idedo lilya wahamba kaliwanza na shiṟingishyo shilya awainengye shewaimya.]
42001001	Kyamba wandu wafoi walewika mawoko hawo iṟehiya, mbonyi tsilya tsilewutika kunu kodu;
42001002	chando watsiludambikie iwo wawetsiwonyi matsika kuwooka, wawewei na wahidi wa kidedo-kyo.
42001003	Na inyi kilenjichihia, ngatumatuma mnu tsoose kimatsa kimaenyi kyatso; njikukuṟehie wokikisa iyo Teofilo oko umichimbiṟe mnu.
42001004	Kundu nomanye owanzo lo mbonyi-tso uletsipfundo nlo lohi.
42001005	Kyasia matika halya Herode aweei mangi ya kulya Yudaya, kuwei-pfo mndu mkohanyi amlahe rina lyake nyi Sakaria, ai o kambenyi lya Abia, na mkooke nyi o kishari kya wana wa waka wa Aron, nao rina lyake nyiwe Elisabeti.
42001006	Nawo wakawa wecha wasumhanyi ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa wawawi, wakahenda wechihendelia mawawaso hoose na njopfundo tsa Mndumii tsose, ma walaṟatsie-ho kindo.
42001007	Wawewode manapfo, kipfa Elisabeti nyiwe mhumba, nawo wawawi nyi wawei waku.
42001008	Kyasia kamba lyake likashika lyehenda ṟunda shindo sha wukohanyi woke sumuhana na Ruwa.
42001009	Kakooyo nyi kamba lyake kui kido kya wukohanyi nahende pfo ipfaamira opfaamo, kaida kulya hekalunyi lya Mndumii.
42001010	Mamwingi fulya fo wandu foose fukakaa nja fochiterewa Ruwa saa iya kochipfaamiṟo.
42001011	Kawonekio nyi malaika o Mndumii kahoṟoka oo ora lo kulyo lo kitaṟa kyepfaamiṟia.
42001012	Sakaria ambona kawa mkahai, kawado nyi wuowu.
42001013	Malaika ulya kambia, “Ma kulawowuo Sakaria, kyamba kiterewo kilya kyapfo nyiki kiidikie; na mkoopfo Elisabeti nyi echikaa nakufeeye mana o womi, na rina lyake nyi ochimlaha nyi Yohane.
42001014	Na iyo nyi ochiwado nyi sia na ikeseka, na iya mafeonyi hake wandu nyi wechiwuta-ho ichihio wafoi.
42001015	Kipfa nyi echikaa nawe mndu mnene ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa, elechinyo mvinyo ma kindo kyenanza, naweka amichuṟe Mumuyo Mwele kiwookia awuka wusunyi wo mae.
42001016	Nao nyi echihaluo wana wa Israeli wafoi-ho wawuye halukia Ruwa-chu Mndumii owo.
42001017	Na isonguo echisonguo ipfo mbele yake awode mumuyo fo Elia na pfinya yake, nakeimbeṟuo ngoo tsa wandee wa wandu tsiimbeṟukie wana wawo, na walya waapfinya wahalukie mhio fo wandu wai wecha wasumhanyi, nao kundu echiṟeheṟia Mndumii wandu wai wasungusie.”
42001018	Kyasia Sakaria kawia malaika alya, “Aka-wo kindo njemanya-wo nakyo ikyo nkyo kiki; kipfa njii mmeku namka oko nawei mku?”
42001019	Malaika kahaluo kambia, “Inyi nyi Gabrieli, njekehoṟoka sumhana na oshangu lo Ruwa, nao nyio anjiduma njiche ideda na iyo na ikushitsia mbonyi-tso tsiwode sia.
42001020	Kipfa ili kulaidikya madedo hako nyi ochiwa pipi kulechiidima ideda mtano noshike mkonu fulya kyechikaa kiwutike chando ngakuwia.”
42001021	Na wandu waweiwedia Sakaria wakaṟihio kipfa lya alekaa ado kulya hekalunyi.
42001022	Kiheri alewuka na kulya nja, nalakiidime ideda nawo; wakamanyia nyi ammbona kiṟiha kulya hekalunyi; nao kawakemya na owoko, kakaa ai pipi.
42001023	Kekimarisa mkonu iya ya iṟunda lilya lyake, kahenda kuwuuya na kulya kanyi koke.
42001024	Naalyo shiheri shilya shamsia, mkooke Elisabeti kakapika, kaowa meri itanu kahamba,
42001025	“Nyi wudo-ng'u Mndumii anjiwutia mfiri-yo imchihiye yenjiwuta wusutsu woko ipfo kiidi kya wandu.”
42001026	Meeri fulya fo kaṟandaṟu malaika ulya Gabrieli kadumo nyi Ruwa kundu ko mṟinyi fo kulya Galilaya, fumlahe Nasareti.
42001027	Ko manowaka ashitsye, nao awemkose nyi mndu, rina lyake nyi Yosefu, o kisharinyi kya Dawidi, na mana ulya o waka rina lyae nyi Maria.
42001028	Kyasia malaika ulya kaida na kulya mba, kahamba, “Ngakuiṟikiṟa iyo umsaṟie; Mndumii nakae na iyo, ui mwonyishe kota waka wengi.”
42001029	Nao kauma mkahai kipfa kya kidedo kilya, kasaangia kipfa kya kiirikiṟo kilya ke nyiwee kya iki.
42001030	Malaika kambia, “Ma kulaowuo Maria; kipfa nyi kulewona osu ko Ruwa.
42001031	Ambuya, nyiochikapia, nofee mana o womi, na rina lyake nyi ochimlaha nyi Yesu.
42001032	Nao nyi echikaa nawe mndu ang'anyi, nawelaho nyi ai mana o ichu ai huye ya shindo shoose, na Mndumii Ruwa nyi echimnenga kitima kya wumangi kya ndee Dawidi.
42001033	Nao nyi echikaa ai mangi ya oshari lo Yakobo mlungana, ma wumangi woke woikaa wudumbukepfo!”
42001034	Maria kawia malaika ulya, “A kindo-kyo nyi kyekaa kiwe kida, ili njilawode mii?”
42001035	Malaika kahaluo kambia, “Nyi Mumuyo Mwele echikusokia ipfo huye yapfo, na pfinyia ya ichu ai huye ya shoose nyi yechikuwikia mṟishe. Kyainenga kilya kyekaa kifeo kilaho nyi kyele, kii Mana o Ruwa.
42001036	Ambuya na mshari ulya opfo Elisabeti ao nyiawekupfungie lya mana o womi lya wuku woke, na meri-fu mfo kaṟandaṟu amkapika, ulya awemlahe mhumba.
42001037	Kipfa ko Ruwa kuipfo kindo kilemie iwutapfo.”
42001038	Maria kahamba, “Ambuya nyi njikukerie iya njii kisinga kya Mndumii kiwekunji-wutikia chando owehamba.” Kyasia malaika ulya kalekana nao.
42001039	Mfiri iya naalyo Maria kakure kaangusha ihenda kudooya na kulya mafumvuhu, nahende shika kulya mṟinyi fo Yuda.
42001040	Kaida na kulya mba ko Sakaria, kaiṟikiṟa Elisabeti.
42001041	Naalyo Elisabeti kekiicho kiṟikiṟo kilya kya Maria, mana ulya katoolatoola ipfo wusunyi koke. Elisabeti kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele.
42001042	Kakoṟoṟoma na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba, “Wungusu iyo umbikie mboṟa iidye ya waka woose, na iki kyekaa kifeo ipfo wusunyi wopfo na kiwekiwikie mboṟa.
42001043	Ale kindo-ki ng'ku kyambukia, itane mae o Mndumii oko akuchea na kunu koko?
42001044	Keambuya, lilyandi ṟu lya kiiṟikiṟo kyapfo lyaida kunu madunyi hako, mana-chu katoola-toola amkesi kunu wusunyi koko.
42001045	Wungusu icho alekuidikia shilya alewio nyi Mndumii ke nyishekaa shihoye!”
42001046	Naalyo Maria kahamba, “Mrima foko foadapfuma Mndumii.
42001047	Na mumuyo foko fukakesekia Ruwa ai mkiṟa oko.
42001048	Kipfa kya ili ameambuya wufafa wo kisinga kyake. Ambuya wokia wulalu marika hoose hechianga monjisendia osu loko.
42001049	Nyi ili ichu menyi pfinya amenjiwutia shindo shing'anyi; na rina lyake li-yele.
42001050	Na isaṟia lyake nlyechikaa mtano marika na marika; ko walya wamwowoye.
42001051	Nao nyi awutie ngata sa njiyapfinya na kuwoko koke; karahanyitsa walya wakuirinyishie ipfo mahionyi hawo ha mrima yawo.
42001052	Nyi akumbalye waapfinya ipfo maloṟike-hu hawo; kadosya-ho wafafa.
42001053	Wawodo nyi njaa nyi awaihutsie shindo shicha; na wasuṟi kawasama wulya.
42001054	Nyi airie mana oke Israeli nakutamuye isaṟia.
42001055	Na chando ewewia waku walya wadu, Abrahamu na oshari loke mlungana.”
42001056	Kyasia Maria kakaa nao handu ha meri iṟaṟu, numa kawuya na kanyi koke.
42001057	Kyasia Elisabeti maheri hake hefee hakashika, kafee mana o womi.
42001058	Wandu walya wa mṟasa foke na wa kishari kyake wekiicho ke Mndumii amemnetseṟa ado, wakawado mnu nsia.
42001059	Ili mfiri fo nyanya wakacha napfo idina kimana kilya, wawekundi na ikidumbuya rina nyi Sakaria cha lilya lya ndee.
42001060	Mae kahaluo kahamba, “Ote-ko! Nalaho rina nyi Yohane.”
42001061	Nawo wakambia, “Kuwode mndu o kishari kyapfo ekelaho rinalyopfo.”
42001062	Nawo wakakemia nde ke nyi rina lihya akundi nalaho.
42001063	Nao kakuwesia kiṟaṟo kyeṟehia; kaṟehia-ho, rina lyake nyi Yohane. Wakaṟihio wose.
42001064	Naalyo tichi dumbu lyake likawuya tambalahaluka na olimi loke naawo, kadeda kechikuidapfumya Ruwa.
42001065	Na wandu walya wa mṟasa fowo wakahoyo nyi wuowu woose; na mbonyi-tso tsikadung'ana kulya mafumvunyi ha Yudaya kose.
42001066	Na walya waleicho wose wakatsiwika ngoonyi wakahamba, “A mana-chu nekaa nawe ada wai?” Cha kipfa lyandi kuwoko ko mndumii kuwei nao.
42001067	Na Sakaria ulya ndee kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele kahamba kisuku kya Ruwa kahamba,
42001068	“Kuhende kochikuidapfumyo Mndumii-chu ai Ruwa o Israeli; nyi ili indi amsahia wandu wake na ikuwawonyiia okiio.
42001069	Nao nyi ameluṟihichia ombe lo oletso; ipfo mbenyi ya mana ulya oke Dawidi.
42001070	Na chando awehambie na madumbu ha wadedi walya waele kimatsa kacha mṟamna.
42001071	Ke naluwonyie oletso lo mesa hadu; na lo owoko lo walya walusuo woose.
42001072	Ke nawikie waku walya wadu osaṟio; na ikutamuya mkundana fulya foke mwele.
42001073	Nyamu iya elelia ndeadu Abrahamu; kundu naluinenge,
42001074	Luke lui waletse owoko lo wakituwa wadu, lulai na wuowu.
42001075	Luwehenda lochimhidia na wuele na wucha wusumhanyi ipfo oshangunyi loke mandi-ha lui na moo mafiri hose.
42001076	Na iyo mkoku nyi ochikaa nolaho nyi ui mdedi o ichu ai huye ya shoose; kipfa nyi ochisonguo ipfo mbele ya Mndumii, nohende kochisungusia njia tsake.
42001077	Nokeinenga wandu wake wulaanyi womanyia okiio; ili wechileheṟo manyamaṟo hawo.
42001078	Kipfa kya isaṟia lya mrima fo Ruwa odu; nalyo nyi lyechiluinenga isahio nyi madoenyi ha huye.
42001079	Hahende waaya walya wadamie meemenyi na maṟishenyi ha opfu; kundu madende hadu hahende isumuhantsyo ipfo njiehu ya ofoṟo.”
42001080	Kyasia kimana kilya kikang'ana-ng'ana, kikahenda kyechiwada pfinya ipfo mumuyonyi fokyo, nao kahenda kukaya kundu ko nuka kukatana koshika mfiri fulya echa kuloṟa na wandu wa Israeli.
42002001	Mandi halya kukawuka iwawaso kulya ko Kaisari Augusto, ke masanga hoose hahende iṟehio baruonyi kya okamba.
42002002	Na kiṟehio-kyo nyikyo kya kuwoka, lilya mandi Kirenyio akeri mchili o kulya Siria.
42002003	Kyasia wandu wakahenda ṟehio wose, orio mndu na mṟinyi foke.
42002004	Na Yosefu nao kawewuka kulya Galilaya, mṟinyi fo Nasareti, kahenda ido na kulya Yudaya, mṟinyi fo Dawidi, fumlahe nyi Betlehemu, kipfa awekeri mndu o mbaṟinyia Dawidi, mpfo kikunyi kyake.
42002005	Kundu nahende ṟehio-pfo hamu na Maria ulya awemkosie, nao nyi awei mnene.
42002006	Kyasia wakeri kundu kulya kiheri kyake kyefee kikashika.
42002007	Kafee manoke mbee o womi kamwoṟowia shidami kamlaṟa mponyi, kipfa walalewonyia handu kulya mchalonyi fo wahenu.
42002008	Kyasia na kulya kihongonyi nyi kuwekeri-pfo walisi wai patehu wechiringa poo lyawo kui makamba kiheri kyakio.
42002009	Wadi a ulya malaika o Mndumii, kacha ihoṟoka alyando wai, na ngeela ya Ruwa ikawaṟingichya riti; nawo wakahoyo nyi wowu wung'anyi.
42002010	Malaika lulya kawawia, “Manya mulaowuo, ambuyenyi njiimwongoya mbonyi tsiwode sia ing'anyi, nayo nyi yekaa ishike ko wandu woose.
42002011	Kipfa ili momefeeyo mkiṟa inu; nao nyi Kristo Mndumii kulya mṟinyi fo Dawidi.
42002012	Na kitaanyio kyanu kyemumanyisha nyi iki, nyi mochiwona mkoku-cho amwoṟowie shidami amlaṟe mponyi.”
42002013	Naalyo peṟeseng'u kukocha mamwingi fo siṟi tsa ruwehu, fukasanza na malaka ulya, wakaidapfuma Ruwa wakahamba,
42002014	“Kiṟumi nyi kya Ruwa kulya huye na orukenyi nyi ofoṟo, ipfo ko wandu wakundikie!”
42002015	Kyasia wamalaika walya wekiwuka kulya kowo wakahenda ruwehu, walisi walya wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi wakahamba, “Kendenyi-ng'u lanye; lukehenda kulya Betlehemu, isahia kindo-kyo kyambutika; ikyo Mndumii aluongoya.”
42002016	Wakahenda wekambia owinyi; wakakoya-pfo Maria na Yosefu; na mkoku ulya amlaṟe alya mponyi.
42002017	Wameidima iwona wakahenda wechionguo mbonyi tsilya tsa kidedo kilya walewio kya kimana kilya.
42002018	Na walya waleicho wado wakaṟihio woose shilya waongoyo nyi walisi walya.
42002019	Na Maria kasuṟuma mbonyi tsilya tsose na mrima ketsihia-hia.
42002020	Kyasia walisi walya wakawuya na kulya kowo, wakaidapfuma Ruwa na imwana kya shindo shilya waleicho shoose na ishiwona chando walewewio.
42002021	Kyasia mkonu nyanya yameida-ho, kushike madinyionyi hake, wakamdumbuya rina lyake nyi Yesu; lilya lilehambo nyi malaika ulya lilyandi alawememoho.
42002022	Kyasia wekimarisa mfiri iya yekuheṟemtsa, iya isumhanyi, chando kiwekiteṟie ipfo wuwawasonyi wo Mose, naalyo wakamduo kulya Yerusalemu wahende imloṟa Mndumii.
42002023	Chando kiwei kiṟehie ipfo wuwawasonyi wo Mndumii ke, orio mana mbee o womi nyi echidambikio Mndumii nalaho nyi kyele kyake.
42002024	Wawewika na kidaso chando kiwei kiwawase ipfo wuwawasonyi wo Mndumii; nakyo nyi kya mbeta tsa ngeṟenyi tsiwi, ang'u tsa mba tsiwi-njikoho.
42002025	Maheri halya kuwekeri mndu kulya Yerusalemu, rina lyake nyi Simeon, na mndu-chu nyi awei mndu mcha, asumuhanyi, aweowoye mnu Ruwa, kechiwedia ulya mowihiṟa Israeli moo, na Mumuyo Mwele nyiawekeri nao.
42002026	Nao nyiawewembikie kyaasa nyi Mumuyo Mwele ke, echipfa shile awona Kristo o Mndumii kuwookapfo.
42002027	Nao kacha na kulya hekalunyi amwamtse nyi Mumuyo Mwele. Kyasia ndee o mana ulya Yesu wekimwitsa na kulya mba, wo hamu na mae, wambutie chando kikiteṟie kyake ipfo wuwawasonyi.
42002028	Nao kamwambia mawokonyi, kaichika Ruwa kahamba,
42002029	“Mndumii wulalu nyiokusamia-ng'u msoṟo opfo kipuo; chando ulewekuhambia.
42002030	Kyamba meso hako hamekuwonyia ikiṟa lyapfo.
42002031	Lilya uweṟeheṟie sumuhana na njoshangu tsa wandu wose.
42002032	Lya ngeela yedambuya wandu wa orio mbaṟi mbonyi; na lya kiṟumi kya wandu wapfo Israeli.”
42002033	Kyasia ndee na mae wakawa moṟihio kilya kyahambo kyake.
42002034	Na Simeon kawawikia mboṟa, kawia mae oke Maria, “Ichu nyi ambike mohutsa na iira wafoi wa wana wa Israeli; nawewa kichano kyechidedo-dedo wokaṟuo.
42002035	Na iyo kumonyi oshu nyi lochikuambada ipfo makiidi hawi ha mrima fopfo; kundu mahio na ngoo tsifoi hamanyike napata.”
42002036	Napfo kuwekeri-se mwikimbi mka, elaho nyi Ana; mana o Fanueli; o kisharinyi kya Aseri; nao kui makuyenyi hake nyi awe-mku kaṟatsia; nyiawemkaa na mii maka mfungade numa ya wupora woke.
42002037	Kawekaa-se ai mkusu itane ashitsa maka makumi nyanya na iina, nao alawekelekana ipfo hekalunyi; kahenda kewuta shindo sha Ruwa tupu kekuotoya na iterewa kio na mfiri.
42002038	Nao kawecha naho, saa na iya, kaidapfuma Ruwa; kahenda kyechionguo kyake ko walya waweiwedia maletsionyi ha Israeli wose.
42002039	Kyasia nawo wekimaa yawutsia shisumuhanyi na wuwawaso wo Mndumii shoose, wakahenda ikuwuuya na kulya Galilaya wakashika kulya Nasareti, mṟinyi fowo.
42002040	Na mana ulya kang'ana-ng'ana, kahenda kewada pfinya, kaweichuṟo wuṟango, na osaṟio lo Ruwa lukamkaika.
42002041	Kyasia ndee na mae nyi wawekehenda-henda kulya Yerusalemu orio maka yose ili mkonu menene fo Pasaka.
42002042	Nao kekishitsa mndu o maka ikumi na iwi, wakado nao, chando kiweikido kya mkonu fulya mnene.
42002043	Wekimarisa mfiri iya, warie njia yewuya, mana ulya Yesu kafurumia kulya Yerusalemu, ndee na mae walaichi.
42002044	Wakakusaṟa kulako nyi akeri na walya wa kyaṟonyi, wakatsinda wehenda njienyi ohendo la mfiri fumu, wakampfula ipfo ko walya wa oshari lowo na ko walya waichianyi nawo.
42002045	Wameda walambona-pfo, wakawuya na kulya Yerusalemu wechimpfula.
42002046	Wamemaa mfiri iṟaṟu, wakambona kulya hekalunyi adamie na walosha kewaadanyia na iwawesa-wesa mbonyi.
42002047	Na walya wemadanyia wakatiri mnu wose kipfa kya wuṟango wulya woke na mahaluyenyi hake.
42002048	Kyasia ndee na mae wambona wakauma mkahai, na mae kambia, “Nkyi ili olutana kudi manoko? Keambuya nyi lomekushiha mnu na madima ndeo na inyi.”
42002049	Nao kawawia, “Aikyo mbeinshihia nkyo kiki? Mlaichi ke nyinjiwaṟi ikukaya ipfo shindonyi sha Wande?”
42002050	Nawo walamanye kidedo kilya awawia.
42002051	Naalyo kahenda kusotsanyia nawo, kacha na kulya Nasareti kawa mowahidia. Na mae kasuṟuma mbonyi tsilya mrimenyi tsose.
42002052	Kyasia Yesu kahenda kechiengeṟekia wuṟango na mng'ano na mkundye fokunda Ruwa na wandu.
42003001	Kyasia Kaisari ulya Tiberia ambada wukaisari kushikie maka fo ikumi na katanu, lilya mandi Pontio Pilato ai mchili o Yudaya, na Herode ai mangi ya Galilaya, na manomae Filipo ai mangi ya Ituraya na Oruka lo Tirakonyiti, na Lisanyia ai mangi ya Abilene.
42003002	Mandi Ana na Kayafa wawewode wukohanyi wunene, naalyo kidedo kya Ruwa kikachea Yohane ulya mana o Sakaria kulya nuka kundu akeri.
42003003	Nao kacha na kulya orukenyi kukinganyi na Yordanyi kose kaonguo-pfo mbonyi ya wupatiso wo ihaluka mrimenyi wuendie iletso njonyamaṟo.
42003004	Chando kii kiṟehie ipfo kitabunyi kya mwikimbi Yesaya kyehamba “Ailyo ṟu lya mndu moedia kulya nuka! Teseheṟenyi mtanu fo Mndumii, muwetembecheṟa na njia tsake.
42003005	Orio mapichi hoose haweikilio, na orio mafumvu hose na shitoṟomoso shose shihende idemo; na handu ha kilemekonyi kuwehoṟo-tso kuwe njia njihoṟotsu. Na handu kui kipilipili kuweanjaṟyo kuwe njia njidamiri.
42003006	Na orio wai na mbihu, na wehiwona okiio lo Ruwa.”
42003007	Kyasia kawia mamwingi fulya fuwekemchea ke wache ikupatisio nyio. “A lanye mui malea ha njoka, aichu alemoṟa ke mochikudichia nyashi iya yekaa iche nyiu?
42003008	Kyasia loṟenyi kui mawuto hasumhanyi kye modumbuya, ma mlawone mochideda muhambe, Luwode ndeadu nyi Abrahamu; cha kipfa ngamuwia, Ma maho-ho, Ruwa nechiidima yalutsia-ho Abrahamu luwa.
42003009	Wokya wulalu soka nyi li iwike tsindenyi ya mashidi-ho; akashika ikidi lilechiwika ndunda njicha chi lyechimanyo na ikumbo modonyi?”
42003010	Mamwingi fulya fukambesa fukahamba, “Aka luwike luda ngesa?”
42003011	Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Msa awode kanzi tsiwi nainenge ulya alawode, na ulya awode kando nawewika ado.”
42003012	Kukawecha na wasanyi wa okamba ke wapatisio-ho wakambia, “Mlosha, a so nyi lochiwika luda?”
42003013	Nao kawawia, “Ma mlakiwese kindo kya ngoseṟa ya kilya mui wateṟie.”
42003014	Na sa wawekehenda shidenyii wakawembesa, “A so nyi lochiwika luda?” Nao kawawia, “Ma mlawone mochisohuo mndu ma isoka mndu kindo kya wuilo, mwefuda na wueri-wo wonu.”
42003015	Kyasia wandu walya wakawa mohinga-hinga, wakawehia-hia ngoonyi tsawo kya Yohane ke, kulako nyiio amonyi akeri Kristo.
42003016	Naalyo yohane kahaluo kawawia, “Inyi nyi njekempatisa na mṟinga; kyaindi nyi kukeri icha msa anjieṟie, nao kinsumuhanyie ma yoṟowuo ngowa tsa shadu shakepfo, o nyio echikaa nampatise na Mumuyo Mwele na modo.
42003017	Nao nyiawode mpongo ipfo owokonyi loke, nyiechiseṟewenda kiwuha kyake kiile pang'a, mbeke-tso naingie kikumbinyi kyake, kyaindi muulu-fo nyiechifukoṟa na modo fulechiruma.”
42003018	Kyasia kawa moongoya wandu walya mbonyi tsiwode sia na iwatutuma-tutuma shindo shingi shifoi.
42003019	Kyaindi mangi ulya Herode kekidedio nyio kipfa kya Herodia, ulya mka o manomae, na kipfa kya mawicho halya hengi Herode awenyiamaṟie hose.
42003020	Kaengeṟa iwichuo, itane amshingia mbenyi ya wapfungo.
42003021	Kyasia lilyandi wandu walya waweikupatisio wose, na Yesu kekipatiso, kyechiterewa Ruwa; naalyo kulya ruwehu kukang'alawuka,
42003022	na Mumuyo Mwele kamsokia ai cha mbeta; na ṟu likawewuka kulya ruwehu likahamba, “Iyo nyi ui manoko mkunde unjichihiṟie.”
42003023	Nao Yesu amonyi lilyandi alewooka ilosha wandu nyiaweshikie kufui na mndu o maka makumi haṟaṟu, kyake nyi eeichio ke nyi ai mana o Yosefu nao ai o Eli;
42003024	O Matati, o Lewi, o Meliki, o Yanai, o Yosefu,
42003025	O Matatia, o Amosi, o Nahumu, o Esili, o Nagai;
42003026	o Matatia, o Matatia, o Semei, o Yosefu, o Yuda;
42003027	o Yoana, o Resa, o Serubabeli, o Salatieli, o Neri;
42003028	o Meliki, o Adi, o Kosamu, o Elimadamu, o Eri;
42003029	o Yosua, o Elieseri, o Yorimu, o Matati, o Lewi;
42003030	o Simeon, o Yuda, o Yosefu, o Yonamu, o Eliakimu;
42003031	Melea, o Mena, o Matata, o Natanyi, o Dawidi;
42003032	o Yese, o Obedi, o Boasi, o Salmone, o Naason;
42003033	O Aminadabu, o Adiminyi, o Arinyi, o Hesironyi, o Faresi, o Yuda;
42003034	o Yakobo, o Isaki, o Abrahamu, o Tera, o Nahori;
42003035	o Seruki, o Ragau, o Pelegi, o Eberi, o Sela,
42003036	o Kainanyi, o Arfakisadi, o Semu, o Noe, o Lameki;
42003037	o Metusala, o Enoki, o Yeredi, o Mahalaleli, o Kainanyi;
42003038	o Enoki, o Seti, o Adamu, o Ruwa.
42004001	Kyasia Yesu amwichuṟe Mumuyo Mwele, kawuya awuka kulya Yordanyi, katengesho-tengesho nyi Mumuyo kulya nuka mkonu makumi haana kechihesho nyi Satan womtewa.
42004002	Nao mfiri iya nalelya kindopfo, yekisia, naalyo kawado nyi njaa.
