42004003	Satan kacha imbia, “Komkoya nyi ukeri mana o Ruwa lohi, kewia iho-lyo lihaluke liwe mkate nolye.”
42004004	Yesu kamhaluo, “Nyi kikiṟehie, Kindo mndu echitawulia nakyo moo chi mkate tupupfo.”
42004005	Naalyo kamduo kamdosia handu, kamloṟa mawumangi hoose ha wuyana-wu limu waṟu.
42004006	Satan kambia, “Wuitoṟi-wu nyi njechikuinenga iyo wose na kiweṟe kyawo, kipfa nyi njimdambikie inyi, na njechikuinengia msa ngakumkunda.
42004007	Kyasia iyo kopfira ndi sumuhana na inyi, konjiterewa, isho shose nyi shechikuw̱ia shapfo.”
42004008	Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Nyi kii kiṟehie, nyii ochipfiria Ruwa Mndumii opfo ndi nomterewe, na imhidia nowemhidia o amonyi tupu!”
42004009	Nao kamduo kulya Yerusalemu kamhoṟotsa alya huye kitongolo kya hekalu kambia, “Komkoya na ukeri mana o Ruwa, kuolotse alya wanda.
42004010	Kipfa nyi kii kiṟehie ke, njechikuwawasia wamalaika wake wakuringe.
42004011	Kye nawo nyi wechikuduo na mahi hawo, kundu ulawone koikapa mtulia ihohu.”
42004012	Yesu kahaluo kambia, “Nyi kikihambe, Ma kulaheshe Ruwa Mndumii opfo.”
42004013	Satan kekimarisa orio kyemhesha namtewe, kambuka, kamda, nawede iwuya shiheri shingi.
42004014	Na Yesu kawuya na kulya Galilaya ai na pfinya ya Mumuyo; na kiṟumi kyake kikahenda kedung'ana shihongo shilya shikinganyi na oruka lulya shose.
42004015	Kawewa molosha-losha kulya masinagogenyi hawo amichimbiṟe nyi woose.
42004016	Kacha na kulya Nasareti kundu ang'anyie, kaida na mbenyi ya sinagoge ili mfiri fo Sabato chando aweichiwie, kahoṟokaho nasome.
42004017	Kainengio kitabu kya mwikimbi Yesaya, kekioṟowuo kitabu-kyo kakooya-pfo handu hahaṟehiye,
42004018	“Mumuyo fo Mndumii nyi huyako fui; cha kipfa njimshimbuo na mafuda, njihende yongoya wakiwa mbonyi tsiwode sia. Anjidumie njihende yongoya wapfungo yashuka, na wapfu meso wechiwuya iwona. Njihende ilekia iwo wai wafaṟe wakuashukie.
42004019	Na yongoya maka fo Mndumii fukundikie.”
42004020	Kaoṟowia kitabu kilya, kainengia msoṟo ulya moringa-ho kadamia, na walya wawei kulya sinagogenyi wose wakamkumba meso wechimṟisa.
42004021	Nao kawooka-ng'u ideda nawo kawawia, “Shiṟehiyo-sho nyi inu shahoya ipfo madunyi hanu.”
42004022	Kyasia wose wakachihiyo kyakye, wakaṟihio shidedo shilya sheloda shilewuka dumbunyi lyake wakahamba, “Aka ichu chi mana o Yosefu?”
42004023	Kawawia, “Kulako nyi mui injikaṟwo mhambye-fo fokehambo ke, Mhanga kekukiṟe-wo kumonyi. Ke shindo shilya shiwutikie kulya Kapernaumu lukashiicho, keweshiwutie na iya orukenyi lo kikunyi kyapfo.”
42004024	Kahamba, “Nkya lohi ngambia, Kuwode mdedi o Ruwa ekekundika ipfo orukenyi lo kikunyi kyakepfo.
42004025	Na lohi ngambia, Na kuweipfo waka wafoi wakusu kulya Israeli matika halya ha Elia, lilya mandi kulya ruwehu kuwei kupfunge maka iṟaṟu na meri iṟandaṟu, kuhaho njaa kulya orukenyi kose.
42004026	Elia naladumo ma ko umu-ho, shile na kulya Sarepta, mṟi fo oruka lulya lo Simon ko mka mkusu.
42004027	Na wandu wawodo nyi maṟomu na wawepfo wafoi kulya Israeli mandi halya ha mdedi Elisa, kulakae-ho ma umu aleheṟemtso, shile na Naeman ulya Msiria.”
42004028	Na walya wawei kulya sinagogenyi wakapfuluko wose waicho wado.
42004029	Wakakure, wakamkumbalya-kumbalya na kulya kya patehu lya mṟi fulya, wakatana wamduo alya ohambehu lo ifumvu lilya liweiwike-ho mṟi fulya fowo ke wamwombotse-ho.
42004030	Kyaindi o kaida kulya makiidi hawi hawo kakuhendia.
42004031	Kasoka kashika kulya Kapernaumu, mṟi fo Galilaya, kakaa-pfo, kawa mowalosha ili lya Sabato.
42004032	Nawo wakauma mkahai kipfa kya mloshiye foke, kyamba kidedo kyake kiwewode na pfinya.
42004033	Na kulya sinagogenyi kuwekeripfo mndu awewodo nyi mumumyo fo mṟufu mbicho fo ngafu, nao kafihiṟa na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba,
42004034	“Kudee! Nyiki luwodo na iyo Yesu o Nasareti? Nyi uchee nolurumatse! Na njiichi ke nyi ui u; ke nyi ui Mwele o Ruwa.”
42004035	Na Yesu kamtilima kahamba, “Tsia-ng'u, nombuke!” Naalyo mumuyo ulya kamhutsa wanda alya kiidi kyawo, kambuka nalambike kifaṟe.
42004036	Naalyo wakaṟihio wose, wakawiana mndu na odoe wakahamba, “Nyi kidedo kida ikyo katana awawasa mumuyo ya ngafu kui wukari na pfinya, nayo ikawuka!”
42004037	Iki kyake kikakapo sumu kikadung'ana handu halya hakinganyi naho koose.
42004038	Nao kakure kulya sinagogenyi, kaida na mba ko Simon. Na mamka o Simon nyi awewodo nyi modo, kaaka keng', wakamumterewya.
42004039	Nao katikirya-ho kaarama ahoṟoki, kakanga modo fulya fukamda; mamka ulya o Simon oweṟe kakure kawapfuṟukanyia.
42004040	Koikiila orio walya wawode wandu wawo waluo ndaaṟe-tsi na itsi, wakawaende na alya handu ai; nao kawahekia mawoko umu umu kawachiṟa.
42004041	Na wengi wafoi wakaweleko nyi mumuyo mbicho yechifihiṟa ikahamba, “Iyo nyi ui Mana o Ruwa!” Kawakanga, nalawalekie wahambe ke nyi wamwichi nyi ai Kristo.
42004042	Koikikya nao kawuka-pfo kakuhendya kundu kulawode wandu, na mamwingi fulya fukawewa mompfula; wakacha na kulyando awei wakamwima nalalekane nawo.
42004043	Nao kawawia, “Na mṟi ingi nyi kinjiiwaṟi njihende yongoya mbonyi tsiwode sia tsa wumangi wo Ruwa, kyamba nkyondo njiimdumie.”
42004044	Kawewa moongoya mbonyi kulya masinagogenyi ha Galilaya.
42005001	Kukashika mfiri fumu, lilya mandi wandu wechicha imlulumia, kundu wamwadanyie kidedo kya Ruwa, nao ahoṟoki alya ohambehu lo nduwa ya Genesareti.
42005002	Kawona ngalawa tsiwi tsiwekeri alya ohambehu lo nduwa iya; na wadehi walya wawembuka-pfo; wakahenda isanjia mdeho yawo ii ya ndusu tsinjioke maṟawushi.
42005003	Kaida na ngalawenyi imuho, iya iwekeri ya Simon, kamterewa naiseheṟe kitutu ihende aleshe-leshe na wambaṟa ya nduwa iya; kadamia, kalosha mamwingi fulya fo wandu ai ipfo ngalawenyi.
42005004	Kekihutsia ideda kawuya iwia Simon, “Duo ngalawa ipfo makiidi hawi, ipfo oṟonyi ya nduwa, musotsye-ho mdehoyo yanu mdehe makunga.”
42005005	Simon kahaluo kahamba, “Mwaaria, nyi lulee loitambahana kio kyose kukakya lulawone ma kindo, kyaindi kui kidedo-kyo kyapfo na njechihenda sotsya-ho mdeho.”
42005006	Naalyo wekihenda kuwutia wado, wakakunguwa kilula kya makunga; mdeho iya yawo ikakiṟa itusuka-tusuka.
42005007	Wakatsinyia wodoyawo wa-wekeri ngalawenyi ingi ke wache iwaikanyia; nawo wakacha, wakaichuṟa ngalawa tsilya tsitsiwi itane tsakiṟa isoṟowia wanda.
42005008	Simon Petro awona adi kacha ikuhutsa alya shi-ya madende ha Yesu kahamba, “Kekure nombuke Mndumii, kipfa inyi njikeri mndu makideko.”
42005009	Nyi kipfa waleṟihio mnu o na walya wawekeri nao wose, kipfa kya makunga halya waleorana.
42005010	Nyi wudo na Yakobo na Yohane, wana wa Sebedayo walya waweei wodoe wa Simon. Yesu kawia Simon, “Ulaowuo, kimatsika wulalu nyi ochiwa mdehi modeha wandu.”
42005011	Wameende ngalawa tsilya na wambaṟa, wakakudeya-ho shose, wakamwosha.
42005012	Kukashika lilya mandi awetsindie mṟinyi fowo fumu-ho, kuweepfo mndu awewodo nyi saka; nao awona Yesu kakuhutsa wanda na kyamu kamterewa kahamba, “Iyo Mndumii, kokukundia na ochiidima injiheṟemtsa!”
42005013	Nao kahoṟuo owoko loke kampaaya kahamba, “Ngamkunda; heṟemka!” Naalyo saka iya ikasia.
42005014	Kambawasa nalakiwie mndu, “Kyaindi henda kuloṟe kulya ko mkohanyi nowewika na kindo kya iheṟemka lyapfo, chando kikiteṟie nyi Mose kiwe kiṟingishio kyawo.”
42005015	Kyaindi sumu tsake tsikaengeṟa idung'ana, wakakuwumbia mamwingi ifoi icha imwadanyia na ichiṟo nyio ndaaṟe tsawo.
42005016	Nao kawa mosheṟuka, kakaa kundu kulawode wandu kechiterewa Ruwa.
42005017	Kukashika ili limu kechilosha wandu, kuwedamie-pfo Wafarisayo na walosha na wuwawaso wawewukie orio mṟinyi yose ya Galilaya na Yudaya na Yerusalemu, na pfinyia ya Mndumii ikambanza, kachiṟa wandu.
42005018	Wadi aiwa womi warie mndu na kitaṟa, aluo lyetiliwana shiwungo, wakatambahana imwitsa napfo wahende imleṟia alya sumuhana nao.
42005019	Walawone mwaanya fomwitsa, kipfa kya mamwingi fulya fo wandu, wakado kulya mbehu, wakamsotsa kulya matofalinyi ha huye ario nyi kitaṟa kyake, wakamsotsia alya kiidi sumuhana na Yesu.
42005020	Nao awona iidikia lyawo kambia, “Iyo mndu, njonyamaṟo tsapfo nyi tsinjiwute.”
42005021	Walaanyi walya wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakawooka ihia-hia wakahamba, “A mndu chu-nyi ada, itane adeda ado shindo sheruma Ruwa? Nyiu ichu echiidima iwuta njonyamaṟo tsa wandu shile nyi Ruwa amonyi?”
42005022	Na Yesu kekimanya mahio hawo kahalo kawawia, “Nyiki muihiha ipfo ngoonyi tsanu?
42005023	Sa ki kyangu-ho nyi kihya? Ngesa nyi ihamba, ‘Njonyamaṟo tsapfo nyi tsinjiwute,’ ang'u nyi ihamba, ‘Kure nochuimie?’
42005024	Kyaindi muwone handu mochimanya ke Mana o Mndu nyi awode pfinya kunu orukenyi yewuta njonyamaṟo -- kawuya iwia ulya atiliwanyi shiwungo.” Ngakuwia, “Kekureng'u uire kitaṟa-kyo kyapfo nohende kanyi kopfo!”
42005025	Naalyo lienyi kahoṟoka alya sumuhana nawo kakuhendia kanyikoke kechiidapfuma Ruwa.
42005026	Na wandu wakaṟihio wose, wakahamba, “E-lae, nyi inu lowona shiṟiha!”
42005027	Shindo-sho shambutika kawuka-pfo kahenda, kawona mndu mosana okamba elaho nyi Lewi adamye alyando okamba lokesanyio, kacha imbia, “Njoo; awishana na inyi.”
42005028	Nao kada-ho shose, kakure kahenda yawishana nao.
42005029	Na Lewi kahenda imkoṟia mfuho kulya mba koke; kukakaa-ho mamwingi fufoi fo wasanyi wa okamba na wengi wakundanyi nawo wawedamie kilionyi hamu nawo.
42005030	Kyasia Wafarisayo walya na walaanyi wa shitabu wakarihinyikia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wakahamba, “A nyiki ili molya mukawenyo hamu na wesana okamba na wetehia?”
42005031	Na Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “Iwo wai na oru wasarie mhangapfo shile nyi iwo waluo tupu.
42005032	Chi njicheye ilaha iwo wecha wasumuhanyipfo, indi nyi iwo wanyamaṟie kundu wadumbuye.”
42005033	Nawo wakambia, “Aili wa kiloshionyi kya Yohane wekekuotoya kitsitsi, na iterewa shiterewo, na walya wa Wafarisayo naawo, kyaindi iwo wa kopfo wakawa molya na ikunyooya.”
42005034	Na Yesu kawawia, “Alae nyi mochiidima iwia wandu wa walinyi wakuotoye mandi-ho menyi wali akeri nawo?
42005035	Kya kake na kukae kushike mafiri, ili indi menyi wali echiwuto kowo, nlyondo wechikuotoya mafiri-ho.”
42005036	Kawawia mfanano, “Ma kuwode mndu echiwuta kirache kya nguwo njihya nakiwehie nguwo-hu njikupfo; kokooya nyi wudo echiranduo iya njihya na kirache-kyo kikiwute nguwo-hu nyihya kilaṟinganyi na nguwo iya njiku.
42005037	Ma kuwode mndu echiwika mvinyio mhya machorenyi makupfo, kokooya nyi wudo, mvinyo-fo mhya mfochiranduo-randuo machoreho, nafo nyi fochipusukia wanda na machore hakanyamaṟika.
42005038	Kyaindi mvinyo mhya nyi kikundi fuletsio machorenyi mahya, nasho shikakia shishiwi.
42005039	Ma kuipfo mndu ekenyo mvinyo fukaiye kacha akundi-se mhyapfo; cha-kipfa nyiechihamba, nanga ifu fukaye kacha.”
42006001	Kyasia ili limu kui mkonu fo Sabato kaida mademenyi ha ngano, na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakatufwo-ho mahaa wakahasisa na mawoko wakalya.
42006002	Kyaindi Wafarisayo waweiho wakahamba, “Nyiki ili muiwuta kindo kilasumuhanyi kiwuto ili lya Sabato?”
42006003	Yesu kahaluo kawawia, “A mlemsome kilya Dawidi alewuta lya mandi wawado nyi njaa na walya werianyi nao.
42006004	Chando aleida na kulya mba ya Ruwa kaira-ho mkate iya iweembike mesehu ya Ruwa, ilamteṟie ilio nyi wandu shile nyi wakohanyi wawenyi?”
42006005	Kawuya iwawia, “Mana o Mndu nyi akeri mnene na o Sabato.”
42006006	Kukacha-se mkonu fungi fo Sabato, nao kakuidia na singogenyi kalosha-pfo. Napfo nyi kuwei-pfo mndu owoko loke luwekachukie.
42006007	Walaanyi walya wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakambikia meso waambuye kokooya nyi aikiṟa ili lya Sabato, kundu wawone kemkumba.
42006008	Nao kamanya mahio halya hawo; kawia mndu ulya owoko lukachukie, “Kekure uhoṟoke oo mtengele.” Nao kakure kahoṟoka.
42006009	Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Nyi njiimbesa-wo ke, na kisumhanyi iwuta shicha ang'u shiwicho ili lya Sabato? Ikiṟa moo ang'u ifudetsa ngesa?”
42006010	Kekiwaṟengutsia meso wose, naalyo kambia, “Hoṟuo owoko-lo lopfo.” Nao kawika ado owoko loke lukawuya ichia.
42006011	Nawo wakawado nyi oṟuuṟe, wakadeda kyaama wo wenyi na wenyi chando wechitana Yesu.
42006012	Mandi halya kawuka-pfo kakuhendia kundu ko mafumvunyi naterewe Ruwa. Kalaa dembo tambaṟu kechiterewa Ruwa.
42006013	Koikikya kalaha walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kasambuṟa-ho wasoṟo ikumi na wawi kawalaha nyi wasu,
42006014	nyi Simon, kamlaha-se rina nyi Petro, na Andrea manomae, na Yakobo na Yohane, na Filipo na Bartolomayo.
42006015	Na Mat na Toma, na Yakobo o Alifayo, na Simon elaho Selote.
42006016	Na Yuda o Yakobo na Yuda Iskariote ulya alewa mṟiingi.
42006017	Kasoka nawo kahoṟoka handu ha rendewele arianyi na mamwingi fufoi fo walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, na tendemra ya wandu ifoi, wawewukie Yudaya na Yerusalemu, na Tiro na Simon kulya kundu kukinganyi na ipalipali, walecha imwadanyia na ichiṟo ndaaṟe tsawo.
42006018	Na walya wawei waosose nyi mumuyo ya ngafu wakawechiṟo.
42006019	Tendemra iya ya wandu yose nyi iwekundi impaaya, kipfa ipfo koke nyi kuwewuka-pfo pfinya ikakiṟa woose.
42006020	Naalyo kairia meso kaambuya walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kahamba, “Wungusu nyo mui wakiwa, cha kipfa wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wui wonu!”
42006021	“Wungusu nyo muwodo nyi njaa wulalu, cha kipfa nyi mochikaa muihutso!”
42006022	“Wungusu nyio ili wandu wechimsuo na imuuma wakawemuuma na imruma-ruma na ikumba rina lyanu kuleshe cha ili liwei liwicho, nasho na kitewe kya Mana o Mndu.
42006023	Chihionyi mfiri fulya muwetoola-tola, kipfa woṟunda wonu nyi wufoi kulya ruwehu; kyamba nyi wudo wandeawo walewewutia wadedi walya wa Ruwa.”
42006024	“Kyaindi ochia lonu mui wasuṟi, cha kipfa ikyo kyechimuwihiṟia moo, nyi mulememaa ikudaaya!”
42006025	“Ochia lonu nyo muihutsu wulalu, cha kipfa nyi mochikaa muwado nyi njaa! Ochia lonu muiseka wulalu, kipha nyi mochikaa mkuinadie na ilia!”
42006026	Ochia lonu ili wandu wose wekemudedia necha; kyamba nyi wudo wandeanu walewewutia waikimbi walya wa wongo.
42006027	Kyaindi nyi ngamuwia nyo muiadanyia, Kundenyi wakituwa wanu, na iwo wamsuo muwewawutia mecha.
42006028	Kundenyi iwo wekemsesa mboṟa, muweterewia iwo wekemruma.
42006029	Ichu echikukapa nguchu-yo, mhaluye-se na iyo ingi, na ichu echikusoka ikonya lyapfo, manya ulamiime ma kanzu-yo.
42006030	Orio akuterewa mnenge, na ichu mokusoka shindo shapfo, ma ulakishiwese-se koke.
42006031	Nanyo chando mukundi muwutio nyi wandu, nanyo kewewutenyi mudo.
42006032	Aka nanyo mukakunda walya wamkundi tupu, nyi wucha wuhya muwode? Kipfa ma wadeko na wakundi walya wawakundi-wo.
42006033	Aka nanyo mukawutia mecha iwo wekumuwutia nyo, nyi wucha wuhya muwode? Ma wandu wadeko na wekewuta wado.
42006034	Aka mkaakuya iwo mochihamba ke nyi wechiidima imuwihiṟia, nyi wucha wuhya muwode? Ma wandu wadeko na wekeakuya wanyamaṟi wengi iwo wechiidima iwawihiṟia wado kuhyanyi.
42006035	Kyaindi kundenyi wakituwa wanu, muwewawutia na mecha, muakuye mulakundi iwihiṟio-se kindo; mukawuta mudo nlyodo woṟunda wonu wochifo, nanyo nyi mochiwa wana wa Ulya ai huye ya shose; kipfa o nyi aololye wandu wechimwana na walya wawicho.
42006036	Kyasia, angenyi wesaṟia; chando na Ndeanu ai msaṟi.
42006037	“Ma mlawone mochiwonyia wengi wuwicho, nanyo mochiwonyiopfo; ma mulatetekie owingo, nanyo mochitetekyopfo, leheṟenyi, nanyo kundu muleheṟo.
42006038	Inengienyi, kundu nanyo muinengo; kihesha kicha kii kitsindie kii kisikyesikye kiitsye msanjika, nyikyo wechimbikia ipfo ndenyi tsanu. Kipfa kihesha kilya mokeheshia nakyo, nyikyo mochikaa muheshio nanyo.”
42006039	Kawuya iwawia ifanano, “Alae mpfu meso na echiidima iduo mpfu meso, ungi na njia ngesa; aka chi wechioloka ṟungunyi wawawi?
42006040	Molosho naidye momoloshapfo; kyaindi orio mndu ainutsie shose nyi eching'ang'ana na mlosha oke.
42006041	A iyo, nyiki ili okeambuya kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo, na iyo ulawonyi mriti-fo fui ipfo risonyi lyapfo?
42006042	Aka nyi wuda ochiidima iwia manomayo, Manowama, keleka njiwute kinana-kyo kikeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo, na iyo kulawonyi mriti-fo fui ipfo risonyi lyapfo, iyo? Iyo nyi mokulembetseṟa! Kemewuta kuwoka mriti-fo fui ipfo risonyi lyapfo, numa noambuye-ng'u necha chando ochiwuta kinana kii risonyi lya manomayo.”
42006043	“Ikidi icha lyechidima ikumbia ndunda njiporu-pfo na ikidi liporu likumbia ndunda njicha-pfo.
42006044	Kyamba orio ikidi nyi lyekemanyika kui ndunda tsalyo lyilyenyi cha kipfa ipfo mshenyi wandu wechitowa-pfo mkuyupfo, ma isikinyi lya msha kochihao-pfo sabibupfo.
42006045	Mndu-cho mcha nyi ekeloṟa kilya ki kicha ipfo kisenyi kya mrima foke, na mndu-cho mbicho kaweloṟa kilya kii kiwicho. Kyamba ikyo kiichuo ipfo ngoonyi, na dumbu-lyo naakyo lyechihamba.”
42006046	“Aka-nyo, nyiki ili mokenjilaha, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii,’ nanyo mlekewuta ikyo njekehamba?
42006047	Orio mndu mokuchea na koko, kawa moadanyia shidedo shako na ishiwuta, mndu-cho nyi njiechimloṟa sa aṟinganyi nao,
42006048	nyi aṟinganyi na mndu mowika mba, kaisumia, kaisotsia wanda, kawika itsinde lyayo iṟaṟehu lya iho. Kyasia, mfu fukacha, mṟinga fulya fukatsindika-tsindika mba iya fulaidime iihutsa; kyamba kimae kyayo kiwei kisotsie necha.
42006049	Kyaindi ichu moicho madedo hako kada alahawuta, nyiaṟinganyi na mndu alewika mba yake terihu ya kimamile, nalawanze kimae kyayo, mfu fulya fukaitsindika itane yawunduka, na mbundukie foyo fukaṟihisha mnu.”
42007001	Ammaa ideda madedo halya hake hoose hakaida madunyi ha wandu, naalyo kakuidya na kulya Kapernaumu.
42007002	Napfo kuwekeri-pfo mchili o siṟi ya wasikari ihana, aweluṟe msoṟo o koke kepfa, nao nyiawemkundi mnu.
42007003	Mchili ulya kekicho sumu tsa Yesu, kamdumia wameeku wa ko Wayuda wamterewe nache, nachiṟe isinga lyake.
42007004	Nawo washika alyando Yesu ai wakamterewa mnu wakambia, “Nyawaṟi Mndumii, kembutie kudo.
42007005	Kipfa nyi akundi wandu wa mbaṟi yadu katana aluwikia na mba-i yeterewia.”
42007006	Kyasia Yesu kahenda nawo. Ashikye haleshe na mba ya mchili ulya, mchili ulya kamdumia mbuya tsake wahende imbia, “Mndumii, ulakuwinyishe, kyamba inyi njiiho sa ochicha na koko noide shi ya kai lyakopfo.
42007007	Nkyo kyaduma ngawona ke njilawaṟi icha na kopfo; indi kekuhambie idedo tupu, na msoṟo chu oko nechikuchia.
42007008	Kyamba na inyi nyi mndu njimbike shi ya wuchili, na inyi mbewode wasikari wanjinyiye, na inyi ngawia ichu, ‘Henda,’ nao nyiechihenda; na ungi, ‘Njoo,’ nao nyiechicha, na kisinga kyako, ‘Henda wuta wuliwe,’ nao nyiecheewuta.”
42007009	Yesu aicho ado kamṟihio, kaindukia mamwingi fulya fuwemwitung'atie kawawia “Ngamuwia nyo, ma ko wa Israeli njilemewone iidikia ling'anyi lidipfo!”
42007010	Kyasia walya waledumo wawuya na kanyi wakakooya msoṟo ulya amechia.
42007011	Kukashika ili lya ngama kahenda kundu ko mṟinyi fumlahe nyi Nainyi, na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wakahenda nao na mamwingi fo wandu fufoi.
42007012	Lilyandi aweshikye kufui na kichumi kya mṟi fulya, adi a ulya mndu mpfu ario kehenda dao kya patehu, nao nyiawei mana kimumu ko mae, nao nyiawepfiie mii; na wandu wa kulya mṟinyi wafoi nyi wawerianyi nao.
42007013	Mndumii kekimbona, kamwichio wukiwa kambia, “Ma kulalie mai.”
42007014	Katikiria hafui, kapaaya kitaṟa kilya; na walya warie wakatirima. Nao kahamba “Iyo manake, ngakuwia kure!”
42007015	Mpfu ulya kakure, kadamia, kawooka ideda, nao kamnengya mae.
42007016	Wakawado nyi wuowu wose wakaidapfuma Ruwa wehamba “E lae; kodu komekure mwikimbi o Ruwa ang'anyi, na Ruwa amesahia-ng'u wandu wake.”
42007017	Mbonyi-tso tsake tsikadung'ana kulya Uyuda koose na kulya-ndo kukinganyi napfo kose.
42007018	Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi kya Yohane wakahenda imwongoya shoose.
42007019	Kyasia Yohane kalaha wa kiloshionyi kyake wawi, kawaduma ko mndumii wahende imbesa “Iyo nyi iyo ulya a mhambe ke nyi echicha, ang'u luwedie ungi?”
42007020	Wasoṟo walya wekishika kulya koke wakahamba “Yohane mopatisa nyi aluduma kopfo wai kakuwia-le wai, Iyo nyi iyo ulya a mhambe nyiechicha ang'u luwedie ungi?”
42007021	Na saa iya tichi Yesu kachiṟa wandu waluo ndaaṟe wafoi na maṟishi hawo, kawawuta na mumuyo mbicho na wapfu-meso wafoi kawewasaṟia kawaambuṟa.
42007022	Kahaluo kawawia “Kuhendyenyi muongoye Yohane ishi moicho na iwona mkawewona Wapfu meso aiwa wai iwona, wai iriteka na iwa wai ichumia, wawodo nyi saka wai iheṟemka, wapfu madu nyi wai iicho, wapfiie nyi wai iṟutso, na wakiwa wakaongoyo mbonyi tsiwode sia.
42007023	Wungusu ulya alamsukie nyi inyi.”
42007024	Walya waledumo nyi Yohane wamehenda, Mndumii kawooka ideda na mamwingi fulya fo wandu kya Yohane “A nyikiki mlehenda yambuya kulya nuka; ngesa nyi kiwale kiweisingitso-singitso nyi otanu?
42007025	A nyi kiki mlehenda yambuya-pfo; nyi mndu aṟee nguwo tsa kimamile ngesa? Walya waṟe̱ nguwo tsa shimamile wakuleheshie, nyi mbenyii tsa wamangi wai!
42007026	A nyi kiki-se mlehenda yambuya; ngesa nyi mdedi o Ruwa Ee wo ngamuwia, nyi aidie na wadedi.
42007027	Icho nyio sa awemṟehie ke Ambuya, ngaduma msu oko oshungunyi lopfo, nao nasungusie njia yapfo oshangunyi lopfo.
42007028	Nyi ngamuwia Ipfo ko iwo wawafee nyi waka, kuipfo mdedi o Ruwa ang'ang'anyi na Yohane-pfo. Kyaindi, ichu ai mtutu o woose ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa, nyi ang'anyi kota-o.”
42007029	Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu fokiicho fudo, na wasanyi wa okamba, wakapatisio wupatiso wo Yohane.
42007030	Kyaindi Wafarisayo walya, na walaanyi wa wuwawaso wakatahacha kyaama kya Ruwa wawenyi, kilya Ruwa awekundi, walapatiso nyio.
42007031	“A wandu wa oshari-lu nyi njiechiwafananyisha na kiki? Nyi wafananyi na kiki-wo?
42007032	Nyi wafananyi na shiwana shidamie tumo shechilahana shehamba ‘A ili lomemkapa mtoṟiṟo, nanyo mulashine nyiki; lomemfihiṟia, nanyio ma mlafuhe nyiki?’
42007033	Kipfa nyi kulecha Yohane Mpatisi alaweelya mkate ma inyo mvinyo, nanyo mkahamba nyi amosose nyi mumuyo mbicho!
42007034	Manomndu kacha, echilya na inyo, nanyo mkahamba aichu makilya na makinango mvinyio, nyi mbuya ya wesana okamba na wenyamaṟa!
42007035	Na mṟango ulya nyi ekededyo nyi wana wake woose!”
42007036	Kyasia umu-ho o Wafarisayo kacha imterewa ke nahende ikuliia shelya kulya koke; nao kacha kadamia-pfo.
42007037	Adi aichu mka o kulya mṟinyi ai monyamaṟia Ruwa, aleicho ke nyi adamie kiliionyi kya choonga ipfo mba ko Mfarisayo ulya, kacha naho arie kichupa kya alabastro kiwode mafuda hepfaama.
42007038	Kacha ihoṟoka alya numa ya madende hake kechilia, kawooka ichoweṟa madende halya hake na mchenyere iya; kawuya ihaanguo na njui tsa ipfo mdonyi koke. Amiidima ado kakomba-komba madende halya hake, kahashia mafuda halya hepfaama.
42007039	Kyasia Mfarisayo ulya amlahie shelyenyii kekiwona ado kahia mrimenyi foke amonyi kehamba “Kokoya ichu nyi ai mdedi o Ruwa, nyi awechimanya ke mka-chu nyiu, na mbaṟi yake nyi ida, ke nyi mka mnyamaṟi!”
42007040	Yesu kahaluo kambia “Simon oko, njiwode kindo kyako njiikuwia.” Nao kahamba “Mlosha, kuhambie, mwaaria.”
42007041	“Kuwekeri-pfo wandu wawi wai wasile wa mndu moakuya, ulya umu awode sile yake ya shilingi mahana hatanu, na ulya ungi ya shilingi makumi hatanu.
42007042	Nawo walawone kemtaa, nao kawadeea sile tsilya wo wawawi. Kyasiang'u nyi uhya echimkunda ngoseṟa.”
42007043	Simon kamhaluo kahamba “Ngakusaṟa na ulya aledeeyo sile ifoi-ko.” Nao kambia “Nodumbuo sungusihu teṟe.”
42007044	Kyasia kekiindukia mka ulya kawia Simon “Uwonyi mka-chu? Inyi ngamekuchea na kunu mba kopfo, na iyo onnenga ma mṟinga fosanjia madende hapfo. Nao kyake nyi achoweṟa madende hako na mechenyeṟe, kawuya kahaanguo na njui tsa ipfo mdonyi koke.
42007045	Ma omenjikomba-kombapfo na kiwookia ngacha, ameda ikomba-komba madende hakopfo.
42007046	Ma omenjishia mapfuda kunu mdonyii fokopfo; nao nyiashia madende hako mafuda hepfaama.
42007047	Kipfa kya ikyo nyi ngakuwia-ng'u O nyi ambute njonyamaṟo tsifoi, kyamba nyi amkunda mkundie fung'anyi; kyaindi ichu awuto kyake kitutu nyi awekunda mkundie mtutu.”
42007048	Kawia mka ulya “Njonyamaṟo tsapfo tsamewuto.”
42007049	Kyasia walya wadamie nao kilonyi kya shelya, wakawooka ideda ipfo mrimenyi yawo wehamba, “Nyio-u ichu katana awuta wandu njonyamaṟo?”
42007050	Nao kawia mka ulya “Nyi wuidiki wopfo wokukiṟa; kuhendieng'u na kipuo.”
42008001	Kukashika ili numa-numa, nao kawa motengeta mamṟinyi na shimṟinyi sha wandu kechilosha na yonguo mbonyi tsiwode sia tsa wumangi wo Ruwa arianyi na walya ikumi na wawi.
42008002	Na waka wengi sa walekiṟo mṟufu mbicho na ndaaṟe nyi wawerianyi nao; nyi Maria, amlahe Magidala, nyio ulya alechiṟo mṟufu mbicho mfungade.
42008003	Na Yohane, mka o Kusa, nyi awei msoṟo mokalia shindo sha Herode, na Susana, na wengi-se wafoi wawekemtarama na shindo shawo sha nga.
42008004	Lilyandi wandu wafoi walekumbuhanana wawuka mṟinyi yawo, kadeda nawo kui mfanano.
42008005	“Mkumbi mokumba mbeu alehenda ikumba mbeu tsake, na lilyandi awekeri ikumba, maata tsikaoloka mbai ya njia tsikachumo-chumo, na shilehe shikacha itsitola shikamaa-ho.
42008006	Tsingi tsikaoloka ihohu lya iṟaṟa, tsamedo tsikawuya yuma, kifa kulawei-ho mchoweṟa.
42008007	Tsingi tsikaoloka mshenyi, msha iya ikadosana natso ikatsichoronguo.
42008008	Na tsingi tsikaoloka terinyi njicha tsikado tsikang'ana, makumbienyi hatso, imu ikakumbia ihana.” Kekiidima ihamba ado kadeda na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba “Ichu ai na madu heicho naicho!”
42008009	Kyasia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wakacha imbesa mbonyi tsa ifanano lilya nyiiwe tsa iki.
42008010	Nao kahamba “Sa wai wainenge imanya mbonyi tsa kiṟika tsa wumangi wo Ruwa nyinyo; indi iwawengi nyi kui mafanano, kundu ma ili wewona walawone, na ili wechiicho walamanye.”
42008011	“Na ifanano lilya nyi ili; mbeu tsilya nyi idedo lya Ruwa.
42008012	Na tsilya tsa mbai ya njia nyiwo iwo weadanyia; numa Satana kacha iwuta kidedo kilya ipfo ngoonyi tsawo, kundu walawone wechiidikia wakiṟo.
42008013	Na tsilya tsa ihohu nyi iwo wekeicho idedo lilya wakaliwada na sia, indi kindo walawode nyi mri, nyi wandu wekeidikia oweṟe kitutu, na kiheri kya mahesho wakakuletsana-ho.
42008014	Na tsilya tsiolokie mshenyi nyi iwo wekeadanyia idedo, wakahenda ishingio nyi akusaṟo ha wukiwa na masaa na malango ha moo-fu, walakikumbie ndunda.
42008015	Indi tsilya tsa terinyi njicha, nyi iwo wekeicho idedo lilya, wakaliwada na ngoo njilalutsu wakakumbia ndunda na itirisia.”
42008016	“Ma kuipfo mndu echiatsa taa naipfinyikie nungunyi ang'u naiwike shi ya kitarapfo; indi nyi echiiwika kidi-hu kyemasa taa, kundu orio wandu waida napfo wawone sayo.
42008017	Kipfa kuipfo kindo kii kipfinyike keeda kilapfunuka numapfo, ma kindo kii kiṟike keeda kilamanyika na iwoneka na patapfo.
42008018	Kyasia ambuyenyi mnu chando mokeicho; kipfa ichu awode nyi echinengo, na ichu alawode, ma isho ekekusaṟa nyi shake necheshisoko.”
42008019	Alyando awei kukawecha naho mae na wana wa mae, indi walaidime ishika afui nao, nyi kipfa waleshingio nyi mamwingi fo wandu.
42008020	Kawio ke mayo na wana wa mayo nyi wahoṟoki oo njia, nyi wakundi ikuwona.
42008021	Nao kahaluo kawawia “Wama oko na wana wa wama nyi iwo wekeadanyia idedo lya Ruwa wakawewa moliwuta.”
42008022	Kyasia naalyo mfiri fumu kadooya ngalawenyi arianyi na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake; kawawia “Ndenyi luambadie kulya kya ora lungi lo nduwa.” Wakahenda.
42008023	Wechihenda wado na ngalawa iya, nao kalaa mado. Naalyo kukacha otanu sa lwafinya kulya ipalipali-hu, wakawona ngalawa iya iichuo mringa, wakawado nyi fowa.
42008024	Wakahenda imwamtsa wakahamba “Mndumii Mwaaria, Mndumii Mwaria, nyi ideka-ng'u lui!” Nao kakure madonyi kadedia otanu lulya na masinanu halya ha mṟinga; nasho shikatsia sau-sau, kukahutsa olele.
42008025	Nao kawawia “A iidikia lyanu nyiiku li?” Wakaowuo, wakaṟihio, wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi “A ulalu nyiu-wo ichu, ili awawasa otanu na mṟinga nasho shikawemwicho?”
42008026	Wakaambadya, wakashika ohambehu lo oruka lo Wageraseno, nalo nyi mambatsana na Galilaya.
42008027	Kawuka ngalawenyi kadooya kulya orukenyi, kakumbuhana mndu o kulya mṟinyi ai mosose nyi mṟufu mbicho, alawekiṟe̱-se ma nguwo handu ha mfiri ifoi ma ikaa kundu ko mba, shile na shifunyi tupu.
42008028	Kekiafuṟa Yesu kafihiṟa kamwolokia kadeda na ṟu ling'anyi “Nyikiki njiwode na iyo Yesu Mana o Ruwa ichu ai huye ya shose? Ngakuterewa ma ulantuure.”
42008029	Kipfa nyi awemewawasa mṟufu ulya mbicho nalekane na mndu ulya; cha kipfa nyiawemwosose, kakuruo-kuruo shiheri sa shifoi kawa moringo ampfunge na mshe na matima, nao nyiawekedumbuo-dumbuo shilya shiwempfungie, kawa motengesho-tengesho nyi mṟufu ulya kundu ko nuka kulaai wandu.
42008030	Yesu kambesa “Rina lyapfo nyiu?” Nao kahamba, “Nyi Legionyi (isiṟi).” Kyamba awemwosose nyi waṟufu wawicho wafoi.
42008031	Wakamterewa nalawawawasie wasoke ngolokionyi.
42008032	Napfo nyi kuwekeri-pfo poo lya nguwe tsifoi tsiweiliso alya fumwunyi; wakamterewa nawainenge momu wahende itsiososa-tso.
42008033	Kawainenga momu. Naalyo mṟufu iya ikawuka mndu ulya ikahenda yosoosa nguwe tsilya. Poo lilya likapiṟimika kulya msaṟi-hu, likaoloka kulya nduwenyi, likapfumbo nyi mṟinga.
42008034	Walisi walya wawona wado, wakadicha, wakashitsa mbonyii-tso kulya mṟinyii na ko wademi.
42008035	Wandu wakakure wahende yambuya kilya kyawutika, wakashika alyando Yesu ai, wakakooyaho mndu ulya alewuto waṟufu walya wawicho adamie; aṟee nguwo, apfudie, ai alya madendenyi ha Yesu; wakaowuo.
42008036	Na walya wawewonyii wakawaongoya chando ulya awewodo nyi waṟufu wawicho achiṟo.
42008037	Na wandu walya woose walee mṟasenyi ya Wageraseno wakamterewa nawuke kulya kowo, kipfa lyandi walehoyo nyi wuowu wung'anyi; nao kadoya ngalawenyi, kawuya.
42008038	Msoṟo ulya alewuto waṟufu walya wawicho kamterewa ke nakukaye nao. Nao kamsama kambia.
42008039	“Kuwuuye na kanyi; nohende yonguo shindo-shi shing'anyi shidi Ruwa akuwutia.” Nao kakuhendia; kawa moonguo kulya mṟinyi koose shilya Yesu alembutia.
42008040	Lilyandi Yesu alewuya, mamwingi fulya fo wandu fukamwambia, kipfa nyi fuwei imbedia fose.
42008041	Adi a ulya mndu, rina lyake nyi Yairo; kacha naho, nao nyi awei mwitoṟi o mba yeterewia. Kakuhutsa oo madendenyi ha Yesu, kamterewa nahende kulya kanyi koke.
42008042	Kipfa nyi awewode mana kimumu o waka aweshitsie maka ikumi na iwi, nao nyi aweshikie hafui na inenuka. Nao kechihenda mamwingi fulya fuka-peṟehetsana nao.
42008043	Na mka umu aweluo ndaare ya samu handu ha maka ikumi na iwi, awemarisie shindo shake piu ko wahanga nalaidimike ichiṟo nyi mndu.
42008044	Kacha kya ipfo numa, kapaaya mambo tsa nguwo tsake, naalyo lienyi ndaaṟe iya ya samu ikamsia piu.
42008045	Yesu kahamba “Njiu anyipaaya lanye?” Wechikana-kana wose Petro na wodoe wakahamba “Mwaaria, nyi mamwingi-fu fuipeṟe-hetsana na iyo na ikutsindika.”
42008046	Yesu kahamba “Kuwode mndu amenjipaaya, kindo ngamanya nyi pfinya yanjiwuka.”
42008047	Mka ulya awona kechiidima imwowyapfo, kacha naho kechidedema, kamwolokia ndenyi, kamwongoya alya kiidi kya wandu wose kimarete kampaaya, na chando awechia oweṟe lulya.
42008048	Nao kambia “Wuyo nyi moo manoko, kiidikio kyapfo kyamekukiṟa; kuhendie kipuo.”
42008049	Alamhutsia ado, adi a ulya sa awuka kulya ko mwitoṟi ulya o mba yeterewia kawia Yairo, Mana ulya opfo amenenuka, ma kulawinyishe-se mlosha.
42008050	Yesu aicho ado kamhaluo “Ma ulaowuo, idikia tupu, na echichia-se.”
42008051	Kekishika kulya kanyi nalalekie mndu echiida nao kulya mba, shile nyi Petro na Yohane na Yakobo, na ndee o mana na mae.
42008052	Nawo nyi wawekeri ifihiṟa wechimkapya shilio wose. Nao kahamba “Mulafihiṟe, kipfa amepfapfo, nyi alee mado!”
42008053	Nawo wakamseka mnu, kipfa nyi waweichi nyi apfiie.
42008054	Nao kambada owoko, kamlaha kahamba, “Iyo mana, kure!”
42008055	Mumuyo foke fukambuya, kakure. Kawawasa nainengo shelya.
42008056	Wafee wake wakaṟihio. Nao katutuma walawie mndu ikyo kyawutika.
42009001	Kyasia kalaha walya ikumi na wawi na handu hamu, kawainenga pfinya na chila yeng'anyia waṟufu wawicho na ichiṟa ndaaṟe.
42009002	Kawaduma wahende yonguo wumangi wo Ruwa na ichiṟa wandu waluo.
42009003	Kawawia, “Ma mlawone mochiduo kindo kya njienyi, manya ndichi manya kikuchu, ma mkate ma mapesa; ma nguwo ya kawi.
42009004	Na orio mba momekuidia-ho, kaenyi-ho itane moweda iwuka-ho.
42009005	Walya wada walamwambia, mkashika iwuka mṟi-fo, kute-kutenyi kiluli-kyo ipfo madende, kundu kiwawiie kiṟingishio kyawo.”
42009006	Kyasia wakawewuka-ho, wakawa motengeta-tengeta mṟinyi ya wandu wechionguo mbonyi tsa sia, na ichiṟa wandu handu hoose.
42009007	Kyasia mangi Herode kawio shindo shilya shilewutika shoose, kapfiio nyi mdo; nyi kipfa wandu maata waweihamba, Yohane nyi aleṟutso ko wapfu.
42009008	Na maata wakahamba, nyi umu o wadedi wa Ruwa wa kacha akure.
42009009	Herode kahamba, “Yohane nyi njilemdumbuo mdo; aka ichu ngaicho shindo shake shii shido nyiu?” Kaanga moshiha mweke fowonana nao.
42009010	Wasu walya wamewuya, wakamwongoya shilya walewuta shoose. Kasheṟuka nawo kawaduo kundu ko kisekenyi, kulya mṟinyi fumlahe nyi Betisaida.
42009011	Na mamwingi fo wandu foikimanya, fukamwitung'ata. Kawaambya; kadeda nawo mbonyi tsa wumangi wo Ruwa, na sa wawelangi ichiṟo, kawewachiṟa.
42009012	Kushikye iila, walya ikumi na wawi wakacha na alyando ai wakambia “Kesama-ng'u-wo mamwingi-fu fo wandu, kundu wahende ipfo mṟinyi ya wambaṟa na madema, wawone handu helaa na shelya, kifa iya handu lui nyi nuka, nyi handu halai na wandu.”
42009013	Nao kawawia “Wainengenyi shelya nyo.” Nawo wakahamba, “Luwode kya ngoseṟa kota mkate itanu na shikunga shiwipfo, shile na luhende ihuṟa shelya wandu-wa walye wose.”
42009014	Kipfa sa wawei-pfo nyi waweshikie kufui na shiku shitanu womi tupu. Nao kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake “Damiṟenyi wandu njiotasa makumi hatanu-hata-nu.”
42009015	Wakawika wado, wakawadamiṟa woose.
42009016	Nao kaiṟa mkate iya itanu na makunga halya hawi, kaambuya huye ruwehu kashiidapfumya Ruwa, kashipeṟenguo-peṟenguo kainengia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, wakahawia wandu walya.
42009017	Wakalya wakaihuda wose, kukatolo mtsuhaṟo fo shipeṟengu shilya waletsihaṟa, ikaichuo shikunjia ikumi na shiwi.
42009018	Kukashika ili limu aweiiterewa Ruwa kyanya, walya wa kiloshionyi kyake waai hamu nao, kawawesa kahamba, “Mamwingi fo wandu nyi wekehamba inyi nyiwu?”
42009019	Nawo wakahaluo wakahamba, “Nyi wekehamba nyi Yohane mpatisi, na wengi wakahamba nyi Elia na wengi wakahamba nyi umu o wadedi walya wa Ruwa wa kacha akure.”
42009020	Nao kawawia, “A nyio nyi mokehamba inyi nyiu?” Petro kahaluo kahamba, “Nyi Kristo-chu o Ruwa.”
42009021	Nao katutuma, kawawawasa walawie wado mndu.
42009022	Kawehamba ke, “Nyi kiwaṟi Mana o mndu nahende iliso wukiwa wufoi na ileheka ko waitoṟi na ko wakohanyi wang'anyi na ko walaanyi wa shitabu, itane wambaaha, na ili lya kaṟaṟu naṟuke.”
42009023	Kawuya iwia woose, “Mndu akundi yawishana na inyi, nakukane amonyi, nakudikie msalaba foke nache injiosha-ng'u.
42009024	Kipfa ichu akundi iletsa moo foke nyi echifudetsa; na ichu echidetsa moo foke kipfa kyako inyi, nyi echifukiṟa.
42009025	A mndu nyi kiki echiira-ho kya wowina woke kokoya nyi awinya wuyana-wu wose wukawa woke, nao kakudetsia-ho amonyi kawichuṟa mrima foke?
42009026	Kipfa orio mowada sonu tsako inyi ang'u tsa shidedo shako, o ichu na Mana o mndu na echeewada sonu tsake ili echikaa nache na wusuṟi woke, nyiwo wo Nde na wo wamalaika wake waele.
42009027	Nyi kya lohi lohi ngamuwia, iwa wahoṟoki iya maata-ho, wechisonja opfu ma nta walawona wumangi wo Ruwa kuwookapfo.”
42009028	Kyasia kekihamba shidedo-sho, kukaida-ho mkonu cha nyanya, kaduo Petro na Yohane na Yakobo kado fumwunyi nahende iterewa Ruwa.
42009029	Kechiterewa, kyamu kyake kikailacha fana, na nguwo tsake tsikaila weṟu tsikakengemaa.
42009030	Naho kudi aiwa womi wawi waideda nao, nawo nyi Mose na Elia.
42009031	Wakawawonekia wai na kiṟumi wechideda nao kya mainukionyi hake, chando echihenda iinukia kulya Yerusalemu.
42009032	Na Petro na wodoe nyi wawewodo nyi mado. Waambuo, wakawona wusuṟi woke na womi walya wawi wahoṟoki nao.
42009033	Kyasia, lilyandi wawei isamana wahende, Petro kawia Yesu, “Alewo Mwaaria, iya nyi hecha, lukukaye-ho, luwike-ho mahema haṟaṟu, limu lyapfo, na limu lya Mose, na limu lya Elia!” Nao nalamanye kilya aideda.
42009034	Kechideda ado kukacha ipuchi likawawikia maṟishe; nawo wakaowuo lilyandi waleshingio nyi ipuchi.
42009035	Kukawuka ṟu kulya ipuchinyi likahamba, “Ichu nyio manoko msambuṟe mwadannyienyi!”
42009036	Ṟu lilya lyechihamba lido, Yesu kawono ai amonyii. Nawo mfiri iya wakatsia walaongoye mndu ma nta shilya walewona.
42009037	Kyasia ili lya ngama, wechisoka kulya fumvu-hu, kakumbuhana mamwingi fufoi.
42009038	Kulya mamwinginyi kuwekeri-pfo mndu, kakoṟoṟoma kahamba “Mlosha Mwaaria! Nyi ngakuterewa nosaṟie mana oko o womi, kipfa nyi ai kimumu kyako!
42009039	Keambuya, mumuyo mbicho nyi fokemososa, nao kawefihiṟa ngeṟu-yo, kawa momrakuo-rakuo katana adosa mahoṟe-hoṟe, fulakunde ida fulamiwira.
42009040	Ngaterewa iwo wa kiloshionyi kyapfo wafuwute, walaidime.”
42009041	Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Ee, nyo kishari kilawode iidikia kihendie makika! Aka-le-wo, nyi njekaa nanyo njishike indii, a njiwe moduana nanyo njishike indi? Keende mana-cho opfo na iya?”
42009042	Kekicha na alyando ai, mṟufu ulya kawemrakuo-rakuo na imrengetesha-rengetesha. Yesu katilima mṟufu ulya o ngafu, kachiṟa mana ulya, kamnengia ndee.
42009043	Wakaṟihio wose kipfa lya walewona mng'ano fo pfinya fo Ruwa. Nawo wose wechiṟihio wado kya shindo shilya ekewuta, naalyo kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake.
42009044	“Wikyenyi necha madedo-ha ipfo madunyi hanu! Mana o mndu nyiechikaa nahende dambiko mawokonyi ha wandu.”
42009045	Nawo walamanyie kidedo-kyo, kikawatambisa walatambahalukio, wakaowuo imbesa kya kidedo kyo.
42009046	Kyasia wakawado nyi mhio-hio ke nyiu echikaa nawe mnene-nene ngesa?
42009047	Na Yesu kamanya mhio-hio iya ipfo ngoonyi tsawo, kawada kimana kitutu, kakihoṟotsa oo mbaṟinyi yake.
42009048	Kawawia, “Mndu kaambia kimana-ki kui rina lyako, nyi inyi anjiambia; na monjiambia inyi, nyi aambia ichu anyiidumie; kipfa ichu ai mtutu onu kamunyiia, nyio sa ang'anyi.”
42009049	Yohane kahaluo kahamba, “Mlosha Mwaaria, nyi lulewona mndu aweifuna waṟufu wawicho kui rina lyapfo, naso lukamwima, cha kipfa alekeawishana naso.”
42009050	Yesu kambia, “Ma mlamwime; kipfa sa alalehanyi nanyo nyi awishanyi nanyo.”
42009051	Lilyandi mfiri yake ileetuka, kushikie mainukionyi hake nao kahaluka wohenda Yerusalemu.
42009052	Kaduma na wasu wakawemsongoya. Wakahenda, wakaida mṟinyi fo Wasamaria ke wamteseheṟie-pfo handu.
42009053	Nawo walakunde imwambia, kipfa lyandi awesumhantsie kyamu wohenda Yerusalemu.
42009054	Walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wo ko Yohane na Yakobo wekiwona wado wakahamba, “Mndumii, ukundi luhambe modo fuoloke kulya ruwehu fuwarumatse, chando na Elia ewewuta?”
42009055	Nao kainduka, kawadedia kahamba, “A mumuyo-fu mkeri nafo mlafuichi nyi fuda?
42009056	Mana o mndu chi alecha narumatse moo ya wandupfo, shile nyi iikiṟa.” Wakahenda mṟinyi fungi.
42009057	Wechikuhendia wado njiehu, mndu kambia, “nyi njechiawishana na iyo orio handu omekuhendaia.”
42009058	Na Yesu kambia, “Mapaara nyi hawode mruma, na shilehe shikawewada sungu, indi Mana o mndu awode handu helaṟa mdo fokefo.”
42009059	Kawia mndu ungi, “Nde, awishana na inyi.” Nao kahamba, “Kemembikia momu fohenda ikuṟikia wande.”
42009060	Yesu Kambia, “Leka, wapfu-wo waṟike wapfu wawo, indi iyo njoo nohende kochionguo wumangi wo Ruwa.”
42009061	Na ungi-se kahamba, “Mndumii, njechianga moawishana na iyo; indi kya kuwooka kemembikia momu njihende isamana na wandu wa kanyi koko.”
42009062	Na Yesu kambia, “Ma mndu amelesha owoko loke kawada kumbi lyedema na mbe, kawuya yambuya numa, nechikaa nasumhane ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwapfo.”
42010001	Iya numa-numa Mndumii kasambuṟa wasoṟo wengi makumi mfungade, kawaduma wawi wawi wahende imsongoya, wahende kundo ko mṟinyi koose, na handu hoose ekaa nache naho.
42010002	Kawawia, “Shesambuo nyi shifoi, indi weṟunda-ho wakanyia. Keterewenyi Mndumii menyi shesambuo nadume waṟundi ipfo kisambuyonyi kyake.
42010003	Kuhendyenyi! Ambuyenyi nyi ngamduma mui cha machoondi hai kiidi kya shisii.
42010004	Mulahende murie kichoṟe, manya kikuchu, ma shadu, manya mulaiṟikiṟe mndu njienyi.
42010005	Indi mkaida na mba ko mndu, kuwooka hambenyi, ‘Ofoṟo lukae na mba-i.’
42010006	Na kokoya ipfo kuipfo mana o ofoṟo ofoṟo lonu nyi lochimkaika; na kokooya alaipfo, nyi lochiwuya-se na konu.
42010007	Kyasia kaenyi mba iya mochikulia na ikunyooya isho wamwinenga. Kipfa moṟunda nyi asumuhanyie woṟunda woke. Ma mlaṟaheṟahe ihenda mba-i na ii.
42010008	Na orio mṟi moida napfo, wandu wafo wakamuambia, shelya wamuomoya lyenyi.
42010009	Chiṟenyi wandu-wo wakeri-pfo waluo, muwawie, ‘Wumangi wo Ruwa womchea hafui.’
42010010	Na orio mṟi moida, wandu wafo walamuambie, wukenyi-pfo muhende ipfo njienyi tsafo muhambe,
42010011	‘Ma kiluli-kyo kya ipfo mṟinyii fonu kikuwode kunu madende kodu, nyi lochimuangatsia, kyaindi manyienyi, wumangi wo Ruwa womcha hafui!’
42010012	Na inyi ngamuwia, Kilya kya Sodoma nyi kechianguo mfiri fulya kota ka mṟi-fo!”
42010013	“Ochia lopfo iyo Korasinyi, ochia lopfo iyo Betisaida; nokooe nyi kulya Tiro na Simon kulewutikia shindo-sho sha pfinya cha ishi shiwutikie kunu kiidi kyanu, nawo nyi wawechidumbuya lilya kacha, wakuṟike na shisaṟa sha wukiwa na idamia mafunyi.
42010014	Kyaindi kilya kya Tiro na Simon nyi kyechianguo ili mfiri fo mondu kota kyanu.
42010015	Na iyo Kapernaumu chi uweei mdose kokooya ruwehu? Nyi ochikaa noolotso noshike kulya kundu ko wapfu.
42010016	Ulya amwicho nyio nyi anjicho inyi, na ulya amleha nyo nyi anjileha inyi; na ichu anleha inyi, nyi aleha ulya anjidumie.”
42010017	Wasoṟo walya makumi mafungade wakawuya wai wachihiye, wakahamba, “Mndumii, kui rina lyapfo, waṟufu wawicho na waleluicho, nyi wai wawike shi yadu.”
42010018	Nao kawawia, “Nyi njilewona Satan kechioloka ruwehu cha mbawa.
42010019	Kyasia na inyi nyi njimwinengie pfinya yechumia njoka na shisuwa na ya orio pfinya yose ya mkituwa, ma kuipfo kindo ma kida ma kida kechimukapapfo!
42010020	Kya kake mulawone mochichihio ili mumuyo mbicho imbike shi yanu ikamuicho; indi chihionyi kya ili marina hanu hamaṟehie kulya ruwehu.”
42010021	Saa iya iya kakeseka kui Mumuyo Mwele kahamba; “Ngakuana Wande, ui Mndumii menyi ruwehu na oruka, kipfa ili mbonyi-tsi utsiṟikie iwo waṟango na iwo waṟamtsu, kowuya idambuya shikoku; ee-wo Wande, na kiweekuchihie kihendeke kido.”
42010022	Kaindukia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kahamba, “Shindo shose nyi njiledambikio nyi Wande, ma kuwode msa aichi ke Mana nyiupfo, shile na Wande, ma ke Wande nyiu, shila na Mana, na ichu Mana akundi imdambuya.”
42010023	Kaindukia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kyaanya kahamba; “Wungusu walya meso hawo hechiwona isho nyo muwonyi.
42010024	Cha kipfa nyi ngamuwia; Waikimbi wafoi na wamangi nyi wawelangie wawone ishi nyo muiambuya, manyia walashiwone, na iicho isho nyo mokeicho, manya walaicho.”
42010025	Adi a ulya mndu mlaanyi o mawawaso kakure kacha imhesha namtewe kahamba, “Alewo Mlosha Mwaaria. Nyi wuda njiechiwika ngesa njikuoṟie-wo moo fo mlungana?”
42010026	Nao kambia, “A ipfo wuwawasonyi nyi kii kiṟehie-pfo kida, nyi usomie-pfo kuda?”
42010027	Nao kahaluo kambia, “Kunda Ruwa Mndumii opfo na ngoo yapfo yose, na mrima fopfo fose, na pfinya yapfo yose na makusaṟo hapfo hose, nowekunda na odoo chando ukundi moo fopfo kumonyi.”
42010028	Yesu kambia, “Na ohaluo kisumhanyi, kewewuta kudo na ochikaa uwone moo.”
42010029	Nao kakunda ikutana mcha asumhanyi kawia Yesu, “A odoya oko nyiu?”
42010030	Yesu kamhaluo kahamba, “Nyi kuwekeri mndu alewuka Yerusalemu kesoka na Yeriko, katumukio nyi wasoki, wakamwatuo nguwo, wakamkapa, wakambika maṟishi, wakamda kinawo-nawo kyepfa na ikia.
42010031	Kyasia mkohanyi kasoka na njia iya-iya, alakusirie, kambona kaida kihadi wokusheṟuo.
42010032	Na mndu Mlewi nawo kashika-ho, kambona, kawekusheṟuo.
42010033	Kyasia mndu Msamaria arie njia yake, kashika alyando ai, kambona, kamwichio wukiwa.
42010034	Kasembelia kufui, kampfunga shifaṟe shilya na shidami, kaletsia-ho mafuda na mvinyio; kamwira kamdosia mhongo fo indo lilya lyake liwembawie, kamduo mbenyi ya wahenu kamwinduṟia-ho.
42010035	Na ili lya ngama ngamenyi kakure nahende, kawuta dinaṟi tsiwi kainengia ulya menyi mba kahamba, ‘Njikanya imbawaṟa, na kokooya owutase kindo kya ngoseṟa, na njekutaa njimonyi ili njewuya.’ ”
42010036	Yesu kambesa, “A wandu-wa waṟaṟu nyiu-ho awekeri odoe o ulya aletumukio nyi wasoki walya? Nyi ohamba kuda?”
42010037	Nao kahamba, “Nyi ulya alemsaṟia ko.” Yesu kambia; “Henda-ng'u nowute kudo.”
42010038	Nawo wechichumia wadi na njia, nao kaida na kundu ko mṟinyi. Mndu mka umu, rina lyake nyi Marita kamwambia, kamduo kulya kanyi koke.
42010039	Nao nyi awewode mana o mae elaho nyi Maria; nao kacha damia alya madendenyi ha Mndumii, kaadanyia madedo hake.
42010040	Marita kapfuṟukana imtomboshanyia shelya, numa kacha na hafui kahamba, “A nyi kulaikusaṟa-wo Mndumii, ili manowama anjidea shindo ngapfuṟukana njimonyi? Kembie-wo nawewika-ho owoko loke lutomboshane kimu.”
42010041	Mndumii kamhaluo kambia, “Marita, Marita, kyapfo nyi uwodo nyi makusaṟo ha shindo shifoi na ikuwinyisha kowekuwinyisha.
42010042	Indi, kindo kiwaṟi nyi kimu tupu; Maria o nyi asangie-ho kiteeno kii kicha, nakyo ekaanakisoko adipfo.”
42011001	Kukashika ili limu awei handu kechiterewa Ruwa, amhutsia, umu o walya wa kiloshionyi kyake kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, luloshe-wo iterewa Ruwa, chando na Yohane alewelosha walya wa kiloshionyi kyake.”
42011002	Nao kawawia, “Ili mochiterewa Ruwa hambenyii mudi, ‘Nde-yadu ui ipfo ruwehu, rina lyapfo litano lyele; wumangi wopfo wuche. Isho ukundi chando shekewutika kulya ruwehu, na kunu orukenyi shiwewa shido.’ ”
42011003	“Kando kadu kalufoi uluinenge inu.
42011004	Uludeye sile tsapfo luwode, chando naso lokedeea wasile wadu. Ma ulaluduo kitewionyi. Indi ulukiṟe shindo shiwicho.”
42011005	Kawawia, “Nyiu o konu awewode mbuya yake, kahenda koke kio madumbwo hawi kambia, ‘Mbuya yako, kenjiakuya mkate iṟaṟu.
42011006	Kipfa nyi mbuya yako acha koko wulalu awuka kyaṟo, ma njiwode kindo kemnengapfo.’
42011007	Na ulya o mba nahaluo nahambe, ‘Ma kulanjiwinyishe; na mongo fomemaa ishingo; na wana wako nyi wakeri na inyi kitaṟehu, nyi walee-ng'u; ma njiechiidima ikure njiihende ikuinengapfo.’
42011008	Nyi ngamuwia; Ma kada alakure nahende imnenga ili ai mbuya yake, na awechikure kipfa ili amterewa ado na kituumuo, alawode sonu, namnenge isho awuṟie shoose.”
42011009	“Na inyi nyi ngamuwia; Keterewenyi nyi mochiinengo; kepfulenyi nyi mochiwona. Kekapekapenyi mongo nyi mochipfunguyo.
42011010	Kipfa orio moterewa nyi echiinengo, na mopfula kawewona, na mokapakapa mongo kawepfunguyo.
42011011	Ang'u ipfo konu kuipfo ndee o mana, mana kamterewa mkate nao namnenge iho? Ang'u kamterewa ikunga, nao namnenge njoka handu ha ikunga?
42011012	Ang'u, kamtereewa ipoṟe lya nguku, nao namnenge lya kisuwa?
42011013	Kyasia-ng'u, kokooya nyo mui wawicho, nyi mokeidima iinenga shiwana shanu shiinengo shicha, aka chi kya ngoseṟa mnu Nde-anu o ipfo ruwehu echiengeṟa inenga Mumuyo Mwele iwo wamterewa?”
42011014	Yesu nyi awekeri ifuna mṟufu mbicho ai na pipi; mṟufu mbicho kekimbuka, mndu ulya ai pipi kadeda.
42011015	Na maata-ho wakahamba, “Kindo kyainenga kaidima ifuna waṟufu wawicho nyi Belsebuli, ichu ai mnene o waṟufu wawicho weososa wandu.”
42011016	Wengi-se wakamhesha wakundi nawaloṟe ofano luwukie ruwehu.
42011017	Nao kekimanya makusaṟo hawo kawawia, “Orio wumangi wupaṟakanyi kipfa kyawo wuwuenyi nyi wochihaluka mrapu, na mba nyi yechihoya mba ingi.
42011018	Aka kokoya Satan nao nyi apaṟakanyi amonyi, akashika wumangi woke nyi wochiwanga wuda? Kipfa ili muihamba ke nyi Belsebuli anjiwanza ngafuna waṟufu-wa wawicho wekeososa wandu.
42011019	Aka kokooya inyi nyi njiekefuna waṟufu wawicho na pfinya ya Belsebuli, aka wana wanu nyi wechiwafuna na pfinya ya wu? Kipfa ikyo wo nyi wechimuwinga.
42011020	Indi kokooya nyi kimnyo kya Ruwa njekefuna nakyo waṟufu wawicho, nyi wudo-ng'u wumangi wo Ruwa wucheye na konu.
42011021	Ili mndu mwapfinya akupfungie shisha kechiringa mmba yake, nzohoṟa tsake nyi tsekaa kipuo.
42011022	Kyaindi ili mwapfinya amng'anyie amchea kambinga, nyiechiduo shisha shake shose awekusirie nasho na isumba shilya amsoka.
42011023	Ichu alawadanyi na inyi anjikundipfo, na sa alasanyia na inyi nyi echiola ola.”
42011024	“Ili mumuyo fufanyi ngafu fombuka ko mndu fochipfula handu heonyonya halawode mṟinga, na ili fulechiwona nyi fokehamba ‘Wai, too, keleka njiwuye na kulya mba koko kundu ndewuka.’
42011025	Fushika-ho, fukakooya injiahie na ishelo ikaweshelo.
42011026	Nalyondo fochihenda iende mumuyo ingi mfungade ifuwichuye kundu iidime ikaa-pfo, na numa mawuto ha mndu ulya hefurumia hakawa mawicho kota halya ha kuwooka.”
42011027	Lilyandi aweihamba madedo-ha, mndu mka mliwe o masumbuhano halya kairia ṟu kambia, “Nanga wusu wulya wulekuduo na mawe̱ halya kulehaonga.”
42011028	Nao kahamba, “E-wo, kyaindi nanga sa wekeicho idedo lya Ruwa na ikaa wakakaa nalyo.”
42011029	Kyasia mamwingi fo wandu wafoi wakakuwumbia alyando aweei, naalyo kawooka ihamba “Kishari-ki nyi kishari kiwicho, kekepfula ofano luṟihishie; nakyo ma kechiwona ofanopfo, shile nyi ofano lulya lo Yona.
42011030	Chakipfa chando Yona alewa afano lo wandu wa Niniwe, na wudo na Mana o mndu echiwiia kishari-ki ofano.
42011031	Mangi mka o kulya ora lo-kosoka nyi echikaa nahoṟoke alya mondunyi hamu na wandu wa kishari-ki, nawawinge; kipfa nyiawecheye awuka alyando oruka lutsitsie, kacha yadanyia wuṟango wo Solomon, na kya ngoseṟa kota Solomon aiki.
42011032	Wandu walya wa Nyinyiwe nyi wechikaa wahoṟoke mondunyi hamu na kishari-ki, wakiwinge; kipfa mrima yawo iletau ikamanya mwongye fo Yona, na kya ngoseṟa kota Yona aiki!”
42011033	“Kuipfo msa echiatsa taa naiwike kimolyapfo ang'u naipfihisie kiponyipfo, kyaindi nyi echiiwika kidihu kehekia taa, kundu orio waida na ipfo mba wawone ngeela-yo.
42011034	Taa ya mbihu nyi riso. Riso-lyo lyapfo kokooya likeri licha, kyasia na mbihu fopfo fose nyi fuwode sa. Kyaindi ili lii-iwicho, na mbihu fopfo nyi fochiwa meema.
42011035	Kyasia, wang'u mokuṟisa mnu, kundu sa-yo ii ipfo kopfo ilawone yechiwa meema.
42011036	Kyasia, ili mbihu fopfo fose fukeri sa, fulawode ma ohawi lui na meema, naaho-ng'u nyi fochiwa sa rambatanyi, cha ili taa yakulimika na ngela yayo ii cha mbawa.”
42011037	Kechideda ado Mfarisayo umu kamterewa nahende ilya shelya kulya koke; kahenda-pfo, kadamia.
42011038	Lilyandi Mfarisayo ulya alewona alye alawooka isanja mawoko, kaṟihio.
42011039	Mndumii kambia, “Nyo Wafarisayo nyi mokesanja shirahu na shitela ipfo kya-nja, kyaindi ipfo kiidi kyanu nyi kuichuo wusoki na wuwicho.
42011040	Mui matondo, alae chi ichu mowuta sha kya-nja ekewuta na sha kya-mba?
42011041	Kyasia, shilya shii ipfo kya-mba, saṟienyi nasho wandu, na shose nyi shechimbiia sha osu.
42011042	Ochia nyi lonu nyo Wafarisayo, kipfa nyi mokedambika kya ikumi kii kya kyaana na shindunda na mboha, indi mkaidia wuchili wusumuhanyi na ikunda lya Ruwa, ishi nyi shimuwaṟi iwuta kulawode ida shilya.
42011043	Ochia nyi lonu nyo Wafarisayo, kipfa ili mukundi isambuṟa shidembo sha kusonguo ipfo masinagogenyi, mkawekunda na shiṟikiṟo sha ipfo tumo.
42011044	Ochia lonu, kipfa nyi mui cha shipfu shiwowie, na wandu wakawa moshichuma-chuma walaichi.”
42011045	Kyasia mndu umu o walaanyi wa wuwawaso kamhaluo kambia; “Mlosha Mwaria, kohamba kudo nyi olumina naso.”
42011046	Nao kahamba, “Nanyo walaanyi wa wuwawaso, ochia lonu, kipfa ili mokedika wandu maṟio halechiwa iira, nanyio ma mlekehapaaya ma na kimnyio kyanu kimu.
42011047	Ochia lonu, kipfo ili mokechopa shifu sha wadedi wa Ruwa, na wewawaaha nyi wande-yanu.
42011048	Nyi wudo moketetekia mawuto halya ha wandeyanu, mukawechihiṟo nyiho; kipfa nyiwo wawewawaahie, nanyo mkawachopia shipfu.
42011049	Nyi njechiwadumia waikimbi na wasu, na maata wawo nyi wechiwawaaha na wengi wawafune.
42011050	Kundu oshari-lu luwuwuyo samu tsa waikimbi wose tsipusukie kimatsika wuyana wuwiko shika inu.
42011051	Wokya samu ya Abeli itane samu ya Sakaria ulya alewoohio makiidi ha kitaṟa kilya kedasia na omombo. Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia; Wandu waoshari lu nyi wechiiweso!
42011052	Ochia lonu, nyo walanyi, wa wuwaso, kipfa muleduo opfunguo lo wulaany nanyo muwenyi mulaide napfo, na walya wawekundi iida napfo mkawakingia.”
42011053	Lilya mandi alewuka alyando awei, walaanyi wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakawooka imtengetia mnu na imbesa shifoi.
42011054	Wakamṟinjiawia wechimdeha madedo echihadeda, kundu wawone kemkumba.
42012001	Kiheri nakyo kukakuwumbia-ho mamwingi fo wandu shiku na shiku itane wachumana-chumana, nao kawooka ideda na wasu wake kuwooka kahamba, “Kuṟisenyi mso fotarang'asha fo Wafarisayo, nyifo wulembetseṟi.
42012002	Ma kuipfo kindo kii kiwoshie kilechishikuo ma kiṟike kilechimanyika numapfo.
42012003	Kyasia-ng'u, orio shindo shose muhambie memenyi nyi shechikaa shiichio senyi; na orio kindo muwewedie madunyi ipfo mba kimolya, nyi kekaa kihambio ipfo mbehu.”
42012004	“Kyaindi nyi ngamuwia nyo wakunde wako, mulawone mochiowuo iwo wewaha mbihu, wakammaa walaidime iwuta kya ngosera.
42012005	Kyaindi njimloṟe sa mochimwowuo; owuonyii ulya echiidima iwa̱ha, numa awewode-se pfinya yemkumba kulya modonyi, Ee, ichu nyiio ngamuwia; muowuonyii!
42012006	Alae chi wekekumba njoṟiu tsitanu wuhuru wo senti tsiwi? Indi manya lumu-ho luhadimikie ko Ruwapfo.
42012007	Kyaindi nyo ma njiui tsa ipfo mdonyi konu na tsinjitale tsoose. Mulaowuo, nyo nyi muidie shilehe shifoi kui wucha!”
42012008	“Orio monjiṟingishia oshangunyi lo wandu, na Mana o mndu nyi echikaa namṟingishie oshangunyi lo wamalaika wa Ruwa.
42012009	Kyaindi ichu monjikana wandunyi, nyi echikaa nakano alya sumuhana na wamalaika wa Ruwa.
42012010	Na orio sa echihamba idedo lyesutsa Mana o mndu nyi echihooṟio manyalepfo.
42012011	Nanyo, ili wechimuduo masinagogenyi na ko wachili na ko waitoṟi ma mulakuwinyishe ikusaṟa chando mochihaluo ang'u kindo mochikuashuo nakyo ang'u chando mochihamba.
42012012	Cha kipfa Mumuyo Mwele nyio echimlosha saa iya tichi kindo kiwaṟi ihambo.”
42012013	Kyasia, mndu umu o kulya mamwinginyi kambia, “Mlosha Mwaria, njikanyia iwia manowama luhawane kyooṟa kyadu.”
42012014	Nao kambia, “Nyiu anjiwikie njidumbuo mondu yanu ang'u mhawi mohawa shooṟa?”
42012015	Nao kawawia, “Ambuyenyi, mukuṟise lango tsa shindo ma tsida ma tsida, cha kipfa mfeeṟa fo mndu fochiidima imnenga natawulye moo na shindo-sho awodepfo.”
42012016	Kyasia kawawia ifanano kahamba, “Kuwekeri-pfo mndu msuṟi, madema hake hakaende mnu shelya.
42012017	Nao kakusaṟa-saṟa mrimenyi kahamba, ‘Nyi wuda njiechiwika, ili ndawode kundu njesambuya shelya sako?’
42012018	Kahamba, ‘Nyi wudi njiechiwika; nyi njechisanja shikumbi shako njiwike shing'anyie ishi; nyipfondo njiesanyia isho shicheye shoose na nzohoṟa tsako.
42012019	Numa njiwie mrima foko; iyo mrima foko nyi uwode shindo sha kisa shifoi shishikie maka ifoi; onyonya-ng'u, nokuliie na ikunyooya na ikeseka nokukesekie.’
42012020	Kyaindi Ruwa kambia, ‘Iyo nyi tondo, kio-ki nyi wechicha ishiha moo fopfo wafuduo, aka isho uteseheṟie nyi shechiwa sha-u?’
42012021	Nyi wudo kyechiwutikia ichu mokusanyia shindo indi alasuṟie ko Ruwa.”
42012022	Kawia na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Kwi kipfa-kyo nyi ngamuwia; Ma mulakusaṟe wukiwa wo kindo ketawulia moo ang'u kindo mochiṟaa ipfo mbihu yanu.
42012023	Kipfa moo nyi fung'anyie shelya, na mbihu fukaweng'anya maṟao.
42012024	Keambuyenyi-wo makuru, hekewaaya ma isambuopfo, na Ruwa nyi ekehalisa hakaihuda pacha, a nyio chi mung'anyiie malehe-ho kui wuhuru!
42012025	A wukoho wonu nyiu onu echiidima yengeṟia-ho ma kyoweṟe kimu ma cha dambo ma ili akusaṟa-saṟa?
42012026	Kyasia kokooya mlekeidima ma kindo kitung'tu kido, nyiki ili mokesaṟa wukiwa wo isho shingi?
42012027	Kuloshienyi ipfo shiwaṟonyi sha mademenyi, chando shilekekapa ndusu manyia yoka; indi nyi ngamuwia; manya Solomon ipfo wusuṟinyi woke wose, awei mṟike nguwo cha kimu kyashopfo.
42012028	Aka, kokooya Ruwa nyi wudo ekeṟika maṟa-ho ha mapatenyi hechikaa-ho inu, na ngama hakakumbo mawiwenyi, a chi ngoseṟa echimuṟika nyo muidikie kitutu?”
42012029	“Nanyo mamlatambahanyie kindo mochilya na kido mochinyo, ma mrima yanu ilaṟahisho nyisho. (
42012030	Cha kipfa isho nyisho wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu wa kunu wuyana weketambahanyia wose.) Kyaindi Ndeyanu na amuichi, kamanya ke shindo-sho nyi shimuwaṟi.
42012031	Kyaindi lalakienyi wumangi woke; na isho shingi nyi cha sha ngawo.”
42012032	“Ma mlawone mochiowuo nyo poo itutu; kipfa nyi kilechihia Ndeyanu imuinengia-nyio wumangi-wu.
42012033	Kumbenyi nzohoṟa tsanu muwone shesaṟia wakiwa. Kesungusienyi na shikuchu shilechikuo sheṟika kisa kilechisia ipfo ruwehu, nyiho handu kulechisembelio nyi manyinyi ma ilio nyi kase.
42012034	Chakipfa ipfondo kisa kyanu kikeri, nyipfondo na mrima yanu yechikaa.”
42012035	“Kaenyi-ng'u mukupfungie shitsi, na taa tsanu tsiweaka.
42012036	Nanyo muwenyi muwe cha wandu waiwedia mndumii owo nawuye walinyi, kundu ili echicha, kakapa mongo, waweṟuhuo faṟa.
42012037	Nanga wasoṟo walya mndumii owo echiwakooya walee dembo ili echicha; nkya lohi ngamuwia; nyi echikupfunga na iwadamiṟa shelyenyi, natengete kechiwahidia iwainenga shelya.
42012038	Kokoya acha isumuka lya kawi ang'u lya kaṟaṟu kawakooya wai wado, nanga wasoṟo-wo.
42012039	Manyenyi iki; kokooya menyi mba aweichi kiheri mwiwi echicha, nyi awechilaa dembo, ma awechilekia mba yake ifunjopfo.
42012040	Nanyo kaenyi mukuṟeheṟie, kipfa Mana o mndu nyi echicha saa mulakuṟeheṟie.”
42012041	Petro kambia, “Mndumii ifanano-li nyi oluwia so lu-wenyi tupu, a ngesa na wandu wengi wose?”
42012042	Mndumii kahamba, “A nyiu ichu mokalia kanyi awei mwidiki mṟango, mndumii oke awemhaluye mnene o waṟundi wake, nawe mowahawia kando ili kiheri kyashika?
42012043	Nanga msoṟo ulya mndmii oke kacha kamkooya kewuta ado!
42012044	Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, Nyi echimbika mwiṟichi o nzohoṟa tsake tsose.
42012045	Kyaindi msoṟo ulya kawuya ikusaṟa ipfo mrimenyi foke, mndumii oko nyi akeleo icha, kawooka ikapa wodoe wa kyumi na wa kika, na ilya na inyo na inango.
42012046	Ilindi mndumii oke echicha mkonu alakusirie, saa alaichi, nyi echimkapa ilyi iwicho na imsamza na wadeko.
42012047	Na msoṟo aichi shindo mndumii oke akundi, nalateseheṟe, ma nalawute kisumhanyi chando mndumii oke akundi, o nyi echikapo maṟiinga hafoi.
42012048	Na ichu alaweichi, kawuta sa shechimwendie ikapo, o nyiechikapo kyake kitutu. Orio amnenge shifoi, koke nyi shechiweso shifoi, ma ichu amwaṟie shifoi mnu, nyi wechimbesa sha ngoseṟa.”
42012049	“Nyi njilecha ikumba modo wuyana, fukamekekuakia, nki njikundi-se?
42012050	Kyaindi njiwode wupatiso woko njipatiso nawo, na chando wunjikoṟoma, na mtano wumarisike.
42012051	A nyi muhiye nyi njicheye yende ofoṟo wuyana? Nyi ngamuwia, Ote, indi nyi mpaṟakano.
42012052	Kipfa kimatsika wulalu, wandu watanu wai mba imu nyi walekanyi kui waṟaṟu nyi kui wawi, waṟaṟu waloyane na wawi na wawi waloyane na waṟaṟu.
42012053	Nyi wechiloyana ndeye na mana o nguwo yake, na mana na nde, mae na mana oke o kika, na mana o kika na mae, mamii na mali o mana.”
42012054	Kawewia na mamwingi fulya fo wandu, “Mkawona ipuchi liiu lido kulya kishingonyi, nyi mokehamba owinyi, mvuo nyi icha ii. Kyaindi nakyo na wudo.
42012055	Kukawiwita otanu locha kulya nuka nyi mokehamba nyi kochiwaa, kikawewa kido.
42012056	Nyo makulembetseṟe, ate fana ya ruwehu na ya oruka nyi mocheedima iitambahaluo; na nki ili mulaidima itambahaluo shiherishi sha wulalu?”
42012057	“A nyiki ili nyo muwenyi mlekechilia kindo kisumhanyi?
42012058	Kipfa ili murianyi na mokituwa mohenda ikukumba ko mchili, kiheri mui njienyi, kambiṟa imnenga woṟunda woke, kundu mulekane nao, nalawone kekuduo wokukuruo itane ko mangi, na mangi-chu nalakudambikie msoṟo mokusaṟikia, na mosaṟikiacho nakuwike kipfungonyi.
42012059	Nyi ngakuwia, ochikiwuka-pfopfo, na utane omaa itaa piu, kulechitsihaa ma senti imu.”
42013001	Naalyo shiheri shilya shilya kukacha wandu wakamwongoya kya Wagalilaya walya Pilato alesangana samu tsawo na shidaso shilya shawo.
42013002	Nao kahaluo kawawia, “Aka nyi mohamba ke Wagalilaya walya nyi wawei wanyamaṟi kota Wagalilaya wengi wose ili waletowokio nyi shindo-sho-ko?
42013003	Ote, nyi chi wudopfo; kyaindi nyo mukada muladumbuya, nyi mochirumara kotawo.
42013004	Ang'u, walya ikumi na nyanya wehoyo nyi kitaanga kilya kya Siloamu kikawawaaha, nyo nyi mokehamba ke nyi waweei wanyamaṟi wakaida wandu wa Yerusalemu ko?
42013005	Ngamuwia, chi wudopfo, kyaindi mukada muladumbuya, nyi wudo mochisaramaya mose.”
42013006	Kyasia kahamba ifanano-li, “nyii mndu awewode mkuyu fuwedooye demenyi lyake lya msabibu, kahenda, akundi ndunda tsafo nalatsiwone.
42013007	Kawia moringa mdemi fulya, ‘Ambuya, maaka-fu nyi fo kaṟaṟu, njechecha njikundi ndunda kunu mkuyu-hu njilawone; fusume, nofukuṟuo; njiki-ili fokelemeṟa teri, fukashingia handu wulya?’
42013008	Nao kahaluo kambia, ‘Hoi Mndumii, kefude-se makafumu-se njikefudemia njifualye na kyala.
42013009	Kulako fochiwika dunda numa; fulawike, nofumanye-ng'u.’ ”
42013010	Kyasia mkonu fumu kechilosha sinagogenyi yawo imu-ho.
42013011	Napfo kuwei-pfo mka awewodo nyi mumuyo foluo-luo msengetete, kawenjongya maka ikunyi na nyanya, nao ipfo mbihu awemlemeka, nalaidime-se ma ihoṟoka necha.
42013012	Yesu ambona, kamlaha na alya afui kambia, “Iyo mndu-mka; omeletsano na iluo-luo lyapfo!”
42013013	Kamhekia mawoko, naalyo kahoṟoka chiu, kaidapfuma Ruwa.
42013014	Kyaindi mnene ulya moambuya sinagoge kapfuluko nyashi, kipfa lya Yesu achiṟa mkonu fo Sabato, kawia wandu walya, “Nyi kuwode mfiri iṟandaṟu yeṟunda lanyie, iwaṟi iṟunda, kyasia, njonyi mkonu-yo muchiṟo, ma mlache mkonu fo Sabato!”
42013015	Mndumii kahaluo kahamba, “Nyo nyi wamakulembetseṟi; alae chi orio umu onu ekepfunguo pung'a yake ang'u nzoi yake ipfo mbangonyi mkonu fo sabato nahende iirutsa mṟinga?
42013016	A ichu ai mana o waka o Abrahamu Satana aweempfungie maka ikumi na nyanya, a nyikili kilawaṟi na ichu napfunguo mshe-fo ili mfiri fo sabato?”
42013017	Kekihamba ado, wakituwa walya wake wakasuka woose; na mamwingi fulya fo wandu foose fukachihiṟo nyi shindo shilya sha wusuṟi shiwekewuto nyio.
42013018	Yesu kahamba, “A wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wufananyi na kiki a njiwufananyishe na kiki.”
42013019	Nyi wufananyi na mbeu imu ya Haradali, mndu aleira kawiaya mdeminyi foke; ikado ikang'ana, ikawa mdi fung'anyi, shilehe sha shi ya ruwehu shikacha ikulaya ipfo maṟambe-hu hafo.
42013020	Kahamba-se lya kawi, “Nyi kindo kida njiechifananyia nakyo wumangi wo Ruwa?
42013021	Nyi wufananyi na mso foshimbiṟa mkate mndu-mka alefuira, kafuwika msonyi fo shitela shiṟaṟu, fukatana fotarang'aa fose piu.”
42013022	Nao kawa motengeta-tengeta mamṟinyi na njiotiṟiwenyi kechilosha arie njia yehenda Yerusalemu.
42013023	Mndu umu kambia, “Ale Mndumii, sa wechikiṟo nyi wangu ngesa?”
42013024	Kawawia, “Tambahanenyi ikuchuruwuya kichuminyi kii kisise; kipfa nyi ngamuwia; nyi kuipfo sa wechikunda ikuidia-pfo, indi walechiidima.
42013025	Kiheri menyi kanyi amaa ikure, amshinga na mongo, lyondo mochiwooka ihoṟoka oo nja na ikapa-kapa mongo mochihamba; ‘Hoi Mndumii, kelupfunguye-wo.’ Nao nyi echimuhaluo nahambe; ‘Njichi kundu muwukiepfo.’
42013026	Nalyondo mochiwooka ihamba, ‘Nyi luwekelya na inyo kuwonyi, na iyo kocheluloshia kulya mṟinyi yadu.’
42013027	Nao nyiechimmbia nyo, ‘Njimwichi kundu muwukiepfo; kurenyi iya koko nyo moose muwuteie sha wukika!’
42013028	Nlyondo kochikaa-ho yeṟeṟa na iimadya maheho ili mochiwona Abrahamu na Isaki na Yakobo na wadedi wa Ruwa wose wakeri ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa, nanyo muwenyi muwone ke nyi muwapfunyie nja.
42013029	Kochikaa kuche wandu wawuka kulya kya ora lo ngamenyi na kya ora lo kyukanyi, na kya ora lo huye na lo seri, wache damia shelyenyi sha wumangi wo Ruwa.
42013030	Ambuyenyi, nyi kuipfo wefurumia wechiwa wawooki; na wawooki wawe wefurumia.”
42013031	Oweṟe lulya tichi Wafarisayo maata wakacha na alyando aweei wakambia, “Wuka iya nohende, kipfa Herode nyi akundi ikuwaaha.”
42013032	Nao kawawia, “Hendenyi muwie ipaara-lyo; Ambuya nyi njiifuna mṟufu mbicho na ichiṟa njimarise ichiṟa wandu inu na ngama, na kilalau nyi njechikooya njimarisie.
42013033	Kyaindi inu na ngama na kilalau nyi kinjiiwaṟi itengeta, kipfa kilawaṟi mdedi o Ruwa nawoohio mbarinyi, shile na Yelusalemu.
42013034	Ee-Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, okewaaha wadedi wa Ruwa kowekumbia na iwo wawadume kopfo maho, nyi kafoi kada njiwekundi isanyia wana wapfo handu hamu chando nguku yekesanyia malea hayo makungonyi nanyo mulakunde!
42013035	Ambuyenyi mmba tsanu nyi tsechideo tsii njisame. Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, mochinjiwona-se manya-lepfo, shile na mkonu fulya mochihamba; kuichiko ichu acha kui rina lya Mndumii.”
42014001	Kyasia kaida na mba ya mnene umu o Wafarisayo ili lya mkonu fo sabato nalye-pfo shelya; nawo wakambikia ndeheka.
42014002	Napfo nyi kuwekeri-pfo mndu aluo, aambi mṟinga, ai alya sumuhana na oshangu loke.
42014003	Yesu kawesa walanyi walya wa wuwawaso na Wafarisayo walya kawawia, “Kuipfo mti kochiṟa mkonu fo sabato ang'u ote?”
42014004	Nawo wakatsia do. Nao kambada, kamchiṟa, kamsama.
42014005	Kawawesa, “Nyiiu onu pung'a yake ang'u punda yake ikaoloka ṟungunyi lya mṟinga, nade alaidosa-pfo oweṟe kudi ili kui mkonu fo sabato?”
42014006	Nawo walaidime imhaluo ma-nta.
42014007	Kyasia kawia walya wa-walahe ifanano, kipfa alewona chando walesambuṟa shidembo sha kusonguo, kawawia.
42014008	“Kowona olaho nyi mndu walinyi, manya kuladamie kidembo kya kusonguo, kipfa nyi kochiwona kochicha mndu amlahe awode kiṟumi kota iyo.
42014009	Na ulya amlahie mu-wawi nache nakuwie, Kesehia ichu; na iyo nyi ochiwooka iwado nyi rihima ili ochiwada kidembo kya numa ya woose.
42014010	Kyaindi kolaho, damia kidembo kya numa; kundu ulya akulahie ili echicha nakuwie, mbuya, tikira alya huye. Nlyondo ochiṟumisho nyi walya wadamie na iyo shelyenyi woose.
42014011	Chakipfa orio mokudosa amonyi nyi echisotso, na mokusotsa nyi echidoso.”
42014012	Kyasia kawuya iwia na ulya awemlahie, “Kowona osungusia choonga ya kyahuo ang'u ya kilaayo, manya kulalahie mbuya tsapfo ma wana wa mayo ma wodoo ma wamṟasa wasuṟi, wawone wechikulahia-se iyo kiwe matalana.
42014013	Indi kosungusia choonga ya mpfuho, lahia wakiwa na shileta na weriteka na shipfupfuṟe.
42014014	Na iyo, nanga iyo; kipfa wo walawode kekutaa. Kipfa kitaayonyi kyapfo nyi alya maṟutsyonyi ha wecha wasumuhanyi.”
42014015	Kyasia umu o walya wadamie nao shelyenyi aicho ado kambia, “Wungusu ichu ekaa nakuliie choonga ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
42014016	Na Yesu kambia, “Mndu umu alesungusia kilaayo king'anyi, kalaha wandu wafoi.
42014017	Kyasia, kiheri kya kilaayo kaduma msoṟo oke nahende-wia walya wawalahe, ‘Kenjonyi, kipfa shoose shamewa!’
42014018	Iwo woose wakawooka yoka mtambo na kamu yekuwuta-ho. Ulya o kuwooka kambia, ‘Nyi njilehuṟa mdemi foko, nyi kinjiwaṟi njihende ifuambuya, ngakuterewa kenjieeka iwuya.’
42014019	Na o kawi kahamba, ‘Nyi njilehuṟa mbe ikumi, nyi njihenda itsihesha kokooya na tsiichi ikuruo magari, nyi ngakuterewa kenjieeka iwuuya.’
42014020	Na o kaṟaṟu kahamba, ‘Nyi njiilealika mka, kwi kipfa ikyo, ngaidima ichapfo.’
42014021	Msoṟo ulya kawuya kaongoya mndumii oke ado. Naalyo menyi kanyi kapfuluko nyashi, kawia msoṟo ulya oke, ‘Kure owinyii faṟa nohende ipfo mtandarenyi na ipfo njienyi tsa mṟi noende wakiwa na shileta na wapfu-meso na wairiteka nowaitse na kunu.’
42014022	Msoṟo ulya kahamba, ‘Mndumii, kilya ulembawasa kyambutika; indi na kuwode-se mwaanya.’
42014023	Mndumii ulya kawia-se msoṟo ulya, ‘Kure nohende mtanunyi na mṟasenyi ya kuleshe, uwaitike wache na iya, kundu mba yako iichuo pacha.
42014024	Kipfa nyi ngamuwia; Wasoṟo walya waweei-walahe, ma umu owo, echisonja kelya kyakopfo!’ ”
42014025	Kyasia mamwingi fo wandu fufoi fukaawishana nao, nao kawaindukia kawawia.
42014026	“Mndu kacha na koko, alasuo ndee na mae na mka na wana wake na wanawamae wa kyumi na wa kika na mrima foke amonyi, echiidima iwa mloshe okopfo.
42014027	Orio sa ada alakudika msalaba foke fopfiaho nanjioshe-ng'u inyi, echiidima iwa mloshe okopfo.
42014028	Kipfa nyi mndu ada o konu ili akundi iwika imba ling'anyi, alechidamia, naitale kuwooka, kokooya awewode shelimarisa?
42014029	Kulawone kechiwooka ilisumia, na numa elechiidima ilimarisa, na wose wechiwona wawooke imtaluo.
42014030	Wahambe, ‘Mndu chu nyi alewooka isumia immba, nalakidime ilimarisa.’
42014031	Ang'u na kuipfo mangi echihenda shidenyi iwinzana na mangi ingi, alechiwooka idamia nadede chila, kokooya na ekaria imsembelia na wasoṟo wake shiku ikumi nawingane na ichu arie wasoṟo shiku makumi hawi?
42014032	Kawona alechimwidima, nyi echimdumia wasu ai kuleshe namterewe wawade ofoṟo.
42014033	Nyi wudo-ng'u na orio umu onu, echiidima iwa mloshe oko, alawooka ikuletsana na shilya awodepfo.”
42014034	“Chumwi nyi injicha, kyaindi kombona yamepuo nyiki kechiwiko-pfo ichie-se?
42014035	Ma yeewa-se iwiko mdemenyi ma kyalenyipfo, shile nyi ikumba ipfo nja wandu wachume-chume. Ichu awode madu heicho naicho.”
42015001	Wesana okamba na wanyiamari, iwa woose nyi wawekemchea, kundu wamwadanyie.
42015002	Wafarisayo na walaanyi wa shitabu wakarihinyika wakahamba; “Ichu nyi ekeambia wanyamaṟi na ilya kalya nawo.”
42015003	Nao kawawia ifano-li kahamba.
42015004	“Nyi mndu uhya o konu awode machoondi hake ihana, limu-ho lideke, alechida halya makumi kenda na kenda ipfo patenyi nahende iwatiṟa lilya lidekie itane aliwona?
42015005	Nao kameliwona, kalihekia makoso-hu hake amchihiye.
42015006	Kamecha na kanyi kalaha wambuya na wa mṟasa kawawia, ‘Kechihiyonyi-wo kimu na inyi, kipfa ngamewona ichoondi lilya lyako liwedekie.’
42015007	Ngamuwia, ‘Na wudo kochiwada sia kulya ruwehu kya mndu umu mnyamaṟi adumbuya kota kya wandu wecha makumi kenda na kenda walasaṟie idumbuya.’ ”
42015008	“Ang'u nyi mndu mka uhya awode shilingi tsake ikumi, ikadeka-ho imu, alechiatsa taa naahie ipfo mba, napfule wo-laalya itane aiwona?
42015009	Na kameiwona kalaha wambuya wake na waka wa mṟasa kawawia, ‘Ke chi-hionyi-wo hamu na inyi, kipfa ili ngamewona shilingi iya yako iwedekie.’
42015010	Na inyi nyi ngamuwia, ‘Na wudo kochiwa sia ko wamalaika wa Ruwa kya mndu umu mnyamaṟi adumbuya.’ ”
42015011	Kahamba-se, “Mndu awewode wana ake wa womi wawi.
42015012	Ulya manawo kahenda iwia ndee, ‘Wande, njinenga ohawi loko lo masaa lulya luwechinjisumhanyia.’ Nao kawahawia shindo shilya shake.
42015013	Kukaida mfiri sa mwangu, mana ulya lyamkeku kakungura shindo shilya shose kahenda-samia oruka lo kuleshe. Kundu kulya kaola-ola masaa halya hake kui shindo sha seṟeṟia, kawa mseṟeṟi.
42015014	Nao kekimaa yola-ola shoose, kukacha njaa ing'anyi kulya orukenyi. Nao kawooka iwuṟa shetawulya moo pichu.
42015015	Kahenda ikuwada na msuṟi umu o walya wa kulya orukenyi; nao kamduma mdemenyi foke, nahende ilisa nguwe.
42015016	Kalanga iihutsa ndeu yake na makanda hekelio nyi nguwe tsilya, indi nalainengo nyi mndu.
42015017	Kawuya itawuka mrima kahamba, ‘Nyi waikelei wenga wa wande oko wawode kando kawo kaingiki, na inyi njipfiia njaa kunu wai!
42015018	Njechikure njihende ko wande oko njimbie, Wande, njilenyamaṟia ruwehu na sumuhana na iyo.
42015019	Ma njikisumhanyi ilaho nyi mana opfo-sepfo; kekunjihaluye umu o waikelei wapfo.’ ”
42015020	Naalyo kakure kahenda kulya ko ndeye. Akeri handu sa haleshe alameshika, ndee kambona, kamwichio wukiwa, kakambia, “Kamchunguṟia nzingonyi, wakahekiana momu.
42015021	Mana kambia, ‘Wande, nyi njilenyamaṟa huye ruwehu na sumuhana na iyo; ma njikisumhanyi ilaho nyi manopfosepfo.’
42015022	Kyaindi ndeye kawia masinga hake, ‘Kambienyi owinyi muhende yende nguwo ya wuitoṟi iya ichihiye tsingi mumṟike, muwembika na rachi ipfo kimnyonyi kyake na shaadu ipfo madende.
42015023	Muhende yende na ihache lilya linoru mulishinjie,’ lulye, luchihio.
42015024	Kipfa mana-chu oko nyi awepfie kawuya iṟuka, nyi awedekie, kawuya iwoneka. Naho wakawooka ichihiyo.
42015025	Kyaindi mana ulya oke mbee nyi mdemenyi aweei; achepfo ashikie kufui na kanyi, kaicho shinanda na ṟingi.
42015026	Kalaha-ho ileu limu kaliwesa, ‘Nkiki ikyo?’
42015027	Nalyo likambia, ‘Nyi mananu acha na ndeyo kashinja ihache lilya linoru, kipfa kya ili awuya imbona ai na oru.’
42015028	Nao kaichuo nyashi, nalakunde ma iida napfo. Kyasia ndee kaida na ipfo nja kamlemba-lemba.
42015029	Nao kahaluo, kawia ndee, ‘Keambuya; kiṟa mbeikuṟundia maka ifoi ido, na inyi njilemetehiye ma wuwawaso wopfopfo, ma iyo kulemennenge wudahina wo wuoṟo njihende ma ikuchihiṟanyia na wambuya wakopfo.
42015030	Kyaindi wulalu omekewona mana-chu opfo ache ichu aolye masaa hapfo ai na shisaya na weṟuhuyo, ate o nyi omshinjia ihache lilya linoru!’
42015031	Nao kambia, ‘Manoko, iyo nyi ukeri na inyi shiheri shoose, na ishi njiwode na shapfo shoose.
42015032	Kyaindi nyi kiwewaṟi ichihio na ikeseka, kyamba mana-cho oko nyi awepfiie kawuya iṟuka, nyi awedekie kawuya iwoneka.’ ”
42016001	Kyasia kawia na walya wa kiloshionyi kyake; “Kuwekeri-pfo mndu msuṟi awewode mwiṟichi oke momringia kanyi, o kakumbo koke ke nyi ekeola-ola masaa hake.
42016002	Kamlaha kambia, ‘Nyi kiki iki ngaicho kyapfo; kenjiloṟa itala lya shindo sha wuiṟichi wopfo, kipfa nyi njiwonyii ochiidima-se injihidiapfo.’
42016003	Mhidi ulya kahia ipfo mrimenyi koke, ‘Nyi wuda njechiwika ngesa, ili mndumii oko anjifuna wuhidinyi? Idema njechiidimapfo, na yeṟeṟa nyi njechiwado nyi sonu tseeṟeṟa.
42016004	Hoo! Ngamemanyia chando njechiwika, kundu ili njechiwuto wuhidinyi wanjiambie, wanjiitse na mba kowo.’
42016005	Kyasia kalaha wasile wa mndumii oke wose umu-umu kawia ulya o kuwooka, ‘Nyi sile ya kiki uwode ya mndumii?’
42016006	Nao kahamba, ‘Nyi matanaki ihana ha mafuda.’ Nao kambia, ‘Ambia baruo yapfo nodamie, noṟehie-ho owinyi fara makumi hatanu,’
42016007	Kawia na ulya ungi, ‘A iyo nyikiki uwode?’ Nao kahamba, ‘Nyi mkunja ihana ya ngano.’ Nao kambia, ‘Nga baruo yapfo noṟehiye-ho makumi nyanya.’
42016008	Kyasia mndumii ulya kaṟumisha mwiṟichi ulya awenyamaṟie, kipfa lilya alewuta ado na wuṟango; kipfa wana wa wuyana-wu wo wulalu nyi wa-waṟango kota wana wa sa ipfo sumuhana na kishari kyawo wawenyi.”
42016009	Nyi wudo-ng'u na inyi ngamuwia, “Kehenda kuwadienyi mbuya na shindo sha mamona ya wuwicho, kundu ili shechishika isenekia, wamwambie, wamdamiṟe alyando kochikao mlungana mandi-ho masaa hanu hechimdekia.
42016010	Ichu ai mhendeli o shindo shangu, nechiwa na mhendeli o shindo shifoi.
42016011	Na ichu atahacha kindo sa kitutu, nechiwa motahacha na kindo king'anyi?
42016012	Akashika mkada mlaiwahendeli kya mamona ya wuwicho, ichu echimasia sha lohi nyiiu?
42016013	Nanyo mulamewa wahendeli kya shindo sha wengi, aka-shika ichu echimwinenga shii shanu nyiu.”
42016014	Kwipfo mṟundi echidima ipfuṟukanyia womi wawipfo. Kipfa nyi wudi kechihendeka, “Nyi echisuo ichu o kuwooka, nakunde ulya o kawi, ang'u nakuwade na ichu o kuwoka, naisaluche ichu o kawi; Mochiima iṟundia iwa wawi; Ruwa na Mamonapfo.
42016015	Kyasia Wafarisayo walya waicho wado nawo nyiwe-wandu wawelangie mnu mapesa, wakakutsinyia kyake. Nao kawawia, ‘Nyo nyi mokekuhaluo wecha wasumhanyi oshangunyi lo wandu muwenyi, kyaindi Ruwa nyio aichi ngoo tsanu; cha-kipfa wutumbe wo ki-wandu nyi kindo kisuikie ko Ruwa.’
42016016	Mbonyi tsa wuwawaso na tsa waikimbi nyi tsileedio itane Yohane acha, na kiwookya-lyo nyi kokeongoyo mbonyi njicha tsa wumangi wo Ruwa, na orio mndu nyiekepario-pfo na pfinya.
42016017	Nyi kyaangu ruwehu na sanga shisaramaye, kota kimṟeho kimu kya wuwawaso kechideka.
42016018	Orio mndu alekana na mka oke kaalika ungi nyiaṟuhuya; na ichu echialika ulya alekana na mii, nyiaṟuhuya.”
42016019	“Kuwekeri mndu msuṟi awekeṟaa nguwo tsa king'aring'ari na tsa kimamile tsa owiṟo pang'a, kawa mokukesekia na shiweṟe mkonu yose.
42016020	Na mndu mkiwa, rina lyake nyi Lasaro awe-mkumbe alya mongo koke, nao nyi awewodo nyi matiinga,
42016021	kalanga ikuihutsio nyi shipeṟengu-sho shechioloka ipfo mese-hu ya mruṟi ulya. Kyaindi na shite itane shacha shikamkomba-komba matiiga halya.
42016022	Kukashika, mkiwa ulya kapfa, kahenda-dao nyi wamalaika kulya nndenyi tsa Abrahamu. Na msuṟi ulya kawepfa, kaṟiko.
42016023	Msuṟi ulya akeri kulya kundu ko wapfu mawukiwenyi, kairia meso kawona Abrahamu kuleshe, na Lasaro ai ipfo nndenyi tsake.
42016024	Kalesha ṟu, kamlaha kahamba, ‘Hoi wande oko Abrahamu! Kenjisaṟia-wo wukiwa, nokeduma Lasaro nakape kimdo kya kimnyo kyake mṟingenyi nache injioloṟa olimi-lu; kipfa ili njiilya mnu wukiwa kunu ngumienyi ya modo-fu.’ ”
42016025	Abrahamu kahamba, “Manoko, kekumbuo-wo chando iyo kuwei-yambia mecha hapfo lilya mandi uwei na moo orukenyi, na Lasaro kyake kaambia mawawio tupu na wuale, nao wulalu iya nyi aiwihiṟyo moo na iyo kowawiṟo.
42016026	Ma koda isho shoose, kunu kiidi kyadu nanyo nyi kung'alawukie-ho pichi lya ngolokio ing'anyi, kundu iwo wakundi yambadia ipfo konu walaidime, na iwo wa konu walaidime yambadia kodu.
42016027	Nao kahamba, ‘Kyakusiia, indi ngakuterewa, ndeyako, nokekumdumia kulya kanyi ko wande.
42016028	Kipfa nyi njiwode wanawawama wako watanu, nakehenda iwakekedia, kundu wo walawone wechicha-se na kundo-ku ko mawukiwa.’
42016029	Abrahamu kahamba, ‘Na wawode Mose na waikimbi wa Ruwa, leka wawaadanyie-wo.’
42016030	Nao kahamba, ‘Ote-wo, Abrahamu oko, ndeako, indi kokooya wacheyo nyi mndu o kunu ko wapfu, nalyondi wechidumbuya mrimenyi yawo.’
42016031	Abrahamu kambia, ‘Wakamda walaadanyia Mose na waikimbi wa Ruwa, na nokoe mndu awechiṟuka awuka ko wapfu, wawechiidikishopfo.’ ”
42017001	Kyasia Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Na kukaki kochida kulacha madekeshopfo, indi ochia lo ulya echihaende!
42017002	Nanga kapfungio iho lya iseo ipfo tsingonyi kapfuluyo ipalipalinyi, nlyondo kiwechichia kota ili adekesha umu o watutu.
42017003	Kuṟisenyi Kokoya manomayo akudekio, kemdedie! Kakutochia, mhooṟie.
42017004	Na kakudekio ka-mfungade mkonu fumu, nao kawewuya icha na-kopfo ka -mfungade ihamba, ngamedumbuya, kewemhooṟie.”
42017005	Wasu walya wakambia, “Mndumii, luengeṟie pfinya yeidikia Ruwa.”
42017006	Mndumii kahamba, “Kokoya mbewode iidikia ma litutu cha mbeu ya haradali, na muwechiwia mkuyu fu, kuṟuka iya, nokudonge ipalipalinyi!” Nafo nyi fuwechimwidikia.
42017007	“Indi nyiiu onu awode isinga lyake lyedema na mtambo fodema, ang'u molisa, nao kiheri acha awuka demenyi nambie, Kenjo owinyi nodamie?
42017008	Chi echimbia, ‘Njiomoya kando njilye! Kupfunge nonjihidie mṟasa njimae ilya na inyo; ngammaa ilya, nokulieng'u iyo kumonyi na inyo noweku nyooya.
42017009	Alae nyi awechiwia isinga lilya haika kipfa lyaṟunda kilya lyawawasio?
42017010	Kyasia, nanyo na wudo, mukamemarisa iwuta shoose mui wawawasie hambenyi, So nyi masinga halechiwa; shilya luwutie nyi shilya shiluwaṟi iwuta tupu.’ ”
42017011	Naalyo kukashika, lilya mandi awerie njia yehenda Yerusalemu, kaida kiidi kya Samaria na Galilaya.
42017012	Kekiida na kimṟinyi kimu, naaho wasoṟo ikumi mawawodo nyi saka wakamkumbuhana; wakahoṟoka aleshe.
42017013	Wakairia ṟu wakahamba, “Yesu! Mwaria! Kelusaṟie wukiwa!”
42017014	Nao kekiwawona kawawia, “Kuhendyenyi mukuloṟe kulya ko wakohanyi.” Wadi wechihenda-pfo wakaheṟemka.
42017015	Na umu owo-ho awona ke amchia, kawuya kaichimbira Ruwa na ṟu ling'anyi.
42017016	Kacha, kamhoya na kyamu alya madendenyi hake kamwana. Nao nyi-we o Samaria.
42017017	Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Walya waheṟemka chi ikumi; a walya kenda nyiku waya?
42017018	Kowoneka-se-ho ma sa wawuya wache iichika Ruwa shile na mhenu-chu tupu?”
42017019	Kambia, “Kure nokuhendie kanyi, nyi iidikia lyapfo lyakukiṟa.”
42017020	Lilyandi aleweso nyi Wafarisayo ke wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wochicha indi, kawahaluo kahamba, “Wumangi wo Ruwa wochicha wochikuloṟa-loṟa na wandupfo.
42017021	Manya wechihamba, aiwu iya, ang'u awulya kulyapfo; kipfa wumangi wo Ruwa nyi ipfo kidi kyanu wui!”
42017022	Kyasia, kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake, “Nyi kochikaa kuche shiheri, nyilyondo mochilanga iwona mfiri fumu fo Mana o mndu, manya mulechifuwona.
42017023	Na sa wechimuwia, Ambuyenyi iya, ambuyenyi ipfo; ma mlakure handu mui muhendepfo.
42017024	Kipfa chando mbawa yekewaṟuka ikawooka ora-lu likakooya ora lungi, ikalimikia shoose shii kunu shi ya ruwehu, nyi wudo na kya Mana o mndu kechiwa mkonu-fo foke echicha nafo.
42017025	Kyaindi kuwooka nyi kimbaṟi ituuro mnu na ileho nyi wandu wa oshari-lu.
42017026	Na chando kulewa shiheri shilya sha Noe, na wudo kochikaa kuwe mkonu iya ya Mana o mndu.
42017027	Nyi wawei ilya, wakawenyio, wakaalika, wakaaliko, itane mkonu fulya Noe aleida na kulya ngalawenyi, kukacha mra fukawakombetsa wose piu piu.
42017028	Nyi wudo shiwefananyi na kiheri kya Loti, nyi waweilya, wakawenyo, wakawehuṟa, wakawekumba, wakawewaaya, wakawewika mba.
42017029	Kyaindi mkonu Loti alewuto kulya sodoma, kukaoloka modo fo kibiriti-biriti ipfo ruwehu fukawarumatsa woose piu.
42017030	Na wudo-ng' tichi kochikaa kuwe mkonu fulya Mana o mndu echitarambuyo.
