42017031	Mkonu fulya, ma mndu ai kai na masaa hake hai wanda, ma nalawone kesoka ihaira. Na wudo namndu ai mdemenyi, ma nalawuuye shii numa.
42017032	Kekumbuonyi-wo mka o Loti!
42017033	Orio mndu akundi ineneka mrima foke, nyi echifudetsa, na mndu alakundi ifunenekia, nyi echifuinutsia kipuo wyoo.
42017034	Ngamuwia, kio kilya kilya, wandu wawi walee kitaṟehu kimu, umu-ho nyi echiiroho, na icho ungi nadeoho.
42017035	Na waka wawi waisea handu hamu, umuho nyi echiiroho, na ungi nadeo-ho. [
42017036	Wawi wechikooyo wai demehu, umu-ho nairoho, na odoe nadeo-ho.]”
42017037	Wakahaluo wakambia, “Nyiku Mndumii.” Nao kawawia, “Handu hai mnying'a, nyi'hondo mtonyi (mosuṟa) yekekuwumbia.”
42018001	Kawawia ifano lyehamba, n'kimuwaṟi iterewa kitsitsi mlechilemo.
42018002	Kahamba, “Kundu ko mṟinyi kuweepfo mchili modumbuo mondu, alaweowoye Ruwa ma ikusaṟa kya mndu ma uhya.
42018003	Kuweepfo-se na mka mkusu kulya mṟinyi, kawa mohenda-henda ko mchili ulya modumbuo mondu kahamba, ‘Dumbuo-wo mondu foko na mosile chu oko!’
42018004	Nao nalakunde, kambetesa haleshe. Numa kawuya ihamba ipfo mrimenyi koke, ‘Ngakaa njilaowoye Ruwa, na ikusaṟa kya mndu ma uhya.
42018005	Kyaindi ili mka-chu anjichungia-chungia adi kitsitsi, na njimweke idumbuo mondu foke, kundu nalawone kefurumia icha injiraha-raha kyamu.’ ”
42018006	Mndumii kahamba, “Keadanyenyi mchili-chu modumbuo mondu kilasumhanyi chando ahamba.
42018007	Aka Ruwa awechidumbuo mondu fo iwo awasambuṟie, iwo wekemfuhia mfiri na kio? A ngesa nyi echiwawetesa?
42018008	Nyi ngamuwia, nyi echikambiṟa idumbuo mondu fowo owinyi. Nyi mohamba muda? Ili Mana o mndu echicha na echiwona ofoṟo orukenyi?”
42018009	Kuweepfo wandu wawekusaṟye kyawo wawenyi ke nyi wai wecha wasumuhanyi, wakapiṟa wengi; kawawia ifano-li,
42018010	“Wandu wawi waledo na hekalunyi iterewa Ruwa; umu nyi Mfarisayo, na o kawi nyi mosana okamba.
42018011	Mfarisayo ulya kahoṟoka, katerewa mrimenyi koke adi, ‘Ruwa ngakuichika, kipfa ili njilafananyi na wandu wengi, wasoki, wa ukika, waṟuhui, ma ndafananyi na msanyii-cho o okamba.
42018012	Mfungade fumu nyi njekekuotoya kawi, na shilya njiwode shoose, ngawedambika kenga kya ikumi.’
42018013	Kyaindi msanyi ulya o okamba kahoṟoka haleshe, nalakarie ma iiiia meso huye ruwehu, indi kakukapa kipeeta kahamba, ‘Hoi Ruwa, kenjisaṟia-wo inyi mokudekio!’
42018014	Kyasia nyi ngamuwia, ‘Ichu nyi alesoka na kanyi koke amsumuhantse kota ulya.’ Chakipfa orio mokung'anyisha amonyi, nyi echinyiiṟo, na mokunyiiṟa amonyi, nyi eching'anyisho.”
42018015	Wakamwendie na shiwana, kundu nashipaaye. Walya wa kiloshionyi wekiwawona, wakawatukia.
42018016	Yesu kawalaha wache na koke kahamba, “Kelekenyi shiwana shikucheye na koko, ma mulashiime; cha kipfa wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wo iwo wai chasho.
42018017	Nyi kya lohi ngamuwia, ‘Mndu alaambia wumangi wo Ruwa ai cha mana nechishika-pfopfo.’ ”
42018018	Kuwei-pfo mndu ang'anyi, kambesa kahamba, “Mlosha mcha, ngawika njida, njioṟe moo fo mlungana?”
42018019	Yesu kambia, “Nyikipfa-ki ili onyiilaha Mcha? Kuipfo mchapfo, shile Ruwa amonyi.
42018020	Mawawaso na uhaichi ke, ‘Ulaṟuhuye; Ulawaahe; Ulaiwe; Ulairie sha wongo; India ndeyo na mayo.’ ”
42018021	Nao kahamba, “Isho shose nyi njishiwode wookia wututu woko.”
42018022	Yesu aicho ado kambia, “Utsiheṟe kindo kimu henda kumba isho uwode shose nohawie wakiwa, nlyondi ochiwada kisa kulya ruwehu. Komemarisa, nocheng'u nonjioshe.”
42018023	Kekiicho ado kasokio mnu nyi fowa kakuinadia mnu, kipfa nyi awesuṟie mnu.
42018024	Yesu kekimbona ado kahamba, “Ambuyenyi chando kiumie wasuṟi ida na wumanginyi wo Ruwa!
42018025	Kipfa nyi kyangu ngamia iide ṟochenyi lya sindanu kota mndu msuṟi iida wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
42018026	Walya waleicho wakahamba, “Aka nyi mndu ada echikiṟo?”
42018027	kahamba, “Isho shilechiidimika ko wandu, ko Ruwa nyi shechiidimika.”
42018028	Petro kahamba, “Ambuya, so nyi luleda shindo shadu shoose, lukakuosha.”
42018029	Yesu kawawia, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, Kuwode mndu aleda mba ang'u mka, ang'u wanawamae, ang'u iwo wamfeye, ang'u wana, kipfa kya wumangi wo Ruwa.
42018030	Aleekaa nawihiṟio sha ngeria kafoi shiheri-shi shekaa iya wanda, na shiheri shechicha, nasumbo moo fo mlungana.”
42018031	Kyasia kasanza walya ikumi na wawi handu hamu kawawia; “Ambuyenyi, nyi lukeri-ng'u ido luhende kulya Yerusalemu, na shilya shii shiṟehie kya Mana o mndu nyi waikimbi wa Ruwa, nyi shechihoya shoose.
42018032	Kipfa nyi echihenda idambikio wandu wawicho, wamwisaluche, na imruma, na imwiselia mnyeri.
42018033	Wawemkapa na ngowa tsiwode msha, numa wambaahe. Nao mfiri fo kaṟaṟu nawuye iṟuka.”
42018034	Na iki walakimanyie ma kitung'tu. Idedo-lyo likawaṟikikia, walalimanye kimaduma, walamanye kilya lyahamba.
42018035	Lilya aweshikie kufui na Yeriko, adi a ichu mndu kipfupfuṟe adamie mbarinyi ya njia kechiterewa shiinengo.
42018036	Aicho tendemra ya wandu yechiida, kawesa, nkyo kiki ikyo?
42018037	Wakamwongoya ke nyi Yesu o Nasareti aiida.
42018038	Nao kakoṟoṟoma ilaha kahamba, “Hoi Yesu, mana o Dawidi, njisaṟia-wo wukiwa.”
42018039	Walya wawesonguo wakamkanga natsie. Kyaindi o kaengeṟa ilaha, “O mana o Dawidi, njisaṟiawo wukiwa mmbe!”
42018040	Yesu katirima, kawawasa naendo na alyando ai. Kekishika-ho, kambesa.
42018041	“Nyi kiki ukundi njikuwutie?” Nao kahamba “Nyi njiwuye yambuo-se Mndumii.”
42018042	Yesu kahamba, “Ambuo-se; nyi iidikia lyapfo lyakukiṟa.”
42018043	Naalyo kaambuo, kahenda nao kechiidapfuma Ruwa. Na wandu walya walewona, wakang'anyiisha Ruwa.
42019001	Kekishika kulya Yeriko, kaida na kulya mṟinyi.
42019002	Napfo kuwekeri-pfo mndu awelaho rina lyake nyi Sakayo, aweei mnene o wasanyi wa okamba, awewei msuṟi.
42019003	Kalanga iwona Yesu namanye chando ai, nalaidime; kipfa kya mamwingi fo wandu, nao nyi awe mfui wumba.
42019004	Kahenda kusonguo kechidicha, kado mkuyu-hu kundu nambone, kipfa njia nyi iweidie handu halya.
42019005	Yesu kekishika-ho, kaambuya huye, kambona, kambia, “Sakayo, soko-pfo owinyi faṟa; kipfa na ngaki, inu na njihende itsinda kulya mba kopfo.”
42019006	Nao kasoka-pfo owinyi faṟa, kamduo kanyi kokye amchihiye.
42019007	Na walya walewona, wakamnunuwia wakahamba “Nyi aida na ko mndu mnyamaṟi katsinda-pfo.”
42019008	Sakayo kahoṟoka, kawia Mndumii, “Ambuya Mndumii kenga kya masaa hako njiwode nyi njechiinenga wakiwa, na kokooya ndemlemba mndu kindo, nyi njechimbihiṟia kya ngeria kaana.”
42019009	Yesu kambia, “Kunu mmba komewoneka okiio kipfa nao amonyi nyi awei mana o Abrahamu.
42019010	Kipfa Mana o mndu nyi alecha ipfula kilya kidekie, nakikiṟe.”
42019011	Wandu wekiicho isho, nao kaengeṟa ideda kechiloṟa mfano, kipfa nyi awei afui na Yerusalemu, nawo wakakusaṟa kulako wumangi wo Ruwa nyi wochikuloṟa oweṟe lulya.
42019012	Kahamba, “Mndu o wumangi alehenda oruka lo kuleshe nawade-pfo wumangi, numa nawuye.
42019013	Kalaha wasoṟo wake ikumi, kawainengia mahana ikumi ha shilingi, kawawia, ‘Kape-kapenyi natso mbucha njitane ngawuya.’
42019014	Na wandu wa kulya mṟinyi nyi wawemsuo, wakaduma wasu ipfo numa yake wambie, ‘Lukundi ichu naluitoṟie-sopfo.’
42019015	Nao kekiidima iwada wumangi wulya, kawuya, kahamba wasoṟo walya alewainengia pesa tsilya, walaho wache na koke, kundu namanye sa aendie kindo kulya mbuchenyi.
42019016	Kukacha ulya o kuwooka kahamba, ‘Mndumii, shilingi tsilya tsapfo ihana tsileṟimiṟa tsingi mahana ikumi.’
42019017	Nao kambia, ‘Hoona! Iyo msoṟo mcha, kipfa ui mṟeheṟi o shindo shitutu, wa-ng'u mwitoṟi o mṟi ikumi.’
42019018	Kukacha o kawi, kahamba, ‘Mndumii, shilingi tsapfo ihana tsileende tsingi mahana hatanu.’
42019019	Kawewia na ichu, ‘Na iyo kewewa-ng'u mwitoṟi o mṟi itanu.’ ”
42019020	“Kukacha ungi owo kahamba, ‘Mndumii, ambuya, aitsi shilingi tsapfo ihana. Nyi njiwetsipfungie ipfo kidaminyi kya mbiṟuko.
42019021	Kipfa njikuowoye ili ukeri mndu mkeremi, nyiokekuiria kindo kulaleṟie-ho, kowesambuo sa kulawaaye.’
42019022	Nao kambia, ‘Na madedo ha dumbu lyapfo nyihechikuwonyia naho owingo, iyo msoṟo mbicho. Nyi uweichi ke nyi njii mndu mkeremi, njekekuiria kindo njilaleṟie na isambuo sa njilawaaye.
42019023	Aka nyikili kulaleduo pesa tsako ko menyi mokumba shindo? Na ili njiwechiwuya nyi njiwechitsiambia na tsa ngeria.’
42019024	Kawia walya wawe-ho, ‘Msokenyi shilingi-tso ihana, mwinengie icho awode mahana ikumi.’
42019025	Wakambia, ‘Mndumii, nyi awode mahana ikumi!’
42019026	‘Na inyi nyi ngamuwia, Orio sa awode echiengeṟa inengo, na ulya alawode, nyi echisoko na kilya awode.
42019027	Na wakituwa walya wako, walakundi njiwaitoṟie, waendenyi na iya muwarandwo-randwo njiwonyi!’ ”
42019028	Kekimaa ihamba ado, kaengeṟa iwada njia yedo na Yerusalemu.
42019029	Kekishika hafui na Betifage na Betanyia, alya kufui na fumwu lya mashidi ha msinepfu, naalyo kaduma wasu wake wawi, kawawia;
42019030	“Hendenyi kulya mṟinyi fui mambatsana nanyo. Mkameida napfo nyi mochiwona-pfo ihache lya nzoi li-ipfunge, ilalembawe mndu ma umu, mulipfunguo-ho, munjiendie.
42019031	Na kokooya mndu ambesa, Nyikili molipfunguo-ho, mbienyi, nyi Mndumii alikundi.”
42019032	Na walya waledumo wakakure, wakahenda, wakawona chando alewawia.
42019033	Wechifunguo ihache lilya lyo nzoi, wenyi-lyo wakawawia, “Nyikili mopfunguo ihache-lyo?”
42019034	Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi Mndumii aliwodie iṟunda.”
42019035	Wakaliduo ko Yesu; wakaliala nguwo tsawo, wakadosiaho Yesu.
42019036	Kechihenda ado, wakamwalia nguwo tsawo kulya njiehu.
42019037	Lilya aleshika kufui na msaṟi fulya fo fumvu lya mashidi ha msinepfu, naalyo siṟi iya ya wandu wa kiloshionyi kyake yose ikawooka ichihio na iadapfuma Ruwa na maṟu hang'anyi kipfa kya ṟiho tsilya tsa pfinya waletsiwona tsose.
42019038	Wakahamba, “Naleheke ichu mocha iwa mangi kui rina lya Mndumii; ruwehu nyi ofoṟo, na kiṟumi kikae huye ruwehu!”
42019039	Kyasia, kulya mamwinginyi kuwekeri-pfo Wafarisayo maata, wakambia, “Mlosha, kanga iwo wa kiloshionyi kyapfo!”
42019040	Nao kahaluo kahamba, “nyi ngamuwia, Kokoya iwa watsia, maho na hechikoṟoṟoma.”
42019041	Ashika kufui na yafukia, kawona mṟi fulya kafulilia.
42019042	Kahamba, “A kulamanya-wo na iyo mfiri-fu fo inu mbonyi-tso tsiwechikuendie ofoṟo! Kyaindi ulalu shameṟiko mesonyi hapfo ulawonyi.
42019043	Cha kipfa nyi kochikaa kukuhoye mafiri, nlyondo wakituwa wapfo wechikuṟingichia na mfoo na ikutengetia na ikufiṟita kose kose.
42019044	Nawo nyi wechimuwunduya wanda na wana wapfo wai ipfo kiidi kyapfo, wamuole-ole walechida ma iho likae huya iho lingi, kipfa ulalemanya shiheri shilya ulesahio!”
42019045	Kaida na hekalunyi, kawooka ifuna-pfo sa wawei ikumbia-pfo shindo.
42019046	Kawawia, “Nyiki kiṟehie, ‘Mba yako iwe mba yeterewia,’ nanyo mkawuya iihaluo opango lo wasoki!”
42019047	Nao kawa molosha handu halya haele orio mkonu, Indi wakohanyi wanene na walaanyi wa wuwawaso na wanene wa wandunyi wakashiha mwaanya fomrumatsa.
42019048	Walawone kembutia; kipfa wandu wafoi wawewatiṟanyi nao wechimwadanyia.
42020001	Kukashika, ili mkonu fumu kechilosha wandu kulya hekalunyi, na yonguo mbonyi tsa sia, kukacha wakohanyi, na walaanyi wa shitabu warianyi na wameeku.
42020002	Wakadeda nao, wakambia “Keluwie, Ishi nyi uiwuta kui pfinya ida? A kingise, nyiu akuinengie pfinya-i?”
42020003	Kahaluo kawawia “Na inyi na njimuwesa kidedo kimu, munjihaluo,
42020004	wupatiso wo Yohane nyi ruwehu wuwukie ang'u nyi ko wandu?”
42020005	Wakakusaṟa-saṟa wo wenyi na wenyi ke, lukahamba nyi ruwehu wuwukie, nao nyiechihamba, a nyiki ili mlalemwidikia?
42020006	Na lukahamba, ko wandu, wandu wose nyi wechilukumbia maho, kipfa wakusirie ke Yohane nyi mwikimbi o Ruwa.
42020007	Wakahaluo, “Luichi kundu wuwukiepfo.”
42020008	Na Yesu kawawia, “Ma inyi njiechimuwia pfinya-i njeketana nayo ishipfo.”
42020009	Kyasia kawooka iwia wandu ifano-li, “Mndu awedemie mdemi fo msabibu; kafudambikia wefulimia, kahenda orukenyi lungi ikaa-pfo mfiri ifoi.
42020010	Kiheri kya ndunda tsambiṟa, kaduma msoṟo oke nahende ko walya welimia, kundu wamnengie ndunda tsintowe kulya msabibunyi; na walya welimya wakamkapa, wakamwinutsa wulya.
42020011	Kawuya iduma msoṟo ungi; wakawemkapa-se na imwinyala, wakamfuna alarie kindo.
42020012	Kaengeṟa iduma, kaduma-se o kaṟaṟu; nawo wakambika shifaṟe wakamfunyia nja.
42020013	Menyi dema lya msabibu kahamba, ‘Ngawika njida? Nyi njechiduma mana-chu oko mkunde; kofia ichu nyi wechimwowuo!’
42020014	Walya welimia wambona, wakakusaṟa na ideda kyama wo wen na wenyi wakahamba, ‘Hoona ichu nyio mokyora, nndenyi lumbahe-ng'u, kundu na kyora-kyo kechiwa kyadu!’
42020015	Wakamkumbalya nja ya mdemi fulya fo sabibu, wakambaaha, ‘Kyasia, menyi dema lilya lya msabibu nyi echiwawutia ada ngesa?’ ”
42020016	“Nyi echicha nawarumatse, na msabibu iya nadambikie wengi.” Na walya waleicho wakahamba, “Kilahendeke kido!”
42020017	Nao kawaambuya wowatuma kahamba, “A idedo-lyo li iṟehie lyehamba, Iho lilya wandu wewika mba walelisuo, nyilyong'u lilewa iho ling'anyi lya ndumbenyi; kimaduma kya idedo-lyo nkiki?”
42020018	“Orio moho huye ya iho-lyo nyiechifunjika-funjika; na ichu mohoyo nyi iho-lyo, nyi lyechimsonohotsa.”
42020019	Walaanyi wa shitabu na wakohanyi wakakunda imleshia mawoko wambade kiheri kilya kilya, indi wakaowuo wandu, kipfa nyi walemanya ke ifano lilya nyi lyahambo kipfa kyawo.
42020020	Wakambikya ndeheka, wakamdumia wemsoṟa wokulembetseṟa ke nyi wai wecha wasumhanyi na wucha, kundu wawone mti fo madedo hake wahende imdambika wuchilinyi na pfinyenyi ya mchili mwitoṟi o oruka.
42020021	Wakambesa kindo kemsoruo, wakahamba, “Mlosha, nyi luichi nyi okededa kisumhanyi na ilosha kisumhanyi, ma ulekeambuya shamu sha wandu; na njia tsa Ruwa kolosha chando tsii lohi.
42020022	So na kilusumhanyie iwikia kaisari kodi ang' ote?”
42020023	Nao kamanya mkoṟo yawo, kawawia,
42020024	“Kenjiloṟenyi shilingi. Nyi iwode ofano lou na mṟeho nyi fou?” Wakahamba, “Nyi sha kaisari.”
42020025	Nao kawawia, “Keinengyenyi kaisari ishi sha kaisari; na Ruwa mbemnenga isho shi sha Ruwa.”
42020026	Manya walaidime imdeha na madedo hake alya oshangunyi lo wandu, wakaṟihio mhaluye foke, wakatsia.
42020027	Kuwekeri-pfo na Wasadukayo wawekekaṟuo ke kuipfo iṟuka lya wapfupfo, wakacha na koke wakambesa.
42020028	Wakahamba, “Mlosha, Mose nyi aleluṟehia ke; kokoya mndu, manomae apfa kada mka alawode mana, manomae naoṟe mkachu, kundu nawonyie manomae luwa.
42020029	Kyasia kuweepfo wasoṟo mfungade wa mndu umu; ulya mmbee kaduo mka, kapfa kada mka ulya alawode mana.
42020030	Mka ulya kadao nyi ulya momwituma.
42020031	Na ulya o kaṟaṟu naawo, kikahendeka kido, itame wapfa woose mfungade walade ma mana,
42020032	Mainukionyi na mka ulya kawepfa.
42020033	Kyasia, maṟutsionyi ha wapfu, mka -chu nyi echiwa o uhya-ho? Kipfa woose mfungade nyi waweei wamii wa mkachu.”
42020034	Yesu kawawia, “Nyi wana wa wuyana wu nyiwo sa wekealika na yaliko.
42020035	Kyaindi walya wechinengo ishika wuyana wulya na iṟutso ko wapfu, wo wechialika ma yalikopfo.
42020036	Kipfa ma ipfa wechikipfapfo; kipfa wo nyi wechiwakana na malaika, wawewa na wana wa Ruwa, kifa wai wa kirukionyi.
42020037	Kyaindi kui kipfa kya wapfu, ke nyi wechiṟutso, ma Mose na alewetongio ipfo isikinyi kiheri Mndumii alemlaha. Kamhamba, Ruwa o Abrahamu na Ruwa o Isaki na Ruwa o Yakobo.
42020038	Ruwa chi o mnying'apfo, indi nyi o wai na moo. Kyamba iwo wai ma moo woose nyi wai-ho kipfa kyake.”
42020039	Wengi wa walanyi wa shitabu wakahaluo wakahamba, “Mlosha, iyo nyi odambuo necha.”
42020040	Nawo walelekaria-se imbesa kindo.
42020041	Kyasia kawawia, “A nyi wuda ili wandu wekehamba ke Kristo nyi mana o Dawidi?
42020042	Nao Dawidi nyi ahambie amonyi ipfo kitabunyi kya shimbo kehamba, ‘Mndumii nyi alewia mndumii oko, Kedamia kuwokonyi koko ko kulyo.’ ”
42020043	“Njitane ngaleṟia wakituwa wapfo, wanda madendenyi hapfo.”
42020044	“Alae, komkooya Dawidi nyi amlahiye nyi Mndumii, nyi wudaechiwa-se manoke?”
42020045	Kawia walya wa kiloshionyi kyake wandu walya wawei imwadanya waichio wose.
42020046	“Kuṟisenyi kya walaanyi wa shitabu, iwo wakundi ichumia waṟee nguwo tsa mkuruo tsekulembetseṟa, wokulefuo, wawekundi iṟikiṟio nyi wandu ipfo tumo; na ipfo sinagogenyi nyi wakundi-pfo shidembo sha kusonguo; na wakalaho shelyenyi wakasambuṟa alya ko wasuṟi.
42020047	Nyi wekelya mba tsa waka wakusu wakatsimaa, na kwi wulembetseṟi wakakurihiria ihamba ke nyi lokemterewia. Iwo! Iwo, nyi wechikaa wawonyio owingo ngoseṟa.”
42021001	Nao kairia meso, kawona chando wasuri wechiwika shindo sha nnga ipfo sandukunyi lya njodambiko.
42021002	Kawewona na mka umu mkiwa, ai mkusu kechiwika-pfo shisenti shiwi.
42021003	Kahamba, “Nyi kya lohi ngambia, Mka-chu mkiwa ai mkusu, nyi awika-pfo kya ngoseṟa kota woose.
42021004	Chakipfa iwo woose nyi wawuta ipfo mfoeṟenyi fo masaa hawo, kyaindi ichu, ipfo wukiwenyi woke, nyi adambika shoose ashiwode, isho shiwechimbanza moo foke.”
42021005	Na wandu wengi nyi wawei ikapa sumu tsa hekalu lilya chando liweishele necha na maho mecha na mchopie ingi iwenji sanzie-pfo nao kahamba.
42021006	“Kya ishi muyambuya wulalu, nyi kochikaa kuche shiheri, kulechideo ma iho huya iho lingi lilaiwunduye wanda.”
42021007	Wakambesa wakahamba, “Mlosha, nyi indi isho shechikaa shishike; na kitaanyio kyasho nyi kiki ili shechikaa shiwe?”
42021008	Nao kahamba, “Ambuyenyi mlawone mochidetseṟo; kipfa nyi kochicha wafoi kui rina lyako wahambe nyio inyi; wawehamba, Kiheri kyamesembelya. Manya mulahende ilungana nawo!
42021009	Nanyo ili mochiicho mbonyi tsa shida na tsa shipfulu-pfulu sha wandu, ma mlawuko nyi madima. Kipfa shindo-shi na shikaki na shikae shiwooke iwutika, indi, imarisio lyechicha owinyi lidopfo.”
42021010	Naalyo kawawia, “Wandu wa mbaṟi imu nyi wechiapfinyiana na mbaṟi ingi, na wumangi na wumangi wungi.
42021011	Na handu hengi na hengi nyi kochiwoneka na shidihinyisha-shi shing'anyi, na kungi na kungi njaa na ndaaṟe tseambukia, kuwewoneka na makindo hechikangaṟitsa wandu; na riho tsing'anyi tsioweshie tsiwoneke huye ruwehu.
42021012	Kyaindi kuwooka, isho shoose shilameshika, nyi wechimuitsa kiterengionyi wamukape na imufuna, wawemduo masinagogenyi na mengenyi, wamuhoṟotse oshangunyi lo wamangi na lo wachili waitoṟi, nakyo nyi kipfa kya rina lyako.
42021013	Ishi nyi shechimuwonekia nyo kundu muidime injiṟingishya.
42021014	Mukuteṟye ipfo mrimenyi konu ke mulawooke ihia kekuashuo.
42021015	Kipfa ipfo madumbunyi hanu nyi inyi njechimbikia-pfo madedo ha wuṟango, na iwo wemkaṟuo wose, wechidima ihakaṟuo ma ihakanapfo.
42021016	Nanyo nyimocheṟiingio na nyi wafee na wanawamaanu, na wodoyanu wa kishari na wakunde wanu.
42021017	Nanyo nyi mochisuikia wandu woose kui kipfa kya rina lyako.
42021018	Kyaindi ma ochui lumu lochimdekia mdonyi konupfo.
42021019	Damiṟenyi mrima yanu kui ikutirisya.”
42021020	“Kyaindi ili mochiwona mṟi fo Yerusalemu fochitengetio nyi masiṟi, wutenyi-ho imanya, kiheri kyafo kenyamaṟo kyamshika.
42021021	Kiherikyo sa wakeri kulya Yudaya, wadichie nja; na iwo wai nja, ma walawuye napfo.
42021022	Kipfa shiherisho, nyisho shewuwuya kisecha, kundu shilya shii shiṟehie shishike shoose.
42021023	Kyaindi ochia nyi lo waka walya wekooyo waai walemo na weonza mandi-ho! Kipfa iya wuyana nyi kochiwada kiwi king'anyi, ili wa oshari-lu wechiwuwuyo kui nyashi ing'anyi.
42021024	Wengi nyi wechiwooho kui njoshu, wengi wadao wafungo njosharinyi tsose. Na Yerusalemu ideo yechichumo-chumo nyi wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu, itane shiheri sha mbaṟi-tso njihenu shainutsio.”
42021025	“Kochiwoneka na ṟiho tsa njofano ipfo mnengeṟinyi na merinyi na nyenyerinyi, na iya wuyana wandu wa mbaṟi tsoose nyi wechikapo ngoo walechimanya kimaduma, kipfa masinanu ha ipalipali nyi hechiengeṟa ihaluka-haluka na idihina.
42021026	Wandu nyi wechiuma ndadya kwi kitewe kya wuowu na iwedia shilya shechihoya wuyana; kipfa pfinya tsa ruwehu nyi tsechisingitso-singitso.
42021027	Kiheri-kyo, nlyondo wechiwona Mana o mndu kechicha ario nyi ipuchi, awode pfinya na kiṟumi king'anyi.
42021028	Kyasia, ili isho shechiwooka iwa, kekuheluonyi, mbeiria mdo yanu huye, kyamba momshika hafui na iletso.”
42021029	Kawawia ifanano, “Keambuyenyi mkuyu-fo, na orio mashidi hengi hoose.
42021030	Mukamewona haoṟa, nyi mokemanya mbenyi ke, kiheri kya masambuyonyii kyameshika hafui.
42021031	Nyi wudo nanyo, mkamewona shindo-sho shamewooka iwa, manyenyi ke, wumangi wo Ruwa womshika afui.
42021032	Nyi lohi ngambia; Oshari-lu lochiarisika manya-lepfo, na kutane ishi shawutika.
42021033	Ruwehu na oruka nyi shechikaa shimande, kyaindi madedo hako hechimandapfo.”
42021034	“Kyasia, kuṟisenyi, mulawone ngoo tsanu tsechilemeṟo nyi itandaluo ndeu na wunanzi na mawinyisha ha wanda-i, mfiri fulya fuwone fochimutowokia mulakusirie.
42021035	Kipfa chando mdeho fokerakuo, nyi kechichea woose handu hose wai kunu wuyana.
42021036	Nanyo, laenyi dembo mfiri yoose mochiterewa, kundu muidime ikuashuo isho shoose shikundi iwa, na ihoṟoka alya sumuhana na Mana o mndu.”
42021037	Kyasia, nao orio mkonu, ili mfiri, nyi awekewa molosha kulya hekalunyi, kukameila kakure-pfo kahenda ilaa kulya fumvunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu.
42021038	Wandu woose wakawemchea ngamenyi kilawo kundu wamwadanyie.
42022001	Kyasia, kukatikiria mkonu mnene fo mkate ilamtarang'ashe; fulya fumlahe nyi fo pasaka.
42022002	Na wakohanyi wang'anyi na walaanyi wa shitabu wakashiha mweke fombaaha; kipfa nyi waweowoye wandu.
42022003	Kyaindi Satana kahenda yososa Yuda ulya amlahe Iskariote, nao nyi umu o walya ikumi na wawi.
42022004	Kakure, kahenda ideda na wakohanyi wanene na wachili walya wa wasikari, kundu namdambike mawokonyi hawo.
42022005	Nawo wakachihio, wakaidikiana nao kya pesa wechimnenga.
42022006	Nao kaidikia na pata, kashiha mweke fomdambika kundu wandu walamanye.
42022007	Koikishika mkonu fulya fo mkate ilamtarang'ashe, nafo nlyondo kokedaso kidahina kya Pasaka.
42022008	Kaduma Petro na Yohane, kawawia, “Hendenyi muluteseheṟie handu lochiliia kiidahina kya pasaka.”
42022009	Nawo wakambia, “Nyiku ukundi luhede isungusia, Mndumii?”
42022010	Nao kawawia, “Ili mochiida na kulya mṟinyi, nyi mochikumbuhanana na mndu arie nungu ya mṟinga, mwoshenyi, itane kulya mba kundu echiida napfo?
42022011	Muwie ichu menyi mba, Mlosha nyi akuwesa, nyi'ku kui mba yekaa, kundu njiliie-ho Pasaka hamu na wa kiloshionyi kyako?
42022012	Nao nyi echimlora kiriha kinene ki-kyale nguwo; nyipfo-ndo mochilusungusia.”
42022013	Nawo wakahenda, wakawewona chando alewewawia, wakawaṟeheria-pfo kidahina kya Pasaka.
42022014	Kiheri kikashika, kacha idamia shelyenyi hamu na wakiloshionyi kyake.
42022015	Kahamba, “Nyi mbelangie mnu ngawewado na nyi macha helya nanyo Pasaka-i ili ndameshika mawawiṟionyi hako.
42022016	Kipfa nyi ngamuwia; Njechilya-se ma ntapfo, na iwede ishika ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa.”
42022017	Kaira kirahu kiichuo mwinyo, kakiterewia, kakiwainengia kahamba, “Ambienyi iki, hawianenyi mu-wenyi na wenyi.
42022018	Kipfa nyi ngamuwia, njechikinyo-se kya ndunda tsa msabibu wumangi wo Ruwa wulachapfo.”
42022019	Kaweira na mkate, kafuterewia, kafufunja kafuwainengia kahamba, “Ifu nyifo mbihu foko [fuimdambikio. Wutenyi iki kiwe ngumbuo yako.”
42022020	Na wudo kaweira na kirahu, wammaa ilya, kahamba, “Kirahu-ki nyi mkundano mhya fo ipfo samunyi yako impusuyo nyo.]
42022021	Kyaindi ambuyenyi owoko lo monjiṟiingia ailu lui kunu mesenyi hamu na inyi.
42022022	Mana o mndu na echihenda njia yake chando amteṟie, kyaindi ochia lo mndu ulya momṟiingia.”
42022023	Naalyo wakawooka iwesana wo wenyi na wenyi, “Iya kodu-so nyiu echiwuta iki?”
42022024	Kukaweamka na marekiano ipfo kambenyi lyawo ke, nyiu o kambenyi lyadu ai mnene kaida wengi.
42022025	Nao kawawia, “Wamangi wa mbaṟi tsa wandu nyi wekewaitoṟia, na iwo waapfinya ipfo kowo wakalaho nyi wandu wang'anyi.
42022026	Nyo, ma mlawone mochiwa mudo. Indi ichu ang'anyi ipfo kambenyi lyanu nakutane cha mtutu, na ichu ai msongoru, nawecha mopfuṟukanyia.
42022027	Kipfa ang'anyi nyi uhya, nyi ulya adamie ailya a nyi ulya momwendiye? Chi ichu adamie ailya? Kyaindi inyi kambenyi lyanu nji cha mopfuṟukanyia.
42022028	Nanyo nyinyo mulewatiṟana na inyi kulya maheshionyi hako.
42022029	Na inyi nyi ngamdambikia wumangi, chando na Wande oko anjidambikie inyi.
42022030	Muwe welya na wenyo mesenyi yako ipfo wumanginyi woko; nanyo nyi mochikaa mudamie maloṟike-hu ha wusuṟi mochichilia njoshari-tso ikumi na tsiwi tsa Israeli.”
42022031	Kyasia kahamba, “Simon, oo Simon, keambuya, Satan nyi amkundi nyo namuwiwite chando mokeela ngano.
42022032	Kyaindi inyi ngamekuterewia, kundu iidikia lyapfo lilamande; na iyo komewanga, wanza wanawamayo.”
42022033	Nao kambia, “Mndumii, nyi hamu na iyo! Nyi njikuteseheṟie ihenda na iyo kipfungonyi ma opfunyi.”
42022034	Nao kambia, “Nyi ngakuwia Petro, olong'onyi lochikapa inu kulamaa injikana kaṟaṟu ke, Unjiichipfo.”
42022035	Kawawesa, “A mandi halya ndemduma mlarie kichoṟe ma kikuchu ma shadu, kuipfo kindo mulewuṟa ma kimu?” Wakahamba, “Ma kimu lulewuṟapfo?”
42022036	Kawawia, “Kyaindi ulalu ichu awode kichoṟe na kikuchu, nashiduo, na ichu alawode oshu nahende ikumba ikonya lyake nahuṟe oshu.
42022037	Cha kipfa ngamuwia, ‘Isho shi shii-ṟehie na shikaki na shikae shishike shewutikia iya koko. Nasho nyi ishi, katalio wanyamaṟinyi,’ kipfa isho shinjiwaṟi na shikae shiwutike.”
42022038	Nawo wakambya, “Mndumii, ambuya iya nyi kwiho njoshu tsiwi.” Nao kawawia, “Kyakusiia!”
42022039	Yesu kawuka-pfo kahenda kulya fumvunyi lya mashidi ha msinepfu chando aweichiwie; na wa kiloshionyi kyake wakamwitung'ata.
42022040	Ameshika handu halya kawawia, “Terewenyi, mulashike iida kiheshonyi.”
42022041	O kahenda kyaada, handu ha mkumbie fo songoṟo, kapfira ndi, katerewa kahamba,
42022042	“Hoi Wande, kokukundia, njiashuo kirahu-ki, kyaindi kilahendeke channdo inyi njikundi, shile chando ukundi iyo.” [
42022043	Kacheyo nyi malaika awuka ruwehu kambanza.
42022044	Nao kakaa kelimbana na opfu, indi kaengeṟa mnu iterewa; itane mbiṟuko foke fowa cha matacha ha samu hetonyiikia wanda.]
42022045	Nao kakure kulya kiterewionyi kakooya walya wa kiloshionyi walee kitewe kya fowa.
42022046	Kawawia, “Kimaduma nyiki mukalaa? Kurenyi muterewe, mulawone mochida kiheshionyi.”
42022047	Kechededa ado, alamhutsa, kukacha wandu wafoi, na umu o walya ikumi na wawi, rina lyake nyi Yuda, awasongoe, kasembelia Yesu kamkomba.
42022048	Yesu kambia, “Yuda, na otana oṟingia Mana o mndu kochimkomba?”
42022049	Na walya wa weei nao wamṟingichie wekiwona chando kiiwa wakahamba, “Mndumii, lukawakapa na oshu?”
42022050	Odoyawo umu kamanya isinga lya mkohanyi ang'anyi, kasunukuṟa-ho kudu kulya ko kulyo.
42022051	Yesu kahaluo kahamba, “Tsienyi wamarise kyawo!” Kapaaya kudu kulya, kamchiṟa.
42022052	Yesu kawia walya walecha immbada; nyi wakohanyi wang'anyi, na wachili wa hekalu na wame̱ku, “Nyi mokure na njooshu na nguwidi cha wandu wewatiṟa msoki.
42022053	Orio mkonu nyi njiwekeri nanyo ipfo hekalunyi ma mulanjileshie mawoko; kyaindi ii nyiyo sa yanu, nyihondo meema fuwodie pfinya.”
42022054	Wakambada, wakamduo, wakamwitsa na mba ko mkohanyi ang'anyi. Indi Petro kamiwata ai haleshe-leshe.
42022055	Wakaatsa modo alya osehu lo mkohanyi ang'anyi makiidi hawi wechioda, Petro kadamia alya kiidi kyawo.
42022056	Kisinga kika kekimbona, ai alya senyi ya modo, kikamtukuya, kikahamba, “Na ichu na awei nao.”
42022057	Kakana kahamba, “Wai, njimanya, njimwichipfo mae!”
42022058	Oweṟe ungi kambona kahamba, “Na iyo na umu-mbo owo-e?” Petro kakana kahamba, “Oṟa msumi, njimanya.”
42022059	Saa imu iida-ho, ungi kawanza kahamba, “Ee lohi, na ichu nyi awei hamu nao, kipfa nyi Mgalilaya.”
42022060	Kyaindi Petro kahamba, “Oṟa odoya, njiichi kindo uihamba-nyi.” Kechededa ado, olong'onyi lukatesa.
42022061	Mndumii kahalukia Petro, kamwambuya, Petro katamuo idedo lilya lya Mndumii embia, “Inu olong'onyi lochitesa kulamaa injikana kaṟaṟupfo.”
42022062	Kahenda kulya kya nja, kafuha kahutsa tara.
42022063	Na wasoṟo walya wawemrie wakamtaluo na imkapa-kapa.
42022064	Wakamboshia ipfo mesonyi, wakambesa-wesa, malasha, njiu akukapa?
42022065	Na shitaluo shingi shifoi wakaweshihamba sanza na imruma.
42022066	Koikikya kukakusanza wameeku wa njoshari na wakohanyi wanene na walanyi wa shitabu, wakamduo mengenyi yawo.
42022067	Wakahamba, “Luwie, kokooya nyi iyo Kristo?” Kawawia, “Ngakaa nyechimuwinyiya, mochinjidikia manyalepfo.
42022068	Manya inyi ngamuwesa kindo, mochiidima injihaluopfo.
42022069	Kyaindi wookia wulalu Mana o Mndu nechikaa adamie owokonyi lo kulyo lo pfinya ya Ruwa.”
42022070	Wakahamba woose, “Ate iyo nyi Mana o Ruwa?” Nao kawawia, “Nyo nyi mohamba, kipfa inyi nyo.”
42022071	Nawo wakahamba, “A nyikiki luita mbahanyia-se wuṟingishi, kipfa so luwenyi lomemwuicho dumbunyi lyake amonyi wushikie imbinga.”
42023001	Mamwingi fulya fukeri-ho fose fukakure fukamduo kulya ko Pontio Pilato.
42023002	Wakawoka imkumba wakahamba, “Ichu nyi lulembona chando aihaluo-haluo wandu wa oshari lodu na iwaima ke, walataaye Kaisari okamba, kakuhamba inyi Kristo nyi mangi.”
42023003	Pilato kambesa, kahamba, “Iyo nyi mangi ya Wayuda?” Nao kamhaluo kahamba, “Na chando owehamba.”
42023004	Pilato kawia wakohanyi na mamwingi fulya fo wandu, “Ko mndu-chu njiwonyi-pfo kyemwanduya-nyi.”
42023005	Kyaindi wo wakaengera mnu iitikya-itikya wakahamba ke nyi ekewa mopfuluo-pfuluo wandu kelosha kadung'atsa kunu Yudaya kose awookie kulya Galilaya itane ashika iya.
42023006	Pilato kekiicho ishi kawesa kokooya nyi mndu o Galilaya.
42023007	Kekimanya ke nyi asumhanyie wuchilinyi wo Herode, kamdika kulya ko Herode, kyamba na mandi halya Herode nyi kulya Yerusalemu awecheiye napfo.
42023008	Herode kekiwona Yesu, kachihio mnu; kipfa nyi awelangie imbona wokia shiheri sha haleshe, kipfa nyi awemiicho mbonyi tsake tsifoi kahamba kulako nyi echiwona kindo kiṟihishie kiwuto nyio.
42023009	Kambesa shifoi, indi nalahaluo ma idedo limu.
42023010	Na wakohanyi walya wang'anyi na walanyi wa shitabu wakahoṟoka-ho, wakamkumba kui wuitiki.
42023011	Herode na wasoṟo wake wakamuisalucha na imwinyila, wakamṟika nguwo ikengemae, kambihiṟia Pilato.
42023012	Mfiri fulya tichi Pilato wakawada mbuya na Herode, kipfa ili kuwooka nyi wawesuanyi.
42023013	Pilato kalaha wakohanyi wanene na handu hamu wameeku wa njoshari, na wandu wose.
42023014	Kawawia, “Nyi monjiendei mnduchu cha nyi ai mndu moweṟuo-weṟuo wandu, indi ambuyenyi, ili njilededa mondu foke muweho mkaicho, inyi njilewona owingo lo mbonyi-tso mocha imkumba natsopfo.
42023015	Manya Herode na wudo; kipfa ili ambihiṟa na kunu kodu. Kyasia, kuwode kisumhanyie opfu kii iwute nyiopfo.
42023016	Kyasia, nyi njiechimkapa kya kisamo njimlekie.” [
42023017	Indi nyi kuwe-pfo kido kewapfunguya mpfungo umu ili mkonu mnene fo Pasaka.]
42023018	Wandu wose dang'a wakafahia wakahamba, “Ichu mduo, nolupfunguye Baraba.”
42023019	Na Baraba-chu nyi awemshingie mba ya wapfunguo kipfa kya wuṟiingi wuweamkie kulya mṟinyi na wuwaahi.
42023020	Pilato kawuya ideda nawo wose lya kawi, kipfa nyi awekundi ipfunguo Yesu.
42023021	Nawo wakakaṟuo wakahamba, “Mbambye msalabenyi, mbambye msalabenyi!”
42023022	Nao Pilato kawawia lya kaṟaṟu, “A nyi kiwicho kida awutie lanye? Inyi njiwonyi kido limsumhanyie opfupfo. Kyasia, nyi njechimkapa, numa njimlekie.”
42023023	Kyaindi wakamrohia mnu wakundi nawambio msalabenyi. Na kifahio kilya kyawo, sanza na kya wakohanyi kikarohia.
42023024	Pilato kadumbuo ke kihendeke chando wakundi.
42023025	Kawapfunguya ulya awembike kipfungonyi kipfa kya wusutsu wo wuwahi; nyio walemkunda; na Yesu kamdambika wawute nao chando wakukundia.
42023026	Kiheri wawemrie, wakakumbuhanana na mndu ewuka mdeminyi foke, ewio nyi Simon o kulya Kirene, wakamdika msalaba fulya foke nafuduo oo numa yake.
42023027	Kyasia mamwingi fo wandu wafoi fukamiwata numa na fo waka wechifuha na imkapia shilio.
42023028	Na Yesu kawaindukia kahamba, “Nyo waka wa kunu Yerusalemu, ma mlanjililie inyi, indi lienyi kyanu muwenyi na kya wana wanu!
42023029	Cha kipfa ambuyenyi, nyi kochikaa kushike mafiri wahambe, nanga iwo wahumba, na wusu-wo wulalefee na mawee-ho halelemeonze!
42023030	Nlyondo wechiwooka iwia mafumwu, keluhoyenyi, na shitoṟomoso, kelushikienyi.
42023031	Kipfa kokooya wawutia wadi ikidi iwishi, aka ili yumu nyi lyekaa liwiko lida?”
42023032	Kukawedao-pfo na wandu wawi wewuta mawicho, kundu wawooho wasanzo nao.
42023033	Nawo wekishika handu ha-halahe nyi handu ha mbuonyi, wakambambya msalabenyi hamu na wanyamaṟi walya, umu ora lo kulyo, na ungi ora lo kumoso.
42023034	Na Yesu kahamba, “Hoi Wande uwahooṟie, kipfa iki waiwuta wakiichipfo.” Na nguwo tsilya tsake wakatsihawa wechikapa natso kuṟu kuhya.
42023035	Na wandu wakahoṟoka-ho wechiambuya. Na waitoṟi walya wakamtaluo wakahamba, “Chi alekiṟa wengi, nakekukiṟa-ng'u amonyi kokooya nyio Kristo amsambuṟe nyi Ruwa!”
42023036	Na wudo na wasikari walya wakawemtaluo-taluo na imchungia-chungia na imwendie mṟinga futarang'ae.
42023037	Wakahamba, “Kokoya iyo nyi ui mangi ya Wayuda, kekukireng'u kumonyi!”
42023038	Na alya msalabehu huye yake nyi kuweeho mṟeho fumṟehie Kigriki na Kiroma na Kiebri, Mangi ya Wayuda nyi ichu.
42023039	Wanyamaṟi walya wawewamase kimu nao, ulya umu-ho kawemtaluo kahamba, “Iyo chi iyo Kristo? Kukiṟeng'u kumonyi naso-wo!”
42023040	Kyaindi ulya odoe kahaluo kamdedia kahamba, “A iyo okiowuo-se Ruwa ili ukeri iya owingonyi ilu?
42023041	So nyi lukeri-ho kya sungusihu, kipfa nyi luiambia kilya kisumhanyie mawuto hadu; kyaindi ichu awode kindo awutie kya wukika manya-lepfo.”
42023042	Kawuya kawia Yesu, “Kewekunjitamuye-wo hoi na hoi Mndumii, ili ochishika ikuidia ipfo wumanginyi wopfo!”
42023043	Nao kambia, “Nkya lohi ngakuwia, Na inu tichi ochiwona kui na inyi kulya Paradiso.”
42023044	Kyasia ili kuweshikie kufui sa ya kaṟandaṟu, kukaho meema puti kulya orukenyi koose mtano saa ya kenda.
42023045	Mnengeṟi fulaloṟe ngeela yafo, isulia lilya lyeshingia hando haele ipfo hekalunyi likarandukia oo makiidi hawi likalekana.
42023046	Na Yesu kalesha ṟu na pfinya kahamba, “Hoi Wande, ngadambika mumuyo foko ipfo mawokonyi hapfo.” Amaa ihamba ado kalekia moo.
42023047	Kyaindi mchili ulya o wasikari kekiwona shilya shewutika, kaidapfuma Ruwa, kahamba, “Na lohi, mndu-chu na awei mcha asumuhanyi!”
42023048	Na mamwingi fulya fuwekuwumbie-ho yambuya shido-sho, wekiwona shilya shilewutika, wakawuya na kanyi wechikapa-kapa shipeeta.
42023049	Na wandu walya waweichianyi nao wose, na waka walya wawemitung'atye wookia Galilaya, nyi waweehoṟoki aleshe wechiamabuya shindo-shi.
42023050	Nlyondo kulekuloṟaho mndu ang'anyi, rina lyake nyi Yosefu o mṟi fo Wayuda foilaho Arimatia, nao nyiwe mndu mcha o wusumhanyi.
42023051	Ichu awekuwode na chila yawo ma mawuto hawopfo; nao nyi aweiwedia wumangi wo Ruwa.
42023052	Ichu kahenda kulya ko Pilato, kamterewa mnying'a fulya fo Yesu.
42023053	Kahenda-fusota-ho, kafuoṟowia nguwo tsa owiṟo, kafuṟika opangenyi luwei lusume kundu ko ihonyi, sa lulawemerike mndu.
42023054	Nafo nyiwe-mkonu fosaya Sabato, kuile kuamkenyi Sabato.
42023055	Kyaindi waka walya wawehendesanyi nao wookia Galilaya, wakaosha-osha, wakawona opanga lulya, na mbihu foke chando fuleṟiko.
42023056	Wawuya-pfo, wakacha iṟeheṟa mdi ya opfamo hamu na mafuda hemshia. Mkonu fulya fo Sabato wakatsinda wakutsiiye chando kiweei kiwawase.
42024001	Mkonu fo kuwooka fo mfungade wakacha na alya opangenyi ngamenyi otuko warie mdi iya ya opfaamo waweṟeheṟie.
42024002	Wakakooya iho lilya liliwute-ho, likapiṟimitsio mbai.
42024003	Waida napfo walawone-pfo mnying'a fo Mndumii Yesu.
42024004	Wechiṟumo-ṟumo wado, wadi a iwa wasoṟo wawi wahoṟoki alya mbarinyi yawo waṟee nguwo tsikengemae.
42024005	Wawodo wado nyi wuowu, wechiinamitsia na mdo yawo wanda, nawo wakawawia, “Ichu ai na moo nyi wuda muimpfula ko wapfu?
42024006	Akeri ipfo-sepfo, indi ameṟutso. Kekumbuonyi-wo shilya alemuwia lilyandi awekeri kulya Galilaya.
42024007	Kechihamba, nkishikie Mana o mndu nadambiko mawokoonyi ha wandu wanyamaṟi nakapio msalabenyi na mfiri fo kaṟaṟu nawuye iṟuka.”
42024008	Nawo wakakumbuo madedo halya hake.
42024009	Wakawuya wawuka alya opangenyi, wakacha yongoya walya ikumi na umu shindo-shi shose, hamu na walya wengi wose.
42024010	Nawo nyi, Maria Magidala, na Yohane, na Maria mae o Yakobo, nawaka wodoya, nyiwo walewia wasu walya shindoshi.
42024011	Madedo-ho hakawawiia cha kihano tupu walahaidikie.
42024012	Kyaindi Petro kakure kakambia na kulya opangenyi, kaimehya-pfo, kaaambuya kawona shidami shilya sha owiṟo tupu shi-shileṟyeho; kawuya kechiṟihio mrimenyi kya shilya shawutika.
42024013	Kyasia mfiri fulya tichi wandu wa mbari yawo wawi wakahenda kundu ko mṟinyi, napfo kowuka kulya Yerusalemu nyi kukuleshe cha mchumie fo saa tsiwi; na rina lyafo nyi Emao.
42024014	Nawo wakahenda wechikapa sumu tsa mbonyi tsilya tsiwutikie.
42024015	Wechikapiana wado sumu na iwesana, Yesu kacha kaduana nawo.
42024016	Kyaindi meso hawo hakawooho walammanye.
42024017	Nao kawawia, “A nyi mbonyi tsida mukeri ihaluyana ili mukeri ichumia lanye?” Indi wo wakahoṟokaho wakuinadie.
42024018	Na ulya umu owo, rina lyake nyi Kleopa, kamhaluo kambia, “Ate na iyo kumonyi ukeri kunu Yerusalemu kulaichi mbonyitsi tsiwutikie mafiri-ha?”
42024019	Nawo kawawia, “Antso njiki?” Wakambia, “Nyi tsa Yesu o kulya Nasareti, ulya aweei mdedi o Ruwa awode pfinya yewuta na yededa sumuhana na Ruwa na wandu wose.
42024020	Ichu-ng'u wakohanyi wadu wang'anyi, na waitoṟi wadu, nyi alemdambika kundu nahutyso owingo lombaaha, wakambambya msalabenyi.
42024021	Natso nyi luwekusirie nao ke nyi awechikaa naletse Israeli. Kyasia-ng'u ishi shose shambutika, mfiri fo inu nyi fo kaṟaṟu.
42024022	Na kingi nyi waka wa kodu maata wameluwuta madima, nawonyi washika kulya opangenyi ngamenyi kilawo.
42024023	Walakooye-pfo mnying'a foke. Wakacha wakahamba, nyi wawonekio nyi wamalaika, wakawawia nyi ai na moo.
42024024	Nyi wudo na wodoyadu waangu wahenda kulya opangenyi, wakawekooya wado chando waka walya waluwia, kyaindi o walambone.”
42024025	Nao kawawia, “Nyo mulaichi mbonyi mui mudo na ngoo njilemeri iidikia shilya waikimbi wa Ruwa wahambie.
42024026	Alae Kristo chi kiwemsumhanyie iliso wukiwa kundu naidime ikuidia wusuṟinyi woke?”
42024027	Nao kawoka alya ko Mose na waikimbi wose kawatambahaluya shilya shi-shidede sha mbonyi tsake kadung'atsa mṟeho yose.
42024028	Wekisembelia hafui na mṟi fulya waweihenda, kakuhesha cha ili akundi ihenda.
42024029	Nawo wakamlemba-lemba wakahamba, “Shika-wo kodu, kipfa nyi iila kui, na mfiri fomekelia.” Nao kaida na mba, kakaa nawo.
42024030	Kikashika lilyandi awedamie nawo kilionyi kya shelya, kaira mkate fulya, kaidapfuma, kafupeṟenguo, kawainengia.
42024031	Nawo wakatambaruka meso hawo, wakammanya nyio. Nao kawadekia-dekia walakimbonese.
42024032	Wakawiana wa-wawi, “A chi luweihya shimbadu kunu ngoonyi tsadu lilyandi aweideda naso kulya njiehu kelutambahaluya mṟeho iya?”
42024033	Wakakure oweṟe lulya, wakawuya na Yerusalemu; wakakooya walya ikumi na umu wakuwumbie handu hamu, na walya wodoyawo wakeri nawo.
42024034	Wechihamba, “Mndumii na kya lohi ameṟuka opfunyi, amekuloṟa na Simon!”
42024035	Nawo wakawaongoya mbonyi tsilya tsilewutikia kulya njiehu, na chando alemanyo nyiwo lilyandi alefunja mkate fulya.
42024036	Wechideda wado, o amonyi kacha kahoṟoka oo kiidi kyawo kawawia, “Ofoṟo lukae nanyo.”
42024037	Wakawuko m'madima, wakaowuo wakahia kulako nyi kiṟishe wawona.
42024038	Kawawia, “Nyikili moangalala mdo, nkili mahio mawicho hadi hakuwada ngoonyi tsanu?
42024039	Njiambuyenyi mawoko hako na madende hako, mumanye nyio inyi, njiwade-wadenyi, muwone. Kipfa kiṟishe kiwode nyama na mbihu na mafuo chando muwonyi njiwode inyipfo.”
42024040	Kekimaa ihamba ado, kawaloṟa mawoko na madende.
42024041	Nawo wakeri wado walameidikia wawodo nyi mkeu-keu fo sia na iṟihio, kawawia, “Muwode kindo kelya ma kida iya?” Nawo wakamneenga ora lo ikunga lu-ukahaṟe.
42024042	Kaluambia, kalulya wawonyi.
42024043	-
42024044	Kawawia, “Iha nyiho madedo hako njilemuwia lilyandi njiwei nanyo ke, shilya shii shiṟehie nyi Mose ipfo wuwawasonyi na ipfo ko waikimbi na ipfo saburinyi na shikae shihoye shose.”
42024045	Nahong'u katambaṟuo wuṟango wulya wowo wakatamuo mṟeho iya mwele.
42024046	Kawawia ke, “Nyi wudo kikiṟehie ke Kristo nyi awechikaa naliso ado wukiwa, na ili lya kaṟaṟu naṟuke wapfunyi.
42024047	Numa wandu wa mbaṟi tsose tsa masanga waongoyo rina lyake wadumbuye, waidime ihoorio manyamaṟo. Nasho shiwoke Yerusalemu.
42024048	Nanyo nyi mochiwa waṟingishi wa mbonyitsi.
42024049	Keambuyenyi, nyi njiechimdumia kyaasa kya Wande kimuwonekie, nanyo kaenyii-ng' kunu mṟinyi ifu itane mowonyio pfinya iwukie huye.”
42024050	Kahenda nawo, kawaduo kulya Betanyia, Kawaṟambatsia mawoko, kawawikia ona.
42024051	Kechiwawikia ona, kalekana nawo, kairio huye ruwehu.
42024052	Nawo wakampfiria ndi, wakawuya na Yerusalemu wawodo nyi msiha fung'anyi.
42024053	Wakahenda ika kulya hekalunyi mafiri hoose wechiadapfuma Ruwa.
43001001	Ipfo mawokyonyi kuweipfo idedo; liweipfo nalyo Idedo liwei na Ruwa, nalyo liwei Ruwa.
43001002	Lyo liwekeri na Ruwa ili mawokyonyi.
43001003	Shindo shose shiipfo nyi shiishitane na mweeke folyo. Nalyo kulawode liweipfo kuwechitano kindo ma kimu kya isho shii-shitanepfo.
43001004	Lyo liwerie moo, na moo fu fukawa sa ya wandu.
43001005	Na sa yo nyi iwaa ipfo meemenyi, na meema fu fulaiambye.
43001006	Kuwei-pfo mndu aledumo nyi Ruwa rina lyake nyi Yohane.
43001007	O alecha kyewika-ho wuṟingishi kundu nawikye sa yo kiṟingishyo wandu washike iidikia wose.
43001008	Chio awei sa iya amonyi-pfo kya indi alecha kundu nawe mṟingishi moṟingishya wandu sa yo.
43001009	Nyi yo Sa ya lohi yo yelimika oryo mndu ose ai kunu wuyana.
43001010	Nyi idedo liwekeri kunu wuyana na wuyana wu wuwuumbe kui mweeke folyo na wuyana wu manya wulammanye.
43001011	O nyi alecha na orukenyi lokye amonyi na iwo wai wakye ma walamwambye.
43001012	Indi iwo walemwambya na imwidikia kawaenengya wulimbi wo itano wana wa Ruwa wose.
43001013	Nawo nyiwo walefeo nyi Ruwa chi kui wuidimi wo mndu o wandupfo ma kui pfinya tsa mbihu-pfo, ma kui idumbwo lya msoro mliwe pfo kya indi Ruwa amonyi nyio ndeawo.
43001014	Nalyo idedo likahaluka mndu arie nyama tsa wandu likakaa kodu. Natso lukawona wuitoṟi wokye, nawo wuitoṟi wu wui wo Mana kimumu mfi aikaa na Wande aichuo wutonga pacha na wukilohi woose.
43001015	Yohane nyi aṟingishye kyake kechipoṟohora na ihamba, “Ichu nyio ulya njilehamba kyake, kye kwipfo aicha oo numa yako na nawenjisongoye nyi aweipfo, kipfa o awekukeṟye-ho, inyi njilamefeo.”
43001016	Na ili pfo koke nyi kadahyonyi lukawa welimyo kisumbo kikaweitumano nyi kisumbo.
43001017	Cha kipfa Ruwa naleende wuwawaso wulya kui Mose, indi wutonga na wukilohi, wo nyi wuleendo nyi Yesu Kristo.
43001018	Kuipfo mndu alemewona Ruwa ma indipfo. Ichu akeri Mana okye kimumu mfi ai cha Ruwa alunganyi na wande, nyio aleluongoya mbonyi tsa Ruwa.
43001019	Na kiṟingishyo kilya kya Yohane kikeri kii-le lya mandi Wayuda walemdumya wandu wakohanyi na Walewi wawuka kulya Yerusalemu wahende imbesa wahambe, “A iyo nyi ukeri o wu?”
43001020	Nao kakuhambya na pata ma alakane kakuhambya, “Inyi chi njii Kristo-pfo.”
43001021	Wakambesa, “A iyo nyiu? Ngesa nyi ukeri Elia?” Yohane kahamba, “O chi inyipfo.” A ngesa ukeri mwikimbi ulya? Nao kahaluo, “Oo.”
43001022	Nahong'u wakambia, “A nyi ukeri nyi wu? A nyi wuda ohamba kyapfo iyo kumonyi? Natso luwone kindo lochihenda iwia walya waludumye?”
43001023	Nao kahamba, “Inyi njikeri mndu ulya mwikimbi Yesaya alehamba kyakye, ‘Ru lya mndu moedya kundo kuwode olele kyehamba, keachikyenyi njia ya Mndumii.’ ”
43001024	Na wandu walya wai-wadume nyi Wafarisayo.
43001025	Wakawesa Yohane “A nyi ki kyaduma kowa mopatisa wandu na iyo kulakeri Kristo ma Elia, ma mwikimbi ulya?”
43001026	Yohane kahalwo kahamba, “Inyi njechekepatisa na mṟinga, indi kwipfo ahoṟoki kiidi kyanu nanyo mulamwichi.
43001027	Nyio sa aicha numa yako, na inyi njimfoi ma ipfungwo ngowa tsa shadu shakepfo.”
43001028	Kyasia-ng'u nakyo kundo kyewutikya kido nyi kulya Betanyia kulya molyola ya meda fo Yordanyi kundo Yohane echipatisya.
43001029	Na ili lya ngama Yohane kawona Yesu kyechimchea kahamba, “Aiki kichondi kya Ruwa kyechiwuta-ho wunyamaṟi wo wuyana.
43001030	Nao nyio ichu njiweihamba kyake kye kwipfo msoro aicha numa yako, na nyi aweipfo kipfa o awekukerye-ho inyi njilamefeo.
43001031	Na inyi njimonyi njiwemwichipfo. Indi o kundu namanyike na pata ipfo ko wandu wa Israeli nkyo kindo njilechea njipatise na mṟinga.”
43001032	Na Yohane kawika kiṟingishyo kahamba, “Njilewona Mumuyo fo Ruwa echimsokya ai cha mbeta awuka ruwehu kacha ikaa nao.
43001033	Na inyi njiwemwichipfo, indi ichu alenjiduma njipatise wandu na mṟinga nyio alenjiwia, ‘Mndu-chu ochimbona Mumuyo fo Ruwa fochimsokia fuwuka ruwehu fukamkaya nyio echiwa mopatisa na Mumuyo Mwele.
43001034	Na inyi iwona ngamebona ngawika kiṟingishyo kyake ngahamba, kye ichu nyio Mana o Ruwa.’ ”
43001035	Nahong'u ili lya ngama Yohane awehoroki-ho lingi arianyi na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wawi.
43001036	Kawona na Yesu echikuidyaho kahamba, “Ichu nyio ihuruwi lya Ruwa.”
43001037	Nahong'u walya wawi wa kiloshyonyi wamwicho Yohane adeda adi madedoho wakaoshana na Yesu.
43001038	Yesu kaindukya kawawona wa kiloshionyi waimwituma kawawia, “Iki mwipfula nkyo ki?” Nawo wakambia, “Hoi Rabi (Nakyo nyi kimu na Mlosha) nyi ku okyekaa?”
43001039	Kawawia, “Kyenjonyi muwone.” Nahong'u wa kiloshionyi wakacha wakawona hando ekyekaa wakatsinda nao mkonu fulya puti. Nalyo nyi mbe saa ikumi kyukanyi.
43001040	Andrea, manomae o Simon Petro, nyi umu o walya wawi waleicho kilya Yohane ahamba wakamwituma Yesu numa.
43001041	Andrea kawoka iwona manomae o Simon kambia, “Lombona Mesia.” (Nakyo kokihalwo kigriki nyi kimu na Kristo.)
43001042	Kaduo Simon na alya ko Yesu. Yesu kaambuya Simon faa kahamba, “Nyi iyo Simon ui mana o Yona nolahong'u rina lyapfo nyi Kefa.” (Nakyo kohalwo nyi kimu na Petro iho lya “ngina.”)
43001043	Ili lya ngama Yesu awerie ihenda kulya Galilaya. Nalyo kakoya Filipo. Yesu kambia, “Oshana na inyi.”
43001044	Na Filipo awei mndu o Betisaida, o mṟi fulya fo Andrea na Petro.
43001045	Filipo kawona Natanaeli kambia, “Hoo lomekuwonya ichu amhambe nyi Mose na waikimbi, nyio Yesu o Yosefu ulya o kulya Nasareti.”
43001046	Natanaeli kawesa Filipo, “A kulya Nasareti kindo kyechiwukaho kii kicha nkyo kiki?” Filipo kambia “Kenjoo-wo uambuye.”
43001047	Yesu kawona Natanaeli kecha na oo ando akeri kadeda kyake kehamba, “A ichu mndu Mwisraeli o lohi; alawode mtambo ipfo mrimenyi.”
43001048	Na Natanaeli kambia, “A nyi nonjimanya kuda?” Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Ili Filipo alawemekulahe kukeri alya tsindenyi ya mkuyu fulya na mbemekuwona.”
43001049	Natanaeli kamhaluo, “Hoi Rabi, iyo nyi ukeri Mana o Ruwa, Iyo nyi Mangi ya Israeli.”
43001050	Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Ili ngamekuwia kye nyi njiwekuwonyi kukeri alya tsindenyi ya mkuyu fulya nkyo kyakuenenga koidikya-ng'u. Nyi ochikaa nowone kyeching'anya isho.”
43001051	Nalyo Yesu kambia, “Na lohi na lohi ngambia, nyi mochiwona kulya ruwehu kuṟuhukye na wasu wa Ruwa wechido na isoka wekaya Mana chu o mndu.”
43002001	Kikasia ili lya kilalau kukaalika wali kulya Kana ya Galilaya. Na mae o Yesu npfondo awei.
43002002	Na Yesu nawo wawei walahe-pfo na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
43002003	Kyasia mpfinyo foikitenekya mae o Yesu kambia, “Wakiwode-se ma mpfinyo-pfo.”
43002004	Yesu kambia, “Kyadu na iyo nyi kiki, mka? Saa iya yako yamekushikyapfo.”
43002005	Kyasia mae kawia waeeki walya, “Kindo echimbia nanyo kewekiwutenyi.”
43002006	Kyasia hando kuwekuṟihichye-pfo nungu tsiṟandaṟu tsa maho chando mbuka tsa Wayuda tsiwei tsa msambye yawo imu yechiwada madewe hawi ang'u haṟaṟu.
43002007	Yesu kawawia, “Kehenda ichuṟenyi nungu tsi mringa,” Wakatsiichura wakashitsa o mingenyi.
43002008	Kawuya kawawia, “Wulalu kedahyenyi-ng'u mbehenda daya mheṟi.” Wakaduo-pfo.
43002009	Kyasia mheṟi ulya kekisaha mṟinga fulya fuhalukye mpfinyo. Nao nalamanye kundu fuwukye; wandu waichi na wae̱ki walya weedahya mṟinga fulya. Mheṟi ulya kalaha menyi-wali.
43002010	Kambia, “A lae oryo mndu ose chi echiwoka kuheṟya mpfinyo ifu mcha, nawo wakameihuda-ihuda chi echiheṟa ifu mbicho-wicho-ng'u. Ate iyo kowuya iṟika ifu mcha tane wulalu.”
43002011	Yesu nalewoka iwuta ṟiho i ya kuwoka Kana ya Galilaya. Kalora wuitoṟi wokye, na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakamwidikya.
43002012	Iki kyamsia kahenda isoka na kulya Kapernaumu o amonyi na mae na wanawamae na wa kiloshyonyi wakye wakakaa-pfo mkonu mangu.
43002013	Kyasia mkonu mnene fo Wayuda fulya fo Pasaka fuwekeri fo afui; Yesu kahenda ikudoya na kulya Yerusalemu.
43002014	Na ipfo hekalunyi kakoyapfo wandu wekumba mbe, machondi na mbeta, na wailachi weilachia wandu pesa tsawo nyi wadamye mesenyi tsawo.
43002015	Nao kalemalema shihowo, shelachwo kawafuna ipfo hekalunyi handu hamu na machondi halya na mbe tsilya tsawo. Na fesa tsa wailachi katsipusuya shi na ipfulwo na shitaṟa (mesa) shawo.
43002016	Kawia na walya wekumba mbeta, “Irenyi shindo shi mushiwute aa. Ma mulawone mohalwo mba ya Wande oko iwe mba ya mbucha.”
43002017	Wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakakumbwo kikeri kiṟehye kyehamba, “Ikunda lyako lyekunda mba yapfo lyanjimaa.”
43002018	Kikatewa Wayuda wakawesa Yesu, “A nyi kichano kya kiki owuta oluloṟa kye nuwode pfinya ili ohenda itana kudo?”
43002019	Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Sanjenyi Hekalu li na inyi njiliwike-se lingi ko mfiri iṟaṟu.”
43002020	Nahong'u Wayuda wakahamba, “Hekalu lyi liliwike ko maaka makumi haana na iṟandaṟu na iyo noliwike-se lingi ko mfiri iṟaṟu?”
43002021	Indi Yesu nyi alededa kya mbihu foke mfo fui hekalu lilya.
43002022	Nahong'u lilyandi aleṟuka awuka ko wapfu waloshe wakye wakawuya ikumbwo kye nkyo ikyo alemhamba, wakaweidikya Maṟehyo halya Maele na idedo lilya Yesu awehambye.
43002023	Kyasia kiheri kilya Yesu awekeri kulya Yerusalemu lya mkonu mnene ya Pasaka wandu wafoi wakaidikya rina lyake wechiwona ṟiho tsilya etsiwuta.
43002024	Indi o Yesu aleidikyana nawopfo, kipfa awewaichi o amonyi wose.
43002025	Yesu naweichi chuṟe tsa wandu tsoose alawewurie mndu motsimbia.
43003001	Kukakaa-pfo mndu o ipfo kambenyi lya Wafarisayo, awio rina lyake nyi Nyikodemo ai msongoru o Wayuda.
43003002	Nao kakuchea ko Yesu ili kio kambia, “Hoi Marya, nawo luichi kye ukeri mlosha umdume nyi Ruwa cha kipfa kulakeri ma mndu echiidima iwuta ṟiho tso owa mowuta iyo na koka nyi Ruwa akeri nao tupu.”
43003003	Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Kya lohi na lohi ngakuwia, Mndu kada lafeo uhya nechiidima iwona wumangi wo Ruwapfo.”
43003004	Nikodemo kambia, “Aka-wo mndu namanye ifeo-se ada lingi ai meku? Ngesa nyi echiidima-se kuwuya na ipfo wusunyi wo mae nawefeo-se lya kawi?”
43003005	Yesu kahalwo, “Kya lohi na lohi ngakuwia, Mndu kada alafeo nyi mṟinga na Mumuyo echiidima ihenda ipfo wumanginyi wo Ruwa manyale-pfo.
43003006	Mndu nekefeo kimbihu nyi ndeye na mae, kya indi nekefeo kimrima nyi Mumuyo.
43003007	Ma kulaṟihio ili ngakuwia kye mkaki na mufeo wuhya.
43003008	Otanu lochekewiwita kundo lochikukundya na mrundumo folo na ochikuichyo, kya indi kulamanye ma kundo luwuka ma kundo loihenda. Kyasia-ng'u na oryo mndu mofeo m Mumuyo na wudo akeri.”
43003009	Nikodemo kahalwo kambia, “A ikyo nyi kyechiidimika kida ngesa?”
43003010	Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Nyi ukeri mlosha o kunu Israeli kulamanye ikyo?”
43003011	Kya lohi na lohi ngakuwia, Kilya lomemanya nakyo lochekehamba na kilya lomewona nakyo lochekeongwo kya iṟingishya lyadu. Na kiṟingishyo kyo kyadu nyo mulakiidikye.
43003012	Ili njemwongoya kya shindo shii sha kunu orukenyi nanyo mulanjiidikye, a ili njemwongoya kya shilya sha ruwehu nyi mochikuidikya muda?
43003013	Ma kulelemedoe mndu kulya ruwehupfo, na ichu alewesoka ruwehu nyio Mana o Mndu ai ipfo ruwehu.
43003014	“Chando Mose ewedosya njoka iya huye kulya kundo ko olele na Mana o mndu na wudo echika nairio huye.
43003015	Kundu oryo mndu momwidikiya nawone moo fo mlungana.
43003016	Kyamba Ruwa nyi awekundi wuyana katana alekya Mana okye kimumu mfi, kundu oryo mndu ose amwidikye nalawone kedeka kya indi nawone moo fo mlungana.
43003017	Kyamba Ruwa alaleduma Mana okye nache na kunu wuyana kundu naanduye wuyana wu, kya indi nyi kundu wuyana wuhendekiṟo nyio.”
43003018	“Mndu aidikye Mana echiwonyo owingopfo. Mndu alamwidikie o ammaa iwonyo owingo kipfa ada alaidikya Mana chu o Ruwa kimumu mfi.
43003019	Na owingo lu lukeri luile: Nyi sa ilecha na kunu wuyana na wandu wakakunda meema kota sa. Kitewe kipfa nyi shindo watanye shiwei shiwicho.
43003020	Kipfa oryo mndu atanye shiwicho o asuo sa ma ekehenda kundo kuwode sa iipfo kundu mawutoho hake mawicho halalimiko.
43003021	Indi mndu ai motana kiwulohi kilya o ekehenda kundo kuwode sa kundu ngata tsake tsihende imanyishoho ke nyi tsinjiwute kui ihendelia Ruwa.”
43003022	Ishi shikawa Yesu kahenda kulya orukenyi lo Yudaya arianyi na waloshe wakye, Katsinda-pfo nawo kechipatisa wandu.
43003023	Na Yohane nyi awei-pfo echipatisa wandu kulya Ainon kulya kufui na Salemu ili kuweipfo mṟinga fufoi. Kukacha napfo wandu nao kawapatisa.
43003024	(Kyamba kiheri kilya Yohane awemekumbo kipfungon-pfo.)
43003025	Nakyo kikaenenga wa kiloshionyi wa Yohane Waleloyana na mndu Myuda wechiwesana nao kya isamba.
43003026	Wakawuya Yohane wakambia, “Hoi Marya, ulya awei na iyo kulya mataya ya Yordanyi, nao nyio iyo ulembikya kiṟingishyo nyi aipatisa na wandu wose wakamwosha.”
43003027	Yohane kahalwo kahamba, “Kwipfo mndu eidima iwada kindo shila nyi kilya ainengo nyi Ruwapfo.
43003028	Nyo muwenyi mkaṟingishia kye njilemhamba kye chio inyi njii Kristo-pfo. Kya indi njimdume njimsongoye.
43003029	Ichu arie mka moaliko nyio menyi-wali. Indi mbuya ya menyi-wali ichu ahoṟoki oo afui kemwadanya nyi aichihio mnu na sia ing'anyi ili aicho menyi wali kechideda. Nyi wudo sia yako yaichuo pacha.
43003030	Kimbaṟi o naengeṟe iṟumisho na inyi njinyie.”
43003031	“Ichu acheye awukye huye nyio mnene o woose. Ichu apaṟikye kunu wuyana kawewa na o kunu wuyana kuwededa shii sha wuyana. Indi ichu achee awukye ruwehu o akeri mnene o wose.
43003032	Nao nekehamba kilya alekiwona na ikiicho na kiṟingishyo kyo kyakye nyi
43003033	akiwikya mhuri fohamba ke Ruwa nyio kiwulohi.
43003034	Icho Ruwa alemduma nyi mbia tsa Ruwa aihamba, kyamba Ruwa aimnengya Mumuyo kulaipfo iikenya.
43003035	O Wande nyi akundi Mana chu kamdambikya shindo shose.
43003036	Mndu aidikye Mana o nakuwode na moo fo mlungana. Na mndu ada alaidikya Mana cho o echiwona moo fo mlunganapfo kya indi tuuke ya Ruwa yechikaa irianyi nao.”
43004001	Wafarisayo wakaicho kye Yesu nyi akuwonya waloshe wafoi na iwapatisa kaida Yohane. (
43004002	Kui lohi Yesu amonyi alepatisa wandupfo, nyi waloshe wake nyiwo.)
43004003	Yesu kekiicho isho kawuka kulya Yudaya kawada njia kawuya na kulya Galilaya.
43004004	Na njia ikamtewa nahende idumbwo kulya Samaria.
43004005	Kyasia kashika mṟinyi fumu fo kulya Samaria fu-mdumbuye rina nyi Sikari fukeri kufui na kihamba kilya Yakobo aleinenga mana ulya oke Yosefu.
43004006	Napfondo kuwei soka ya Yakobo. Na Yesu kakoya amayo nyi kyaṟo kahenda idamya kudi oo sokenyi kiheri kya saa tsiṟandaṟu tsa mfiri.
43004007	Kukacha napfo mka o Kisamaria idahya mṟinga. Yesu kambia, “Nenga mṟinga njinyo.” (
43004008	Nyi kipfa waloshe wake wawehendye kulya mṟinyi wahuṟe-pfo shelya.)
43004009	Mka ulya o Kisamaria kambia, “Kyechiwa kida ili iyo ui mndu o Kiyuda konjiterewa mṟinga na inyi njikeri mka o Kisamaria?”
43004010	Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Koye kuweichi kisumbo kya Ruwa na nyiu ichu aideda na iyo kyekuwia, ‘Njirutsa mṟinga njinyo,’ koye uwemwichi nyio uwechimterewa nao awekuenenga mṟinga fuwode moo.”
43004011	Mka ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, a ili kulawode ma kindo kyedahya mṟinga, na ṟungu li lyiileshe lidi nyi hanga ochiende mṟinga fu furie moo?
43004012	Alae iyo ui mnene koida mku ulya odu Yakobo? Nyio aleluenenga ṟungu ili. Nao nyi alewa monyo-pfo mṟinga o amonyi na wana wake na shuma shake nasho.”
43004013	Yesu kahalwo kambia “Oryo mndu ose anyo mṟinga fu o cheiwuya iwado nyi nyoda.
43004014	Indi mndu kanyo mṟinga fu njechimnenga inyi ewado nyoda ma indipfo shika mlungana. Kya indi mringa fu inyi njechimenega ipfo koke nyi fochiwa soka ya mṟinga fuwode moo, na fochimnenga moo fo mlungana.”
43004015	Mka ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, nnenga-ng'u mṟinga fu njilakoye-se yakuka, manya njilakiitike iwuya na iya idahya mṟinga.”
43004016	Nao Yesu kambia, “Henda laha mii opfo uche nao na iya.”
43004017	Mka ulya kahalwo kahamba, “Njiwode miipfo.” Yesu kambia, “Nyi ohamba kya sungusihu kye uwode miipfo.
43004018	Kipfa nyi kulemdao nyi wamii watanu, na ichu ukeri nao wulalu o ai mii opfopfo.” “Ikyo nyi kya lohi ahamba.”
43004019	Mka ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, njiwonyi iyo nyi ukeri mwikimbi.
43004020	Alewo waku walya wadu nyi wawekewikya Ruwa wuindi kunu fumvu-hu li nanyo nyi mokehamba, kye nyi kulya Yerusalemu mpfo kundo kusumhanyi iwikya Ruwa wuindi.”
43004021	Yesu kambia, “Iyo mka, njiidikya, kye kukae kuche kiheri mulakiwikye-se Wande wuindi kunu fumvu-hu manya kulya Yerusalemu.
43004022	Nyo Wasamaria kilya mokeindya mukiichipfo indi so lokeindya kilya lukiichi, kyamba nyi ipfo ko Wayuda mpfo kundu okiio lo wandu luwukye.
43004023	Kya indi kukaa kuche kiheri nakyo kii-ho na wulalu kyechienenga weindya Ruwa wa lohi nyi wechiwikya Wande wuindi wurio nyi Mumuyo na kiwulohi. Kipfa nao Wande amonyi aipfula wai wadi wembikya wuindi wo mbaṟi ii.
43004024	Ruwa nyi ai Mumuyo na wemwindya wawe wembikya wuindi wurio nyi Mumuyo na kiwulohi.”
43004025	Nahong'u mka ulya kambia, “Njiichi kye nyi kochicha Mesia elaho nyi Kristo. Nao mandi echicha o echilutambahaluya orio kindo.”
43004026	Yesu kambia, “Nao nyio inyi njideda na iyo.”
43004027	Kashika oo waloshe wake wakacha wakaṟihio wakoya aideda na mndu mka. Indi kulakae-pfo ambesa nkiki uipfula kokye, angu nkili uideda nao.
43004028	Nahong'u mka ulya kada-ho nungu yake kahenda kulya mṟinyi kahenda iwia wandu walya.
43004029	Kawawia, “Kenjonyiwo muwone mndu ammaa injiwia shose njiletana; kulako nyio Kristo ngesa?”
43004030	Wandu wakakure wawuka kulya mṟinyi wakachea Yesu.
43004031	Ikyi kyechihendeka kidi waloshe wake wakamterewa wakahamba, “Hoi marya, lya kyelya.”
43004032	Nao kawaia, “Inyi njiwode kando njikeri ilya nyo mulakaichi.”
43004033	Waloshe wake wakawesana, “Kulako kuweipfo amwendye wundo wolya ngesa?”
43004034	Yesu kawawia, kyelya kyako nyi ihenda iwuta kilya kikundyo nyi ichu alenjiduma na inutsya iṟunda lyake.
43004035	Nyo chi mokehamba, ke leka kusie meri iina kushike kiheri kyesambwo. Keambuyenyi-wo, inyi ngambia, ke-iryenyi meso hanu muambuye madema ha, shilimu nyi shesambuo.
43004036	Mosambwo aambia wueṟi wokye kechisanyia shilimu kipfa kya moo fo mlungana; kundu ichu mokumba mbeu na ichu mosambwo wasangane wechikesa kimu.
43004037	Kipfa mdedie fu fuhambie, “Mokumba mbeu nyi ungi na mosambwo kawa ungi.
43004038	Njimuduma isambuo kilimu mulalewinyia. Nyi wengi wawinye-ho nanyo mkawona ho kiira kundo ko wawinye.”
43004039	Wasamaria sa wafoi wa kulya mrinyi wakaidikia kipfa kya madedo ha mka ulya, “Nyi anjiongoya shindo njilewuta shose.”
43004040	Wasamaria walya ili walekoya Yesu walemterewa natsinde kowo. Nao kakaa-pfo mfiri iwi.
43004041	Na wandu wafoi wakaingiki wakamwidikya kipfa kya mloshye fokye.
43004042	Wakawia mka ulya, “Kye lokiidikya-se kimaduma kya kilya uhambie iyopfo. Kyamba nyiso luwenyi lomwicho lukawuta-ho imanya kye ichu nyio lohi ai Mkiṟi mokiṟa wuyana.”
43004043	Mkonu iya iwi yamsia Yesu kakure kulya kahenda Galilaya.
43004044	Kyamba Yesu amonyi aleṟingishya na pata ke. “Mwikimbi hando alechiindyo nyi ipfo orukyenyi lokye.”
43004045	Ili amaa ishika adi kulya Galilaya Wagalilaya wafoi wakamwambia necha. Kipfa walewona shilya aletana kulya Yerusalemu shose mkonu fulya mnene. Kyamba nawo wawesengudie mkonu fulya mnene fo Pasaka.
43004046	Yesu kawuya ishika-se kulya Kana ya Galilaya kundo aletana mṟinga fukawa mpfinyo. Nahong'u kuwewode mndu mnene aluṟe mana o womi kulya Kapernaumu.
43004047	Nao ili aleicho ke Yesu amcha na kulya Galilaya awuka kulya Yudaya kamhendia kashika kulya kundu ai, kamterewa kye nachiṟe mana ulya okye kyamba nyi kufui nalekie moo.
43004048	Yesu kambia, “Mukamba mulawona shichano sha mawowo na maṟiho hemuṟishisha mochikuidikyapfo.”
43004049	Mnene-chu kambia, “Hoi-wo Mndumii, soka owinyi ukoye manoko alamnenuka.”
43004050	Yesu kambia, “Kuhendye-ng'u manachu opfo nekia.” Mndu ulya kaidikya idedo lilya Yesu ambia kakuhendya.
43004051	Arie njia yesoka na kulya kanyi masinga hake hakacha imwambya wakahamba, “Manopfo amchia.”
43004052	Nao kawatuma saa iya mandi mana alekyo. Wakambia “Nyi wukowu ili saa mfungade lyo modo fulya fulembuka.”
43004053	Nahong'u ndee kakumbuo saa nayo lyandi Yesu alembia, “Manopfo nekukaya na moo.” Nawo wakakuidikya na wa kanyi kokye wose.
43004054	Nayo nyiyo ṟiho ya kawi Yesu ewuta amcha na kulya Galilaya awuka kulya Yudaya.
43005001	Ili numa kuweshikye mkonu mnene fo Wayuda Yesu kahenda ido na kulya Yerusalemu.
43005002	Nahong'u kulya Yerusalemu oo kufui na kichumi kilya kya machondi kukeri-pfo nduwa ilaho rina lyayo kiebri nyi Betesida. Nayo ii na shidangasha sha mholo-holo shitanu.
43005003	Napfo kudamye-pfo mamingi fo wandu waluo wapfu meso na wahuli madende ho, na watangarimi. [Nawo wechiwedaya mṟinga fulya fochikupayapaya,
43005004	cha kipfa ili malaika echisokya kulya nduwenyi ku kiheri kapayapaya mṟinga fulya. Na ulya amewooka isokya ipfo mṟingenyi ili fomekupayapaya kawekuchia ndaṟe yo yakye.]
43005005	Kyasia hando ho kwipfo mndu aluo amaye maka makumi haṟaṟu na nyanya.
43005006	Yesu kawona mndu ulya alee-pfo. Kamanya kye amaye-pfo maheri hafoi. Kambia, “Okunda ichia woe?”
43005007	Mndu ulya aluo kamhalwo, “Mndumii njiwode ma mndu nanjisotsie ipfo nduwenyi ili mṟinga fochikupayapayapfo. Indi ili njii-pfo njihendahenda ungi kawenjiida kasonguo ikusokya-ho.”
43005008	Yesu kambia, “Kyekureng'u nokudike kitaṟa kyapfo nokuchumie-ng'u.”
43005009	Nalyo liyenyi mndu ulya kachia kakudika kitaṟa kilya kyake kachumia. Na mfiri fulya fuwei fo Sabato.
43005010	Nahong'u Wayuda wakacha iwia mndu ulya alechiṟo “Inu nyi Sabato kikusumhanyi iduo kitaṟa kyapfopfo.”
43005011	Nao kawawia, “Mndu ulya anchiṟa anjiwia, kudike kitaṟa kyapfo nokuchumie.”
43005012	Wakambesa, “A mndu ulya akuwia kundike kitaṟa kyapfo nochumia nyiu?”
43005013	Na ulya alechiṟo nalakimanye mbeo-u kyamba Yesu awemedekya ipfo kidi kya mamingi fung'anyi fo wandu fukeri hando halya.
43005014	Kyasia ili numa Yesu kamkoya ipfo hekalunyi kambia, “Ambuya omekuchia-ng'u, ma kulakae unyamaṟe-se ukae nowone kindo kiwichowicho kyechikutowokya.”
43005015	Mndu ulya kakure-pfo kahenda iwuuya Wayuda walya kye mbeo Yesu eemkiṟa.
43005016	Nakyo kikaenenga Wayuda wakawa weṟinjawya Yesu wakapfula meeke fombaha cha kipfa lya alewuta ado mkonu fo Sabato.
43005017	Nao kawahalwo, “Ndeyako nyi aiṟunda kiheri kyoose na inyi daa njiṟunda.”
43005018	Nakyo kikaengeṟa iitika Wayuda wapfule mwaanya fombaha chi kipfa atahachye Sabato tupupfo kya indi nyi ili ahamba kye Ruwa nyi ndee amonyi kechikung'ang'anyisha adi na Ruwa.
43005019	Nahong'u Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mana echiidima itana kindo kui chila yake amonyi kulawode nyi ikyo awona Nde aitana-pfo. Kyamba kindo ndee atana na Mana nakyo kawekitana ado da.
43005020	Kyamba o Wande nyi akundi Mana, kamloṟa orio kindo aitana amonyi shose. Nao echimloṟa na shetana shing'anyi kota isho mukuwutye-ho iṟihio.
43005021	Kyamba chando Wande aṟutsa walya wapfu kawainenga moo, nao Mana na wudo-ng'u iwo akunda kawainenga moo.
43005022	Kyamba Wande alaanduya mndu o wandu ma umu kya indi Mana nyio amdambikye yanduya li lyose.
43005023	Kundu wandu waindye Mana chando wekeindya Nde. Ichu ada alaindya Mana nyi ada iindya na Nde alemduma.”
43005024	“Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Ichu moanguya dedo lyako madu na iidikya ichu alenjiduma nawode moo fo mlungana. Nao echianduyo manyalepfo, kya indi nyi amsama auka opfunyi kasamya moonyi.
43005025	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Kukaa kuche kiheri na wulalu na kikeri-pfo da lyondo wapfu wechiicho ṟu lya Mana o Ruwa na iwo weliicho wechiwona moo.
43005026	Kyamba chando Wande awode moo fuwukye ipfo kiidi kyake kwenyi nyi wudo da aleinenga Mana ikaa na moo fuwukye ipfo kiidi kyake kwenyi.
43005027	Kawemnenga na wuchili wo idumbwo mondu kipfa akeri Mana chu o Mndu.
43005028	Ma mulaṟihyo kya ikyo, kipfa kukaa kuhoye kiheri ili iwo woose walee ipfo shipfunyi wechiicho ṟu lyake.
43005029	Nawo nyi wechiṟuka. Iwo wawutye hai mecha waṟuke kyewada moo, na iwo wawutye hai mawicho waṟuke kya yanduyo mondu fulya.”
43005030	“Inyi ngaidima iwuta kindo kii kya chila yakopfo. Njekeanduo mondu mdumbuye fuidikyanyi na kilya ngaicho njewio nyi Wande, na mdumbuye foko nyi fusumuhanyi. Kindo njiiwalya chi kilya njikundi inyipfo; kya indi nyi kilya ichu alenjiduma akundi.
43005031	Kokoya ngakuṟingishya njimonyi kiṟingishyo kyako kyeidikyo kye kii kya lohipfo.
43005032	Indi nyi kuipfo ungi monjiṟingisha. Na inyi njiichi kye kiṟingishyo anjiṟingishya nyi kya lohi.
43005033	Nyo nyi muleduma watichi wanu ko Yohane nao kaṟingishiaho kiilohi kilya.
43005034	Na inyi ma njekewada kuṟingishyo ki-kiwike nyi wandupfo kya indi nyi ngahamba ikyo kundu muhende ikiṟo.
43005035	Yohane nyio awei cha taa yewaa yechilimika, nanyo nyi mlelanga ikukesya na saa yo ya oweṟe lulya.
43005036	Indi inyi njiwode kiṟingishyo kyako king'anyi kota kilya kya Yohane. Kyamba maṟunda njiṟunda halya wande alenjienenga njihaṟunde, naho nyiho hairingishia kye nyi Wande alenjiduma.
43005037	Nao Wande monjiduma kawenjiwikya kiṟingishyo o amonyi. Nanyo mlemeicho ṟu lyake ma mantapfo, ma fana yake mlemeiwone-pfo.
43005038	Ma idedo li lyake mukuwodye nalyo likae ipfo mrimenyi-pfo kipfa ichu alemduma mulalemwidikya.
43005039	Nyo mokyeweṟuwetsa Maṟehyo Maele muichi kulako mochiwonapfo moo fo mlungana, ate maṟeho ho nyi inyi. Naho hainjiṟingishya.
43005040	Nanyo ma mulakunde ikuchea na koko kundu muwade moo fulya.”
43005041	“Kitewe kyako chi iwona kiṟumi ko wandupfo.
43005042	Kya indi nyo njimwichi kye ikunda lya Ruwa muliwode ipfo mrimenyi yanupfo.
43005043	Inyi njicheye kui rina lya Ndeyako, nanyo ma mulanjiambye. Kokoya ungi echicha kui rina lyake amonyi nyi mochimwambya.
43005044	Nyi wuda moidima iidikya nyo ili mokeringa kiṟumi mukeri muiwikyana muwenyi na wenyi, na kiṟumi kilya kicheye ko Ruwa amonyi mulaikiwalya?
43005045	Ma mulawone mohamba kye nyio inyi nyechimkumba ipfo ko Wande. Mose chu mumkusihye nyio echimkumba.
43005046	Kyamba kokoya muweidikye Mose na inyi muwenjiidikya, kyamba Mose o aṟehye kya injihamba inyi.
43005047	Indi kokoya mulaidikie shilya aleṟehya, nyi wuda mochiidikya madedo inyi njideda?”
43006001	Kyasia ili numa Yesu kahenda yambada nduwa ya Galilaya (ilaho ya Tiberia) kaambadya kya kulya molyolya.
43006002	Mamingi fung'anyi fo wandu wakamwosha kipfa ili wandu wo walewona ṟiho alewuta tsechiṟa wandu waluo.
43006003	Yesu kahenda ido na kundo ko fumvu-hu wakadamya-ho wo na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye.
43006004	Na mkonu fulya mnene fo Wayuda fulya fo Pasaka nyi kufui fuhoye.
43006005	Nahong'u Yesu kekiirya meso hakye kekiwona mamingi fung'anyi fochikuchea na alyando ai nao kawia Filipo, “A kundo lochihuṟa mkate fo wandu wa wakulie nyi ku ngesa?” (
43006006	Nao kehamba ado nyi kyeseenga Filipo cha kipfa nyi aweichi kindo arie iwuta.)
43006007	Filipo kamhalwo, “Kyakyo ma mkate fo shilingi (dinari) mahana hawi fochiwashika mndu nawone-ho ma kipeṟengupfo.”
43006008	Umu o wa kiloshyonyi kyake ewio rina lyake nyi Andrea ai manomae o Simon Petro kambia.
43006009	“Kunu nyi kuwode manake awode mkate ya ngano itanu na makunga hawi. Kyechiwiko cha iki wandu wamfo wado?”
43006010	Yesu kahamba, “Damiṟenyi wandu wo wadamye wanda.” Napfo nyi kuwewode-pfo maṟa hafoi. Nahong'u wasoṟo walya wakadamya wanda washikye cha shiku shitanu.
43006011	Naho Yesu kawada mkate iya kaidapfuma Ruwa kahawya wandu walya wadamye, na mkunga halya kawewahawya chando wakundi.
43006012	Wekiidima ikuihudya Yesu kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyakye, “Doduonyi-ho shipeṟengu sho shitsihee-ho shiladekye wanda.”
43006013	Wakadodwo-ho shipeṟengusho sha mkate shiletsuha wandu wamlya wakaichuṟa shikunja ikumi na shiwi.
43006014	Kyasia wandu wekiwona ṟiho lilya Yesu awuta wakahamba, “Nyi kya lohi ichu nyi akeri mwikimbi ulya aimteṟye nache kunu wuyana.”
43006015	Kyasia Yesu kekimanya nyi icha wai wache wahende imbika mangi nao kasheṟuka, kahenda alya fumvu-hu o amonyi.
43006016	Kyasia ili kyukanyi wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakasoka na kulya mawambao ha nduwa.
43006017	Wakado alya ngalawehu, wakahenda yambadya kya kulya Kapernaumu. Na mema fuhoye-pfo na Yesu alawemewakoye.
43006018	Na nduwa iya ikahalukahaluka mnu masinanu otanu lochiida-ho sa lung'anyi.
43006019	Naho ili wa kiloshionyi wammaa ihendesho na ngalawa iya mhendo fo saa imu ang'u kufui nayo (kilometa5-6) nalyo wakawona Yesu kyechichumia huya mṟinga, amshika kufui na ngalawa iya wakaangalala.
43006020	Yesu kawawia, “Nyio inyi, ma mulaowuo.”
43006021	Nawo wakakunda imdosya ipfo ngalaweny. Nalyo liyenyi wakakoya ngalawa yamshika alya ohambe-hu lo oruka lulya kundo waihenda.
43006022	Nahong'u ili lya ngama mamingi fulya fo wandu walya waledeo wahoṟoki kulya molyolya ya nduwa iya wakakoya ke kwipfo-se ngalawa ingipfo shile iya imu iweipfo na Yesu alesangana na wa kiloshyonyi kyakye ido nawo alya ngalawe-hupfo. Nyi walya wa kiloshyonyi kyakye walehenda wo wawenyi.
43006023	Kyasia kukacha napfo ngalawa tsingi tsiwuka kulya Tiberia tsikashika kufui na alya ndo walelia mkate iya Mndumii ammaa iadapfuma Ruwa.
43006024	Nahong'u mamingi fulya fo wandu ili wakoya Yesu nalaiho manya wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wakahenda ido alya ngalawehu tsilya wakashika kulya Kapernaumu, wechimpfula.
43006025	Nawo ili walemkoya alya ohambe-hu lulya lungi lo nduwa wakambia, “Marya a nyi indi omshika kunu?”
43006026	Yesu kawahalwo kahamba, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Kyamwenenga monjiwalya chi maṟiho halya mulewonapfo, nyi kimaduma kya mkate iya mulelya mukaihuda.
43006027	Mlawinyie kelya kyechipuo; winyienyi kyelya kyechikaa kipfa kya moo fo mlungana nakyo nyi Mana chu o mndu echimwenenga. Kyamba Wande nyio Ruwa nyi alembikya mhuri yemṟingishya kye nyio.”
43006028	Nawo wakambia, “Alewo luwike luda lukoye itana maṟunda ha Ruwa?”
43006029	Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Iṟunda lilya liwawaso nyi Ruwa aili, kye kundu muhende iidikya ichu alemduma.”
43006030	Nahong'u wakambia, “A nyi kiki otana kyeluloṟa kichano so lukiwone luwute-ho ikuidikya iyo. Nyi owika-pfo kuda ngesa?
43006031	Waku walya wadu wo walelya Manna kulya olelenyi lulya chando ki-kiṟehye kyehamba, Alewaenenga mkate folya fuwukye ruwehu.”
43006032	Nahong'u Yesu kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Chi Mose amuinengye mkate fu fuwukye ipfo ruwehupfo. Nyio Wande oko amuenenga mkate fu fo lohi fuwukye ruwehu.
43006033	Kyamba mkate fu fui fo Ruwa nyio ichu asokye ruwehu kechienenga wuyana wu moo.”
43006034	Nahong'u wakambia, “Hoo Mndumii, keluenengewo mkate fu kiheri kyose.”
43006035	Yesu kawawia, “Nyio inyi njikeri mkate fu fo moo. Mndu akuchea na koko akiwado-se nyi njaapfo, na mndu awa monjiidikya nakirohyo-se nyi nyoda ma indipfo.
43006036	Kya indi ngammaa imbia, kye nyi mulenjiwona manya mulanjiidikie.
43006037	Iwo woose Wande amenjienenga wo wechikuchea na koko. Na mndu akuchea na koko njechimfunya njapfo.
43006038	Kipfa kyannenga ngasoka ruwehu chi kundu njiwute kya chila yakopfo kya indi kundu njihende iwuta kii kya chila ya ichu alenjiduma.
43006039	Na kilya ichu alenjiduma achilia kikeri kii-le, njiladetseho ma umu o walya alenjiinenga kya indi kundu njiṟutse woose Mfiri fulya fofurumia.
43006040	Kyamba kindo Wande oko akundi nyi ikyi kye oryo mndu awona Mana na imwidikya nawade moo fo mlungana. Na inyi njechiwaṟutsa Mfiri fo urumia.”
43006041	Nahong'u Wayuda wakawoka inunuwa kyake ili ahamba, “Inyi nyi mkate fu fo moo fuchee ruwehu.”
43006042	Wakahamba, “Ashika-wo ichu chio Yesu ai mana o Yosefu? Nde na mae na luwaichi. Nyi kyawa kida ili ahamba kye nyi asokye ruwehu?”
43006043	Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Lekyenyi inunuwa nyo muwenyi na wenyi.
43006044	Kwipfo mndu eidima icha na kokopfo, kulawode wande ichu alenjiduma amhomwo napfo, na inyi njechimṟutsa Mkonu fulya foimarisya.
43006045	Waikimbi waleṟehya, ‘Wandu woose wechilosho nyi Ruwa.’ Nahong'u oryo mndu ose aadanya kiwuka ko Wande na ikulosha nyi aicha na koko.
43006046	Chi kikeri cha ili kwipfo mndu alemewona Wandepfo, shila nyi ichu awukie ko Ruwa, nyio alemewona Wande.
43006047	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Ichu aidikie nyi awode moo fo mlungana.
43006048	Inyi nyi mkate fo moo.
43006049	Waku walya wanu wo walelya Mana kulya nuka wakawepfa.
43006050	Aifu mkate fusokye ruwehu; kundu wandu wechilya-ho walakikoyese ipfa.
43006051	Nyio inyi nji mkate fu fo moo fusokye ruwehu. Mkate fu mndu ailya-ho nechikaa na moo mlungana. Na mkate fo njechimnenga mfo mbihufu foko njifulekia njiwonesye nafo wuyana wu moo.”
43006052	Lyo likatewa Wayuda wakaloyana wawenyi na wenyi wakahamba, “A nyi wuda ichu echiidima iluhavya nyama tsake lukulile ngesa?”
43006053	Nahong'u Yesu kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mukada mulalya nyama tsa Mana chu o mndu na inyo samu yake mochikaa ma na moo fu mufuriepfo.
43006054	Mndu kalya nyama tsako na inyo samu yako nyi awode moo fo mlungana na inyi njechimṟutsa Mkonu fulya foimarisya.
43006055	Kyamba nyama tsako tso kando ka lohi na samu yako nyi yo kyenyo kya lohi.
43006056	Na mndu kalya nyama tsako kawenyo samu yako nyio akaa kiidi kyako na inyi njikaa kiidi kyakye.
43006057	Kikawa chando Wande chu alenjiduma akeri menyi-moo na inyi njii na moo kimaduma kya Wande na wudo da ichu anjilya inyi nyi akaa na moo kimaduma kyako.
43006058	Ifu mfo mkate fusokye ruwehu, fulai fo mbaṟi imu na mana iya waku walya walelya wakawepfa. Mkate fu mndu kafulya o echiwada mo mlungana.”
43006059	Na kundo alehambya madedo ho nyi ipfo sinagogenyiyi ya kulya Kapernaumu echiloshya-ho.
43006060	Nahong'u wa kiloshyonyi kyake wamwicho adeda ado wawo wafoi wakahamba, “Madedo ho nyi maumu. A mndu eidima ihaicho nyi wu?”
43006061	Nao Yesu kamanya ke wa kilohyonyi kyake nyi wainunuwa kya ikyo. Nalyo kawawia, “A ikyo kyamutewa mkawa kiṟumaṟuma?
43006062	Alewo nyi kyechiwa kida kiheri mochiwona Mana chu o Mndu echido na alya kundo awekukeṟye-ho kacha?
43006063	Mumuyo mfo fuiwika moo, mbihufu fumenyi fochiidima kindopfo. Madedo ho ngamemuwia ho hai ha Mumuyo hakawewa na moo.
43006064	Indi ipfo kiidi kyanu nyi kwipfo maata walai waidiki.” (Kyamba wuka kiwokyonyi Yesu aweichi walya walamwidikye nyi wahya na ulya echimtwaṟa nyio u.)
43006065	Nalyo kahamba, “Nkyo kimaduma ngamuwia, Kwipfo aidima icha na kokopfo shila nyi ichu ai mṟamtse nyi Wande oko.”
43006066	Kipfa kya madedo-ha, wandu wa ipfo kiloshyonyi wafoi wakawuya na numa walakihendesane-se nao.
43006067	Nahong'u Yesu kawesa walya ikumi na wawi, “Kulako nanyo mokunda ikuhendya ngesa?”
43006068	Simon Petro kamhalwo, “Hoi Mndumii lukuhendye ko u ngesa? Nyio iyo uwode madedo haende moo fo mlungana.
43006069	Natso lomekuwutya-ho ikuidikya lukakumanya ke iyo nyi ukeri Mwele chu o Ruwa.”
43006070	Yesu kawahalwo, “A chio inyi njilemusambuṟa nyo ikumi na wawi? Na ipfo kiidi kyanu umuho kawuya iwa mkumbi?”
43006071	Yesu alehamba ado kya Yuda Iskariote ai mana o Simon. Kyamba nao nyio alehenda imtwaṟa ma ili awei umu o walya ikumi na wawi.
43007001	Nahong'u ili numa numa Yesu naweida kulya Galilaya. Kyamba alalekunda itengeta kulya Yudaya kipfa wasongoru wa Wayuda wawekundi imbaha.
43007002	Na Mkonu mnene fo Wayuda fomanya Matengo iwei kufui.
43007003	Nahong'u wanawamae wakambia, “Kure kunu nohende ishika kulya Yerusalemu kundu na wa kiloshyonyi kyapfo wawone ngata tsi tsapfo otana.
43007004	Kyamba kwipfo mndu etana kindo kiṟika namanyikye isangenyi-pfo. Kokoya owuta shindo shii shidi henda kuloṟe-ng'u na wuyana wu.” (
43007005	Kyamba ma wanawamae wawememwidikie-pfo.)
43007006	Nahong'u Yesu kawawia, “Kiheri kyako kyamshikapfo. Indi nyo kiheri kii kyanu kyo kihianyi na mkonu yose.
43007007	Ma wuyana wu woidima imusuo nyopfo. Indi inyi wanjisuo kipfa kya kiṟingishyo kyako njiwikye kimaduma kyawo njihamba ke mawuto hawo hai mawicho.
43007008	Nyo kudoyenyi na kulya mkonu ii mnene. Inyi njihenda ido napfo mkonu yo mnenepfo kipfa heri lyako lilandeshika ihoya.”
43007009	Amdeda nawo ado o amonyi kakaa kulya Galilaya.
43007010	Kyasia wanawamae wamedo napfo kya mkonu iya mnene iipfo nao Yesu kawedo napfo kyaṟo kilawei kya pata.
43007011	Wasongoru wa Wayuda walya wakawa wempfula-pfula ili lya mkonu iya mnene wakahamba, “Alewo o nyiku-aya ngesa?”
43007012	Na wandu walya wafoi waweiho wakachila mnu kyake. Walya maata wakahamba, “O ai mcha wyo.” Maata wakahamba, “Ote nyi adekesha wandu.”
43007013	Ma kudo kulakae-pfo mndu adeda kyake na pata kipfa nyi waowoye wasongoru walya wa Wayuda.
43007014	Nahong'u mkonu iya mnene ishikie kyenga Yesu kahenda kulya hekalunyi kadamia-ho echilosha wandu.
43007015	Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakaṟihio wakahamba, “A mndu chu nyi wuda aichi mapfundo nao alalesoma shule?”
43007016	Nahong'u Yesu kawahalwo kahamba, “Mloshye yo yako njilosha nayo chi yako inyipfo kya indi nyi ya ichu alenjiduma.
43007017	Mndu akundi iṟunda shilya Ruwa akundi nyio echimanya kya mloshye yo yako kokoya nyi ipfo ko Ruwa iwukye ang'u kokoya nyi ngadeda kiwukye koko inyi njimonyi.
43007018	Ichu ekyekuhambia kyakye tupu o apfula iwikyo kiṟumi o amonyi. Indi mndu atambahanya iwonya ichu alemduma kiṟumi o akeri mhendeli alawode mtaambo, o lohi.
43007019	Alewo chio Mose amunengye wuwawaso? Na kunu kiidi kyanu kuipfo ma umu aiindia wuwawaso wupfo. Kimaduma nyi ki ili mukundi injiwaha?”
43007020	Wandu walya wakuwumbie-ho wakahalwo. “Nyi uisuko! Nyiwu akundi ikuwaha?”
43007021	Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Nyi ngata imu njiletana nanyo mukaṟihio kyayo.
43007022	Mose nyi amwinengye mṟumo fo odino, Ma chi ipfo ko Mose fuwukyepfo kya indi nyi ipfo ko waku walya. Nanyo mokedina mndu na mkonu fo Sabato.
43007023	Kyasia kokoya mndu naidino ili lya Sabato kundu wuwawaso wo Mose wulahende itahachyo nkili monjiwadya nyashi ili njilechiṟa mndu pyu mkonu fo Sabato?
43007024	Mulawone modumbwo mondu mochiadanya ora lumu. Dumbwonyi mdumbuye fo sungusihu.”
43007025	Nahong'u wandu maata wa kulya Yerusalemu wakahamba, “Alewo chio ichu wawempfulya mweke fombaha?
43007026	Ambuyenyi! Nyi aiwaikimba na pata walambie ma kindo. Kulako wasongoru walemanya kye nyio Kristo ngesa?
43007027	Kya indi mndu chu nyi lumwichi kundu awukye, na kiheri Kristo echicha kwipfo mndu echimanya kundo echichapfo. Kyaindi so luichi kundu awukie.”
43007028	Lyo likaenenga Yesu ipfo hekalunyi kundo ailosha kaira ṟu kahamba, “Ee-da na muwenjiichi na kundo njiwukye na muweichi da. Na inyi njicheye kui chila yako njimonyipfo. Kwipfo mokilohi alenjiduma, nao ma mulamwichi nyo.
43007029	Inyi njimwichi, kyamba nyi ipfo koke njiwukye nao nyi anjidumye.”
43007030	Nahong'u wakawa wepfula mweke fombada mondu, ma kulakae-pfo mndu alekaria imleshia owokonyi kipfa kiheri kyake kilawemshike.
43007031	Nahong'u ipfo maminginyi fo wandu wafoi-ho wakawuta-ho imwidikya o, wakahamba, “Kiheri Kristo echicha a nechiwika shichano shing'anyie iishi ichu alewika ngesa?”
43007032	Wafarisayo wakaichowandu waideda kya Yesu shiwehewehe shidi naho wakohanyi walya wang'anyi na Wafarisayo wakasangana wakaduma wasoṟo wawo wahende imbada.
43007033	Yesu kahamba, “Nyi kiheri sa kyangu njitsinda-se nanyo njihende ko ichu alenjiduma.
43007034	Mochinjiwalya mulechinjikoya. Kyamba kundo inyi njechikaa moidima ishika-ho nyopfo.”
43007035	Nahong'u Wasongoru wa Wayuda walya wakadeda wo wenyi na wenyi, “Akawo mndu chu nyi hanga aihenda napfo naso lude lulamkoya-se? Kulako akunda ishika ko Wayuda walya wanyanyaṟikye ipfo masangenyi ha Wagriki nahendelosha-pfo Wagriki wo?
43007036	Kimaduma nkiki ili ahamba, mochinjiwalya mulechinjikoya na ipfo kundo inyi njechikaa moidima ishika-ho nyopfo?”
43007037	Naho ili komshika mkonu fulya mnene foimarisya nafo fui mtoṟu kota ingi Yesu kahoroka-ho kaira ṟu ling'anyi kahamba, “Kokoya kwiho mndu awodo nyoda nakucheye na koko nache inyo.
43007038	Mndu kanjiidikya inyi kyake kyechiwa chando kiikiṟehye kyehamba, ke mndu chu ipfo mrimenyi fokye kochisoka-pfo meda ya mra fo mṟinga fuwode moo.”
43007039	Nakyo nyi alededa kya macheyenyi ha fo Mumuyo Mwele, fulya wandu wamwidikye wekaa wafuambie. Kyamba mandi halya Mumuyo Mwele fulawemsokye kipfa Yesu alawemeng'anyisho.
43007040	Wandu maata wa ipfo maminginy fo wandu wekiicho adeda adi wakahamba, “Ichu nyi lohi ai mwikimbi ulya.”
43007041	Wengi wakahamba, “Ichu nyio Kristo.” Wengi wakahamba, “Alewo Kristo nawukye kulya Galilaya?
43007042	Mareho Maele hahambieki? Hahambye, ke Kristo echicha awukye kishariny kya Dawidi,” na echifeo ipfo Betlehemu ipfo mṟiny fo Dawidi.
