43007043	Nahong'u mamingi fulya fo wandu fukadumbukana kawi kimaduma kyake.
43007044	Kukawekaa-pfo wandu wangu wakundi imbada indi kulakaepfo mombada.
43007045	Nahong'u wasoṟo walya wadume wakawuya na kulya ko wakohanyi wanene na Wafarisayo. Nawo wakawawia, “A nyi kyi kyaima mulamwende?”
43007046	Wasoṟo walya wakahalwo, “Kulandewoneke msa adeda cha mndu chupfo.”
43007047	Wafarisayo wakawahalwo, “Nanyo namuiwatandawushe?
43007048	Mlemewona mndu msongoru ma umu tupu amemwidikya ang'u o ipfo ko Wafarisayo?
43007049	Kya indi moṟimboho fu fo wandu fulaichi wuwawaso, wo Mose; wai wasese!”
43007050	Umu-ho nyi Nikodemo ulya alesahya Yesu kacha, nao nyi o ipfo kiidi kyawo kawawia.
43007051	“Alewo wuwawaso wu luwode nyi wokewonya mndu owingo kulawode nyi ammaa yadanyo komeshika itichyo kilya kyake aletana ngesa?”
43007052	Nawo wakahalwo wakambia, “Kulako na iyo nyi uwukye kulya Galilaya? Suma Maṟehyo Maele teṟe nomanye, ke kulya Galilaya kochikure-pfo mwikimbi manyale-pfo.” [
43007053	Wakahenda oryo mndu na kanyi kokye.
43008001	Nahong'u Yesu kahenda kulya fumvunyi lya mtsinepfu.
43008002	Ili lya ngama ngamenyi kaida-se na ipfo hekalunyi Wandu waipfo woose wakamwosha, nao kadamya-pfo kechiwalosha.
43008003	Nahong'u Walaanyi wa shitabu na Wafarisayo wakaende napfo mka amtumukyo wuṟuhuinyi. Wakamhoṟotsa oo makiidi hawi.
43008004	Wakawesa Yesu, “Alewo Mwarya, Mka chu amtumukyo wuhuṟuinyi.
43008005	Mose aluwawasye ipfo Wuwawasonyi wodu kya waka wa mbaṟi ii kye lowakapa na maho. Na iyo nyi ohamba kuda kya iki ngesa?”
43008006	Kyainenga wadeda wadi nyi ili wakundi imhesha wawone kitewe kyemkumba. Na Yesu kakuaramya wanda kechiṟehia na kimnyo ipfo teri-hu.
43008007	Naho ili waleisima imbesa kahoṟoka kawawia, “Ichu onu alai na mti o naase imkapa na iho.”
43008008	Nahong'u kawuya kakuaramya-se lingi wanda kechiṟehya teri-hu.
43008009	Nawo wamicho wado wakawoka ituṟuka-ho umu umu wakawokya na wameku wakatana wasia-ho. Na Yesu kadeo-pfo amonyi na mka ulya ahoṟoki oo kiidi.
43008010	Nahong'u Yesu kekihoṟoka kawesa mka ulya, “Nyiku waya wandu walya? Kokaa-pfo ma umu akuwutya kya mti fulya?”
43008011	Mka ulya kahamba, “Ma umupfo, Mndumii.” Nahong'u Yesu kambia, “Manya inyi njikuwonya kya mti fulyapfo. Kuhendye. Kowuka-ho dumbuya teṟe, ulakinyamaṟe-se.”]
43008012	Nahong'u Yesu kawuya kadeda nawo lingi kahamba, “Inyi nyi sa ya wuyana. Mndu anjilatya nakihenda-se memenyipfo. Nechikaa ai na sa yende moo.”
43008013	Nahong'u Wafarisayo wakambia, “Iyo nyi okuṟingishya kyapfo kumonyi. Kiṟingishyo kyo kyapfo kii kya lohipfo.”
43008014	Yesu kahalwo kawawia, “Na kokoya ngakuṟingishya kyako njimonyi, kiṟingishyo kyako na kii kya lohi da nyi kipfa njiichi kundo njiwukye na kundo njihenda. Indi nyo mulaichi ma kundo njiwukye ma kundo njihenda.
43008015	Nyo mokedumbwo mochiambuya fana ya nja, indi inyi njidumbwo kya mndupfo.
43008016	Na kokoya ngadumbwo kya mndu mdumbuye foko nyi fo sungusihu fowa fuichi kimaenyi cha kipfa njilaiho njimonyi. Wande-chu alenjiduma nai na inyi.
43008017	Ma ipfo wuwawasonyi wonu nyi kii-kiṟehye kyehamba, ke kiṟingishyo kii-kiwike nyi wandu wawi nyi kya lohi.
43008018	Nyio inyi njii mṟingishi njikuṟingishya kyako chando kii, na wandechu alenjiduma kaṟingishya kyako da.”
43008019	Nahong'u wakambia, “Wande chu opfo nyi ku aya?” Yesu kahalwo, “Inyi munjiichipfo ma Wande mumwichi-pfo. Kima muwenjiichi inyi na Wande oko na muwemmanya da.”
43008020	Nyiho madedo Yesu alededa ipfo kiṟihenyi hando njosano tsekeambyo kechilosha wandu ipfo Hekalunyi. Ma kulakaepfo mndu ambada cha kipfa kiheri kyakye kilawemeshikye.
43008021	Yesu kawuya kawawia lingi, “Inyi njikuhendya nanyo mochinjipfula. Na mochikupfia ipfo wunyamarinyi wonu. Kundo kulya inyi njikuhendya nyo mochiidima ishika-ho pfo.”
43008022	Wasongoru wa Wayuda wakahamba, “Kulako akundi ikuwaha Nki ili ahamba kye kundo kulya njikuhendya mochiidima ishika-ho nyopfo?”
43008023	Yesu kawawia, “Nyo nyi kunu wuyana mupaṟikye, inyi kipaṟika kyako nyi kulya huye. Nyo mui wandu wa wuyana, inyi chi o wuyanapfo.
43008024	Nkyo kitewe ngamuwia-ng'u, Nyi ipfo wunyamaṟinyi wonu kundo mukeri mpfondo mochikupfia. Kyamba kokoya mulechiidikya kye, ‘Inyi nyio.’ Na ipfo wunyamaṟinyi wonu kundo mukeri mpfondo mochikupfia.”
43008025	Nawo wakambia, “Alewo iyo o ku ngesa?” Yesu kawawia, “Njilemuwia wokya o, ke kilya njideda nanyo idumbwo kyanu njileicho.
43008026	Njiwode shifoi shededa kyanu na idumbwo kyanu. Kya indi ichu alenjiduma akeri menyi-wukilohi, na inyi shilya njileicho shiwuka kokye nsho njiiwia wa wuyana.”
43008027	Nawo ma walamanye ke aideda nawo kii kya Wande.
43008028	Nahong'u Yesu kahamba, “Mukamshika iiria Mana chu o mndu mpfondo mochimanya ke, ‘Inyi nyio;’ na imanya ke njiwode kindo ngiwuta ki kya chila yako njimonyi-pfo kyaindi ikyo Wande alenjilosha nkyo njihamba.
43008029	Na ichu alenjiduma nyi ahendesanyi na inyi. Ma anjida njikae njimonyi-pfo kipfa nyi njiwuta shichihianyi nao mfiri yose.”
43008030	Kyekimaa ideda ado wandu wafoi wakamwidikia.
43008031	Nahong'u Yesu kadeda na Wayuda walya wamwidikye kahamba, “Kokokya mokaa mukuwode na dedo lyako lyo-ng'u mochiwa wa kiloshyonyi kyako wa lohi.
43008032	Na imanya mochimanya wukilohi wu, na wukilohi wu wochimwashwo muwe wenyi-mkuachie.”
43008033	Nawo wakamhalwo, “So lui luwa lya Abrahamu, lulandewe masinga ha mndu ma indipfo. Kyawa kida ili ohamba, Muwe wenyimkuachie?”
43008034	Yesu kawahalwo, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Oryo mndu mowuta wunyamaṟi akeri isinga lyesingya wunyamaṟi.
43008035	Isinga ekyekaa na menyi ipfo kanyi kiheri kyosepfo. Mndu mokaa kanyi kiheri kyose nyi Mana.
43008036	Kokoya ichu ai Mana echimwashwo lyo-ng'u mochiwa wenyi-mkuachie.
43008037	Njiweichi da nyi mukeri luwa lya Abrahamu. Kya indi nyi mukundi injiwaha kipfa muladikia idedo lyako.
43008038	Inyi kilya njiwonyi ipfo ko Wande nkyo njikeri ihamba. Nanyo kilya momicho kiwukye ko ndeanu nkyo muiwuta.”
43008039	Wakahalwo wakambia, “Ndeyadu nyio Abrahamu.” Yesu kawawia, “Kokoya muwei wana wa Abrahamu nyi muwewuta chandu Abrahamu alewuta.
43008040	Inyi ngamuwia wukiilohi njilewuicho ko Ruwa; na ma kudo mkundi injiwaha. O Abrahamu alewika adipfo!
43008041	Nyo nyi mokewuta mawuto halya halya ha waku wanu walewuta.” Wakambia, “Chi lui-wafee wa njapfo. So luwode Wande umu da nao nyio Ruwa.”
43008042	Yesu kawawia, “Ukoye Ruwa awei Ndeyanu nyi muwenjikunda inyi kyamba inyi njilecha njiwuka ko Ruwa na wulalu njikeri iya. Njilecha kui kyama kyako inyi njimonypfo. Ruwa alenjiduma.
43008043	A kimaduma nyi ki ili mulamanya mdedye foko? Manya mulaidima yadanya idedo li lyako.
43008044	Nyo mui wana wa Mkumbi ulya onu, na mukundi iwuta lango tsa ndeanu. Na ishi shilango nyi Nde chu onyu nyisho mukundi ishiwuta. O awekeri mmbahi, mowaha wandu wokya mawokyonyi; alakuwode wukilohi-hu ma hanga, kipfa wukilohi wulai nao. Ilindi adeda kii wongo kyo kii kyake akiende kii kya chure yake amonyi kipfa akeri mowongo kawa nyio mku mopaṟa shi wongo shose.
43008045	Kya indi inyi njekehamba wukilohi wu nkyo kyaima mulanjiidikye.
43008046	A le nyi wu o kunu konu aidima injiwonya mti fo kindo njiwenyamaṟye? Na kokoya ngahamba wukilohi wu, kitewe mulanjidikye nyi iki ngesa?
43008047	Ichu apaṟikye ko Ruwa o nekeadanya madedo ha Ruwa. Nanyo muinjiadanyiapfo kipfa nyo chi wana wa Ruwapfo.”
43008048	Wayuda walya wakahalwo wakambia, “Chi lohamba kya lohi kye ukeri Msamaria uwodo nyi oṟuṟe?”
43008049	Yesu kahalwo, “Inyi njiwodo nyi oṟuṟe manyalepfo. Inyi njiwikya Wande oko kiṟumi kya indi nyo muidetsa kilya kii kyako.
43008050	Manya njipfula iwada kiṟumi kyakopfo. Na kwipfo umu mokiringa, nao nyi modumbuo mondu.
43008051	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mndu awada madedoho hako echipfa ma indiipfo.”
43008052	Wayuda walya wakambia, “Wulalu lomanyang'u kye uwodo oṟuṟe! Abrahamu nalepfa na waikimbi wakawepfo da; na iyo kohamba, ‘Ichu echikuwada na idedo lyapfo echipfa ma indipfo.
43008053	Akawo iyo ui mnene kong'anya mku odu Abrahamu ngesa, nao nyi alewepfa? Na waikimbi walya wakawepfa da. Nyi okutana cha wu iyo kumonyi ngesa?’ ”
43008054	Yesu kahalwo, “Kokoya ngakung'anyisha njimonyi mng'ano foko fuwechiwa kindopfo. Wande chu oko mochekyehamba nyio Ndeanu nyio ainjing'anyisha.
43008055	Ma mulalememmanye. Kyaindi inyi njimwichi. Kokoya ngahamba njimwichipfo nyi njiwechiwa mowongo chanyo. Kya indi njimwichi na idedo lii lyake lyo njiliringa.
43008056	Abrahamu mku chu onu nyi alekesa kya iwona mkonu fu foko nao kafuwona kachihio.”
43008057	Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakambia, “Alewo iyo omshitsa ma maka makumi hatanu-pfo, kohamba nyi kulewona Abrahamu?”
43008058	Yesu kawawia, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mandi Abrahamu alawemefeo inyi njiwei-pfo.”
43008059	Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakaira maho wamkumbye. Nao Yesu kasheṟuka kawuka ipfo hekalunyi.
43009001	Na ili Yesu aweiida kawona mndu apfie meso kui ifeo.
43009002	Na walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambesa, “Alewo Mwaria, mndu anyamaṟyeho nyi uhya, nyio ichu a nyi wafee wakye ili alewoneka ado ai mpfu meso?”
43009003	Yesu kahalwo, “Ma chi ichu ma chi wafee wakyepfo. Kya indi nyi kilewa kido kundu pfinya Ruwa iwono yechirunda ipfo kokye.
43009004	Kui na sa kiluwaṟi luṟunde maṟunda na ichu anjidumye; kipfa kio kiicha kiheri mndu elechiidima iṟunda maṟunda.
43009005	Mandi njikeri kunu wuyana njii sa ya wuyana.”
43009006	Kyekihamba ado kapuchya mada ipfo wanda, mada halya kawumbawumba naho mbumba fo teri. Mbumba fulya fo teri kafushia kulya mesonyi ha mpfu meso.
43009007	Kambia, “Kehenda kusanje kulya nduwenyi ya Siloamu.” (Kohalwo nyi kimu na “Mndu mdume.”) Nao mpfu meso ulya kakuhendya-pfo kakusanja, adi kawuya kechiambwo.
43009008	Kyasia walya wamṟasa wake na walya walembona lya awei maliomba wakahamba, “A lae ichu chi mkiwa ulya echidamya kawa maliomba?”
43009009	Wengi wakahamba, “Chiopfo lang'u.” Wengi wakahamba, “Ote nyi mndu afananyi nao.” Nao kahamba, “Ee nyio inyi da.”
43009010	Nahong'u wakambia, “A meso hapfo nyi wuda halewuya itambaṟuka?”
43009011	Nao kahalwo, “Nyi mndu ulya alaho nyi Yesu o amewumba mbumba fo teri kafushia aa mesonyi hako kanjiwia, ‘Henda samba kulya nduwenyi ya Siloamu.’ Nalyo ngamhenda, ngasamba ngaidima iambuo.”
43009012	Wakambia, “A mndu chu nyi ku aya?” Kahamba, “Njichinyi.”
43009013	Nalyo wakahenda iduo mndu ulya awei kipfupfure kulya ko Wafarisayo.
43009014	Na mfiri-pfo Yesu alewumbawumba teri nyi mkonu fo Sabato katambaṟuo meso halya hake.
43009015	Kyasia Wafarisayo nawo da wakambesa-se, “Kuleambuo kuda?” Nao kawawia, “Nyi aleshia mbumba fo teri aa mesonyi, ngamhenda isamba ngakoya-ng'u yambwo.”
43009016	Nahong'u Wafarisayo maata-ho wakahamba, “Mndu chu awukie ko Ruwapfo kyamba ada alaindya Sabato.” Wengi wakahamba, “A mndu mnyamaṟi naidime iwuta ado ṟiho tsa mbaṟi ii ngesa?” Kyasiang'u wakadumbukana kawi.
43009017	Wakawuya wakawia-se kipfupfuṟe ulya, “A iyo kyakye nohamba kuda ili akuambuṟye meso?” Nao kahamba, “Nyi akeri mwikimbi.”
43009018	Nahong'u wasongoru wa Wayuda walya walaidikye kyake kye nyi awepfie meso kawuya yambwo. Wakatana walaha wafee wa mndu ulya alekoya yambwo.
43009019	Wakawawesa wakahamba, “Ichu na mana onu ulya mochekehamba nyi amfee ai mpfu meso? Aka nyi wuda alewiko ili aambuo wulalu?”
43009020	Wafee wakye wakahalwo wakahamba, “Nawo luweichi nyi ai mana odu na ifeo nawei mfee ai mpfu meso.
43009021	Kya indi kundo aendye wuamburu wu kyakyo lokimanyasepfo ma mndu cho alemwambuṟa meso lumwichipfo. Kekumbesyenyi amonyi atoṟikye nechekudedya kyake amonyi!”
43009022	Na kyaenenga wafee walya wakadeda wado nyi waleowuo wasongoru walya wa Wayuda. Kyamba Wayuda walya wawemmaa ideda kyama kyawo kye kokoya mndu echimhamba na pata kye nyio Kristo nawo wambute siṟinyi yawo.
43009023	Nkyo kiletewa wafee wakye wakahamba, “Nyi atoṟikye, kembesenyi o amonyi!”
43009024	Nahong'u wakawuya wakalaha-se mndu ulya awei kipfupfuṟe wakambia, “Hamba lohi oshangunyi lo Ruwa. Kya mndu chu luichi kye nyi akeri mnyamaṟi.”
43009025	Nahong'u mndu ulya kahalwo, “Koka nyi ai mnyamaṟi kyakyo njiichi-pfo. Na kimu tupu njiichi kye mbei kipfupfuṟe ngawuya yambwo wulalu.”
43009026	Wakambia, “A ngesa nyi alekuwika ada? Kakuambuṟa ada meso ho?”
43009027	Mnducho kawahalwo, “A ili ngamembia-se nanyo mulaadanye. Nyi kya ki-se mukundi ikiicho lya kawi. Ngesa nanyo na mbekundi imhalukya muwe wa kiloshyonyi kyake?”
43009028	Wakamruma wakahamba, “Mndu o kiloshyonyi kyake na iyo. So lui wa kiloshyonyi kya Mose.
43009029	Kya Mose nyi luichi kye Ruwa alededa nao. Kya indi mndu chu lumwichi o kupfo!”
43009030	Mndu ulya kahalwo kawawia, “Iki nyi kindo kya kiṟiha ili mulaichi kye nyi o ku, nao alenjiambuṟa meso ha hako.
43009031	So nyi luichi kye Ruwa echiadanya wandu wanyamaṟipfo. Na msa aowoye Ruwa kawuta shilya shimchihie nyio ekyemwadanya.
43009032	Wokya mawokyenyi ha wuyana kulemewonekye mndu aambuṟye meso ha mndu a mfee ai kipfupfuṟe-pfo.
43009033	Kima chila mndu chu awei o ko Ruwa aweidima iwuta kindo-pfo.”
43009034	Nawo wakambia, “A iyo ui mfee kudo ui mnyamaṟi kotana olulosha so?” Nawo wakamtuhuta na nja.
43009035	Kyasia Yesu kaicho kye nyi wamtuhutye na nja. Kekimkumbuhana kambia, “Uidikye Mana chu o mndu ngesa?”
43009036	Nao kahalwo kahamba, “A nyi o wu Mndumii na inyi njikekumwidikya-ng'u.”
43009037	Yesu kambia, “Iwona omembona, na ichu aipfo adeda na iyo nyio.”
43009038	Nao kahamba, “Akawo ngakuidikya hoi Mndumii!” Kakuhutsa wanda na kyamu oo madendeny hake.
43009039	Na Yesu kahamba, “Inyi kindo njikucheye na kunu wuyana nyi ianduya, iwa walawonyi kundu wakoye iwona, na iwa wawonyi kundu wawe shipfupfuṟe.”
43009040	Wafarisayo maata-ho warianyi nao waicho wado wakambesa, “Ngesa naso lui wapfu meso?”
43009041	Yesu kawawia, “Kima mbei wapfu meso muwewa wanyamaṟipfo. Kya indi wulalu momhamba, ‘So nyi lui waamburu,’ na ikyo kyaloṟa mui wanyamaṟi.”
43010001	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, “Mndu kada alaida na mfiṟihenyi fo machondi aida oo mongo, kang'alawuo hando hengi o nyi mwiwi na msoki.
43010002	Indi ichu aiida napfo aida oo mongonyi nyio ai mlisi o machondi.
43010003	Nao mringi o mfiṟiha kawempengeluya kichi. Na machondi halya hakaicho ṟu lyakye. Na machondi halya hai hakye amonyi kahalaha marina haho kahaduo nja.
43010004	Kamaa iduo halya hai hakye nja hose nekehasongoya. Na machondi halya hakamwiwata kyamba haichi ṟu lyakye.
43010005	Indi mndu mhenu hekemlatyapfo, kya indi nyi hekemdicha cha kipfa halaichi ṟu lya wahenu.”
43010006	Nyifong'u mfanano Yesu alewawia. Nawo walamanye ikyo arie iwawia nkyo iki.
43010007	Nahong'u Yesu kawawiase, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, inyi nyi mongo fohenda kundo machondi hai.
43010008	Walya walenjisongoya nyi wawekeri waiwi na wasoki wose kya indi machondi halawaadanye.
43010009	Ngiṟi iya nyio inyi. Mndu aida napfo aidia koko nyechikiṟo na yanga napfo na iwuka napfo nawekoya na uṟa.
43010010	Mndu ai mwiwi nelekecha shila nyi kundu naiwe na ishinja na idetsa. Inyi njilecha napfo kundu mukoye iwada moo na mweena fofo fose.
43010011	“Mlisi mcha nyio inyi. Ichu ai mlisi mcha nyi nekerekya machondi hakye moo.
43010012	Mndu chu ai mekelei ma alakeri mlisi, machondi ho halambaṟi hakye, kyakye kawona rumu lyechicha nao katihia-ho machondi ho kadicha. Na rumu likacha iharakwo na iharahanyitsa.
43010013	Cha kipfa ili o ai mekelei ma echisaṟa machondi hopfo.
43010014	Mlisi mcha nyio inyi. Na inyi njiichi iho hai hako, naho hakawekunjimanya.
43010015	Chando nao Wande anjiichi inyi na inyi njiweichi Wande, Na inyi ngarekya machondi moo.
43010016	Njiwode na machondi hengi-se halakeri ha mfiṟihafu. Kyaho nangaki na njihaende naho. Naho na hecheicho ṟu lyako. Naho kochikaa-ho ipo limu tupu na mlisi na umu mfi.”
43010017	“Nkyo kyaenenga Wande anjikundi ili ngakurekya-ho moo foko kundu njiwuye ifuwada-se lingi.
43010018	Ma kwipfo aifunjisokapfo kya indi nyi ngafulekya kui ikunda lyako njimonyi. Nyi njiwode pfinya ya ifulekya, njiwewode na pfinya ya ifuwada-se. Nyi wudo wande oko alenjiwawasia njiṟunde.”
43010019	Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakawuya idumbukanase kawi kipfa kya madedo halya hake.
43010020	Wafoi wa ipfo kiidi kyawo wakahmba, “Nyi oṟuṟe lumbode na isuko kasuko. A nyi nkya ki-se mumwadanyia?”
43010021	Wengi wakahamba, “Madedo ho adeda chi hakeri cha ha mndu awodo nyi oṟuṟepfo. Alewo mooṟuṟe awechiidima itambaṟuo meso ha shipfupfuṟe ngesa?”
43010022	Nahong'u kushikye mkonu mnene kulya Yerusalemu fokumbwo ngumbwo ya hekalu ilesamyo. Na kiheri kilya kiwei kya mbeo.
43010023	Na Yesu aweichumiachumia ipfo hekalunyi ipfo kiṟihenyi kyalyo kihambo kya Solomon.
43010024	Nalyo Wayuda walya wakacha imtengetia wakahamba, “Mtano indi ochiluwika mkeumkeu? Kokoya ukeri Kristo iyo, keluwie-wo na pata ṟaa.”
43010025	Yesu kawahalwo, “Nyi njilemuwia da nanyo mulaidikye. Maṟunda hako ngiwuta kui rina lya Wande oko, nyiho-ng'u hainjiṟingishia.
43010026	Nanyo ma mulaidikye ili mulakeri kambenyi lya machondi hako.
43010027	Machondi ho hako nyi haicho ṟu lyako. Na inyi njihaichi naho hanjilatya.
43010028	Na inyi ngahaenenga moo fo mlungana. Naho ma hechikaa hadeke-se ma mlunganapfo. Ma kwipfo mndu echiharakwo kunu owokonyi lokopfo.
43010029	O Wande ahanjienengye nyi ang'anye wose. Ma kwipfo mndu aidima iharakwo ipfo mawokonyi ha Wandepfo.
43010030	Inyi na wande lui wamu.”
43010031	Nalyo Wayuda walya wakawuya yende maho wamkape naho.
43010032	Yesu kawahalwo, “Maṟunda hafoi sa mecha ngamaa imbonesya nyo hawuka ko Wande. Ipfo kiidi kyaho nyi liki lyemtewa munjikape na maho ngesa?”
43010033	Nalyo Wayuda walya wakamhalwo, “Chi kimaduma kya iṟunda liwe icha lurie ikukapa na mahopfo. Nyi kimaduma kya ngalali yapfo yeruma Ruwa, na ili iyo ukeri mndu o wandu kokutana Ruwa kumonyi.”
43010034	Yesu kawahalwo, “A ipfo wuwawasonyi wonu chi kuwode-pfo idedo lii iṟehye lyehamba, ke, Inyi njilehamba, ‘Nyo nyi mukeri maruwa?’
43010035	Kyasia walya waleshitsyo idedo lya Ruwa komkoya Ruwa nyi alewasenda maruwa na iki kii-kiṟehye ma kilechiwa ipfunguka.
43010036	Ashika-wo inyi ili njiletano mwele nyi Wande kanjiduma kunu wuyana nyi monjihamba ke nyi ngaruma Ruwa ili ngahamba, njikeri Mana o Ruwa ko?
43010037	Kokoya ngada njilawuta maṟunda ha Wande oko, denyi mulanjiidikye inyi.
43010038	Indi kokoya ngawa mohawuta nahong'u mulanjiidikye inyi modeda, keidikyanenyi na maṟunda ho hako mukuwutye-ho imanya kya kisimirya kye o Wande ai na inyi na inyi njii na Wande.”
43010039	Nahong'u wakawuya wakapfula mweke fombada. Nao kakuashuo ipfo mawokonyi hawo.
43010040	Yesu kawada njia kaambada meda fo Yordanyi kashika kulya kundo Yohane epatsiya kakaapfo.
43010041	Wandu wakamchea wafoi, nawo wakahamba, “O Yohane ma alewuta ngata ya ṟihopfo. Kya indi kilya Yohane alededa kya ichu kyamba iwa kya lohi kyose.”
43010042	Nalyo wandu wa kulya wafoi wakamwidikia.
43011001	Kyasia kuwekeri-pfo mndu aluo nyio Lasaro o kulya Betanyia (o mṟi fulya fo Maria na Marita manawo.
43011002	Na Maria nyi ulya aleshimbwo Mndumii na mafuda ha opfamu sa lucha, kaangatsa madende hake na njui tsa mdonyi fokye. Na msacha chu okye nyio Lasaro ulya aweluo.)
43011003	Nahong'u washiki walya wakye wakamdumya Yesu ndumi wakahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, mbuya yapfo nyi aluo.”
43011004	Yesu kekiicho ado kahamba, “Ndaṟe ii chi ikeri ya opfupfo, chila kipfa kya mng'ano fo Ruwa kundu Mana chu o Ruwa nanganyisho.”
43011005	Na Yesu nyi ekundi Marita na maomae Maria na Lasaro.
43011006	Kyasia amicho Lasaro nyi aluo Yesu katsinda-se mfiri iwi kulyando awekeri.
43011007	Kidima kawia walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake, “Kendeng'u luwuye na kulya Yudaya.”
43011008	Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambia, “Hoi Mwarya, kandi Wayuda walya werie ikukapa na maho, na iyo owuya napfo lingi?”
43011009	Yesu kahalwo, “Saa tsa mfiri chi tsiipfo ikumi na tsiwi? Kokoya mndu achumia kiheri kya mfiri echikapa mtuliapfo kipfa nyi awonyi sa ya wuyana wu.
43011010	Indi kokoya mndu achumia ili kio nechikapa mtulia kipfa sa iya ilakeri nao.”
43011011	Yesu ekihamba adi kawuya kalungyaho kingi kawawia, “Mbuya chu odu Lasaro nyi alee, kya indi njihenda-pfo njimpang'tse.”
43011012	Nahong'u walya wa kiloshyonyi wakambia, “Hai Mwarya, kokoya naleee madonyi nyi echichia.”
43011013	Na Yesu adeda ado kehambaho opfu loke, nawo wakahamba lako nyi aideda kya mahombyenyi ha mado.
43011014	Nalyo Yesu kawawia na pata, “Lasaro ampfa.
43011015	Na inyi ngachihio ili njilawekeriho kipfa kyanu nyo kundu muwuteho iidikya. Indi nndenyi-ng'u luhende kulya kokye.”
43011016	Nahong'u Toma (ulya alaho o mbasa) kawia wodoya walya wa kiloshyonyi “Nndenyi-ng'u naso, luhede ipfa hamu nao!”
43011017	Nahong'u Yesu kekicha-ho kakoya ammaa mkonu iina opangenyi.
43011018	Na kowuka kulya Betanyia ushike Yerusalemu nyi ochimaa mhendo fo kyenga kya saa ushike kilometa tsiṟaṟu(mastadio 15).
43011019	Na Wayuda wafoi wawecheye na kulya kany ko Maria na Marita kundu wechiwawanza kya opfu lo msacha chu owo.
43011020	Nahong'u Marita kekiicho Yesu akeri icha kahenda imwambya na Maria kakaa kulya kanyi.
43011021	Marita kawia Yesu, “Hoi Mndumii, nokoe iyo kuwekeri-iya msacha oko nawechipfapfo.
43011022	Nako na wulalu njiichi oryo kindo ochiterewa Ruwa nao Ruwa echikuenenga kyose.”
43011023	Yesu kambia, “Msacha opfo nyi echikuṟukya.”
43011024	Marita kambia, “Njiichi nyi echikuṟukya iya maṟukyenyi ili Mkonu fulya fofurumya.”
43011025	Yesu kambia, “Inyi nyio wuṟuki na moo. Na mndu anjiidikye nekaa-ho na moo ma kapfa.
43011026	Na ichu aiho na moo kanjiidikya ekaa napfe ma indi-pfo. Ngesa uweidikye kudo?”
43011027	Nao kambia, “Ee-wo Mndumii, nawo ngamekuidikya nyi ui Kristo Mana chu o Ruwa ulya awechicha na kunu wuyana.”
43011028	Kekihamba ado kakure-pfo kahenda ilaha Maria ulya ai manomae kambia kya kiṟika, “Marya amcha nao nyi akulaha.”
43011029	Nao kekiicho ado kakambiṟa ikure owinyi kahenda alyando Yesu ai.
43011030	Na Yesu awemeshikye kulya mṟinyipfo, nawei alyando ekumbuhana Marita.
43011031	Nahong'u Wayuda walya wawei na Maria ipfo mba wechimbanzawanza ili wawonyi Marita akure owinyi chuṟu kehenda nja wakamwosha wehamba kye nyi echihenda ipfo opangenyi ihenda ikapya-pfo kilio.
43011032	Nahong'u Maria kekishika alya ndo Yesu ai kekimbona adi kakuhutsa wanda oo madendenyi hake kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, nokoe iyo uweiho msacha oko nawechipfapfo.”
43011033	Nahong'u Yesu kekiwona kelia na Wayuda walya wacha warianyi nao nawo, kawado nyi rihima ipfo ngoonyi kawa kirihisa o amonyi.
43011034	Kahamba, “Nyi ku mumlaṟye?” Wakambia, “Njoo-wo Mndumii, noambuye.”
43011035	Yesu katonyitsa matihi.
43011036	Nahong'u Wayuda walya wakahamba, “Keambuyenyi chando awemkundi.”
43011037	Nawo maata-ho wakahamba, “A ichu aleweambuṟa-se meso ha kipfupfuṟe kilya nalaidime iima Lasaro nalapfe?”
43011038	Nahong'u Yesu kawuya iwado nyi rihima ipfo ngoonyi lingi kashika oo opangenyi. Na opanga lo luwei utoche na iho li-ihekye oo momu.
43011039	Yesu kahamba, “Keirenyi-ho iho ili.” Marita mshiki o mpfu ulya kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, amshika idaa! Kyamba mkonu fu nyi fo kaana lang'u.”
43011040	Yesu kambia, “A lyando ngawekuwia, Komekuidikya nyi ochiwona wuitoṟi wo Ruwa?”
43011041	Nalyo wakairaho iho lilya. Na Yesu kairya meso huye ruwehu kahamba, “Hoi Wande, ngakuana ili okenjiadanya.
43011042	Na inyi na mbeichi nyi owa monjiadanya kiheri kyose. Kya indi nyi kipfa kya wandu wa wahoṟoki iya waiṟingichye nkyondo ngakihambya kundu wechiwuta-ho iidikya ke nyi iyo unjidumye.”
43011043	Kekihamba ado kakoṟoṟoma na ṟu ling'anyi, “Lasaro, ncho na nja.”
43011044	Nalyo lienyi mpfu ulya kawukaho kacha na nja ampfungye shidami sha nguo madende ho na mawoko ho na kyamu kyake kii-kiwoshye na kidami kya mbiṟuko. Yesu kawawia, “Kempfungwonyi mumlekye nakuhendye.”
43011045	Nahong'u Wayuda wafoi walya wacheye na kulya ko Maria wekiwona kilya Yesu awuta wakamwidikia.
43011046	Na walya maata-ho wakahenda kulya ko Wafarisayo wakawawia kilya Yesu awuta.
43011047	Ko ikyo wakohanyi wang'anyi wakasangana na Wafarisayo wakalaha chila iya ing'anyi ya wanjama wakahamba, “A luwike luda ili mndu chu awa mowuta ngata tsifoi tsido?
43011048	Lukamda nakae ado wandu nyi wechisia ipfo kokye wahende imwidikya wose. Nalyo Waroma wechicha wechilusoka sanga-li na Hekalu-li na inyamaṟa mkambo fodu.”
43011049	Nahong'u o umu ipfo kiidi kyawo nyi Kayafa awei Mkohanyi Ang'anyi o maka fulya o kawawia, “Muichi ma kindopfo.
43011050	Ma mulakusaṟye kye nyi kichaho konu mndu umu napfe hando ha wandu wa sanga lyose kota wandu wa sanga lyose wechiarisika?”
43011051	Na ili alededa ado chi ipfo koke kwenyi liwewukyepfo. Kya indi nyiili awei mkohanyi ang'anyi o maka fulya adeda ado kechihamba kisuku kyeṟingishya kye Yesu ai mteṟye napfe kyekiṟa mkambo fu fowo.
43011052	Ma chi kyekiṟa mkambo fu fo wandu tupupfo kya indi kundu na wana wo wa Ruwa wanyanyaṟikye wo nawasanze wawe wamu.
43011053	Nahong'u wokya mkonu fulya wasongoru wa Wayuda wakachilya ihenda iwaha Yesu.
43011054	Nalyo Yesu nalakiwe-se moidaida na pata ipfo ko Wayuda walya, kya indi kawuka-ho kahenda sangenyi liwe likinganyi na kundo kulya ko olele, kashika mṟinyi folaho Efraimu katsinda-pfo ai hamu na wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
43011055	Nahong'u Pasaka ya Wayuda iwei kufui, wandu wafoi wakahenda ido na kulya Yerusalemu wawuka ipfo sangenyi lilya, Pasaka ilamshika ihoya, wahende ikuilisha.
43011056	Nawo nyi Yesu waweimpfula wakadeda wo wenyi na weny wahoṟoki ipfo hekalunyi wehamba, “A nyi mowona kyawa kida? Nyi lohi nechida alechicha isenguda mkonu ii mnene ngesa?”
43011057	Na wakohanyi walya wang'anyi na Wafarisayo wo wakawawasa na pata wehamba, “Kokoya mndu ammanya kundo Yesu akeri naende mbonyi kundu wakoye imbada.”
43012001	Nahong'u kuwetsuheṟe mfiri iṟandaṟu mkonu mnene fo Pasaka fukishike Yesu kashika kulya Betanyia kundo Lasaro awekyekaa ulya Yesu emṟutsa wapfunyi.
43012002	Napfo wakamsungusia choonga ili kyukanyi. Na mndu mopfuṟukanya-ho m Marita. Na Lasaro nyi ai o ipfo kiidi kya walya wadamye na Yesu kilionyi kya choonga.
43012003	Naho Maria kawuta kiraryo kya mafuda ha mbaṟi ya Nardo ha wuhuru wung'anyi hashikye ratili imu, kacha ishia Yesu madende kawuya kaangatsa madende halya na njui tsake. Mba iya ikarumbalala opfamo lo mafuda halya.
43012004	Na Yuda o Iskariote umu o walya ikumi na wawi ipfo kiidi kya walya wa kiloshyony kyake (nao nyio sa echikaa namtwaṟe Yesu,) kahamba,
43012005	“A mafuda ha kima hakumbo ko dinari mahana haṟaṟu tsiinengo wandu wakiwa nyi ki?”
43012006	Na kyemnenga kahamba ado chi kipfa ili echikusaṟa kya wakiwapfo, nyi ili ai mwiwi arie mfuko fulya na shilya shechidambiko kafoi kawa moṟoṟokwo-ho.
43012007	Naho Yesu kahamba, “Mulawinyishe mka-chu kumdeye-ng'u nahende ihasuṟuma kuwede mkonu foko fo iṟiko.
43012008	Kyamba wandu wakiwa nyi mukeri nawo mafiri hose, mndu mulakeri nao mafiri hose nyio inyi.”
43012009	Nahong'u mamwingi fulya fung'anyi fo ipfo ko Wayuda ili wamwicho ke Yesu nyi kulya Betanyia ai wakacha napfo chi kimaduma kya iwona Yesu tupupfo, indi nyi kundu wawone na Lasaro ulya emṟutsa wapfunyi.
43012010	Na wakohanyi walya wang'anyi wakadumbwo chila kundu wawahe na Lasaro.
43012011	Kipfa nyio aletewa Wayuda wafoi wakawa wakalekana na wasongoru wawo; wakaidikya Yesu.
43012012	Kyasia ili lya ngama mamwingi fo wandu fulya fucheye napfo kya mkonu fulya mnene wakaicho kye Yesu nyi aicha na kulya Yerusalemu.
43012013	Wakawada maṟamba ha makangachi wakakure wahende imwambya wakakoṟoṟoma ilaha, “Hosana. Kwadapfumo ichu acha kui rina lya Mndumii kawewa mangi ya Israeli.”
43012014	Na Yesu kakuwonya mchungu mkoho kadamia mhongo-hu fofo. Kiwekehendeka chando kiikiṟehye kyehamba.
43012015	“Kulawone kochiowuo iyo ukeri mṟi fo Sionyi. Ambuya Mangi yapfo aikuchea ai mdamiṟe mhongo-hu fo ihache lya mchungu.”
43012016	Nakyo chando kikeri wa kiloshyonyi wake waweichi kuwokapfo. Nyi mandi halya Yesu amhenda iwiko mwitoṟi lyo mandi walekumbwo kye nyi wudo kii-kiṟehye kyakye na iwuta wakawembutya wado da.
43012017	Na mamwingi fulya fo wandu walya wawei nao mkonu fulya alelaha Lasaro nawuke ipfo opangenyi kamṟutsa wapfuny wo wakahamba-ho kyemṟingishya.
43012018	Nakyo kikaweinenga mamwingi fulya fo wandu wakahenda imwambya kipfa waleicho kye Yesu aletana ikyo kikawewa kichao king'anyi kidi.
43012019	Nalyo Wafarisayo walya wakawiana mndu na odoye, “Muwonyi da? Loidima kindopfo! Ambuya wuyana wose wuimwosha.”
43012020	Na ipfo kiidi kya wandu walya waledo na Yerusalemu wahendewikya Ruwa wuindi mkonu fulya mnene kukawekaa-pfo na Wagriki waangu.
43012021	Wo wakachea Filipo o kulya Betisaida ya kulya Galilaya. Wakamterewa wakahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, lulangie iwona Yesu.”
43012022	Filipo kakure kahenda iwia Andrea. Andrea kasangana na Filipo wakahenda iwia Yesu.
43012023	Na Yesu kawahalwo kahamba, “Aikyo kiheri kyamshika Mana chu o mndu nahende iwiko mwitoṟi.
43012024	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, ndunda iya ya ngano kokoya yada ilaoloka teri-hu ikapfia-ho yo yadeo ikakaa ido. Indi kokoya yampfia-ho yo yechido iwike ndunda tsifoi.
43012025	Ichu mokunda moo fokye nekaa nafudetse. Na ichu mosuo moo fokye kunu wuyana aifuringa fushike ikaa mlungana.
43012026	Kokoya mndu akundi njipfuṟukanya nache injilatya. Na hando inyi njikeri mpfondo na mpfuṟukanyi oko echikaa. Na kokoya mndu anjipfuṟukanya Wande nyi echimng'anyisha.”
43012027	“Wulalu mrima foko fotautau, na inyi njihambe njida? ‘Ngesa njihambe,’ Hoi Wande, njiletsa na saa ii ikeri-ho? Kya indi kimaduma ngakoya saa ii nyikyo ikyo.
43012028	Hoi Wande, kunda ung'anyishe rina lyapfo iyo.” Nalyo ṟu likaichio liwuka ipfo ruwehu lyechihamba, “Ngameling'anyisha na lingi-se njechilinganyisha-da.”
43012029	Nahong'u mamwingi fo wandu wahoṟoki-ho wakaicho iki wakahamba, “Nyi ikuṟuṟuma lyadeda nao.” Wengi wakahamba: “Nyi malaika adeda nao.”
43012030	Yesu kahalwo kahamba, “Ṟu lyo kimaduma lyadeda chi kipfa kyako inyipfo, indi nyi kipfa kyanu nyo.
43012031	Wulalu wuyana wu wohenda iwonyo mdumbuye. Wulalu mnene o wuyana wu echifunyo kulya nja.
43012032	Na inyi ngammaa iiryo huye njilekana na wanda ii lyo njechiwahomwo orio umu na koko.” (
43012033	Kadeda ado kechenga kya opfu lokye kye nyi lo mbaṟi njiki echikaa napfe.)
43012034	Nahong'u wandu walya wakuwumbye-ho wakamhalwo, “So nyi lokeicho kya Kristo kii-kihambe ipfo wuwawasonyi wodu kye nyi echikaa-pfo mlungana. A kyawa kida-ng'u ili iyo ohamba kye nyi kiwari Mana chu o mndu nahende iiryo huye? A Mana cho o mndu nyi o ku ngesa?”
43012035	Yesu kawawia, “Kutsuhae-ho kiheri sa kyangu sa ii ikeri-se nanyo. Chumie ili mukeri na sa ii mulawone mohenda ihoyo meema, kyamba ichu mochumia memenyi aichi ma kundo ashikapfo.
43012036	Ili mukeri na sa ii keidikyenyi sa kundu muwe wana wasa.” Yesu kyekimaa ideda madedo-ho kawukaho kahenda isheṟuka.
43012037	Ma amemaa iwuta ṟiho tsing'anyi tsidi wawonyi nawo ma walakunde imwidikya.
43012038	Nyi kilehendeka kido kyeinutysa idedo lya mwikimbi Yesaya lyehamba, “Hoi Mndumii, a mndu aleidikya shilya luiongoya nyi wu? Nao nyi o ku atambaṟukye meso nawone wuidimi wo Mndumii?”
43012039	Na kimaduma walaidima imwidikya nyi kilya kingi Yesaya alededa kyehamba.
43012040	“Ruwa nawahye meso hawo kaumiṟa na ngoo tsawo kundu walahende yambwo na meso hawo, ma ichihio na ngoo tsawo wawuyei nyi Mndumii ahamba, na inyi njiwakiṟe.”
43012041	Nyi wudo Yesaya alededa lya alewona wuitoṟi wokye kawa modeda kyakye.
43012042	Ma kudo kuweipfo na wasongoru wafoi wa Wayuda waleidikya Yesu kya indi kipfa kya iowuo Wafarisayo walakihambe na pata wakoye wawuto sinagogenyiyi.
43012043	Kyamba nyi wawekundi iṟumisho nyi wandu kota irumisho nyi Ruwa.
43012044	Nahong'u Yesu kahamba na ṟu lyinganyi, “Mndu anjidikye inyi chio inyi anjiidikye tupu-pfo, naidikie ichu alenjiduma daa.
43012045	Na ichu anjiwonyi inyi, nyi awonyi na ichu alenjiduma daa.
43012046	Inyi nyi njicheye na kunu wuyana njikeri sa na oryo mndu anjiidikye inyi kundu alakoye ikaa meemenyi.
43012047	Na kokoya mndu aicho madedo hako kada alahawada chio inyi njechimbonya owingopfo. Kyamba kitewe ngacha chi kundu njiwonye wuyana wu owingopfo kya indi nyi kundu njikiṟe wuyana wu.
43012048	Ichu monjimina kada alaambya madedo ho hako nahawade o nawode mombonya owingo. Idedo lyo lyako ngamdeda lyo lyechimbonya owingo Mkonu fulya Fofurumya.
43012049	Kipfa inyi kilya njilededa chi koko inyi kiwukye-hopfo. Nyi Wande-chu oko ichu alenjiduma o anjinengye iwawaso lya kindo kyededa na ihamba.
43012050	Na inyi njiichi kye kilya o awawasye kyo kirie moo fo mlungana. Nahong'u ngadeda kilya Wande alemmaa injiwawasia njidede.”
43013001	Mkonu fulya mnene fo Pasaka fulameshika ihoya Yesu amemanya kye kiheri kyakye kyamshika nawuke kunu wuyana iwuya ko Wande. Nao msa alewa mokunda iwa wakye mandi ai kunu wuyana nyiwudo-ng'u alewaloṟa mkudye fokye tane mainukyonyi.
43013002	Nahong'u Kilayo kilya kii-kyaale Yesu na wa kiloshionyi na ichu mkumbi amemmaa yamtsa wuṟingi ipfo mrimenyi fo Yuda Iskariote ai mana o Simon wohenda iṟingya Yesu.
43013003	Nao Yesu aweichi kye nyi Wande amaa imdambikya shindo shose mawokonyi hakye, na ipfo ko Ruwa nyipfondo acheye, na ipfo ko Ruwa mfondo aiwuya napfo.
43013004	Nahong'u kakure alya kilionyi kya Kilayo kilya kawuta nguo yakye ya huye. Kaende kiwaraṟa kya nguo kakupfunga nakyo oo kitsinyi.
43013005	Kawuya kaletsya mṟinga iraunyi kawoka isanja wa kiloshyonyi kyakye madende kahaangwo na kiwaṟaṟa kilya akupfungye nakyo.
43013006	Nahong'u kashika oo ko Simon Petro, na o Petro kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, nawo otana osanja madende?”
43013007	Yesu kahalwo kambia, “Ikyo njiiwuta okimanya wulalupfo, indi nyi ochikimanya ili numa.”
43013008	Adi Simon Petro kambia, ochinjisanja madende ma indi-pfo; Yesu kambia, “Ngada ndakusanja uwode kita na inyipfo.”
43013009	Adi Simon Petro kambia, “Ho Mndumii njisanja, ma chi madende hako tupupfo, indi na mawoko ha na mdo fu.”
43013010	Yesu kambia “Ichu amsamba awode echikisanjosepfo, shile madende ho tupu, Kya indi nyi a mheṟemtsu-ng'u ose. Nyo mui waheṟemtsu kya indi ma chi wosepfo.” (
43013011	Kyamba Yesu aichi ulya mtwaṟi oke, nkyondo ahambya, “Ma mui waheṟemtsu mosepfo.”)
43013012	Kekiidima iwasanja madende na ikuṟaaya nguo tsilya tsake kekidamya kawawia, “Ngesa na mamonya kindo ngambutya?
43013013	Nyi mochekembia, ‘Njii Maarya na Mndumii, na kya lohi mokehamba kyamba na mbekukerye kudo.
43013014	Kyasia-ng'u kokoya inyi nji Maarya na Mndumii ngammaa imsanja madende, nanyo nyi kiwembaṟi isanjana madende muvenyi na wenyi.
43013015	Kyamba njimbikye kichano kundu nanyo muwewuta chando inyi ngambutya nyo.
43013016	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia. Kwipfo mndu isinga ang'anye mndumii olyopfo, manya mndu ai mdume ang'anye ulya alemdumapfo.
43013017	Mukamekumanya-ng'u ikyo nanga nyo ili mochikiwuta.’ ”
43013018	“Chi ngadeda njido kyanu mosepfo. Inyi njiichi iwa njilewasambuṟa. Kya indi nyi kochihoya kyeinutsa ki-kiṟehye kyehamba, ‘Ichu alie mkate foko nahaluka injiterengia.’
43013019	Nyi ngasonguo imuwia wulalu kilameshika iwa kundu ilindi kyeshika iwa mukuwutye-ho iidikya kye nyio inyi.
43013020	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, ‘Ichu aambya mndu ngamduma nyio inyi anjiambya.’ Na ichu anjimbya inyi nyi aambya ichu alenyiduma.”
43013021	Kyasia Yesu kekihamba iki kawado nyi rihima mnu ipfo mrimenyi kahamba napata, “Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia kye iya kiidi kyanu umu-ho nyi echinjitwaṟa.”
43013022	Nalyo walya wa kiloshyonyi wakaambuyana mndu na odoe wai kitambisa walamanye kya mndu adeda kyakye.
43013023	Na kwipfo umu o wa kiloshyonyi kyake adamye-ho echikuihetsa kipetehu kya Yesu ai mkunde okye.
43013024	Naho Simon Petro kamkemya kye nawese mbei uhya aideda kyakye.
43013025	Mndu ulya o kiloshionyi katikiria kechikuihetsa kipetehu kya Yesu kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, na nyio wu?”
43013026	Naho Yesu kahalwo. “Nyio ichu njechimchoweṟya itangamra na ilimnengya.” Kachoweṟa itangamra kalinengya Yuda mana o Simon Iskariote.
43013027	Nao Yuda kyekiambia itangamra lilya nalyo liyenyi Satana kamwanga. Nahong'u Yesu kambia, “Iki urie iwuta kehenda iwuta owinyi.”
43013028	Indi walya wadamye-ho wechilya chonga kwipfo ma umu alemanya nyi ambia kikipfo.
43013029	Kukakaa-pfo wekusaṟa kya Yuda ili awei moringa mfuko fosuṟuma fesa kulako Yesu ambia, Henda ihuṟa shilya shiwaṟi shesungusia mkonu fu mnene, ang'u kye naenenge wakiwa kindo kya nga.
43013030	Nahong'u Yuda amemaa iambia itangamra lilya nalyo liyenyi kaida na ipfo nja. Nalyo kuwei kio.
43013031	Nahong'u Yuda ekihenda nja Yesu kahamba, “Mana chu o mndu nyi wulalu ameng'anyisho na Ruwa kaweng'anyisho ipfo kundo ai.
43013032	Kokoya kiṟumi kya Ruwa kyamewono kiidi kya Mana nao Ruwa nyi echimng'anyisha Mana ai nao. Na imng'anyisha echimng'anyisha wulalu da.
43013033	Wana wako, njitsinda nanyo hando ha oweṟe da. Nyi mochinjipfula nalyo kivewa kidi chando njilewia wasongoru wa Wayuda ngahamba, ‘Kundo kulya njikuhendya moidima icha naho-pfo.’ Nanyo na wudo ngamuwia wulalu.
43013034	Nyi iwawaso lihya ngamuinengya kye mochikundana; kundanenyi chando; inyi njilemukunda, nanyo na wudo mbekundana.
43013035	Kindo oryo mndu ose echimanya nakyo kye nyi mui wa kiloshyonyi kyako nyi ikundana ili mochikunda mudo.”
43013036	Simon Petro kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, nyi ku uihenda?” Yesu kahalwo, “Kulya kundo njihenda iyo ochiidima injilatya-ho wulalupfo, kya indi ochinjilatya ili numa.”
43013037	Petro kambia, “Alewo Mndumii, kitewe njilaidima ikulatya wulalu nyi kyo iki? Njechireka moo foke njikuletse-pfo.”
43013038	Yesu kahalwo. “Nyi ukuṟeherye ipfa kipfa kyako? Nyi lohi kya lohi ngakuwia, olong'onyi lulamekapa nochinjikana kaṟaṟu.”
43014001	Yesu kawawia, “Ma mulanenewuke ipfo ngoon tsanu. Idikienyi Ruwa muwenjidikya na inyi.
43014002	Ipfo kanyi ka wande oko nyi kuipfo shidembo shifoi. Koka shila wudo njiwemuwia. Wulalu njikeri ihenda imteseheṟya-ho hando.
43014003	Na ili njihenda imteseheṟya-ho hando, nyi njechiwuya lingi njiche imwondwo na ipfo koko; kundu hando inyi njikeri mpfondo nanyo mochikaa.
43014004	Na kundu njihenda njia yeshikapfo muichi.”
43014005	Adi Toma kambia, “Ndumi, kundo uihenda iyo luichi manyalepfo, a nyi wuda lochimanya njia yo?”
43014006	Adi Yesu kahamba, “Inyi nyiyo njia, lohi na moo. Ma kwipfo msa echishika ko Wande alashitso nyi inyipfo.
43014007	Kokoya monjimanya inyi, nao Wande oko na muwemwichi-da. Na wulalu da mommanya na imbona.”
43014008	Adi Filipo kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, keluloṟe-wo Wande chuo, naso lochifuda.”
43014009	Adi Yesu kambia, Filipo kiheri ki kyose ngamekaa nanyo na iyo kulanjimanye? Ichu amenjiwona inyi ammaa iwona Wande. A kyawa kida ili ohamba, keluloṟe-wo Wande chu?
43014010	Alewo kulaidikye kye inyi njii-msanze na Wande nao Wande ai-msanze na inyi? Madedo ho ngamuwia moose manya hawukye koko njimonyipfo. Ni Wande chu ai kiidi kyako nyi awa moṟundya-ho mawuto hakye.
43014011	Kiwaṟi munjiidikye kye inyi njii-mlunge na Wande nao Wande ai-mlunge na inyi, Shila wudo njiidikienyi kipfa kya mawuto ho hako.
43014012	Ni lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Mndu kanjiidikya inyi, mawuta ngawuta nao da echiwuta, na manenenene kota ho echihawuta, nyi kipfa inyi nyi ipfo ko Wande njihenda.
43014013	Na oryo kindo mochiterewa kui rina lyako inyi nikyo njechikiwuta kundu Wande nang'anyisho ipfo kiidi kya Mana.
43014014	Kindo moterewa kyakyo kui rina lyako njechimuwutya inyi.
43014015	Kokoya monjikunda nyi mochiwada mawawaso ho hako.
43014016	Na inyi njechiterewa Wande nao echimwenenga Mtarami ungi nawe mokaa nanyo itane mlungana.
43014017	Nyio Mumuyo o wukilohi, ichu wuyana wu wulaidima imbada kipfa wulawode meso hembona ma wuṟango wommanya. Nyo nyi mommanya kipfa nyi aimukaya kechitsinda mrimenyi yanu.
43014018	“Inyi ma njechimda-ho wangoendapfo, nyi njiicha-se na konu.
43014019	Kutsuhae kiheri sa kyangu wuhana wu wulenjiwona-se. Indi nyo ni mochinjiwona kipfa inyi njii na moo nanyo da mochikaa na moo.
43014020	Mkonu fulya ili fochishika ni mochimanya kye inyi njii-mlunge na Wande oko nanyo muiwalunge na inyi, na inyi njii-mlunge nanyo.
43014021	Mndu akuwode na mawawaso hako kawa moharinga nyio mndu anjikundi. Na mndu anjikundi nyi echikundo nyi Wande oko. Nao inyi njechimkunda na ikuloṟa nao.”
43014022	Nahong'u Yuda (chi mana o Iskariote-pfo ulya ungyi) kambia, “Alewo Mndumii, nyi kyawa kida ili uikuloṟa naso koda kulakuloṟa na wuyana wu?”
43014023	Yesu kahalwo kambia “Mndu kakaa-ho anjikundi nyi idedo lyo lyako echiliringa, nawo Wande chu oko echimkunda naso nyi lochicha ikaa kokye.
43014024	Mndu kada alanjikunda ma madedo ho hako aharingapfo. Na idedo lyo moliicho chi lyako inyi njimonyipfo kya indi nyi Wande ichu alenjiduma.
43014025	Isho nyisho ngammaa imuwia kiheri ki njii nanyo.
43014026	Indi Mkarishi chu nio Mumuyo Mwele, ichu Wande echimuduma kiwe kui rina lyako, o echimpfunda shindo shose na imtamuṟya kya shose njilemuwia inyi.”
43014027	“Nyi ofoṟo ngamudeya, nyi ofoṟo lu loko ngamusumba. Na msumbye foko chi fukeri cha fo wuyana wupfo. Mamlanenewuke, ngoo yanu ilatautau.
43014028	Nyi muleicho njechimuwia kye njihenda; na iwuya njechiwuya na konu. Ukoye muwenjikundi nyi muwechichihio ili njihenda ko Wande kipfa o nanjing'anyi inyi.
43014029	Na wulalu ngamaa imuwia ilindi kilameshika ikuwia kido kundu ili kyechiwa kido; muwute-ho iidikya.
43014030	Njikideda-se nanyo shindo shifoipfo kyamba mangi ii ya wuyana wu naicha. Koko inyi echiiidima kindopfo.
43014031	Kya indi kundu wuyana wu wuhende imanya kye njikundi Wande na chando Wande wuhende imanya kye njikundi Wande na chando Wande alenjiwawasa nyi wudo njiwuta. Kurenying'u luwuke aa luhende.”
43015001	“Inyi nyii msabibu fo lohi na Wande chu oko ai mndemi.
43015002	Oryo iṟamba lipaṟikye koko likada lilawika ndunda lyo aliruwuyaho. Na ili lii-pfo lyose liwika ndunda lyo alitasana liengeṟe iwika ndunda.
43015003	Nyo mulemmba watsane kui mweeke fo idedo lyo njilemuwia.
43015004	Kyekaenyi-ho mochilungana na inyi na inyi njiwekaa-ho njilunganyi nanyo. Kikawa chando iṟamba lilechidima iwika ndunda lii kyanya kyalyo lilakulungye na msabibu, nanyo na wudo da mochiidama iwika ndunda mulakulungye na inyipfo.”
43015005	“Inyi nyi msabibu nanyo mukawa nyi maṟamba hafo. Ichu akulungye na inyi na inyi ngawekulugna nao nyio awa mowika ndunda tsifoi. Tare nyio inyi moidima iwuta kindopfo.
43015006	Mndu oose kada alakaa kiidi kyako o echikumbo kleshe cha ṟamba lilawika lyikakumbo nja lyikawa mlalambodi. Wandu wakahasanya handu hamu wakahakumba modony hakakoṟo.
43015007	Kokoya mokaa-ho kiidi kyako inyi na madedo ho hako kokoya mokaa naho ipfo mrimenyi yanuu, oryo kindo moterewa mochiinengo.
43015008	Wande oko naing'anyisho kokoya mokumbia ndunda tsifoi na iwa wa kiloshionyi kyako.
43015009	Chando Wande alenjikunda na wudo inyi ngawemkunda nanyo. Kaenyi mukuwode na ikunda lyo lyako.
43015010	Kokoya moringa mawawaso ho hako nalyong'u mochikaa mukuwode na ikunda lyo lyako. Chando na inyi njileringa mawawaso ha Wande chu oko ngawekaa njikuwode na ikunda lyo lyake.
43015011	Ngamemuwia isho kundu msiha fu foko fukae ipfo mrimenyi yanu, na masiha fu fonu fuwe fui na mweena.
43015012	Iwawaso lyako lyo likeri liile, kekundanenyi muweni na wenyi chando njilewemukunda nyo.
43015013	Ma kuwode ikunda lyiidye mndu lyechiota ili lya mndu areka moo foke kimaduma kya mbuya tsakyepfo.
43015014	Nahong'u nyo nyi mukeri mbuya tsako kokoya mohenda iwuta kilya njilemuwawasainyi.
43015015	Chi njikimhamba-se masingapfo kipfa mndu isinga o amanya kindo menyi olyo awutapfo. Nyi ngammaa imsenda nyo mui mbuya cha kipfa isho njileicho shiwuka ko Wande chu oko nsho njilemuinenga shose.
43015016	Chi nyi mulenjisambuṟa inyipfo. Nyio inyi njilemsambuṟa nyo na imuduma mukuhendekye mochikumbya ndunda. Na shilya mokumbya sho shikae shilechisia, ili o Wande echimuenenga isho mochimterewa kui rina lyo lyako.
43015017	Iki ngambawasa nyi kiile, kekundanenyi muwenyi na wenyi.
43015018	“Kokoya wuyana wu womusuo manyen kye nyi wulewooka injisuo inyi wuka mawokionyi.
43015019	Kima muwei wa kiwuyana, wuyana wu wuwechimukunda nyo malai wandu wawo. Indi ili nyo wa mlai kiwuyana na inyi njilemusambuṟa njemletsa na wuyana-wu lyo lyatewa wuyana wu womsuo.
43015020	Kumbuonyi shilya njilemuwia: Kuipfo mndu isinga ang'anye menyi olyopfo. Komkoya nyi walenjiterengya inyi, nanyo na wudo wechimuterengya. Kukoye waweringa madedo hako na iho hanu nyi wechiharinga-da.
43015021	Kya indi ishi shose wechimuwutya nyi kipfa kya rina lyako inyi, kipfa walaichi ichu alenjiduma.
43015022	Kima njilawemche na ideda nawo wawehoyo owingo lo wuyamaṟipfo. Indi wulalu wakuwonya mweeke fokuwuta owingo lu lowopfo.
43015023	Mndu kanjisuo inyi nawesuo na Wande chu oko.
43015024	Kima njilawemetana ipfo kiidi kyawo ngata tsilya, tsilawemtano nyi mndu ungi wawekaa wai na owingo lo wunyamaṟipfo. Kya indi wulalu nyi wahawonyi da wakawensuo inyi na Wande chu oko wakawemsuo.
43015025	Kya indi kilehendaka kido kundu idedo lilya liinukye-ho lilya lii-ṟehye ipfo wuwawasony wowo lyehamba, ‘Walenjisuo isuo lilawode tewe.’ ”
43015026	“Ilindi Mkarishi echicha ichu njechimdumya inyi njii ko Wande nyio Mumuyo o wukilohi awukye ko Wande nao nyi echiwika-ho kiṟingishyo kyenjiṟingishya inyi.
43015027	Nanyo na wudo da mochiṟingishya cha kipfa muhendesanyi na inyi wokya mawokyonyi.”
43016001	“Kyanjienenga ngamuvia njido nyi kundu mulawone mohenda ipfuluko.
43016002	Wandu nyi wechimbuta siṟiny yawo ipfo masinagoginy hawo. Ee da, kushikye kiheri na oryo mndu amuwaha nahambe kye nyi awuta ado kindo kichihianyi na Ruwa.
43016003	Na kyatewa wawuta wado nyi kipfa walaichi ma Wande ma inyi walanjiichi.
43016004	Ili ngamuwia njido nyi kundu ilindi kiheri kyawo kyechishika muhende itamwo kyawo kye inyi njimonyi njilewoka imuwia njido.” “Njilemuwia mbonyitsi wokya mawokyenyipfo kipfa njiweri nanyo.
43016005	Na wulalu njikuhendya njiwuye ko ichu alenjiduma. Ma kulaipfo o kiidi kyanu monjiwesa nyiku uihenda.
43016006	Indi ili ngamuwia njido nanyo mukaichwo fowa ipfo mrimenyi yanu.
43016007	Na inyi ngamuwia kya lohi, Ili njihenda nyo mokuwutyaho kiira. Kyamba kokoya ngada njilahenda Mkarishi ulya echimchea nyopfo. Indi kiheri ngamaa ishika njechimduma konu.
43016008	Nao kamcha nyi echitoromisha wuyana wu kya wunyamaṟi na kya wuhoṟotsu na kya mwanduye fo Ruwa.
43016009	Kya wunyamaṟi nyi ili Walanjiidikya inyi;
43016010	kya wuhorotsu njikuhendya ko Wande nanyo mulakinjiwona-se.
43016011	Kya mwanduye nyi ili mangi ii ya wuyana wu ammaa iwonyo owingo.”
43016012	“Nyi njiwodese shindo shifoi shembia kya indi mulawechishiidima wulalu.
43016013	Indi kiheri ichu echicha ai Mumuyo o wukilohi, o echimuwiia mateteṟa momwitsa wukilohinyi wose, kyamba alechideda kui wuitiki wokye amonyi, kya indi shilya aicho nyisho echideda, na shilya shirie iwa nyisho echimwongoya.
43016014	O echinjing'anyisha inyi kyamba mbonyi tsi echimwongoya nyi kunu koko inyi echitsiwuta.
43016015	Shindo shose Wande awode nyi shako. Nkyo kyannenga ngamuwia, ‘Mbonyi tso Mumuyo Mwele echimwongoya nyi kunu koko echitsiwuta.’ ”
43016016	“Mwaanya sa kitutu nanyo mochinjiwonasepfo, na maanya fungi kitutu na mowuya injiwona.”
43016017	Nahong'u walya wa kiloshyonyi maata wakawiana wo wenyi na wenyi, “A ikyo aluwia nyi kiki ngesa? Mwaanya sa kitutu nanyo mochinjiwonasepfo na mwaanya sa kitutu na mowuya injiwona? Kawehamba, Njikuhendya ko Wande?”
43016018	Nahong'u wakahamba, “A ikyo ahamba kya mwaanya kitutu nyikyo iki ngesa? Luichi kindo ahambapfo.”
43016019	Yesu kamanya kye wakundi imbesa kawawia, “Kindo muiweṟiwetsa mowesana kyakyo nyi ili ngahamba, ‘Mwaanya sa kitutu nanyo mochinjiwonasepfo na mwaanya fungi kitutu na mowuya injiwona?’
43016020	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Kye nyo mochifuha na ikapa kilio na wuyana wu wochichihio. Nyo mochisokyo nyi fowa, kya indi fowa tso tsanu tsikae tsechihaluka msiha mwenyi.
43016021	Ili mndu mka mlemo arakwo nyi awawyo, nekewado nyi fowa kipfa kiheri kyake kefee kyamshika, indi mandi mana amfeo nakikumbwose mawina halyapfo kipfa kya sia iya imbode ya mndu amfeo wuyanenyi.
43016022	Nanyo na wudo da, kiheri kya wulalu muisokyo nyi fowa. Indi njechiwonana nanyo lingi, na mrima yanu yechichihio na msiha fu fonu kwipfo mndu eidima imsokasepfo.
43016023	Na mkonu fulya fukamshika mochinjiwesa-se kindopfo. Nyi lohi kya lohi ngamuwia, Kokoya moterewa Wande kindo kui rina lyako na kikawa ki nyi echimwenenga.
43016024	Mṟasa wulalu mulemeterewe kindo kui rina lyakopfo. Keterewenyi nalyo mochienengo na msiha fonu fuichwo pacha.”
43016025	“Shindo shi ngamededa nanyo njiwemkapya semeṟi. Indi kiheri kikeri icha njilakidedase nanyo njemkapya semeṟi, kya indi njechimwongoya mbonyi tsa Wande na pata.
43016026	Mkonu fo ili fochishika lyong'u mochiterewa kui rina lyako. Ma ngamuwia kye inyi njemuterewya ko Wandepfo.
43016027	Kyamba o Wande namukundi nyo amony cha kipfa nyi mulenjikunda mukawenjiidikya kye ipfo ko Ruwa njicheye.
43016028	Nyi ipfo ko Wande njiwukye ngacha na kunu wuyana, Wulalu ngada wuyana wu njiwuye na ko Wande chu.”
43016029	Wadi wa kiloshyonyi kyake wakahmba, “Ate wulalu odeda na pata ulakilukapya semeṟi.
43016030	Wulalu lomanya kye nyi uichi shindo shose ulahuṟi mndu mokuwesa. Nkyo kyaenenga lukaidikya kye nyi ipfo ko Ruwa ucheye.”
43016031	Yesu kawahalwo, “Oweṟe lu nyi moidikya?
43016032	Ambuyenyi kiheri kikeri icha na kilemcha kyechitewa muhende irahanyitso oryo mndu na kokye munjideye-ho njimonyi. Ma ngakaa-ho njimonyipfo kipfa Wande nakeri na inyi.
43016033	Ngamuwia isho kundu mukae muwode ofoṟo mukulungye na inyi. Ili mukeri kunu wuyana i muwodo nyi waale. Kya indi kukarishyenyi inyi ngambinza wuyana wu.”
43017001	Yesu akimaa ideda ishi shose kaambuya ruwehu kahamba, “Hoi Wande, aiki kiheri kyamshikang'u. Kunda ing'anyisha Mana chu opfo kundu Mana chu opfo nakung'anyishe iyo.
43017002	Kyamba uleinengya Mana chu itoṟya wandu wose kundu nawasumbe wose ulemwenenga moo fo mlungana.
43017003	Na moo fu fo mlungana fui-le, nyi wakumanye iyo kye nyi ukeri Ruwa lohi iyo kumonyi wawemanya na ichu ulemduma nyio Yesu Kristo.
43017004	Inyi njilekung'anyisha kunu wuyana; ngamwawutsia kuheo kilya unjienengye kyetana.
43017005	Na wulalu, Hoi Wande, njing'anyisha-ng'u ipfo oshangunyi lopfo kochinjienenga wuitoṟi wulya njiwewode ipfo kopfo lilyandi wuyana wu wulawemeumbo.
43017006	“Rina lyi lyapfo lyo njiletambaṟuya wandu wa ulewanjienenga na iwawuta kunu wuyana. Wawei wandu wapfo, na iyo kowanjienenga, nawo nyi wamewada idedo lyo lyapfo.
43017007	Wulalu wakamanya ishi shose unjienengye nyi ipfo kopfo shiwukye.
43017008	Kipfa madedo ha ulenjienenga nyi njilehawaenenga. Nawo wakahaambya; wakawuta-ho imanya kye nyi ipfo kopfo njicheye lohi, wakaidikya ke nyi iyo ulenjiduma.
43017009	“Nawo nyiwo njiwaterewya. Chi wuyana wu ngawuterewyapfo, kya indi nyi iwo ulenjinenga kipfa ili wakeri wapfo.
43017010	Na ishi shii shako shapfo na shapfo shikawewa shako da. Na ipfo kowo ngamhenda ing'anyisho.
43017011	Na inyi njikikeri-se kunu wuyanapfo. Nawo na kunu wuyana wakeri. Nao inyi nyi ikucheya na kopfo njii. Hoi Wande Mwele! Waringe wakae na rina lyo lyapfo, ilyo ulenjinenga inyi, kundu nawo wawe wamu chandu naso lui wamu.
43017012	Mandi njiwei nawo njilewa mowaringa wawe weindya rina lyo lyapfo ulenjienenga. Nyi njiwepfo njewalaya choowe, ma kwipfo umu owo aledekapfo shile nyi mana chu o odetso kundu kidedo kilya Kiele kiinukie.
43017013	Indi wulalu na ipfo kopfo njikuhendya, ngahamba ishi kunu wuyana, kundu msiha fu foko wakae nafo mrimenyi wafuwode fuawukye-ho necha.
43017014	Inyi njiwalimye idedo lyo lyapfo na wuyana wu wukawasuo kipfa walakeri na wa kipaṟika kya wuyana wu chando nao inyi njilakeri o kipaṟika kya wuyana wu.
43017015	Chi ngawaterewya kopfo kundu uwawute kunu wuyanapfo. Indi ngawaterewya kopfo uwaringe wakie ichu mbicho.
43017016	Wo chi wakeri wa kipaṟika kya wuyana wupfo chando nao inyi njilakeri o kipaṟika kya Wuyana wu.
43017017	Uwatane waele wafane wukilohi wulya. Idedo lyapfo lyong'u likeri wukilohi wulya.
43017018	Chando iyo ulenjiduma kunu wuyana nyi wudo na inyi ngawaduma kunu wuyana;
43017019	Nyi kimaduma kyawo ngakutana mwele inyi kundu nawo da wahende itano waele kui wukilohi wulya.”
43017020	“Indi chi iwa tupu ngawaterewyapfo. Nyi njiterewia-ho na walya wose wechinjiidikya kui mwongoye fowo.
43017021	Ngaterewa kye wose wawe wamu chando iyo, Hoi Wande, ui umu na inyi, Na inyi njii umu na iyo kundu nawo wawe kiidi kyadu. Wuyana wu wuteho iidikya kye nyi iyo ulenjiduma.
43017022	Inyi njilemmaa iwainengya wuitori wulya ulenjiinenga kundu wawe wamu chandu so lukeri wamu. Inyi njikae nawo na iyo ukae na inyi.
43017023	Washike iawutsyo mkae fokaa wamu kundu wuyana wumanye kye nyi iyo ulenjiduma; kowewakunda chandu ulenjikunda inyi.
43017024	‘Hoi Wande! Kya walya ulenjinenga, ngakunda kye wakae handu hamu na inyi ipfo kundo njikeri kundu wawone wuitoṟi wulya kulenjiinenga kui ikunda lyapfo uwenjikundi wokya wuyana wulawemeumbo.
43017025	Hoi Wande ui menyi wuhoṟotsu, wuyanawu wukuichi-pfo, kya indi inyi njikuichi. Iwa wakuichi kye nyi iyo ulenjiduma.
43017026	Inyi njilewamanyishia rina lyi lyapfo na njechikaa njechiwuta njido, kundu ikunda lyapfo uliwode koko fuwakaye ipfo mrimenyi yawo, na inyi njikae njimlunge nawo.’ ”
43018001	Nahong'u Yesu ekimaa ideda adi kakure-pfo arinanyi na walya wa kiloshyony kyake kaambada meda fo Kidiron kashika kundo kuwode kyungu kiikiṟihye. Yesu kahenda-pfo arianyi na wa kiloshyonyi kyake.
43018002	Nahong'u na Yuda ulya momṟingya aweichi handu halya cha kipfa mpfo kundo Yesu na wa kiloshyonyi kyake wawekekusanzya-ho kafoi.
43018003	Nahonu Yuda kahenda yondwo itorito lilya lya wasikari na waringi maata wa ipfo ko wakohanyi wang'anyi na Wafarisayo. Kacha napfo arianyi nawo warie shimunyi na taa na shisha.
43018004	Nahong'u Yesu ili emmanya shilya shemhoya shose kawuka-pfo kawawia, “A mndu mwimpfula nyi wu?”
43018005	Wakamhalwo, “Nyi Yesu ichu Mnasareti.” Kawawia, “Nyio inyi.” Nahong'u kukahoṟoka-pfo na Yuda ulya amṟingya arianyi nawo.
43018006	Nahong'u kekiwawia, “Nyio inyi,” wakawuya numa wakaho wanda.
43018007	Yesu kawawesa lya kawi, “A mndu mwimpfula nyi wu?” Nawo wakahamba, “Nyi Yesu chu Mnasareti.”
43018008	Yesu kahalwo. “Ngamembia, ke nyio inyi. Kyasia koka nyi inyi muinjipfula kekudeenyi-ng'u iwa wakuhendye.”
43018009	(Kikahenda kido kundu kilya alededa kihende iinukya kilya kyehamba, “Walya ulenjienenga wawe wako nyiledetsa-ho ma umupfo.”)
43018010	Simon Petro awewode oshu kalusomwo kalachwo isinga lya mkohanyi ang'anyi kamsunukuṟa-ho kudu ko kulyo, na isinga lilya rina lyake nyi Maliko.
43018011	Kyasia Yesu kawia Petro, “Kewihiṟa oshu lu na ipfo kiṟandenyi. Alewo! Kirahu ki Wande anjinengye alewo nyi ohamba njide njilanyo ngesa?”
43018012	Itorito lilya lya wasikari lirianyi na wanene wawo na waringi walya wa Wayuda wakawada Yesu wakampfunga.
43018013	Wakawoka imduo kulya ko Anna kyamba o akeri ndeyomka o Kayafa ulya akeri mkohanyi aanyi o maka fulya.
43018014	Na Kayafa nyio ulya aleinenga Wayuda chila iya echihamba, ke kyamuwia kira mndu umu napfe handu ha wandu wa sanga lyose.
43018015	Nahong'u Simon Petro wechiosha Yesu numa na o kiloshyonyi kyake ungi-ho. Na ichu ungi nyi aichianyi na mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi, kaida na ipfo ose-hu ko mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi handu hamu na Yesu.
43018016	Indi o Petro katirima oo kichuminyi ora lo nja. Nalyo ulya ungi o kiloshyonyi, ulya aichianyi na mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kawuya na nja kadeda na mka ulya kisinga ai mringi o kichumi kilya kaitsa Petro na ipfo osehu.
43018017	Nalyo mka ulya kisinga mringi o kichumi kilya kawia Petro, “Na iyo chi uwei umu o wa kiloshyonyi kya mndu cho?” Nao Petro kahamba, “Chio inyipfo.”
43018018	Kukahoṟoka-pfo masinga na waringi walya wakamaa yatsa modo fo makaa kipfa kuweipfo mbeo wakaoda-ho. Na Petro kahoṟoka-pfo handu hamu nawo kechioḏa modo fulya.
43018019	Nahong'u mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kawesa Yesu kya wa kiloshyonyi kyake na kya mloshye foke.
43018020	Yesu kamhalwo, “Inyi njiweloshye na pata wuyana wukaicho. Mafiri hose njiwelosha ipfo sinagogenyiyi na hekalunyi kundo Wayuda wechekekumbuhananya. Kuwode ma kindo ndehamba kya kiṟikapfo.
43018021	Nyi ki ili onjiwesa-se inyi? Kekuwesye iwo waleicho kindo njilewawia. Nyiwo iwo waichi chando mbeihamba.”
43018022	Kekihamba ado umu o waringi walya wahoṟoki-ho kakapa Yesu na okofi kahamba. “Ngesa nyi wudi ochihalwo mkohanyi ang'any?”
43018023	Yesu kamhalwo, “Koka ngamdeda owicho kehambang'u ikyo kiiho kiwicho. Indi koka na kya sungusihu nyi ki ili onjikapa?”
43018024	Kyasia Anna kasama Yesu ai mpfunge na kulya ko Kayafa mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi.
43018025	Nao Simon Petro kadeo echioda modo. Nalyo wakambia, “Na iyo da chi ukeri o kiloshyonyi kyake?” Nao kakana kahamba, “Chio inyipfo.”
43018026	Nahong'u masinga ha mkohanyi ang'anyi umu owo akeri mshari o ulya Petro emmanya kudu kulya kahamba, “Chi njilewekuwona ukeri nao alya kyungunyi?”
43018027	Nalyo Petro kakana lingi. Nalyo liyenyi olong'onyi lukakapa.
43018028	Nahong'u wakawuta Yesu kulya ko Kayafa wakamduo kulya osehu lo mba ya chila. Nalyo kiheri kya ngamenyi. Nawo wenyi ma walaide na ipfo mba ya chila walawone wechikuteṟefutsa kundu waidime ilya Pasaka.
43018029	Nalyo Pilato kacha na ipfo nja hando wai kahamba, “Kikumbo nyi kya iki murie kyecha ikumba mndu-chu?”
43018030	Wakahalwo wakambia, “Ukoe ichu alawei motana shiwicho luwechicha imdambika kunu kopfopfo.”
43018031	Nalyo Pilato kawawia, “Kyekumdayenyi nyo mkehenda yandwo mondu foke chando kisumuhanyi na mawawaso hanu.” Nalyo Wayuda wakambia, “Lu-wawikye momu fo iwaha mndupfo.” (
43018032	Nakyo kikahenda kido kundu idedo lilya lya Yesu lihende iinukya lilya alehamba lyetongya opfu lulya echihenda ipfa.)
43018033	Naho Pilato kaidase na ipfo mba ya chila kalaha-pfo Yesu kambia, “A iyo nyi ukeri Mangi ya Wayuda?”
43018034	Yesu kahalwo, “Ili odeda kudo nyi okiwuta kopfo kumonyi ang'u nyi wandu wengi wakuwia wado kyako?”
43018035	Pilato kahalwo, “A inyi mbo njikeri Myuda? Nyi mkambo fu fopfo na wakohanyi wa wang'anyi wamaa ikudambika kunu koko. A kindo uletana nkyo iki ngesa?”
43018036	Yesu kahalwo, “Wumangi woko wukeri wo kunu wuyana wupfo. Ukoe wumangi woko wuwei wo kunu wuyana wasoṟo wako koka walenjikapanya njilawone njedambiko Wayuda wo. Kya indi wulalu chando kikeri wumangi wu woko wukeri wo kunu-pfo.”
43018037	Naho Pilato kambia, “Nawo owei ng'u Mangi?” Yesu kahalwo, “Iyo omhamba nawo nji Mangi. Kyannenga ngafeo mndu nyi ikyo, kyawennenga ngacha na kunu wuyana nyi kundu njiṟingishie wukilohi. Oryo mndu ose ichu apaṟikye wukilohi echicho ru lyako.”
43018038	Adi Pilato kambia, “A wukilohi kiki wo?” Nao Pilato kekihamba ado kawuya-se na ipfo nja kundo Wayuda wai kawawia, “Njiwonyi owingo kokyepfo.
43018039	Indi kunu konu kuwode mbuka ya kacha kye njimpfunguye mndu ili lya Pasaka. Nahong'u mokunda-ng'u njimpfunguye Mangi ii ya Wayuda?”
43018040	Nalyo wakafunja kisangalale lingi wakahamba, “Chi ichupfo. Funguo Baraba.” Nao Baraba awekeri mndu mbahi.
43019001	Kikashika oo Pilato kaanduya Yesu kembawasya nakapo na ngowa tsa shiteecho.
43019002	Nalyo wasikari walya wakaoka oṟo ya msha wakambika mdonyi, wakamṟika nguo ya king'aring'ari.
43019003	Wakacha ihoṟoka oo sumuhana nao wakahamba, “Lokuiṟikiṟa Mangi ya Wayuda!” Wakawuya wakamkapa ngofi.
43019004	Naho Pilato kacha-se na nja kawawia, “Ambuya, ngamwende na iya nja kundo mukeri kundu mochiwuta-ho imanya ke njilaidima iwona owingo lokye.”
43019005	Nahong'u Yesu kacha na ipfo nja aṟee oṟo iya ya msha na nguo tsa king'aring'ari. Nalyo Pilato kawawia, “Ambuyenyi! Aichu mndu chu.”
43019006	Wakohanyi wang'anyi wekimbona na waringi walya wakafunja kisangalale wehamba, “Henda imkapya msalabehu, Henda imkapya msalabehu.” Pilato kawawia, “Kyekumdayenyi nyo mbembambya msalabehu cha kipfa inyi ndawona mti kokye.”
43019007	Wayuda wakamhalwo, “So luwode wuwawaso wo kikodu na kui wuwawaso wo nyi kimsumuhanyi ipfa kipfa amekutana Mana o Ruwa amonyi.”
43019008	Pilato kekiicho kihambo kido kaengeṟa yowuo.
43019009	Kawuya kaida-sa na kipfo mba ya chila kawia Yesu, “A iyo nyi o ku?” Kya indi Yesu nalamhalwo ma kindo.
43019010	Pilato kambia, “Nyi kuladeda na inyi? Ngesa nyi kulaichi njiwode pfinya yekulekya na pfinya yekuwambia msalapenyi?”
43019011	Yesu kamhalwo, “Kuwewode pfinya na inyi kima chila kuleinengo iwuka huye ko Ruwapfo. Nakyo kiinengye ichu anjidambikye kunu kopfo kawaḏa wunyamaṟi wung'anying'anyi.”
43019012	Wokya o Pilato kapfula mweeke fomlekya. Indi Wayuda wakasambahada wehamba, “Koka ochilekya ichu ukeri ma mbuya ya Kaisaripfo. Oryo mndu mokuhalwo Mangi amonyi nyi alehya Kaisari.”
43019013	Kyasia Pilato kekiicho madedo ho kaende Yesu na kipfo nja, kadamya alya lorikehu lo yanduya ipfo kundo koelaho Menge njiale maho. Na rina lyayo lya kiebri nyi Gabata.
43019014	Nahong'u mkonu fulya fuwei foikuteseheṟa ilya Pasaka saa ya kaṟandaṟu mfiri: Nalyo Pilato kawia Wayuda, “Aichung'u Mangi yanu.”
43019015	Wadi wakafunja kisangalale, Mduo mduo, mbambye msalabenyi. Pilato kawawia, “Ntane ngawambya Mangi yanu msalabehu?” Wakohanyi walya wang'anyi wakahalwo. Luwode Mangipfo sile nyi Kaisari amonyi.
43019016	Kikashika oo nalyo Pilato kadambikya Yesu mawokonyi nahende ikapyo msalabehu.
43019017	Wakahenda warie Yesu. Nao kahenda akudikye msalaba foke amonyi. Kawuka kulya mṟinyi kashika kundo koelaho nyi ko mbuonyi. (Na rina lya Kiebri nyi Goligota.)
43019018	Hando naapfo wakambambya msalabenyi, wakamsanza na wengi wawi, umu ora lo kulyo na ungi ora lo kumoso. Yesu kakaa oo makidi hawi.
43019019	Kyasia Pilato kaṟehya kiṟehyo kyeolongya kaikapya oo msalabehu huye. Na kindo kii-kirehye-ho nyi kikeri kiile “Yesu Mnasareti Mangi ya Wayuda.”
43019020	Naho kirehyo ki Wayuda wafoi wakakisoma kipfa alya Yesu awambyo msalabehu kuwekeri kufui na mṟinyi. Nakyo kiwei kiṟehye mdedye fo Kiebri, Kiroma, na kigriki.
43019021	Naho wakohanyi walya wang'anyi wa Wayuda wakawia Pilato, “Ma kulaṟehye kyehamba, ‘Nyi Mangi ya Wayuda,’ kya indi uṟehye, ke o nalehamba, ‘Nyi ai Mangi ya Wayuda.’ ”
43019022	Pilato kahalwo, “Kindo ngamṟehya akyo ngamṟehya.”
43019023	Kyasia wasikari walya wekiwambya Yesu msalabehu wakaira nguo tsakye, wakatsihawa njohawi tsiina orio msikari na ohawi lokye na kanzi iya naawo. Na kanzi iya ilawode opfumo ii njioke piu cha iṟimbi.
43019024	Wakawiana mndu na odoe, “Kyayo lulairandwo randwo lae, luwike nayo kuṟu kuhya yambuyo ho mndu echiduo.” Kikahenda kido kundu kochihoya Kiṟehio Kiele kilya kii-kiṟehye kyehamba, “Nyi walehawana nguo tsako na maṟaonyi hako wakawika naho kuṟu kuhya.” Wasikari walya nyi wudo walewuta.
43019025	Kyasia kulya kufui na msalapa fo Yesu kuhoṟoki-ho mae, na manomae o mae, Maria o Kileopa na Maria ulya o Magidala.
43019026	Nalyo Yesu kekiwona mae na ulya o kiloshyonyi ulya wakundanyi ahoṟoki-ho naho kawia mae, “Mka aichu manopfo.”
43019027	Kawuya kawia ulya o kiloshyonyi, “Aichu mayo.” Matsika saa nayo ulya o kiloshyonyi kamduo nakae kulya koke.
43019028	Kyasia Yesu kekimanya shose shamemarisikya kya Kirehio kilya Kiele shechihoya nao kahamba, “Njianga.”
43019029	Napfo kuu-kuwike-pfo nungu iwode mpfinyo fo mtarang'ao. Nalyo lienyi wakaira kyoonga mṟinga wakakikapya mpfinyo fulya futarang'ae wakakiwika iwalehu wakamlongoṟya kulya dumbunyi.
43019030	Naho Yesu kekififinda mwinyo fulya futarang'ae kahamba, “Kyamekumarisikyang'u.” Kang'odwo mdo kalekya moo.
43019031	Fuwei mkonu fo katanu nyifo fo kuṟeheṟa fusongoe mkonu fo Sabato, Wayuda wakakoya chi kicha mnying'a iya itsinde kulya msalabehu ili mkonu fo Sabatopfo. Na Sabato iya iwei nyi mkonu sa mnene fo ngoseṟa. Wayuda Wakacha iterewa Pilato mafuo halya ha walya wawambie msalabenyi hahende ifunjofunjo na mbihu yawo isotso-ho.
43019032	Naho wasikari wakacha-ho wakafunja ulya o kuwoka maḏende ho na ulya o kawi walya wawa-wambye msalabenyi kimu Yesu.
43019033	Wekishika oo ko Yesu wekiwona amepfa nawo walakimfunje madende ho.
43019034	Indi wasikari walya umu-ho kamtocha oo owari na pfumu nalyo kudi kukaewa-ho samu na mṟinga. (
43019035	Na ichu alekiwona nyi awa mokiṟingishya na kiṟingishyo kyo kyakye nyi kya lohi. Nao aichi nyi kya lohi adeda kundu nanyo muwange iidikya-ho.)
43019036	Na kyenenga kikawutika kido nyi kundu Kirehio Kiele kyechiinukya kyehamba, “Kuwode fuo lyakye lyechifunjo manya limu-pfo.”
43019037	Kukawekaa-pfo kingi kii-kiṟehye kyehamba, “Wakae wechiwona ichu walemtocha na pfumu.”
43019038	Naho shilya shekisia kukacha napfo Yosefu o kulya Arimatia akeri o kiloshyonyi kya Yesu kya kiṟika kipfa ili aowoye Wayuda. Kacheterewa Pilato moomu fosotsa-ho mnying'a fo Yesu. Pilato kamnenga momu. Nahong'u Yosefu kakuhendya-pfo kasotsa-ho mnying'a fo Yesu.
43019039	Kukawecha naho Nyikodemo ulya ewecha ko Yesu ili kio lya mbooko. Kacha arie msanzo fo mafuda hepfaama ha mbaṟi tsifoi: manemane na ubanyi shishikye kufui na ratili ihana.
43019040	Kyasia wakaira mnying'a fo Yesu wakafuoṟowya nguonyi tsa owiṟo wakasanganya-ho mafuda halya hepfaama chando mbuka tsa Wayuda tsiwewei tseṟika.
43019041	Kyasia kulya kundo Yesu ewambyo msalabehu nyi kwipfo kyungu kii-kiṟihye kitungutungu na ipfo kyungunyi kuwode-ho opanga lo iṟika lu uhya sa lulelembiko mndu.
43019042	Hando napfo wakahenda iṟika-pfo Yesu kipfa kya Mkuteseheṟye fulya fo Wayuda fo Pasaka; na kipfa ili opanga lulya luvewa kufui.
43020001	Nahong'u mkonu fulya fo Ruwa, ngamenyi kilawo na iwushiwushi, Maria ulya o Magidala kahenda ishika alya opangenyi. Kakoya iho lilya lyambuto oo momunyi fo opangenyi.
43020002	Nalyo kawikya mteṟa kashika kulya ko Petro na ulya o kiloshyonyi wawekotanyi na Yesu, kawawia, “Ate nyi wamira Mndumii-pfo opangenyi naso lulamanye ma kundo wahendye imlaṟa.”
43020003	Wadi Petro wakakure-pfo na ulya ungi o kiloshyonyi. Wakawada njia yeshika kulya opangenyi.
43020004	Wakahenda wechidicha wa wawi. Nalyo ulya ungi o kiloshyonyi kadicha kasongoya Petro, kawoka ikushikya alya opangenyi.
43020005	Nao aimehya-ho kawona nguo tsilya tsa owiṟo tsii-njiṟeṟye ipfo wanda, kya indi nalaide naho.
43020006	Naho Simon Petro kashika-pfo kecha oo numa yake adi kakuhendya ipfo opangenyi kawona nguo tsilya tsii-njiwike-ho.
43020007	Na kidami kilya kya mbiṟuko kiwei kipfunge alya mdonyi fo Yesu kila-kiṟye handu hamu na nguo tsilya, nyi kikeri hando hakyo kyenyi kii kikunjiṟye.
43020008	Nalyo na ulya ungi o kiloshyonyi ulya alewooka ishika alya opangenyi kaweanga napfo, ulya alewoka ishika alya opangenyi Kawona kakuidikya. (
43020009	Kyamba lyandi walandemanye kilya kii-kiṟeẖye kyehamba, kye nyi kii-kiteṟie nahende iṟuka awuka ko wapfu.)
43020010	Nahong'u walya wa kiloshyonyi wakakure-ho wakawuya na kanyi.
43020011	Kyasia mandi nalyo Maria kadeo ahoṟoki oo sumuhana na ipfo opangenyi kelia ipfo nja. Adi kelia kaimehya ipfo opangenyi.
43020012	Kawona wasu wa Ruwa wawi waṟee nguo njiili wadamye-ho. Ulya umu kakaa oo mdonyi na ungi madendenyi alyando mnying'a fo Yesu fuwei mlaṟe.
43020013	Nawo wakambia, “A iyo mka, nyi ki ili uilia?” Kawawia, “Nyi ili wamira Mndumii oko na inyi ndamanye-se hando wahendye imlaṟa.”
43020014	Kekihamba ado kaindukya numa kawona Yesu ahoṟoki-ho nao nalamanyie kye nyio Yesu.
43020015	Yesu kambia, “A nyi kiki olia, mka? Nyiwu uimpfula?” Nao kahamba lako nyi ulya moikalya kyungu kambia, “Koka nyi iyo umuirye-ho, Mndumii, kembiawo hando uhendye imlaṟa, na inyi njihende imwondwo-pfo.”
43020016	Adi Yesu ambia, “Maria.” Nao kainduka kambia kiebri, “Rabunyi.” Nakyo kii cha ili kohambo, “Maarya oko.”
43020017	Yesu kambia, “Ma kulawone koikuwasha na inyi. Kipfa ili ndamekudoya na kulya ko Wande. Kya indi uhende kulya ko wanawawama nowawie, Njikudoya na ipfo ko Ndeyako nao Ndeyanu na ko Ruwa oko nao Ruwa onu.”
43020018	Maria o Magidala adi kawehenda kacha iwia walya wa kiloshyonyi, “Inyi ngambona Mndumii.” Kawewaongoya na kilya ambia.
43020019	Nahong'u mfiri fo Ruwa kyukanyi na mongo ili impfunge ya mba iya ipfo kundo wa kiloshyonyi wakuwumbye nyi kipfa waowoye Wayuda. Kudi Yesu a ichu amcha kahoṟo kidi kyawo kawawia, “Kaenyi na ofoṟo.”
43020020	Kekihamba ado kawaloṟa mawoko na owari. Nalyo walya wa kilsohyonyi wakafuda mnu ili wawuya iwonana na Mndumii.
43020021	Yesu Kawuya kawawiase, “Kaenyi na opfoṟo. Chando Wande anjidumye na inyi na wudo ngawemduma nyo.”
43020022	Adeda ado kawaomoya kawawia, “Keambuyenyi Mumuyo Mwele.
43020023	Wesa mochiwahooṟya njonyamaṟo tsawo wametsihooṟyo, na wesa mochiwapfungiṟya njonyamaṟo tsawo wametsipfungiṟyo.”
43020024	Kya indi Toma (aleho o mbasa) ulya ai o ipfo kiidi kya walya ikumi na wawi alawei nawo lya mandi Yesu alecha.
43020025	Naho wa kiloshyonyi walya wengi wakambia, “So lombona Mndumii.” Nao Toma kawawia, “Ngamda njilambona ngoru tsa msomari ipfo mahinyi hake, njilambika ma kimnyo kyako ipfo ngoru-hu tsa msomari ma owoko loko ipfo owarinyi lokye njechikuidikya ma ngashika indipfo.”
43020026	Kyasia ili numa komeida-ho mfiri nyanya walya wa kiloshyonyi kyakye wawekeri-se ipfo mba na Toma ai ipfo kiidi kyawo. Kudi aichu Yesu acha-ho mongo ii-mfunge kahoroka ipfo kiidi kyawo, kahamba, “Kaenyi na ofoṟo.”
43020027	Kiidima kawia Toma, “Keende-ng'u kimnyo kyapfo na aa noweambuya na mawoko hako, uweende na owoko lopfo noluwike aa owarinyi loko. Ma kulawe mlemeshi iidikya kya indi uwe mwidiki.”
43020028	Toma kahalwo kambia, “Hoi Mndumii oko. Hoi Ruwa oko!”
43020029	Yesu kambia, “Omenjiwona n kyo kyakuenenga iidikya! Nanga iwo walalemewone indi wakaweidikya.”
43020030	Nahong'u kukawekaa-pfo ngata tsingi sa tsifoi Yesu aletana, walya wa kilsohyonyi watsiwonyi, natso tsilai njiṟehye kunu kitabunyi.
43020031	Kya indi itsi tsii-njiṟehye-ho kundu mukuutyeho iidikya kye Yesu akeri Kristo Mana o Ruwa, na ipfo kundo mwidikye mudi mushike ikoya-pfo moo kui pfinya ya rina lyo lyake.
43021001	Nahong'u ili numa Yesu kawuya ikuloṟa lingi na walya wa kiloshyonyi kyake kulya mawambao na nduwa ya lya kulya Tiberia. Na chando ekuloṟa nyi kikeri kiile.
43021002	Nyi Simon Petro wawekeri handu hamu na Toma (ulya alaho o mbasa) na Natanaeli o kulya Kana ya Galilaya na wana walya wa Sebedayo na wengi-se wawi wa ipfo kiloshyonyi kyake.
43021003	Simon Petro kawawia, “Njihenda dehya makunga.” Wakambia, “Natso luihenda lurianyi na iyo.” Wakakure wakadoya ngalawenyi. Nalyo kio kilya waladehe-ho ma kindo.
43021004	Naho komidima ikya Yesu kahoṟoka alya mawambao ha nduwa; kya indi walya wa kiloshyonyi walammanye kye nyio.
43021005	Nalyo Yesu kawawia, “Alewo, shiwana shako, momewona makunga ma lyimu?” Wakamhalwo, “Ote mbee, manya lyimu.”
43021006	Kawawia, “Kehenda ombotsenyi mdeho fo oo ora lo kulyo lo ngalawa nalyondi mochiwona makunga” Naho wakaombotsa-ho, mdeho iya nawo walaidime-se ifuirya huye kipfa kya kilula kya makunga.
43021007	Nalyo ulya o kiloshyonyi Yesu wakotanyi nao kawia Petro, “Ate nyi Mndumii!” Simon Petro kyekiicho nyi Mndumii kakupfunga nguo ya huye (kyamba aweṟee kidami kya kitsi tupu,) katoolya ipfo mṟingenyi.
43021008	Kya indi wa kiloshyonyi walya wengi wakacha wario nyi ngalawa iya ili walawekeri kuleshe na alya mawambao, hando haiho ha mkonu yehesha mahana hawi. Wakacha wechikurwo mdeho fulya fuichwo makunga.
43021009	Nahong'u wekidoya alya mawambao-hu wakawona kuu-kuatse modo fo makaa na ikunga liilileṟye-ho na mkate.
43021010	Yesu kawawia, “Makunga momdeha wulalu endenyi-pfo maata.”
43021011	Petro kahalukya-pfo kakuruya mdeho fulya ipfo mawambaohu nafo fuichwo makunga hang'anyi ihana na mkami hatanu na haṟaṟu. Naho ma ili halefo handi mdeho fulya ma fularanduke.
43021012	Yesu kawawia, “Kenjonyi, mususwo.” Nahong'u walya wa kiloshyonyi manya kulakae-pfo akarya imbesa, “A u?” Nyi ili wammanya nyi Mndumii.
43021013	Yesu kacha napfo kawada mkate kawaenengya na ikunga lilya nalyo.
43021014	Nalyo likawa lya kaṟaṟu Yesu alekuloṟa na walya wa kiloshyonyi ili ameṟuka awuka ko wapfu.
43021015	Wekimaa isuswo Yesu kawia Simon Petro, “Ngesa iyo Simon o Yohane, nonjikundi kota iwa?” Nao kahamba, “Ee-wo Mndumii, nawo oichi njikukundi.” Kambia, “Kelisa mahuṟuwi hako.”
43021016	Kawuya kambia lingi lya kawi, “Ngesa iyo Simon o Yohane, nonjikundi?” Nao kambia, “Ee-wo Mndumii, nawo oweichi njikukundi.” Kambia, “Kelisa shichondi shako.”
43021017	Kawuya kambia lingi lya kaṟaṟu, “Iyo Simon o Yohane, nonjikundi woe?” Petro kasokyo nyi fowa kipfa ili ambia lingi lya kaṟaṟu, “Nonjikundi?” Nao kambia, “Hoi Mndumii, nyi uichi shindo shose; kowemanya kye njikukundi.” Kambia, “Kelisa shichondi shako.
43021018	Nyi lohi kya lohi ngakuwia, Lilya mandi uwei mkoho nyi uwekupfunga mkanda kumonyi kokuhendya kundo okunda. Kya indi ili ochikaa nokuo nyi ochilesha mawoko hapfo na ungi nakupfunge echikuduo kundo ulakundi.” (
43021019	Na kyamwenenga kadeda ado kyemtongya opfu akaa naluwone naṟumishe nalo Ruwa nyi lochiwa lo mbaṟi njiki.) Ekimaa ihamba ado kambia, “Kenjiosha.”
43021020	Petro kainduka kawona ulya kiloshyonyi ulya Yesu wakotanyi nao oo numa. (Nao nyio ulya alekaa kechikuihetsa kipetehu kya Yesu lya walelya kilayo kilya kechimbesa, “Hoi Mndumii, a nyio wu aikuṟingya?”)
43021021	Nahong'u ili Petro alewona mndu ulya kawia Yesu, “A ichu kyake kyechiwa kida?”
43021022	Yesu kambia, “Kokoya ngakunda ichu nakae-pfo njitane ngawuya a ikyo kikuwode kyi iyo? Iyo kenjiosha tupu.”
43021023	Nahong'u nyipfondo kuwewukye mhambo fulya fuvedung'anye ipfo ko wanawawama foehamba, kye mndu chu o kiloshyonyi epfapfo. Na kindo Yesu alembia chi alembia epfapfo. Nyi alembia, “Kokoya ngakunda ichu nakae-pfo njitane ngawuya a ikyo kikuwode kyi iyo?”
43021024	Nahong'u nyio ichu o kiloshyonyi ai mṟinghishi moṟingishya isho shose kashiṟehya-ho. Natso nyi luichi kye kiṟingishyo kyake kii kya lohi.
43021025	Nahong'u kukawekaa-pfo na shindo shingi shifoi Yesu aletana. Nasho koya shiweṟehyo kui kimu kimu nyi njikusaṟye wuyana wu wose wuwechiidima iwada shitabu sho sheṟehyopfo.
44001001	Kitabu kilya kya kuwoka ndekiwika le Teofilo oko, nyi kya mbonyi tsa shindo shilya Yesu alewoka ishiwuta na ishilosha.
44001002	Itane mfiri fulya alewawasya wasu walya wake awasambuṟye kyando kyawo kui Mumuyo Mwele kadao huye.
44001003	Nawo nyiwo alemkuloṟa nawo numa ya mawawiṟo hake ke nyi ai na moo kui ngata sa tsifoi kechiwawonekya handu ha mkonu makumi haana na ideda nawo kya wumangi wo Ruwa.
44001004	Naho kekiwasanza ili lya ifurumya kawawasa ke walakure wawuke kulya Yerusalemu kya indi wawedye-pfo kyaasa kilya kya Wande, “Kilya mleongoyo nyi inyi.
44001005	Cha kipfa Yohane nyi alewa mopatisa kwi mṟinga indi nyo mochipatiso kwi Mumuyo Mwele ma kulatiṟe-se kafoi kiwokya mafiri hapfo.”
44001006	Na walya wasanzye-ho wakambesa, “Mandiho ngesa nyi ochiwuya ilawuya-se Israeli wumangi?”
44001007	Nao kawawia, “Chi kyanu kimusumuhanyi imanya shiheri na hando isho Wande awoshye sha pfinya yake amonyipfo.
44001008	Kya indi nyo mochiambya pfinya ili Mumuyo Mwele echimsokya. Nanyo nyi mochiwa waṟingishi wako ipfo Yerusalemu na Yudaya kose na Samaria itane mokoya mtsitsionyi fo masanga.”
44001009	Kekimaa ideda isho waiho wadi wechiambuya kairyo huye ipuchi likamambya limbuta maambuyenyi hawo.
44001010	Wakeri-ho wetuluya meso ruwehu kehenda wadi a walya wasoṟo wawi wahoṟoki alyando wai waṟee nguwo njikengemari.
44001011	Wakahamba, “Lanye wasoṟo wa Galilaya, nyikili muhoṟoki mdi iya mochiambuya ruwehu? Yesu chu awuto konu kedao ruwehu na wudo echikaa nache na chando mbembonyi kehenda na ipfo ruwehu.”
44001012	Kikasia wakawuya wechihenda Yerusalemu wawuka kulya fumvunyi lyewio nyi lya msinepfu likeri kufui na Yerusalemu lii haleshe cha hando ha ohendo lo sabato.
44001013	Nawo wekiida na mba wakado na ipfo kitangenyi kulyando wawedamye, nyi Petro na Yakobo na Yohane na Andrea na Filipo, na Toma na Bartolomayo na Matayo na Yakobo o Alifayo na Simon Selote na Yuda o Yakobo.
44001014	Iwa wose wawekeri-ho wakuwode kuingoo imu ipfo kiterewyonyi handu hamu na waka walya na Maria mae o Yesu na wanawamae.
44001015	Mafiri naho Petro kakure ipfo kiidi kya wanawawama, na msanzo fo marina hose fuweshikye ihana na makumi hawi, kahamba.
44001016	“A lanyewo wasoṟo na wanawawama, nyi kiwewaṟi kiṟehyo kiinutsyo, kilya Mumuyo Mwele adedye kacha kui dumbu lya Dawidi kya mbonyi tsa Yuda ulya alewa mosongoya walya walewada Yesu.
44001017	Nao nyi awei mwitale kimu naso kaweambya kihachi kya wupfuṟukanyi wu kimu naso.
44001018	Kyasia ichu nyi alehuṟa mdemi na mweke fo wueri wo wukika kaho wanda karandawuka, ndewu yake yose ikawundukya-ho.
44001019	Kikamanyika ko wandu wose wakeri Yerusalemu, dema lilya likatana lyadeeyo rina kui kishomo kyawo Hakelidama, (kodambuya nyi dema lya samu.)
44001020	Kyamba kii kiṟehye ipfo kitabunyi kya shiimbo sha Dawidi, ke kihamba kyake kiwe mrapu, ma kulakae-pfo mndu molaa-ho. Na kingi-se, ke wukaṟa woke wuambyo nyi ungi.
44001021	Kyasia-ng'u wulalu kikunding'u mndu o ipfo kiidi kya wasoṟo wo luwehende-sanyi nawo mafiri halya hose mandi Mndumii Yesu alewa mokuchea kodu na iwuka kodu.
44001022	Awokya wupatiso wo Yohane itane mfiri fulya alewuto kodu kedao huye, na kikaki umu owo natano mṟingishi o maṟukyonyi hake kimu naso.”
44001023	Kyasia wakahoṟotsa-ho wasoṟo wawi Yosefu alaho nyi Barsaba na rina lingi-se einengo nji Yusto, na ichu ungi nji Matia.
44001024	Wakaterewa wakahamba, “Hoi-wo Mndumii, iyo uichi ngoo tsa wandu wose, keluloṟe nyi uhya-ho umsangye ipfo kiidi kya iwa wawi.
44001025	Naduo hando ha wusu wo na wukaṟa wo aa ando Yuda apakye, kakuhendya hando hai hake kimoṟi.”
44001026	Wakawakapya kuṟu kuhya, kuṟu kuhya kukawada matia kasambuṟo ke nakae kimu na wasu walya ikumi na umu.
44002001	Kyasia koikishika mkonu fo Pentekoste wawekeri hando hamu wose wasanganyi.
44002002	Naho kudi peṟeseng'u kukacha ndiṟimo iwuka ruwehu ikeri cha ili owira loida sa lwapfinya ikaichuṟa ipfo mba kundo wadambye kose.
44002003	Kukawawonekya njolimi tsihawakanyi cha modo, nakyo kikakaa oo huyawo oryo umu owo.
44002004	Wakaichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele wose wakawoka ideda kui shishomo shingi chando Mumuyo ewainenga ideda.
44002005	Nahong'u kulya Yerusalemu kukeri-pfo Wayuda waowoye Ruwa wawukye mbaṟinyi yose ya wandu wa kunu shi ya ruwehu.
44002006	Kyasia ṟu lilya lekiida-ho mamwingi fo wandu walya fusangana-ho fukauma ndadya kipfa ili oryo mndu aicho wechideda kui kishomo kyake.
44002007	Wakatiṟi wose ando amu wakaṟihio wechiwiana, “Alae iwa waideda wose chi Wagalilaya!
44002008	Aka nyi kyawa kidang'u ili so loicho oryo mndu kishomo kyadu lu wafee nakyo?
44002009	So Waparti na Wamedi na Waleami naso lulee Mesopotamia na Yudaya na Kapadokia na Ponto na Asia.”
44002010	“Furigia na Pamfilia na Misiri na njora tsa Libia kufui na Kirene.
44002011	Natso wahenu luwukye Roma lui Wayuda na wapfunde wawo na Wakreta na Waarabu, iwa luwaichuo wechideda kui mdedye yadu wehamba ngata tsa Ruwa tsilya tsing'anyi.”
44002012	Wakatiṟi ando amu wose wakawa kiṟumaṟuma wakawiana mndu na odoe, “A ikyo nyi kirie iwa kida ngesa?”
44002013	Wengi-ho wakatalwo wakahamba, “Nyi wai ihutsu kipfuo kya mvinyo.”
44002014	Kyasia kukahoṟoka-ho Petro warianyi na walya ikumi na umu kairya ṟu lyake kahamba na iwawia, “Lanye wandu wa Wayuda nanyo mose mui kunu Yerusalemu. Kindo ki kyakunda itambaṟukya konu, keadanyenyi madedo hako.
44002015	Chi wudo chando mokusaṟapfo; wandu wa chi wanangopfo, kyamba wulalu nyi saa tsiṟaṟu tsa ngamenyi.
44002016	Kya indi kindo ki nyi kilya kii kidede kui dumbu lya mwikimbi Yoleli kehamba,
44002017	‘Ruwa ahambye, nyi kechiwa ili mafiri hefurumya njechipusya wandu wose Mumuyo oko. Na wana wanu wa womi na wa waka wechideda shisuku. Na wanake wanu wechiwona shiwonesyo. Na wameku wanu wechilodya ndodo.
44002018	Na mafiri ho njechipusuya shisinga shako shumi na shika Mumuyo oko, nawo wechihamba shii sha Mumuyo.
44002019	Ṟiho njechilekya ipfo ruwehu huye na shichano orukenyi iya wanda, samu na modo na tuṟukumbi ya mtsu.
44002020	Mnengeṟi fochihaluka fuwe meema na meri fuwe samu shisongoye mfiri fulya fo Mndumii fulya fung'anyi fochimanyisha shose.
44002021	Nakyo kiwe ke oryo molaha rina lya Mndumii nyio echikiṟo.’ ”
44002022	“Lanye womi Waisraeli kundenyi muanguye madedo-ho madu. Yesu chu o Nasareti nyi mndu aledumo konu nyi Ruwa kechimanyisho kui maṟihio na ngata na shichano shi, sha Ruwa aweshiwuta kui kuwoko koke kiidi kyanu chando muichi muwenyi.
44002023	Mndu chu ili awei mdambike-ho adi kui chila ya Ruwa njiwanze na kui mmanyie foke matsika kacha nyio mukambambya msalabenyi kui mawoko ha walya walaichi wuwawaso mkambaha.
44002024	Ruwa kamṟutsa kamwashuo mawawyonyi ha opfu kipfa kilawechiidi-mika nakae awodo nyi opfu.
44002025	Kyamba Dawidi amsenda kehamba kyake, ‘Njiwonyi Mndumii oshangunyi loko mkonu yose, kyamba ai awokonyi loko lo kulyo njilasingide.
44002026	Nkyo kyanenga ngoo yako iwodo nyi msiha na olimi loko luikesa. Na nyama tsi tsako tsechika tsikusirye.
44002027	Ke ochilekya moo foko fukae fuu mshinge kulya shipfo, manya ochida mwele opfo nakoye inyamaṟikapfo.
44002028	Omenjiloṟa njia tseshitsa kundo kuwode moo, ochinjihutsa sia njikeri oshangunyi kopfo.’ ”
44002029	“Lanye wanawa-wama, kenjiadanyienyi njidede oshangunyi lonu kya mku chu odu Dawidi ndawodo nyi wuowu, ke nyi alepfa kaṟiko, na kifu kyake kikeri kunu kodu na inu.
