44002030	Kyasia amba mwikimbi nao aweichi ke Ruwa amliiye nyamu ke ipfo luwenyi lyake nyipfondo echiamtsa nadamye loṟikehu loke lo wuitoṟi.
44002031	Mpfondo alekuwutya-ho iwona kilya kirie iwa kadeda kya maṟukyenyi ha Kristo ke alechideo kulya shi ma mbihu foke fochipuopfo.
44002032	Yesu cho Ruwa nyi alemṟutsa naso lose nyi lui waṟingishi wake.
44002033	Kyasia amemaa idoso itane kuwokonyi ko kulyo ko Ruwa na yambya kiwantasyo kilya kya Mumuyo Mwele ko Wande kadika iki mukiwonyi na ikiicho wulalu.
44002034	Kyamba Dawidi aledo na ruwehupfo. Kyaindi amonyi alehamba, ‘Mndumii nyi alewia Mndumii oko, Damia kuwoko koko ko kulya.
44002035	Ntane ngamaa ileṟya wakituwa wapfo shi ya madende hapfo.’ ”
44002036	“Kyasia mba ya Israeli yose iketawuka imanya kya lohi, ke Ruwa nyi alemtana Mndumii na Kristo, Yesu cho mlembambya msalabenyi.”
44002037	Wekiicho wadi iki kikawakoṟa ngoo tsawo wakawia Petro na wasu walya wengi, “A luwikewo luda, lanye wanawawama wadu?”
44002038	Petro kawawia, “Dumbuyenyi, na oryo umu nahende ipatisyo rina lyo lya Yesu Kristo lyembonya mhoṟye fo njonyamaṟo tsanu mushike yambya kimasyo kya Mumuyo Mwele.
44002039	Kyamba kiwantasyo ki nyi kikyanu na wana wanu na wandu wose wa ombo na ombo wesa Ruwa Mndumii odu echiwalahya-ho.”
44002040	Kawaṟingishya na madedo hengi hafoi na iwatutuma kewawia, “Lekanenyi na kishari ki kya mtolo.”
44002041	Na walya waleambya idedo lyake na sia wakapatiso. Mfiri fulya kukaengeṟyo-ho wandu washika shiku shiṟaṟu.
44002042	Nawo wakawa wekuwada ipfo kiloshyonyi kya wasu na ipfo kipfunganyonyi ipfo kifunjonyi kya mkate na ipfo shiterewyonyi.
44002043	Oryo mndu kahoyo nyi wuowu ili ṟiho tsifoi na shichano shikawuto nyi wasu walya.
44002044	Na waidiki walya wawekeri wamu wose na iwada shindo shose kyando.
44002045	Na kilya waleki-huṟa na iwada kyawo kyo nyi walekumba wakahawya mkambo oryo ndu chando awewuṟye.
44002046	Na mfiri yose nyi wawetsindye ipfo hekalunyi wai na ngoo imu wechifunja mkate mba kui mba na yambya shelya shawo na sia na kui ngoo njikesi.
44002047	Wechiadapfuma Ruwa wakawa mowonya wandu wose ikunda. Na Mndumii kaengeṟaengeṟa siṟi ya walya wechihenda ikiṟo.
44003001	Mkonu fumu Petro wakadosana na kulya hekalunyi na Yohane saa kenda mandi kochihenda iterewo.
44003002	Naho kudi kukeri-ho msoṟo umu ai mhuli madende ho kui yendo wusunyi wo mae echihenda iwiko oo kichuminyi kya hekalu kechilaho nyi kilya kicha oryo mafiri hose kechieṟeṟya walya weida kulya hekalunyi shindo shemsaṟya.
44003003	Mndu chu kekiwona Petro na yohane wechiida na ipfo hekalunyi kawaterewa kindo kyemsaṟya.
44003004	Petro wakamtumya meso na Yohane kahamba, “Luambuye so.”
44003005	Nao kawaambuya mkangamya akusihye ke echienengo kindo nyiwo.
44003006	Petro kahamba, “Njiwode ma fesa ma sahabupfo. Kya indi kilya njiwode nyikyo sa njechikuinenga, Kui rina lya Yesu Kristo Mnasareti hoṟoka nochumie!”
44003007	Kambada owoko lo kulyo kamiṟumtsa, nalyo liyenyi njayo tsake na shilunga sha maungo ho shikawada pfinya.
44003008	Kaamka chiwu kahoṟoka kachumia, kaida na kulya hekalunyi kimu nawo kahenda ketoolatoola kaidapfuma Ruwa.
44003009	Wandu wose wakambona kechumia echiidapfuma Ruwa.
44003010	Wakammanya ke nyi ulya awedamya na iterewa shindo shemsaṟya alya kichuminyi kilya kicha kya hekalu wakawa mkahai na iṟihyo kya kindo kilya kilembutikya.
44003011	Kyasia arianyi na Petro na Yohane wandu wose wakaangusha na alyando wai kulya kidangashenyi kyelaho nyi kadangasha kya Solomon wai mkahai.
44003012	Petro kekiwona ado kahalwo wandu walya, “A lanye wasoṟo wa Israeli, nyiki ili muiṟihio mudi kya iki, ang'u nyi kili muilufunya meso so cha ili nyi so lutanye ichu nachumie kui pfinya tsadu so luwenyi ang'u na wuele wodu so?
44003013	Nyi Ruwa chu o Abrahamu akeri na o Isaki na o Yakobo, Ruwa chu o waku wadu nyi alewika mana ulya oke Yesu wuitoṟinyi, ulya mulemdambika mukawemkana alya oshangunyi lo Pilato lyandi kedumbwo ke nalekyo.
44003014	Nyo mlekana ichu Mwele ai na o Wusumhanyi mkakunda mwinengo mbahi ulya.
44003015	Kyasia nyo mlewaaha mangi iya ya moo na Ruwa nyi alemṟutsa opfunyi, naso nyi waringishi wa mbonyi tso.
44003016	Na mwidikye foidikya rina lya Yesu, ili akusirye nalyo, rina lyake nalyo lyaṟamtsa mndu chu mumbonyi na immanya. Mwidikye fomwidikya o mfo fowonesya mndu chu oru loke iya oshangunyi lonu mose.
44003017	Kyasiang'u lanyewo wanawawama, na ngamekumanya nyi mlewuta ishi mlaichi na waitoṟi wanu naawo.
44003018	Nyiyo njia Ruwa aleinutsya nayo shilya awesongoye ihamba kui dumbu lya waikimbi walya kya mawawyo ha Kristo.
44003019	Dumbuyenyi muilachike mrima yanu kundu njonyamaṟo tsanu tsiwuto-ho.
44003020	Nalyo lienenge shiheri shembihiṟya moo shiche shiwukye ko Mndumii, nao nahende imdumya ichu awemteṟye onu wokya kacha, Kristo nyio Yesu.
44003021	Nao nyi awewaṟi naamnbyo ruwehu itane shiheri shacha shilya shewihiṟa wuhya shindo shose, shilya Ruwa awededye kui dumbu lya waikimbi wake waweiho wokya mawokyony ha wuyana.
44003022	Mose nyi ahambye ke, Mndumii Ruwa odu echimwamtsya mwikimbi echiwuka kiidi kya wanawamanu cha inyi. Nyio ichu muwe mochimwadanya kya shindo shose echimwongoya.
44003023	Nakyo nyi kyechiwa ke oryo mndu alaadanya mwikimbi cho nyi echirumatso mkambonyi.
44003024	Ee nyi wudo na waikimbi wokya Samueli na walya waleituma numa yake wose wadedye wechiongwo mbonyi tsa mafiri ha.
44003025	Nyo mukeri wana wa waikimbi wo na wa mkundana fulya, fulya Ruwa awewikyanyi na waku wanu kechiwia Abrahamu ke, Na oshari lopfo iyo kiidi kyalo mbaṟi tsa wandu tsii kunu masangenyi mpfondo tsecha iwikyo one tsose.
44003026	Ruwa kekimaa iṟutsa Mana chu oke alesongwo imduma konu nyo kundu namwonyishe kemletsana oryo umu onu ipfo mawichonyi hake.”
44004001	Kyasia Petro na Yohane wechiongoya wado wandu wadi wakohanyi wanene wakawachea warianyi na mchili o hekalu na Wasadukayo.
44004002	Wo wawodo nyashi mnu kipfa ili wailosha wandu wechiongwo iṟuka lya wapfu lilewoneso nyi Yesu.
44004003	Wakawapfunga mawoko wakawashingya mba kukiweda ili lya ngama cha kipfa komshika iila.
44004004	Na walya weadanya dedo wafoi wakakuidikya na mfoe fo wasoṟo walya fukashika shiku shitanu.
44004005	Kyasia ili lya ngama ngamenyi wanene na wameku na walaanyi wa shitabu wakasanza kulya Yerusalemu.
44004006	Na Kayafa nao na Yohane na Aleksandria nawo wose wawei wa kisharinyi kya mkohanyi ang'anyi.
44004007	Wakawawika makiidi hawi hawo wakawawesa, “A nyi kui pfinya ya ku mlewuta mudo a nyi kui rina lya wu?”
44004008	Naho Petro kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele kawawia, “Lanye wanene na wandu na wameku.
44004009	Kokoya lohenda yanduyo inu kya mndu ulya mnyonge kya njia iya alechiṟo nayo.
44004010	Kemanyenyi nyo mose na wandu wa Israeli wose ke nyi kipfa kya rina lya Yesu Mnasareti ichu mlembambya msalabenyi Ruwa kamṟutsa wapfunyi, nyi kui rina lyo mndu chu ahoṟoki lya oshangunyi lonu ai na oru.
44004011	Nao nyio ichu iho lilya liweimine nyi nyo wewika mba, nalyo lyambiko-ho liwe inene lya kinga ndumbenyi.
44004012	Ma kukipfo-se ungi aende okiiopfo. Kyamba kulakeri ma rina lingi kunu shia ruwehu li inengye wandu liwanyi lukiṟo nyilyo.”
44004013	Kyasia wekiwona wuṟamtsu wo Petro na Yohane na imanya ke nyi wai wandu walai waloshe wo ilosho wakatiṟi mnu, wakawamanya ke nyi wawekeri kimu na Yesu.
44004014	Wakawewona mndu ulya elechiṟo ahoṟoki kimu nawo, walamanye ma kindo kyehalwo.
44004015	Wakawawawasa wawuke mba ya chila, nawo wakakusanza kiṟika.
44004016	Wakahamba, “Luwutye ki wandu wa? Kyamba nyi ṟiho imanyikye na pata waiwutye, imanyikye ko wandu wose wai Yerusalemu, manya lochiidima iikanapfo.
44004017	Kya indi kundu kindo ki kilahende idung'ana ko wandu le luwaoweshe walahambe-se mbonyi tsa rina li ko mndu ma kawa uhya oose.”
44004018	Wakawalaha wakawatutuma walawone wechihamba mbonyi ma walaloshe kya rina lya Yesu ma limu.
44004019	Petro na Yohane wakawahalwo wakawawia, “Kokoya nyi kisumhanyi imwadanya nyo kota Ruwa le kedumbwonyi iki nyo muwenyi.
44004020	Kyamba so lochiidima ida luladeda ikyo lulewona na iichopfo.”
44004021	Nawo wekimaa iwaowesha-se wakawalekya walawone njia yewahoṟuo kitewe nyi wandu cha kipfa wandu wose waweichimbiṟa Ruwa kya shilya shilewutika.
44004022	Kyamba mndu ulya alewutiyo ṟiho lilya lyemchiṟa maka yake nyi iweidye maka makumi haana.
44004023	Wekimaa ipfungwo wakahenda ko wandu wawo wakawaongoya mbonyi tsa shindo shilya shose walewio nyi wakohanyi wanene na wameku.
44004024	Nawo wekiicho wado wakairya Ruwa maṟu hawo kui ngoo imu wakahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, iyo uwikye ruwehu na wanda ii na ipalipali lilya na shindo shose shikeri-pfo.”
44004025	“Na iyo udedye kui Mumuyo Mwele na dumbu lya isinga lyapfo Dawidi mku chu odu kohamba, ‘Nyi Kili wa mbaṟi njihenu wapongana na mkambo ya wandu ikahia sha mai?
44004026	Wamangi wa wuyana watikiriana wakusanza, na waitoṟi wapfungana wakadeda kyama kyelemana na Mndumii na Kristo oke.’
44004027	Cha kipf̱a nyi lohi kunu mṟinyi fu Herode na Pontio Pilato handu hamu na wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu na wandu wa Israeli walesanza kya isinga lyapfo yele o Yesu ichu ulemshimbwo na mafuda.
44004028	Ili walewika wadi wakahenda iwuta kilya owoko lopfo na chila yapfo iweteseheṟye wokya kacha shiwewaṟi shiwutike.
44004029	Kyasiang'u hoi Mndumii, keambuya wo wulalu shiowesha shawo, notarame masinga hapfo, wadede idedo lyapfo wai na wukesi.
44004030	Nohoṟuo owoko lopfo lochiṟa wandu kundu shichano na ṟiho tsitanyike kui rina lya manopfo mwele o Yesu.”
44004031	Kukashika wekimaa iterewa Ruwa handu halya wawesanzye-ho hakadihina wakaichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele wakaongwo idedo lya Ruwa wai wakesi.
44004032	Na mfoheṟa ya waidiki walya wawei ngoo imu na mrima fumu. Nawo kulakae-ho ma umu kehamba shindo shilya awode nyi shake amonyi, kya indi wawewode shindo shose kyando.
44004033	Na wasu wakawa weṟingishya iṟuka lya Mndumii Yesu na pfinya ing'anyi, nawo wakawonesyana wucha wung'anyi wose.
44004034	Ma ipfo kiidi kyawo kuweipfo ma umu awewuṟye kindopfo; kyamba walya wose walekuhuṟya kihamba ang'u mba nyi waleshikumba wakaende wuhuṟu wo shindo shilya shilekumbo.
44004035	Wakacha iwuleṟya oo madendenyi ha wasu. Naho kikahawyo oryo mndu cha sa mndu awuṟye.
44004036	Kuwepfo na mndu Mlewi awukye Kipro, rina lyake Yosefu, aledeyo rina nyi wasu Barnaba, ikyo nyi ihamba, mana kiṟeenyi.
44004037	Nao awewode dema kalikumba kaende fesa iya kaileṟya oo madendenyi ha wasu.
44005001	Kyasia kukeri-pfo Msoṟo mu ewio rina lyake nyi Ananyia na mka oke nyi Sapfira. Kahenda ikumba kihamba kyake.
44005002	Kaṟoṟokwo-ho wuhuru wulya maata mka aichi, kacha arie-ho kiteeno kilya kakilerya oo madendenyi ha wasu.
44005003	Petro kambia, “lyo Ananyia, nyi kili Satana akuichwo ipfo ngoonyi yapfo icha iwia Mumuyo Mwele wongo na iṟoṟokwo wuhuru wo dema lyo maata?
44005004	Nyi kulawechiidima ikukaya nafo fui fopfo na ili fuwei mkumbe cha kiwei kyapfo kya oru lopfo? A ili kindo kido kikucheye ipfo mrimenyi fopfo nyi ki? Ma chi wandu owalembapfo chila Ruwa!”
44005005	Ananyia kekiicho ado adi kaho wanda kapfa. Wuowu wung'anyi wukahoya wandu walya waleicho iki wose.
44005006	Kukakure wanake wakamwira-ho wakamduo nja wakamṟika.
44005007	Oweṟe cha hando ha saa tsiṟaṟu mka ulya oke kawecha iida naho alaichi kilya kyambutika.
44005008	Petro kambesa, “Kenjiwia nyi mukumbye dema lyo wuhuru na iwo?” Nao kahamba, “Ee na kui wuhuru wo.”
44005009	Petro kambia, “A ikyo nyi kya iki ili mleidikyana mudi muwawi ke muche iseenga Mumuyo o Mndumii? Ambuya wandu walya wahenda iṟika mii opfo aiho oo mongo, nawo wechikuduo na iyo.”
44005010	Nalyo liyenyi kaho wanda oo madendenyi hake kapfa. Wanake walya wakaida naho wakakoya amepfa wakamduo nja wakahenda imṟika kufui na mii.
44005011	Nahong'u wuowu wung'anyi wukahoya siṟi yose na wandu wose waleicho ishi.
44005012	Na kui mawoko ha wasu kukatanyika shichano na maṟihio hafoi kiidi kya wandu. Nawo wose nyi wawekeri alya kidangashenyi kya Solomon wai na mhio fumu.
44005013	Na ipfo kiidi kya wandu wengi wose kwipfo ma umu alekaria ilungana nawopfo, wandu wakawahonerya mnu.
44005014	Kyasia kukahenda kochiengeṟyo-ho wandu waidikye Mndumii mamingi fung'anyi fo womi na waka.
44005015	Koikyo kukatana wandu waluo wawa moleṟyo ipfo njiehu tsing'anyi wawalaṟe njonyi-hu na shitaṟe-hu kundu Petro kacha kiṟishe kyake tupu kiwikye umu-ho owo mṟishe.
44005016	Nafo mamwingi fo mṟinyi ikeri kulya mbai mbai ya Yerusalemu wakasumbuhana wechiende waluo na iwo wai walise wukiwa nyi waṟufu wawicho, nawo wose wakachiṟo.
44005017	Kukakure mkohanyi ang'anyi na walya wose wawei kimu nao, iwo nyiwo wawei wa msanzyenyi fo Masadukayo, wakakure waichwo wunyeng'i.
44005018	Wakawada wasu wakawawika mbenyi ya mwapfungo.
44005019	Na malaika o Mndumii kacha kapfungwo mongo ya mba iya ya wapfungo kio kawawuta-pfo kahamba.
44005020	“Hendenyi muhoṟoke hekalunyi muwie wandu madedo ha hose ha moo fu.”
44005021	Nawo wekiicho iki wakahenda kilawo kulya hekalunyi wakawoka ilosha. Mkohanyi ang'anyi kacha arianyi na walya wake wakalaha chila iya ing'anyi sanza-pfo na wameku wasambuṟe waana wa Israeli wose wakaduma wandu kulya kipfungyonyi wawaendepfo.
44005022	Waṟundi walya wekishika-pfo walawawone kulya kipfungyonyi wakawuya wakaongoya wehamba.
44005023	“Mba ya wapfungo nawo iwenjipfunge neng'cha wyoo na waringi nawo wawehoṟoki alya mbele ya mongo; kya indi lupfungwo mongo lokoya-pfo mndupfo.”
44005024	Mchili o hekalu na wakohanyi walya wanene waicho wadi isho wakahoyo nyi ipfiio nyi mdo kipfa kyawo wakahamba, “Iki nyi kirie iwa-se kida ngesa?”
44005025	Kukacha-pfo mndu kawashitsya mbonyi ke wandu walya mlewashingya kulya mba ya wapfungo nyi kulya hekalunyi wai wahoṟoki wechilosha wandu.
44005026	Nahong'u mchili ulya kukure kahenda kimu na waṟundi walya wakawaende, indi chi kui pfinyapfo kyamba waleowuo wandu walache iwakumbya maho.
44005027	Wakawaende wakawaanduya ipfo mengenyi. Mkohanyi mnene kawawesa kehamba.
44005028	“Alae chi lulembawasa nyo na imtutuma munu ke mulaloshe mochisenda rina lyi, nanyo ambuyenyi momeichuṟa Yerusalemu shilosho shanu, nawo mukundi iluendye samu ya mndu ulya ikucheye huyadu.”
44005029	Petro kimu na wasu wakahalwo wakahamba, “Nyi kiwaṟi iindya Ruwa kota wandu.
44005030	Ruwa chu o waku wadu alemṟutsa Yesu ko wapfu nyio ichu mlembaha mochimmasa kidi-hu.
44005031	Nao nyio ichu Ruwa alemira na owoko loke lo kulyo kamtana mwitoṟi mokiṟa wandu nainenge Waisraeli mdumbuye na mhoṟye fo njonyamaṟo.
44005032	Natso nyi lukeri waṟingishi wa mbonytsi na Mumuyo Mwele aiho ichu Ruwa ainengye walya wamwidikye wose.”
44005033	Wekiicho wado kikawakoṟa ngoo tsawo wakakusaṟa kewawaha.
44005034	Kukakure-ho umu o chila iya ing'nyi nyi mndu Mfarisayo rina lyake nyi Gamalieli ai mlosha o mawawaso moindyo nyi wandu wose kawawasa ke wasu wadao kya nja oweṟe.
44005035	Kawawia, “Lanye wasoṟo wa Israeli, kuṟisenyi kya wandu wa kya kindo mochiwawutya.
44005036	Cha kipfa numa ya mafiri ha kulekure mndu elaho nyi Teuda kechikuhamba ke nyi mndu ang'anyi wandu wafoi washikie mahana haana wakamwosha. Kekiwoho wakarahanyika woose.
44005037	Numa kukakure mndu elaho Yuda Mgalilaya shiheri shilya sherehyo okamba wandu wafoi wakamwosha, kekipfa wakarahanyika woose.
44005038	Kyasiang'u wulalu ngambia le, Kuihia meṟenyi ko wandu wa. Walekyenyi wahende. Cha kipfa kokoya chila ii ang'u mawuto na hai nyi ha kiwandu nyi kechifunjika.
44005039	Kya indi kokoya nyi ikeri ya Ruwa mochiidima iifunjapfo. Mulache ikoyo nyi mui wekapana na Ruwa.” Nawo wakaidikya madedo halya hake.
44005040	Wakalaha wasu wakawakapa wakawawawasa waladede-se kui rina lya Yesu, wakawasama.
44005041	Nawo wakakure ipfo oshangunyi lo chila iya wai waṟamtsu cha kipfa kya isutso kipfa kya rina lya Yesu.
44005042	Nawo ma walakudeye waleehenda-se yongwo mbonyi tsa Yesu mafiri hose ipfo hekalunyi na kui mmba kui mmba.
44006001	Kyasia walya wa kiloshyonyi mfoe fowo wekihenda ifo mnu kukaamka-ho mununuwo fo Wagriki fonunuwya Waebri kipfa waka wawo walya wapfie mii walewa mohadimo ipfo kipfuṟukanyonyi kya oryo mfiri.
44006002	Nalyo walya ikumi na wawi wakalaha mkambo fulya fo wa kiloshyonyi handu hamu wakahamba, “Chi kichihiṟye so lude ihamba idedo lya Ruwa na ihenda iringa shidembo sha kandopfo.
44006003	Nkyo kimaduma le wanawawama, kekusambuṟyenyi ipfo kiidi kyanu sa wawode kiṟumi kicha waichuṟe Mumuyo Mwele wai na waṟango kundu luwadambikye kiṟundyo ki.
44006004	Natso lukae-ho lochiringa shiterewo na ipfuṟukanya idedo lilya.”
44006005	Kyasia kidedo ki kikachihia mkambo fulya fose, wakasambuṟa Stefano nyio mwidiki msanze menyi Mumuyo Mwele, na Filipo na Pirokoro na Nyikanori na Timon na Parmena na Nyikolao ahalukye kiyuda o kulya Antiokia.
44006006	Wakawahoṟotsa oshangunyi lo wasu. Nawo wakawaterewya wakawahekya mawoko.
44006007	Nahong'u idedo lya Ruwa likadung'ana, mtalie fo wa kiloshyonyi fukapfumbuka mnu kulya Yerusalemu, na wakohanyi wafoi wakahaluka wechiidikya.
44006008	Stefano kaichuṟo wutonga na pfinya ya Ruwa kawa mowuta ṟiho na shichano shing'anyi ipfo wandunyi.
44006009	Kya indi waata wa kisomyo kelaho nyi kya Malibertino na kya Wakirene na kya Waalekisanderia na kya walya wa Kilikia na Asia wakakure wakawesana na Stefano kya kirekyano.
44006010	Nawo walaidime iwingana na wuṟango woke ma na Mumuyo ulya awodo nyio echideda.
44006011	Wakatana wahenda itewa wandu wache ihamba, “Loicho mndu chu kechideda madedo heruma Mose kemsanza na Ruwa.”
44006012	Wakaamtsa wandu na wameku na walaanyi wa shitabu wakahenda imwaala wakambada wakamduo kulya njamenyi ing'anyi.
44006013	Wakahoṟotsa-ho wangochi wehamba sha wongo wahambe, “Mndu chu ekeda aladeda madedo hesutsa hando ha haele na njowawasopfo.
44006014	Cha kipfa lulemwicho kehamba ke Yesu cho Mnasareti nyi echinyamaṟa hando ha na ilacha shido shadu lui wainenge nyi Mose.”
44006015	Na walya wadamye ipfo njamenyi ing'nyi wakamwambuya wose wakawona oshangu loke lui cha lo malaika.
44007001	Kyasia Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kahamba, “A ngesa na wudo kii?”
44007002	Stefano kahamba, “Wanawawama wako na wawandie wako, kenjiadanyenyi! Ruwa chu menyi wuitoṟi alewonekya mku chu odu Abrahamu lyamandi ei kulya Mesopotamia alamehenda kulya Haranyi.
44007003	Kambia, ‘Kure kunu orukenyi lopfo na kowashari wapfo uhende isamya isangenyi kundo njechikuloṟa.’
44007004	Nalyong'u kasama kulya orukenyi lo Wakalidayo kacha ikaa Haranyi, kakure-pfo numa ndee amepfa, Ruwa kamsamiṟa-pfo kamsamiṟya sanga li mu-lee-ho nyo wulalu.
44007005	Nao alemnenga-ho kyedeya mndu kyoṟa ma hando ha ochayo lumupfo na kamteṟya ke nyi echimneenga luwe lo wuchili woke na oshari loke lo numa nao lawewode mana mandi hopfo.
44007006	Ruwa kahamba, ‘Adi ke oshari loke nyi wechisamia orukenyi lo wandu wengi, nawo nyi wechiwatana masinga hawo na iwawutya shiwicho hando ha maka mahanna haana.
44007007	Na mkambo fulya fo wandu wechiwatana masinga, inyi njechifuanduya, nyio Ruwa ahambye ado. Kikamewa ikyo wawukeng'u-pfo, nawo wache injipfuṟukanya hando ha.’
44007008	Kamnenga mkundana fo odino, Kikamewa ikyo Abrahamu kafee Isaki kamdina mkonu fo nyanya. Isaki kafee Yakobo kawemdina. Yakobo kafee waku walya wadu, walya ikumi na wawi kawewawutia ado.”
44007009	“Waku walya wadu wakanyenyia Yosefu wakamkumba wuhuru nadao Misiri. Ruwa kamkayapfo,
44007010	kambuta mawukiwenyi hake hose kamkundishya Farao ulya mangi ya Misiri kechimsumba wuṟango. Nao kambika mokalya Misiri yose na mba yake yose.
44007011	Kyasia kukacha njaa orukenyi lo Misiri lose na Kanaanyi na mawukiwa hang'anyi mnu, nawo waku walawone kindo kyelya.
44007012	Kukashika Yakobo kekiicho ke Misiri kwipfo nganu kaduma-pfo waku walya wadu kyaṟo kya kuwoka.
44007013	Na kyaṟo kya kawi Yosefu kakumanyisha ko wanawamae kukawemanyikya na Farao kiparika kya Yosefu.
44007014	Yosefu kaduma ke ndee o Yakobo nahende endo hamu na kishari kyose washikye wandu makumi mfungade na watanu.
44007015	Yakobo kasoka na Misiri wakapfia-pfo wo na waku walya wadu.
44007016	Wakadao wakashitso Shekemu wakaṟiko kulya kipfunyi kilya Abrahamu ehuṟa na fesa yake ko wana wa Emori kulya Shekemu.”
44007017	“Kyasia kiheri kilya Ruwa eteṟyana na Abrahamu kekishika itikiria kufui wandu walya wakapfumbuka na yengeṟeka mnu kulya Misiri.
44007018	Itane kokure-pfo mangi ingi sa alaweichi kya Yosefu.
44007019	Mangi chu kawutya waku wadu sha mtambo na iwatanya shiwicho kechiwawawasa ke wawihitse shiwana shawo shitutu kundu shilakae na moo.
44007020	Kiheri kyo Mose kafeo nao nyi awekundo nyi Ruwa kalelo na iringo hando ha meri iṟaṟu kanyi ko ndee.
44007021	Kekiwihitso mana o Farao o waka kamwira kamduo kamlela nawe cha mana oke.
44007022	Mose kalosho wuṟango wo Misiri wose kawa mbahanyi o madedo na mawuto.”
44007023	“Mose kekimaa maka makumi haana kaitiko nyi ngoo yake kehenda yambuya wanawamae wandu wa Israeli.
44007024	Kawona umu aweituṟo kamkaya kamtaya kirache kawaha Misiri ulya.
44007025	Nyi alekusaṟa ke lako wanawamae nyi wechimanya ke Ruwa nyi awainengye okiio kui owoko loke, kya indi walemanyapfo.
44007026	Ili lya ngama kawache-se kakoya wawi wechiloyana kakunda iwasansa na iwika-ho ofoṟo kewawia, ‘Lanye womi mui wana wa mka, nyi kiili muiwutiana kilasumhanyi?’
44007027	Kya indi ulya moafinyia odoe kamkumbalya mbai kambia, ‘Nyi o wu akuwikye nowe mwitoṟi moluchilia so?
44007028	Alae nyi ukundi injiwaha chando ule-waha Mmisiri ulya wukowu?’
44007029	Mose kadicha kitewe nyi idedo li kakaa ai msami orukenyi lo Wamadiamu kafee-pfo wana wawi.”
44007030	“Koikisia maka makumi haana malaika o Mndumii kambonekya kulya nuka ya Sinai ai olewonyi lo modo ipfo kingeṟenyi.
44007031	Mose kekimbona kaṟihyo kiwonesyo kilya nao kechitikiṟia afui ke nambuye kukaichyo ṟu lya Mndumii lyehamba.
44007032	‘Inyi nyi njii Ruwa o waku wapfo, njii Ruwa o Abrahamu na o Isaki na o Yakobo.’ Mose kadedema nalakarye yambuya-ho.
44007033	Mndumii kambia, ‘Wuta shadu sho shapfo cha kipfa iya hando uhoṟoki-ho nyi hando haele.
44007034	Nyi ngamewona kituro kya wandu wako kulya Misiri, ngaweicho na msumukyo fowo ngasoka njiche njiwawuteho. Na wulalu kendeng'u, njikuduma nohende kulya Misiri.’
44007035	Nyio Mose cho walewoka imleha wehamba ke o ku akuwikye nowe mwitoṟi moluchilia, nyiong'u aledumo nyi Ruwa nawe mwitoṟi moletsa wandu kui owoko lo malaika ulya alembonekya alya kingeṟenyi kilya.
44007036	Icho nyiong'u alewawuta kechitana ṟiho na shichano kulya orukenyi lo Misiri na kulya ipalipalinyi lya malale na kulya nuka hando ha maka makumi haana.
44007037	Mose cho nyio alewia wandu wa Israeli, ‘Ruwa echimwamtsya mwikimbi cha inyi ipfo kiidi kya wanawamanu.’
44007038	O nyio awerianyi na malaika ulya ipfo siṟinyi ya kulya nuka ulya ededa nao kulya fumvu-hu lya Sinai na waku walya wadu. Nyio aleambya madedo hawode moo naluinenge so.”
44007039	“Mndu chu waku wadu walekunda imwidikyapfo, kya indi nyi walemkunahya mbai wakawuya idosa macha ha Misiri ipfo ngoonyi tsawo.
44007040	Wakawia Aron, ‘Lutsanye ma-ruwa helusongoya, cha kipfa Mose cho aleluwuta kulya Misiri lulaichi kindo kimtowokyepfo.’
44007041	Mafiri halya wakatsana mfano fo ihache wakafuendye shidaso wakachihio nyi kilya wakiwikye na mawoko hawo wawenyi.”
44007042	Kyasia Ruwa kahamba, “Samanya kawada wapfurukanye matoṟito ha nginehu chando kii kiṟehye kitabunyi kya waikimbi, ‘Alae mulenjikoṟya inyi shemaya modonyi na njodambiko maka iya makumi haana kulya nuka lanye wasoṟo wa Israeli!
44007043	Ote, nyi hema lya Moloki muleliira-se na nyenyeri ya Ruwa lyanu Romfa; ntso njofano muletsana muwenyi kundu mutsiolokye wanda. Na inyi njechimusamiṟa muhende kuleshe mutano moshika Babilon.’
44007044	Shiheri shilya waku wadu wawei kulya nuka nyi wawewode hema lilya lya kiṟingishyo liwei chando ulya ededa na Mose awawasye ke wasungusie likeri cha ofano lulya aleluwona.
44007045	Nalyo nyilyo waku wadu walya wawei na Yosua waleliambya wakaliitsa na ipfo sangenyi lya mkambo ya wandu Ruwa alewafuna wechidicha oshangu lo waku wadu. Na wudo liwekaa shika mafiṟi ha Dawidi.
44007046	Nao akundikye Ruwa katerewa momu fowonya Ruwa o Yakobo handu hekaa.”
44007047	Kya indi nyio Solomon aleshika imbikya mba,
44007048	“Kya indi ichu ai huya shose ekekaa mba tsii njiwike na mawokopfo chando mwikimbi ahambye.
44007049	Ruwehu nyi oloṟika loko lo wuitoṟi na wanda ii nyi hando hako hehekya madende hako. Mndumii ahambye, ‘Nyi mba njiki mochinjiwikya? Nyi handu haki inyi njechiidima yonyonya-ho?
44007050	Chi owoko loko luwikye isho shose?’
44007051	Nyo nyi mui mudi na okuchu mulunganyi ilehya Mumuyo Mwele mulai wadine ngoo manya madu; chandu waku wanu wawewutye nanyo na wudo da.
44007052	Nyi ku kuwei mwikimbi waku wanu wakada walamterengya. Ee lae na iwaha wakawewaha walya weesongwo ihamba mbonyi tsa macheenyi ha ichu mhorotsu, ichu nyo mlewa wulalu watwaṟi wake na wawahi.
44007053	Njowawaso nyi muletsiambya kui kitutumyo kya wamalaika manya mulatsiwade.”
44007054	Kyasia wekiicho madedo halya wakahya ipfo ngoonyi wakamwimadya maheho.
44007055	Nao Stefano aichuo Mumuyo Mwele kaambuya kulya ruwehu kawona wuitoṟi wo Ruwa na Yesu ahoṟoki kuwoko ko kulyo ko Ruwa.
44007056	Kahamba, “Ambuya, njiwonyi kulya ruwehu kuṟuhukye na Mana ulya o mndu ahoṟoki ipfo ora lo kulyo lo Ruwa.”
44007057	Nawo wakasambahada mnu na ṟu ling'anyi wakapfinyika na madu hawo wakamrundukya wose wai na mhio fumu.
44007058	Wakamkunahya nja ya mṟi wakambaha wemkumbya maho. Na wangochi walya wakaleṟya nguo tsawo tsa huye alya madendenyi ha msoṟo o rika lya wandu awekeri-ho elaho rina lyake nyi Saulo.
44007059	Wakakumbya Stefano maho nao katerewa kahamba, “Hoi Mndumii Yesu, ambya mumuyo foko!”
44007060	Kapfiria ndi kalaha na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba “Hoi Mndumii! Ma kulawapfungiṟye-wo wunyamaṟi wu!” Kekihamba ado donyi kadonyikya madonyi kapfa.
44008001	Nao Saulo awei umu o walya walemdumbuya kyake ke nawoho. Mfiri fulya kukaamka kiterengyo king'anyi keterengya siṟi kulya Yerusalemu. Wose wakarahanyikya kulya shihongonyi sha Yudaya na Samaria. Wandu wedeo Yerusalemu na wasu.
44008002	Indi wandu weowuo Ruwa wakaira mnying'a fo Stefano wakahenda imṟika necha wakamkapya kilio king'any.
44008003	Saulo kawutya siṟi shifoi sheinyamara kechiida mba kui mba na ikuruo-pfo womi na waka na ihenda iwashingya mba ya wapfungo.
44008004	Na walya walerahanyikya ipfo na ipfo wakahenda wechiongwo idedo lilya.
44008005	Kyasia na Filipo kasoka kashika kulya mṟinyi fulya fo Samaria kawaongoya kya Kristo.
44008006	Wandu walya mamwingi wakakuwada mnu na shilya shileongoyo nyi Filipo wechiadanya na mrima msanze ili wawona na ṟiho tsilya tsechiwuto nyio.
44008007	Kyamba wandu wafoi wawewodo nyi mṟufu mbicho walehenda iletso ikawuka-ho yechifihiṟa mnu, na wahuli wafoi na wawetiliwanyi shiwungo wakahenda ichiṟo.
44008008	Kulya mṟinyi fulya kukakaa-pfo sia ing'anyi mnu.
44008009	Kukawekaa-pfo mndu ipfo mṟiny ewio rina lyake nyi Simon, awode wuhanga, nyi aweṟihishye mnu wandu wa oshari lo Wasamaria kechihamba ke nyio ai mnene.
44008010	Nao nyio aleadanyio nyi wose wokya mtutu itane ang'any wechihamba, “Simon nyi awode wuidimi wo Ruwa wulya wung'anyi.”
44008011	Na kitewe wamwadanye wado nyi kipfa nyi kiheri sa kileshe awemeṟihisha wandu na wuhanga woke.
44008012	Nahong'u wekiidikya Filipo kechiongwo ndumi ya sia ya wumangi wo Ruwa kui rina lya Yesu Kristo wakahenda ikupatisyo-ho womi na waka.
44008013	Nao Simon amonyi aleidikya kapatiso kakuwada na Filipo kaṟihisho mnu awona shichano na riho tsilya tsing'anyi tsiweiwutika.
44008014	Na wasu walya wei kulya Yerusalemu wekiicho ke Samaria yameidikya na yambya ideḏo lya Ruwa wakawadumya Petro na Yohane.
44008015	Wakasokya napfo wakawaterewya waambye Mumuyo Mwele.
44008016	Cha kipfa alawemewasokye ma umu owo shile nyi walepatisyo rina lya Mndumii Yesu.
44008017	Oweṟe nalo ili walewahekya mawoko nawo wakaambya Mumuyo Mwele.
44008018	Na Simon kekiwona ke wandu nyi wainengo Mumuyo Mwele kui ihekyo mawoko ha wasu kawaendie fesa.
44008019	Kahamba, “Njinengenyiwo na inyi pfinya yo kundu oryo mndu ngamhekya mawoko naambye Mumuyo Mwele.”
44008020	Petro kambia, “Fesa yapfo ihende ideka kimu na iyo ilindi ohia ke kisumbo kya Ruwa kechihuṟo na masaa.
44008021	Uwode ohawi ma kiteeno kya kindo kipfo cha kipfa ngoo yapfo iwode wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo Ruwapfo.
44008022	Kyasia wikang'u matumatu kya owicho lu lopfo noterewe Mndumii Ruwa, kundu kokoya kechiwa noloheṟo kya makusaṟo ha ha ngoo yapfo.
44008023	Cha kipfa njikuwonyi nyi uichuo mawawyo cha nduu uweimfunge sha mkika cha mhanda fo ngu.”
44008024	Simon kahalwo kahamba, “Kenjiterewenyi nyo ko Mndumii-kundu isho ohamba shilanjihoye ma kimu.”
44008025	Nawo wekimaa iṟingishya na yongwo idedo lya Mndumii wakawuya na Yerusalemu wechiongwo ndumi ya sia ya okio shihongonyi sha ko Wasamaria sa shifoi.
44008026	Kyasia malaika o Mndumii kacha ideda na Filipo kambia, “Kureho nohende kulya-kya ora lo kosoko kulya mkuwalenyi fusokye fuwuka Yerusalemu fukahenda soka na kulya Gaza, nyi kundo kuwode olele.”
44008027	Nao kakure-pfo kakuhendya napfo Naho adi a ulya mndu Mhabeshi ai mnzenge mheki o mangi iya mka Kandake o kulya Habeshi ai na mnjama oke awemdambikye kisa kyake kyose nakikalye. Nao awecheye kulya Yerusalemu iterewa-pfo.
44008028	Nao nyi iwuyang'u ai adamye igarinyi lyake kechisoma kitabu kya mwikimbi Yesaya.
44008029	Kyasia Mumuyo kawia Filipo, “Tikiria hafui na igari li nohendesane nalyo.”
44008030	Filipo kechisembelya naho kaicho kesoma kitabu kya mwikimbi Yesaya kambia, “Alae kyawekutambalahalukya ikyo uisoma?”
44008031	Nao kahamba, “A njiidime njida kulawode mndu echinloṟa njia?” Katerewa Filipo nadoye kulya igarinyi nadamye-pfo kimu nao.
44008032	Na kifunjo kya mṟeho awei ikisoma nyikyo iki, “Nyi aledao kishinjyonyi cha ichondi lilechifuha oshangunyi lo molioda, nyi wudo nao ma nalatambaṟuo dumbu lyake.
44008033	Ipfo kundo awekunyiṟye adi mondu foke fukaangatso. Nyi o wu echitichya kipaṟika kyake? Cha kipfa moo foke nyi fui mwire fulakae kunu shi.”
44008034	Mnzenge ulya kahalwo kawia Filipo, “Ngakuterewa njiwia, mwikimbi chu adeda madedo ha nyi kya wu ahamba; nyi mbonyi tsake o amony ang'u nyi kya mndu ungi?”
44008035	Nalyo Filipo katambaṟuo dumbu lyake kawoka alya kyasyonyi kya mṟeho fu kamwongoya ndumi ya sia ya Yesu.
44008036	Kyasia wechihenda wadi ipfo njienyi wakashika ikoya kundo ko mṟingenyi. Mnzenge ulya kahamba, “Ambuya aifu mṟinga, nyi kiki kyechinjiima njilapatso?” [
44008037	Filipo kahamba “Kombona amekuidikya kui mrima fopfo fose na kwipfo momu.” Nao kahalwo. “Ngaidikya Mana o Ruwa ke nyio Yesu Kristo.”]
44008038	Kawawasa igari litirimisho. Wakasokya kulya mṟingeny wo wa wawi o Filipo na Mnzenge ulya, kahenda impatisa.
44008039	Kikasia wekiwuka kulya mṟingenyi malaika o Mndumii kaira-ho Filipo kemmeṟutsa msenge ulya nalakimbone-se, kawada njia tsake a mchihie.
44008040	Filipo kawono kulya Azoto, nao kawa moidaida ipfo keongwo ndumi ya sia ya okiio mṟinyi yose katana ashika Kaisaria.
44009001	Kyasia na Saulo kakaa keikoro mikoro fokudosa oloyo na iwaha walya wa kiloshyonyi kya Mndumii Kahenda kulya ko mkohanyi ang'anyi.
44009002	Kambesa baruo tsehenda kulya Damasiko tsa kulya sinagogenyi, kundu, kakokya-pfo wandu wa njia ii wai womi ang'u waka, nawapfunge na iwaende na Yerusalemu.
44009003	Kyasia echihenda ashikye kufui na Damasiko idi ngela pereseng'u ikamdung'anyitsya sa riti iwuka ipfo ruwehu.
44009004	Nao kaho wanda kaicho ṟu lembia, “Saulo wu, Saulo wu! Nyi kili owa monjiterengya?”
44009005	Nao kahamba, “Iyo nyi iyo wu mndumii?” Nao kahamba “Inyi nyio Yesu ichu okemterengya iyo.
44009006	Kya indi kure nohende ipfo mṟinyi nochikaa uwio kindo kikuwaṟi iwuta.”
44009007	Na wasoṟo walya wawerianyi nao wakahoṟoka-ho waangalali, ṟu wakaliicho walawone mndu.
44009008	Saulo kakure alya wanda, kekitambaṟuo meso hake nalaidime iwona. Wakambada owoko wakamteteṟa wakamshitsa kulya Damasiko.
44009009	Kakaa-pfo mkonu iṟaṟu a mpfu meso, ma alalya kindo ma inyo.
44009010	Kyasia kulya Damasiko kukeri-pfo mndu o kiloshyony rina lyake nyi Ananyia. Mndumii kacha imbia oo kiwonyonyi, “Ananyia!” Nao kahamba, “Nyi iya njii hoi Mndumii.”
44009011	Mndumii kambia, “Kekure nohende kulya njienyi i njideye rina nyi njihoṟotsu noshihe mndu awio rina lyake nyi Saulo o kulya Tarso ipfo mba ko Yuda. Cha kipfa nyi aipfo aiterewa.
44009012	Nao nyi amewona mndu kiwonesyonyi ewio rina lyake nyi Ananyia keida na ipfo mba koke kecha imhekya owoko kundu nawuye-se iwona.”
44009013	Ananyia kahaluo, “Ale Mndumii, njileicho kya msoṟo chu njewio nyi wandu wafoi chando aletana wandu waele wapfo wa kulya Yerusalemu shindo shiwicho shifoi.
44009014	Na ili ai kunu na awewode pfinya awutye kulya ko wakohanyi wang'anyi yecha ipfunga iwo welaha rina lyapfo wose.”
44009015	Kya indi Mndumii kambia, “Wada njia uhende-pfo, kyamba o ichu nyi anjikerye kisha kyako ndekisambuṟa nahende iduo rina lyako sumuhana na wandu wa masangeny na wamangi na wana wa isiraeli.
44009016	Kyamba njechikaa njimloṟe shilya shimwendye nahende iwawiṟo kimaduma kya rina lyako chando kimbaṟi ishiwona shose.”
44009017	Kyasia Ananyia kakure kahenda iida na kulya mba iya kamhekya mawoko kahamba, “Saulo, mowowama oko, nyi Mndumii anjiduma o Yesu chu alekuwonekya kulya njienyi kochicha kundu uwuye-se iwona noichuṟo Mumuyo Mwele.”
44009018	Nalyo liyenyi kikamwowokya ipfo mesonyi hake cha nyi kuweho mawala kawuya iwona. Nao kakure kahenda ipatiso.
44009019	Kakulia kando kairika, kakaa kulya ko walya wa kiloshyonyi wa kulya Damasiko mfiri yeikena.
44009020	Nalyo liyenyi kaonguo kya Yesu kulya masinagogenyi ke o nyi Mana o Ruwa.
44009021	Walya waleicho ishi wakaṟihio mnu wose wakahamba, “Ichu chio ulya awei moterengya iwo welaha rina li kulya Yerusalemu? Na kimaduma cha ikyo kimwendie na kunu nyi kundu nawafunge na iwaduo ko wakohanyi wang'anyi.”
44009022	Indi Saulo kaitika iṟingishya kapfulutsa Wayuda walya wawei kulya Damasiko nyashi kechiwanza ke ichu nyi Kristo.
44009023	Ko-meidaho mfiri sa ifoi Wayuda walya wakasanza kyama ke wambahe.
44009024	Kya indi Paulo kamanya mtambo fowo wakawa wemlaya alya shichuminy mfiri na kio wambahe.
44009025	Walya wa kiloshyonyi wakamwira kio wakamrundutsa alya omombohu lo mṟi wakamsotsya wanda na itimba.
44009026	Nao kekishika kulya Yerusalemu kahesha ikulunga na walya wa kiloshyonyi, nawo wawekaa wemwowuo wose walaidikye ke nao nyi awei o kiloshyonyi.
44009027	Nyio Barnaba kamwambya kamdaya wasu kawaongoya chando alewona Mndumii kulya njieny ke nyio alededa nao na chando awei yongwo rina lya Yesu kulya Damasiko alawode wuowu.
44009028	Nao kakaa nawo handu hamu kulya Yerusalemu kechiida na iwuka. Kawa mokuhamba na pata ke nyi aihendelya rina lya Mndumii.
44009029	Kahenda ideda na siṟi ya Wagriki na iwingana nawo. Nawo wakadeda kyama ke wambahe.
44009030	Kyasia wanawawama wekimanya mbonyi tsi wakamduo kulya Kaisaria wakamdika Tarso.
44009031	Nahong'u siṟi tsikakukaya na ofoṟo kulya Yudaya kose na Galilaya na Samaria wakakulunga mbika imu wechichumia weowuo Mndumii wakawonyo mwengeṟya kui wuamtsu wo Mumuyo Mwele.
44009032	Kukashika nao Petro kechitengetatengeta njora tsose kahenda isoka na ko waele wawei kulya Lida.
44009033	Handu halya kawona-pfo mndu ewio rina lyake nyi Ainea. Awelee kitaṟehu maka nyanya cha kipfa awei mumu shiwungo sho.
44009034	Petro kambia, “Ainea, Yesu Kristo akuchiṟa. Kure noale kitaṟa kyapfo iyo kumonyi.” Oweṟe nalo kakure.
44009035	Na wandu wai kulya Lida wose na kulya Saronyi wakambona wakahalukya Mndumii.
44009036	Nahong'u na kulya Yope kuwepfo mka o kiloshyony ewio rina lyake nyi Tabita (nyi kimu na sariha.) Mka chu awei sa msanze mowuta mawuto mecha na isungusia shindo shetarama wakiwa.
44009037	Kukashika mafiri halya kaluo kapfa. Nawo wekiidima imsanja wakamleṟya kulya kai.
44009038	Nahong'u ili Lida koi kufui na Yope wa kiloshyonyi walya wameicho ke Petro nyipfondo ai. Nawo wakamdumya wandu wawi wemterewa ke nalatiṟe icha na kowo.
44009039	Petro kakure kaduana nawo. Kekishika-pfo wakamdosa na kulya kai. Waka wakusu wose wakacha ihoṟoka alyando ai wechifuha na imloṟa kanzu na nguo tsilya Tabita awetsiwikye mandi ei nawo.
44009040	Kyasia Petro kawafuna-ho wose kapfiria ndi katerewa aindukye mnying'a fulya kahamba, “Tabita kure!” Nao katambaṟuo meso hake kekiwona Petro kakuira kadamya.
44009041	Nao kambada owoko kamhoṟotsa. Kekiidima ilaha waele walya na waka walya wakusu kambika oo oshangunyi lowo ai na moo.
44009042	Kindo ki kikamanyika kulya Yope kulya mṟinyi fose wandu wafoi wakaidikya Mndumii.
44009043	Kiidima Petro kakaa kulya Yope mfiri ifoi ai kanyi ko mndu ewio rina lyake nyi Simon ai msusi o njonyi.
44010001	Kyasia kulya Kaisaria kuwekeri-pfo mndu ewio rina lyake nyi Kornelio mchili umu o siṟi iya ya wasikari yechilaho Kiitaliano.
44010002	Ai mndu mhendeli aowoye Ruwa o na wa kanyi koke wose echilekya mnu shindo shesaṟya wandu na iterewa kawelungana iterewa Ruwa.
44010003	Nao kawona na pata malaika o Ruwa oo kiwonesyonyi keida na ipfo mba koke kushikye saa kenda tsa mfiri kambia, “Kornelio!”
44010004	Nao kamwambuya a mṟihie kaowuo kahamba, “Nkyo iki kindo ki Mndumii?” kambia “Shiterewo shapfo na shilewekudooya shikashika kikumbuyonyi kya ipfo oshangunyi lo Ruwa na shisaṟyo shapfo.
44010005	Na wulalu kehendang'u duma wasoṟo kulya Yope nolahe-fo Simon ekelaho nyi Petro.
44010006	Nao ai mhenu o mundu umu rina lyake nyi Simon msusi onjonyi, awode mba yake alya mawambao ha ipalipali. Nyio sa echikuwia kilya kikuwaṟi iwuta.”
44010007	Malaika ulya aweideda nao kekikuhendya Kornelio kalaha waṟundi wake wa kanyi koke wawi na msikari umu ai mhendeli o walya wawekemfuṟukanya.
44010008	Kekiidima iwaongoya shose kawaduma wahende Yope.
44010009	Kyasia ili lya ngama ili walya warie njia yehenda napfo washikye kufui na mṟi fulya Petro kado na ipfo kitaangehu kya mba ihenda iterewa-pfo Ruwa ili saa ya kaṟandaṟu ya mfiri.
44010010	Aipfo adi kawado nyi njaa kalanga kyelya. Wechimsungusia kyelya nao katambahuka riso lya mrimenyi.
44010011	Kawona ruwehu kuṟuhukye na kindo kiimsokya kii cha nguo sa nnene kechisotsosotso na makechu ho ha haana kikatana kyashika wanda.
44010012	Ipfo kiidi kuipfo mando hai na moo ha mbaṟi tsose ha madende haana na mando hekuṟuo wanda na ndehe tsa shia ruwehu.
44010013	Na ṟu likamcheya lyehamba, “Kekure Petro noshinje nolye!”
44010014	Petro kahamba, “Manya, ote, hoi Mndumii! Cha kipfa ndalemlye maale kindo kya ngafu na kindo kilai kiharami.”
44010015	Na ṟu lilya likawuya imbia lya kawi, “Kindo Ruwa akiheṟemtsye iyo ulakilahe nyi kya ngafu.”
44010016	Kindo ki kikawutika kido kaṟaṟu. Kiidima kindo kilya kikadoso-se na ipfo ruwehu.
44010017	Kyasia Petro kekikusaṟa na iṟihiyo kya kiwonekyo kilya ke nyi kii kya iki wadi a walya wawei wadume nyi Kornelio wameidima iwesa mba ya Simon wakahoṟoka oo mbele ya mongo.
44010018	Wakalaha wechiwesa kokoya Simon elaho Petro akeri-pfo.
44010019	Nao Petro awei ikusaṟa kya kiwonekyo kilya. Mumuyo kashika imbia, “Aiwo wandu waṟaṟu waiho waikupfula iyo.
44010020	Kure soka-pfo nohende duana nawo, ma kulapfio nyi mdo cha kipfa nyi inyi njiwadumye.”
44010021	Petro kasoka-pfo kakoya wandu walya kawawia, “Aichu nyi inyi mukeri impfula. Nkyo kiki kimshitsye iya?”
44010022	Wakahamba, “Nyi Kornelio mchili mndu mhoṟotsu aowoye mnu Ruwa menyi kiṟumi kicha ipfo osharinyi lo Wayuda lose, o alewawaso nyi malaika mwele ke nadume wandu kopfo nohende kulya kanyi koke nakuadanye kindo ochimbia.”
44010023	Nahong'u kawalaha na mba kawaambya wai wahenu wake. Kikashika ili lya ngama petro kakure kaduana kimu nawo, na wanawawama maataho wawei kulya Yope wakaduana nao.
44010024	Ili lingi wakaafukya Kaisaria. Nao Kornelio nyi aweiho kechiwaweḏya asanzye na kishari kyake ipfo kanyikoke na wambuya wake walya wa kufui.
44010025	Petro kekishika kuidya napfo Kornelio kacha imwambya kakuhutsa wanda oo madendenyi hake kambikya wuindi.
44010026	Petro kamwirya huye kahamba, “Kure hoṟoka, inyi na mbei mndu.”
44010027	Wechideda nao kaida na mba kawonaho wandu sa wafoi wasanzye-ho.
44010028	Kawawia, “Nawo muichi ke mndu Myuda awode momu fowadana na mndu o mbaṟi ingi ma ihenda kokepfo. Kya indi Ruwa nyio alenjiloṟa ke njilatane mndu ma kawa wu ke nyi ai o ngafu ang'u nyi alai mharami.
44010029	Nkyo kimaduma ili ngalaho ndalehe indi ngacha. Kyasiang'u ngawesa nyi kindo kida munjilahie.”
44010030	Kornelio kahamba, “Inu nyi mkonu fo kaana ngambooka ikuotoya itane saa ii, na saa ya kenda njechiterewa kunu mba koko, cha ili ngawona mndu ahoṟoki oshangunyi loko aṟee nguo njikengemari,
44010031	kanjiwia, ‘Kornelio, shiterewo shapfo shamhenda yadanyo na shilekio shapfo shamekumbuyo ipfo oshngunyi lo Ruwa.
44010032	Kyasia duma wandu wahende kulya Yope nolaheho Simon elaho nyi Petro nache na iya. Nao nyi akeri mhenu o ipfo mba ya Simon msusi o njonyi alee mawambao ha ipalipali.’
44010033	Nahong'u oweṟe na lulya ngaduma wandu kopfo. Na iyo kowewuta necha ili omcha. Kyasiang'u aiwa so lose lukeri iya oshangunyi lo Ruwa luadanye isho umbwawase nyi Mndumii shose.”
44010034	Nahong'u Petro katambaṟuo dumbu lyake kahamba, “Nyi kya lohi ngatawuka imanya ke Ruwa ekeambuya wandu fanapfo.
44010035	Kya indi oryo mbaṟinyi ya wandu yose mndu aiho amowoye na iwuta sha wusumhanyi nyi echikundikya koke.
44010036	Aii ndumi aidikye wana wa Israeli wose echionguo ofoṟo luiwiko nyi Yesu Kristo. Nao nyio ai Mndumii o wandu wose.
44010037	Nyi muichi kilya kyake kilewutika kulya Yudaya yose awokye kulya Galilaya ilindi Yohane alemarisa yonguo wupatiso woke.
44010038	Nyio Yesu o Nasareti chando Ruwa alemshimbwo mafuda kui Mumuyo Mwele arie pfinya. Nao katengeta ipfo na ipfo kechiwuta ngata njicha na ichiṟa walya wawei walamye nyi Satan wose kyamba Ruwa awei kimu nao.
44010039	Natso nyi lukeri waṟingishi wa shindo aleshiwutya orukenyi lo Wayuda na ipfo Yerusalemu shose, ichu walembaha wakammasa kidihu.
44010040	Ichu Ruwa alemṟutsa mkonu fo kaṟaṟu kamnenga nawono.
44010041	Nawewono chi nyi wandu wosepfo, kya indi nyi wangochi walya wawei wasambuṟe nyi woko-so lulie na inyo kimu nao ili alemaa iṟuka wapfunyi.
44010042	Nao kaluwawasa luongoye wandu na iṟingishya ke ichu nyio mteṟye nyi Ruwa nawe modumbuya wai na moo na wapfu mondu fulya.
44010043	Nao ichu waikimbi wamhambye kya iṟingishya lyawo wose ke oryo mndu amwidikye nyi echiwonyo mhoṟye fo wunyamaṟi kui rina lyake.”
44010044	Kyasia Petro kechideda ado madedo ha kudi Mumuyo Mwele kasokya walya weadanya ndumi ii wose.
44010045	Na waidiki wadine walya werianyi na Petro wakasaangya kipfa ili kimasyo kya Mumuyo Mwele kyechipusuyo na wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu.
44010046	Kyamba walewaicho wechideda na njolimi njihya wechiichimbiṟa Ruwa. Nalyo Petro kahaluo kahamba,
44010047	“Ngesa na kwipfo mndu echiidima iima mṟinga wandu wa walechipatiso iwo wamwambya Mumuyo Mwele kimu cha so?”
44010048	Kawawasa ke wapatisyo rina lya Yesu Kristo. Nalyo wakamterewa natsinde kowo mkonu maata.
44011001	Kyasia wasu na wanawawama wai kulya Yudaya wakashitsyo mbonyi ke wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu nawo wameambya idedo lya Ruwa.
44011002	Petro kekido nahende Yerusalemu walya wadine wakarekyana nao.
44011003	Wehamba, “Nyi kuleida na ko wandu walawadine kolya nawo.”
44011004	Petro kawooka iwaongoya kya osaaṟe kahamba.
44011005	“Nyi njiwei kulya mṟinyi fo Yope njechiterewa ngatambahuka riso lya mrimenyi ngawona kiwonesyo kya kindo kii cha nguo nnene kyechisoka kiwuka ruwehu kyechisotso na makechu hakyo ha haana kikanjikoya.
44011006	Ngakiambuya mnu njechikusaṟa ngawona-pfo mando hai na moo ha madende haana hai mando ha ngeṟenyi na shindo shekekuruo wanda na ndehe tsa kunu shia ruwehu.
44011007	Ngaicho ṟu lyechinjiwia, ‘Kure Petro noshinje nolye!’
44011008	Ngahamba, ‘Manya, ote hoi Mndumii! Cha kipfa kindo kya ngafu ma kindo kilai kiharami kilemeide dumbunyi lyakopfo.’
44011009	Ṟu likambia lya kawi liwuka ruwehu, ‘Shishiheṟemtse nyi Ruwa ma kulashitane nyi shilai shiharami.’
44011010	Kindo ki kikawutika kido kaṟaṟu, kidima shindo shose shikakurwo na kulya huye-se shikadao ruwehu.
44011011	Ate, oweṟe lo wandu waṟaṟu wakahoṟoka oo moongo fo mba iya kundu mbekeri, wawei wadume koko wawuka Kaisaria.
44011012	Naho Mumuyo kanjiwia njiduane nawo ma ndawone njepfio nyi mdo. Nawo wanawawama wa waṟandaṟu wakaduana kimu na inyi. Lukahenda na kulya mba ya mndu ulya,
44011013	kaluongoya chando awonye malaika ahoṟoki ipfo mba koke kembia, ‘Duma wandu wahende kulya Yope nolahe-pfo Simon elaho nyi Petro.
44011014	Msa echikuwia madedo sa hechikuendye okiio iyo kimu na wa kanyi kopfo wose.’
44011015	Nahong'u ilindi njiweasa ideda njidi Mumuyo Mwele kawasokya cha lilyandi alusokya so lya kuwoka.
44011016	Na inyi ngakumbuo-ho idedo lilya lya Mndumii ehamba ke, ‘Yohane nyi alepatisa na mṟinga, kya indi nyo mochipatiso na Mumuyo mwele.’
44011017	Kyasiang'u ipfo kundo Ruwa amewainengawo kisumbo kilya kilya aleluinenga so ili waidikye Mndumii Yesu Kristo na ikusirya nao aka inyi nyi inyi wu njidime ilehya Ruwa!”
44011018	Wekiicho madedo halya wakatsia wakaṟumisha Ruwa wehamba, “Kyasia Ruwa ameinenga wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu mdumbuye fochiende moo.”
44011019	Kikasia walya werahanyika kitewo nyi mawukiwa halya hewoneka kiheri Stefano alewoho wakahenda wakatana washika kulya Foenike na kulya Kipro na Antiokia. Walaongwo idedo lilya ko mndu ungi shile nyi ko Wayuda wo wawenyi.
44011020	Ipfo kiidi kyawo kuwepfo womi wawukye kulya Kipro na Kirene nawo wekishika kulya Antiokia wakadeda na Wagriki wakaongwo ndumi ii ya sia ya Mndumii Yesu.
44011021	Nalo owoko lo Mndumii lukakaa nawo lukaenenga mfeṟa fo wandu fung'anyi fomshika iidikya fukahalukya Mndumii.
44011022	Kyasia ili oloho lo mbonyi tsi tsa wandu wo tsikashika madunyi ha siṟi iya ya Yerusalemu wakaduma Barnaba nahende natane ashika kulya Antiokia.
44011023	Nawo kekishika-pfo na iwona wutonga wo Ruwa wuiho kachihio kawatutuma wose ke wakunde ikuwada na Mndumii kui ngoo njiwanzi.
44011024	Cha kipfa awei mndu mcha amwichuṟe Mumuyo Mwele menyi wuidiki. Na mfeṟa fung'anyi fo wandu fukahalutsyo Mndumii.
44011025	Nahong'u kakure-pfo kahenda Tarso ipfula-pfo Paulo.
44011026	Kekimbona kamwende na Antiokia. Wakakaa wasanzi na siṟi ya hando ha maka fumu fose na ilosha wandu sa wafoi. Na kulewa na kulya Antiokia wa kiloshyonyi wakawooka idumbuyo rina nyi Wakristo.
44011027	Mafiri naho iho waikimbi wakasoka wawuka Yerusalemu wakashika Antiokia.
44011028	Kukahoṟoka umu-ho owo, rina lyake ewio nyi Agabo, kaloṟa kui pfinya ya Mumuyo Mwele ke nyi kuicha njaa sa ing'anyi ikiṟe idung'ana wuyana wose. Nayo nyi yeshika mafiri halya ha Kaisari Klaudio.
44011029	Na walya wa kiloshyonyi oryo mndu chando awemwonyishe wakasanga shedaya wanawawama wai kulya Yudaya sha ndarama.
44011030	Wakawuta wado wakadikya wameku walya kui owoko lo Barnaba na Saulo.
44012001	Kyasia matika nalyo mangi iya Herode kasotsa wa ipfo siṟinyi maata-ho mawoko kewatura.
44012002	Kawaha-ho Yakobo na oshu ulya akeri manomae o Yohane.
44012003	Kekiwona ke nyi kyachihia Wayuda kaengeṟa kawada na Petro. Nalyo kushikye kiheri kya mkate ilaimtarang'ashe.
44012004	Kekimaa imbada kamkumba kipfungyonyi, kamdambikya wasikari waana waana wamringe. Kahia nyi echimloṟa sumuhana na wandu kiheri Pasaka ilemida-ho.
44012005	Kyasiang'u Petro kakaa a mringe kulya mba ya wapfungo, kya indi kochilingana iterewo Ruwa nyi siṟi kipfa kyake.
44012006	Kyasia lyandi Herode arie imloṟa sumuhana na wandu lya kio kilya kisongoe Petro kalaa madonyi a mbike kiidi kya wasikari wawi a mpfunge na mshe iwi, na oo moongo kya nja kwiho waringi weringa mba iya ya wapfungo.
44012007	Naho kudi a ichu malaika o Mndumii kawonekya-ho na ipfo kiṟihenyi kukaaka ngela, kapang'alya Petro oo owarihu kambia, “Kekure wulalu kudi!” Na shipfunga shilya shikadawuka ipfo mawokonyi hake.
44012008	Malaika ulya kambia, “Kufunge noṟae shadu.” Kawuta ado. Kawuya imbia, “Urawuye nguo yapfo ya huye nowenjituma numa.”
44012009	Nao kaida na ipfo nja kamwituma numa. Ma nalamanye ke nyi mbonyi ya lohi injiwute nyi malaika, kahamba kulako nyi awona ndodo.
44012010	Wakaida kiringo kilya kya kuwoka na kilya kya kawi. Wakashika oo kichuminyi kya menya kya njia ya kulya mṟinyi. Kikawaṟuhukya ki kyenyi wakaida na mbele akyo. Wakaida njia ya kulya mṟinyi imu wakamaa. Adi peṟeseng'u malaika ulya kamda-ho.
44012011	Nahong'u Petro kekikupang'kyaho necha kahamba, “Wulalu ngamekumanyang'u kya lohi ke Mndumii nyio amduma malaika oke kanjiletsa owokony lo Herode na owedo lo wandu Wayuda lose.”
44012012	Nao kechikusaṟa adi kahenda kulya kundo mba ya Maria ii, ulya akerimae o Yohane ichu ewio rina lyake lya kawi Marko, napfo nyi kusanzye-pfo wandu wafoi wechiterewa.
44012013	Kyasia kekikapakapa mongo fo kichumi kisinga kika ewio rina lyake nyi Roda kacha yadanya.
44012014	Nao kekimanya ṟu li nyi lya Petro nalakiṟuhwo mongo fulya kipfa kya sia iya imbode kaangusha na ipfo mba kaongwo, “Petro nyi ahoṟoki oo mongo wai.”
44012015	Wakambia, “Nyi osukosuko ko!” Nao katimirya ke na wudo kii. Nawo wakahamba, “Ko mmalaika oke.”
44012016	Petro kaengeṟa ikapakapa, nawo wekiṟuhwo wakambona wakawa mkahai.
44012017	Nao kawakemya na owoko watsie. Kawaongoya chando Mndumii ambutie kulya mba ya wapfungo. Kawuya kahamba, “Kehenda kiongoyenyi Yakobo na wanawawama.” Kidima kakure-pfo kahenda kusamya kundo kungi.
44012018	Kukye wasikari walya wakaṟihio mnu chando kilya kya Petro kiwiie.
44012019	Nao Herode kekimpfula nalambone kawesa waringi walya kawawasa ke wawoho. Nao kasoka awuka kulya Yudaya kahenda kulya Kaisaria kakaapfo.
44012020	Nao aweshimbye mnu wandu wa kulya Tiro na Sidon. Nawo wakakusanza wakamdumya wemterewa; wakiidima iwada mbuya na Bilasto ulya ei mheki o mangi wakamterewa ofoṟo, kiwewye nyi wuhinji wohinjya shindo shelya ipfo wumanginyi woke.
44012021	Kikasia mfiri fumu-ho fuwei mteseheṟe Herode kakuṟika maṟao hake ha kiwumangi kadamya loṟeikehu loke lo wuitoṟi kawadedya.
44012022	Nawo wandu wakairya ṟu lyehamba, “Ru li nyi lya Ruwa chi lya mndu o wandupfo.”
44012023	Oweṟe cha ili malaika o Mndumii kamkapa nyi ili indi alalewikya Ruwa kiṟumi. Kalio nyi mashinu ai na moo kapfa.
44012024	Nalyo idedo lya Ruwa likang'ana lyedung'ana.
44012025	Na Barnaba na Saulo wekiidima iinutsya kihachi kilya wakawuka Yerusalemu wakawuya warie-pfo kimu nawo Yohane ulya elaho nyi Marko.
44013001	Na ipfo siṟinyi iya ikeri ipfo Antiokia koipfo waikimbi na walosha, nyiwo Barnaba na Simeon elaho Nyigeri na Lukio Mkirene na Manaen ulya ei odoya o mangi Herode, na Saulo.
44013002	Nawo ili wawei wasanze wewikya Mndumii wuindi na ikuotoya Mumuyo Mwele kahamba, “Njiwiluyenyi Barnaba na Saulo wahende ipfo kiṟundyonyi ndewalahya.”
44013003	Nahong'u wekiidima iterewa na ikuotoya wakawahekya mawoko wakawalekya wahende.
44013004	Kyasiang'u wandu wo wekimaa idumo nyi Mumuyo Mwele wakasokya kulya Seleukia, wawuka-pfo wakahenda kyaṟo kya ipalipalihu wakashika Kipro.
44013005	Wakeri kulya Salaminyi wakaongwo idedo lya Ruwa ipfo masinagogenyi ha Wayuda. Nawo wawerianyi na Yohane mowapfurukanya.
44013006	Wekiidima iidaida kiṟingitiny kya Kipro kyose itane washika Pafo wakawona-pfo mndu mhanga ai mwikimbi o wongo mndu Myuda rina lyake ewio nyi Bar-Yesu.
44013007	Mndu chu awekuwode na mchili o kulya Sergio paulo ai mndu sa awode wuṟango. O kalaha Barnaba na Saulo wache na koke kakunda yadanya idedo lya Ruwa.
44013008	Kya indi mhanga ulya Elima (ikyo nyikyo mdambuye fo rina lyake) karekyana nawo akundi itumhaṟa mchili ulya nade nalaidikye.
44013009	Kya indi Saulo ichu nao elaho nyi Paulo aichuo Mumuyo Mwele kamkuṟuya meso kambia.
44013010	“Iyo mndu uichuo mtambo na wuporu wose ui mana o Satana, mkituwa o wusumhanyinyi wose ulada ilemalema njia tsa Mndumii tsii njihoṟotsa
44013011	kyasia ambuya owoko lo mndumii lochikuwada, na iyo ochikaa-ho ui mpfu meso kulawonyi mnengeṟi kiheri kimu kiwe.” Kudi putikanyi ikamhoya na meema kaṟumbaṟumba na ipfula mndu mombada owoko namloṟe njia.
44013012	Nalyo mchili ulya kekiwona kilya kilewutika kaidikya echiṟihio kya mloshye fo Mndumii.
44013013	Kikasia Paulo na wodoe wakaira kyaṟo kya ngalawenyi wawuka kulya Pafo wakashika kulya Perga orukenyi lo Pamfilia. Yohane kalekana nawo kawuya na Yerusalemu.
44013014	Kya indi wo wakakure kulya Perga wakakyamya sanga wakashika kulya mṟinyi fo Antiokia nyifo fo Pisidia ili mfiri fo Sabato wakaida na sinagogenyi wakadamya.
44013015	Kyasia msomye fo kuwoka fo wuwawaso na fo kawi fo waikimbi yekimaa isomo wanene wa sinagoge wakawadumya kewawia, “Hoi womi mui wanawawama! Kokoya muwode idedo lyewanza mkambo fu kulihambyenyi.”
44013016	Kukakure Paulo kawakemya na owoko kahamba, “Lanye wasoṟo wa Israeli nanyo muiho mui weowuo Ruwa kenjiadanyenyi!
44013017	Ruwa o mkambo fu fo Israeli alesambuṟa waku walya wadu katorisha mkambo fu kiheri wei wasami kulya orukenyi lo Misiri kawawuta-fo na owoko lwapfinya kawaduo njia.
44013018	Kawalisya kulya nuka maka iwe makumi haana.
44013019	Nao keiidima irumatsa mkambo ya wandu mfungade ipfo orukenyi lo Kanaanyi kawainenga teri iya iwe kyoṟa kyawo.
44013020	Kukaida-ho maka mahana haana na makumi hatanu. Kukashika oo kawawikya wachili tane ahoya Samueli awei mwikimbi.
44013021	Napfondo wakaterewa wainengo mangi. Ruwa kawainenga Saulo mana o Kisi mndu o osharinyi lo Benyamin hando ha maka makumi haana.
44013022	Kekiidima imbuta-ho icho kawaamtsya Dawidi nawe mangi yawo kamṟingishya kehamba, ‘Ngawona Dawidi ai mana Isai echiwa mowuta shilya inyi njikundi shose.’
44013023	Ipfo luwenyi lya mndu cho Ruwa aleamtsya-pfo wandu wa Israeli mokiṟa nyio Yesu chando aweteṟye kyasa.
44013024	Nao alawendekure Yohane alesonguo yongoya mkambo fo Israeli fose wupatiso wo idumbuya.
44013025	Nao Yohane kechiinutsya ohendo loke alehamba, ‘Mohia ki kyako ke inyi nyi wu? Inyi chiopfo. Kya indi ambuyenyi nyi kukeri icha umu numa yako msa njilamshikye impfunguo ngowa tsa shadu shake.’ ”
44013026	“Lanye womi, mui wanawawama, mui wana wa oshari lo Abrahamu na iwo wa ipfo kiidi kyanu mui weowuo Ruwa, pfo konu nyo idedo li lya okiio lu lii idike!
44013027	Kyamba iwo walee kulya Yerusalemu na wanene wawo ili walawemwichi o wakamwanduya, na wudo walemwinutsya madedo halya ha waikimbi hekesomo oryo sabato.
44013028	Ma wawuṟa mti fo imbaha wakaterewa Pilato da nambahe.
44013029	Kukashika wekimaa shose chando shiwei shiṟehye kyake wakamsotsa alya kidihu wakamlaṟa ṟungunyi.
44013030	Kya indi Ruwa kamṟutsa wapfunyi.
44013031	Kawa mokuloṟa mfiri ifoi na walya wawedoe nao wawuka Galilaya wakashika Yerusalemu. Nawo nyiwo iwo wakering'u wangochi wake wemṟingishya oshangunyi lo wandu wulalu.
44013032	Natso nyi lui imwongoya ndumi ya sia kya kyaasa kilya waku walya wadu weinengo.
44013033	Ke Ruwa nyio alelushitsya so wana wawo kyaasa ki ili keṟutsa Yesu ko wapfu, chando kii kiṟehye kiimbony kya Dawidi kya kawi kyehamba, ‘Iyo nyi mana oko inyi ngamekufee inu.’
44013034	Kimnengye alemṟutsa nyi kundu nalakoye inyamaṟika ma indi. Nyi wudi aṟingishye kehamba, ‘Njechimuinenga nyo mbuka ya Dawidi ilechilachika.’
44013035	Nkyondo ahambye hando hengi, ‘Ochilekya mwele opfo nakoye inyamaṟikapfo.’
44013036	Kya Dawidi o kekimarisa ipfuṟukanya chila ya Ruwa ipfo rikenyi lyake nyi alehenda ilaa kalaṟo hando hamu na waku wake kakoya iwona inyamaṟika.
44013037	Kya kake ichu aleṟutso nyi Ruwa o nalekoya iwona inyamaṟikapfo.
44013038	Kyasiang'u nyo womi mui wanawawama, iki kimanyike konu ke nyio ichu ainengye muiongoyo mhoṟye fo njonyamaṟo.
44013039	Na kimaduma kya ichu msa amwidikye nyi echitalo ke nyi alawode mti shindo shilya shose mulaweidima italya wusumhanyi na mweke fo wuwawaso wo Mose.
44013040	Kekuṟisenying'u kundu kilya kii kidede nyi waikimbi kilamhoye nyo.
44013041	‘Ambuyenyi nyo wemina! Ṟihionyi muhende ideka. Kipfa ngatana ngata mafiri ha hanu, ngata ii mulechiidikya manya le ma mndu kamdambuya munu!’ ”
44013042	Ili wambuya idamya wandu wakaterewa ke wahendewio mbonyi tsi lingi Sabato iya ingi.
44013043	Kisanzyo kyose kekiinuka sinagongeny Wayuda wafoi na wandu wa kichong'u kya siṟi yawo wahendeli wakaoshana na Paulo na Barnaba. Nawo wakawalosha na iwatutuma ke wakae wakuwode na wutonga wu wo Ruwa.
44013044	Kukashika ili lya Sabato ingi wandu weengi mnu kufui na mṟi foose wakakusanzya ke waadanye idedo lya Ruwa.
44013045	Kya indi Wayuda wekiwona mamwingi fulya wakaichuo wunyenyi wakarekyana na Paulo kya shilya ahambye wechiruma.
44013046	Paulo na Barnaba wakadeda na wukahari wakahamba, “Nyi kiwei ke nyi kiwari idedo lya Ruwa likembooka yongoyo konu. Kya indi kyamba molitangaluya kuleshe na idumbuo modumbuo kyanu muwenyi ke mulasumhanye moo fu fo mlungana, ambuyenyi aiwa luhalukya wa mbaṟi njihenu.
44013047	Kyamba nyi wudo lu wawawase nyi Mndumii, ‘Nyi njikuwikye nowe saa ya wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu nowawiie okiio itane mtsitsinyi fo wanda ii.’ ”
44013048	Wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu wekiicho wado wakachihio wakaichika idedo lya Mndumii wakaidikya nawo nyiwo iwo wawemteseheṟyo moo fu fo mlungana.
44013049	Nahong'u idedo lya Mndumii likadung'ana kulya orukenyi lulya lose.
44013050	Kya indi Wayuda wakaamtsa wuṟingi wakatewa waka wa wasuṟi walya wa kichong'u kya siṟi yawo na wanene wa mṟi wahende pfulukopfuluko wechiterengya Paulo na Barnaba na iwafuna kulya mṟasenyi yawo.
44013051	Nawo wakawakutiakutia kiluli kya ipfo madende hawo wakahenda Ikonio.
44013052	Na walya wa kiloshyonyi weichuo sia na Mumuyo Mwele.
44014001	Na kulya Ikonio na wudo kukahendeka, wakahenda sinagogenyi lya Wayuda wakaongwo-pfo wado, naho mamwingi sa fung'anyi fo ko Wayuda na fo Wagriki wakaidikya.
44014002	Kya indi Wayuda walya walaidikye wo wakaamtsa wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu na isutsa wanawawama kowo.
44014003	Kyasia wakakaa-pfo kiheri kileshe wechionguo mndumii kui wukahari nao Mndumii aweiwakanya iṟingi-shya idedo lilya lya wutonga woke kechiwainenga pfinya yetana ngata na maṟihyo kui mawoko hawo.
44014004	Kya indi mamwingi fo wandu wa kulya mṟinyi fukahawukana kawi, iwa wakaka ora lo Wayuda na iwa ora lo ko wasu.
44014005	Naho kukaamka kilafumbi ipfo ko wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu na Wayuda na wanene wawo ke wahende iwatura na iwakumbya maho.
44014006	Kikasia wekishikyo nyi mbonyi tsi wakadichya mṟinyi ya Likaonyia na Lisitra na Deribe na kundo kulya kuṟasanyi naho.
44014007	Wakakaa-pfo wechionguo ndumi ya sia ya okiio.
44014008	Kyasia na ipfo Lisitra kuweipfo mndu mfafa o madende awei mhuli madende ho wokya awoneka ko mae alelemchumie ma limu.
44014009	Mndu cho kawa moadanya ipfo kundo Paulo echideda. Nao kamwambuya kawona ke ai na mkusirye fo ichiṟo.
44014010	Kadeda na ṟu ling'anyi kambia, “Horoka na madende hapfo sumuhana!” Kohoṟoka faṟa kachumia.
44014011	Mamwingi fulya fo wandu wekiwona kilya Paulo atana wakairya maṟu hawo wehamba kui Kilikaonyia, “Ate Maruwa hamefanana na wandu wai, naho hamelusokya kunu kodu wai.”
44014012	Wakadeya Barnaba rina nyi Zeusi na Paulo wakamlaha nyi Hermesi cha kipfa nyio awei mdedi.
44014013	Nao mkohanyi o Seusi o hekalu lilya liwei alya mbele ya mṟi kaende-ho pung'a nao oṟo tsii njioke tsa shiwaṟo tsechopa kichumi kinene kya mṟi arie iwika shidaso kimu na mamwingi fulya.
44014014	Kya indi wasu walya Barnaba na Paulo wekimanya ikyo wakaranduo nguo tsawo wakarundukya ipfo kiidi kya wandu wakafihiṟa.
44014015	Wechihamba, “Lanye womi, a nyi kindo kiki mkeri iwuta? So luwei wandu wepfa chanyo luimwongoya ndumi ya sia ya okiio kundu muhaluke mulekane na shindo shi sha maai muhalukye Ruwa chu menyi moo ichu awikye ruwehu na wanda ii na ipalipali na shindo shose shikeri-ho.
44014016	Nao nyio marika halya hammaa isehyana nyi alelekya mkambo ya wandu ihendekye njia tsayo imenyi.
44014017	Ma ili kiwei kidi nalekuda alakuṟingishya amonyi kui mecha hake awutye wandupfo kawa momwendie mvuo nginehu na imwinenga shiheri shesambuo kechimwihutsa ngoo tsanu shelya na sia.”
44014018	Kyasia wechihamba wado wakakiṟa ilemo iima mamwingi iya ya wandu kundu walawadasie.
44014019	Kukashika-pfo Wayuda wawuka Antiokia na Ikonio. Wo wakatukura mamwingi iya wakatana wakumbia Paulo maho wakamkuruya kulya mbele ya mṟi wakusaṟie ke nyi amepfa.
44014020	Walya wa kiloshyonyi wekicha wechimṟingichya kakure-ho hakuhendya kulya mṟinyi. Na ili lya ngama kawuka-pfo kahenda na Barnaba wakahenda shika Deribe.
44014021	Kikashika wekimaa yongwo ndumi ya sia ya okiio kulya mṟinyi fulya na iwonapfo wechiidikya sa wafoi wakawuya na kulya Lisitra na ikonyio na Antiokia.
44014022	Wechiwanza mrima ya wa kiloshyonyi na iwatutuma ke wakae necha mwidikyenyi na ke nyi kiluwaṟi ikuidya shiwirenyi shiingi mtano na lushike wumanginyi wo Ruwa.
44014023	Wakawasaya wameku wasongoru kui siṟi kui siṟi wakawadambikya Mndumii chu wawemwidikye wechiterewya-ho na ikuotoya.
44014024	Wakahenda ikyama kulya Pisidia wakashika Pamfilia.
44014025	Wekiidima yonguo idedo kulya Perga wakasoka tane washika Atalia.
44014026	Wawuka-pfo wakahenda kyaṟo kya ipalipali-hu kyehenda Antiokia. Ipfo mpfondo weterewyo wutonga wo Ruwa kya kyando kilya wawememaa ikiinutsya.
44014027	Wekiafukya wakalaha kisanzyo kya siṟi yose wakawaongoya hilya Ruwa awutye ai nawo shose na ke nyi alepfunguya wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu mongo fo mwidikye.
44014028	Wakatsinda-pfo kimu na wa kiloshyonyi kiheri sa kileshe.
44015001	Kukasoka wandu wawuka kulya Yudaya wakacha ilosha wanawawama ke mulamedino odino lu luwawase nyi Mose mochiidima iwonyo okiiopfo.
44015002	Nakyo kikaamtsa Paulo na Barnaba wakaloyana nawo na irekyana nawo kyumu. Lyefurumia wakawawasa ke Paulo na Barnaba wahende ido na kulya Yerusalemu kimu na wengi-ho wa ipfo kiidi kyawo waduo-pfo mbony tsa nganu ii ko wasu na wameku waipfo.
44015003	Kyasia wammaa ipfungyo kichau nyi siṟi wakado wakakyama ipfo orukenyi lo Foenike na Samaria wechiongwo-pfo mbonyi tsa mahalukyonyi ha wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu wakachihiṟa wanawawama mnu.
44015004	Nawo wekiafukya Yerusalemu wakaambyo necha nyi siṟi na wasu na wameku wakawaongoya shilya Ruwa aleshiwuta ai nawo shose.
44015005	Kya indi maata-ho wa ipfo kambenyi lya Wafarisayo walya weidikye wakakure wakahamba, “Na kikaki nyi kiwaṟi iwadina na iwawawasya wawade shilya shii shiwike nyi Mose.”
44015006	Wasu na wameku wakasanza wakusaṟe kidedo ki.
44015007	Koikikaa-ho mawesano hafoi Petro kakure kawawia, “Lanye womi wanawawama, nyo nawo muichi ke na mkonu iya ya kuwoka oo kiidi kyanu Ruwa nyi alewawasya dumbu lyako lyechitarama wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu wahende iicho ndumi ya sia ya okiio na iidikya.
44015008	Nao Ruwa ichu aichi ngoo tsa wandu kawawikya kiṟinghishyo kewainenga Mumuyo Mwele kimu naso.
44015009	Manya alewika-ho mletsano kiidi kyadu so nawopfo kaweheṟemtsa ngoo tsawo kui mwidikye.
44015010	Kyasiang'u le nyi kiili muihesha Ruwa na ipfungya wa kiloshyonyi kidi kya nzingonyi, sa wande yadu ma so luleleidima ikiduo.
44015011	Kya indi lukusirye ke nyi wutonga wo Mndumii Yesu wuwen nyi woluinenga lohenda ikiṟo njia imu nawo.”
44015012	Kyasia mamwingi fose fukatsia wakaadanya Barnaba na Paulo wechiwaongoya oloho lo shichano na maṟihio halya Ruwa alehawuta ko wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu ai nawo.
44015013	Na iwo wekitsia Yakobo kahaluo kahamba, “Lanye womi wanawawama, kenjiadanyenyi.
44015014	Simeon ameluongoya chando Ruwa aleasa isenguda wandu wahenu nakuwonye-ho mkambo fuu mdumbuye rina lyake.
44015015	Na madedo ha waikimbi na haidikyanyi na iho chando kii kiṟehye.
44015016	Isho shikameida njechiwuya-se. Nyio inyi njechiwika-se mba ya Dawidi ihoiye, na masanjiko hayo na njechihasungusia iwuye-se ihoṟoka necha.
44015017	Kundu mtsuhaṟo fo wandu futsuheye wahende iwado macha hepfula Mndumii hamu na mkambo yose ya wandu wai waendye rina lyako lyewakaya. Nyio Mndumii ahambye ado kechikiwuta.
44015018	Nakyo kimanyikye ke kii kido matsi mawokyonyi ha wuyana.”
44015019	“Nkyo kimaduma inyi ngadumbwo njidi; Ma lulawone lochipfulwopfulwo walya walemhalukya Ruwa ipfo mkambonyi ya wandu.
44015020	Kya indi luwaṟehye baruo yehamba, ke wakuletsane na isho sha ngafu shii shidambikye mafanano wawekuletsana na waṟuhui na shindo shi shiotsuo na samu.
44015021	Kyamba kiheri sa kileshe madedo ha Mose hawode waimhamba oryo mṟinyi ya wandu ili ekesomyo-ho ipfo masinagogenyi oryo mkonu fo Sabato.”
44015022	Kikashika oo wasu na wameku wasongoru waleidikyana kimu na siṟi yose ke wasambuṟe wandu ipfo kiidi kyawo na iwaduma wahende Antiokia kimu na Paulo na Barnaba. Na Sila, nyi wandu wasongoru ipfo kiidi kya wanawawama.
44015023	Wakaṟehya baruo wawaendie na mawoko hawo, nayo ihambye idi, “So wasu na wameku lui wanawawaama lo mwiṟikiṟa nyo wanawawaama wadu mui ipfo Antiokia na Siria na Kilikia muwukye mkambonyi ii mhenu.
44015024	Nyi lomeicho ke nyi wandu wawukie kunu kodu wakacha na konu walawewadume nyiso nyi wamemuwinyisha na madedo hawo na ipfulwo mrima yanu.
44015025	Nkyo kimaduma lomwidikyana na ngoo imu ke lusambuṟe wandu na iwaduma konu handu hamu na wakunde wadu Barnaba na Paulo.
44015026	Nawo nyiwo womi walisye moo yawo wukiwa kimaduma kya rina lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
44015027	Kyasiang'u nyi lomduma Yuda na Sila wechicha imbia madedo naaho iho ki madumbu hawo.
44015028	Kyamba luledumbwo na mweke fo Mumuyo Mwele ke lulamudike mhanda shile nyi ishi shiwuṟyo-ho.
44015029	Mukae mochilehana na shindo shii shidasye mfanano na samu na shindo shii shiotsuo na wuṟuhui. Mukakuima isho le nyi mowuta necha. Kekaeny na kipwo.”
44015030	Kikasia wekimaa isamo wakasoka wakashika kulya Antiokia wakasanza siṟi yose wakawainenga baruo iya.
44015031	Wakaisoma wakachihio mnu kipfa iwawihiṟye idi moo.
44015032	Na Yuda na Sila nawo wawenyi wawei waikimbi wakaikimba wanawawama kui madedo hafoi wakawakarisha necha.
44015033	Nawo wekikaa-pfo kiheri kya oweṟe sa luarie wakasamo nyi wanawawama kui ofoṟo wawuye na ko walya wawadumye. [
44015034	Kya indi Sila o kikamchihia ikaa-pfo.]
44015035	Na Paulo na Barnaba wakakaa kulya Antiokia wechionguo ndumi ya sia ya idedo lya Mndumii kimu na wandu wengi sa weengi.
44015036	Kokisia-ho mfiri mangu Paulo kawia Barnaba, “Ndeipfo. Luwuye isenguda wanawawama wulalu oryo mṟi kundo luwaongoye idedo lya Mndumii lumanye nyi waipfo wada.”
44015037	Kyasia Barnaba kakunda iheda arianyi na Yohane ulya echilaho nyi Marko nahende kimu nawo.
44015038	Kya indi Paulo kahamba ke ichu alepaṟakana nawo kulya Pamfilia alatsinda nawo kyandonyi asumuhanyi ihenda nawopfo.
44015039	Kukakaa-ho kiloyano wakatana walekana Barnaba kaduo Marko kaida ngalawenyi kahenda Kipro.
44015040	Na Paulo kasanga Sila kakure kechiwawasyo nyi wanawawama wutonga wo Mndumii.
44015041	Kahenda isenguda Siria na Kilikia kakapa siṟi owanzo.
44016001	Kyasia Paulo kashika Deribe na Lisitra. Na ipfo koipfo o kiloshyonyi umu ewio rina lyake Timoteo ai mana o mka Myuda mwidiki na ndee nyi wei Mgriki.
44016002	Timoteo cho awei mṟingishye mhendeli nyi wanawawama wai kulya Lisitra na Ikonio.
44016003	Paulo kakunda ichu nahende imwimya kambada kamdina kimaduma nyi kya Wayuda walya wekeri mṟinyi iya, kyamba wose weichi ke ndee nyi Mgriki.
44016004	Kikasia wechiida kulya mṟinyi iya wakawawawasya mdumbuye iya ya wasu na wameku wasongoru wa kulya Yerusalemu wairinge necha.
44016005	Nahong'u siṟi tsilya tsikahenda kuwangya mwidikyenyi tsikaweengeṟa ing'ana mtalie fowo oryo mkonu.
44016006	Wakakyamya Furigia na Galatia wakaimo nyi Mumuyo Mwele ke walaongwo idedo ipfo Asia.
44016007	Wekishika yafukya Misia wakahesha ke wahende Bitinia na Mumuyo o Yesu nalawawikye momu.
44016008	Kyasia wakaida Misia wakasokya Troa.
44016009	Nahong'u ili kio Paulo kawonesyo kiwonesyo kya mndu o kulya Makedonyia ahoṟoki-ho kamterewa kahamba, “Keambadyawo kya kunu Makedonyia uluikanyewo so!”
44016010	Kikasia kekimaaa iwona kiwonesyo kilya oweṟe nalo lukakunda ikure luhende Makedonyia lutawukye imanya ke nyi Ruwa alulahye napfo kundu luhende iwaongoya ndumi ya sia ya okiio.
44016011	Nahong'u lukaira kyaṟo kya ngalawenyi luwuka Troa lukashika Samotrake na mteṟa fumu, ili lya ngama lukashika Neapoli.
44016012	Na wuka ipfo lukashika Filipi nyifo mṟi mnene fo kihongo kilya kya Makedonyia fuu mlaṟe nyi Waroma. Lukakaa mṟinyi ifu mkonu maata.
44016013	Koikishika mkonu fo Sabato lukawuka na nja ya kichumi kya mṟi lukahenda wamba ya meda lukusaṟye ke hando ho nyi kuiho hando ha shiterewyo. Lukadamia lukadeda na waka wawesanzi-ho.
44016014	Mka umu ewio rina lyake nyi Lidia ai mka mokumba nguo tsa king'aring'ari ai o kikunyi kya Tiatira aowoye Ruwa kaluadanya. Nao Mndumii kamtambaṟwo ngoo naringe necha madedo halya hechidedo nyi Paulo.
44016015	Kekiidima ipatiso o na wa kany koke kaluterewa kahamba, “Kokoya momenjikooya ke nawo njii mwidiki o Mndumii kekuidyenyi na kunu kanyi koko mukae-pfo.” Kaluitikaitika.
44016016	Kikashika mandi lochihenda handu halya ha shiterewyo kisinga kika kyikalukumbuhana kiwodo nyi mumuyo fo wulasha msa awembonya wenyi wake mbucha sa ing'anyi kui wulashi woke.
44016017	O awekeoshana na Paulo naso numa kefihiṟa mnu kechihamba, “Aiwa wasoṟo wai masinga ha Ruwa chu o huye wai wemuongoya njia ya okiio!”
44016018	Kawa mowuta ado mfiri ifoi. Na Paulo kapfuluko kainduka kawia mumuyo ulya, “Ngakuwawasa kui rina lya Yesu Kristo, wuka ko mndu chu!” Kambuka saa na iya.
44016019	Kikasia wenyi wake wekiwona ke kikusiryo kya mbucha yawo kyamewadekya wakawada Paulo na Sila wakawakuruo wakawashitsa mengenyi ya mṟi oshangunyi lo wanene.
44016020	Wakawadaya wachili wakahamba, “Wandu wa wawa mopfuluopfuluo mṟi fodu, nawo nyi Wayuda.
44016021	Na yonguo wekeonguo mbonyi tsa shido sa shilawaṟi kodu ke lushiambye na ishiwuta lui Waroma.”
44016022	Mamwingi fo wandu nafo fukawashimbya na wachili wakawaatuo nguo tsawo kui pfinya wakawawasa wakapo na shiteecho.
44016023	Nawo wekiidima iwakapa ngapo sa tsifoi wakawashingya mba ya wapfungo wakawawasa mringi o mba ya wapfungo nawaringe na riso lya kyambuṟe.
44016024	Nao kekiwawaso adi kawakumba kulya kiṟihenyi kya kiidi kawapfunga madende ho na matima.
44016025	Kya indi kio aa madumbwo hawi Paulo na Sila waweiterewa Ruwa na imwimbya shiimbo shemṟumisha na wapfungo walya wengi waiho wechiadanya.
44016026	Pereseng'u kukaida kidihingashi sa king'anyi na njomombo tsa mba iya ya wapfungo tsikatana tsawolawola na oweṟe mongo ikaṟuhuka na shipfunga shilya sha wandu wapfunge wose shikadawuka.
44016027	Kyasia mringi ulya o mba ya wapfungo pang'u kapang'ka kawona mongo ya mba ya wapfungo ke nyi iṟuhukye kasomwo oshu ke nakuwahe akusaṟye ke kulako wandu walya wapfunge wose nyi wamedicha.
44016028	Naho Paulo kakoṟoṟoma ilaha na ṟu ling'anyi echihamba, “Manya kulakutanye kiwicho, kyamba nahondo lui lose.”
44016029	Nao kaduma taa kakupunguṟa kulya kiidi kechidedema kui wuowu kakuhutsa wanda na kyamu oo maḏendenyi ha Paulo na Sila.
44016030	Kawaende na nja kahamba, “Hoi wandumii wako, nyi kiki kinjikoe iwuta njikekukiṟyowo?”
44016031	Nawo wakambia, “Keidikya Mndumii Yesu Kristo nalyo mochikukiṟyo na kanyi kopfo.”
44016032	Wakawuya wakamwongoya idedo lya Mndumii wo na wa kanyi koke wose.
44016033	Kawaambya saa na iya ya kio kawasanja kulyando wawewakape kahenda kupatisyo wo na wa kanyi koke wose oweṟe na lulya.
44016034	Kawaende na ipfo mba koke kawaomoya shelya kachihio mnu wo na wa kanyi koke wose cha kipfa lyandi awonyi akuidikye Ruwa.
44016035	Koikitambaṟuka waitoṟi wakaduma warundi wehamba, “Lekia wandu wo wakuhendye.”
44016036	Mringi ulya o mba ya wapfungo kaongoya Paulo madedo ha ke waitoṟi nyi waduma wandu wemfunguo. Kyasia wulalu kuwukyenyi na nja mukuhendye na ofoṟo.
44016037	Na Paulo kawawia, “Nyi walelukapa oshangunyilo wandu wose kulawode ma lomeanduyo, naso lui Waroma, wakawelukumba kipfungonyi, na wulalu wakundi iluwuta-pfo kui kiṟika? Manya! Chi wudopfo, wache wo wawenyi wache iluwutapfo.”
44016038	Waṟundi walya wakahenda wakashitsya waitoṟi walya madedo ha. Nawo wakaowuo waicho ke nyi Waroma.
44016039	Wakacha wakawalembalemba wakawaduo na nja, wakawaterewa wawuke kulya mṟinyi fulya.
44016040	Nawo wakawuka kipfungonyi wakaida na kanyi ko Lidia. Wekiidima iwonana na wanawawama wakawawihiṟya moo wakakuhendyang'u.
44017001	Wekimaa ikuidya ipfo Amfipoli na Apolonyia wakashika Tesalonyikye, napfo kuweipfo sinagoge lya Wayuda.
44017002	Nao Paulo kawuta chando aichiwie kahenda kowo ipfo mba kechideda nawo Sabato tsiṟaṟu kya shilya shii shiṟehye mṟehonyi fulya.
44017003	Kawa mowatambaṟuya na iwadambuya ke nyi kiwewaṟi Kristo nahende iwawiṟo na iṟuka ko wapfu kaweṟingishya kehamba, “Yesu chu njimuongoya mbonyi tsake nyo nyio Kristo.”
44017004	Maata-ho wakaidikya wakasanzya ora lo Paulo na Sila na Wagriki wahendeli sa wafoi na waka wa wanene chi weikenapfo.
44017005	Na Wayuda walya wakalang'aa mnu wakahuṟa wambafu maata weketsinda ipfo tumo wakasanza mamwingi fo wandu wakaamtsa kitohyo kulya mṟinyi wakaringitia mba ya Yason wechiwapfula-ho wahende iwaduo oshangunyi lo wandu wa mṟi.
44017006	Wamda walawakoya-pfo wakakuruo-pfo Yason kimu na wanawawama maata wakawaduo oshangunyi lo waitoṟi wa mṟi wakafihiṟa wakahamba, “Wandu wa wapfuluye wuyana wameshika na kunu.
44017007	Na Yason kawaambya koke. Na iwa wose nyi wewuta shikapanyi na njowawaso tsa Kaisari wehamba ke nyi kwipfo mangi ingi elaho nyi Yesu.”
44017008	Wakapfulutsapfulutsa mamwingi fulya fo wandu na waitoṟi wa mṟi ili waleicho isho.
44017009	Wekimaa yambia fesa ya mriteke Yason na waodoe waleiwika yeritekya wuhendeli wowo wakawalekia.
44017010	Oweṟe cha ili na kio kilya wanawawama wakaduo Paulo na Sila kulya Beroya. Wekishika-pfo wakahenda sinagogeny lya Wayuda.
44017011	Nawo wandu wa nyi wawei na sonu kota walya wa Tesalonyikye, nyi waleambya idedo na wulalutsu wose wakawa wesumasuma ipfo mṟehonyi mfiri yose kundu wawone koka shindo sho nyi wudo shii lohi.
44017012	Nahonu wawo wafoi wakaidikya, na waka wa Wagriki wasuṟi na wasoṟo chi waangupfo.
44017013	Kya indi Wayuda wa kulya Tesalonyikye wekishikio nyi mbonyi ke idedo lya Ruwa liongoyo nyi Paulo kulya Beroya wakahenda-pfo wechipfulutsa wandu na iwadosya nyashi.
44017014	Oweṟe naalo wanawawama walya wakaduo Paulo kyaṟo kyemshitsa ohambeny lo ipalipali, kya indi Sila na Timoteo wo wakatsinda-pfo.
44017015	Nawo waleimya Paulo wakamshitsa Atene. Wekiidima yambya iwawaso lyedaya Sila na Timoteo ke ma walakeleo-pfo walamwosha owinyi wakakuwuya na kowo.
44017016	Paulo aipfo adi kechiwawedya kulya Atene kawona chando mṟi fulya fuichwo njofano, mumuyo foke fukapfuluko mnu.
44017017	Naho kawa modeda na Wayuda na iwo waowoye Ruwa ipfo sinagogenyi, na wudo mfiri yose ipfo tumo oryo sa wamekumbuhanana nao.
44017018	Nahong'u wandu wa wulanyi wo Epikuro maata-ho na wa wulanyi wo Stoa wakasumbuhanana nao. Kuwepfo wehamba, “A mndu chu o Makideda nkyo iki akundi hamba?” Wengi wakahamba, “Nyi ai cha nyi moongwo mbonyi tsa waṟufu wahenu.” Nyi kipfa aweionguo ndumi ya sia ya Yesu na ya maṟukyonyi.
44017019	Kyasia wakammbada wakamduo kitoṟohu kya Aresi hando hededya chila wakahamba, “A ngesa lochiidima kumanyawo mloshye fu mhya nyi fo iki ifu ochekyelosha?
44017020	Kyamba oendye madu hadu kindo kihenu, kyasia lukakundang'u imanya kindo ki nyi kyo iki uiluwia.”
44017021	Nyi ilindi Waatene na wahenu waipfo walawode kyama kya kindo ma kimu shile nyi ilekya mbonyi na yadanya mbonyi tsa kindo kihya.
44017022	Kyasia Paulo kahoṟoka alya kitoṟohu kya Aresi makiidi hawi kahamba, “Lanye womi wa Atene, njiwonyi nyo muwodo mnu nyi macha hewikya maruwa wuindi kya shindo shose.
44017023	Lyandi mbeidaida kunu konu njechiambuya hando hanu hewikaho wuindi ndekoya rasyonyi lii liṟehyeho ke Ili lii lya Ruwa lilaichio. Kyasiang'u ichu nyo mokembikya wuindi ma mulamwichi rina nyio ichu njimwongoya.
44017024	Ruwa chu awikye wuyana wu na shindo shose shikeri-ho o ili ai Mndumii menyi ruwehu na wanda ii nechekeku kaya mahekalunyi haa mawike na mawokopfo.
44017025	Ma echiwa ipfuṟukanyo nyi mawoko ha wandupfo cha ili awewuṟye kindo ma kimu. Cha kipfa nyio ainenga wose moo na yomuo mumuyo na shindo shose pyu.
44017026	Nao nyio awikye ichu umu mopaṟa mkambo ya wandu yose wakahenda ilaa masangeny ha wanda ii hose, kekimaa iwateṟya maheri na mṟasa ya mkae yawo.
44017027	Kundu wahende ipfula Ruwa na kikawa nyi kui iwadawada watane wamkoya. Nao kyake oryo mndu chando lukeri aa nyi akeri ma kuleshe naopfo.
44017028	Kyamba nyio ailuwawa ili lukukerye luwei na moo na ikupaya-paya-ho na ikukaya-ho luweiho. Na chando wateṟi wa shiimbo wa kikonu walewehamba ke, O naso luwei wa mbaṟi yake.
44017029	Kyasiang'u kokoya so lui wa mbaṟi ya Ruwa ma lulakae lokusaṟa ke Ruwa afananyi na sahabu ang'u fesa ang'u iho nyisho shindo shii shisungusie kui wuarya na wuṟango wo wandu.
44017030	Kyasiang'u Ruwa nyi awetsirilye matika halya kuiho wutondotondo. Kya indi komshika iya mandi ha wulalu nao awang'u motutuma wandu kudo kose ke wailachike mrima yawo.
44017031	Nyi ili indi akuteṟye na mkonu foke msa arie icha idumbo nafo mondu fo wuyana wose kya wuhoṟotsu nafudumbuo na msoṟo ulya akumbikye-ho kechiitsya wandu wose mweke fomwidikya ili alemṟutsa wapfunyi.”
44017032	Kyasia wekiicho kilya kya maṟukyenyi ha wapfu walya maata-ho wakakihalwo seko. Wengi-ho wakahamba, “Kyakyo lukundi icha ikuadanya lingi.”
44017033	Kikasia Paulo kakure-ho kasamana nawo.
44017034	Na wandumii maata-ho wo wakawadana nao wakashika iidikya. Ipfo kiidi kyawo kuwepfo meku o menge ya kitoṟo kya Aresi umu-ho rina lyake nyi Dionyiso na mka umu rina lyake nyi Damari na wandu wengi kimu nawo.
44018001	Kyasia kidima Paulo kalekana na kulya Atene kahenda kashika Korinto.
44018002	Kakoya-pfo mndu Myuda ewio rina lyake nyi Akila amfeye kulya Ponto, nao acheye kandi awuka Italia kimu na mka oke Prisikila na kipfa Kaisari Klaudio ewawasa ke Wayuda wose wasame wawuke Roma. Naho kahenda kawaiṟikiṟa.
44018003	Nawo nao ili wupfuru wowo wuwei wumu kakaa kowo wechiṟunda handu hamu. Kyamba wei waarya wesungusia mahema.
44018004	Kyasia kawa molosha ipfo sinagogenyi oryo mkonu fo Sabato kechiidiki-shaidikisha Wayuda na Wagriki.
44018005	Kikasia Sila na Timoteo wekisoka wawuka Makedonyia Paulo kaṟungamisha mwongoye na kamu kechiṟingishya Wayuda ke Yesu nyio Kristo.
44018006	Wekilehana nao na iruma kakutakuta nguo tsake kawawia “Mondu fo samu yanu ihoye mdo yanu ii menyi. Inyi njii mharami nayo. Wokya wulalu ngaindukya mkambo ya wandu ingi.”
44018007	Kawuka-pfo kahenda ikaa kanyi ko mndu ewio rina lyake nyi Tito Yusto aowoye Ruwa, mba yake iweṟasanyi na sinagoge.
44018008	Na Kirisipo mnene o sinagoge lilya kaidikya Mndumii wo na wa kanyi koke wose. Wakorinto weengi wakaaadanya idedo wakaidikya wakapatiso.
44018009	Nao Mndumii kadeda na Paulo kui kiwonesyo kya kio kechimbia, “Ma kulawone kochiowuo, kya indi deda tupu ma ulatsie.
44018010	Kyamba inyi njikeri na iyo. Ma kuipfo echikupaya na ikulisa wukiwopfo. Cha kipfa inyi njiwode wandu wai wako sa weengi kunu mṟinyi ifu.”
44018011	Kakaa-pfo hando ha maka fumu na meri iṟandaṟu kawalosha idedo lya Ruwa.
44018012	Nahong'u kiheri kilya Galio alewada wuchili wo kulya Akaya Wayuda walya walesangana kyekumba Paulo wakamduo mengenyi.
44018013	Wehamba, “Mndu chu nyi awa mokuruo wandu kundu wawikye Ruwa wuindi njia ikapanyi na njowawaso tsadu.”
44018014	Oweṟe Paulo arie itambaṟuo dumbu Galio kawia Wayuda walya, “Lanye Wayuda, kima kindo mokiende kiwei kya wukika ang'u wumbafu inyi njiwechimwadanya sumuhana na chile.
44018015	Kya indi ili kyamba nyi mawesanao ha opfundo na marina na mawiko ha ipfo konu nyo muwenyi, ikyo kiringenyi muwenyi, inyi njilakundi iwa modumbwo mondu fo shindo shido.”
44018016	Kawafuna alya mengenyi.
44018017	Nawo wose wakarundukya Sostene mnene o sinagoge wakamkapa alya mengeny na Galio nalasaṟe ke ikyo nyi kindo kyawuto.
44018018	Paulo kaengeṟa ikaa-pfo mfiri ifoi kidima kasamana na wanawawama kahenda kyaṟo kya ngalawenyi kyahenda Siria. Na Prisikila na Akila wakaduana nao kekimaa yoda mdo foke kulya Kenkirea kyamba nyi awewode mbiana.
44018019	Wakashika Efeso kawada-pfo. O amonyi kahenda sinagogenyi kadeda na Wayuda.
44018020	Wakamterewa ke nakae-pfo kiheri kifoifoi nalakunde.
44018021	Nyi alesamana nawo kehamba, “Ruwa kanjiwonya mwaanya njechiwuya na konu kyaṟo kingi.”
44018022	Kekimaa iwuka Kaisaria kado kaiṟikiṟa siṟi iya kasokya Antiokia.
44018023	Kikashika kekikaa-pfo kiheri kimu kawuka-pfo kaida sangenyi lya Galatia na Furigia mṟi kui mṟi kechikapa wa kiloshyonyi owanzo.
44018024	Kyasia mndu Myuda rina lyake ewio nyi Apolo amfeye Aleksandria kashika kulya Efeso ai mlaanyi molaya shindo shose awei na mbahanyi ipfo mṟehonyi.
44018025	Mndu chu awei mloshe njia ya Mndumii, nao ili aakye adi mumuyonyi foke kahenda ideda na ilosha kui osaṟe mbonyi tsa Yesu. Nao nyi aweichi wupatiso wo Yohane tupu.
44018026	Kawoka ideḏa ipfo sinagogeny ai na wuṟamtsu. Kukatana Akila na Prisikila wamwicho wakamduo kowo wakamwoṟowoyaoṟowoya njia ya Ruwa sungusihu lya wueṟa.
44018027	Nao kekikunda yambada ipalipali nahende Akaya wanawawama wakamdimisha wakamṟehya baruo ko walya wa kiloshyonyi yehamba ke wamwambye. Kekishikapfo kaikanya waidiki kawashitsa necha kui wutonga wu wurianyi nao.
