44018028	Kyamba nyi alewinza Wayuda na kamu na kamu oshangunyi lo wandu wose kechiwaloṟa kui madedo ha mṟeho ke Yesu nyio Kristo.
44019001	Kikashika Apolo akeri kulya Korinto Paulo kekikuidya njorukenyi tsilya tsa huye kashika Efeso kakumbuhanana-pfo na wa kiloshyonyi maata.
44019002	Kawawesa, “Muleambya Mumuyo Mwele lya mandi mulehaluka?” Wakamhalwo, “Ote, ma iicho ke nyi kuipfo Mumuyo Mwele lulemeichopfo.”
44019003	Nao kahamba, “Aka nyi mui wapatise kui wupatiso wuki?” Wakahamba, “Nyi kui wupatiso wo Yohane.”
44019004	Paulo kahamba, “Yohane aweipatsa kui wupatiso wo idumbuya kechiwia wandu waidikye ulya akeri icha numa yake nyio Yesu.”
44019005	Wekiicho isho wakapatisyo rina lya Mndumii Yesu.
44019006	Nalyo ili indi Paulo alewahekya awoko Mumuyo Mwele kawachea wakawoka ideda na njolimi njihya na ihamba shisuku.
44019007	Na mfoye fowo waweshikye wasoṟo ikumi na wawi.
44019008	Kahenda sinagogenyi kadeda-pfo na wukahari echiongoyana na wandu handu ha meri iṟaṟu na iwakuruo waidikye kya shilya sha wumanginyi wo Ruwa.
44019009	Kya indi ili wandu maata walekuumiṟya mrima wechileha iidikya na isutsa njia ii oshangunyi lo kisanzyo kya wandu kalekana nawo kasanza wa kiloshyonyi kyanya kawa moonguo ipfo kisomyonyi kya mndu ewio rina nyi Tirano mkonu yose.
44019010	Kikahendeka kido kulya Asia wakaicho idedo lya Mndumii kui Wayuda na kui Wagriki.
44019011	Nahonu Ruwa kawuta ngata tsing'anyi tsa pfinya kui mawoko ha Paulo tsilaweichyo kacha.
44019012	Kukatana wandu waluo waendyo shidami na nguo tsikuwashye na mbihu foke na ndaṟe tsawo tsikawawuka na waṟufu wawicho wakasama.
44019013	Kuweiho na Wayuda maata wahanga watangitangi wawekeiṟaṟia waṟufu wawicho, nawo wakahesha isendya rina lya Mndumii Yesu walya wewaosose nyi waṟufu wawicho wehamba, “Ngamwitika kui Yesu cho akeri yongoyo nyi Paulo.”
44019014	Na iwo walewuta isho nyi wei wana mfungade wa Sikewa mndu Myuda mkohanyi ang'anyi.
44019015	Mṟufu ulya mbicho kawahaluo, “Yesu njimwichi na Paulo ngammanya, kya indi nyo nyi waki?”
44019016	Na mndu ulya awemosose nyi mṟufu mbicho kawarundukya kawakapa wa wawi kawaapfinya adi wakatana wawuka kulya mba wedicha wai kitaṟe wai wafaṟefaṟe.
44019017	Mbonyi ii ikadung'anya Wayuda wose na Wagriki wei kulya Efeso wakahoyo mnu nyi fowa wose, rina lya Mndumii Yesu likahenda ing'anyisho mnu.
44019018	Na waidiki wafoi wakacha wakatocha njonyamaṟo na ihamba shindo shilya wawekewuta.
44019019	Na wafoi wa walya waweikupayapaya na shindo sha uhanga luwicho wakasanya shitabu shilya shawo wakashikoṟa na modo oshangunyi lo wandu wose. Wakasanza mtalie fo wuhuru makumi hatanu.
44019020	Nyi wudo idedo likang'ana na ikuwangya-ho kui pfinya ya Mndumii.
44019021	Isho shekimarisika Paulo kakuteṟya mrimenyi foke isenguda Makedonyia na Akaya nashike ihenda Yerusalemu kahamba, “Ngamekaa ipfo nyi kinjiwaṟi ishika iwona na Roma.”
44019022	Kyasia kaduma wawi wa walya wechimpfuṟukanya ke wasonguo ihenda Makedonyia nawo nyi woko Timoteo na Erasto, o amonyi kakaa-se kulya Asia kyoweṟe.
44019023	Nahong'u matika nalyo kukaamka kipfupfulu sa kinene kimaduma kya mbonyi tsa njia ii.
44019024	Kyamba kuwepfo mndu rina lyake ewio nyi Demetrio nyi mpfuru mtsanyi o fesa echitsana njofano tsa hekalu lya Artemisi kawa mowonya waarya walya mbucha sa ifoi.
44019025	Nao nyio kawasanya handu hamu wose sanza-pfo na wengi wawode kirundyo kimu nao kahamba, “Lanye-wo womi muichi ke wumasi wodu nyi luwutie ipfo kiṟundyonyi iki.
44019026	Nanyo muwonying'u na iicho muicho ke chi kunu Efeso tupu kya indi na Asia yose pyu Paulo cho ameidikisha wandu weengi na iwahaluo mhio yawo kechihamba ke maruwa chiho haa matsane na mawokopfo.
44019027	Ma chi kiṟundyo kyadu kirieng'u ihenda imeneka tupupfo, kya indi na hekalu li lya ruwa mka ang'anyi adi lyo liyenyi likering'u ihenda lilakisaṟo ke nyi kindopfo, ma mng'ano foke fumenyi, ifu fuiwikyo wuindi nyi wa Asia yose na wa wuyana wu nyi fokiṟa ihenda ifurunjika.”
44019028	Kyasia wekiicho wado wakadosa nyashi ya nduika wakafihiṟa wakahamba, “Artemisi o Efeso nawo ang'anyi!”
44019029	Kyasia mṟi fulya fukadung'ana kipfulupfulu fose wakakambia wakawingia na hando halya hesanzya-ho mkambo wechikamada napfo na Gayo na Aristariko wai wandu wa Makedonyia wecheye-pfo kimu na Paulo.
44019030	Nao Paulo kechihamba na-hende na ipfo kiidi kya msanzye fulya, wa kiloshyonyi walamlekie.
44019031	Na wanene wa wuchili wo Asia maata-ho wei mbuya sa njicha tsake nawo wakamdikya wuikimbi wechimtutuma ke nalakuloṟe ipfo kisanzyonyi.
44019032	Naho wengi wawefuha wadi na wengi nyi wudi, kyamba kisanzyo ki kilawewode mochilia na wo wafoi-ho walamanye ma tewe yekusanzya-ho.
44019033	Kyasia ipfo mamwinginyi wakawada Aleksandria Wayuda walembika mdonyi na Aleksandria kawakemia na owoko arie ikanya kisanzyo kyo Wayuda.
44019034	Kya indi wekimmanya ke nyi ai Myuda wakasambahada wose na ṟu ling'anyi limu cha hando ha saa tsiwi wechifihiṟa na ihamba, “Artemisi o Efeso nawo ang'anyi.”
44019035	Nahong'u mṟehi o mṟinyi kekimaa iwaoloṟa kahenda ideda nawo kehamba, “Lanye wasoṟo wa Efeso, nyi mndu mki alaichi ke mṟi fu fo Efeso nyifo mringi o hekalu lya Artemisi menyi mng'ano fui na mringi moringa mfano fulya fuolokye ruwehu?
44019036	Kyasiang'u kya mbang'u shindo sho shileiwa ikano nyi kimuwaṟi mukutsie, mulawone mochiwuta kindo kya wudimidimi.
44019037	Kyamba momende wandu wa walaiwie shindo sha hekalu ma iruma ruwa lyanu ika.
44019038	Kyasiang'u kokoya Demetrio na waarya wengi wawode kyeanduya mndu, menge nteṟye na tsiipfo na wachili na waipfo wakumbane-ho.
44019039	Kya indi kokoya muwode kyeidya ikyo nyi kyechisunguzio nyi kisanzyo kii-kilahe necha.
44019040	Kyamba nyi lokiṟa yendyo mondu so fo itahachya ofoṟo lo sanga kitewe nyi shindo shi sha inu. Kulaipfo ma kimaduma luwechiidima ikuwuta-ho na mweke fokyo ipfo mondunyi fo kisanzyo ki.”
44019041	Kekiidima ihamba ado kafunja kisanzyo kilya.
44020001	Kitohyo kilya kekiida Paulo kalaha wa kiloshyonyi kawasanza kyewakapya owanzo kasamana nawo kawuka-ho kehenda Makedonyia.
44020002	Na kekimaa iida shihongo shilya na iwawihiṟya moo kechihamba mbonyi kafoi kashika Ugriki.
44020003	Kekimarisa-pfo meri iṟaṟu Wayuda wakamwida kiṟoṟowa ilindi awerie ihenda Siria na njia ya ipalipali naho kawuya na njia yelenga kya Makedonyia.
44020004	Wandu waleduana nao shika Asia nyi Sopateri, mana o Puro mndu Mberoya, na Aristariko na Sekundo wai Watesalonyikye, na Gayo awukye Deribe na Timoteo na Tikiko na Tirofimo wai wa Asia.
44020005	Iwa wawemsongwo wakaluweda Troa.
44020006	Natso lukaira kyaṟo kya ipalipali, mkonu iya ya Pasaka ilemsia, lukawuka Filipi lukawakoya Troa kyaṟo kya konu itanu lukakaa-pfo mkonu mfungade.
44020007	Kikashika mfiri fo kuwoka fo mfungade ili luwei wasanze kyefunja mkate Paulo kawawia mbonyi akundi iira kyaṟo nahende ili lya ngama kaitika madedo hake itane koshika kio madumbwo hawi.
44020008	Napfo kuwepfo taa sa tsifoi kulya kai kundo luwesanzi.
44020009	Nahong'u manake umu elaho nyi Eutiko adamye itiṟishenyi kahombya mnu kipfa Paulo elunga mnu ideda kaoloka awuka kai-hu lya kaṟaṟu kahenda iiro-ho ampfa.
44020010	Paulo kasoka kamhoya kamchunguṟya kahamba, “Kutsienyi mulatohye kyamba moo foke nawo fui nao.”
44020011	Kyasia kawuya ido na kai kafunja mkate kalya, kaengeṟa ideda nawo shifoi itane koshika kilawo, nalyo kakure ihenda.
44020012	Nawo wakahenda yende manake ulya ai na moo wakakaa wai wawihiṟye moo.
44020013	So lukasonguo iida na ngalawenyi lukahenda lukashika Aso lukundi yambya Paulo hando ho, kipfa nao nyi wudo awewawasye o amonyi kakunda ihenda kyaṟo kya madende.
44020014	Kekilukoya kulya Aso lukamwambya lukashika Mitilene.
44020015	Lukawukapfo lukaida ngalawenyi ili lya ngama lukashika hando haambatsanyi na Kio. Ili lingi lukaafukia Samo na ili lya ngama lukashika Mileto.
44020016	Nyi ili indi aweteṟye keida Efeso ai ngalawenyi nalashike ikeleo kulya Asia, kyamba aweidimadima akundi ishika Yerusalemu Pentekoste kokoya kyaidimika.
44020017	Paulo ai Mileto kaduma mndu nahende Efeso kalaha-pfo wameku wa siṟi.
44020018	Wekicha yafukya koke kawawia, “Nawo muichi wokya mkonu fulya ndewoka ipfuṟukanya Asia njiwei msanze nanyo kiheri kyo kyose.
44020019	Chando njiweisingya Mndumii kui ikunyiṟa lose na itonyitsya mchenyeṟe na shihesho shilya shilenjihoya kitewe nyi okuchu lo Wayuda walya.
44020020	Nyi mwichi ke njilemṟika nyo idedo ma limu lii kiiṟa kyanupfo. Kya indi njiweimwongoya na imulosha ma njiwei patehu ma njiwewa ipfo mba.
44020021	Njechiṟingishya Wayuda na Wagriki kya mdumbuye wakucheye nafo Ruwa na kya mwidikye wakuihetse na Mndumii odu Yesu.
44020022	Kyasia ambuyenyi wulalu ngawada njia ihenda Yerusalemu njii mpfunge nyi Mumuyo ndamanye ma kindo kyekaa kintowokye-pfo.
44020023	Shile nyi Mumuyo Mwele awa mombia mṟinyi kui mṟi kehamba ke nyi shiwoho shikeri injiweda-pfo na shiwira.
44020024	Kya indi njiiringa moo foko fuwembiia mlodopfo. Kilya njiiringa nyi kingi, nyi kundu njekaa njikumarisye ohendo loko lo kipfuṟukanyo kilya njii mdambikye nyi Mndumii Yesu kyeṟingishya ndumi njicha ya wutonga wo Ruwa.”
44020025	“Na inyi njimonyi wulalu ngamanya ke nyo mose njilemwongoya wumangi njechiida ipfo na ipfo nyi mochikiwonana-se na kyamu kyakopfo.
44020026	Nkyo kimaduma ngamṟingishya nyo mose mkonu fu fo inu, ke inyi njiwode mti fo samu ya mndu ma wu ma wupfo; njii mharami.
44020027	Kyamba njilekushowa nde ndamwongoya kya chila ya Ruwa yosepfo.
44020028	Kekuṟisenying'u nyo muwenyi, mbelisa na ipoo lyose ilyo Mumuyo Mwele ambikye kiidi kyalyo wakaṟa kundu mochilisa wuarya siṟi ii ya Ruwa alekuwonya kui samu ya Mana ake amonyi.
44020029	Inyi na njiichi ke ngammaa ihenda mashite ha ngeṟenyi malang'a hechicha na konu halechiwado nyi sonu kya ipoo lipfo.
44020030	Ma ipfo kiidi kyanu muweny kochiamka-pfo weḏeda kya mkika wechikuruya wa kiloshyonyi ora lo kowo.
44020031	Nkyo kimaduma kelaenying'u dembo na itamwo mbekutamuya chando njileikimba oryo mndu chandu mukeri ose njechimutonyitsya mchenyeṟe ngamaa maka iṟaṟu kio na mfiri njilalekane-ho.”
44020032	“Kyasiang'u wulalu le ngamudambikyang'u Ruwa mukae wawanze nyi idedo lyo lya wutonga woke. Nyio Ruwa aidima imupfunga muwe mba na imwenenga kyoṟa kimu ipfo kundo wailishe wake wose wale̱.
44020033	Na inyi njilepfula-ho ma fesa ma sahabu ma mṟae ya mndupfo.
44020034	Nyo mbeichi muwenyi ke mawoko ho hako nyiho halenjitambahanya shindo shako shinshikye na sha wodoya wako.
44020035	Na ishi shose njiwei mupfungya nasho mtaato kundu nanyo mukuwinyishe ipfuṟukanya wafafa mochikumbwo kilya Mndumii Yesu ahambye ke, ‘Nanga iinenga kota yambya.’ ”
44020036	Kekiidima ihamba ado kapfira ndi katerewa nawo wose hando hamu.
44020037	Wakafuha mnu wose wakahoya Paulo ipfo nzingony wakamhekya momu.
44020038	Na kyeinenga wakahoyo mnu nyi fowa nyi kidedo kilya awawia ke nyi wechikaa wawonane-se nao kyamu kyakepfo. Wakahenda imwimia wakamshitsa ngalawenyi.
44021001	Kikashika loikimaa ilekana nawo na iira kyaṟo kyadu kya ngalawenyi lukashika Kosi na mteṟa fumu na ili lya ngama lukashika Rodo na wukapfo lukashika Patara.
44021002	Lukawona ngalawa yechiambada ishike Foenike lukadoya-pfo lukaira kyaṟo.
44021003	Na loikiwona Kipro lukaida kya ora lo kumoso, lukahenda lukashika Siria lukasokya Tiro. Kyamba mpfondo ngalawa iya yadu iwesotsya mhanda yayo.
44021004	Lokiwona wa kiloshyonyi lukakaa-pfo mkonu mfungade, nawo wakawia Paulo kui mweke fo Mumuyo Mwele ke nalado na Yerusalemu.
44021005	Loikimaa iinutsya mafiri halya lukakure lukahenda. Na wandu wose handu hamu na waka na wana wawo wakaluimya lukatana loshika mbele ya mṟi lukapfiria ndi alya mbai ya ipalipali lochiterewa.
44021006	Lomemaa isamana lukadoya ngalawenyi, nawo wakawuya na kowo.
44021007	Kyasia loikimarisa kyaṟo kyadu wuka Tiro lukashika Pitolemai, lukaiṟikiṟa wana wawama lukakaa kowo mkonu fumu.
44021008	Kukye ngamenyi lukahenda lukawuka-pfo lukashika Kaisaria, lukahenda ko Filipo moongwo ndumi ii ya sia awei umu o walya mfungade lukakaa koke.
44021009	Mndu chu awewoḏe wana wake wawaka waana wechihamba shisuku.
44021010	Kyasia lokikaa-pfo mfiri sa ifoi mwikimbi kacha ewio rina lyake nyi Agabo kasoka awuka Yudaya.
44021011	Kaluchea so kawada ngometa ya Paulo kakupfunga nayo amonyi madende ho na mawoko ho kahamba, “Mumuyo Mwele ahamba adi, mndu menyi ngometa ii Wayuda nyi wudong'u wechimpfunga ipfo Yerusalemu na imdambika mawokonyi ha wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu.”
44021012	Luicho ishi so na wandu wa hando halya lukaterewa Paulo nalado nahende Yerusalemu.
44021013	Paulo kahaluo, “Muiwika muda, ifuha na injifunya ngoo? Kyamba inyi njikuteseheṟye kya ipfungo na njiwekuṟeheṟye ma ihenda iwoho kyewikya rina lya Mndumii Yesu wuindi.”
44021014	Nahong'u amleha kilya lombia lukakutsia lukahamba, “Kilya Mndumii amdumbuya kyake naakyo kiwutike.”
44021015	Mafiri halya hekiida lukaira shindo shadu lukado luhende Yerusalemu.
44021016	Wa kiloshyonyi wa kulya Kaisaria maata-ho wakaduana naso ihenda napfo, wakaluduo ko mndu ewio rina lyake nyi Mnason luleṟye ndichi ipfo kanyi koke, ei mndu o Kipro mwidiki o kuwoka.
44021017	Loikishika Yerusalemu wanawawama wakaluambya na sia.
44021018	Kukashika ili lya ngama Paulo kaida na ko Yakobo kimu naso na wameku wasongoru wose mpfondo wawei.
44021019	Kekimaa iwaiṟikiṟa kawaongoya shilya shose kimu kimu isho Ruwa awetanye ko wandu wa mbaṟi njihenu kui kipfuṟukanyo kyake.
44021020	Waicho wado wakaṟumisha Ruwa wakambia, “Monowama odu na uwonyi Wayuda wo waidikye chando washikye shiku nawo wose wawodo nyi nyashi yekapanya wuwawaso.
44021021	Nawo walewio kyapfo ke nyi uilosha Wayuda wose iwo wai ipfo kiidi kya wa mbaṟi nyihenu wuṟingi woṟingya Mose kochiwawia waladine wana wawo manya walahendelye shido shi.
44021022	Nyi luwike luda ngesa nyi ili wechiicho wose ke omcha.
44021023	Kyasiang'u keidikyawo iki luikuwia, Kunu kodu kwipfo wandu waana waa wapfunge nyi kyasa wawikye Ruwa.
44021024	Duo wandu wo nokuilishe kimu nawo, nowainenge fesa waidime iwuta njui tsawo. Mpfondo wandu wose wechiwuta-ho imanya ke mbonyi tsilya walewio tsapfo tsose, ke chi kindopfo, kya indi iyo kumonyi okechumia kyomboho ochiringa necha wuwawaso wu.
44021025	Kya waidiki walya wawukye mkambonyi ya wahenu lulememaa idumbwo na iṟehya baruo ke wakae wechikuṟisa kya shindo shi shidasye mfanano na kya samu na kindo kiotswo na kya wuṟuhui.”
44021026	Nalyo ili lya ngama Paulo kakusanza na wasoṟo walya kechikuilisha kimu nawo. Kilemba kido kahenda hekalunyi kehamba-ho imarisya lilya lya mkonu iya ya kiilishyo, kushike iwiko-ho kidaso kimaduma kya oryo umu owo.
44021027	Kyasia mfiri iya mfungade yekishika kufui na iinutsyo Wayuda wakambona walya wacheye kulya Asia wakambona kulya hekalunyi wakahaya wandu wose wakambada wakafihiṟa.
44021028	“Lanye wasoṟo wa Israeli, kenjonyi muche wikya ngaya! A ichu mndu aanga molosha oryo mndu ose kundo kose kya isutsa mkambo fu na wuwawaso wu na kundo ku kwele. Na kinene ya isho nyio aitsye Wagriki na hekalunyi kafanyitsa ado kundo ku kwele.”
44021029	Nyi ilindi wawembona Tirofimo Mwefeso ulya ai kimu nao kulya mṟinyi, wakakumbwo kulako Paulo nyi amemwitsa na hekalunyi.
44021030	Mṟi fose fukawa kipfulupfulu wandu wakakambya ikusanza handu hamu wakawada Paulo wakamkuruo na ipfo nja wambuta hekalunyi. Oweṟe lo mongo ikashingo.
44021031	Waiho wadi warie imbaha mbonyi tsikashikya mchili mnene o siṟi yose ya wasikari ke mṟi fose fo Yerusalemu fomba kipfulupfulu rambatanyi.
44021032	Oweṟe naalo kaira wasikari na wachili wawo kasoka ihenda iwaosha echikambya. Nawo wekiwona mchili chu mnene na wasikari wakada walakikape Paulo.
44021033	Mchili mnene katikiria afui kambada kawawasa ke napfungo na mshe iwi. Kawesa mbeo wu na kindo atanye mbekyo kiki.
44021034	Na ipfo mamwinginyi wakafihiṟa wehamba wadi na wengi wakahamba wadi. Kekiwona alaidima imanya lohi ke nyi mbonyi tsa iki kipfa kya kifahyo kilya kawawasa nahende idao kulya otiriwenyi lo wasikari.
44021035	Kekishika shiteṟenyi nado na huye wasikari wakamwira womwira kipfa kya wuapfinya wo mamwingi fulya.
44021036	Cha kipfa kamba sa inene lya wandu walemwiwata wefihiṟa, “Wuta-ho mndu chu!”
44021037	Nao Paulo kechiitso na kulya otiṟiwenyi kawia mchili chu mnene, “Njikuwodye momu njikuwie idedo?” Nao kahamba, “A uichi Kigriki?
44021038	Akawo iyo chi Mmisiri ulya aleamtsa wuṟingi na wandu walya shiku shiina mkonu ii, walya welaho wawahi kawaduo kulya nuka?”
44021039	Paulo kahamba, “Inyi nyi mndu Myuda njiwukye Tarso mṟi fo Kilikia, njii menyi kidembo kya ipfo mṟinyi fulai mfari. Ngakuterewa umbikie momu njikudedye na wandu wa.”
44021040	Kyasia kekimbikya momu Paulo kahoṟoka alya shiterenyi kakemya wandu walya na owoko. Komtsia sau kadeda nawo kui kishomo kya Kiebri kehamba.
44022001	“Lanye womi mui wanawawama wako na wawande wako, kenjiadanyenyi, njihalwowo kyako aa oshangunyi lonu wulalu.”
44022002	Wekiicho ke adeda nawo kui kishomo kya Kiebri wakaengeṟa itsia. Nao kahamba.
44022003	“Inyi nyi mndu o Kiyuda, njilefeo Tarso mṟi fo Kilikia, indi itoṟisho ngatoṟishyo kunu mṟinyi ifu njiwedamye madendenyi ha Gamalieli ngalosho wuwawaso wo waku sungusihu na ikapanya Ruwa mbaṟi ii mui nayo nyo inu tichi.
44022004	Ili njiwei moterengya wandu wa njia ii njihya itane ngawashitsa opfunyi ngawapfunga na iwawika kipfungonyi kui womi na kui waka.
44022005	Chando mkohanyi ang'anyi aidima iṟingishya hamu na menge ya wameku wasongoru yose. Nao nyiwo walennenga na baruo ya ko wanawawama ngahenda nayo Damasiko ke njiende-pfo walya wekeri-pfo njiwaende na Yerusalemu waa wapfunge wache ihoṟwo.”
44022006	“Kikashika njechihenda njishike itikiria Damasiko kiheri kya kingoto peṟeseng'u ngeela ing'anyi iwuka ruwehu ikanjidung'anyitsya sa riti.
44022007	Ngaho wanda ngaicho ṟu lyenjiwia, ‘Saulo-wu, Saulo-wu, nyi kiili owa monjiterengya?’
44022008	Ngahaluo, ‘Iyo nyi iyo wu hoi Mndumii?’ Kanjiwia, ‘Inyi nyio Yesu o Nasareti ichu okemterengya iyo.’
44022009	Na walya warianyi na inyi walewona ngeela iya kya indi ṟu lya ulya aweideda na inyi waleliichopfo.
44022010	Ngahamba, ‘Hoi Mndumii, nyi kiki kinjiwaṟi iwuta?’ Mndumii kanjiwia, ‘Kure nohende Damasiko, mpfondo ochiwio kya shilya shose u mteseheṟye ke noshiwute.’
44022011	Na inyi ili njilepfa meso kitewe nyi sa ya ngeela iya ngateteṟo njiwodo owoko nyi walya warianyi na inyi ngashika Damasiko.”
44022012	Nahong'u kuwepfo mndu ewio rina lyake nyi Ananyia mndu mohendelya necha wuwawaso awei mbikye kiṟingishyo kicha nyi Wayuda wose wekeri kulya.
44022013	O kanjichea kahoṟoka afui na inyi kanjiwia, “Manowama, Saulo, ambwo!” Oweṟe na lulya ngampaluya meso hako.
44022014	Nao kahamba, “Ruwa o waku wadu nyi akusangye nomanye chila yake na iwona mhoṟotsu ulya na iicho ṟu liwukye dumbunyi lyake.
44022015	Kipfa nyi ochiwa mongochi oke ko wandu wose moṟingishya isho omeshiwona na ishiicho shose.
44022016	Kyasia wulalu nyi kyo iki uwedya? Kure hoṟoka nopatiso nosambe njonyamaṟo tsapfo ochilaha rina lyo lyake.”
44022017	Kikashika njekimaa iwuya na Yerusalemu njechiterewa ipfo hekalunyi ngakoya njii mkaonyi fo Mumuyo.
44022018	Ngambona kenjiwia, “Faṟa kure nowuke kunu Yerusalemu owinyi, cha kipfa wechikuidikya kiṟingishyo kyapfo kyenjiringishya inyifo.”
44022019	Na inyi ngahamba, “Hoi Mndumii, nyi waichi wawenyi ke nyio inyi njiwekewa mopfunga walya wakuidikye na iwakapa ipfo masinagogenyi hawo.
44022020	Na ipfo kundo samu ya mongochi ulya opfo o Stefano yechipusuo na inyi njiweho moadanya mondu na idumbwo kyake na iringa nguo tsa walya wembaha.”
44022021	Nao kanjiwia, “Kuhendye kyamba inyi njechikuduma kuleshe ko wandu wa mbaṟi njiehenu.”
44022022	Wakamwadanya mṟasa idedo lilya wakairya maṟu hawo wehamba, “Wuta mndu chu orukenyi, kyamba nawaṟi nakae na moopfo.”
44022023	Wakafihiṟa wado wechikumba nguo tsawo na yolya-olya kiluli huye.
44022024	Mchili ulya mnene kawawasa naendo na otiṟiwenyi kechihamba nahende iweso kechikapo kundu kitewe kilya kyewatewa wamfihiṟya wado kimanyike necha.
44022025	Wekiidima impfunga na shiwoho Paulo kawia mchili ahoṟoki afui nao, “Alae nawo kisumhanyi ikapa mndu Mroma nao alameanduyo kuwoka?”
44022026	Mchili ulya naicho ado kahenda iwia mchili ulya ang'anyi kambia, “Nyi kiki urie iwuta? Kyamba mndu chu nyi Mroma.”
44022027	Kukacha mchili chu ang'anyi kambia, “Kenjiwia nyi ui Mroma?” Kahamba, “Ee.”
44022028	Mchili chu ang'anyi kahaluo, “Inyi nji wonye kidembo ki kya Wuroma kui ilekya fesa tsifoi.” Paulo kahamba, “Inyi njikiwode wokya ifeo lyako.”
44022029	Ikyo kikatewa walya wawekuteseheṟye kembesa na finya wakakure-ho wakamda oweṟe nalo. Na mchili ulya ang'anyi kahoyo nyi wuowu kekimanya nyi Mroma, na ili indi amempfunga.
44022030	Ili lya ngama akundi imanya ṟingishi nyi kimaduma ki akumbo nyi Wayuda kampfunguo kawawasa wakohanyi wanene na wa menge yawo wose wakusanze kasotsa Paulo kowo kemhoṟokya oshangunyi lowo.
44023001	Paulo kaambuya chila iya kahamba, “Lanye womi mui wanawawama! Shika mkonu fo inu nyi ngamhendelya Ruwa wuhendeli wohendelya mkambo foke ngo tsa mrima foko tsihoṟoki necha kulawode ipuo.”
44023002	Mkohanyi chu ang'anyi Ananyia kawawasa walya wahoṟoki afui nao wamkape dumbu lyo.
44023003	Naho Paulo kambia, “Ruwa echikukapa iyo ui omombo luushie ila! Iyo udamye yandwo kyako kiituwanyi na njowawaso, na iyo kowawasa njikapo kiṟunduma kya njowawaso?”
44023004	Walya wahoṟoki afui wakahamba, “Alae nyio mkohanyi ang'anyi o Ruwa uimdedya kudi!”
44023005	Paulo kahamba, “Ngamanya ke o nyi mkohanyi ang'anyipfo, wanawawama. Kyamba nyi kii kiṟehye, Ma kuladedye mnene o mkambo fopfo shiwicho.”
44023006	Naho Paulo kekimanya ke kyenga kimu kya wa chila ii nyi Wafarisayo na kyenga kimu nyi Wasadukayo kairya ṟu lyake chilenyi iya kahamba, “Hoi womi mui wanawawama, inyi nyi Mfarisayo njii mana o Mfarisayo! Njikeri yanduyo kimaduma nyi ili njikusirye na maṟukyonyi ha wapfu.”
44023007	Kekimaa ideda ado kukakaa-ho mpaṟakano sa fung'anyi fo Wafarisayo na Wasadukayo, mamwingi fulya fukadumbukana kawi.
44023008	Nyi ili indi Wasadukayo wechihamba kwipfo maṟukyonyi ma malaika ma mumuyopfo. Na Wafarisayo wo wechihamba ee shii-pfo shi shiwi.
44023009	Kukakaa-ho kifihiṟo sa kinene. Walanyi wa ora lo Wafarisayo wakahoṟoka wakadeda mnu wehamba, “Luwonyi-ho kiwicho kya mndu chu manyalepfo. Kulako nyi mumuyo ang'u nyi malaika adedye nao.”
44023010	Kiloyano sa king'anyi kyekiamka-ho mchili ulya ang'anyi kaowuo kulako nyi wechirandwo Paulo, kawawasa wasikari wasoke wamletse mawoko hawo wamdose na kulya otiṟiwenyi.
44023011	Kio kilya Mndumii kamchea kahoṟoka afui nao kembia, “Kuwuyo nyi moo. Kyamba chando uleṟingishya mbonyi tsako kunu Yerusalemu na wudo kikuwaṟi nohende itsiṟingishya kuḏo kulya Roma.”
44023012	Koikikya ngamenyi kuwepfo Wayuda wakalya mma wakakupfunga na nyamu wehamba, walalye kindo ma inyo mṟinga itane wamaa iwaha Paulo.
44023013	Na iwo waleliiana wado nyamu waweshikye wandu makumi haana na kota.
44023014	Nawo wakahenda ko wakohanyi wang'anyi na wameku waosongoru wakahamba, “Nyi lukupfungye na nyamu ke lulanonze kindo na kutane lomaa iwaha Paulo.
44023015	Kyasiang'u wulalu nyo kimu na wameku wa chila muitikeitike mchili cho ang'anyi namsotse na iya konu cha ili mkundi imanya mbonyi tsake necha lya wuera. Natso luiho lukuṟeheṟye imbaha alamemushikya nyo.”
44023016	Muho o Paulo kaicho mbonyi tsa kyama kyawo kaida na kulya otiṟiwenyi kaongoya Paulo mbonyi tsilya.
44023017	Paulo kalaha-ho mchili umu kambia, “Duo manake ichu ko mchili ang'anyi, nyi awode kindo akundi imbia.”
44023018	Kyasia kambuta kamduo ko mchili ang'anyi kambia, “Paulo ulya mpfunge anjilaha akundi ke njikuendye manake chu, nyi awode kindo akundi ikuwia wai.”
44023019	Mchili ulya ang'anyi kambada owoko kahenda nao kihadi kambia kyaada,
44023020	“Nyi kindo kida ikyo ukundi injiwia?” Kambia “Nyi Wayuda wameidikyana kekuterewa nosotse Paulo na wanda ngama nomende mengenyi yawo cha ili nyi wakundi imanya mbonyi tsake kya ṟingishihu lya wueṟa.
44023021	Kyasia na iyo ma ulaidikye. Kyamba wandu waida makumi haana wamwalye walie mma ke walechilya manya inyo kindo itane wammaa imbaha, nawo wulalu waiho wakuṟeheṟye wechiwedya kyasa kopfo.”
44023022	Kikasia mchili ulya ang'anyi kalekya manake ulya nakuhendye kembawasa, “Ke ma ulakiwie mndu ma kawa wu ke omenjiwia ishi.”
44023023	Kalaha wachili wawi kawawia, “Sungusienyi wasikari mahana hawi wehenda kulya Kaisaria na wasikari wa frasi-hu makumi mfungade na wa mapfumu mahana hawi kiheri kya saa ya kaṟaṟu ya kio.
44023024	Na mchungu maata yalo yedosyaho Paulo wamduo wamshitse kipuo ko Felisi mchili mwitoṟi o oruka.”
44023025	Kamṟehya na baruo aile.
44023026	“Inyi Klaudio Lisia ngakudikya iyo Felisi ui mwitoṟio o sanga mamtsu kiiṟikiṟo kyako kya sia.
44023027	Mndu chu nyi alewado nyi Wayuda kashika kufui nawoho nyiwo ngahenda-pfo na siṟi ya wasikari ngamletsa-ho njekimanya mbonyi ke o nyi Mroma.
44023028	Na inyi njikunda imanya kimaduma nyi kiki wakamkumba ngamsotsa ngamduo mengenyi yawo.
44023029	Ngawona ke kindo wamkumbye nyi kipfa kya mawesano ha wuwawaso wowo. Manya kuwode ma kindo ma kimu aa mkumbe nakyo kemhutsya iwoho ang'u ma ipfungopfo.
44023030	Na inyi njekiikimboke nyi arie yokyo mtambo nyi Wayuda nalyo ngamdika kopfo owinyi. Ngawawasa na walya wemkumba ke wache ideda mbonyi tsake sumuhana na iyo.”
44023031	Kikasia wasikari walya wakaduo Paulo chando walewawaso wakamshitsa kulya Antipatri na kio.
44023032	Kukye ngamenyi wakadea wa frasi-hu wahende kimu nao, nawo wakawuya na otiṟiwenyi lowo.
44023033	Na walya wekishika kulya Kaisaria wakainengya mchili ulya mwitoṟi baruo iya wakamdambikya na Paulo.
44023034	Nao kekiidima iisoma kambesa kundo awukye nyi wuchilinyi wuki. Kawio nyi wo Kilikia.
44023035	Nahong'u kahamba, “Njechiadanya mondu fopfo iliindi na walya wekukumba wechicha.” Kyasia kawawasa ke naringyo kulya mba ya chila ya mangi Herode.
44024001	Koikiida-ho mkonu itanu Ananyia mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kasoka arianyi na mata-ho wa wameku wasongoru wakasotsana nao kimu na mdedi umu rina lyake ewio nyi Tertulo, wakadeda na mchili chu mwitoṟi kya Paulo.
44024002	Nahong'u o kekilaho naho Tertulo kawoka imkumba kahamba.
44024003	“Lukuwonye wuhoya sa wufoi ipfo shi yapfo le, hoi Felisi odu ung'anyi kudi. Na kui riso lyapfo lya kyambuṟe shindo sha kunu mkambonyi ifu shikaengeṟa ihenda ichia. Kyasia isho shose loshiambya luikuana oryo shiheri na hando hose.
44024004	Kya indi njilaengeṟe ikurohya, Ngakuterewa ukuluadanyewo madedo hadu sa maangu kui wuhoo wopfo.
44024005	Kyamba lombona mndu chu m mwambutsi sa mbicho awa moamtsa mapaṟatsano kiidi kya Wayuda wose iwo wadung'anye wuyana wu wose, nao nyio msongoru o siṟi ya Wanasareti iya ikuwikye kyanya.
44024006	Alemhesha na ifanyitsa hekalu ngafu, nyihondo lukambada, [lukakunda imwanduya kui wuwawaso wadu.
44024007	Kya indi mchili Lisia kashika-ho kalumsoka na pfinya ing'anyi ipfo mawokonyi hadu
44024008	kawawasa walya wemkumba wache na kopfo.] Iyo kumonyi ochiidima imbesa nomanye kya shindo shilya lumkumba nasho so.”
44024009	Wayuda nawo wakakusanza nao wehamba ke na wudo shikeri.
44024010	Na Paulo ili mchili chu mwitoṟi amkemya ke nadede kahaluo, “Ili ngamekumanya ke iyo nyi omekaa ochichilia mkambo fu hando ha maka sa ifoi nkyondo ngakudedya-ho kyako njimonyi na ngoo njikesi.
44024011	Nyi kyangu kyapfo kyetichya ke kulameida-ho mkonu ngoseṟa ya ikumi na iwi wokya mandi njiledo ihenda Yerusalemu njiwike-pfo wuindi.
44024012	Nawo walanjiwone njechideda na mndu ipfo hekalunyi ang'u ma njechiamtsa kitohyo ipfo wandunyi, manya ipfo masinangogenyi manya hando hengi ha ipfo mṟinyi.
44024013	Ma wechiidima iwanza shindo sho wacha nkumba nasho wulalupfo.
44024014	Kya indi ngahamba na pata aa oshangunyi lopfo ke njikeri iwikya Ruwa chu o waku wadu wauindi njechichumia njia ii wekeilaha ya siṟi ikuwikye kyanya kui idikya ishi shose shiidikyanyi na wuwawaso na isho shii shiṟehye nyi waikimbi.
44024015	Ili njiwode mkusirye njikusirye nafo Ruwa ke kochikaa-pfo maṟukyonyi ha wapfu wai wa wuhoṟotsu na walai wa wuhoṟotsu, ma koka nyiwo nawo wakeri nafo.
44024016	Nakyo nyikyo kyannenga njikuitike inyi njimonyi njikae na ngo tsa mrimenyi tsii njihoṟotsu sumuhana na Ruwa na wandu kya oryo shindo shose.”
44024017	“Komeida-ho maka ifoi njilewuya na mkambonyi fo wandu wako njiwaendye njodambiko na shidaso.
44024018	Nasho nyisho walenjikoya ipfo hekalunyi njishirie njii mwilishe njimonyi manya njilamsanzye-pfo na wandu mamwingi ma yamtsa-ho kifahyo.
44024019	Kya indi walya walenjiwonapfo nyi Wayuda wengi wawukye Asia. Nyi kiwawari wo wakae iya sumhana na iyo wanjikumbe koka wawoḏe ideda ma lida ma lida lyenjikumba inyi.
44024020	Ang'u wandu wa wawenyi wakuhambye nyi deko liki waliwonye koko lilya ndehoṟoki ipfo mengenyi iya.
44024021	Shile nyi kipfa kya dedo limu lilya mandi ndefihiṟa njihoṟoki makiidi hawi hawo njehamba, ‘Nyi kipfa kya maṟukyonyi ha wapfu nkyondo njianduyo oshangunyi lonu njidi inu.’ ”
44024022	Kyasia Felisi kawatiṟimishya mdumbuye nyi kipfa aweichi necha kya njia ii kahamba, “Lisia mchili ulya o wasikari ili echisoka na kunu nawo njechidumbwo kya madedo hanu.”
44024023	Nahong'u kawawasa mchili ulya mtutu ke naringe Paulo nakae akuachie nalaime na wandu wake ma umu-ho mocha imtarama ma mocha imsahya.
44024024	Kyasia komeida-ho mfiri sa maangu kukacha-ho Felisi warianyi na mka ulya oke Drusila o ipfo mbaṟiny ya Wayuda. Kalaha-ho Paulo kamwadanya kededa kya idikya Kristo.
44024025	Kyasia ili ashika yongwo mbonyi tsa wuhoṟotsu na tsa wukeha na tsa kiheo kya mondu fochikaa fuche naho Felisi kawuko m madima kahamba, “Kekuhendyeng'u wulalu, ngawona mkonu njechikudumya-se.”
44024026	Nao nyi awekusihye ke nyi echinengo fesa nyi Paulo kundu nampfunguo. Nkyo kitewe kawa momlaha kafoi kakapa nao sumu.
44024027	Koikiida-ho maka iwi Felisi kasehya-ho Porkio Festo wuchili woke. Na Felisi kakunda ikulopa na Wayuda kada Paulo ai mpfunge.
44025001	Kikasia Festo kekikuidya na ipfo wuchilinyi woke kukaida-ho mkonu iṟaṟu kado na kulya Yerusalemu awuka kulya Kaisaria.
44025002	Nawo wakohanyi wang'anyi na wasongoru wa Wayuda wakamchea kyeira mondu fo Paulo wakamwanjarya na imterewa.
44025003	Ke nawawutye kicha kyewachihiṟa nawawase naendo na Yerusalemu. Nawo nyi wadedye kyama kyehenda kumbahya kulya njiehu.
44025004	Festo kahaluo ke Paulo echiringyo kulya Kaisaria, nao amonyi nyi akuṟeheṟye ihenda-pfo mkonu fo afui.
44025005	Kahamba, “Kyasia wandumii wanu wasoke kimu na inyi wahende imkumba kokoya kuwode-pfo kimwendye owingo.”
44025006	Kekimaa-pfo ikaa kowo mfiri maata ilaidye nyanya ang'u ikumi kasoka na kulya Kaisaria. Ili lya ngama kadamya ipfo loṟike-hu loanduya kawawasa Paulo naendo.
44025007	Wayuda walya walesoka wawuka Yerusalemu wekicha wakamṟingichia wakaende-ho ngumba tsifoi sa njilemeri tsemkumba sa walaleidima itsiwanza.
44025008	Paulo kakudedya kyake adi, ke, “Inyi njinyamaṟye kindo kya wuwawaso wo Wayuda ma kya hekalu ma kya Kaisaripfo.”
44025009	Kyasia Festo kakunda ikulopa ko Wayuda kawesa Paulo, “Ngesa nawo kunda ihenda kudoya na kulya Yerusalemu noche idumbuyo-pfo mondu fo mbonyi tso nyi inyi?”
44025010	Paulo kahamba, “Njihoṟoki iya mengenyi ii njidose nyi Kaisari, nyiho hando hanjiwaṟi njidumbuyo-ho mondu fo. Njiwode kindo njidekyo Wayudanyi na chando uwekuichye mnu necha.
44025011	Kokoya njidekyo ang'u koka njitanye kindo kyenjiwonya mti funjiendye njihende iwoho njilehye ipfapfo. Kya indi kokoya idedo li wankumba nalyo lilai lya lohi kwipfo msa echiidima injidambika mawokonyi hawo kui kikundapfo. Mondu foko fuhende kuwuuyo Kaisari.”
44025012	Kikasia Festo kekiidima ideda na wandu wa chila kahaluo, “Omekunda mondu fopfo fuhende kuwuuyo Kaisari, kyasia nochikuhendyang'u ko Kaisari.”
44025013	Koikiida-ho mkonu maata mangi Agripa na Berenyike arianyi nao wakacha na kulya Kaisaria wache iiṟikiṟa Festo.
44025014	Nawo wamkaa-pfo mkonu maata Festo kaongoya mangi mbonyi tsa Paulo kehamba, “Iya kukeri-ho mndu amde kipfungonyi nyi Felisi.
44025015	Na inyi kiheri mbekeri Yerusalemu wakohanyi wanene na wameku wasongoru wa Wayuda wakanjichea kededa kipfa kyake wakaterewa nawonyo wudeheli.
44025016	Na inyi ngawahaluo ke chi mbuka ya Waroma idambika mndu ma kawa wu ke nawoho mndu cho alamewonana na walya wemkumba kyamu kui kyamupfo na iinengo mwaanya fokudedya-ho kyake kehaluo ngumba tsakepfo.
44025017	Kyasiang'u wekisanzya iya na inyi ndatirime, kya indi ili lya ngama ngadamya loṟike-hu loanduya ngawawasa mndu cho naendo-ho.
44025018	Na walya wemkumba wekimṟingichia walamkumbe na kindo kya wukika kyende mondu lohi chando mbekusaṟie.
44025019	Kya indi wawewode mawesano hawo kya mwidikye fowo wawenyi na kya mbonyi tsa mndu elaho Yesu msa alemmaa ipfa msa Paulo ekewa mohamba ke nyi ai na moo.
44025020	Na inyi ngapfiio nyi mdo kya ipfula ṟingishi ya mbonyi ii ngambesa kokoya akundi ihenda Yerusalemu nahende yanduyo-pfo kya shindo shi.
44025021	Kya indi ili Paulo akuhodye ipfo kundo ahambye ke nadeo naanduyo nyi ichu ang'nyi ngawawasa ke naringo ntane ngamdika ko Kaisari.”
44025022	Agripa kawia Festo, “Inyi na mbekundi njiadanye mndu chu.” Kahamba, “Nawo ochimwadanya ngama.”
44025023	Kyasia ili lya ngama Agripa wakacha na Berenyike waṟee maṟao ha wuitoṟi wakaida na mba ya maanduyano kimu na wachili na wandu wasongoru wa mṟi. Festo kawawasa Paulo naendo.
44025024	Festo kahamba, “Mangi Agripa nanyo mose mukeri iya kimu naso, muwonyi mndu chu, kyake msa wuingi wo Wayuda wose walenjiisima ipfo Yerusalemu na kunu na wudo-se wechifihiṟa ke nawaṟi nakae-se na moopfo.
44025025	Na inyi njekiwona ke alatanye kindo kyembonya iwoho nao amonyi kekikunda yanduyo nyi ichu ang'anyi ngakudumbuya kemduo koke.
44025026	Na inyi ndawode idedo lya ṟingishi-hu lyeṟehya Mndumii. Nkyo kimaduma ngamende na iya sumhana na oshangunyi lonu, mnu nyi lopfo iyo mangi Agripa, kundu kamemaa iweso mbonyi tsake njiwute-ho iwona idedo lyeṟehya.
44025027	Kyamba ngawona ke nyi kindo kilechiwa idika mpfungo, kulaiho kyeloṟa ngumba tsilya akumbo natso.”
44026001	Nahong'u Agripa kawia Paulo. “Na uwode momu fo ikudedya kyapfo.” Naho Paulo kairya owoko loke kakudedya-ho adi.
44026002	“Hoi mangi Agripa, nanga inyi, ili njiwonyo mwaanya fokudedya inu sumhana na iyo kya shindo shilya njii mkumbe nasho nyi Wayuda.
44026003	Cha kipfa iyo uichi mnu necha mbuka tsa Wayuda na mawesano hawo hose chando wawode. Nkyondo ngakuterewa ke ukunde injiadanya na itirisia.
44026004	Kyasia Wayuda wose nyi waichi ohendo lo moo foko wokya wukoho woko chando fuhendekye ipfo mkambonyi foko na ipfo Yerusalemu.
44026005	Nawo wammanya wokya kacha ke nawo mbekeri Mfarisayo o kamba lilya lyesimiria na kamu wuindi wu wodu kiwe wawechikunda iṟingishya ikyo.
44026006	Ma wulalu da njihoṟoki iya njianduyo kipfa kya mkusirye fokusirya kyasa kilya waku wadu wawewawikye nyi Ruwa.
44026007	Nakyo nyikyo kinengye mkambo fu fodu fo njoshaṟi tsi ikumi na tsiwi tsechipfuṟukanya Ruwa na itambahana mfiri na kio ili wakusirye ke kishike yawutysyo. Na inyi ng'u njikumbo nyi Wayuda kipfa kya mkusirye fo wai, hoi mangi.
44026008	A nki ili lyasaṟo n nyo ke nyi idedo lilechiidikya ke Ruwa echiṟutsa wapfu?”
44026009	“Nao inyi na njiwekudumbuye koko ke nyi kiwaṟi iwikya mwongoye fo rina lya Yesu o Nasareti tunja na mweke fo shindo shifoi.
44026010	Na itana njiweshitana kulya Yerusalemu ngamhenda ipfunga wafoi wa waele walya na iwakumba shipfungyonyi njekiwawaso nyi wakohanyi wang'anyi, nawo ili wawei yanduyo kyehenda iwoho njiwekeende naho kiho kilya (kyeidikya ke wawoho).
44026011	Na ipfo masinagogenyi njiweiwakapa kafoi na iwaitika wasese Yesu njechiaaka mnu iwaterengya ngatana ngashika mṟinyi ya wuhenunyi.”
44026012	“Nakyo kikannenga njechihenda Damasiko njiwode baruo ya wakohanyi wang'anyi irie pfinya yawo.
44026013	Oo mangi, ili mfiri kingoto tichi njikeri ipfo njienyi ngawona ngela iwuka ruwehu iidye sa ya mnengeṟi ikanjidung'anyitsia sa riti inyi na walya wawerianyi na inyi.
44026014	Lukaho wanda lose na inyi ngaicho ṟu lyenjilaha kui mdedye fo Kiebri lyehamba, ‘Saulo wu, Saulo wu! Nyi ki ili uinjiterengya? Nyi kyumu kyafo ikapa ndeecho na masehe.’
44026015	Na inyi ngahamba, ‘A iyo nyi iyo wu, hoi Mndumii?’ Mndumii kanjiwia, ‘Nyi inyi Yesu, ichu iyo uinjiterengya.
44026016	Kya indi kure nohoṟoke, cha kipfa nyi ngakuwonekya kimaduma nyi le, njikutane nowe mṟundi oko moṟingishya shilya ushiwonye na shilya njechikuloṟa.
44026017	Nyi ngakusambuṟa iyo ipfo mkambonyi fu na mkambonyi iya ingi ngakuduma kowo.
44026018	Nowaambuṟe meso hawo, waindukye sa, wawuke wuitoṟinyi wo Satan wahalukye Ruwa, waambye mhoṟye fo manyamaṟo na iwada kyoṟa, kii kya walya wai wailishe kui mwidikye fonjiidikya inyi.’ ”
44026019	“Agripa, ikyo kikanenga njilakuhode iidikya kiwonesyo ki kya ruwehu.
44026020	Indi ndehenda yongoya wandu ke wadumbuye na ihalukya Ruwa wawe wewuta mawuto hasumhanye mdumbye fowo; ndewoka iwaongoya njido ipfo Damasiko na ipfo Yerusalemu itane sanga lya Yudaya lyose na mkambo ya wandu ingi.
44026021	Kifa kya ikyo Wayuda wakanjiwada ipfo hekalunyi wakahesha injiwaha.
44026022	Kyasia njekikuwonya ngaya iwukye ko Ruwa nkyo kinjiwodye-ho ngashika inu tichi njechiṟingishya watutu na wanene, manya njilahambe idedo lingi shile na halya waikimbi na Mose wawehambye ke hechikaa hainukye.
44026023	Ke Kristo kiheri amaa iwawiṟo na iwiko msongoru kui iṟutso ko wapfu nawe moongwo mbonyi tsa sa ko mkambo fu na ko iya ya wahenu.”
44026024	Akeri-ho kechikudedya adi Festo kadeda na ṟu ling'anyi kahamba, “Paulo nyi uwodo nyi wusuko! Isomasoma lyapfo lya kafoi n lyo lilepfulwo mdo fopfo.”
44026025	Kya indi Paulo kahamba, “Oo Festo oko ung'anyi kudi! Njiwodo nyi wusukopfo, indi njideda madedo ha lohi haa mapfamye faa.
44026026	Cha kipfa nao mangi na aichi mbonyi tsa shindo shi, na inyi ngaidima ikudedya nao njii mkesi kyamba njichi na kamu ke kulaipfo idedo ma limu lya iho alaiichi, cha kipfa kindo ki kilawutikye kundo ko mbai.
44026027	Iyo mangi Agripa, uidikye waikimbi? Inyi na njichi ke nyi uwaidikye.”
44026028	Agripa kawia Paulo, “Omshika kufui unjiisime njiwe mkristo.”
44026029	Paulo kamhaluo, “Njiterewa Ruwa ke ma kishike kufui ma kidoe msaṟi naenenge iwo wose wanjiadanya inu chi iyo tupupfo wawe cha inyi wuta-pfo shipfungo shi.”
44026030	Nahong'u mangi na mchili ulya na Berenyike na walya wawedamye kimu nawo wakakure.
44026031	Wakateshuka, na kya aleshe kitutu wechiwiana wakahamba, “Mndu cho nawode kindo atanye kembonya iwoho manya ipfungopfo.”
44026032	Agripa kawia Festo, “Mndu cho awechipfunguo nokoye alawemekulahye ko Kaisari.”
44027001	Kikasia kekidumbwo ke luhenda kyaṟo kya Italia wakawika Paulo na wapfungo wengi-se maata mawokonyi ha mchili o siṟi ya Kaisari elaho rina lyake nyi Yulio.
44027002	Lukadoya ngalawenyi ya Adaramiti iwekeri-ho yehenda ishike ipfo mamṟinyi ha chombenyi lya Asia, lukaira mta; Aristariko Mmakedonyia o kulya Tesalonyikye arianyi naso.
44027003	Ili lya ngama lukashika Sidon. Yulio kawutya Paulo kicha mnu kambikya momu fo ihenda ko mbuya tsake yembeṟyo-pfo nyiwo.
44027004	Wuka-pfo lukaira mta lukaida shi ya Kipro kundu lulenge otanu kipfa njotanu tsiwei tsa ngumbuhana.
44027005	Lukaida ipalipali lya ora lo Kilikia na pamfilia lukashika Mira mṟi fo Likia.
44027006	Na ipfo mchili ulya kakoya-pfo ngalawa ya Aleksandria ikuṟehyeṟye ihenda ishike Italia, kaludosya-pfo.
44027007	Lukahenda kyaṟo kya ombohomboho komiida-ho mkonu sa ifoi lukashika ora lo Nido otanu luweiluima. Lukaida seri ya Kreta lushikie kufui na Salmone.
44027008	Lukaida kui ngataṟa lochiwambaṟa kya chombenyi lukashika kundo kochihambo Maowonyi mecha. Kufui naho kukeri mṟi fochilaho Lasaya.
44027009	Komeida-ho maheri sa hafoi na kyaṟo kyammba kiwode ngataṟa wulalu, kipfa mfiri yekuotoya iwemeida Paulo kawatutuma.
44027010	Kawawia, “Lanye womi, njiwonyi ke kyaṟo ki nyi kyechiwa kya mawukiwa na shihutsa shifoi, chi kya nzohoṟa na ngalawa tupu pfo indi na kya moo yadu daa.”
44027011	Kya indi mchili ulya kaidikya kya ulya moduo ngalwa iya na menyi oyo kota kilya kya Paulo, alehamba.
44027012	Na ili indi ṟuko lilya lilawesumhanyi necha wandu wakae-ho kiheri kya mbeo wafoi wakahamba ke kichie iwuka kundo ku kundu kyaṟo kishike Foenike kokoya kyechiidimika, na ikaa wakae-pfo shiheri sha mbeo; napfo nyi ṟukonyi lya Kreta liringa njotanu tsa ora lo kyukanyi.
44027013	Na otanu lo ora lo kingoto loikiwoka ida kitutu wakusaṟye ke wamewona mwaanya fo chila yawo wakaira kyaṟo wakaduo ngalawa kufui na Kreta ipfo kya chombenyi.
44027014	Koiida-ho kidemvu sa kitutu otanu lo pfinya lo mbaṟi ya owira lukaiamkya lolaho mweeka mlandari.
44027015	Ngalawa ikadao cha kipfa ilaleidima ikapana na otanu lukailekya lukadao.
44027016	Lukadao mnu lukashika kufui na kiṟingiti kyelaho Kauda lukakumba mnu pfinya lukaidima iira kingalawa kilya kya mbai luwekiṟa ihenda ifoyo.
44027017	Wekiidima iira wakaṟunda na shitarama shilya wechipfunga ngalawa na ngoi weitsa ipfo shi yayo. Nawo ili waleowuo ke walashike ishitso mṟasa ipalipali lya Sirite wakaala shihia sheduo ngalawa wakawekudayo wadi.
44027018	Na kyamba luweikapo mnu nyi owira lulya ili lya ngama wakawoka ikumba nzohoṟa ipalipalinyi.
44027019	Ili lya Kaṟaṟu lukakumba shihia sha ngalawa kui mawoko hadu luwenyi.
44027020	Mkonu ifoi ilemsia mnengeṟi na nyenyeri tsila woneka lukawuta-ho macha hekia.
44027021	Nawo ili kulemsia-pfo mfiri ifoi walalya kindo Paulo kahoṟoka kiidi kyawo kahamba, “Lanye wasoṟo, nyi kiwechiwa nanga nokoe mulenjiidikya mukada mulaire mta kulya Kreta na iwona ngatara tsi na kihutsa ki.
44027022	Na wulalu njimwinenga chila, wuyonyi nyi moo, cha kipfa kulaipfo moo ma fumu kiidi kyanu sa fochideka shile na galawa ii nahong'u.
44027023	Cha kipfa kio kya inu malaika o Ruwa chu inyi njii mndu oke nao nyio njekemṟundya alenjichea.
44027024	Nao kanjiwia, ‘Ma kulaowuo Paulo! Nyi kikuwaṟi ihenda hoṟoka oshangunyi lo Kaisari. Kingi-se ambuya Ruwa amemaa ikuenenga wandu wa wai kyaṟonyi kimu na iyo wose.’
44027025	Kyasia ng'u le womi, sambukenyi. Cha kipfa njiidikye Ruwa ke nawo kyechiwa kido chando ndewio.
44027026	Kya indi na lukaki na lupwitsyo kiṟingiti-hu kimu.”
44027027	Koikishika kio kya ikumi na kaana lochidao ipfo na ipfo ipalipali hu lya Adria ili kio madumbwo hawi waphuṟukanyi wa ngalawa wakakusaṟa ke wameshika itikiria kundo kuhadutsu.
44027028	Wakaolotsa kiheṟa wakawona shiheṟo makumi hawi sha wuleshe wo mṟingenyi, wakahendahenda kitutu wakaolotsa-se kiheṟa wakakoya shiheṟo ikumi na shitanu.
44027029	Wakawuta-ho yowuo washike ipwitsyo hando hawode ngarahamba wakaolotsa shitirimisha ngalawa shiina wakaterewa kukye.
44027030	Na wapfuṟu-kanyi walya wa ngalawa wo wawerie ihenda idicha na ida-ho ngalawa wakasotsya kingalawa kilya kya mbai ipalipalinyi cha ili wakundi yolotsa shitirimisha ngalawa sha kusongwo.
44027031	Paulo kawia mchili na wasikari, “Iwa walamekaa kunu ngalawenyi mochiidima ikiapfo.”
44027032	Nalyo wasikari wakadumbwo shiwoho sha kingalawa kilya wakakilekia kiho.
44027033	Napfo koikishika itambaṟuka Paulo kawawasa wose walye shelya kehamba, “Inu nyi mkonu fo ikumi na kaana mochiweda na ikuotoya mulalya kindo ma kitutu.
44027034	Kyasiang'u ngambawasa ke mulye shelya, kyamba nkyo kyechimwendie wuṟamtsu, cha kipfa kulaipfo ma ochui lo ipfo mdonyi yanu lochideka.”
44027035	Kekimaa ideda adi kaira mkate kaana Ruwa oshangunyi lowo wose kafufunja kawoka ilya.
44027036	Wakasambuka wose wakalya shelya shawo wawenyi.
44027037	Natso chando luwekeri ngalawenyi luweshitsye wandu mahana hawi na makumi mfungade na waṟandaṟu.
44027038	Wekiihuda wakaanguṟa nzohoṟa ya ngalawenyi wakaṟukuta ngano ipalipalinyi.
44027039	Kukye walamanye oruka lulya shile nyi walewona ndumba imu-ho iwode kyambado wakadeda chila ke waitse naho ngalawa kokoya kyechiwa.
44027040	Wakadumbwo ngoi tsa shitirimisha ngalawa wakashida ipalipalinyi, wakaleheṟwo shiwoho sha shiindutsa ngalawa wakadosa ikungo lilya itutu kundu liwade otanu wakahenda na kya alya kyambadonyi.
44027041	Kya indi wakakoya hando kihongo kya sanga kimandye mṟingenyi wakananza-ho ngalawa. Kulya kusongwo kukawado kukawanga tapu kulakupaye, kya indi kulya kya numa kukafunjika kui pfinya tsa masinanu.
44027042	Chila ya wasikari ikawa ke nyi wapfungo wawoho mndu nalashike ikukumba mṟingenyi na idicha.
44027043	Kya indi mchili ulya ili ekundi iletsa Paulo kawaima walawute chando wakuteseheṟye kawawasa walya waichi iigelea mṟinge-hu wakuolotse ipalipalinyi kuwoka washike teri-hu.
44027044	Na walya watsuhae wakukiṟe wechikuwada iwa maṟaṟo-hu na iwa shindo-hu shingi sha ngalawenyi. Na wudo wandu wose wakawuta-ho yafukya oruke-hu na kipuo.
44028001	Loikiidima yashuka lukamanya ke kiṟingiti kilya nyi kyechilaho Malita.
44028002	Na wandu walya walee-pfo wakaluwutya shicha shiilewetsye. Nyi waleatsa modo wakaludamiṟa lose kipfa kya mvuo iwekapye na kipfa kya mbeo.
44028003	Paulo amsana ngu kikonde katsiwika kulya rikonyi kukawuka-pfo njoka yedicha modo fulya ikamwoṟowya owoko loke.
44028004	Wandu walya wekiwona indo lilya likumasye ipfo kuwokonyi wakawiana, “Mndu chu naashukye iwa mndu mbahipfo. Ma chando ameashuka kulya ipalipalinyi motaa kirache amda nakae na moopfo.”
44028005	Nao kaikutiakutia kulya modonyi nalatano kindo nyiyo.
44028006	Wakamtuluya meso wakusaṟie ke nyi aishimba ang'u naho wanda pu aa mfu. Wamemtuluya meso mnu na iwona ke lyamtana kindo ma ntapfo wakailacha mahio hawo wakahamba ke ichu nyi Ruwa.
44028007	Kufui na hando halya kuwekeri-ho kihamba kya mnene o kiṟingiti kilya ewio rina lyake nyi Publio. Mndu chu kaluambya na kyamu kiila kalutana wahenu wake hando ha mkonu iṟaṟu.
44028008	Kikashika ndee o Publio kakoyo aluo ndaṟe ya modo na yaraka samu. Paulo kaida na ipfo koke katerewa kamhekya mawoko kamchiṟa.
44028009	Isho shekitanyika wengi wawewodo nyi ndaṟe tsawo kulya kiṟingitinyi wakacha wakachiṟo.
44028010	Nawo wakaluwikya wuindi na iluinenga shindo sha mwaano. Natso loikikure ke luire-se mta wakalusama na shindo shilya luweshihuṟi shose.
44028011	Komeida-ho meri iṟaṟu lukahenda kyaṟo kya ngalawenyi ya Aleksandria iwentirimishye kiheri kya mbeo kulya kiringitinyi irie ofano lo wambasa walya.
44028012	Lukashika Sirakusa lukakaa-ho mkonu iṟaṟu.
44028013	Luwuka ipfo lukahaluka lukashika Regiumu. Komeida-ho mkonu fumu otanu lo ora lo kingoto lukawiwita lukaenenga loafukya Puteoli komsia mkonu iwi tupu.
44028014	Ipfo lukakoya-pfo wanawa-wama lukaterewo nyiwo ke lukae-pfo mkonu mfungade. Na wudo lukashika Roma.
44028015	Na wanawawama wa ipfo wekiicho mbonyi tsadu wakacha iluambya wakashika tumo ya Apio na kundo kulaho Mkahawa Iṟaṟu. Paulo kekiwawona kaidapfuma Ruwa kasambuka.
44028016	Loikikuidya na ipfo Roma mchili ulya kadambikya wapfungo ipfo mawokonyi ha mchili o waringi wa Kaisari, kya indi Paulo o alewikyo momu fokukaya amonyi kimu na askari momringa.
44028017	Kikasia komeida-ho mkonu iṟaṟu kalaha wanene wa Wayuda wache kisanzyonyi. Wekimaa icha kawawia, “Lanye mui womi na wanawawama, na kikawa ke njilatanye kindo kyetahachya mkambo fu fodu ma mbuka tsa waku wadu na njimdambike mawokonyi ha Waroma nji mpfunge njiwuto Yerusalemu.
44028018	Nawo wamemaa injiwesa wakundi injipfunguo kyamba kulawepfo kitewe ma kimu kyetewa njiwooho.
44028019	Kya indi Wayuda wekideda mnu ipfo mondunyifu ngaitiko ikulahya ko Kaisari. Chi kikeri ke nyi mbewode kidedo kyecha ikumba wandu wa mbaṟi yakonyi.
44028020	Kyasia nkyo kimaduma inyi ngamlaha muche luwonane na ideda kimu. Kyamba kyatewa njii mpfunge na mshe fu nyi mkusirye fo Israeli.”
44028021	Nawo wakamhalwo, “So lulemeambye baruo tsiwode mbonyi tsapfo tsiwuka Yudaya-pfo. Manya kwipfo monowama ma umu ashikye kunu echiluongoya kyapfo kii kiwicho ma ilukapya sumu kyapfopfo.
44028022	Kya indi lukundi iicho kopfo iyo chando uwonyi. Kyamba kya siṟi ii ikuwikye idi kyanya nyi luichi ke nyi ikeri ileholeho hando hose.”
44028023	Wekimaa iteṟyana nao mkonu wakacha na koke kulyando awelaa wandu sa wafoi kawaongoya neng'cha na iṟingishya wumangi wo Ruwa kechiwadambuya kya Yesu na mweke fo wuwawaso wo Mose na fo waikimbi awoka ngamenyi kashika kyukanyi.
44028024	Maata-ho wakaidikya shilya shilededo na maata walaidikye.
44028025	Na ili walaweidikyanyi wo wenyi na wenyi wakakuhendya kowo Paulo kekimaa ihamba idedo li limu ke, “Mumuyo Mwele alededa necha na waku walya wanu kui dumbu lya mwikimbi Yesaya.
44028026	Kechihamba, Henda ko mkambo fu nowawie, licho na mochiicho na madu manya mochimanyapfo. Na yambwo na mochiambwo manya mulechiwona kindo.
44028027	Kyamba ngoo tsa wandu wa tsii njiumiṟe na madu hawo nyi wai walemeri yadanya, na meso hawo nyi wahapfumbye walashike iwona kui meso hawo nyi iicho kui madu hawo na itawuo kui ngoo tsawo na iilacha mahio hawo kundu njiwakiṟe.
44028028	Kyasia iki kimanyike-ng'u ipfo konu wokya wulalu, ke okiio lu lo Ruwa lui udike ko wa mbaṟi njihenu. Nawo na wechiluadanya.” [
44028029	Kekimaa ihamba isho Wayuda wakakuhendya kowo wechiwesana sa shingi wo wenyi na wenyi.]
44028030	Paulo kakaa-pfo hando ha maka iwi iambanyi alee ipfo mbenyi koke kundo echilaa, kawa moambya wandu wose wawekewa momcheya.
44028031	Kechiongwo mbonyi tsa wumangi wo Ruwa na ilosha kya Mndumii Yesu kui wukesi wuingi nalaimo nyi mndu.
45001001	Nyio inyi Paulo njii isinga lya Yesu Kristo msu msambuṟe nji-mdahuye Ndumi ya Ruwa ya Sia ya okiio.
45001002	Nyiyo aweiteṟye na mweeke fo waikimbi walya wakye ipfo Maṟehyonyi Maele.
45001003	Ya mana chu oke apaṟikye osharinyi lo Dawidi kui nyama.
45001004	Ambike-ho Mana o Ruwa Menyi pfinya kui Mumuyo mosumba wuele likawa kui iṟuka wapfunyi, nyio Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu.
45001005	Nao nyio alelusaṟya kaluinenga wudumi wohendelishya rina lyo lyake wuidiki ipfo mkambonyi ya wandu yose.
45001006	Mpfondo nanyo muipfo mui wasambuṟe wa Yesu Kristo.
45001007	Ngamwiṟikiṟa nyo mukeri ipfo Roma mose mui wakunde wa Ruwa, wasambuṟe waele. Wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo luwukye ipfo ko Ruwa Nde yadu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
45001008	Kya kuwoka ngaana Ruwa oko njikuwawie na Yesu Kristo kimaduma kyanu mose kyamba wuidiki wonu wukeri ihambo wuyana kose.
45001009	Kyamba Ruwa chu njimṟundya kui mrima fose foko njechionguo Ndumi ya Sia ya Mana chu okye nyio awa mṟingishi oko moṟingishya kye njimukumbwo nyo kitsitsi.
45001010	Oryo mandi njiterewa njikeri iwesa Ruwa kulako njechiwonyo mwaanya foshika konu.
45001011	Kyamba njiwodo macha hewonana nanyo njimwendye kyemuwanza kii-kiwike nyi Mumuyo.
45001012	Nalyo nyilyo liwe nyi iwanzana iidikya lyanu linjiwanze na iidikia lyako lyimmbanze nyo.
45001013	Indi njikundi mumanye, wanawawama, kye njiwelangie kafoi icha na ipfo konu cha ipfo mkambonyi iya ingi, kya indi ngaimo shika inu.
45001014	Inyi na njii mosile o Wagriki na o wa mdedie mhenu, o waṟango na o walai waṟango.
45001015	Nyi wudo njilangie ionguo Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio na konu ipfo Roma.
45001016	Kyamba inyi njilapfia sonu kya Ndumi yo ya Sia ya okiio, kyamba nyi ikeri pfinya ya Ruwa yewonya oryo mwidiki oletso iasie na mndu Myuda na mndu Mgriki.
45001017	Kyamba kotambahaluyo nayo wuhoṟotsu wuwukye ko Ruwa wokuwada kundo kuwode wuidiki wochiduo mndu wuidikinyi, chando kyikiṟehie, ke Mndu mhoṟotsu nyi echikaa awode moo fuṟukye wuidikinyi.
45001018	Kyamba tuuke ya Ruwa yahenda imanyisho ichee ruwehu yechiolokya oryo wukika wo wandu na wutahachi wowo iwo wekeshingya wukilohi wulya njia kui tewe lya wutahachi.
45001019	Kipfa isho sha Ruwa shewa imanya na shiwataṟambukye kyamba Ruwa nyi alewatambaṟuya.
45001020	Kyamba isho shake shilowa yambuya sho shekyewono wokya awikie wuyana shishiwike nyio wehanahana kyasho; nasho nyi shiile, pfinya yake ilunganyi ikaa na mkaike foke fui fo Ruwa amonyi kikaenenga walawonyo mwaanya fokapa nene.
45001021	Kitewe nyi kipfa ili waweichi Ruwa, indi walawemwindya cha Ruwa manya imwaana, kya indi wakahenda ihanahana uhamu wo wongo, na mdo fowo fukatushia fukawa meema.
45001022	Ipfo kundo wakutanye walaanyi mpfondo watondokye.
45001023	Wusuṟi wu wo Ruwa alechisia wo wakawuilacha na mfano fofanana na mndu o wandu ekesia na fo malehe na fo mando na fo shindo shekekupupurwo.
45001024	Nkyo kitewe Ruwa alewalekia wahende dao nyi lango tsawo tsewaduo ngafunyi washike yendye mbihu yawo wusutsu kowo wawenyi.
45001025	Wo walekuilachya wukilohi wo Ruwa na wongo, wakawikya kitsane wuindi na ikiterewa wakada mtsanyi mokiwika ai moidapfumo mlungana. Amenyi.
45001026	Nkyo kimaduma Ruwa alewalekia wahende iwado nyi wulanga wuendie wusutsu; na waka wawo wakailacha mbutie fulya fuwaṟi na sa fulawaṟi.
45001027	Na womi na wudo wakaweda ikaa na waka wawo chando kiwaṟi wechiaka-aka na ilangana wo wenyi na wenyi, womi wakawewuta na womi mbutie fulai na sonu, wakakuwonya wueri wusumhanyi wo wunyamaṟi wowo kowo wawenyi.
45001028	Nawo chando wawepiṟye ikaa na Ruwa ipfo kundo akuwatambaṟuye na wudo o Ruwa nyi alewalekia wahende furunjikya mhie yawo wechiwuta shilya ishiwuta.
45001029	Wakaichuo wutahachi wo orio mbaṟi na wunyenyi na wuwahi na isohuo mondu na yoka mtambo na maupahapaha na maweweda.
45001030	Nyi wekeduo wandu aaṟu, wesuo Ruwa, wai waami, wechumia useṟeṟi wai wa mtengelele, wandu wasumi, wepiṟa wafee.
45001031	Kindo kilai nawo nyi osaṟe, nyi wuhendeli, kindo kilai nawo nyi sonu, kindo kilai nawo nyi iichio mndu wukiwa.
45001032	Ma ili waichi kilya Ruwa awikye-ho kye wewuta wadi ate wawoho. Nawo naa wekewuta wado chi wo wawenyi tupupfo kyaindi wekeichika na walya wekewuta wado.
45002001	Nkyo kyaenenga hoi iyo, ui mndu o wandu, ma kowa wu, ulaidima ikuwuta-ho ili uidedya ungi; kyamba ipfo kundo odedya ungi mpfondo okuwonya owingo iyo kumonyi, kyamba isho ukeri ideda kyasho nyisho nasho iyo kumonyi ukeri iwuta.
45002002	Indi luichi ke mdumbuye fulya Ruwa afudumbuya walya wewuta shindo shido nyi fuidikyanyi na kilya kii lohi.
45002003	Aka wo iyo ui mndu o wandu, mowonya owingo iwo wengi wewuta wado na iyo kumonyi okewuta kudo, alae nyi okusaṟa kye nyi ochikia ipfo kundo Ruwa adumbuo mondu ko?
45002004	Ang'u ngesa upiṟye wuwongoya woke na wutsitsa na wuleeli wufoi wudi kulamanye ke wucha wu wo Ruwa wokuitika udumbuye umhalukye kui mrima?
45002005	Na orikiki lu lopfo na wuumu wo ngoo ilakunda imhalukya sho shekuwiia tewe okuruwia kumonyi tuuke ya Mkonu fulya fo tuuke fomanyisha mdumbuyo fusumhanyi fo Ruwa.
45002006	Natae oryo mndu ose wueri wo mawuto hake.
45002007	Iwo watsinda wewuta kilya kii kicha wepfula moo fo mlungana echiwaenenga wuitoṟi na kiṟumi na moo fulechisia.
45002008	Indi iwo wengi wawode ikukunda walaidikye kilya kiilohi indi wakaidikya mawicho wo wechihoyo nyashi na tuuke ya Ruwa.
45002009	Kiwi na fowa na mawawio shechiwada oryo mrima fo mndu ose mowuta sha wuwicho, wokya Myuda shika Mgriki.
45002010	Indi Ruwa nechiinenga wuitoṟi na kiṟumi na ofoṟo shechisokya oryo mndu mowuta kilya ki kicha, wokya Myuda shika Mgriki.
45002011	Kyamba Ruwa ekyeambuya fana ya mndu-pfo.
45002012	Kyamba iwo wawetahachie walaweichi wuwawaso wo Mose na wachideka kulawode wuwawaso, na walya wawetahachie waichi wuwawaso nyi wechidumbuyo mondu na mweke fo wuwawaso.
45002013	Kyamba chi iwo waicho wuwawaso wawa wahoṟotsu ipfo sumhana na Ruwapfo, shila nyi iwo wai wewuta wuwawaso wechitano wahoṟotsu.
45002014	Kyamba ili wa mkambo iya ilawode wuwawaso wekewuta kui madoenyi hawo isho wuwawaso wuhambie kyasia-ng'u wuwawawaso wawenyi.
45002015	Wo wamanyishye ke iwuta lilya wuwawaso wulya wuliwawasye likeri iṟehye ngoonyi tsawo wai waliṟingishye kui ngo tsa mrimenyi yawo na kui mahio hekeanduyana na yanguṟyana njowingo.
45002016	Kuwe mkonu fulya ilindi Ruwa echianduya kui mweke fo Yesu Kristo kya shilya sha wandu shii-shiṟike. Nyiyo ndumi njimdume nayo.
45002017	Aka-wo iyo, kokoya okusenda Myuda ochikuihetsa wuwawaso-hu na ikushela kye ui na Ruwa.
45002018	Komanya kilya Ruwa awawasye kochiletsana sheletsana ui-mpfunde na wuwawaso.
45002019	Kokusirya iyo kumonyi kye uwei msongoru o wapfie meso, na sa ko walya wai meemenyi.
45002020	Kuwewa mtoṟishi motoṟisha walaichi kindo, mlosha o walatimie ili wuwawaso wukupfungye mtaato fo wutichi na wukilohi.
45002021	A kikawa kido kolosha wengi koda ulakulosha iyo kumonyi? Kowa moongwo; ma kulaiwe, na iyo kowuya iwa?
45002022	Kowewa mohamba; kulaṟuhuye, na iyo koṟuhuya? Iyo koleha mfano ya maruwa ha wongo kowewa mokapa naho mbucha?
45002023	Nyi okuichika kye nowode wuwawaso wo Ruwa, kowewa moendye Ruwa wusutsu ochiumbuya wuwawaso wu.
45002024	Chando Madedo Maele hahambye “Rina lya Ruwa lyekeanga mosalucho ipfo mkambonyi ya wandu kipfa kyanu nyo Wayuda.”
45002025	Kyamba odino lui lucha kokoya owa mowuta shilya shii-shiwawase, indi kokoya okeumbuya wuwawaso odino lopfo lomba cha ili ulai mdine kima uladedino.
45002026	Kokoya nyi wudo kii na ichu alai mdine kawa moringa shilya shii shiwawase nyi wuwawaso, nechiwa cha ili amdine.
45002027	Na ichu moawutsya uwawaso alai-mdine nyame-hu nyi echikuwonya owingo iyo owa motahachya wuwawaso na ukukerye na mṟeho fulya na odino ma chandu walai wadine.
45002028	Kyamba Myuda chi ichu afanyi Myuda kya nja-pfo manya odino lo Myuda chi ilu luwonyo ludo ipfo nyamenyipfo.
45002029	Kya indi sa ai Myuda o lohi nyi ichu akukerye adi Myuda kya mmba na odino nyi lukukerye ipfo kundo ngoo iinjitsane. Likawa kui Mumuyo likawewa kui mweke fo iwawaso. Na mndu ai adi kiichiko kyake ewikyo kiwukye ko wandupfo shila nyi ko Ruwa amonyi.
45003001	Kikawa kido Myuda wawodeki kya ngoseṟa kota wandu wengi? Na odino lulya loekya ki?
45003002	Mwidye fu a fui-pfo foringa njora tsose. Kya kuwoka Wayuda nyi waiwadambikye mbia tsa Ruwa.
45003003	A nyi ki-wo ili kuweipfo waleletsihendelya? Alae wuṟingi wu wowo wushike iwuta-ho wuhendeli wo Ruwa ko?
45003004	Oo! Manyale Ruwa nyi mhendeli kiheri kyose indi oryo mndu o wandu ai mowongo chando ku-kuṟehye, “E-wo Ruwa, oryo mandi omededa.”
45003005	Indi kokoya wutahachi wu wodu wowikya wudi wuhoṟotsu wo Ruwa kiṟingishyo luhambe luda ngesa? Kulako Ruwa nekedeko echilekia tuuke yake iluhoye ko? Ngadeda njido mbaṟi ya kiwandu.
45003006	O Manyale! Aka shile nyi wudo nyi wuda Ruwa awechianduya wuyana wu?
45003007	Indi kokoya kiwulohi kya Ruwa kyawutia tewe lyehenda yengeṟya wuitoṟi ipfo hando inyi njii mowongo a nyiki-se inyi njianduyo cha ili njii mnyamaṟi ngesa?
45003008	Kyimu cha ihamba, “Luwute wuwicho kundu luwone mecha?” Wengi nyi wudo ili kwipfo wailuiria wongo na ilusutsa kye nyi wudo lokelosha. Wo wechianduyo owingo lusumhanyi.
45003009	Kwipfo mndu ma umu aimhendelyipfo? A nyi wuda-se ngesa! So Wayuda lulimbie ngesa? Chi kosepfo. Kyamba lulesonguo ikumba na Wayuda na Wagriki kye nyi wai-walamye nyi wunyamaṟi wose.
45003010	Chando kuu-kuṟehye, “Kulaipfo ai mhoṟotsu manya umu.
45003011	Kulaipfo awode osaaṟe kulaipfo ai mopfula Ruwa.
45003012	Wama ihenda itandawuka wose wakalehela wose kakapi. Kulaipfo sa ekewuta kilya kii kicha manya umu.
45003013	Oṟo lowo nyi kipfu kiwedye mnying'a, njolimi tsawo nyi wekelemba natso, ipfo shi-ya momu yawo nyi wuṟoi wo manjoka wuu-wuṟike-pfo.
45003014	Dumbu lya-wo liichwo shirumo na shipusiṟo.
45003015	Madende hawo hedichya ipusuo samu.
45003016	Ipfo kundo wamekuidya-ho kodeoho mawaṟi na mawawiṟo.
45003017	Na njia yewika ofoṟo walaimanye.
45003018	Ipfo kowo wawode yowuo Ruwa manyale-pfo.”
45003019	Kya indi luichi kye isho wuwawaso wuhambye nyi woshiwia walya wai shi ya wuwawaso kundu oryo dumbu lipfumbo na wuyana wose wuwone wuu-wuhutsye owingo sumuhana na Ruwa.
45003020	Kipfa kulaipfo mndu o wandu awetano mhoṟotsu oshanguyi lo Ruwa kui mweke fo mawuto ha-mawawase, kyamba wuwawaso wu kindo wukiendie nyi imanyisha mndu wunyamaṟi wokye.
45003021	Na wulalu wuhoṟotsu wo Ruwa womhenda imanyisho tare wuwawaso indi wuu-wuwikye kiṟingishyo nyi wuwawaso-wo na waikimbi wo.
45003022	Ruwa neketana wandu wahoṟotsu oshangunyi lokye kui wuidiki woidikya Yesu Kristo iwo wamwidikye wadi wose, kyamba kulaipfo mletsano.
45003023	Kyamba wandu woose wawenyamaṟie na iwuṟa wawewuṟye ngeela ya Ruwa.
45003024	Nyi wai-watane wahoṟotsu ki wutonga wokye walawewika-ho kindo likawa na oletso lulya luleendo nyi Kristo Yesu.
45003025	Nao nyio Ruwa alemtana njoko yeoloṟa mondu fulya, iwe kui samu yake ko iwo womemwidikya. Nalewuta ado kundu namanyishe wuhoṟotsu wu wokye na kya mwidyo fulya aweidya matahachyo halya ha kacha mwidyo.
45003026	Nyiho naho Ruwa alewa mokukarishya kyaho kundu namanyishye-ho wuhoṟotsu wu woke, kiheri kya wulalu kumanyike-ho ke nyio amonyi ai mhoṟotsu kawewa motana na ichu aidikye Yesu mhoṟotsu.
45003027	A mwaanya fokushela ku foya ngesa? Nyi fumbikye hima. Nyi kui mweke fo wuwawaso wuki? Nyi wulya woringa iawutsia mawuto ngesa? Manyale, kya indi nyi kipfa luidikie.
45003028	Nyihondo lokuwutya-ho ihamba ke mndu o wandu aitano mhoṟotsu ili awa mwidiki kulawode nyi iawutsia mawuto hamaringe nyi wuwawaso wulya.
45003029	Alae Ruwa nyi o Wayuda tupu ko? Chi nao mkambo ingi riti wo? E-ko na o mkambo ingi riti!
45003030	Ruwa nyi umu echitana ichu mdine nawe mhoṟotsu kui wudiki na ichu alai mdine nawe wa mhoṟotsu kui wuidiki.
45003031	Ashika kikawa kido luilache wuwawaso luwike-ho wuidiki ngesa? O ma-le kya indi nyi ikapya wuwawaso owanzo lukeri.
45004001	Aka luhambe luda kya nde yadu Abrahamu ngesa? Ke nyi luwemkoya ai mku odu molualutsa kui mbihu ngea?
45004002	Kokoya Abrahamu ametano mhoṟotsu kui mweke fo shilya o awutye, nyi awode-ho kyekuṟumisha, kya kakye echikushela sumuhana na Ruwa pfo.
45004003	Kyamba kilya kii-kiṟehye kyo kyehamba kida? Kyehamba ke Abrahamu nyi aleidikya Ruwa, nao Ruwa kamtana mhorotsu.
45004004	Mndu moṟundya ungi, weri woke alekewutalyo kyemsaṟya kya indi nyi wusumhanyi wokye.
45004005	Indi mndu alawa moṟundya-woṟunda kawa moidikya kekusirya Ruwa ichu awa motana mndu alasumhanyi nawe mhoṟotsu nao nyio kui wuidiki wu woke atano mhorotsu.
45004006	Na wudo na Dawidi ahambye kya sia ya mndu Ruwa amtanyie mhoṟotsu kulai ko mawuto.
45004007	Nyi ahambye, “Nanga iwa waiwahoṟye matahachyo hawo njonyamaṟo tsawo tsikaangatso.
45004008	Nanga msoṟo ulya Mndumii alaikumbuose manyamaṟo hakye!”
45004009	Nanga ii nyi ya wadine tupu ang'u nyi na ya walawadine ngesa? Na ko walya walawadine daa. Kyamba lomhamba kye, “Abrahamu nyi aleidikia nao Ruwa kamtana uhoṟotsu.”
45004010	Kyasia Abrahamu nyi aleitalyo ada ngesa? Ngesa nyi lyandi amedino a lyandi alawemdino? Chi lya amdinopfo, na lya alawemdino.
45004011	Na kichano kya odino kyo alekiambya kiwe kichano kya wuhoṟotsu wulya wuwemba kui mweke fo wuidiki wulya awei nawo mandi alawendedino, kundu nawe mku o walai wadine wechiidikya wakashika italio wuhoṟotsu wu.
45004012	Nawewa na mku o wa-wadine iwa walai wadine wadi kya indi na wekyeosha njia iya iya ya njayo tsa wuidiki ndeyadu Abrahamu awewuwode lyandi alawemdino.
45004013	Kyamba kyaasa kilya kyeteṟya Abrahamu ang'u luwa lyake ke wakudaaye wuyana wu, kyoṟa kyo kilawei-kiteṟye kui mweeke fo wuwawaso kya indi kui mweeke fo wuidiki wotalio wuhoṟotsu.
45004014	Kyamba kukoye walya wakuwodie wuwawaso-hu wawei waoṟi weoṟa wuyana, wuidiki wuwechiwa wo maai na kyaasa-kyo kya Ruwa chi kindo-pfo.
45004015	Kyamba wuwawaso wokyeende mondu kya indi ipfo kundo kulawwode wuwawaso kwipfo yumbuyapfo.
45004016	Nkyo kimaduma kyose kiwe kui wuidiki kikuhendekye njia ya wutonga, kundu kyaasa kilya kiwe kituwe kituwie oryo luwa lyoose chi iya ipaṟikye ipfo wuwawasonyi tupupfo kya indi na iya ipaṟikye wuidikinyi wo Abrahamu ichu akeri mku odu lose.
45004017	Kisumhanye kilya kii-kiṟehye, “Ngamekuwika mku o mkambo ifoi.” Kikawa kido ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa cha Abrahamu awemwidikye ichu ai moṟutsa wapfu na kui idedo lyakye shindo shilaiho shikawewa.
45004018	Ipfo kundu kulawewode kowedya Abrahamu aleidikya kechiwedya kye nashike iwa mku o mkambo ifoi kisumhanye kilya kii-kihambe, “Nyi wudi-ng'u luwa lyapfo lyechifo cha nyenyeri.”
45004019	Alalehele wuidikinyi wokye machandu aweichi ke mbihu fokye fomkachuka ashitsye kufui maka ihana manya wusu wo Sara chando wuwekachukye cha mhumba.
45004020	Indi alepfio nyi mdo kya kyaasa kilya kya Ruwa nade alakiidikyapfo, nyi elewanga wuidikinyi kechiwikya Ruwa mng'ano.
45004021	Kawekusihya pyu kye Ruwa ai na pfinya yeawutsya kyaasa aleteṟya.
45004022	Nalyo nyilyo kalitalio wuhoṟotsu.
45004023	Indi ilyo lyehamba, “Kalitalio wuhoṟotsu” chi kimaduma kyakye amonyi tupu-pfo.
45004024	Kya indi lii-iṟehye na kimaduma kyadu so lushike ilitalio ludi lochikusihya na Ruwa-chu aṟutsye Yesu Mndumii odu ipfo ko wapfu.
45004025	Nyio icho ammaa ihenda idambiko kimarete kya matahachyo hadu kashika iṟutso kipfa kya wuhoṟotsu wodu.
45005001	Kyasia ili lui-watane ludi wahoṟotsu na mweke fo wuidiki nyi luwode ofoṟo lo ko Ruwa lui-uwikeho nyi Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu.
45005002	Nao nyio aluinengye mtengele fulya foluduo ipfo kundo kuwode wutonga-wu wo Ruwa lukuilikishye nawo na ikuṟumisha kui owedi lowedya wuitoṟi wo Ruwa.
45005003	Ma chi kya ikyo tupupfo, kya indi lui wakyesi ipfo shiwirenyi kipfa nyi luichi shiwira shekeende ikuhoda.
45005004	Na ikuhoda-li lyeke̱nde otsano na otsano-lu loke̱nde owedi.
45005005	Na owede-lu lohutsa sonupfo kipfa ikunda lya Ruwa liikualya ngoonyi tsadu kui Mumuyo Mwele ichu lui-wasumbe.
45005006	Kyamba Kristo amelupfia so kiheri luwefafae kawepfia walemeshi walemanyi na Ruwa matika na halya.
45005007	Chi kii kiangu ipfa keletsa mndu asumhanyipfo. Kya ichu ai mcha amonyi kofia kuweipfo ekaria ilekia-ho moo.
45005008	Indi Ruwa nyi amanyishye ikunda lyake alukundi nalyo so ipfo kundo Kristo alelupfia kiheri luwei-se wanyamaṟi.
45005009	Kikawa kido naso lui-watane wahoṟotsu wulalu oshangunyi lo Ruwa kui pfinya ya samu iya yake, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa lochikaa luhende iletso nyio tuuke iya ya Ruwa.
45005010	Kyamba kokoya lomhenda yoloṟyo Ruwa kui ipfa lya Mana-chu oke lilyandi luwei kituwenyi, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa lochikaa luiwaringe ipfo kundo aitsinda na moo ili lui-waoloṟye ludi.
45005011	Manya chi ikyo lukuwawye na Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo lukamaayambya mwoloṟye-fu wulalu kui mweke foke.
45005012	Nakyo kihendekye kidi, ke wunyamaṟi wulecha na kunu wuyana kitewe kya mndu umu, na opfu lukacha kitewe nyi wunyamaṟi, nakyo kikaenenga opfu lomhenda idung'ana wandu wose nyi kipfa wanyamaṟie wose.
45005013	Kyamba wunyamaṟi wuwei kunu wuyana kiheri kulawewode wuwawaso, indi wunyamaṟi wulahenda italo alyando kulaipfo wuwawaso.
45005014	Kya indi wokya Adamu shika Mose nyi opfu luwei mangi achilie na walya walawenyamaṟye cha Adamu aleumbuya mawawaso ha Ruwa. Nao Adamu nyio awehambie ichu echikaa nache.
45005015	Kya indi kiiho na kiira chi shihianyipfo, kyamba kokoya yumbuya lya ichu umu litewye washike ihenda ipfa wadi wafoi nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa wutonga wo Ruwa na ohawi lo wutonga wurio nyi mndu-chu umu Yesu Kristo wusuṟie wafoi walya.
45005016	Na kisumbo-ki kya Ruwa kilafananyi na wunyamari wulya wo mndu ulya umu. Kyamba ipfo kundo ulya umu alemhenda yanduyo kukawuka-ho mdumbuye folunga ipfunga kitsitsi, indi kisumbo ki kya wutonga ili kyamcha kitewe nyi marendemko ha wandu wafoi, kyo kyaende msumhantsie fowatana wahoṟotsu.
45005017	Nkya lohi wunyamaṟi wo mndu ichu umu wuletewa opfu luchilie wose kimarete kya ichu umu-ho, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa iwa weambya mfeṟa fo wutonga na fo kisumbo kya wuhoṟotsu wulya nyi wechiwa mangi tsekuachia na moo wakuwode na ichu umu nyio Yesu Kristo.
45005018	Nahong'u kihendyekye kidi; kye chando iho lya ichu umu lyendie wandu wose owingo nyi wudo ipfo kundo ichu umu awehoṟoki-ho kechihendelya shose kuendyo wandu wose kihoṟotsa moo.
45005019	Cha kipfa chando walya wafoi wamhenda itano wanyamaṟi kitewe nyi wulemi wulya wo mndu-cho umu, na wudo na walya wafoi wechitano wahoṟotsu kimaduma nyi wutechi wo ichu umu-ho.
45005020	Indi wuwawaso wulya wuweoshye-ho wofeṟya iho lilya. Indi ipfo kundo wunyamaṟi womfo, mpfondo wutonga woshika ifo kawi wochilimba.
45005021	Nyi kyawa kido kundu chando wunyamaṟi wuwei mangi yededa na pfinya ya opfu nyi wudo wutonga wuwe mangi ipfo mengenyi ya wuhoṟotsu wochiwika moo fo mlungana fo ipfo Mndumii-hu odu Yesu Kristo.
45006001	Aka luihamba luda ngesa? Lukae lochiwuta kya wunyamari, kundu wotonga wushike ifo ko? O, manyale.
45006002	So lukamaa iwiia wunyamaṟi wapfu, nyi wuda luwuye-se ikaa nawo lingi ngesa?
45006003	Ang'u mokaa mulaichi ke so ili luiwapatisye Kristo Yesu nyi lui wapatisye opfu loke?
45006004	Kikawa kido nyi lui-waṟike kimu nao opfunyi kulya kui wupatiso kundu chando Kristo aleweṟutso wapfunyi kui wuitoṟi wo Wande na wudo so lukae-ho lochihendekya luirie moo mhya.
45006005	Kyamba kokoya lomehenda ilungyo kila kya opfu lulya loke, na kya iṟuka lyake na lochihenda ikilungyo.
45006006	Kilya lukiichi kikeri kiile; ke wumndu wodu lui-wawike nawo, wo womaa ihenda ikapyo msalabe-hu kimu nao kundu mbihu-fu fuichiwie inyamaṟa fudi fuhende irumara so lulakisingye-se wunyamaṟi.
45006007	Kyamba alyando mndu o wandu amhenda ipfa nyi aimdumbwo mwaanya fonyamaṟa.
45006008	Indi kokoya lomhenda ipfa kimu na Kristo nyi luidikie kye lochikaa nao.
45006009	Nyi luichi ke Kristo alemerutso wapfunyi ekifasepfo, opfu lokimwidimasepfo.
45006010	Kyamba kilya alepfa kyakyo nyi alepfa kya wunyamaṟi ili limu lyedumbwo teṟe, indi iki kimbode ili ai-ho na moo nyi kii-le; ke nyi ai mopfuṟukanya nafo Ruwa.
45006011	Nanyo na wudo kewekuitalenyi mui wandu wawewiia wunyamaṟi wapfu, na moo muwode nyi mukuwodye nafo Kristo-hu Yesu mochipfuṟukanya nafo Ruwa.
45006012	Ko ikyo mulalekie wunyamaṟi wuchilie mbihu mopfa yanu yechikaa ipfe muwechiidikyana na lango tsafo.
45006013	Ma mulawone mochidambikya wunyamaṟi shiwungo shanu shiwe shihia sha wukika, kya indi kudambikenyi nyo muwenyi Ruwa cha wandu warie moo waweṟukie nafo wapfunyi, na shiwungo shanu shiwiie Ruwa shihia sha wuhoṟotsu.
45006014	Kyamba wunyamaṟi wulechimwidimase, kyamba mulai shi ya wuwawaso kya indi nyi mukeri shi ya wutonga.
45006015	Alewo kiwukye-ho nyi ki? Ke luwute kya wunyamaṟi kipfa ili lulai shi ya wuwawaso kya indi lukakaa shi ya wutonga? O, chi wudopfo.
45006016	Aka mulaichi ke ichu mochikumdambikya cha masinga kyemwanguya madu nao nyio mombia masinga hake mochimwanguya madu kiwe kya wunyamaṟi woduo opfunyi kiwe kya wuidiki woende wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
45006017	Indi Ruwa nawikyo mwaano ki kipfa muwesia ikaa masinga ha wunyamaṟi mukashika yanguya madu mateteṟa-chu mompfunda muiwadambikye kokye mukuwode-ho na mrima msanze.
45006018	Indi mlewuto wusingenyi wo wunyamaṟi nyi musingye wuhoṟotsu wu.(
45006019	Ngadeda njidi kiwandu kipfa mofafaa kui nyama tsanu;) Kyamba chando muwewedambikye shiwungo shanu shiwe shesingya ngafu na wukika wofeṟya-ho wukika, nyi wudo muwe mochidambikya shiwungo shanu wulalu shiwe shechisingya wuhoṟotsu-wu wuduo kiilishyonyi.
45006020	Kyamba ilindi muwei masinga ha wunyamaṟi mandi-ha muwechi chandu kimuwaṟi iwa wahoṟotsu pfo.
45006021	Nyi kiira kiki mulewona ho mandi halya? Chi kiwei kya mbaṟi imwinengye mopfia kyayo sonu wulalu? Cha kipfa kiira kyakyo nyi opfu.
45006022	Indi wulalu ili momeletso na wunyamaṟi mukatano masinga ha Ruwa; nyi muwode-ng'u kiira wulalu kimwendie iilisho na kiheṟi kyefurumia nyi moo fo mlungana.
45006023	Kyamba wueri wosingya wunyamaṟi nyi opfu, indi kilya Ruwa aisumba nakyo mndu oke nyi moo fo mlungana fukukerye Kristo-hu Yesu Mndumii odu.
45007001	Ang'u mulaichi, wanawawama, kyamba njiideda nanyo sa muichi mawawaso. Mawawaso haitoṟye mndu ili mandi ai-ho na moo?
45007002	Kyamba mndu mka amwalikyo mii nyi apfungyo mii nyi wuwawaso ili mandi mii aiho na moo hose; kya indi mii chu kamekupfia, mka-cho amuitorye-se nyi wuwawaso womfungya miiacho-pfo.
45007003	Kiwukye-ho nyi kii-le; ke kiheri mii ai-ho na moo mka cho kadao nyi mii ungi nyi echiwio kye nyi ai mokiṟuhuyo; kya indi kombona mii amekupfia nyi alekio nyi wuwawaso wompfungya mii cho, kakudayo nyi mii ungi echiwio-se ke nyi ai mokiṟuhuyopfo.
45007004	Nanyo wanawawama wako, na wudong'u, mulewohyo kyemletsa na wuwawaso wu kui mweeke fo mbihu fo Kristo; mui wake ichu aleṟutsa auka wapfunyi luwe lochipfuṟukanya Ruwa mapfuṟukanyo.
45007005	Kyamba lyandi luwei wandu wa kimbihu nyi olakilakilo lo maumbuyo hewutyo tewe ipfo wuwawasonyi, nyilo luweiṟunda ipfo shiwungonyi sho shadu shechiuendye opfu.
45007006	Indi wulalu luwode mkuachie lulawaitoṟie nyi wuwawaso-wo lukapfa opfu loluletsa kilya kilupfungye kundu lukae-ho lochipfuṟukanya Ruwa lulawukye mumuyo, lulakuwode-se na mṟeho fo kacha.
45007007	Ili kii kido luhambe luda ngesa? Wuwawaso nyiwo wunyamaṟi? Ote-ko. Kya indi shile wuwawaso inyi njiwe manya wunyamaṟi-pfo. Ma njiwechimanya lango chando tsikeripfo chila wuwawaso wuhamhe. “Ma kulalange.”
45007008	Indi wunyamaṟi wulekuihetsa na iwawaso wukaamtsa lango tsa mbaṟi tsose tsiwei na inyi. Kyamba chila wuwawaso wuiho wunyamaṟi wupfiye.
45007009	Na inyi njiwewekukerye-ho na moo kacha kulaweiho wuwawaso; indi wuwawaso woikicha na wunyamaṟi wukaaluka.
45007010	Na inyi ngaendyo opfu kukanjihoya ke wuwawaso-wo wuwenjiwia okiiyo wowuuya injiendie opfu.
45007011	Kyamba wunyamaṟi wulekuihetsa na iwawaso wukanjilemba wukanjiendie opfu kui mweeke folyo.
45007012	Kyasiang'u wuwawaso nyi wui wulele na isho wushiwawasye shii shiele shirie wuhoṟotsu na wucha.
45007013	Alae kilya kya wucha nyi kiwenjiwiia kya opfu? Ote-ko; kya indi kundu wunyamaṟi-wu, ipfo kundo wuwenjiendie opfu mfondo wumanyikeho na pata ke nyi wunyamaṟi, na iwawaso liwe lyechiitika wunyamaṟi wuhende inyamaṟa wofeeṟa njowingo.
45007014	Kyamba luichi ke wuwawaso wurio nyi mumuyo. Indi inyi njii o kiwuyana njiimbikye isinga lya wunyamaṟi.
45007015	Njiichi kindo njiwuta-pfo; kyamba kilya njikundi njiikiwutapfo kya indi kilya njisuo nkyo njekekiwuta.
45007016	Kyasia komkoya ndakundi ikyo njekewuta na ngaidikya ke wuwawaso nyi wuwucha.
45007017	Indi wulalu chi o inyi njiiwuta-se njidipfo kya indi nyi wunyamaṟi-wu wukuwode na inyi.
45007018	Kyamba njiichi kye kunu koko nafo nyi mbihu fu foko tsako kuwode-ho kii kichapfo. Kyamba ikunda kilya kisumhanyi ee njikundi indi ikiwuta ote, kyalema.
45007019	Kyamba ikyi kisumhanyi njikikundi chiikyo njekewutapfo, kya indi ikyo kiwicho njisuo nyikyo sa njekewuta.
45007020	Indi komkoya ikyo njilakundi nyikyo sa njekewuta, chio inyi njii-ho-se mokiwutapfo, chila nyi wunyamaṟi-wo wuikiwuta, iwu wui kiidi kyako.
45007021	Ili kii kido nyi ngatamuo imanya ke ili njii-ho mokunda iwuta kii kicha nyi kwiho monjichilia, nyikyo kiwicho kilya kiwodanyi na inyi.
45007022	Kyamba njichihianyi na wuwawaso wo Ruwa kui wumndu woko wo kyammba.
45007023	Indi njiwonyi kwipfo wungi wuiwawaso ipfo shiwungonyi shako wochiwahana na wulya wowawasa mhie foko. Wo wukanjitana mpfunge o ipfo wuwawasonyi wo wunyamaṟi wuiwawasa ipfo shiwungonyi shako.
45007024	Apa, inyi nyi kisaya! Ichu ekaa nanletse mbihu-fu funjiduo opfunyi nyi wu?
45007025	Mwano fuwe fochiwikyo Ruwa chu echiidima lukuwawie na Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu. Ili kii kido na inyi njiwekaa na shilya shi shako njimonyi, njiwe mopfurukanya wuwawaso wo Ruwa kunu wuṟangonyi indi kimmbihu njikae njepfuṟukanya wuwawaso wo wunyamaṟi.
45008001	Kyasia ili kii kido wulalu kwiho oseso lohoya walya wai Kristo-hu Yesu-pfo.
45008002	Kyamba wuwawaso-wu wo Mumuyo moende moo fukeri Kristo-hu Yesu, nyiwo wulenjiletsa na wuwawaso wulya woende wunyamaṟi na opfu.
45008003	Kilya wunyamaṟi wulaweidima ili wuwei-wufafaṟe wudi nyi nyama, nyio Ruwa alekiwuta. Kechiduma Mana-chu oke amonyi, awa mfano fo nyama chaso tsirie wunyamaṟi, na kitewe alemduma na kya wunyamaṟi, kawonya wunyamaṟi-wu wukuwode ipfo nyamehu owingo.
45008004	Kiwehendekye kido kundu chile tsa wuwawaso tsishike yawutsyo nyiso lulekechumia mchumie fui-mhendeshe nyi nyama tsa mndu o wandu, indi luichumia mchumie kui pfinya ya Mumuyo.
45008005	Kyamba iwa wai wa mbuka ya nyama wo wekyechilio nyi shii sha nyama tso, indi iwa wai wa mbuka ya Mumuyo, wo wekyechilio nyi shii sha wai wa mbuka ya Mumuyo, wo wekehia shii sha Mumuyo.
45008006	Kyamba shilya nyama-tso tsekekuelengya, nyi shiduo opfunyi, indi shilya Mumuyo fokekuelengya sho shiwika moo na ofoṟo.
45008007	Kipfa shilya nyama-tso tsekekuelengya shiende kituwa na Ruwa kyamba tsilaindye wuwawaso wo Ruwa madu, manya tsilaidima iwuta tsido.
45008008	Indi iwo wakukerye-ho mkao ya nyama waidima ichihiana na Ruwapfo.
45008009	Indi nyo mukeri wa mkao fo nyamapfo kya indi mukeri wa mkao fo Mumuyo, komkoya Mumuyo o Ruwa aikukaya konu ketsinda nanyo. Mndu alai na Mumuyo o Kristo ichu chi o Kristo-pfo.
45008010	Indi komkoya Kristo akuwode nanyo, mbihu-i yanu yechipfa kipfa kya wunyamaṟi, indi Mumuyo fui moo fuimbike ipfo konu kundo momtano wahoṟotsu.
45008011	Indi komkooya Mumuyo o ichu aleṟutsa Yesu wapfunyi aikukaya konu ketsinda nanyo, mṟutsi-chu aṟutsye Yesu Kristo wapfunyi nechimtana na mbihu yanu ii mfari-moo, iwe meny-moo kipfa kya Mumuyo-cho oke ai kiidi kyanu.
45008012	Ili kii kido wanawawama nyi lukeri welya sile, indi sile tso tsilakeri tsa nyama tsadu, luwechikapya moo luiwaitike nyitso.
45008013	Kyamba kokooya mokapya moo mui-waitike nyi nyama tsanu mokunda ipfa. Indi komkoya mowaha mbutie ya nyama tsanu njiwicho mui-waitike nyi Mumuyo nyi mochiwada moo.
45008014	Kyamba iwa wose wadao nyi Mumuyo o Ruwa nyiwo wai wana wa Ruwa.
45008015	Kyamba nyi mulaleambya Mumuyo fo wusinga foamtsa-se lingi wuowu chi wudopfo, kya indi nyi muleambya Mumuyo o wuwana moluenenga ilaha; hoi Aba, hoi Wande.
45008016	Nao Mumuyo-cho nyi akusanzye na mumuyo-fu fodu kya iṟingishya kye nyi lui wana wa Ruwa.
45008017	Indi kyamba so lukeri wana wa Ruwa nyi lui na waoṟi luchiambia mboṟa tsa Ruwa; lukamba waoṟi nyi lui na waoṟi weoṟa hamu na Kristo kiwe lohenda ikisokiso nao kundu lushike iwiko na wuitoṟinyi wumu nao.
45008018	Kyamba ngahamba mawawyo ha ki-wulalu halaṟingananyi na wuitoṟi wulya lochikaa luwutambaṟuyo.
45008019	Cha kipfa mweṟeṟukye fo mbika ii fuwedye mnu ke wana-wa wa Ruwa washike ihenda itambaṟuka.
45008020	Kyamba mbika-ii indambikye masionyi chi kipfa iwekundi ihendeke idipfo, kya indi nyi kipfa kya Ruwa ichu moidambika-ho. Iwewa kya owedi.
45008021	Cha kipfa na shiwumbe shi shechikaa shihende yashuo wusingawu wo mkae yepuo ishike ikoya mkuachie fo wuitoṟi-wu wana wa Ruwa wawode.
45008022	Kyamba luichi ke shiwumbe shi shoose shikeri itsika shiwodo nyi kinangananga shika wulalu cha ha okora.
45008023	Manya chi shiwumbe shi tupupfo, kya indi naso luwenyi lui na Mumuyo chu, ili luwode mbetesa iya ya Ruwa lutano wana ipfo matalayonyi ha mbihu fodu.
45008024	Kyamba ikiṟo nyi lomekiṟo kya owedi. Indi kyeweda kikamboneka iweda lyahenda isia; kyamba mndu kindo kilya akiwonyi nyi akiweda-se ki?
45008025	Indi lukamba mowedya ikyo lulawonyi nyi lokiwedya lochikutirisia.
45008026	Na wudo na Mumuyo akeri iludara keluwikya ngaya hando lufafaa; kyamba so lulaichi chandu kiluwaṟi iterewa hando kiwuṟie isumhantso, kya indi Mumuyo amonyi ailuikayaho na masumukyo halechiwa ihamba.
45008027	Indi msa motichya ngoo tsa wandu nyio sa aichi chuṟe tsa Mumuyo ai moterewya wandu wa Ruwa akundi.
45008028	Na luichi kya shindo shose Ruwa nekyeṟunda hamu na walya, wamkundi na iwaonyisha wucha wose, nawo nyiwo wai-walahe kui kyama kilya kyake.
45008029	Kitewe nyi kipfa iwo alesonguo iwamanya kawesonguo na iwasambuṟa wawe wefanana na mfananye fo Mana-chu oke, kundu o nawe wawae o wana wa wee limu wafoi.
45008030	Na iwo alesonguo iwasambuṟa nyiwo alewalaha, na iwo o nyiwo alewatana wahoṟotsu; oshangunyi lokye; indi iwo alemaa iwatana wahoṟotsu wadi nawo nyiwo alewasumba wuitoṟi.
45008031	Aka luhambe-se luda kya iki? Komkoya Ruwa ailuikaya aka ichu alufoye nyi wu?
45008032	Ruwa Amda alanunya ma Mana-chu oke kimumu mfi katana amdambika kipfa kyadu so lose, nyi wuda echida alaluinenga shicha shose, nalusumbe nasho ngesa?
45008033	Ichu echianduya iwa wai-wasambuṟe nyi Ruwa nyi wu? Ruwa aiho awa mletsi!
45008034	Ichu echihutsya owingo nyi wu? Kwipfo-pfo? Kristo Yesu aiho, nyio sa alepfa na kya ngoseṟa nyi aleṟutso, awuka ko wapfu, o akukerye ipfo ko kulyo ko Ruwa Kawa moluterewya-ho so!
45008035	Ichu echiluletsana na ikunda lya Kristo nyi wu ngesa? Ngesa kiwe nyi shiwira ang'u ikisokiso, ang'u iterengyo, ang'u nyi njaa ang'u nyi iwuṟa nguo, ang'u nyi ndenga; ang'u ifunyo oshu?
45008036	Kihendekye chando kii-kiṟehye, “Nyi kitewe kyapfo loanga mowoho taṟaraa puti; lukatano cha ili lui machondi heshinja.”
45008037	Kya indi kya shindo sho kose shindo-shi shiluwode nyi lokia-ho lui wawinzi lukuwawie na ichu alukundi adi.
45008038	Kyamba njikusihye kye ma opfu ma moo ma wamalaika ma waitoṟi ma isho shiiho wulalu ma isho shekaa shiwe ili numa ma maapfinya mawe.
45008039	Ma kilya kikuilikishye ngine-hu ma kilya kisokye ipfo shi ma mbika ingi njiwe shilechiidima iluletsana na mkundana fo Ruwa alukundi nafo furianyi na Kristo Yesu Mndumii odu.
45009001	Njiideda kya lohi njii Kristo-hu, njihamba wongopfo, na ngo tsa mrimenyi foko tsii-njiwanze nyi Mumuyo Mwele tso tsanjiikanya ihoṟotsa kiṟingishyo ki.
45009002	Ke njiwodo mnu mfowa na mawawio ipfo ngoonyi na wukiwa wochitochatocha kitsitsi kipfa kya wandu wako lui samu imu.
