45009003	Kyamba njiwekundi ke inyi njimonyi njitano msese kyewa lyenenga wanawawama wako wa mkambo fumu na inyi wawehenda ikiṟo.
45009004	Wo nyiwo wai Waisraeli sa Ruwa alewasambuṟa wawe wana wakye, kawasumba wuitoṟi na mkundana fulya na wuwawaso wulya na wuindi woindya Ruwa na shyasa shilya.
45009005	Na waku walya na wawo, na ipfo kowo Kristo achee apaṟikye kowo ili amefeo mndu, nyio Ruwa mokaa huya-shose moichimbiṟo mlungana. Amenyi.
45009006	Manya chi cha ili idedo lya Ruwa lilachikiepfo. Kyamba chi wandu wose iwo wapaṟikye ko Israeli wai wambuṟe wa Ruwapfo.
45009007	Cha kipfa chi iwa wai luwa lya Abrahamu wakeri wana wosepfo, Chando Madedo Maele hahambye “Luwa lyapfo nyi lyechiuka ko Isaki.”
45009008	Lyo likeri lile; ke wana wawafee kimbihu chiwo wai wana wa Ruwapfo chila nyi wana wawafee kui kyaasenyi nyiwo sa waitalo ke wai luwa.
45009009	Kyamba kyaasa kilya nyi, “Alya cha wulalu njechiicha-se njikoye Sara awode mana.”
45009010	Kya indi chi ikyo kyake tupupfo, na kya Rebeka ili awekupfungye wamboṟa awuta ko ichu umu nyio ndeyadu so Isaki.
45009011	Kyamba kyawo ma indi wana walawendefeo ma walawendewuta kiwe kii kicha kiwe kii kiporu kashika iwio kyewadumbuya, kundu kyama kya Ruwa kyesambuṟa kikae-ho kechitoṟya.
45009012	Kilahendeke kyechiwa na mweke fo ngaata tsa mndu kya indi kiwukye ko Ruwa ichu modika ndaho kikyenyi, nakyo kiwei kiile, ke wawae nyi echisingya manawo.
45009013	Na wudo ku-kuṟehie ke, “Yakobo nyio njilemkunda indi Esau nyio njilemleha.”
45009014	Aka luhambe luda? Kulako Ruwa nyi aledeko? Manya-le
45009015	kyamba nyi awie Mose, “Njechisaṟia ichu njechikunda imsaṟia.”
45009016	Alewo koka na wudo kii kindo-kyo kyawa ikundo nyi mndu ang'u iidikyo nyiopfo kya indi kii kya Ruwa mosaṟya amonyi.
45009017	Kyamba Maṟehyo Maele hahambye kya Farao, “ Kitewe ngakuwika mangi nyi kundu njimanyishye kopfo pfinya yako mbode na rina lyako liweongoya ipfo orukenyi kose.”
45009018	Kyasia ng'u Ruwa nekesaṟia icho ose akunda imsaria; ichu amdumbuya kyemumiṟa nyi aimumiṟa.
45009019	Kulako nyi ochireeka na inyi nonjiwie, “Nyi kiili Ruwa awonya-se mndu owingo? Kyamba nyi o ku awehodana na kyama kyake?”
45009020	Hoo iyo ui mndu o wandu; nyi ukeri o ku koanduyana na Ruwa? Aka kindo kiwumbe kitane kyawia mokiwumba, “Nyi kiili untanye kudi?”
45009021	Mowumba chi awode pfinya na wumba nakuwutye chando akundi kumu kakuwumbya kihia kyechia kumu kakuwumbya-ho sa kyefana.
45009022	Indi Ruwa narie imanyishya shihia shilya shimpfulutsya nyashi tuuke yake, na iloṟa-ho kilya akuidimye nyi ashilelye na wuleeli wung'anyi ma shishitsye ihenda rumatso.
45009023	Nyi kundu nawemanyishya-ho mfoe fo wuitoṟi wokye alya shihie-hu shirio nyi wutonga wokye isho alesonguo ishiteseheṟya wuitoṟi wulya.
45009024	Nawo nyiso so alelulaha lupaṟikye chi ko Wayuda tupupfo kya indi na ipfo mkambonyi ya wahenu.
45009025	Kiidikyanyi na kilya ahambye kui dumbu lya Hosea; “Njechilaha fulawei mkambo fuwe mkambo foko. Na ichu alawei mkunde nawe Mkunde oko.
45009026	Na mwikimbi ipfo kundo wawekewio, Nyo mukeri wandu wakopfo mpfondo wechikaa wasendo wana wa Ruwa menyi-moo.”
45009027	Na Yesaya apoṟohoṟya Israeli, “Kukoye mfoye fo wana wa Israeli wueshikya cha mbuṟusanga tsa mbai ya ipalipali lya wuyana sa wechikiṟo-ho nyi waangu tupu.
45009028	Kyamba Mndumii nyi echimarisa iwika kitanyo na limu na idumbwo teṟe ipfo sangenyi lyoose.”
45009029	Kiwe chando Yesaya alewesonguo ihamba, “Kima Mndumii Menyi-Matoṟito alawelutsuhaṟya luwa nyi luwewa cha Wasodomu na ifanana na Wagomora.”
45009030	Aka luhambe luda? Nyi kikeri kiile wa mkambo mhenu walawewingya wuhoṟotsu, oshangunyi lo Ruwa wo wakawada wuhoṟotsu, oshangunyi lo Ruwa, kui wuidiki.
45009031	Indi Israeli ili iweiwingya wuhoṟotsu oshangonyi lo Ruwa ikusirye na wuwawaso ileshika ikoya wuwawasopfo.
45009032	Nyi ki kyaduma? Nyi kipfa ilawekuwode kiwanje-hu kya wuidiki indi iwekuwode kiwanje-hu kya mawuta ikakapa mtuulya alya iho-hu lya mtuulya.
45009033	Chando Madedo Maele hahambie, “Ambuya a ulya ngaleṟya iho lyekapya mtuulya kulya Sionyi na piita ya iho yedekesha. Mdu moidikia ichu ai iho lyo echisukapfo.”
45010001	Ee-wo wanawawama, macha ha mrima hanjiwodye kyawo njiwaterewya ko Ruwa wahende wonyo okiio.
45010002	Kyamba nyi ngawawikya kiṟingishyo kye nyi wekekapa mtambakira wechipfula Ruwa, indi chi kya osaṟefo.
45010003	Kyamba ili walaweichi wuhoṟotsu wo Ruwa wakawetambahanya ikulikisha-ho wowo wawenyi nkyo kiletewa walakutambe na wuhoṟotsu wu wo Ruwa.
45010004	Kyamba mtsitsyonyi fo wuwawaso nao Kristo moendie oryo mwidiki wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
45010005	Kyamba kilya Mose ahambye kya wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo wuwewonyo kui mweeke fo wuwawaso kikeri kiile ke, “Nyi mtanyi mowutana chandu mawawaso hahambie nyio mndu echiwada moo na mweeke fowo.”
45010006	Kya indi wuhoṟotsu-wu oshangunyi lo Ruwa wuṟukye wuidikinyi wo wuhambye wudi, “Kulawone koihamba, mrimenyi fopfo, nyi o ku echidoya ruvehu?” (Lyo liwewa isotsa Kristo na wanda.)
45010007	“Ang'u nyi o ku echisoka na kulya ko wapfu.” (Lyo liwewa idosa Kristo ipfo ko wapfu naendo na huye.)
45010008	Madedo Maele hahambye. “Idedo lyo lya Ruwa lii afui, naiyo nyi likukerye ipfo dumbunyi lyapfo na ipfo ngoonyi yapfo.”
45010009	Kipfa komkooya kohamba na dumbu lyapfo kye Yesu nyio Mndumii na iidikya koidikya ipfo ngoonyi yapfo ke Ruwa nyi alemṟutsa ipfo wapfunyi nyi ochikiṟo.
45010010	Kyamba lumwidikya kui mrima liende wuhoṟotsu oshangunyi lo Ruwa; na imhamba kui dumbu liwonye mndu okiio.
45010011	Kyamba Madedo Maele hahambie, “Oryo mndu ose echimwidikya o echikaa nahoyo nyi sonupfo.”
45010012	Nyiko wandu wose; kwiho mletsano foletsana Wayuda na Wagrikipfo. Kyamba ichu umu nyio Mndumii owo wose nyi aisuṟia iwo wechimterewa wose.
45010013	Kyamba Madedo Maele hahambie “Oryo mndu echiterewa kui rina lya Mndumii nyi echikiṟo.”
45010014	Aka wechiidima imlaha wada walamwidikye ngesa? Indi wamwidikye wada walandeshikio mmbonyinyi tsake ngesa? Indi washikio wada mmbonyi tsake kulaiho mowaongoya ngesa?
45010015	A wandu waongwo wada walaiwadume ngesa? Chando kiikiṟehye ke, “Apa ndifo tsa waende ndumi ya Sia chando tsaona.”
45010016	Kya indi chi wose waleambia Ndumi ya Siapfo. Kyamba Yesaya ahambye, “Hoi Mndumii, nyio-wu aleidikya ndumi yadu?”
45010017	Kyasia wuidiki nyi wokeamtso nyi ndumi, indi ndumi nyi ikurye na idedo lya Kristo.
45010018	Ang'u njiwesenyi njihambe, Ngesa nyi waleleicho ndumi-yo? Ee-ko. Waleicho Kuwukye mangelele hawo hakadung'ana wanda ii kose, na madedo hawo hakatana hashika kulyando mtsitsio fo wuyana.
45010019	Ang'u njiwese-se, Kulako Waisraeli walaweichi ngesa? Nao nyi Mose alemhamba, “Inyi njechimutewa muhende inyeng'a wandu walai mkambo, mhenu inenga mukunyashe kya mkambo-fu fulaweimpfunde.”
45010020	Na Yesaya kawekaria kehamba, “Nyi njilekunda ikoyo nyi walya walawekenjipfula, ngawewonekya walya walawewesie mbonyi tsako.”
45010021	Indi Israeli kaiwia, “Njiwetsinda mkonu fose njechileshia mkambo hako mawoko fulanjidikye fukawewa mlemeshi.”
45011001	Ili nyi wudi kii ngahamba, Aka Ruwa nyi alekufunya wandu wake ngesa? Ote ko. Kyamba na inyi njii Mwisraeli njipaṟikye ipfo luwenyi lya Abrahamu njii o kishari kya Benyamin.
45011002	Ruwa afunye mkambo foke alemsambuṟa kachapfo. Ang'u mulaichi kilya Madedo Maele hahambia kya Elia ili alenunuwia Ruwa kechianduya Israeli kehamba.
45011003	“Hoi Mndumii, wamewaha waikimbi wapfo wakawesanya marasyo hapfo; na inyi mmonyi njitsihee-ho; nawo nyi injiṟinjawia moo fu wakeri.”
45011004	Ruwa nalemhaluo ada? “Na njikutsiheṟye-ho wasoṟo shiku mfungade sa welalepfirya Baali ndi.”
45011005	Nyi wudo kuwei na wulalu, kutsuhe mtsuharo sa Ruwa afusamburie njia ya wutonga.
45011006	Indi nyi njia ya wutonga wokye chi kui mawuto ha mndupfo. Kima shila wudo wutonga wuwekaa wui wutongapfo.
45011007	Kikuwukye-ho ki kyemanya ngesa? Waisraeli walekoya kilya waweikipfula-pfo mtsuhaṟo fulya nyi fulekikoya. Indi walya wengi wakakuumiṟa.
45011008	Chando kuu-kuṟehye, “Ruwa nyi alewaenengya mumuyo fo ihombya na meso halaambwo na madu halaicho shika mkonu fo inu.”
45011009	Na Dawidi nyi ahambye, “Kidembo kyawo kyelya kando kiwawiie mshihodi na mdeho, kiwahalukie hando hewalahutsa watayoho kiṟaache.
45011010	Meso hawo hahutsyo meema walawone kindo, na mhongo yawo uileme mlungana.”
45011011	Akale Kulako Wayuda nyi walekapa mtuulya itane warumara ngesa? Oo manya-le. Kya indi ipfo kundu warendemkye mpfondo na mkambo iya mhenu ilewonyo-ho okiio, nalo luhende iwamtsya Wayuda nawo wanyenyi wowanyenyia.
45011012	Indi komkoya iteremka lyawo lyamesuṟisha lidi wuyana na iho lyawo likawesuṟisha mkambo iya mhenu, nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa Wuholotsu wowo wochisurisha wengi mnu.
45011013	Nyi ngadeda nanyo mui wa mkambo mhenu. Ma ili nji-mdume njiwe msu ko mkambo mhenu na njiiwikya wupfuṟukanyi wu woko mng'ano.
45011014	Njechitambahanya yamtsa macha ha wa orukyenyi loko wamunyenyie kulako njechikiṟa-ho maata wawo.
45011015	Kyamba kokoya ipfo kundu wamhenda ileho-wo kukuwukye-ho kisanza wuyana na Ruwa, nyi-ki kyechiwuka ipfo kundo wehenda yambyo nyi Ruwa? Wapfu wechiṟuka!
45011016	Komkoya kipeṟengu kya mkate kii kiele, na mkate fo foose mso fo mruwe fui mwele na komkoya mri fo ikidi fumcha na maṟamba ho naho hamecha.
45011017	Indi komkoya maṟamba halya maata-ho ha msinepfu mcha halepahuo handu halya kukadongio ho iṟamba lya msinepfu fongeṟenyi. Kowa malungyo-ho na mru fo na malenda ha msinepfu,
45011018	kulapiṟe Ma kulakushelye oo maṟambenyi; indi kokunda ikushela manya chi iyo urie mru fo pfo nyifo sa fukurie iyo.
45011019	Kyasia nyi ochikuhambya-ng'u, “Maṟamba nyi ha-mapahwo-ng'u kundu njiodongyo-ho inyi.”
45011020	Na kicha; ho halemepahwo nyi kipfa halaweidikye, indi iyo uhoṟoki-ho kui pfinya ya mwidikye. Ma ulakung'anyishe, indi owuo.
45011021	Kyamba kokoya Ruwa amekeda alalindya Wayuda walya wai cha maṟamba halya ha kikaya, echikulindya iyopfo.
45011022	Kyasia keweringang'u woloru wo Ruwa na wunesi wokye. Wunesi nyi wuhoye walya warendemkye, indi wuoluṟu wo Ruwa wokukaya iyo kiwe ochikutamba na wuoloru-wu; shile nyi wudo na iyo na ochipahwo-ho.
45011023	Na Wayuda da wakada wupiṟi wowo wakaidikia Ruwa na wechikaa wadongyo-ho; Kyamba Ruwa nawode pfinya echiidima-se iwadongya-ho nawo.
45011024	Kyamba komkoya iyo ulepahwo ipfo msinepfunyi fui fo ngeṟenyi kowewuya idongyo ipfo msinepfunyi fulya mcha kulasumhana kikaya kyafo, nyi wuda kya wueṟa Wayuda wo wai wa kikya kyafo wechiwuya idongyo ipfo msinepfunyi fui fowo wawenyi.
45011025	Kyasia, wanawawama, njikundi mukae mulaichi kyama kyikoomepfo, mulawone mokusirya na wuṟango wonu wuwenyi kipfa wumi wokuumiṟa wo Wayuda waweny wo wulemhoya Israeli nyi wo oweṟe, kyayo itane wandu wa mkambo mhenu washikia Ruwa na menu yamhenda ishika iwonyo okiio.
45011026	Kikamewa kido na Israeli yose yechihenda ikiṟo, chando kuu-kuṟehye, “Nyi kulya Sionyi kochiwuka-ho mkira. Nyio sa echiletsa Yakobo wulemeshi wulya.
45011027	Nyifo mkundano foko njiwada nawo ilindi njechiwuta-ho manyamaṟo hawo.”
45011028	Kipfa kya ili waileha Ndumi ya Sia. Wayuda wai wakituwa wa Ruwa kui kiira kyanu, mkambo ingi lyo limanyikya konu, indi sumuhana na msambuṟye fulya wai wakunde wa Ruwa, lyo limanyikye ko waku wawo.
45011029	Kyamba shisumbo sha wutonga wo Ruwa na ndaho yake, sho sheteṟeshukasho.
45011030	Kyamba chando nyo muwelemye Ruwa ili kacha, indi wulalu momeenengo osaṟyo lokye iliindi wo wakaa welema.
45011031	Nyi wudo nawo nyi walemba walemeshi wulalu kipfa mohenda isaṟyo nyo, kundu wahende isaṟyo nawo wokya wulalu.
45011032	Kyamba Ruwa nyi asunguwanye wose ipfo kundo walemanye nao kundu nawawonye wose osaṟyo loke.
45011033	Apa wuleshe wo wusuṟi wo Ruwa na wo wuṟango woke na wulaanyi. Mdumbuye yake yedumbwo mondu chando shilechiwa isonjokoṟa chando tsilechiwa ihesho chandu kuikurehye.
45011034	Nyi o ku alememanya mahio ha Mndumii? Ang'u nyi wu awei mnjama oke?
45011035	Ang'u nyi o ku alesongwo imnenga kindo nawede echiwihiṟyo?
45011036	Kipfa nyio ai kimaenyi kya shindo shose, nao ai moshiwanzya mkaenyi, na kokye shechikaa shiinukye shose. Wuitoṟi nyi woke wokaa mlungana. Amenyi.
45012001	Ngashika aa ngamtutuma-ng'u, wanawawama, njiimwitike nyi osaṟyo lu lo Ruwa, kye mudambike mbihu yo yanu iwe kidaso kyele kii na moo kichihianyi na Ruwa; kiwe wuindi wonu wusumhanyi.
45012002	Ma mulawone mokuwakisha na wuyana-wu wo kiwulalu, kya indi muhende kuhalwo mochikulawukya mhie, kundu muidime iidikyana na kilya Ruwa akundi, kilya kii kicha kichihiṟye, kyawukye swai.
45012003	Kisumbo njii-msumbe nakyo kyanjienenga njiwie oryo mndu ose akeri ipfo konu, ke nalahie kyake kyekung'anyisha kyeng'anya kilya kimsuhananye, kya indi nahie-ho kyeidikya kidembo kyake chando Ruwa ahawye oryo mndu kiheo kya mwidikye.
45012004	Kyamba chando so lui na mbihu fuwode shiwungo shifoi, indi shiwungosho shilai shiwawasye iṟunda lya mbaṟi imu shose.
45012005	Nyi wudo naso lufoi ludi nyi lukeri mbihu fumu fuu-msanze Kristo-hu, indi kyadu so luikayana shiwungo.
45012006	Na shisumbo so lui-wasumbe shirianyi na wutonga wulya, sho shii shingi na shingi. Msa amsumbe wuikimbi naikimbe kisumhanye wuidiki.
45012007	Msa amsumbe waṟundi narunde. Msa amsumbe wuloshi naloshe.
45012008	Msa amsumbe chila yewhiria wengi moo nawewuta ado. Kwipfo ai motutuma, nawekaa echitutuma; kwipfo Sa ai mohawia wengi shindo awode nahawe ai msalari, kwipfo ai mosaṟya, nakae-ho echiṟamka. Na mosaria nasarie na sia.
45012009	Mkundie fukae fulawode wulembetseṟi. Tangaluonying'u kilya kii kiwicho, mukuwawe na kilya kii kicha.
45012010	Mkundana fonu fokundana fuwe fo wakanyi kamu, ngapano moira iwe yewikyana wuindi.
45012011	Mulalehele ihidya siṟi, mwakye-akye mrimenyi yanu mochisingya Mndumii.
45012012	Ipfo kikusihyonyi kyanu mbechihio, ipfo shiwirenyi mukuhode, ipfo wuindinyi woiterewa mukae-pfo kiheri kyose.
45012013	Mudaṟane na wandu wa Ruwa kya shindo wawuṟye, mukukambiṟe ihida wahenu kui wulalutsa.
45012014	Walya waimterengya muwawikye ona. Ee-wo iwawikya ona, ma mulawasese.
45012015	Kewechihionyi kimu na iwo wawachihie, muwelia na iwo welia.
45012016	Muwe mochikayana kui mhie fumu koorio mndu, mulawone mochihia kya shidembo shesonguo, kya indi muchumie muwodanyi na walya watutu. Mulakutane waṟango nyo muwenyi.
45012017	Kiwicho mndu aimbutia mulawone mochimtaa na kiwicho kingi; muwe mochikusaṟa isho shii shicha ipfo sumuhana na wandu wose.
45012018	Kokoya kyewa-ho kui pfinya yo nyo murie, kewadyenying'u wandu wose ofoṟo.
45012019	Wana wa wama, Ma mulatae kiṟaache deyenyi Ruwa, kyamba kui kurehye kiraache nyi kyako inyi, nyio inyi njechitaa. Nyi wudo Mndumii ahambye.
45012020	Kya indi iyo mkituwa opfo kawado nyi njaa kewemnenge shelya, kawado n nyoda kewemrutse mṟinga; kowika kudo nyi ochimsanya okaa lwakye oo mdo-hu foke.
45012021	Ulakunde iwinzo nyi kilya kii kiwicho, kya indi kilya kii kiwicho ukiwinze ochiwuta kii kicha.
45013001	Oryo mndu nawe moanguya wanene wo waitoṟie oruka madu, kyamba kulaiho wuitoṟi shile na iwo wuwukye ko Ruwa; waitoṟi-wo wakeri-ho m wawawikye-ho nyi Ruwa.
45013002	Nkyo kimaduma mndu molemana na mawawaso ha waitoṟi wo, nyi alemanyi na kilya Ruwa akiwikye. Indi walemanyi-wo nyi wechikuwonya wudeheli wawenyi.
45013003	Kyamba wanene wa mengenyi wo walaendye mndu wuowu kya ko wandu wecha, kya indi nyi waende wuowu kya ko wandu wawicho Kokoya ulakundi iowuo waitoṟi wuta mecha nao nechikuṟumisha.
45013004	Kyamba nyi wukukerye-ho mpfruṟukanyi mokupfuṟukanya iyo kya wucha. Indi komkoya owuta kii kiwicho owuo, kyamba walakupfungye oshu kya wulya; kyamba nyi wukeri mpfuṟukanyi o Ruwa mowonya mndu awutye owicho wudeheli wurio nyi tuuke iya ya Ruwa.
45013005	Ko ikyo kiwaṟi iindia wanene wadu, chi kipfa kya tuuke iya ya Ruwa tupupfo, kya indi na kipfa kya ngo tsa mrima.
45013006	Nkyo kimaduma mokyetaa na okamba, wasongoru wo kyamba wakukerye wechiṟundya Ruwa iawutsia iṟunda lyawo.
45013007	Kewenengenyi wose kiwasumhanye, mowesa okamba, mtaenyi okamba, sa ai mosuhuṟa, muwemsuhuṟya, sa aoweshye muvemowuo, moindyo kewemwindyenyi.
45013008	Mulakae na sile ya mndu ma iwe ya iki, shile na iya ya ikundana; kyamba icho mokunda odoe nyio aawutsye wuwawaso.
45013009	Kyamba ili lihambye; ulaṟuhuye, ulawaahe, ulaiwe, ulalange, ma kokooya kwipfo iwawaso lingi ma likawa lihya, nyi hamawunge-wunge na idedo-li, kye kunda odoo chandu ukukundi iyo kumonyi.
45013010	Mndu akundi odoe ekembutia kiwichopfo. Nahong'u ikunda odoya lyo lyekeawutsya wuwawaso.
45013011	Wikyenyi mudo mui wandu waichi heri kye saa yamshika yekure-ng'u madonyi; kyamba oletso lodu wulalu nyi lui afui na kota lyandi lulewoka iidikya.
45013012	Kio kyaitika ihenda mfiri nyi icha fukeri. Ili kii kido lukuatwo mawuto hose ha meema luṟae shisha sha sa.
45013013	Luchumie lui na sonu njicha tsisumhanye mfiri, lulawone lokaa na tsilya mbicho tsa ringinyi ma tsa wunanzinyi ma tsa wumeluki ma tsa sheeṟe ma tsa isohuo mondu ma tsa idosa nyashi.
45013014	Kya indi kuṟaaenyi Mndumii Yesu Kristo, mfo mṟaae fonu, mukuṟise kundu iwetesya moo lilawone lyechiamtsa lango mbicho.
45014001	Msa afafae wuidiki kewemambyenyi mulawone mochimitika hando akangashia.
45014002	Wandu wailachikanyi: Ichu umu nyi akusirye kyelya shindo shose na ichu ungi afafae adi kui wuidiki nyi ekelya mboha tupu.
45014003	Ichu ekelya shelya shose nalawone kechimina ichu alalya shose. Ma ichu ekyelya mboha tupu nalawone kechihutsya ichu ekelya shelya shose owingo; kyamba Ruwa nyi awemwambye nao.
45014004	A iyo nyi o wu notane oanduya mṟundi o mndu ungi? Nyi Mndumii okye amonyi ekembanza mafuo hakye ang'u imwolotsa wanda; indi nyi echihoṟoka kyamba Mndumii ai na pfinya yemhoṟotsa.
45014005	Mndu nekeidima iwona mfiri mliwe fumcha kota ingi, ichu ungi ekeindya mfiri yoose chando yambanyi: Oryo mndu nakuwangye necha mhionyi foke fumenyi.
45014006	Ichu ekyeindia mkonu mliwe nyi ekefuwiluya iindia Mndumii; na ichu molya shelya nyi awelia Mndumii oke, kyamba nyi aidapfuma-ho Ruwa. Na ichu ekekuotoya ilya nyi awekuotoya ichihiṟa Mndumii na idapfuma kaidafuma Ruwa.
45014007	Kyamba kodu kulaipfo mokulisiṟa na moo foke amonyi, ma kulaipfo mokupfia opfu loke amonyi.
45014008	Kyamba ili mandi lui-ho na moo nyio Mndumii luimpfuṟukanya nafo, ili mandi loshika ihenda ipfa, nyio Mndumii lohenda impfia. Kyasia lukaa-ho na moo ang'u lukapfa na luwei wa Mndumii.
45014009	Kimaduma kya ikyo Kristo alepfa kawuya kaṟuka, nyi kundu nawe Mwitoṟi o iwo wapfie na iwo wai na moo.
45014010	A iyo nyi kiili oanduya manomayo? Ang'u iyo, nyi kiili uminye manomayo? Kyamba so lose nyi lochikaa lushike ihoṟoka alya mbai ya loṟika lo ianduyo lo Ruwa.
45014011	Kyamba kuu-kuṟehye; Mndumii ahambye, so inyi njii na moo, orio mndu nechinjipfiria ndi na oryo olimi lochichika ke inyi nyi Ruwa.
45014012	Kikawa kido oryo mndu odu nyi echikaa nahoṟokye kii kyake o amonyi ipfo oshungunyi lo Ruwa.
45014013	Nahong'u kya indi muitike ideda kya iki, ke kulakae-ho echiendie manomae tewe ang'u paṟi lya mrima ang'u imtewa nawute wunyamaṟi.
45014014	Inyi njiichi njikusihye Mndumii Yesu kye kwipfo kindo kirie tewepfo.
45014015	Kyamba kokoya manomayo ahenda iwichuṟo nyi mlie fopfo okichumia mhendo furio nyi ikundapfo. Manya kulawone kochidekesha kui mlie fu fopfo ichu alepfio nyi Kristo.
45014016	Kilya kyanu kii kicha mulalekye kiisalucho.
45014017	Kyamba Wumangi wo Ruwa chi wukeri mlie na mnyoepfo, kya indi nyi wukeri wuhoṟotsu na ofoṟo na wukesi wokuṟamkya-ho kui Mumuyo Mwele.
45014018	Kyamba ichu akuwodye na ikyo awa mopfuṟukanya-ho Kristo nyio sa achihiṟye Ruwa kawekundo nyi wandu.
45014019	Ili nyi wudo kii luwingye isho shiende ofoṟo na isho shepfungana so luwenyi na wenyi.
45014020	Ma kulawone kochifurunja irunda lya Ruwa kui marekyano ha mlie fo shelya. Shelya shoose shii shiheṟemtsu kya indi ko ichu echilya kindo kepfio nyi mdo, ipfo kokye kyechiwa nyi wunyamaṟi.
45014021	Kiwe kicha-ho nyi koda kulalya nyama; ma inyo mpfinyo; ma ilya kyelya kingi kyekeendye manomayo ikapya-ho mtuulya.
45014022	Nyi mwidikye uifukaya wocho? Ufukaye kya ora lo-kopfo ukeri oshangunyi Ruwa. Nanga icho alakuendye owingo amonyi lo Ruwa. Nanga icho alakuendye owingo amonyi ipfo kundo akudumbuya kya kindo kiwe.
45014023	Indi ichu echilya kepfiopfio mdo o nyi ai mbonye owingo, kipfa awuta kilai-kiamtse nyi mwidikye. Na oryo kindo kilechiwuto na mweke fo mwidikye kyo kii wunyamaṟi.
45015001	Indi so luwangi wuidikinyi kiluwaṟi idaṟana na waleheshi walya hando wafafae, lulawone lochikulisiṟa luwenyi.
45015002	Oryo mndu odu nawe molisiṟa odoe na kilya kii kicha kiwe kyechimira.
45015003	Kyamba nao Kristo alalekulisiṟa amonyi, kya indi kiwehendekye kuu-kuṟehye, “Shiisalucho sha walya walekuisalucha iyo nyio inyi shikanjihoya.”
45015004	Kyamba shilya shileṟehyo mbooko nyi shilemmaa iṟehyo shelulosha-so, kundu lukuwutye ikaa lochikusihya ipfo kundo mṟeho-yo ihambye ikukarishya lya waidiki wa kacha yechiluwihiṟya nalyo moo.
45015005	Nao Ruwa chu ai mokarisha na iwihiṟya moo namuenenge muwe mochikusaṟa kimu nyo muwenyi na weny, kiwe kyechihiana na Yesu Kristo.
45015006	Kundu muwe mochiwikya Ruwa mng'ano, ichu ai Nde o Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo, fuwe fochiwikyo-ho kui mrima ii msanze cha ili kui-ho modeda umu mfi.
45015007	Nkyo kimwitike muhende yambyana nyo muwenyi na wenyi chando na Kristo alewemuambya nyo kyewikya Ruwa mng'ano.
45015008	Kyamba ngamuwia Kristo nyi alewa mopfuṟukanya Wayuda kemanyisha-ho kiwulohi kya Ruwa nainutsye-ho shaasa Ruwa shilya waku walya walewikyo,
45015009	kundu mkambo iya mhenu waṟumishe Ruwa kipfa kya osaṟio loke lowasaṟya. Chando kuu-kuṟehye, Nkyo kyaenenga njechikuṟumisha ipfo mkambonyi mhenu na iimbya kiṟumi kya rina lyapfo.
45015010	Kukawuya kukahambo-se; Nyo mkambo mhenu ke chihionyi kimu na mkambo fu foke.
45015011	Na lingi-se, “Keichikenyi Mndumii nyo yoose mbaṟi tsa wandu, mkambo yo iwe yechimwichika yose.”
45015012	Na lingi-se Yesaya ahambye, “Kochicha mndu kuwuka kisharinyi kya Yese, msa echiikolonya mkambo ya wandu, nao nyio wa mkambo-ii wechimwidikia.”
45015013	Nao Ruwa-chu mokusihyo adi nawe mombonya nyo mfeṟa fo oryo msiha fose na ofoṟo shirianyi na mwidikye fomwidikya kundu mukusuṟye necha mui na mkusihye kui pfinya ya Mumuyo Mwele.
45015014	Na inyi mmonyi, wanawawama, njikusirya kyanu nyo ke muwelukye wutechi welu mukaichuo wulaanyi wose mukatana moidima iloshana muwenyi.
45015015	Indi njilawode wuowu ngaṟehya mbonyi kui shinengele cha ili njimtamra njiimchihie nyi wutonga njimsumbe nyi Ruwa.
45015016	Mumanye ke inyi njii mwongoi o Kristo Yesu a-mdume ko mkambo ya wandu mhenu njiwe mowoongoya Ndumi ya Sia ya Ruwa ya okiio, kundu wa mbaṟi tsingi tsa wandu wawe odambiko luchihianyi na Ruwa lui-uheṟemtse nyi Mumuyo Mwele.
45015017	Mpfo kundo kiṟumi kya wusongoṟu woko kiwukye iki njiwode ipfo Kristo-hu Yesu wopfuṟukanya shilya shii sha Ruwa.
45015018	Kyamba njilakarya ihamba kindo shile nyi shilya Kristo aletana anjiwode kihia kyake kyeangushya mkambo mhenu madu kui ideda na iwuta.
45015019	Kikawa kui pfinya ya shichano na maṟiho shiweiwiko nyi Mumuyo Mwele, fo Ruwa. Kui ichumia lyako orio handu, wokya Yerusalemu ngashika Iliriko, ngaonguo Ndumi ya Sia ya Kristo kui Wusalari.
45015020	Indi ngakunyasha njidi kye njechiongoya Ndumi ii ya Sia kundo kulandesendyo rina lya Kristo, njilawone njechihenda iwika mba ipfo kundo ungi awehye-ho otende.
45015021	Kya indi kihendekye chando kuukuṟehye, “Iwo walandeongoyo mbonyi tsake wahende imbona, na iwo welandeicho kyake wahende immanya.”
45015022	Nakyo nyikyo kiwenjishingye njia kafoi yeshika konu.
45015023	Indi wulalu ngamemarisa iṟunda kunu; na kyamba kafoi mbewodo nyi macha heshika konu; njiicha wulalu.
45015024	Mbekundi iwonana nanyo njechiida ihenda Hispanyia njiwoneho na kyentarama ipfo kyaṟonyi ngamaa isuṟa nanyo macha.
45015025	Indi wulalu njiihenda Yerusalemu itarama wandu wa Ruwa walya ngaya.
45015026	Siṟi tsa Makedonyia na Akaaya waleteṟia ilekia kitarama ketarama wandu wa Ruwa wai wakiwa ipfo Yerusalemu.
45015027	Nyi kiwachihiṟye kihendeke kidi, na wakerye-ho na wasile wawo; kyamba ili wa mkabo mhenu wamesanzyo iambia mboṟa tsa kimrima sha Wayuda nyi kiwewawaṟi wawewaikanya Wayuda wo na shichoṟe shawo sha kimbihu.
45015028	Nahong'u ngamemarisa iki na iwikya osano luwewatowokye ludi mhuri foko ipfo kowo njechiira kyaṟo kyehenda Hispanyia njiide konu.
45015029	Na njichi ngacha na konu njechicha njirie mofoeṟa fo ona luwukye ko Kristo.
45015030	Nanyo wanawawama, ngamterewa mnu njikuwode na Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo na ikunda lya Mumuyo ke muwe mochikusanza na inyi ngapanonyi monjiterewya ko Ruwa.
45015031	Kundu njihendeletso walemeshi walya wa ipfo Yudaya na osano loko loendye Yerusalemu luhende ichihiana na wandu walya wa Ruwa.
45015032	Kundu njishike konu njiwodo nyi sia njechiwihiṟyo moo hamu nanyo chandu Ruwa akundi.
45015033	Na Ruwa-chu menyi ofoṟo nakae nanyo mose. Amenyi.
45016001	Ngakunda imumanyisha Foibe mshiki odu, ai mrundi siṟinyi ya Kenkirea.
45016002	Kundenyi imwambya mui-wasanze na Mndumii chandu kiwaṟi wandu wa Ruwa mumtarame oryo hando awuṟie-ho nahende ihoṟokyo; cha kipfa nao nyi awei motarama sa wafoi kawenjitarama na inyi.
45016003	Njiiṟikiṟyenyi Pirisika na Akila iwa wai wakyando wako wa Kristo-hu Yesu.
45016004	Nyiwo sa werekye moo yawo wawenyi kyeletsa moo foko, ma chi inyi njimwaana mmonyi tupupfo sile nyiso na siṟi tsa mkambo iya mhenu tsose.
45016005	Njiiṟikiṟyenyi na siṟi iya wekyekusanza mbenyi tsawo. Kewenjiiṟikyṟienyi Epaineto mkunde oko, nyio sa aleasa ihalukya Kristo ipfo Asia.
45016006	Munjiiṟikiṟye Maria icho alekuwinyisha mnu kelupfuṟukanya.
45016007	Muwenjiiṟikiṟya-wo Andironyiko na Yunyia washari wako waweei wapfunge kipfungonyi hamu na inyi, nyiwo wandu wamanyikie wa kiidi kya wasu wakawenjisongoya na iwa wandu wa Kristo.
45016008	Njiiṟikiṟyenyi Ampiliato mkunde oko o Mndumii-hu.
45016009	Njiiṟikiṟyenyi Uribano mokyando oko o Kristo-hu na Stakisi mkunde oko.
45016010	Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Apele icho na mtaanye mndu mkristo, kewenjiiṟikiṟyenyi walya wai kanyi ko Aristobulo.
45016011	Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Herodion mshari oko. Muwenjiiṟikiṟya iwo wa mba ya Narikiso wai wa Mndumii.
45016012	Kenjiiṟikiṟyenyi Trufaina na Trifosa wawei wapfurukanyi wa Mndumii. Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Peri mkunde ichu awewinye mnu kya Mndumii.
45016013	Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Rufo ichu ngohoda inganyi mnu a-msambuṟye Mndumii na mae cho ai mae na wama.
45016014	Kewenjiṟikiṟienyi Asinyikrito na Filegonyi na Herime na Patiroba na Herima na wanawamadu wai hamu nawo.
45016015	Muwenjiiṟikiṟya Filologo na Yulia na Neri na mshiki oke na Olimpa na wandu wose wa Ruwa wai handu hamu nawo.
45016016	Muiṟikiṟane nyo muwenyi na wenyi mochihekyana momu kui mhekye mwele. Siṟi tsa Kristo tsose tsamwiṟikiṟa.
45016017	Lanye wanawawama, ngamtutuma muringe mnu weitsaho mpaṟakano weitsa shipaṟatsana na shilahutsa shilya shikapanyi na opfundo lulya mui-wapfunde, mukushowe mnu kyawo.
45016018	Kyamba iwo wai wadichi, Mndumii odu Kristo waimṟundyapfo, kya indi nyi wekeṟundya ndewu tsawo wakalemba ngoo tsa wandu wai malala wechideda madedo mecha na sumu tseloda.
45016019	Kyamba nyi mumanyikye kose kya wuhendeli wonu; nkyo kyanjienenga ngachihio kyanu. Njikundi muwe waṟango ko mbonyi njicha; mulawode paṟi ko mbonyi njiwicho.
45016020	Na Ruwa-cho menyi ofoṟo nyi echikaa natseneheṟye Satan ipfo shiya madende hanu owinyi. Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu wukae nanyo.
45016021	Timoteo mokyando oko nyi wamwiṟikiṟa na Lukio na Yason na Sosipatro nyiwo washari wako.
45016022	Nao inyi Tertio moṟehya baruo ii kui Mndumii na ngamwiṟikiṟa.
45016023	Gayo ichu akeri oṟicho loko na lo siṟi yose na amwiṟikiṟa. Erasto-chu mheki o mṟi wamwiṟikiṟa na Kwarto monowama. [
45016024	Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo wukae nanyo mose. Amenyi.]
45016025	Ruwa nyio aidima imukapya owanzo kechimteteṟa na Ndumi ya Sia ya Okiio yehamba Yesu Kristo nyiyo ii njikeri iiongoya na otambahaluo lo kyaama kilya kiwekaa kiweikikoome maheri halya halunganyi.
45016026	Indi kikahenda imanyisho kiheri kya wulalu na mweeke fo Mṟeho iya ya waikimbi, kui iwawasa lya Ruwa-chu o mlungana lyewawusa yanguya wuidiki madu, iwu wuu-wuṟingishye mkambo mhenu yose.
45016027	Nyio Ruwa ai mṟango o amonyi nakae echiwikyo mng'ano kui Yesu Kristo maheri hose halunganyi. Amenyi.
46001001	Inyi Paulo njii msu o Kristo Yesu njiimsambuṟe njido kui kyama kya Ruwa, so na Sostene manowama.
46001002	Loiṟikiṟa siṟi ya Ruwa ikeri ipfo Korinto luweiṟikiṟa iwa wai-waheṟemtse kui Kristo Yesu, wai wa kikale wasambuṟe wo na wengi wose welaha rina lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo oryo handu ha kowo na kodu.
46001003	Wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo shiwukye ko Ruwa Wande odu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
46001004	Njiiana Ruwa oko kitsitsi kimaduma kyanu kipfa kya osaṟyo lo Ruwa mui-waenenge ipfo kundo mukuwode na Kristo Yesu.
46001005	Kyamba musuṟie kya oryo kindo mukuwode nao kiwe kya oryo idedo kiwewa kya oryo mtambahalukye.
46001006	Kikatanyika kui kiṟingishyo kyehamba Kristo ili kilembanzyo kido ipfo konu.
46001007	Nakyo kikaenenga mulatiyo nyi kisumbo ma kida ma kida mukakaa mochiwedya ikuloṟa lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
46001008	Nao nyio echiwa momkapya owanzo itane masiiyonyi mulawonyo tewe mkonu fulya fo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
46001009	Ruwa ai mhendeli, nao nyio amemlahya kilunganyonyi kyelungana na Manoke Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu.
46001010	Indi ngamututuma lanye wanawawama kui rina lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo ke muwe mochideda kimu mose, ipfo konu kulakae-pfo ndutsano kya indi mukae-ho mui-waṟeheṟye mhie fumu na mdumbuye fumu.
46001011	Kyamba njii-mmanyishye nyi walya wai wa mba ya Kloe kyanu wanawawama wako, ke ipfo konu kuipfo wuṟingi.
46001012	Indi hando ngahongya-ho na ha-le; ke oryo mndu o konu ekehamba kiwungi, umu, inyi njii o Paulo, na ungi, inyi njii o Apolo, na ungi, inyi njii o Kefa na ungi, inyi njii o Kristo.
46001013	Alae! Kristo nyi ahawukanyi? Paulo nyi ambambye msalabenyi kimaduma kyanu? Ang'u nyi muiwapatisie rina lya Paulo ko?
46001014	Njiiana Ruwa kipfa ndapatisye mndu ipfo konu shile Krispo na Gayo.
46001015	Kulashike ihamba ke momepatisyo rina lyako inyi.
46001016	Indi ipatisa njilempatisase na wa mba ya Stefano. Ngoseṟa ya iwo njiichi kokoya njipatisye mndu ungipfo.
46001017	Kyamba Kristo alanjitanye msu nyi kundu njipatise, kya indi nyi kundu njiongwo ndumi ya sia yo okiio. Nalyo lilawe kui madedo ha wuṟango kundu msalaba fo Kristo fulahendewiro.
46001018	Kyamba ndumi ya msalaba ikerye iwo wehenda deka wutambashi, kya indi kyadu so wehenda kiṟo ikulukerye finya ya Ruwa.
46001019	Kyamba kii-kiṟehye kii-le; Njechirumatsa wuṟango wo iwo wai waṟango na ikombetsa wulaanyi wo iwo welaya shindo.
46001020	Mndu mṟango nyi ku aya? Mndu mlaanyi o shitabu nyi ku aya? Mndu mwiichi motambahanya njo-pfundo tsa maindi ha nyi ku-aya?
46001021	Cha kipfa ipfo kundo wuyana wu wulawemanya Ruwa kui wuṟango wowo nyi kuwewode wuṟango wo Ruwa kikachihiana na Ruwa ikiṟa waidiki kui mwongoye fusolongi.
46001022	Cha kipfa Wayuda wekewesa shichano na Wagriki waipfula wuṟango.
46001023	Kya indi so luionguo Kristo ambambie msalabe-hu. Lyo lyaenenga Wayuda wekapa tuulya likawia wa mkambo mhenu wutondo.
46001024	Kya indi iwo wai-walahe ma wai Wayuda ma wai Wagriki kowo Kristo aiwawiia pfinya ya Ruwa na wuṟango wo Ruwa.
46001025	Kipfa kilya kii kya wutondo kichee ko Ruwa kyo ki na wuṟango wukaida wo wandu na kilya kii kya wufafa kirianyi na Ruwa kyo kii na pfinya ikaida ya wandu.
46001026	Keambuyenyi ndaho yanu, wanawawama wako, nyi kuwode waṟango wa kiwandu wafoipfo ma wenyi pfinya ma wai wasongoru.
46001027	Kya indi shilya shii-shitane sha wutondo nyi wuyana wu nyisho Ruwa ameshisambuṟa shesonusha waṟango, na shilya shifafa sha iya wuyana nyi sho Ruwa alesanga nahutsye nasho shilya shiapfinya sonu.
46001028	Na shilya shilawei na kiṟumi kunu wuyana na shilya siwei shipiṟe nyisho Ruwa kashisanga shilawei kindo kundu nahaluo shilya shii kindo maai.
46001029	Kikahendeka kido kundu kulakae-ho mndu ai nyama echikushela ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa.
46001030	Na ipfo koke kwenyi kimaenyi kyanu kikeri ili mui Kristo-hu Yesu, nyio amelutaanyo nyi Ruwa wuṟango na wuhoṟotsu na wuiilisho na oletso.
46001031	Kihendeke chandu kii-kiṟehye ke; Mokushela nakushele kui Mndumii.
46002001	Na inyi lyandi ndecha na konu-le wanawawama, njechimwongoya kiṟingishyo kii-kiwike nyi Ruwa njilalecha na mtandawuko fo madedo na fo wuṟango.
46002002	Kyamba njilalehamba njiichi kindo ipfo konu shile nyi Yesu Kristo nao nyi ili ambambye adi msalabenyi.
46002003	Njiwekukerye konu na mkao fo wufafa na wuowu na mdedema.
46002004	Na ili njiweideda na yonguo ma njileidimaidima na wuṟango woitika iwinapfo kya indi njiwemanyishya-ho Mumuyo na pfinya.
46002005	Kundu mwidikye fonu fulakae wuṟango-hu wo ki-wandu kya indi wuwe fu-mbike kui pfinya ya Ruwa.
46002006	Sha wuṟango na lushiwode sheongoya walya wai waholoki, indi wuṟango wu wulai wo maindi ha ki-wulalu manya wo waitoṟi wa ki-wulalu ki kyerumara.
46002007	Kya indi luihamba wuṟango wo Ruwa wo kisenyi wui wukoome wusa Ruwa aweteṟye. Maheri halawendewiko woluwonya so wuitoṟi.
46002008	Kyawo waitoṟi wa maindi ha ki-wulalu walawewuichi ma umu-ho. Cha kipfa nokoe wawewuichi wawechiwambya Mndumii menyi wuitori msalabenyipfo.
46002009	Kyakyo kikeri chando kiikiṟehye, “Shilya riso lya mndu lilawewona ma kudu kulaweicho, manya shilaweida na ngoonyi ya mndu o wandu, nyisho Ruwa aweshiṟeheṟye walya wamkundi.”
46002010	Natso nyio Ruwa alelutaṟa-mbuya kui Mumuyo. Kyamba mumuyo asumye shose na shiṟike sha kisenyi kya Ruwa.
46002011	Kyamba ipfo wandunyi nyi o ku aichi shilya shiwode mndu shile nyi mumuyo fo mndu fui nao? Nyi wudo na shilya sha Ruwa kulaipfo msa aichi shile Mumuyo o Ruwa.
46002012	Natso lulaleambya mumuyo fo wuyana, kya indi nyi Mumuyo awukye ko Ruwa kundu lukuwutye-ho imanya shilya luiwasumbe nyi Ruwa chando shii.
46002013	Nasho nyisho luideda kyasho chi kui madedo ha-masungusie na wuṟango wo kiwandu, kya indi ha-mawike nyi Mumuyo, lochilinganyisha shilya sha Mumuyo na mweke fo Mumuyo.
46002014	Indi mndu o mhendeshye fo kiwandu ekeambyana na shilya shii sha Mumuyo o Ruwapfo, kyamba shembiia wutondo nalaidime ishimanya, kipfa shekewa itichyo kui njia ya Mumuyo tupu.
46002015	Indi mndu msumbe Mumuyo eketichya shose nao amonyi alawa itichio nyi mndu.
46002016	Kyamba nyi o ku aichi mhie ya Mndumii awechimloṟa njia. Indi so lui na mhie fo Kristo.
46003001	Na inji le, wanawawama wako, njileidima ideda nanyo cha wa kimumuyopfo kya indi cha wa kimbihu, cha wanangu wa kikristo.
46003002	Njilemurutsa maruwa njilalemwinenga kyelya kyumu kipfa mulawemekiidime. Ee ma wulalu moekiidima-pfo.
46003003	Kyamba ma wulalu da mukeri-se wa-kimbihu. Kyamba ili ipfo konu kuwode wunyenyi na wuṟingi chi mui wa-kimbihu mochikuhendeshya mbaṟi ya kiwandu?
46003004	Nyi kokoya kwipfo ehamba, inyi njii o Paulo, na ungi ehaba, inyi njii o Apolo, chi ideda mbaṟi ya kiwandu mui?
46003005	Alewo Apolo nyi ai ki, na Paulo nyi ai ki? Nyi wakeri wapfuṟu-kanyi mulemidikisho nyiwo na oryo ose aweiṟunda kiheo kilya Mndumii alemnenga.
46003006	Inyi ndewaya Apolo kanosa, kya indi moalutsa shose nyio Ruwa.
46003007	Kokoya nyi wudo kii mowaya chi kindopfo ma ichu monosa chila Ruwa moalutsa nyio.
46003008	Kya indi mowaya na monosa wahianyi, na oryo owo echiwona woṟunda woke wumsumhanye o wuidikyanyi na mawina hake.
46003009	Kyamba so luiṟunda kimu na Ruwa, nyo mui ndonga ya Ruwa, mui wiko lya Ruwa.
46003010	Kui kiheo kya wutonga wo Ruwa njii-msumbe nyi ngamewika kiwanja cha mpfuru mṟango na ungi kawika-ho mba. Kya indi oryo ose moiwika-ho naṟunde na osaṟe.
46003011	Kyamba kulaipfo mndu aidima iwika kiwanja kingi shie nyi kilya kilemmaa iwiko, nyikyo Yesu Kristo.
46003012	Na kokoya mndu awika kiwanje-hu ki sahabu ang'u fesa ang'u maho maili pang'a ang'u shidi ang'u nyatsi ang'u mamwahiṟo.
46003013	Kyasia kiṟundyo kya oryo mndu kyechiwoneka na pata, kyamba mkonu fulya fulya fochikimanyisha kipfa nyi fochikuwonekya furie modo, na modo fu fumenyi nyi fochihamba kiṟundyo kya oryo mndu ke nyi kiwei kya mbaṟi nki.
46003014	Kiṟundyo kya mndu awikye-ho kikakaa-ho kiwangi echiambya woṟunda woke.
46003015	Kiṟundyo kya mdu kikasenekya echiwudetsyo, indi o amonyi echiletso likawa cha lya mndu mokiia modo.
46003016	Mulaichi ke, nyo nyi hekalu lya Ruwa na ke, Mumuyo mwele ai mokaa nanyo sho?
46003017	Kokoya mndu anyamaṟa hekalu lya Ruwa, na Ruwa echinyamaṟa mdu cho. Kyamba hekalu lya Ruwa lii yele, nalyo nyi nyo.
46003018	Kulakae-pfo echikulemba amonyi. Kokoya kwiipfo konu akuwona amonyi ke aa mṟango na maindi ha kiwulalu, nakuwiie tondo nakuwutie-ho ihenda ṟanguo.
46003019	Kyamba wuṟango wo wuyana wu nyi wutondo ipfo sumuhana na Ruwa. Kyamba kii-kiṟehye kii-le, “O nyio mochawilia waṟango ipfo mlemekonyi yawo.”
46003020	Na lingi-se lyehamba, “Mndumii aichi makusaṟo ha waṟango ke nyi hai ha maai.”
46003021	Kokoya nyi wudo kii kulakae-pfo echiku-shela na mndu o wandu kyamba nyi hanu hose.
46003022	Liwe nyi Paulo, liwe nyi Apolo, liwe nyi Kefa, liwe nyi wuyana wu, liwe nyi moo, liwe nyi opfu liwe nyi shindo shi-ho liwe nyi shilya shekaa shiwe, shose nyi shanu.
46003023	Nanyo nyi mui wa Kristo, na Kristo nyi o Ruwa.
46004001	Na wudo so oryo mndu nalutane waṟundi wa Kristo na waheki wa kyama ki-koome kya Ruwa.
46004002	Kikawa kido kitsuhae kyeringa waheki nyi nashike iwono ai mteechi.
46004003	Kokoya ngahenda idumbuyo n-nyo mdumbuye mliwe ang'u nyi ngadumbuyo nyi menge ya kiwandu kiwe lyo likerye inyi kindo sa kitutu. Ma inyi ngakudumbuya mdumbuye njimonyipfo.
46004004	Kyamba njilaichi kitewe. Kya indi ki kyansumhantsakyo, modumbuo kyako nyi Mndumii.
46004005	Nkyo kimaduma mulahende idumbuo kiheri kilandewiṟa itane Mndumii ache ichu echiendie senyi shindo shii-shiṟikishe meemenyi na itambaṟuya necha patehu chila tsikuwode ngoonyi Mandi na halya oryo mndu ose kiṟumi kilya kimsumhanye nyi echiwikyo nyi Ruwa.
46004006	Nasho wanawawama, ngameshihalutsya ora lo kodu so na Apolo kimaduma kyanu, kundu mukuwutye kodu imanya ke kulatole shilya shii-shiṟehye, kundu ichu umu nalakushelye-ho kya ichu umu kechilehana na wengi kya ichu ungi.
46004007	Kyamba nyi o ku akuwika iyo mdonyi. Nyi kiki ukiwode ulakiambye? Na kiwe nyi ukiambye nyi kyaki ukushela cha nyi kulakiambye?
46004008	Mulemmaa ihuda mulemmaa ikusuṟia mulemmaa iwada wumangi tare so? Na kiwechiwa nanga mukawewona wumangi wu kundu naso lukae wumanginyi wu handu hamu nanyo.
46004009	Kyamba ngahamba ke Ruwa alutanye so wasu luwe wandu wakinga numa luwe wepfa lukamewiia wuyana ṟiho lyeṟihisha wamalaika na wandu.
46004010	So lui matondo kimaduma kya Kristo, indi nyo mui waṟango kui Kristo. So nyi wafafa indi nyo nyi wawanzi. Nyo mui na kiṟumi kicha so lui na wusutsu.
46004011	Luwodo nyi njaa na nyoda shika saa ii lui nayo wulalu tichi lu wakuye maṟao lukapo ngapo lulawode kanyi kokaa.
46004012	Luiwina lochiluya moo kui maṟunda ha mawoko hadu luwenyi. Hando lohenda irumo nyi lowika-ho ona, hando lohenda iterengyo nyi lokutirisia.
46004013	Hando lohenda iiryo kui wongo nyi lokededa kya wucha. Lui-watane maseheṟo ha wuyana luwembiia wose kindo kya manyeena shika inu.
46004014	Ishi chi ngashiṟehya kundu njimhutsye sonupfo, kya indi kundu njimtutume nasho mui wana wako wakunde.
46004015	Ma muwei na waichi wemwichia Kristo shiku na shiku chi muwode mudi na wemfee wafoipfo, kyamba nyio inyi njilemfee njii Kristo-hu kui ndumi ya sia ya okiio.
46004016	Nkyo kyantewa ngamtutuma ke muwe mokuwakisha na inyi.
46004017	Nkyo kimaduma ndeduma Timoteo ipfo konu ai mana oko mkunde ai na mhendeli o Mndumii-hu, nyio echimkumbuṟa mhendeshye yako ya Kristo-hu iya njekeilosha oryo siṟinyi hando hose.
46004018	Kwipfo wakuṟumbashie cha ili ndaicha na konu.
46004019	Indi njechicha na konu owinyi Mndumii kamkunda njechikaa njitichie kilya wakuidimye chi kilya wakudedye.
46004020	Kyamba wumangi wo Ruwa wukukerye kundo kudedopfo kya indi nyi ipfo kundo kuwuto.
46004021	Kilya mukundi nyi kiki? Njiche konu njirie iṟiiga ang'u njiche njirio nyi mkundye na mumuyo mwoloṟu?
46005001	Koichyo kundo kose ke konu kuwode wuṟuhui, na wuṟuhui wu nyi wo mbaṟi ileewa isenda ma ipfo ko wandu walaidikye wai, mndu nakae na mka o ndee.
46005002	Nanyo mokutumbashya mulakunda ikuinadya kundo nahende iwuto ipfo kiidi kyanu icho atanye kindo kyo.
46005003	Na inyi ma ndakeri-ho kui mbihu indi njikukerye-ho kui mumuyo njilemmaa idumbuya mndu-chu aletana kindo kiwicho kido mdumbuye cha ili njiweiho.
46005004	Ngadeda kui rina lya mndumii Yesu luwodanyi nyo na mumuyo foko hamu na pfinya ya Mndumii odu Yesu.
46005005	Kyedambikya Satan mndu cho mbihu fohoṟuo kundu mrima fukiṟo mkonu fulya fo Mndumii.
46005006	Ili mukutumbashye mudi chi kichapfo. Mulaichi ke kitarang'asha sa kitutu kidutsye mbumba fo mso fose mtarang'ao?
46005007	Kyasia muahye kitarang'asha kilya kiku na nja kundu muwe mbumba mhya chando mui mulaiwawike kitarang'asha. Cha kipfa na pasaka yadu ilemmaa ishinjo, nyio Kristo.
46005008	Nakyo kyaenenga luachikie mkonu mnene iya yadu, chi kui kitarang'asha kilya kiku manya kui kitarang'asha kya wuporu na wuwicho kya indi kui shilaishitarang'ashe sha wusalari na wulohi.
46005009	Njilemṟehya na baruo iya ke ma mulasangane na waṟuhui.
46005010	Chi ngamhamba nayo waṟuhui wakeri na wuyana wu ang'u manyinyi ang'u wasoki ang'u weindya maruwa ha wongo wai nawo. Kiwei kido kiwemwitika muwuke iya wuyana.
46005011	Kya indi wulalu kilya njilemṟehya kiwei kii-le, ke mulasangane na mndu a mlahe manowama nao awa mṟuhui ang'u inyinyi ang'u moindya maruwa ha wongo ang'u mokiruma ang'u makinango ang'u msoki. Mndu o mbaṟi ii ma ilya mulaidikye ilya nao.
46005012	Kipfa nyi kiki kimbode njidumbuye wa ora lo nya mdumbuye? Chi kyanu kyewonaya wa ora lo kya mba mdumbuye sho?
46005013	Indi iwo wakeri ora lo nja nyi Ruwa echiwawonya mdumbuye. Funenyimbafu ulya ipfo kiidi kyanu.
46006001	Alae. Mndu o konu awode kindo kededa na odoe nawo ekarya imwanduya ipfo ko wa mkika nalache oshangunyi lo walya wai waele?
46006002	Ma mulaichi ke walya wai waele wechiwonya wuyana wu mdumbuye fowo? Na kokoya wuyana wu woshika iwonyo mdumbuye ipfo kundo nyo muwode menge akashika mulasumhanye yadanya mondu ii mangu idi?
46006003	Mulaichi ke nyi lochiwonya wamalika mdumbuye, denyi ishi sheluya moo!
46006004	Akawo nyo ili muwode kyeanduyana kya shindo sheluya moo nyi mokedamiṟa-ho walya walawode kiṟumi ipfo siṟinyi?
46006005	Ngahamba njido njimhutsye sonu. Na wudi muwuṟye mndu ai mṟango o ipfo kiidi kyanu awechiidima iletsana mndu na manomae.
46006006	Kya indi mndu manowama ekeanduyana na manomae nakyo nyi ipfo patenyilya walaidikye.
46006007	Nalyo ili muwodianyi mudi mondu muwenyi na wenyi nalyo liyenyi limwendie kihutsa. Kimaduma nyiki mulakunda iwutyo sha wukika? Kimaduma nyi ki mulakunda isoko?
46006008	Kya indi nyo muwenyi mokewuta sha wukika na isoka mokesoka. Na wandu walya mokewawutia mudo nyi wanawamanu.
46006009	A mulaichi ke wewuta sha wukika nyi walechioṟa wumangi wo Ruwa? Ma mulakulembe. Makiṟuhuya na mkiṟuhuyo wechioṟa wumangi wo Ruwapfo, manya weindya maruwa ha wongo; manya wetahachia wali, manya wesutsa wukika ang'u wumi.
46006010	Manya waiwi, manya wenyi-wuehi, manya makinango, manya makiruma, manya wasoki.
46006011	Na wa mbaṟi itsi muwekeri maata wanu. Kya indi momesanjo. Kya indi momeilisho. Kya indi momesumhantso kui rina lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo na kui Mumuyo o Ruwa odu.
46006012	Shindo shose njikuwodie kyasho momu, kya indi chi shose shanjiwiia kya wuchapfo. Shose njikuwodei kyasho momu, kya indi njilawone njehenda ilimbo nyi kiliwe.
46006013	Shindo shelya nyi sha ndewu nayo ndewu nyi ya shindo shelya. Nao Ruwa echishikombetsa shi shiwi, ndewu na shelya. Indi mbihu fo mndu fuu-mbike fuwe fo wuṟuhuipfo kya indi nyi fo Mndumii, nao Mndumii nyi menyi mbihu fu.
46006014	Na Ruwa kashika iṟutsa Mndumii nyi echishika iṟutsa naso kui pfinya yake.
46006015	Mulaichi ke mbihu yanu nyi yo shiwungo sha Kristo? Akashika shiwungo sho sha Kristo wulalu njishiire njihende ishihaluo shiwungo sha makiṟuhuyo? Manya!
46006016	Mulaichi ke ichu alungana na makiṟuhuyo nyi amewa mbihu fumu nao? Cha kipfa ahambye, walya wawi wechiwa mbihu fumu.
46006017	Kya indi ichu alunganyi na Mndumii nyi amba mumuyo fumu nao.
46006018	Dichenyi wuṟuhui. Oryo wunyamaṟi mndu awuta na wukeri kya nja ya mbihu foke. Kya indi ichu aṟuhuya nyi atanya mbihu foke amonyi wunyamaṟi.
46006019	Ang'u mulaichi ke mbihu fonu nyi fomba hekalu lya Mumuyo Mwele aikaa nanyo, ichu muleinengo nyi Ruwa. Nanyo chi mukeri wanu muwenyipfo.
46006020	Cha kipfa muiwahuṟe na mtalo fo kisale. Kyo kimwitike muhende iṟumisha Ruwa chu kui mbihu fonu.
46007001	Kyasia kya shindo shilya mulenjiṟehya ngamhaluo ke nyi nanga msoṟo nalakuwashe na mndu mka.
46007002	Kya indi kyeringa wuṟuhui oryo mndu nawade mka oke amonyina oryo mka nakae na mii oke amonyi.
46007003	Mii nainenge mka oke kilya kimbaṟi, shiwudo nao mka naweinenga mii kilya kyake kimbaṟi.
46007004	Mka naitoṟye mbihu fokepfo kya indi nyi mii, shiwudo na mii naitoṟye mbihu fokepfo kya indi nyi mka.
46007005	Ma mulaimane shile nyi kui ikuteṟyana mwaanya kundu mukuwonye nafo suku tsetsinda kiterewonyi. Numa muwewuyanase kundu Satan nalashike imtewa kui iwuṟa lyanu lyewuṟa kiheo.
46007006	Indi ngahamba iki kyeikimba, chi ngakiwawasapfo.
46007007	Kyako inyi njikundi nyi kiile ke wandu wose wawe cha inyi njimonyi. Kya indi oryo mndu ose ai msumbe nyi Ruwa kii kyake amonyi ichu nyi wudi na ichu nyi wudi.
46007008	Indi ngawia iwo walamealika na iwo wapfie mii njiile, nyi kicha wakukaye chando inyi njikeri.
46007009	Kya indi kokoya walaidima ikuima wakualikye. Kyamba nyi kii kicha yalika kota yaaka.
46007010	Kya indi iwo walemmaa yalikana le ngawawasa, na iwawasa li chi lyakopfo indi nyi lya Mdumii, ke mka nalalekane na mii oke.
46007011	Indi komkoya amlekana nao na nakae ado alaaliko ang'u nahoṟyane na mii. Nao mii nalawone echisama mka oke.
46007012	Kya indi wandu wengi ngawawia inyi chi Mndumii-pfo ke kokoya mndu manowama awode mka oke alai mwidiki nao mka chu akundi kukaya nao nalamsame.
46007013	Na mka mliwe awode mii alai mwidiki na mii chu akundi ikukaya nao nalade msoṟo chu.
46007014	Kyamba msoṟo chu alai mwidiki nyi aimwilishe kui manowama chu. Shila wudo wana wanu wawei wa ngafu, indi wulalu wai waele.
46007015	Kya indi ichu alai mwidiki kalekana nakulekanye. Hando ho manowama mndumii ang'u mka nampfungiṟyepfo. Kilya Ruwa alulahye so nakyo nyi kiidikyano.
46007016	Cha kipfa nyi uichi kuda, iyo mka, koka ochikiṟa miopfo? Ang'u iyo mndumiinyi uichi kuda kokoya ochikiṟa mka opfo?
46007017	Maṟi oryo mndu ose nachumie chando Mndumii amteṟye; chando Ruwa amlahye nyi wudo nahendeke. Nkyo ikyo njekewawasya siṟi tsose.
46007018	Mndu kamelaho awei mdine nalakiṟike; mndu kamelaho alai mdine nalahende idino.
46007019	Kiende kiṟumi chi mkae fui mdinepfo ma chi mkae fulai mdinepfo, indi ihendelya mawawaso ha Ruwa.
46007020	Oryo mndu ose nakae mkae iya awei nayo iliindi amshike henda ilaho.
46007021	Komelaho ui isinga ma kulawone kosuo. Ma koshika iwonyo mwaanya fohenda lekio kukundye ikaa.
46007022	Kyamba ichu amhenda ilahyo Mndumii ai isinga nyi amba mtalae o Mndumii. Na wudo ichu amelaho ai makuachia nyi awewiia Kristo isinga.
46007023	Mui wahuṟe na wuhuṟu wo kisale, mulawone mochiwiia wandu masinga.
46007024	Oryo mndu le, wanawawama, mkae fulya awei nafo iliindi amshika ilaho nyifo nakae nafo ai na Ruwa.
46007025	Kya marokya kyo njiwode iwawaso lya Mndumii-pfo, indi ngahamba mhie yako njii mtane mhendeli kui isaṟya lya Mndumii.
46007026	Na iki ngahamba kii kicha kimaduma kya mafirita ha ki-wulalu kikeri kii-le ke kiwe kicha mndu nakae mkae ai nayo.
46007027	Nyi ui mpfungye mka? Ma kulakunde ipfunguo. Kumdeye kudi kulampfungye mka? Ma kulapfule mka.
46007028	Indi ma kokoya oalika uwode mtipfo. Na rokya likakualikyo liwode mtipfo. Kya indi wandu wo wai wado wechirohyo m mawina ha nyamenyi, na inyi ngakunda ihawaringa.
46007029	Kya indi ngahamba-le, wanawawama, mwaanya fo iheri li nyi itika inyia fukeri. Mandi hatsuhae walya wawode waka wawe cha ili nyi walawode.
46007030	Na walya wailia wawe cha ili walailia, na walya waichihio wawe cha ili walaichihio, na walya waihuṟa shindo cha ili walai wenyisho.
46007031	Na walya wailuya moo na mweke fo wuyana wu walawone wechiwulia ngula. Kyamba mbikye fo wuyana wu nyi isia fukeri.
46007032	Na inyi njikundi mukae mulakurohye. Ichu alaalikye ekekuwinyisha kya Mndumii ke nyi wuda echichihiṟa Mndumii.
46007033	Kya indi ichu aalikye nyi ekekuwinyisha na sha wuyana wu ke nyi wuda echichihiṟa mka oke, kawa mokuletsana adi amonyi.
46007034	Na mka alai na mii na rokya na wudi aikuwinyisha na kya Mndumii, kundu nawe mwele kui mbihu na kui mumuyo. Indi ichu amalike nyi ekekuwinyisha na sha wuyana wu ke nyi wuda echichihiṟa mii.
46007035	Na iki ngadeda kundu kiwe kiira konu muwenyi, chi kundu njimkumbye kiwoho kyemchuruwuyapfo kya indi kundu mudamie Mndumii-hu tsee mui na wuwongoyi wose wulaweṟukye.
46007036	Kya indi na kawa wu kawona akiṟa yendie rokya lyake wusutsu aimkuya rikonyina wudo kuwode-ho wuitiki wowuta kindo nahende iwuta kilya akunda. Chi atahachia handopfo, wakualikyane.
46007037	Indi ichu ahoṟoki na ngoo yake ii njiwanzi nalawode kitikimapfo kya indi ai na chile tsewuta kyake akunda nao akuteseheṟye mrimenyi foke fumenyi naringe rokya lyake nyi awuta necha.
46007038	Nkyo kimaduma ichu moalikya rokya lyake nyi awuta necha; na ichu alaalikya rokya lyake nyi awuta necha kota.
46007039	Mka nyi ai mlungye mii mandi ho mii ai-ho na moo hose. Indi mii kamhenda ipfa nyi amlekyo ihenda yalikyo nyi oryo mndu amkunda kihendewutika kui Mndumii da.
46007040	Kya indi nanga lya wueṟa kokoya akukaya chando akeri, nyi wudo inyi ngawona. Na ngahamba na inyi njii na Mumuyo o Mndumii.
46008001	Na kya nyama tsiinjidasye maruwa ha wongo; na luichi ke so lose lui wenyi-wuṟango. Wuṟango nyi wokeende ikutumbasha indi ikunda nyi lyekepfunga mba.
46008002	Kokoya mndu akumbuo ke ai na wuṟango woemanya kindo o amemanya njia wuṟango woṟunda nayopfo.
46008003	Chila nyi mndu akundi Ruwa; ichu nyi ammanye nyio.
46008004	Kyasia kya mlie folya nyama tsilya tsiinjidasye maruwa ha wongo na luichi ke maruwa ha wongo hakeri wuyana lohipfo, na ke kulaipfo Ruwa shile ichu umu.
46008005	Cha kipfa ma kokoya kuipfo wehambo maruwa kiwe nyi ruwehu ang'u nyi wuyana chando-ng'u kuwode wai maruwa wafoi na wandumii wafoi.
46008006	Kya indi so luwode Ruwa umu ai Wande. Nyio kimaenyi kya shose shii-ho na kiwuyonyi kyadu na ipfo koke. Luwode na Mndumii umu nyio Yesu Kristo. Kui mweke foke shindo shilemmba shose, naso na kui mweke foke.
46008007	Kya indi wuṟango wu wukeri na wosepfo. Kwipfo weketsilya cha ili tsiinjidambikye maruwa ha wongo lohi, ngo tsa mrimenyi yawo, ili tsiinyifafa tsidi, tsikahenda ifanyitso.
46008008	Kya indi kando kaa na wucha wolusanza na Ruwapfo. Lukalya lui na wo mwengeṟyapfo, lukada lulalya lohenda iwunyiṟyopfo.
46008009	Ke kuṟisenyi mulawone mkuachie fonu fuwe fochiendie walya wai wafafa kihutsa.
46008010	Kyamba mndu kakuwona iyo menyi wuṟango wu kudamye kiliyonyi ipfo kundo wadambikye shidaso shilya alae ngo tsa mrima fo mndu cho afafaa adi chi tsechikapyo owanzo natane alya tsiinjidambikye maruwa ha wongo?
46008011	Na ulya mfafa kahenda idetso nyi wuṟango wu wopfo, nao ai nyi manowama msa Kristo alempfia.
46008012	Na wudo ili muitahachia wanawawama wo na ikapa ngo tsa mrimenyi yawo ifafaa idi, nyio Kristo mukeri imtahachya.
46008013	Nkyo kimaduma kiti kyelya kidekeshe manowama oko nyide ndalye nyama itane mlungana, ndashike tewa manowama oko nakape tuulya.
46009001	Alae inyi chi makuachia? Inyi chi msu? Chi njiwonye Yesu Kristo Mndumii odu? Nyo chi mui itana lyako njitanye Mndumii-hu?
46009002	Kokoya inyi ndai msu o ko wengi kya indi njii msu konu nyo. Kyamba kitisiṟo kyemanyisha wusu woko nyi nyo ipfo Mndumii-hu.
46009003	Kiṟohwo kyako njekeṟohwo iwo wenjihesha nyi wudo kikeri.
46009004	Alae chi lui na pfinya yehenda ilya na inyo?
46009005	Chi lui na pfinya yekualikya mka ai manowama arianyi naso wamae wa Mndumii na Kefa?
46009006	Ang'u alae nyi inyi njimonyi na Barnaba lulai na momu foda maṟunda heluya moo?
46009007	Nyi asikari mki ekehenda shidenyi ma indi echikutaya wueri woke amonyi? Nyi o ku ekedonga msabibu alechilya mandunda hayo? Ang'u nyi o ku echilisa poo alechinyo maruwa ha poo lilya?
46009008	Alae njideda isho kya mbuka tsa wandu ang'u wuwawaso nawo wuhambye ishowo?
46009009	Kyamba ipfo wuwawasonyi wo Mose kuukuṟehye kuile, “Ma kulawone kochipfunga mbe dumbu yechituura ngano.” Alae Ruwa nyi akusaṟa kya mbe?
46009010	Ang'u chi adeda isho kipfa kyadu tichi? Ee-ng'u nyi shii-shiṟehye kipfa kyadu kyehamba ke mdemi nawe modema kui mkusihye nao motuura ngano nawewa motuura kui mkusihye fo kuwonya ohawi lumsumhanye.
46009011	Kikamba so lumdongye nyo shii sha Mumuyo, alae nyi kindo sa kinene kokoya losambuo shindo-hu shanyu shii sha mbihu?
46009012	Kokoya wengi waiho wawode pfinya yekuwutya-ho ohawi lowo ipfo konu a so chi lya wueṟa? Kya indi so lulekuachia na pfinya iipfe, indi lokukarishya kya shindo shose kundu lulawone luwechiwikya ndumi ya sia ya Kristo tunja.
46009013	Mulaichi ke walya wepfuṟukanya sha hekalunyi nyi wekelya ohawi luwukye kosho, na walya wedasya-ho shidaso nyi wekehawyo sha rasionyi?
46009014	Na Mndumii na wudo awawasye ke walya weonguo ndumi ya sia ya okiio wakuwonye keluya moo kiwukye mwongoyenya.
46009015	Indi inyi njiwekutambye na pfinya i ma kya kimupfo. Manya chi ngaṟehya isho kundu kinyiwiie kidi inyipfo. Nanga njikupfie! Kuwode mndu ma kawa wu echifurunja kiṟumi kyakopfo.
46009016	Kyamba ma kikawa njiongwo ndumi ya sia ya okiio lyo linjiendie kiṟumipfo. Kyamba lyo limbode lii kitikima. Ochia loko kokoya ndaiongwo.
46009017	Cha kipfa ngatana iki kui ikunda lyako njiwode woṟunda woko. Kokoya kilai nyi ikunda lyako, kya indi wukaṟa wu na njimdambikye.
46009018	Ngashika oo woṟunda woko nyi wo iki? Nyiwo iwu, ke ili nyonguo ngalekya ndumi ya sia ya okiio njilatao, ndawese-ho kilya kimsumhanye kya kiheo kya ndumi ya sia yo.
46009019	Na ipfo kundo ngamba njido makuachia kya wandu wose nyi hodno njilekutana isinga lyesingya wose kundu njiwonye wandu wafoi lya wueṟa okiio lu.
46009020	Na ngamewiia Wayuda cha mndu Myuda kundu njikuwonye Wayuda. Nyiwewiia walya wai shi ya wuwawaso cha njii shi ya wuwawaso kundu njikuwonye wai shi ya wuwawaso.
46009021	Walya walai shiya wuwawaso na ngamewawiia cha ili njilai shi ya wuwawaso. Nao inyi njilawuṟye wuwawaso wo Ruwa, kya indi njikuilikishye wuwawasonyi wo Kristo. Nyi njilewawiia njidi-le kundu njikuwonye walai shi ya wuwawaso.
46009022	Walya wefafaa njilewawiia mfafa nao inyi kundu njikuwonye iwo wafafa. Nyiwo wandu wose njiwe mawiia mkao yawo yose kundu njiwute-ho ikiṟa wandu kui njia tsose.
46009023	Na inyi ngawuta isho shose kimaduma kya ndumi ya sia ya okiio kundu njiwe mokyando oyo.
46009024	A mulaichi ke walya wetangyana kya ikapa mteeṟa nyi wekewikya mteeṟa ipfo pate-hu wose, kya indi mokoya kirekyo kilya nyi umu. Wikyenyi-ng'u mudo mteeṟa kundu mukiwade.
46009025	Na oryo morekyana nyi ekekuotoya kya shindo shose, kyasia nawo iwo nyi kundu waambye oṟo ya kiṟumi iya yechisia, kya indi so nyi kundu luwade iya ilechisia.
46009026	Na inyi da njikapa mteeṟa njido chi cha mndu arichahyapfo, na inyi na wudo ili njikapa na nzina chi ngakapa njiashe hando hekapapfo.
46009027	Kya indi nyitsana mbihu foko na ifuidikisha, kilawe ke ngammaa yongoya wengi na inyi njimonyi njiwe imndu lyekumbalyo ipfo.
46010001	Kyamba-le, wanawama, njilakundi mude mulamanya ke wandeyadu nyi wawei shi ya-puchi lilya wose, wakaida ipfo ipalipalinyi wose.
46010002	Wakashika ipatisyo Mose ipfo shi ya puchi lilya na ipfo mṟingenyi wose.
46010003	Nawo wose wawekeri ilya kando kamu kawei Mumuyo.
46010004	Wawenyo wose na mnyo se fumu fuwei Mumuyo cha kipfa wawekekunyoya kiwukye ngaṟahambenyi ya Mumuyo iweitumanyi nawo. Nayo ngaṟahamba iya nyiyo Kristo.
46010005	Kya indi kyawo wafoi walechihiana na Ruwapfo, wakahutso wanda kulya nuka.
46010006	Ishi nyi shilewa sha mbetesa yadu kundu so lulawe welanga shiwicho chando wo wawelangie.
46010007	Ma mulawe weindya maruwa hengi chando kuwewode kowo kii-kiṟehye kyawo kyehamba, mkambo fo wandu fukadamya fochilya na inyo kidima wakakure wahende ishina.
46010008	Manya lulawe wemeluka chando kowo kuweipfo wemelukye wadi wakaoloka oweṟe lo mkonu fumu wandu washikye shiku makumi hawi na shiṟaṟu.
46010009	Manya lulataanye Mndumii chando kowo kuweipfo wawemtaanye wakakombetso nyi njoka.
46010010	Manya mulakuinung'unu chando kowo kuweipfo walekuinung'unu wakarumatso nyi morumatsa.
46010011	Ishi shilesanzyo iwutika ipfo kowo kui mbetesa indi shiishiṟehye kipfa kya wuikimbi womwikimba nyo mui-washitsye maheri hamandie.
46010012	Nkyo kimaduma msa mohamba ke nyi ahoṟoki nakuṟise nalawone echiho.
46010013	Kiweipfo kihesho kilemhoya kilawei kya kiwandupfo. Na Ruwa ai mhendeli alechimda muhesho kidye mng'ang'ana fonu, kya indi handu hamu na kihesho kilya kawika-ho na mongo fowukia, kundu muidime ikutirisia.
46010014	Nkyo kimwitike, nyo wakunde wako, mudiche wuindi woindya maruwa ha wongo.
46010015	Ngadeda nanyo mui wandu waichi, keheshenyi ikyo njideda.
46010016	Kirahu kilya kya ona luikionyisha chi kulusanzye samu ya Kristo? A mkate fulya luifufunya chi fulusanzye mbihu fo Kristo?
46010017	Kyamba mkate nyi fo fumu, naso lufoi li mbihu fumu, kyamba so lose luihawyo mkate fulya fumu.
46010018	Keringenyi Israeli iya iwiie kui ifeo lya nyama. Walya wailya shidaso shilya chi walungana na rasio iya?
46010019	Alewo nyi ki njihamba? Ke nyi kidaso kiwe kindo ko? Ang'u mfano fuwe kindo ko?
46010020	Chi wudopfo. Kya shilya wekeshidasa nyi waishidasya wasatan manya chi Ruwapfo. Kya indi inyi njilakundi muwe wa kita kimu na wasatan.
46010021	Moidima isanza inyo kirahu kya Mndumii na kya wasatanyipfo. Moidima isanza kidembo kya mezenyi ya Mndumii na kya mezenyi ya wasatanyipfo.
46010022	Ang'u nokunda ipfulutsa Mndumii nyashi? Nyi loidima imwota o ko?
46010023	Shindo shose njikuwodie kyasho momu, kya indi chi shose shanjiwiia kya wuchapfo. Shindo shose njikuwodie kyasho momu kya indi chi shose shapfunga mbapfo.
46010024	Ma mndu nalawone kechipfula kilya kichihianyi nao amonyi, kya indi napfule kichihianyi na odoe.
46010025	Shose shekekumbo ipfo mchangalenyi yekumba nyama mukulie da kulawode mowesa kundu kuwukie mochiringa ngo tsa mrimenyi.
46010026	Kyamba wanda ii menyi oyo nyio Mndumii sanza na mena foyo.
46010027	Mndu o walya walaidikye kamlaha nanyo mukakunda ihenda-pfo kulienyi oryo kindo wamuwikya mulechiwesa kundo kuwukye mochiringa ngo tsa mrimenyi.
46010028	Indi kokoya mndu ahenda imbia, “Nyama ii nyi nyama nyidase” ma mulailye nyi kimaduma kya ichu mosenda na kimaduma kya ngo tsa mrimenyi.
46010029	Ngoo tsa mrima ngatsihamba chi tsa fopfo iyopfo, kya indi nyi tsa fo ulya ungi. A nyi kitewe mkuachie foko fuhendekapo nyi ngoo tsa mrima fo mndu ungi?
46010030	Kokoya ngakulia ohawi loko njechiana nyi ki njihenderumo kipfa kya kindo njikiadapfuma?
46010031	Kyasia-ng'u ili muilya ang'u muinyo ang'u muiwuta kindo ma kida ma kida shiwutenyi shose shewikya Ruwa kiṟumi.
46010032	Mukae-ho mulawiie wandu tewe ma Wayuda ma Wagriki na wa siṟi ya Ruwa.
46010033	Chando nao inyi nyekechihiana na wose kya shindo shose njilaipfula kilya kinchihiṟye inyi indi kilya kichihiṟye walya wafoi kundu wahende ikiṟo.
46011001	Muwe waitung'ati wako chando inyi njii o Kristo.
46011002	Na ngamwichika, wanawawama, nyi kipfa monjikumbuo kya shindo shose mukuwode necha na njowawaso tsilya njilemwinenga.
46011003	Kya indi njikundi mumanye ke mdo fo oryo mndumii nyi Kristo, na mdo fo mka nyi mii, na mdo fo Kristo nyi Ruwa.
46011004	Oryo mndu msoṟo kashika iterewa anu kashika ideda awodo Mumuyo nao aṟee kindo kisokye mdonyi nyi asutsa mdo foke.
46011005	Kya indi oryo mndu mka kashika iterewa ang'u ideda awodo m Mumuyo alawoshye mdo foke nyi asutsa mpfo foke. Kyamba nyi awa umu tichi na ichu atsikie njui tsake.
46011006	Kyamba kokoya mka alakunda ikushikya na nahende isemo na kamu. Kya indi ili ihenda isemo ang'u itsiko lyo liendie mndu mka wusutsu na nakae amshikye.
46011007	Mndu msoṟo o alawuṟye ishikya mdo kyamba nyi ai mfano fo Ruwa mohamba ngela yake. Kya indi mndu mka ai mohamba ngela ya mndumii.
46011008	Kyamba mndumii alapaṟikye ko mka indi nyi mka apaṟikye ko mndumii.
46011009	Manya chi mndumii aletano kimaduma kya mkapfo, indi nyi mka kashika itano kimaduma kya mndumii.
46011010	Nkyondo kiwaṟi mka nakae na kichano kyeitoṟyo ipfo mdonyi foke kipfa kya wasu walya.
46011011	Ma kikamba kido indi ipfo Mndumii-hu mndu mka awa kindo shile mndumiipfo, manya mndumiia awewa kindo shile mkapfo.
46011012	Kyamba chando mka apaṟikye ko mndumii, nyi wudo da na mndumii ekefeo nyi mndu mka. Nasho ili shii shido nyi shii shiwike nyi Ruwa shose.
46011013	Kedumbwonyi muwenyi, nyi kisumhanyi mndu mka nahambe kiterewo kyeterewa Ruwa alaimshikye ko?
46011014	Alae, chi wumba liyenyi limloshye ke mndumii kalekya nyui tsilee nyi akuendye wusutsu?
46011015	Indi mndu mka awode njui nileshe nyi kiichiko kyake. Cha kipfa amwinenge nyui tso nleshe tsimbiie maṟao hemshikya.
46011016	Indi kokoya kwipfo ahamba nawike-ho nganu, so luwode kido cha ikyopfo, manya siṟi tsa Ruwa ote.
46011017	Ili njiwawasa njidi kuwode-pfo handu halawa iichika, nyi kipfa mokesanza kilai kya kiira indi kya kihutsa.
46011018	Kya kuwoka ngaicho wai ke ippfo konu ili mokusanza kui siṟi nyi kuwode mapaṟakano. Nakyo ngakiidikya kyenga.
46011019	Kyamba nyi kuwaṟi iwoneka maletsano ifo konyu kundu walya waidima ikusiryo wamanyike na pata ipfo hamu kulaidimika kekulia kilayo kya Mndumii.
46011020	Kyamba ipfo kilionyi oryo mndu ekepfukapfuka iwada kilya kii kyake kikyenyi,
46011021	na ichu awodo n njaa, na ichu nyi a mnanzi.
46011022	Ale! Mulawode mba tsekulia-pfo na ikunyoya? Ang'u mopiṟa siṟi ya Ruwa na ihutsya walya walawode kindo sonu? Njimuwie njida ngesa? Njimwichike ko? Kya ikyo njemwichikanyi.
46011023	Kyamba nyio Mndumii amenjienenga imanya shilya njilemmaa imudambikya nyo, nasho shii shidi, ke Mndumii odu Yesu kio kilya aleṟingyo nyi alewada mkate.
46011024	Kekiidima yaana kafufunja shifunyo kahamba, Aifu mbihu foko fohenda idambikyo kipfa kyanu. Muwe mowuta mudo kenjikumbuo.
46011025	Na wudo nakyo kirahu kilya kilayo kyamlio kechihamba, Kirahu ki nyi mma mhya ya ipfo samunyi yako; muwe mochiwuta mudi oryo mandi monyoya-ho mochinjikumbuo.
46011026	Kyamba oryo mandi molya mkate fu na inyo kirahu ki mukeri ihamba opfu lo Mndumii itane echiwuya.
46011027	Nkyo kyaenenga oryo molya mkate fu ang'u inyo kirahu kya Mndumii alashisumhanye nyi atahachie mbihu fo Mndumii na samu yake.
46011028	Indi mndu o wandu nakutaanye amonyi, kammaa nache echilya kya mkate fu nawenyo kya kirahu-ki.
46011029	Kyamba ichu ailya na inyo alaichi mbihu fu fuipfo nyi akulia wadeheli na iwukunyoya.
46011030	Nkyo kimaduma ipfo konu kwipfo wafoi waluo, wai wanyonge, na wandu sa weengi walee.
46011031	Indi kima luwekuanduya so luwenyi luwechidehelyopfo.
46011032	Kya indi ili loshika idehelyo nyi Mndumii nyi lohenda itoṟisho kundu lulaseso handu hamu na wuyana wu.
46011033	Nkyo kimwenenge, wanawawama wako, ili moshika ikusanza kilionyi muwe moahiwedyana.
46011034	Kokoya kwipfo mndu awodo nyi njaa nakulie ipfo kanyi, mulashike ikusanza liendye wudeheli. Shingi shadeo-pfo nyi njechishisungusia ili njecha.
46012001	Kya shisumbo sha Mumuyo le, wanawawama, njikundi mude mulamanyapfo.
46012002	Muichi lyandi muwekeri wahenu nyi mowekedao ko mfanano ilawode mdedye cha ili mokuruo-pfo.
46012003	Nkyo kimaduma ngammanyishya ke kulaipfo modeda awodo nyi Mumuyo o Ruwa awechihamba Yesu naseso, na kulaipfo aidima ihamba, Yesu ai Mndumii shile awodo nyi Mumuyo Mwele.
46012004	Nyi kuwode makamba ha shisumbo sha Mumuyo, indi Mumuyo nyio menyi.
46012005	Kuwode makamba ha mapfuṟukanya, na Mndumii nyio amonyi.
46012006	Kuwade makamba ha matanyo kya indi nyi Ruwa ai motana shi shose arie wose.
46012007	Indi oryo mndu aenengo mdambuye fo Mumuyo kundu kuwonekeho kiira.
46012008	Kyamba ichu umu amnengo nyi Mumuyo ideda wuṟango, na ichu ungi ideda wulaanyi kui mweke fo Mumuyo ulya ulya.
46012009	Ungi amnenge wuidiki kui Mumuyo ulya ulya, na ungi aimsumbe pfinya tsechiṟa waluo kui Mumuyo ichu umu.
46012010	Na ungi amnenge iwuta ngata tsa pfinya, na ungi ihamba wuikimbi na ungi itichya wuilachi wo Mumuyo iya iipfo, na ungi aimnenge mdedye ya shiṟuma, na ungi amnenge wuṟango wodambuya shiṟuma shilya.
46012011	Indi isho shose nyi Mumuyo ichu umu ose ashitanye echihawya oryo umu kikoke chando akunda.
46012012	Kyamba chando mbihu fo mndu fui, nyi fo fumu na shiwungo shafo nyi shifoi, indi shiwungo sha mbihu shifoi shidi shikeri mbihu fu fumu sho shose, nyi wudo na Kristo ai.
46012013	Kyamba so lose lulempatisyo mbihu fumu kui Mumuyo umu, kiwe luui Wayuda ang'u kiwe lui Wagriki, kiwe lui masinga ang'u kiwe lui masumba. Nyi luiwarutsye Mumuyo chu umu so lose.
46012014	Kyamba na mbihu fo mndu fulakeri kiwungo kimu indi shofoi.
46012015	Kima odende luweihamba, ili ndakeri owoko njikeri o mbihupfo, kyo kiwechitewa lulakae lui lo mbihupfo.
46012016	Ma kudu kima kuweihamba, ili ndakeri riso njikeri o mbihupfo lyo liwechitewa kulakae kui ko mbihupfo.
46012017	Kima mbihu fuwei riso fose a iicho kindo liwechiwa naki ko? Kima fuwei kudu fose na irumishya opfamo liwechiwa na ki ko?
46012018	Indi wulalu Ruwa awewikya shiwungo shi oryo kimu kyasho kya ipfo mbihunyi chando alekunda.
46012019	Kya indi kima shiwei sha ofano lumu shose, a mbihu nyi fuwechiwono ku?
46012020	Indi-ng'u wulalu shiwungo nyi shifoi, indi mbihu nyifo fumu.
46012021	Na riso lilaidima iwia owoko, njikutiie iyonyi. Manya mdo fulaidima iwia madende, nyimutie nyonyi.
46012022	Kya indi lya wueṟa mnu, shiwungo sha mbihu, shilya shifanyi cha ili shii shifafa kota shingi nyisho lushiwuṟye kya wuitiki.
46012023	Na shilya loshitana shikiwae kiṟumi sho lokeshisoṟowitsya na tsirie kiweṟe kya ngoseṟa, na shilya shadu shiwode wuṟenze sho shirie wuindi wo ngoseṟa.
46012024	Indi shilya shadu sha sonu njicha sho shii na tiiepfo. Kya indi Ruwa ametomboshana adi mbihu kashika iwikya kiwungo kikiwa kiṟumi kisonguo.
46012025	Kundu mbihu manya fulahendehoyo mpaṟakano, kya indi shiwungo shiinduṟane shishenyi na shenyi.
46012026	Na kokoya kiwungo kimu kyahenda iwawyo shingi shose shawayo hamu nakyo; kokoya kuipfo kiwungo kyawikyo mng'ano shahenda ichihio hamu nakyo shose.
46012027	Nanyo mukeri mbihu fo Kristo mukuhawie-ho shiwungo.
46012028	Na kwipfo Ruwa awawikye ipfo siṟinyi, lyesonguo nyi wasu, lya kawi nyi waikimbi, lya kaṟaṟu nyi wedambuo, lingi nyi wewuta ngata tsa pfinya, lingi nyi warie pfinya tsechiṟa waluo, lingi nyi waeki, lingi nyi waiṟichi, lingi nyi wededa mdedye ya shiṟuma.
46012029	Alae nyi wai wedambuo wose ko? Alae nyi wai wewuta ngata tsa pfinya wose ko?
46012030	Alae nyi wai warie pfinya tsechiṟa waluo wose ko? Alae wai wededa mdedye ya shiṟuma wose ko? Alae nyi wai wetambahaluya shiṟuma wose ko?
46012031	Indi lalakyenyishisumbo shilya shi shicha lya wueṟa. Na kutsuhae nyia ingi ierie tsingi tsose nayo ngahenda imloṟa.
46013001	Ma ngadeda shishomo sha wandu na sha wamalaika, na inyi njiwuṟye ikunda njiwewa cha manga fodihina na cha mangalili hededa.
46013002	Ma mbewode shisuku njiweichi shindo sha kisenyi shose na wulaanyi wose, mbewode na mwidikye foteshuo mafumwu, na inyi ndawode ikunda njikeri kindopfo.
46013003	Ma mbechihawya wakiwa mataa hako hose ngawedambikya na mbihu foko fuhende koṟo, na inyi njiwewuṟye ikunda na isho shinjiwukia-ho kindosho.
46013004	Ikunda nyi liwode wuleeli. Ikunda nyi lyekewongoya wandu. Ikunda chi liwode wulang'apfo, manya lyekekushelapfo.
46013005	Malikutumbashielyo. Ikunda chi litahachye sonulyo, ma lyekepfula kiira kyalyopfo, ma lyechiwa itawishotawishopfo, ma lyekeitalya mawicholyo.
46013006	Lyo lilawa ichihiṟo nyi wukika, kya indi liichihio oryo kundu likumbuhananye kilya kii-lohi.
46013007	Lyo nyi lishikye shose, nyi lihendelye shose, nyi liwedye shose, nyi likamadye shose.
46013008	Ikunda lyechisia manyalelyo; shisuku nasho shechihenda idumbuka, na ideda na shiṟuma nalyo lyeshika imanda, na wulaanyi wolanya shindo wo wochidumbuka.
46013009	Kyamba wulaanyi wodu nyi wo mbetesa, na shisuku shadu na sha mbetesa.
46013010	Kya indi ili mandi wuholotsi wulya womcha na mbetesa yechisia nawo.
46013011	Ili njiwei mkoku njilededa cha mkoku ngameṟanguoṟanguo cha mkoku na ihia kimkoku. Ili ngamba msoṟo ngamekuatuo wukoku wose.
46013012	Kiheri kya wulalu lushiwonyi cha mfano ya kilolenyi shii mangeṟingesha, indi kiheri kya numa lochishiwona oshangu kui oshangu; kiheri kya wulalu imanya lyako likeri lya mbetesa, kya indi ili numa njechikimanya kyose chando na inyi ngamanyo.
46013013	Na wulalu mwidikye na mukundie na mbedie, isho shiṟaṟu nasho shechikaa. Kya indi mkundie nafo fung'anyi kiidi kyasho.
46014001	Lalakyenyi mkundie fu muwe mochilanga shisumbo sha Mumuyo, indi kilya kii kinene nyi kundu muhendetambahaluya.
46014002	Kyamba ichu modeda mdedya Ruwa. Kyamba kulaipfo mndu moicho, indi awa modeda sha kisenyi kui Mumuyo.
46014003	Kya indi ichu motambahaluya nyi adedya wandu kyewaholotsa na iwaṟamtsa na iwakarisha.
46014004	Ichu aideda mdedye fo shiṟuma nyi ekekuholotsa amonyi, indi motambahaluya o awa moholotsa siṟi.
46014005	Na inyi njiwekundi muwededa mdedye ya shiruma nyo mose, kya indi kilya njiwekundi kya wueṟa nyi kundu muwewa wetambahaluya. Kyamba icho motambahaluya nyi mnene kota ichu modeda mdedye fo shiṟuma kulawode awa na moshidambuya, siṟi ikuwutye-ho iheda holotso.
46014006	Alewo wanawawama, kokoya ngamchea njededa mdedye shiṟuma nyi kiira kiki njembonya ngamda ndae̱da nanyo otambahaluyo ang'u wulaanyi ang'u odambuyo ang'u mapfundo.
46014007	Ma koka nyi shindo shilai na moo ili shalekya maṟu kiwe nyi mtoṟiṟo kiwe nyi kinubi (nyi wuda lyekapa lii na ndusu mfungade), shilamlekya maṟu hailachanyi kechimanyika kida ke nyi kiimbo kiki kikapo nyi mtoṟiṟo ang'u nyi kinubi?
46014008	Kyamba na ombe lo shida koka lolekya ṟu lilamanyikye nyi o ku echikuṟehyeṟa kya ihenda kiwahanyonyi?
46014009	Shi wudong'u nanyo na mdedye fonu fo shiṟuma, kokoya modeda lilamanyikye, nyi wuda kochimanyika-ho kilya kiidedo ngesa? Kyamba moewa wededa mkume-hu tupu.
46014010	Kunu wuyana kuwode mdedye ya mbaṟi sa tsifo, manya kulaipfo ma fumu fulatambahaluka.
46014011	Kyasia-ng'u komkoya ndamanya mhambye fo kishomo kilya nyechiwiia mokideda ulya ndaicho, nao modeda ulya echinjiwiia inyi mndaicho.
46014012	Na wudo nanyo ili mulalakye mudo sha mumuyo kundenyi ilanga sheholotsa siṟi mushike isuṟyo.
46014013	Nkyo kimaduma ichu modeda fo shiṟuma naterewe-ng'u nainengo pfinya yedambuya.
46014014	Kyamba kokoya ngaterewa kui shiṟuma nyi mumuyo foko fuiterewa-ho indi mhio foko fulawika kindo.
46014015	Akashika nyi kyawa-se kida? Nyi njechiterewa kui mumuyo, njiweterewa na kui mhio; njichiimba kui mumuyo njiweiimba na kui mhio.
46014016	Cha kipfa kokoya iyo oterewa kui mumuyo ochiana na ichu adamya kidembo-hu kya mndu alaichi nyi echiidikya kindo uihamba?
46014017	Kyamba iyo ee nyi uiana necha, kya indi ulya ungi akuwutia-ho ihenda iiropfo.
46014018	Inyi ngaana Ruwa kimaduma nyi njekededa fo shiṟuma ngamweṟa nyo mose.
46014019	Kya indi ipfo kundo siṟi iisanze ngakukundika ideda ma madedo cha hatanu kui mhio foko hawe hechilosha wengi kota ideda madedo kiku kui shiruma shilya.
46014020	Wanawawama, ma mulawone mochiwa wana kui wutichi wotichia mbonyi muwe wandu watimye.
46014021	Ipfo wuwawasonyi kuu-kuṟehye kuile; Njechideda na mkambo fu kui mweke fo wenyi-shishomo shingi na kui momu ya wahemu; manya waidedyo wado wechinjiichopfo. Mndumii nyi wudi ahambye.
46014022	Nkyo kyaenenga mdedye ya shiṟuma yawa kichano chi kya waidikipfo kya indi nyi kyemanyisha walaidikye; indi odambukyo lulya lo lukerye chi walaidikyepfo kya indi walya waidikye.
46014023	Kyasia-ng'u kokoya siṟi yose isanzi handu hamu na wose washike ideda kui shiṟuma kishika kukaida napfo wandu walaichi ang'u nyi walaidikye alae chi wechihamba nyi wusuko wumbode?
46014024	Kya indi kokoya wahoya idambuya wose kukaida napfo mndu alaidkiye ang'u alaichi mbonyi nyi ahenda idedyo nyi wose,
46014025	na ihenda iwonyo owingo na pata, na wudo echiho wanda kewikya Ruwa wuindi na ihamba na pata ke Ruwa asanganyi na nyo.
46014026	Alewo wanawawama, nyi kukuwukyeho ki? Oryo mandi mosanza handu hamu nyi oryo mndu onu awode kiimbo ang'u opfundo ang'u otambahaluyo ang'u shiṟuma ang'u odambuyo; isho shose shitanyike shewembesha kiwimbi.
46014027	Kokoya mndu adeda kui shiṟuma wadede wawi washika ifo wawe waṟaṟu nahong'u, nawo wadede kui makamba, na umu nashidambuye.
46014028	Kya indi kokoya kulaipfo modambuya nakutsie ipfo kisanzyonyi nakudeye kikoke amony ai na Ruwa.
46014029	Indi waikimbi wadede wawi ang'u waṟaṟu na wengi watambahaluo.
46014030	Kya indi sa adambye kamanyisho idedo, ulya o kuwoka nahende itsia.
46014031	Kyamba nyi moidima iikimba nyo mose umu umu wawuteho ikulosha wose na ihenda wihiṟyo moo wose.
46014032	Nayo mumuyo ya waikimbi nyi yekaa yechiidikya waikimbi.
46014033	Kyamba Ruwa alai o mtandawuko kya indi nyi o ofoṟo.
46014034	Kiwe chando kikeri ipfo siṟinyi tsa waele tsose ke waka watsie ipfo shisanzyonyi sha siṟi, kyamba walai-waenenge momu fodeda kya indi wawe wenyi-wuindi chando nawo wuwawaso wohamba.
46014035	Wakakunda ikulosha kindo wawese wamii wawo kulya kanyi kowo kyamba nyi kiendye mndu mka sonu ili adeda kisanzyonyi kya siṟi.
46014036	Alae nyi ipfo konu dedo lya Ruwa lipaṟikye ko? Ang'u nyi konu kwenyi likushikye ko?
46014037	Kokoya kwipfo ahamba ke nyi ai mwikimbi ang'u mndu o mumuyonyinahoneṟye ishi ngamuṟehya nyo ke shikeri sha mawawaso ha Mndumii.
46014038	Indi kokoya mndu akileha nyi ahenda ileho.
46014039	Ili kyamba kido, wanawawama, muitike ihenda dambuya, na ideda kui shiṟuma mulaiime.
46014040	Indi shose shitanyike kui wuindi na ki osenge.
46015001	Indi ngamkumbuṟa, lanye wanawawama, ndumi ya sia ya okiio ndemuongoya nyiyo muleiambya mukuilikye nayo.
46015002	Na ikiṟo mohenda ikiṟo nyiyo, komkoya muwode mbonyi tsilya ndemuongoya tapu. Kilawe nyi muleidikya msangachale.
46015003	Kyamba ndemwendie nyo kilya ndekiambya na inyi, kya kuwoka ke Kristo apfie kitewe nyi njonyamaṟo tsadu chando kuwei kuṟehye.
46015004	Kiidima na ke nyi amṟike na ili lya kaṟaṟu aṟukye chando kuwei kuṟehye.
46015005	Kiidima nao ke nyi alekuloṟa na Kefa, kiidima na walya ikumi na wawi.
46015006	Kiidima kawekuloṟa na wanawawama wafooya mahana hatanu handu hamu, kyawo wafoi waiho-se na moo itane inu, na wengi maata walemhenda ilaa.
46015007	Kiidima kakuloṟa na Yakobo kawekuloṟa na wasu wose.
46015008	Likingye wose kakuloṟa na inyi njii cha msa amfee kiheri kilahsikye.
46015009	Kyamba inyi nyi mtutu o wasu ndaiho molaho msu kipfa nyi ndewa mokisakisa siri ya Ruwa.
46015010	Kya indi kui wutonga wo Ruwa nji chasa nji, na wutonga wu woke wunjikerye chi wulewa wo wulyapfo kya indi ngamewinya kya wueṟa kota wo wose, ma chi inyipfo shile nyi wutonga wu wo Ruwa wukeri na inyi.
46015011	Kake kokaa nyi inyi kokaa nyiwo, nyi wudo lokeongwo mukaweidikya mudo.
46015012	Kyasia kokoya kokeongoyo kya Kristo ke aṟumba ke nyi kulaipfo iṟuka lya wapfu?
46015013	Kya indi kokoya-ng'u kulaipfo iṟuka lya wapfu na Kristo nao naleṟukapfo.
46015014	Indi kokoya Kristo alaleṟutso kyasia-ng'u na mwongoye fodu na fowewa fo maai na mwidikye fonu nafo.
46015015	Natso luwewono ke nyi luwei waṟingishi wa Ruwa na wongo ili luweṟingishye kindo kilemanyina Ruwa luwehamba ke o aṟutsye Kristo nao alamṟutsye komkoya nyi kii ke wapfu walechikaa waṟutso.
46015016	Kyamba kokoya wapfu walechiṟutso, nao Kristo naleṟutsopfo.
46015017	Na kokoya Kristo alamṟutse mwidikye fonu fukusirye na kindo kii wulya, nanyo mukukerye-seho muriwo nyi manyamaṟo hanu.
46015018	Akawo na walya-ng'u walemhenda ilaa wekusirye na Kristo nyi wawedeka.
46015019	Komkoya lukusihye na Kristo kya moo fu lufurie wulalu tupu nyi luwewa wandu welilia kota wengi wose.
46015020	Kya indi wulalu Kristo aṟukye-ng'u wapfunyi, nyi amba mopaṟasaka o walya walee.
46015021	Kyamba ili opfu lui-uende kitewe nyi mndu umu na wudo-ng'u na iṟuka lya wafu likawa liwukye ko mndu umu.
46015022	Kyamba chando waihenda ipfa kui Adamu ulya wose na wudo-ng'u wechihenda iṟutsyo moo kui Kristo wose.
46015023	Kya indi oryo mndu ose na itumana limsumhanye, mboki nyio Kristo numa walya wake o Kristo ili echiwuya.
46015024	Numa nyi imarisyonyi lya shose ili indi adambikya Ruwa Wande wumangi kammaa irumatsa wuitoṟi wose na wunene na wuapfinya.
46015025	Kyamba nakaki nakae awode wumangi wu naitoṟye natane aleṟya wakituwa wake shi ya madende hake wose.
46015026	Mkituwa echikaa nafurumye iwuto-ho nyi opfu.
46015027	Indi mandi halya amshika ileṟyo shi yake shose
46015028	nao amonyi o Mana echikuleṟya ichu alemeṟya shose kundu nao Ruwa nawe menyishose mohomuo shose.
46015029	Alewo wepatisa walya nyi wechikuwutya-ho ki wakupatisyo wai wepfa? Kokoya wepfa walashika iṟuka manyale nyi ki wakupatisyo kyawo?
46015030	Natso nyi kili luikumba moo oryo saa tsose?
46015031	Njikeri mopfa o mfiri yose soo nyo mui kiichiko kyako, wanawawama, njekuichika nakyo kui Kristo Yesu Mndumii odu.
46015032	Kokoya nyi kiwei kya wandu tupu ili njilekapana na mando malang'a kulya Efeso kyanjiwukya-ho nkyo iki? Kokoya wapfu walashika iṟutso, kyasia luwe lochilya na inyo kyamba nyi ngama lohenda ipfa.
46015033	Ma mulalembike; sumu njiwicho tsekenyamaṟa sonu njicha.
46015034	Ṟamkenyi necha ma mulatahachie hando; kyamba kuwode walaichi Ruwa; nakwipfo echiwesa, aa wuda wapfu washike iṟutso ngesa? A nyi wechicha warie mbihu ida ko?
46015035	Kya indi kulako kwipfo echiwesa, aa nyi wuda wapfu washike iṟutso ngesa? A nyi wechicha warie mbihu ida ko?
46015036	Ili iyo! Mbeu okumba wanda yechiwuya ido yaluke chia yasongu ipfapfo.
46015037	Na kilya owaya nakyo mbumbie fulya fui-mteṟye fuwepfo kya indi nyi kitaṟe kya kimboma, kiwe nyi kya nganu ang'u nyi kya kilimu kya mbaṟi tsingi.
46015038	Kya indi Ruwa nyio akinengye mbumbye yakyo chando alekukundya kaweenengya orio mbeu mbumbye foyo iinjenyi.
46015039	Nyama tsiipfo tsose chi nyama tsimupfo, ya mndu o wandu nyi ingi na ya mando nyi ingi na ya malehe nyi ingi na ya makunga nyi ingi.
46015040	Na wudo kwipfo na mbumbye ya kiruwehu na ya wanda ii, kya indi kiweṟe kya iya ya ruwehu nyi kingi na kya iya ya wanda ii nyi kingi.
46015041	Kiweṟe kya mengeṟi nyi kingi na kiweṟekya mweri na kingi na kiweṟe kya nyenyeri na kingi; kyamba nyenyeri na nyenyeri tsilachikye kui ngela.
46015042	Kyasia na wuḏo kii na kya maṟukyenyi ha wapfu. Koṟiko kyechipuo, kochiṟutso kilekipuo.
46015043	Kokeiiko kifanyi kochiṟutso kiila; koṟiko kii na wufafa koshika iṟutso kii na pfinya.
46015044	Kokeṟiko mbihu fo mrima kochiṟutso mbihu fo mumuyo. Chando kwipfo mbihu fo mrima nyi wudo kwihona fo mumuyo.
46015045	Nyi kuukuṟehye kudi, Adamu mndu o kuwoka nyi alewa mrima fuwode moo.
46015046	Chi fo mumuyo fosonguopfo indi nyi fo mrima fui fo kuwoka, numa kukachang'u fo mumuyo.
46015047	Mndu o kuwoka awukye terinyi ai teri, ndu o kawi ulya awukye ruwehu.
46015048	Mbaṟi ya ichu o teri na ya walya wai teri nayo, na mbaṟi ya ichu o ruwehu na ya walya wa ruwehu nayo.
46015049	Na so lukamemaa iṟaa mfananye fo ichu o ruwehu.
46015050	Kindo ngahamba le wanawawama, nyi iki, ke shi-nyama na samu sho shaidima yoṟa wumangi wo Ruwapfo. Ma kipuo kyaoṟa kilechipuopfo.
46015051	Ambuyenyi ngamuwia kii kiṟikie, ke lulechihenda kulaya lose, kya indi lochiilachika lose.
46015052	Waṟu cha ili okema kiheri kya ombe lofurumya; kyamba kochikapo ombe na wapfu wechiṟuka warie moo fulechisia naso lochiilachika.
46015053	Kyama na kikaki kipuo ki kiṟae kilapuo na kyepfa ki kiṟae kilepfa.
46015054	Kyasia ili kyepuo ki kyekaa kiṟae kilepuo na kyefa ki kirae kilefa nalyondi idedo lilya lii-iṟehye lyechihoya lilya lihambye, opfu lui-umeṟe nyi mbinzi.
46015055	Hoo iyo opfu wuwinzi wopfo nyi ku wui?
46015056	Hoo-iyo opfu lokapa nyilo wunyamaṟi, na pfinya iya wunyamaṟi wuiṟie nyiwo wuwawaso.
46015057	Kya indi Ruwa nahende iwikyo mwaano ichu moluinenga wuwinzi kui Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
46015058	Nkyo kimwenenge, wanawawama mui wakunde, mukae mui wawanzi mulechisingida, muitike itana kyando kya Mndumii kui mwengeṟya mfiri yose ochimanya owino lonu lulai lo maai mukukerye Mndumii-hu.
46016001	Kya kisango kilya kesangya waele walya muhende iwuta chando ndewawasa siṟi tsa Galatia.
46016002	Ke oryo mkonu fo kuwoka fo mfungade oryo mndu o ipfo konyu nakuleṟye ipfo kanyi koke kiteseheṟyo amwonyishe nakyo kundu kisangokyo kilawone kyechianga isanyo inyi ngamemaa icha.
46016003	Na inyi ili ngamwafukya walya mochiwasambuṟa njiwadume na baruo wahende iduo oleki lonu kulya Yerusalemu.
