50002007	Kya indi alekuatuo amonyi kawada mkao fo mndu isinga kawao mfananyie fo wandu kawekoyo ai o mbuka ya mndu.
50002008	Awekunyiiṟye amonyi kawewa moidikya itane ashika opfunyi nalo luwei opfu lo msalabenyi.
50002009	Nkyo kimaduma nao Ruwa amng'anyishye adi kamsumba rina ling'anye oryo rina lingi lyose.
50002010	Kundu oryo ndi tsikuleme kui rina lya Yesu na tsa waruwehu na tsa wawanda ii na tsa wai shi.
50002011	Na oryo olimi luonguo ke Yesu Kristo nyio ai Mndumii kyewikya Ruwa Wande kiṟumi.
50002012	Nkyo kimwenenge nyo, mui wakunde wako, chando muwei waidiki mfiri yose chi mandi halya njiwei konu tupupfo kya indi wulalu kya ngoseṟa njii aleshe nanyo ke pfuṟukanyenyi wo okiio lonu kui wuowu na idedema.
50002013	Kyamba nyio Ruwa aitana kimu nanyo iteseheṟa na iṟunda shilya shichihianyi.
50002014	Kewewutenyi shindo shose mulechinunuwa ma ipfio nyi mdo.
50002015	Kundu muwe watechi na wasalari mui wana wa Ruwa walawode paṟi kiidi kya mbaṟi ya wandu ilee kipfuṟi ipfulukye, ipfo kiidi kyawo muiwaa cha nyenyeri tsii aa wuyana.
50002016	Ili muidunganyitsa dedo lilya liende moo njiwone-ho iwikyo kiṟumi kyenjiwiia mkonu fulya fo Kristo kyehamba ke njilawekuwiwitya njia kya mai ma njilawekuṟohya kya wulya.
50002017	Kya indi ma kokoya samu yako yashika ihenda yoolo yechidasyo wuidiki wonu na iwupfuṟukanya na ngachihio ngawechihio hamu nanyo mose.
50002018	Na wudo nanyo kimu kewechihionyi mbechihio-wo hamu na inyi.
50002019	Ngakusirya na Mndumii Yesu ke njidume Timoteo ipfo konu mkonu fo afui, kundu na inyi njihende iwihiṟyo m moo njechimanya oloho lo konu.
50002020	Kyamba njilawode ai kyandonyi kimu na inyi echihendelya itonga kyanu chaopfo.
50002021	Kyamba waiwinya wose shilya shii shawo chi shilya shii sha Kristo Yesu.
50002022	Indi ichu mumwichi wutechi woke ili awei na inyi cha mana na ndee echipfuṟukanya ndumi ya sia ya okiio.
50002023	Kyasia nyio njikusihye njimdume oweṟe na lulya njemanya kilya kenjidumbukya.
50002024	Kya indi njekusirya na Mndumii ke nao inyi njechikaa njiche njimonyi mkonu fo afui.
50002025	Kya indi ngamhamba nyi kinjiwari kyemdumya manowama chu Epafrodito ai mokyando na mongao oko kawewa msu onu monjiendie shilya sheluya moo.
50002026	Nyi kipfa awodo m macha kyanu mose kawuko m madima nyi ili momwicho ke nyi amluo.
50002027	Kyakyo na kya lohi aweluo kakiṟa henda ipfa, kya indi Ruwa kawuya imsaṟya. Manya chi o amonyi lesaṟyapfo nao inyi, kundu njilahoyo mbadiko na mbadiko.
50002028	Nakyo kyanjiitika kya ngoseṟa njimdume kundu muhendechihio ili mowonana nao, nao inyi njiwihiṟyo-ho moo.
50002029	Kyasia muambyane nao necha kui Mndumii muwodo nyi sia yose. Na wandu wai wado chao muwahonerye mnu.
50002030	Cha kipfa nyi alekoyana na opfu echipfuṟukanya Kristo kakumba moo kundu naengeṟye-ho kilya kilewuṟika-se ipfo maikanyenyi mulenjiikanya naho.
50003001	Lyefurumia, wanawawama wako, ke-chihionyi kui Mndumii. Ili ngamusumutsa njidi lyo lyanjipfulutsa inyipfo kya indi lyamfeṟya nyo owanzo.
50003002	Ringenyi wai mashite, keweringenyi wewuta sha wuwicho muwe moringa weweha wotahacha.
50003003	Kyamba odino lulya nyi lodu so lokewikya Ruwa wuindi kui Mumuyo lukakuichika kui Kristo Yesu lulechikusirya na nyama tsa mbihu.
50003004	Ma kuwode kiwentewa inyi njiwechikusirya na mbihu. Kokoya kwipfo mndu ma kawa u akusirye na nyama tsa mbihu, kya ngoseṟa nyio inyi.
50003005	Inyi m mndu njii mdine mkonu fo nyanya, o mkambo fo Israeli, o kipaṟika kya Benyamin, Mwebri o Waebri, moindya wuwawaso mbaṟi ya kifarisayo.
50003006	Njiwei mlang'a moterengya siṟi, kya wusumuhanyi wuwukie wuwawasonyi kuweipfo anjiwonya owingopfo.
50003007	Kya indi ishi shiwenjiwiia sha meenasho ngameshitana sha mawuṟa kimaduma kya Kristo.
50003008	Ee-da na shindo shose ngashihamba shii sha mawuṟa sumuhana na imanya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oko lisuṟye lidi. Nao nyio annengye ngatanyo shindo shose mawuṟa ngashihamba mbosha kundu njihende iwada Kristo.
50003009	Njishike ikoyo njii nao, njilai na wusumuhanyi womba woko wuwewukie wuwawasonyi kya indi njii na iwu wohendewa kui wuidiki woidikya Kristo, nyiwo wusumhanyi wowiko nyi Ruwa ipfo kiwanje-hu kya wuidiki wulya.
50003010	Wo immanya o na pfinya ya maṟukyenyi hake na kyando kya mawawyo hake njihende fananyisho nao ma ipfo kipfionyi.
50003011	Njikuwutie-ho ishika ikoya alya maṟukyenyi ha wapfu.
50003012	Manya njilemshika ilikoya ma imarisikia ichiapfo kya indi ngakulasa na njia kulako njechiliwada kitewe nyi kipfa njilembado nyi Kristo Yesu.
50003013	Wanawawama, chi ngakuhamba njimonyi cha ili ngamaa iliwadapfo, kya indi kimu tupu kinjiwode, nyi ngahadima shilya shii mhongo njikuleshya shii mdonyi.
50003014	Njikambia njekuṟungamisha wowinza wulya wo ndaho iya iwukie ipfo huye ikeri ya Ruwa kui Kristo Yesu.
50003015	Kyasia so lui waholotsi na iki luwe lochikihia. Kokoya kwipfo ma kingi muihiahia kyakyo na Ruwa echikimtambahaluya.
50003016	Aka-wo oondo lushikye itisiki lutisiki.
50003017	Wanawawama, muwe waitumanyi wako mbeambuya na iwo wekechumia wado chando muluwade so lui kila kya moo.
50003018	Cha kipfa kwipfo wafoi wekechumia mbaṟi njilembia kyayo kafoi ngawuya iwahamba-se na wulalu njefuha, ke nyi wai wakituwa wa msalaba fo Kristo.
50003019	Hando wakeri ikushitsya-ho wawenyi ipfo odetsonyi ndewu nyiyo Ruwa owo, kiṟumi kyawo kiwaendye wuṟenze, nawo nyiwo wekekumbuo shikeri sha wanda ii.
50003020	Indi kiluwikye so kanyi kulya ruwehu kikeri. Nyi hondo luiwedya Mndumii Yesu Kristo nachee-pfo ai mletsi.
50003021	Nao nyio echikaa nailache mbihu fodu fo wunyonge fuwute-ho ifanana na mbihu foke fui na wuitoṟi. Kechiwa kidi kisumhanye pfinya iya awode yemnenga echilaṟa shose shi yake.
50004001	Nanyo wanawawama wako njimkundi, ngawewado nanyo nyi meṟeṟuko nyo mui msiha foko na otariche loko, kaenyi muhoroki chimu kui Mndumii, wakunde wako.
50004002	Ngatutuma Euodia ngawetutuma Sintike ke wawe wechihia mhie fumu kui Mndumii.
50004003	Na iyo-se Sinzigo oko msalari, ngakuterewa na iyo uwaikanye nyiwo wawerianyi na inyi ikapanya ndumi ya sia ya okiio handu hamu na Klemensi na wakyando wako walya wengi wai-waṟehye marina hawo ipfo kitabunyi kya moo.
50004004	Kechihiyonyi shiheri shose ngawuya ihamba chihiyonyi mui-walunge na Mndumii.
50004005	Wuho wonu wumanyike ko wandu woose Mndumii nyi afui nache.
50004006	Mulakuinadye kya kindo ma kida, indi shilya mushiwuṟye muwe moshisendya Ruwa kui wuindi na kui kifuhyo na kui mwaano.
50004007	Na ofoṟo lo Ruwa ilu lung'anye mahio hose nyilo lochiringa ngoo tsanu na makusaṟo hanu mui-walunge na Kristo Yesu.
50004008	Lyefurumia, nyo wanawawama, oryo kii kya lohi, oryo kii na sonu njicha, oryo kii kihorotsu, oryo ki kiharami, oryo kichihianyi oryo kisongowia, maa kui-ho kya opfudi na wuhoneri kyasho muhane-hane necha.
50004009	Ishi mulekupfunda nasho koko mukashiwada kui iicho na iwona sho muwe mochishiwuta, na ofoṟo lo Ruwa lochikaa nanyo.
50004010	Inyi njii mchihie mnu kui Mndumii cha kipfa ohido lonu mokenjihidya nalo lomitika-se ileheka ipfo kundo muweikunda kya indi mukawewuṟa mwaanya.
50004011	Chi ngadeda njidi njiiwuṟapfo, kyamba inyi njikuloshye ikutsia na shilya njii nasho.
50004012	Ngamanya ikaa njewuṟa ngamanya ikaa njiwode sha mweena. Njii mtsane njiichiwiane na shose kui kimu kui kimu, kui ikaa njii mwihutsu kui ikaa njelio n njaa, kui iwuṟa na kui iwona.
50004013	Ngakuidimya njido shose njii na ichu monjikapya owanzo.
50004014	Ma kikamba kido na momtana kya wucha ili mulewada kyando na shiwira shi shako.
50004015	Nanyo Wafilipi, muichi muwenyi mandi halya ndumi ya sia ya okiio ilewoka yongoyo ilindi njilewuka ipfo Makedonyia nyi kulaweipfo siṟi ingi iwode kyando na inyi kui itala lya tsecha na tsehenda shile nanyo mbenyi tupu.
50004016	Na lyandi njiwei ipfo Tesalonyikye mulenjidikya tseluya moo ma limu na kawi lang'u?
50004017	Chi njiipfula kitarama inyipfo, kya indi njiipfula mwengeṟya fuhendetalio fonu.
50004018	Na ngambona shose shamba sha mfeṟa. Nyi njilemsuṟyo njido iliindi ngamwambya osano lonu lomendo nyi Epafrodito. Lo opuo lopfama mnu necha, nyilo odambiko lukundikye luchihiana na Ruwa.
50004019	Na Ruwa chu oko echimsumba nyo ishi muwuṟye shose kui wusuṟi woke womanyisha wuitoṟi wu wui na Kristo Yesu.
50004020	E-wo Ruwa chu ai na Ndeyadu nyio akaa-pfo echiwikyo wuitoṟi maheri hose halunganyi mlungana Amenyi.
50004021	Kenjiiṟikienyi oryo mwele ai-msanze na Kristo Yesu. Wanawawama wa wai na inyi na wamwiṟikiṟa.
50004022	Waele wo wamwiṟikiṟa wose, sa wasonguo-ho nyiwo wa mbenyi tsa Kaisari.
50004023	Wutonga wo Mndumii Yesu Kristo wukae na mumuyo ya mrima yanu.
51001001	Inyi Paulo njii msu o Kristo Yesu njimbike nyi Ruwa, so na Timoteo, manowama.
51001002	Lomuiṟikiṟa wanawawama mui Kristo-hu wa ipfo Kolosai wandu wa Ruwa waidiki; wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo-lu luwikie ko Ruwa Ndeyadu.
51001003	Loana Ruwa Nde o Mndumii odu yesu Kristo kiheri kyose luimterewya koke.
51001004	Ili lomwicho kya mwidikie fonu kiidi kya Kristo Yesu na kya kikunda kilya kyanu ko wandu wa Ruwa wose.
51001005	Kimaduma kya kilya muiwedie muiwasurumye ipfo ruwehu. Nakyo nyi momsonguo ikiicho kui idedo lya wulohi wurie Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio.
51001006	Iya ishikye na konu. Kyamba chando ikeri wuyana kose yechikumbia mecha na ipfumbuka na wudo na ipfo konu, wokya mkonu fulya mleicho kya wutonga wo Ruwa mukawemanya wulohi woyo.
51001007	Nyi wudo mulelosho osario lu lo Ruwa nyi Epafra mokyando chu odu mkunde ai mṟundi o Kristo momhendelya nyo.
51001008	O nalelumanyisha na kikunda kyanu mulesumbo nyi Mumuyo.
51001009	Nkyo kitewe wokya mkonu luleicho naso luimterewya kitsitsi lochiomba kundu Ruwa namuinenge wurango wose wo kilya akundi, namuichuṟe osaṟe na wurango wo Mumuyo foke.
51001010	Kudo mochiidima ichumia mchumie fuchihianyi na Mndumii na iwuta mecha hamchihirie kiheri kyose. Moo yanu yechikumbia ndunda njicha. Cha ikidi liwikie ndunda mualuke na ipfumbuka mochimanya Ruwa.
51001011	Ruwa namsumbe owanzo lose lusumhanye pfinya ya wuitoṟi woke imwendie itirisia na ikukarishia lyose.
51001012	Mochiana kui sia Wande chu alelutsana lusumhanye ohawi lo kyoṟa Ruwa aleteseheṟia Wandu wakye ipfo kidembonyi kya sa.
51001013	Nyio aleluletsa eluwuta wuaapfinyienyi wo meema kyechiluteteṟa kaweluwika wumanginyi wo Mana okye mkunde.
51001014	Lui nao lukuwude na ndalai, mfo mhoṟie fo manyamaṟo.
51001015	Kristo nyio mfano fo lohi fo Ruwa chu elekewono, ai Mowee o kuwoka mnene o shiumbe shoose.
51001016	Kipfa ishi shose shiipfo maruwehu na kunu wuyana, shilya shiwonyio na shilya shilawonyio shilewiko ku mweke foke, manya shipfumbi sha wuitoṟi, manya menge tsa wusuṟi manya wuwawa manya wuaapfinya. Ishi shose shilewiko nyio kundu shiwe shake.
51001017	Kristo naweipfo shiwumbe shilamekaa-pfo, shikukerye-ho kui o, orio kyimu handu hakyo.
51001018	Nao ai mdo fo mbihu foke mfo siṟi. O ai moasa, mboki o moo fo mbihu fo. O nyi Mana mbee aṟukiye wapfunyi, kundu nawe mosongoya shose o amonyi.
51001019	Kyamba Ruwa amonyi aledumbuo ke Mana nawode mfeṟa fo kiruwa fose fukukaye nao.
51001020	Kui samu ya Kristo msalabenyi Ruwa nalekunda isanza wuyana-wu nao. Ruwa kawika-ho oforo, kechisanza shoose sha ruwehu na sha wuyana-wu nao.
51001021	Nanyo ili kacha muwei mbaṟinyi njihenu kuleshe na Ruwa na ya kituwa nao kui mhio yanu yekuhamba mawutonyi halya hanu mawicho.
51001022	Indi kui opfu lo Mana okye awei na moo iya wuyana; Wulalu Ruwa amembuta owingo ipfo mbihu-hu fo nyama Ruwa amemusanza nao kundu namhoṟotse oshangunyi loke mui waele, wecha mulawode tewe manya imwanduya.
51001023	Kimuwaṟi nyo ikaa mukuwode tupu wuidikinyi mukuilikie-ho mui na kidembo kiwanzi mulechiwa iteshuo ipfo owedionyi lo Ndumi ya Sia, ii momwicho iwemwongoyo mbika iikeri shi ya ruwehu yose; na inyi Paulo ngamba mṟundi o Ndumi ya Sia.
51001024	Wulalu ngachihio ipfo mawawiṟonyi halya njiiwawyo kipfa kyanu ngawemarisa shiwira sha Kristo ipfo mbihuhu foko ishi shiwekundi yengeṟyo-ho sha mbihu fu foke, mfo siṟi.
51001025	Na inyi njimbike mṟundi-oyo kui wuiṟichi wu wo Ruwa njilewudambikio wo kiira kyanu, kundu njiawutsie necha imwongoya idedo li lya Ruwa.
51001026	Kyo kyama kikoome kiwei kiowishe wandu wokya kacha, indi kikawewonesio wandu wake wulalu.
51001027	Nyiwo-ng'u Ruwa alekunda iwamanyishya wandu wakye wusuṟi-wu wo kyama kyo kiele kikoome chando kisuṟie. Nakyo nkyo Kristo kiidi kyanu mosuṟa mowedyo.
51001028	Nyio Kristo luimhamba lochitutuma orio mndu ose na ipfunda orio mndu ose kui wuṟango wose kundu luhoṟotse-ho orio mndu ose oshangunyi lo Ruwa natoṟikye Kristo toṟi.
51001029	Nakyo nyi ngakiwinya njekapana kui wuitiki wu wo Kristo wuiṟunda kiidi kyako na pfinya ing'anyi.
51002001	Kipfa njikundi mumanye ngapano njiwode nyi njiki yemukapanya nyo, na wa ipfo Laodikia na walya walalemewone oshangu loko na meso.
51002002	Njiiṟunda njidi kundu ngoo tsawo tsihendekarisho tsilungana kikundenyi tsiwefeṟyo mfeeṟa fo welu ya wutiichi wose wo imanya kyama kikoome kya Ruwa nkyo Kristo amonyi.
51002003	Ipfo kokye shisa sha wuṟango na wulaanyi shii shiṟike-pfo shose.
51002004	Ngahamba iki kundu kulawone mndu echimlemba na mbonyi tsa wongo ma kokoya tsenongowya mdonyi.
51002005	Kipfa ili njilai konu kui mbihu indi kui mumuyo njii konu njechichihio njewona osenge lonu na owanzo lo ikuihetsa lyanu na Kristo.
51002006	Na wulalu chando muleambya Kristo Yesu Mndumii muhendeke mukuwode nao.
51002007	Mukapie-ho mri kiidi kyakye mui wailikie-ho na iwanzio wuidikinyi chando mulemlosho mochikusuṟa kiidi kyawo kui mwaano.
51002008	Kuṟisenyi mulawone mndu echimduo wapfunguo kui wulaanyi wulya wo kiwandu na wulembi wo mbonyi tsa wulya tsiduana na ṟungusu tsa wandu, tsa shiwundo sha wuyana wu shiladuanyi na Kristo amonyi.
51002009	Cha kipfa mfeṟa fo Wuruwa futsindye na Kristo fose fuwonekie nao kui mbihu.
51002010	Nanyo mui wafeṟe mfeṟa fo moo fumu nao ichu ai mdo fo orio wuitoṟi na wunene.
51002011	Ili mlekulunga na Kristo muledino kimu nao, odinonyi lulali lo wandu lowuta-ho kinyama kya mbihu, nyi odino lo Kristo amonyi kui iletso lyiwukye Wumdunyi wo wunyamari.
51002012	Kipfa mulemriko kimu nao ipfo wupatisonyi mukaweṟutso kimu nao kui wuidiki wo mwamtsie fo Ruwa alemṟutsa Kristo wapfunyi.
51002013	Kawemtana nanyo muwade moo fumu kimu nao nyo muwei wapfu kui manyamaṟo na kui wundaka wo nyama tsanu echimhoṟya manyamaṟo hanu hose.
51002014	Nyi aleangatsa kiṟehio kilya kiweekiṟehie kui owoko kiwei sile hima yadu, nkyo mawiko halya nakyo kiweluanduya kakiwuta ipfo kiidi echikikapya msalabenyi.
51002015	Kristo Kahenda yatuo waitoṟi nao waapfinya no Warufu kewaloṟa na pata echiwamanyisha wai wawinze ewaduo wapfungo amonyi.
51002016	Wulalu manya mndu nalamdedye kya kindo kyelya ang'u kyenyo ang'u kya mkonu mnene mweri fudeḵye ang'u kya msabato.
51002017	Isho nyi shikeri mṟishe tupu fuisongoro nyi kilya kikeri yafukia nakyo nyi mbihu fo Kristo.
51002018	Manya mndu oose nalamuwonyie mti echikundya wutindili na wuindi wo mbaṟi ya wasu wa ruwehu aikushela kya shilya amewona echikutimbisha kui mhie ya nyama tsake alawode mweke Mndu o mbari ii amtondoshe nyi wulembi wo wuyanawu.
51002019	Nakuletsana na Kristo ma alakuwada na mdo fu. Kiidi ya Kristo mpfo kundo mbihu fokyehawio pfinya na owanzo fose folungo kui mapayano na mapfungano foching'ana mng'ano chando Ruwa akundi.
51002020	Kokoya momepfa hamu na Kristo ipfa lyemletsa na pfinya tsa waṟufu wechilia wuyana-wu. Nyi kili muichumiase cha ili mui-se wa wuyana?
51002021	Nkyi ili muiwikio mawawaso weehamba manya kulapaye iki; ma kulasonje kilya ma kulawde kilya!
51002022	Isho shose shelya shihendesia shii shiwawasye shiwetungo nyi wandu.
51002023	Shindo cha isho shihambo shii wuṟango kui wuindi woindya Ruwa njia yawo wawenyi na kui mkununye na kui yotoya mbihu nasho shiwode ma wusuṟi woihutsa nyamapfo.
51003001	Mukameṟutso kimu na Kristo ke-walyenyi shiipfo huye, ipfo kundo Kristo ai adamye owokonyi lo kulyo lo Ruwa.
51003002	Muwe mohia sha ipfo huye chi ishi shii sha wanda iipfo.
51003003	Cha kipfa nyo mompfa na moo fonu fui mṟike kimu na Kristo ipfo ko Ruwa.
51003004	Mandi Kristo chu moo fonu echimanyika matika naho mochimanyika nanyo kimu nao wuitoṟinyi.
51003005	Kyo kimwitike muhende iwaha mamlungia halya hanu hai ha wuyana: wuṟuhui, wungafu; wukuwu; wulanga wuwicho, sanza-ho na wuehi ili wukeri wuindi woindya maruwa ha wongo.
51003006	Shindo cha isho shatewa nyashi ya Ruwa icheye iwo woose waimleha.
51003007	Kuwewode kiheri nanyo muweichumia modao nyisho, nyi matika halya mlechilio nyisho.
51003008	Indi wulalu nanyo kimuwaṟi muhendekuatuo isho shose, nyashi, lango wuwicho, mkuchu, wusutsu, madedo ha sheeṟe halawukye dumbunyi lyanu.
51003009	Mulawiane wongo nyo muwenyi na wenyi ili momaa ikushikuo wumndu wu wo kacha ham na mawuto hawo hoose.
51003010	Murae na wumndu wuhya; echiwiko kui wuhya nyi Ruwa, momuumba. Mfano fo mtsany okye kundu nammanye necha Ruwa.
51003011	Mpfondo kulawode ai Mgriki na Myuda, mdine na alamdine, o mtsudu na o nuka, isinga na isumba, indi shose nyi Kristo, o akuwode nasho shose.
51003012	Nanyo ili mui wasambuṟe wa Ruwa waele na wakunde wake Ḵuwikyenyi wucha woichio mndu wukiwa kui ngoo na wukesi, wo oshangu na ikunyiṟa na wuhoo na woloṟu.
51003013	Muhoyane muwenyi na wenyi mochihoṟyana kokoya kwipfo awode kyededya ungi. Chando nao Mndumii alemuhorya nyo nanyo kimuwaṟi muwute mudo-ng'u.
51003014	Indi mwengeṟia fo isho shose nyi kikunda, kipfa kikunda nkyo kilunga kya orio mbika ikawa imu itoṟikye.
51003015	Na ofoṟo lo Kristo luchilie ngoo tsanu, ilu mui walahie kyalo muwe mbihu fumu. Nkyo kimnenge mochimwaana.
51003016	Dedo lya Kristo likae ipfo konu na mfeṟa folyo foose, Muwe mochifundana na iikimbana wuṟango wose. Mochiimbya Ruwa ipfo ngoo tsanu shiimbo sheterewa na sheṟumisha na shiimbo shi shiamtse nyi Mumuyo shehamba wutonga wu.
51003017	Na orio kindo muiwuta kui ideda ma kui iṟunda mukiwute mochisenda-ho rina lya Yesu Mndumii mowikya Ruwa Wande mwaano na mweke foke.
51003018	Nyo waka, kuwikenyi shi ya wamii wanu kipfa chando kiwaṟi kisumhanye chando Mndumii akundi.
51003019	Nyo womi, kundenyi waka wanu mulawapufukye.
51003020	Nyo wana idikyenyi wafee wanu kya shindo shose, kipfa ikyi kichihianyi na Mndumii.
51003021	Nyo mui wafee, mulapfulutse wana wanu, kundu walawuko madima ihuta na macha.
51003022	Nyo masinga, idikyenyi wanene wanu iya wuyana kya shindo shose, chi kui wuindi wo oshangu kya ichiana na wandu-pfo, kya indi kui ngoo yoose mochiowuo Mndumii.
51003023	Orio kindo mochikirunda, mukiṟunde kui mrima foose cha ili kiikya Mndumii ma chi kya mndu o wandu-pfo.
51003024	Mochimanya ke mochiambya wueri wuwukie ko Mndumii, nawo nyi kyoṟa kilya. Ṟundienyi Kristo Mndumii!
51003025	Cha kipfa ichu anyamaṟa echitao kya kilya awenyamaṟie. Ruwa ekyekundia-pfo.
51004001	Nyo wanene, muwonye masinga kilya kisumhanyi na wuleheṟi mochimanya ke nanyo mui na Mndumii ipfo ruwehu.
51004002	Mutsinde kiterewyonyi; mulae nakyo chowe mochiaana Ruwa.
51004003	Muweluterewya naso kundu Ruwa naluṟuhuye kichumi kyeonguo dedo lyakye li lyehamba kirikye kya Kristo kipfa njiipfunge kimaduma kyalyo.
51004004	Terewenyi kundu njiidime ikimanyisha chando kinjiwari ideda.
51004005	Chumienyi mochikaya walya walaidikie kui wuṟango muikurohya na oryo mwaanya muwode.
51004006	Dedo lyanu liwe lyenongowya mdonyi kiheri kyose likae lyelodaloda mbala, mumanye chando kimuwari ihaluo orio mndu kiheri kyoose.
51004007	Kya oloho lo koko nyi Tikiko echimwongoya shose. Nyio mwanowama mkunde, mtarami mhendeli, mokyando odu kiṟundionyi kya Mndumii.
51004008	Kitewe ngamduma konu, nyi kundu mumanye oloho loko nawekarisha ngoo tsanu.
51004009	Naicha arianyi na Onesmo, mwanowama ichu mhendeli mkunde nao akeri o ipfo konu. Wo wechimuongoya shose shiwutika kunu.
51004010	Aristariko lui nao kipfungyonyi nyi amwiṟikiṟa wai, na Marko manamae o Barnaba. (Kyake momemwambya na shiwawaso, mandi echicha na konu mumwambye.)
51004011	Na Yesu chu esendo Yusto, namuiṟikiṟikira. Wo wakeri kiidi kya wayuda waidikie, nawo wawenyi watarami wako waiṟundya wumangi wo Ruwa, nawo walenjiwiia kitarama kying'anyi mnu.
51004012	Odoyanu Epafra amwiṟikiṟa ai o konu, na isinga lya Kristo Yesu echimkapanya nyo kiheri kyose ipfo shiterewonyi shake kundu muhoṟoke-ho mutimie mui wawanzie orio kindo Ruwa akundi kyose.
51004013	Na inyi ngamṟingishia kye nyi aikuwinyisha mnu kipfa kyanu na kya wa Laodikia na kya wa Hierapoli.
51004014	Luka amwiṟikiṟa mhanga ichu odu mkunde, na Demasi.
51004015	Iṟikiṟenyi wanawawama wa Laodikia na mana mshiki Nyimifa na siṟi yo ipfo wekesanzia ipfo kanyi kokye.
51004016	Kombona momsomyo baruo ii mutambahane kundu isomyo na siṟinyi ya Walaodikia, na iya iledikyo Laodikia kundu nanyo muweisomyo.
51004017	Muwie na Arikipo, ambuya wai kundu uinutsye oṟundo lulya ulewada kui Mndumii.
51004018	Aiki kiṟikiṟo kii kya owoko loko inyi Paulo. Muwe monkumbuo na mshe i njimpfunge nayo. Wutonga wo Ruwa wukae nanyo.
52001001	So Paulo na Silwano na Timoteo loiṟikiṟa siṟi ya ko Watesalonyikye iinjiwike kui Ruwa wande na Mndumii Yesu Kristo wutonga na ofoṟo shikae nanyo.
52001002	Luiwikya Ruwa mwaano mfiri yose kimaduma kyanu lochimsenda shiterewonyi shadu.
52001003	Lulatsia itamuo oshangunyi lo Ruwa odu Wande kyando kya wuidiki wonu na mawina ha kikunda na ikukarishia lya owedo lyewedya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
52001004	Aka-wo wanawawama wakunde nyi Ruwa, chi luichi ke muiwasambuṟe!
52001005	Ili ndumi yo yadu ya sia ya okiio ilawembiia nyo kui dedo liyenyi indi na kui pfinya na kui Mumuyo Mwele na kui wutichi wose. Nanyo mwichi chando lulekukaya konu kipfa kyanu.
52001006	Mukamekuwakisha naso na Mndumii mombada dedo lilya kituryonyi muwewodo nyi sia ya Mumuyo Mwele.
52001007	Ikyo kilemtana nyo msendo fo ko waidikye wose wa ipfo Makedonyia na wa ipfo Akaya.
52001008	Kyamba ipfo konu dedo lya Mndumii lilembuka-ho likaweichio necha chi alya Makedonyia na Akaya tupupfo, kya indi wuidiki wonu woikuwada na Ruwa wukawemanyika hando hose kilakilukoya-se ideda kya ikyo.
52001009	Kipfa wekehamba wa wenyi kyadu njia lulemwitso nayo ipfo konu nyi nki, na chando mulemhalukya Ruwa momlehana na mfano iya muwe mochipfuṟukanya Ruwa menyi-moo ai o lohi.
52001010	Na iwedya Mana oke ichu alemṟutsa wapfunyi nache awuka ipfo ruwehu, nyio Yesu moluringa nyashi iya ikeri icha.
52002001	Kipfa mwichi wuwenyi, wanawawama, ke lulekuidya ipfo konu kya wulyapfo.
52002002	Indi ili luwemewawiṟo na ituro ipfo Filipi chando muichi lukawekukahaṟa na Ruwa chu odu luwehenda ihamba ipfo konu ndumi ya sia ya okiio na ngapano ing'anyi.
52002003	Wuikimbi wu wodu wuwekuwode manya na wudetsi na wulembipfo, ma mtambo iweihopfo.
52002004	Kya indi chando luletungo nyi Ruwa naludambikye ndumi ya sia ya okiio nyi wudo luideda, chi kundu luwe lochichiana na wandu indi na Ruwa ichu ametunga ngoo tsadu.
52002005	Kipfa lulekupaya-ho na idedo lya ikulopa na wandu ma indipfo, ikyo mwichi, manya na iitsa-ho mweke fo wuehi, Ruwa ai mongochi.
52002006	Manya lulelalakya kiṟumi kiwukye wandunyipfo, ma kya konu ma kya ko wengipfo.
52002007	Luwerie pfinya yekaa-ho na mkoromu cha wasu wa kristo indi lulemba wahoneri ipfo kiidi kyanu cha ili mka mwongo aikunjia shikoku shake ndenyi.
52002008	So na wudo luwewodo m macha kyanu lukawekunda imwenenga chi ndumi ya sia ya okiio tupupfo indi na mrima ii menyi; nyi wudo mulemba wakunde wadu.
52002009	Kekumbuonyi-ng'u-wo ngatara tsadu na wawina, wanawawama. Luweiṟunda kio na mfiri, kundu lulawewona lochirohya ma umu onu iliindi luwemwongoya ndumi ya sia ya okiio iya ya Ruwa.
52002010	Nyo na Ruwa mui wangochi ke mkae iya luwemkaya nyo mui waidiki iwei ya wuhendeli na wuhoṟotsu na wusalari.
52002011	Na mwichi chando luleikimba orio umu onu.
52002012	Na imkarisha nyo na imtutuma cha mndu wande ekewutya mana, kundu muchumie mchumie isumhanye Ruwa ichu alemulahya nyo wumangi wulya woke na wuitoṟi.
52002013	Nakyo nyi kimaduma na so lotsinda lochiana Ruwa cha kipfa dedo lyo lya Ruwa momambya moicho kodu muleliwada chi cha dedo lya wandupfo kya indi chando likeri kya lohi cha dedo lya Ruwa. Nalyo likuwode nanyo mui waidiki lyechiṟunda.
52002014	Kipfa nanyo, wanawawama, momba waoshi wa siṟi tsa Ruwa tsiwodo nyi Kristo Yesu tsii ipfo Yudaya ili momeliso wukiwa wumu natso nyi washari wanu wenyi chando wo waleliso nyi Wayuda.
52002015	Nawo nyi wo walewaha Mndumii Yesu na waikimbi walya wakawelufuna naso. Wo waindya Ruwapfo, wawode tumbe na wandu wose.
52002016	Wechiluima yongoya mkambo ya wandu mbonyi kundu wahende ikiṟo. Kyawa kido kyeichuṟa manyamaṟo hawo kiheri kyose. Indi nyashi iya ya mainutsyonyi ilemcha huyawo.
52002017	Indi so, wanawawama, ili luwei waletse nanyo cha wangoeda kya oweṟe lumu kui oshangu chi kui ngoo lulekambiṟa kambi iwona oshangu lonu na macha hang'anyi.
52002018	Nkyo kitewe luwekundi icha na konu, inyi Paulo limu na lyakawi, indi Satana kaluima.
52002019	Kipfa nyi wu ai owedo lodu na sia na oṟo nchope ya kiṟumi ipfo sumhana na Mndumii odu Yesu mandi echikuloṟa kokoya chila nanyo.
52002020	Kyamba nyo mui wuitoṟi wodu na sia.
52003001	Nkyo ili lulawekiidima itsuwa luledumbuo ke luhende ideo ipfo Atene luwenyi.
52003002	Lukaweduma Timoteo manowama odu mṟundi o Ruwa mopfuṟukanya ndumi ya Kristo kundu nambanze nyo nawemkarishia wuidiki.
52003003	Kulawone kochiwoneka afafaa shiwirenyi ishi. Kipfa nyo muwenyi muichi ke luiwawike kya ikyo.
52003004	Kyamba na mandi luwei konu lulesonguo imbia ke nyi kiluwari ituro. Na wudo kilemba chando muichi.
52003005	Nkyo kitewe na inyi njilekiidima itsuwa ngamdumya kya imanya wuidiki wu wonu, kulako mtewi ulya amemtewa na mawina hadu hakawewa ha wulya.
52003006	Na wulalu ili Timoteo amcha kodu ewuka konu kaweluchihiṟa eluongoya wuidiki wulya wonu na kikunda kilya na mkumbuye mcha muwode fo ilukumbuo so kiheri kyose, mui na macha heluwona so chando na so luwodo nyi hanu.
52003007	Nkyo kileenenga ipfo mkoromunyi na kiwirenyi kyadu kyose lomekarishyo kyanu kui wuidiki wu wonu, wanawawama.
52003008	Luitsinda na moo wulalu iliindi nyo muhoṟoki mukuwode na Mndumii.
52003009	Kipfa mwaano nyi mki loidima itaa Ruwa kipfa kyanu sia yo yose luichihio yanu sumhana na Ruwa chu odu.
52003010	Lukeri iterewa kio na mfiri lochiwika matu matu kundu luwone oshangu lonu na imarisa wuidiki wu wonu hando wowuṟa-se mwengeṟia.
52003011	Nao Ruwa amonyi, Ndeyadu na Mndumii odu Yesu naluhoṟotsie njia yadu yeshika konu.
52003012	Na Mndumii namwengeṟye kikunda kyekundana muwenyi na wenyi na ikunda wose nakifeṟe mnu kimu na kilya so lumkundi na kyo.
52003013	Kundu ngoo tsanu tsihende ikanzo tsikae nlalutsu tsii na wuele sumhana na Ruwa Wande odu, matika Mndumii odu Yesu echiwoneka handu hamu na waele wake wose.
52004001	Iki kyamsia, wanawawama, luimterewa na imwikimbi kui Mndumii Yesu kundu muitike ichumia mochihenda mbele chando muleambya kiwewukye kodu kiimtutumya mchumie ichihianyi na Ruwa, nayo na muichumia mudo.
52004002	Nanyo muichi mawawaso lulemwenenga na mweke fo Mndumii Yesu nyi maki.
52004003	Kipfa kilya Ruwa akundi nyi wuilishi wonu, mudiche wuṟuhui.
52004004	Orio mndu onu namanye ikuwonya iṟahembe lyake kui wuilishi na wuindi.
52004005	Lilawe lya kya nyashi ya waaka.
52004006	Cha kya mkambo ya kihenu ilaichi Ruwa. Ma mndu nalawone echieera manomae mbuchenyi ma imlemba, kipfa Mndumii ai mdeheli modehelya kya ishi shose chando lulemsonguo imbia na iṟingishia.
52004007	Kyamba Ruwa alelulahia ngafupfo kya indi kawelulaha kui wuilishi.
52004008	Nkyo kimaduma mndu aleha iki aileha mndu o wandupfo indi Ruwa chu alemwinenga nyo Mumuyo oke mwele.
52004009	Indi kilya mulawuṟie muhende iṟehio kyakyo nyi kikundana, cha kipfa nyo muwenyi mui wapfunde nyi Ruwa kya ikundana muwenyi na wenyi.
52004010	Mukawewutya ikyo na wanawawama wose wakeri ifo Makedonyia kose. Indi lomtutuma muwike-ho mwengeṟia.
52004011	Muwe mowinya-ho kiṟumi kyanu mochipfirilia na ipfuṟukanya shilya shanu na iṟunda na mawoko hanu hamenyi, chando lulembawasya.
52004012	Kundu muchumie ohendo lulawa idedyo nyi walya wai ora lo nja mulawuṟie mweke fowo hando.
52004013	Nyo wanawawama, lokunda imdeya mulaichi kii kiteṟye kya walya walemaa iinutsopfo, kundu mulakae mochikuinadia cha walya wengi walawode kyekuwedya.
52004014	Kipfa kokoya lokusirya ke Yesu alempfa kaweṟuka, na wudo Ruwa echiduo walya wai wainutsye njia imu nao iisume nyi Yesu.
52004015	Na iki lurie imbia lombia kii kidedo kya Mndumii nakyo kikeri kiile, ke so ili lochikoyo luitsuhaa lui na moo kiheri kilya kya iwuya lya Mndumii, manya lochisongoṟyo wai wainutsiepfo.
52004016	Kipfa matika halya koichio iwawaso lyeamtsa ṟu lya msu mwele mchili na ombe lo Ruwa lochideda, Mndumii kachesoka ruwehu, oweṟe na lulya wapfie wa Kristo wechiṟuka wasonguo.
52004017	Ikyo kilemba naso ili lui-se na moo luitsuhaa lochidao handu hamu na walya lui mapuchinyi lushike kumbuhanana na Mndumii ipfo mumuyohu. Na wudo lochikaa lui hamu na Mndumii maheri hose.
52004018	Wihiṟianenyi moo nyo muwenyi na wenyi mochiongoyana oloho lu.
52005001	Indi kya maheri halya na mwaanya iya muwuṟye muhende iṟehyopfo.
52005002	Kipfa nyo muwenyi mwichi na kamu ke mkonu fo Mndumii, cha mwiwi o kio nyi wudo fochicha.
52005003	Mandi waihamba, ofoṟo na owanzo, na hondo orumatso lowatumukya pereseng'u cha okoṟa lohoya mka ai mnene, walaidima idicha.
52005004	Indi nyo, wanawawama, mukeri meemenyi fochimwenengya mkonu fulya fumtumukye cha mwiwipfo.
52005005	Kipfa nyo mui wana wa sa mose na wana wa mfiri. Lui wa kio manya wa meemapfo.
52005006	Kikamba kido manya lulahombye cha walya wengi, kya indi lulae dembo lochikuotoya.
52005007	Walya welaa wekelaa ili koila na walya wekunanza wekenango ili kio.
52005008	Indi so ili lui wa mfiri lukuotoye luṟeee na kiringa mdo nakyonyiowedo loiweda okiṟo.
52005009	Kipfa Ruwa aleluteseheṟya nyashipfo kya indi kundu lukuwade na okiio kui Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
52005010	Nyio amelupfia kundu so ma lui-ho ma lulee lutsinde moonyi hamu nao.
52005011	Mukarishane na ikyo muwe mochikuheluana mndu na odoya chando muweiwuta.
52005012	Indi lomterewa, wanawawama, ke manyenyi iwa waimuwinya nyo na iwukaya kui Mndumii na imtutuma.
52005013	Muwaindye kya woeṟa na iwakunda kimaduma kya iṟunda lyo lyawo. Mwololyane muwenyi na wenyi.
52005014	Indi lomwitika nyo, wanawawama, ke mututume walakaa kambenyi, mukahaṟe wenyi mrima mfafa, walya walawode muwatarame shilya wahuṟi, muwikye wandu wose tirisi.
52005015	Muambuye-ho kundu na mndu nalawone echitaya ungi kiwicho alembutya na kiwicho kyake o aimbutya, indi mutambahanye kiheri kyose iwutiana kilya kii kicha, muwe mokiwutya na wengi wose.
52005016	Chihionyi kiheri kyose.
52005017	Muwe mochiterewa mulatsie.
52005018	Muwike-ho mwaano kya shindo shose. Kyamba nyi iki Ruwa akundi kiwiko nyo kui Yesu Kristo.
52005019	Mulaime Mumuyo.
52005020	Mulamine wuikimbi.
52005021	Indi muheshe shose, musale kii kicha.
52005022	Mudiche kilya kii kiwicho kya orio mbaṟi yose.
52005023	Nao Ruwa menyi ofoṟo amonyi namuilishe wuilishi wuchie wose. Na mumuyo fonu fuawukie na mrima na mbihu ilawade pari ikae mlindie yewedya iwuya lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
52005024	Alulaha nyio mhendeli, nao echiwuta.
52005025	Wanawawama, ke luterewyenyi.
52005026	Muiṟikiṟie wanawawama wose kui ihekyana momu lilya yele.
52005027	Ngamtutumya kui Mndumii ke baruo ii isomyo wanawawama wose.
52005028	Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo wukae nanyo.
53001001	So Paulo na Silwano na Timoteo loiṟikiṟa siṟi ya ko Watesalonyikye ii-njiwike nyi Ruwa Ndeyadu na o Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
53001002	Wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo luwukye ko Ruwa Wande odu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
53001003	Wanawawama, nyi kiluwaṟi iana Ruwa kiheri kyose kipfa kyanu. Na wudo kisumhanyi kipfa kya wuidiki wu wonu wong'ana mnu na kikunda kilya mukundanyi nakyo kikaingiki mnu kya orio mndu onu mose.
53001004	Nakyo kyaenenga so lokuṟumisha kipfa kyanu ipfo siṟinyi tsa Ruwa kya otirisi lonu na wuidiki wo ipfo shiterengyonyi shanu shose na shiwirenyi shilya mulekukarishia kyasho.
53001005	Isho shoose shiṟingishie mdumbuye fo Ruwa fui fo wuhoṟotsu na fo lohi fohamba ke nyo musumhanyi iinengo wumangi wo Ruwa iwu muweiwawiṟo kimaduma kyawo.
53001006	Ruwa nechiwuta kya wusumhanyi, kye nawe motaa matuuro walya walemutuura nyo.
53001007	Nawe momwinenga nyo muhende iwihiṟyo moo handu hamu naso matika halya Mndumii Yesu echikuloṟa asoka ruwehu arianyi na wasu wenyi-pfinya.
53001008	Na olewo lo modo fochiaka pala echidehelya walya walehye Ruwa walaweanguya Ndumi ya Sia ya Mndumii odu Yesu madu.
53001009	Wo wechiwonyo kyewahoṟuo kyewaendie mawawiṟo ha mlungana ipfo oshangunyi Mndumii na ipfo wuitoṟinyi wo pfinya yake.
53001010	Mkonu echicha nakuwutie-ho ewikio kiṟumi kiwukie ko wandu wake, nawe echiichiko nyi kya walya wakye wamwidikye woose. Nanyo na wudo kipfa muleidikia wungochi wodu. Sho shechiwa mkonu fulya fulya.
53001011	Nakyo nyikyo kimaduma luimterewya kiheri kyoose. Kundu Ruwa odu namsumhantsie ndaho ii naweawutsya chila yose ya wucha na iṟunda lya wuidiki kui pfinya.
53001012	Kundu rina lya Mndumii odu Yesu likuwutie konu iichiko, nanyo muweichiko lyiwukie kokye kisumhanye wutonga wo Ruwa na wo Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
53002001	Lomterewa nyo, wanawawama, kya icha lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo na kyadu so ikuwumbya handu hamu nao.
53002002	Kundu mlauko nyi madima owinyi, mlahataṟo mrimenyi manya kui mumuyo mliwe manya kui dedo liliwe manya kui baruo cha ili injiṟehie nyiso yehamba ke Mkonu fulya fo Mndumii fomafukya.
53002003	Kulakaeho echimlemba ma kui njia ii ang'u, ii. Kipfa kwipfo kisonguo nalyo nyi iwuka siṟinyi lilya ling'anyi na ulya mbicho menyi wunyamaṟi nawekuloṟa, nyio mana o orumatso.
53002004	Nao nechikaruo orio kyechiichiko nyi wandu kye nyi Ruwa ang'u wandu wekyekiindia. Katana akudamiṟa amonyi ipfo Hekalunyi lya Ruwa echikumanyisha o amonyi kye akeri Ruwa.
53002005	Mulakikumbuo shilya njilembia shose mandi njiwei-se nanyo?
53002006	Na wulalu mwichi kilya kimtewa mlamanye. Mbicho-chu nechicha kiheri kyakye akundi.
53002007	Ma kudo; Mbicho-chu aowie naiṟunda wulalu; indi echiwono-pfo, tane icho ambowishie echiwukaho.
53002008	Maindi naho Mbicho-chu echikuloṟa. Indi nao Mndumii Yesu echimrumatsa kui mrufu fo dumbu lyake na imkombetsa kombi kui ngesa ya ikuloṟa lyake.
53002009	Na ikuloṟa lilya lya Mbicho-chu lii liitikye nyi Satana kui pfinya yose na shichano na maṟiho ha wongo.
53002010	Na kui mtambo yose ya ifurunja wuhoṟotsu yechilemba iwa wai-wadetse kipfa walalekunda iambia kiilohi kilya wakiṟo.
53002011	Nkyo kyatewa Ruwa kawawika pfinyenyi odetso loitika wahende idikya kii-wongo kilya.
53002012	Kundu wawonyo owingo wose iwo walaleidikya kii-lohi kilya; kya indi wawechihiana na wunyamari wulya.
53002013	Indi kyalukoya so iana Ruwa kiheri kyose kimaduma kyanu, nyo wanawawama mui wakunde nyi Mndumii, kyamba Ruwa alemsambuṟa nyo wokya mawokyonyi mukiṟo mochiilisho nyi Mumuyo muwe wandu muidikyo kii-lohi kilya.
53002014	Nakyo nyi kyo Ruwa lemulahya kui Ndumi yadu ya Sia ya okiio, kundu muhendeduo wuitoṟi wo Mndumii odu yesu Kristo.
53002015	Nakyo kimwenenge, wanawawama, muhoṟoke chimu muwekuwada na kiloshio kilya lulemlosha kui mwongoye na kui baruo tsadu.
53002016	Nao Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo amonyi na Ruwa Ndeyadu ichu alelukunda na iluenenga kiwihiṟia moo kitsinde mulangana na owedo sa ucha kui wutonga.
53002017	Nyio nakarishe ngoo tsanu nawembanza oryo kiṟundionyi na idedonyi lyicha lyose.
53003001	Luterewienyi ko Ruwa Lyefurumia, wanawawama, keluterewyenyi kundu dedo lya Mndumii lidungane na iambio liweindyo cha ipfo konu.
53003002	Terewenyi-da kundu naso Ruwa naluletse na walembi walya wawicho. Kipfa chi wose waidikye Ndumi-pfo.
53003003	Mmhendeli nyio Mndumii. Nao echimbanza na imringa kipuo na mbicho ulya.
53003004	Indi luikusiria na Mndumii kya mbonyi tsanu nanyo ke mukeri iwuta shilya lulembawasya na ikaa mokaa mochishiwuta.
53003005	Indi nao Mndumii namhoṟotsie ngoo tsanu kikunda kya Ruwa na ikukarishia luiwainenge nyi Kristo.
53003006	Natso lombawasya nyo wanawawama, kui rina lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo; kye mlekane na orio manowama awuka kambenyi alaichumia kehendelya opfundo lulya lulemdambikya.
53003007	Kipfa mwichi nyo muwenyi chando kimbari ikuwakisha naso, kyamba so lulewuka kambenyi lyanupfo luwei wadoko-pfo.
53003008	Ma luwekekulia mkate ya nga luweinengo nyi mndupfo, kya indi luwekyekuwinyisha na ikurohya lochiṟunda kio na mfiri kundu lularohye manya umu onu.
53003009	Lulewuta ludo chi cha ili lulawaṟi mulutarame-pfo, kya indi kundu luwe kichano mkuloshie kodu.
53003010	Kipfa na kiheri luwei konu nyi lulembawasya iki kye “Kokoya kwipfo mndu alakunda iṟunda, manya nalaenengo kyelya.”
53003011	Kipfa lomwicho kye ipfo konu kwipfo wandu wekyeṟahaṟaha welekyeṟunda kindo kya indi wai welembeṟia iṟunda wekyeweṟutsa mbonyi tsa wandu wengi.
53003012	Iwo wai wado nyi lowawawasa na iwatutuma kui Mndumii Yesu Kristo ke waṟunde ṟunda wechikutsia walye kyelya kyawo wa wenyi.
53003013	Indi nyo, wanawawama, mulalemo iṟunda mecha.
53003014	Indi kokoya kwipfo mndu alaicho idedo lyadu lya baruo ii, mumbikie kichano, mulakulonge nao kundu nawado nyi sonu.
53003015	Manya mulambade cha ili m mkituwa, kya indi mumkumbuṟe cha manowama.
53003016	Na Mndumii menyi ofoṟo namuenenge ofoṟo mfiri yoose ko orio kindo. Mndumii nakae nanyo mose.
53003017	Aiki kiṟikiṟo kya owoko loko inyi Paulo. Nyi wudi njekyeṟehia orio baruo yoose. Nyi wudo ngaṟehia.
53003018	Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo wukae nanyo mose.
54001001	Inyi Paulo njii msu o Kristo Yesu kui iwawaso lya Ruwa mkiṟi odu na lya Kristo Yesu mowedo nyiso.
54001002	Ngaiṟikiṟa Timoteo manoko mcha o kichong'u kya wuidiki. Wutonga wuwe wopfo na osaṟio na ofoṟo ishi shichee ko Ruwa Wande na ko Kristo Yesu Mndumii odu.
54001003	Lilyandi njiwekure njehenda Makedonyia njilekututuma ke ukae ipfo Efeso, kundu uikimbe wamang'nanya waliwe walawone welosha kiwungi.
54001004	Ma walasumesume shihanu na maitumano ha marika halechidumbuka. Shindo cha isho shekeende mawesano indi shilaende owiko lo Ruwa locha wuidikinyi.
54001005	Indi mṟasa fo wuikimbi wulya nyi ikunda liṟukye ngooyi tsiharami na mrimenyi mcha fuu na ngo tsii teṟe na wuindikinyi wulakulembetseṟye.
54001006	Kwipfo maata waleasha isho wakawedekya sumunyi tsa shindo sha mai.
54001007	Nyi wakutana walosha wa wuwawaso walamanye ma shilya wehamba ma kya shilya wedambuya.
54001008	Indi luichi ke wuwawaso wochia kundo mndu aṟunda nawo kiwuwawaso.
54001009	Echikusaṟa ke wuwawaso wui wuwike kipfa kya mndu asumhanyipfo, indi nyi kipfa kya walya wawuṟie wuchili walai kambenyi; walehanyi na Ruwa, wai wanyamaṟi, wai wambafu wenyi ngafu, iwo wekewuta wande na wama moo, wewaha wandu.
54001010	Waṟuhui, wewichuṟa wanake, weiwa wandu, wededa wongo wefunja nyamu;
54001011	na kya kingi-se kyose iki kikeri ikapana na kiloshyo kyechiṟa mrima kisumhanye ndumi ya okiio iwukie wuitoṟinyi wo Ruwa ichu menyi sia, nayo njileiwawasyo.
54001012	Ngaana Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo mbanzi oko ili alenjikusaṟa mhendeli kanjiwika kipfuṟukanyonyi.
54001013	Mandi njiwemnyeṟuo na mterengi na mwaapfinya. Kya indi nyi njilesaṟyo kipfa ngambuta njido kui wutondo njiwewuṟie wuidiki.
54001014	Indi wutonga wo Mndumii odu wulefo mnu kui wuidiki na kui kunda lilya likeri Kristo-hu Yesu.
54001015	Dedo liṟamtsu lisumuhanyi iindyo nyi wose likeri lile, ke Kristo Yesu amcha wuyana kundu nakiṟe wanyamaṟi, na inyi njii msongoru owo.
54001016	Indi nakyo kilenenga ngasaṟyo njidi kundu Kristo Yesu nasonguo imanyishya koko wuhoo woke wose kya ipfungya mtaato walya wechimwidikya wawade moo fo mlungana.
54001017	Indi mangi ii ya maheri halunganyi ichu alasia alawono, o Ruwa amonyi nakae echiindyo na iichiko maheri hose na hose halunganyi. Amenyi.
54001018	Manoko Timoteo, iwawaso ili ngakuwawasya lirianyi na shisuku shilya shilemsendo huyapfo likeri lile, ke ukupfunge nasho ochiira shia iya njicha.
54001019	Uwode wuidiki na ngo njihoṟotsu tsa mrimenyi. Kyatso maata-ho waletsikumba wakawewunduka na wuidiki wowo.
54001020	Kiidi kyawo kwipfo Himenayo na Aleksandria, wo ngamaa iwadambikya Satana, kundu watsano walakirume.
54002001	Wulalu ngamtutuma kisongoe shose ke muterewe Ruwa muwe mochimbikya matu matu na ikukumba ndenyi tsake muimwaana. Muwike mudo mochiterewia wandu wose.
54002002	Muweterewia wamangi na wanene wose kundu moo fodu fudamie necha fui na olele wyoo fo wutechi na wusalari.
54002003	Ikyo kii kicha kyeidikya ipfo ko Ruwa mkiṟi odu.
54002004	Ichu akundi ke wandu washikekiṟo wose, kii lohi kilya kiwewatambahalukya.
54002005	Kyamba Ruwa nyi umu na msanzi mosanza Ruwa na wandu na umu nyio mndu o wandu Kristo Yesu.
54002006	Nyio ichu alekudambika-ho amonyi ndalai ya italaa wandu wose ihendeṟingishyo ili indi maheri hayo halemshika ikoyo.
54002007	Na inyi njiimbike-ho mwongoyi oyo na msu, ngamba mlosha molosha mkambo ya wandu kui wuidiki na wo-kiilohi ngahamba njido kya lohi njilawongisha kindo.
54002008	Wulalu nyikundi ke womi waterewe orio kundo kose wechiira mawoko ha wuindi walawodo n nyashi ma itautau mdo.
54002009	Na wudo na waka wakusungusie wawenyi kui mṟaye iwamae necha isumhanye sonu na chile, walakuchope na njui njiioke ang'u sahabu ang'u shilukuta ang'u nguo tsekushela.
54002010	Indi liwe lya kilya kisumhanye waka wakuhambie na wuowu woowuo Ruwa lii lya mawuto mecha.
54002011	Mndu mka nakupfunde echiadanya sau ekaa shi ya wuitoṟi.
54002012	Kya ilosha ngaenenga mndu mka momu foloshapfo, manya foidedya mndumii, indi nakutsie necha.
54002013	Cha kipfa Adamu alewumbo kya kuwoka, kilemba ikyo nao Ewa.
54002014	Chio Adamu aletungopfo, indi nyio mka aletungo na kamu kaweshika ihutso.
54002015	Indi nyi echiletso kui ifee lyefee wana ili ekaa wuidikinyi na makundanonyi na wuilishonyi awode osaṟe.
54003001	Idedo lii icha lyeidikya likeri lile, ke kokoya mndu akunda iwa moambuya siṟi alanga iṟunda sa icha.
54003002	Na wulalu mndu moambuya kimbaṟi nawe mndu alawode owingo, ai mii o mka umu asanjikie mdo, menyi osaṟe, mndu msanze, mokunda wahenu, menyi njopfundo.
54003003	Nalawe mkuwi, nalasohuo mondu, indi nawe mwoloṟu alalang'a, alai mweehi.
54003004	Nawe modedya kanyi koke kwenyi mnu necha awodie wana chile wakae na wuindi.
54003005	Kipfa kokoya mndu alaidima idedya kanyi koke kwenyi nyi wuda echipfuṟukanya siṟi ya Ruwa?
54003006	Nalawe mwetsi kundu nalawone echikulandaṟisha nashike ihoya wudehelinyi wo Satana.
54003007	Nakae awode na kiṟumi kicha kya ko walya wai ora lo kya nja, kundu nalahoye wusutsunyi na mtambonyi ya Satana.
54003008	Watarami na wudo wawe wandu weindya, walawode olimi lo kuwi walawado nyi olaka walawe wekapa mbucha njipfu.
54003009	Wakae wakomie kyama kii kiṟike kya wuidiki mrimenyi iwode ngo tsihaṟamie.
54003010	Na wai wado wahendehesho kuwoka, numa wapfuṟukanye siṟi ili wamchia walawode hewadedya.
54003011	Waka na wudo wakae weindya, walahende iduo wandu sumu, wawe wasanjikie mdo, wawe wahendeli kya shindo shose.
54003012	Watarami wakae orio mndumii na mka oke wechidedya necha wana wawo na wa kanyi kowo wose.
54003013	Na iwa wawetaramie siṟi necha wakuwonya kiwaira sa kicha na wureheri wung'anyi wo ipfo wuidikinyi wo Kristo-hu Yesu.
54003014	Ngakuṟehya ishi njekusirya ke nshike ipfo kopfo owinyi.
54003015	Indi kokoya ngakeleo nomanye njia isumuhanyi yekuidya mbenyi ya Ruwa. Nayo nyi siṟi ya Ruwa ichu menyi-mooo, ii ngo iya yekanza kiwulohi.
54003016	Kutambalukye necha kyama kiṟike kya wuindi chando king'anyi. Nakyo kikeri kile: Ichu alekuloṟa kui nyama Kamanyisho mbinzi kui mumuyo Kawonekia wasu Kaweongoyo mkambonyi ya wandu Kaweidikyo wuyana Kairyo wuitoṟinyi.
54004001	Indi mumuyo ahambie na pata ke shiheri sha numa kochiwoneka wewuka wuidikinyi wechiku-wada na mumuyo idetsa wandu na mhambo ya waṟufu wawicho.
54004002	Kui wulembi wo wamawongo iwo wai-wakoṟie ngoru tsa wumbafu ipfo ngonyi tsa mrima yawo.
54004003	Weimbikya yalika na ilya shelya shiliwe isho Ruwa aleshiwika kundu shiambyo kui mwaano nyi waidiki walya waichi ki-wulohi.
54004004	Kipfa orio kii-kiwike nyi Ruwa kii kicha, kulaipfo kyechiwa ileha kokoya kikeri yambyo na imwaana.
54004005	Kyamba kyatano kyele kui dedo lya Ruwa na kui kiterewo.
54004006	Komanyishya wanawawama ishi nyi ochiwa mṟundi o Kristo Yesu sa mcha uimlisiṟe na madedo halya ha wuidiki na ha kiloshyo kilya kicha ukioshye.
54004007	Indi sumu tsilya tsa msaṟakambo tsii tsa kiwukeku tso utsilehe. Kya indi ukutsane kumonyi uwe menyi-wuindi.
54004008	Kya ikutsana lya mbaṟi ya kii-nyama mbucha iwukie-ho nyi sa ntutu. Indi wuindi wulya woengeṟia shose mwengeṟya fo wucha ili fumbikie kyasa kicha kya moo fo wulalu na kya fulya fungi fochicha.
54004009	Idedo ili lii icha lyeidikya lishike iwado nyi wose.
54004010	Nalyo lyaluenenga lokuwinyisha loira-ho ngapano kipfa lokusirya na Ruwa chu menyi moo ai mkiṟi o wandu wose, kya ngoseṟa o walya wamwidikye.
54004011	Wawasya ikyo na ikipfunda.
54004012	Kulalekie wukoho wopfo wuhendemino, indi uwe kichano kya waidiki kui idedo, kui ohendo, kui kikundano, kui wuidiki, kui wukeha.
54004013	Itane ngashika icha, tsinda ochisomya siṟi na iikimba na ipfunda.
54004014	Ma ulaseheṟe kitonga kilya ki na iyo uleinengo kui wuikimbi wuele mandi olehekyo mawoko nyi wameku.
54004015	Winya ishi, ukaike nasho kundu maengeṟia hapfo hamanyikie wose.
54004016	Kuringe kumonyi keweringa na kiloshyo, utsindikye-ho. Kowa mowuta kudo ochikukiṟa kumonyi na ikiṟa walya wakuicho.
54005001	Mndu meku ma ulampomye, kya indi umwikimbe cha ili ai wande, iwa wakoho uwadedie cha wanawawama.
54005002	Iwa wakeku cha wamayo, iwa wakoho cha washiki kui sonu njicha tsose.
54005003	Waka wakusu, iwa wai wakusu lohi uwahonerye.
54005004	Indi kokoya mka mkusu awode wana ang'u wachuku, wo wakupfunde kuwoka iwika wuindi wo ipfo kanyi kowo kwenyi wechitaa sile tsilya walie ko wafee wawo. Kipfa iki kichihianyi na Ruwa.
54005005	Indi ichu ai mka mkusu o lohi aimdee amonyi o akusirie na Ruwa echitsinda shiterewionyi na shifuhionyi kio na mfiri.
54005006	Indi ichu mseke ai mpfu, ma ili mbihu foke fuwode moo.
54005007	Ishi ushiongoye kundu wakae walawode hewadedya.
54005008	Indi kokoya mndu alalisiṟie mbaṟi yake, mnu wa kanyi koke, nyio alekaana wuidiki awichuo kota mndu alaidikye.
54005009	Mka mkusu nalahende iṟehio kambenyi shila ainutsye ma maka makumi haṟandaṟu nawe awei mka o msoro umu mfi.
54005010	Nawe mṟingishie kui mawuto mecha ili ametoṟishya wana ili ameekya necha wahenu ili amesanja waele walya madende ili ameikanya wafoye ili amewinya orio ṟunda icha lyose.
54005011	Indi wakusu walya wakoho-koho uwalehe, kipfa ilindi wakutimbishye Kristo walanga yaliko.
54005012	Wakawada paṟi cha ili walefurunja wuhendeli wo isonguo.
54005013	Hamu na iki wakakuichiwiṟa idokuo na iṟahaṟaha nja tsa wandu. Indi chi wai wadoko tupupfo indi na wemelemele na wadimi-dimi wededadeda shilasumhanyi.
54005014	Nkyo kimaduma ngakunda ke walya wakoho-koho wahende yaliko, wawone wana wapfuṟukanye kanyi walaenengye moala mwaanya fo wusutsu.
54005015	Kipfa kulemboneka waminduka wewingya Satana.
54005016	Kokoya mwidiki mshiki awode wakusu nawalele, nalarohie siṟi kyawo, kundu yo iidime ilela wakusu wawuṟie lohi.
54005017	Wameku iwa wakaya siṟi necha wo wahendewikyo kiṟumi kawi, mnu iwa waiṟunda wechilosha na ipfunda.
54005018	Kyamba kii-kiṟehie kyehamba, nguleta iya ikeri iṟunda yechihuo ngano ulaipfunge dumbu, na kingi; ke mndu mṟundi nawonyo wueri woke wumsumhanye.
54005019	Meku akumbo kopfo ulaadanye mondu shila wangochi wai-ho wawi ang'u waṟaṟu.
54005020	Iwo wadekio kindo uwadedye oshangunyi lo wose, kundu na walya wengi wakuwutie-ho yowuo.
54005021	Ngakututuma na kamu njii oshangunyi lo Ruwa na lo Kristo Yesu na lo wasu waele wasambuṟe ke uringe ishi kulawone kosuya mndu ma kulawute kindo ochikundia mndu.
54005022	Ulahekye mndu mawoko owin; ulawekaṟana na manyamaṟo ha wengi; kuringe kumonyi ukae ulawado nyi mti.
54005023	Ulakinyo mṟinga fumenyi, kya indi wada-ho shi-mvinyo shangu kipfa kya haya lyapfo na kya ndaṟe tsilya tsikuhoya kafoi.
54005024	Kwipfo wandu manyamaṟo hawo hamanyikie owinyi hechisongoya mwanduye, kwipfo wengi hawo hekemanyika numa.
54005025	Mawuto halya mecha na wudo hamanyikye, na kya halya kyaho kihendekye kiwungi ma haidima ikaa hai maṟikepfo.
54006001	Iwa wai masinga shi ya olio waidikye iwikya wenyi wawo wuindi wose, kundu rina lya Ruwa na kiloshyo shilahende irumo.
54006002	Indi iwa wawode wenyi wai waidiki manya walawamine ili wai wanawawama, kya indi waengeṟe iwapfuṟukanya ili wai waidiki na wakunde wechitaa kui isumba. Losha ishi na itutuma.
54006003	Kokoya kwipfo ailosha kiwungi alakuwada na madedo ha oru ha Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo na kiloshyo kilya kiende wuindi wusumhanyi.
54006004	Ichu aimlahutse, alaichi kindo indi aluye mrima kui kitoṟongocho kya mahio na pfumu lya njolimi, nyihondo kowuka wunyeng'i na mlusano, na shirumo na mawewedo mawicho;
54006005	na masingano ha kitsitsi ha wandu wai wafurunjie mhie waiwasoke wukilohi, nyiwo wehamba ke wuindi wulya wowa woikapa nawo mbucha.
54006006	Mbuchai ng'anyi wuindi wulya wuendye mndu naa ipfo; nyi mkukarishie.
54006007	Kipfa luwerie kindo ilindi lulecha wuyanapfo na wudo loidima iduo kindo mandi lochiwuka-hopfo.
54006008	Kokoya luwode kyelela moo na kyeshikya mbihu sho shilufoi.
54006009	Kya indi iwa walanga ifeṟa masaa wekeoloka kitewyonyi na mshihodinyi na langonyi tsifoi tsa mteecho tsiwichuṟye mndu, natso tsekeolotsa wandu odetsonyi na orumatsonyi.
54006010	Ipfo kundo, mawicho haṟukie hose nyi ipfo wukuwunyi wokuwa fesa. Kuweepfo waleiwingya wakawedekio-ho wuidiki wakawekutochio m mawawio hafoi.
54006011	Indi iyo ili ui mndu o Ruwa, dicha ishi, ke wingya-wo wuhoṟotsu na wuindi na wuidiki na mkundie na mutirisie na wuoloṟu.
54006012	Kapana ngapano iya njicha ya wuidiki, ke-wada moo fo mlungana, ifu omelahyo ndaho yafo kowefuṟingisha mṟingishie sa mcha oshangunyi lo wangochi wafoi.
54006013	Ngakuwawasa oshangunyi lo Ruwa mowonya shindo shose moo na lo Kristo Yesu aweṟingishie mringishie fulya mcha odatsinyi lo Pontio Pilato.
54006014	Ke uwade iwawaso lilya lilawode paṟi lilawa idedyo hando itane mndumii odu Yesu Kristo echiwoneka.
54006015	Kiwonesyo iki ichu ai Mwitoṟi amonyi menyi osu echikiloṟa maheri halya aichi, ichu ai mangi ya wamangi na mndumii o wandumii.
54006016	Nao amonyi akaa elechipfa aitsinda ipfo senyi ilechiwa ida. Kwipfo mndu o wandu alembonapfo ma kwipfo echiidima imbonapfo. Kiṟumi kicha na wuitoṟi wo mlungana shii shake. Amenyi.
54006017	Iiwa wawode masaa hafoi maheri ha kiwulalu uwawawasie ke walakusaṟe kyekaa mdonyi, ma walakusirie na wusuṟi wo masaa wokeweṟuka weṟu indi na Ruwa ichu aluinengye shose kui nguka shelisiṟa moo.
54006018	Wawe wechisumba, wafeṟe mfeṟa fo mawuto mecha, wawe makitomoka wakundi ilekia.
54006019	Wechikusanya wawenyi kisa kiwe kechiwawiia kiwanja kicha maheri halya hecha, kundu wakuwonye moo fulya fui moo lohi.
54006020	Hoi Timoteo, ringa kilya ulekidambikyo, dicha sumu tsa msaṟakambo tsa melemele na maambikyano ha wulaanyi wulya wuisendo wulaanyi wongo.
54006021	Na kwipfo wakuhambie nawo wakadekio wuidiki. Wutonga wukae nanyo.
55001001	Inyi Paulo, njii msu o Kristo Yesu kui wuitiki wo Ruwa wusumhanye kyasa kiteṟye kya moo fui na Kristo Yesu.
55001002	Ngakuiṟikiṟa iyo Timoteo mana oko sa mkunde. Ngukulangia wutonga na osaṟio na ofoṟo shiwukie ko Ruwa Wande na Kristo Yesu Mndumii odu.
55001003	Ngaana Ruwa ichu njiweimfuṟukanya na mrima fuwode ngo tsiharami chandu waku wako walerunda njekyeana Ruwa ili njiikusenda iyo shiterewyonyi shako mfiri na kio.
55001004	Njiwodo mnu m macha hekuwona kio na mfiri njekumbuo mchenyeṟe yapfo kundu njiichuṟo na sia.
55001005	Ngatamuo na mwidikie fopfo fo lohi, nafo kyekuyo Luise nawefuwode na mayo o Eunike. Indi njikusirie naafo ufuwode.
55001006	Nkyo imaduma ngakukumbuṟia kye amtsa kiinengo-kyo kya Ruwa ulekiinengo nyi Ruwa mkonu fulya njilekuhekya mawoko.
55001007	Kipfa Mumuyo luleinengo nyi Ruwa chi folutana waowu-pfo; kya indi, nyi fo pfinya na makundie na osaṟe.
55001008	Ikyi kikuenenge kulareenze iṟingishia kya Mndumii odu manya ulaṟeenze kipfa kyako inyi, njii mpfunge kimaduma kyakye. Kya indi ukulunge-ho ihenda wawyo kimaduma kya Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio kui pfinya uleinengo nyi Ruwa.
55001009	O nyi alelukiṟa, kalulaha luwe wandu wakye; ndaho njele. Kimtewye chi mawuto hadupfo; kyaindi nyi kyama kiwei kyake amoonyi na wutonga wulya alelusumba kiidi kya Kristo Yesu mandi halya ha maheri halawendewiko.
55001010	Wukawewonesyo kodu wulalu ilindi Mkiṟa odu Kristo Yesu alewoneka kawuta-ho opfu kashika iwika-ho moo na mkae fulechisia kui Ndumi ya okiio.
55001011	Kyayo Ruwa nalenjisambura inyi njiwe msu na mlosha na moedia Ndumi ii ya Sia.
55001012	Nakyo kyatewa ngaliso wukiwa wo isho. Indi ngapfia kyasho sonupfo, kipfa njichi ichu njimkusirye njii mbanzie imanya ke o awode pfinya yeringa kilya njimsumumbe itane Mkonu fulya fulya.
55001013	Ukuwade tapu na madedo halya hechiṟa mrima njilekulosha ngamekuwia hai mtaato fokuhoṟokya mwidikyenyi na mkundienyi fo kiidi kya Kristo Yesu.
55001014	Kilya kicha ulemsumbo kewekiringe-wo necha kui pfinya ya Mumuyo Mwele ichu ai kiidi kyadu.
55001015	Na uichi ke walya waiiya Asia walenjidicha wose waata wawo nyi Figelo na Herimogene.
55001016	Mndumii nawonye mba ya Onesiforo osaṟyo loke kimaduma alenjiwihiṟya moo kafoi ma alalepfia sonu kya ili njimpfunge.
55001017	Kya indi ili mandi aleshika Roma nyi aleitika injipfula kui wuitiki na itane alenjikoya.
55001018	Mndumii namwenenge nashike ikoya echisaṟyo oshangunyi lo Mndumii Mkonu fulya fulya. Na iyo uichi necha chando aweinjipfuṟukanyia kafoi ipfo Efeso.
55002001	Na wudo iyo, manoko, ukuwangie wutongenyi iwu wui Kristo-hu Yesu.
55002002	Ambia kiloshio kilya uleicho koko oshangunyi lo wangochi wafoi sho ualie wandu waidikye iwa wasumuhanyi sa wechiidima ilosha wengi.
55002003	Kusanze na inyi ikukarishya mawawyonyi cha mbahanyi mcha o Kristo Yesu.
55002004	Mohenda shidenyi nekekuṟisa na mbonyi tseluya moo, kundu nachihiane na msongoru o shida.
55002005	Manya mndu oose mokapa mamtangi echiidama iwinga na iinengo kiṟumi kya wowinza ya mafuo apfungyo oṟo ya shila eheshana nawo kui sungusihupfo.
55002006	Mdemi aleṟunda iṟunda liumu nawaṟi o nasonguo ihawyo kya masambuo.
55002007	Adanya iki ngakuwia. Na Mndumii nakuenenge mtichie foitichia na imanya shindo shose.
55002008	Kumbuo Yesu Kristo ichu aleṟutso wapfunyi apaṟikye kisharinyi kya Dawidi kui mwongoye foko fo Sia ya okiio.
55002009	Mfo fonnenga njiwawiṟo itane ngapfungo na mshe cha mndu mbafu, indi dedo lya Ruwa lyewa ipfungapfo.
55002010	Nkyo kitewe ngakutirisia njekaa shi ya shose kimaduma kya wasambuṟe walya wa Ruwa, kundu nawo wakuwonye okiio lo Kristo-hu Yesu hamu na wuitoṟi wo mlungana.
55002011	Mhambie fu fo lohi: “Kyamba kokoya lulepfa hamu nao, na itsinda na moo lochitsinda lui nao.”
55002012	“Kokoya lokutirisia hamu nao, na itoṟya lochiitoṟia da kimu nao. Kokoya so lomkana nao echilukana so da.”
55002013	“Kokoya so loda lulakae wahendeli, o ekaa ai mhendeli mlungana, kipfa alaidima ikukana amonyi.”
55002014	Uwakumbuṟye ishi ochiwaikimba wuikimbi wu oshangunyi lo Ruwa kye walaire shida ya njolimi kui madedo ilaende kindo shila nyi ipfuluo walya weadanya.
55002015	Itika ikumanyishya Ruwa mṟundi mtsane alawode ipfia sonu iṟunda lyake echilosha idedo lya ki-wulohi kui wuhoṟotsu.
55002016	Indi mawesano ha kiwuyana na madedo ha ho uhadiche; kipfa hekeengeṟa iletsana wandu na Ruwa melemele lyo, kipfa tso tsechilandaṟisha wumbafu kya ngoseṟa.
55002017	Na idedo lyawo lya mbari ii lyechilya cha ode liwicho lilechiwa ikapo.
55002018	Kiidi kyawo kwifo Himenayo na Fileto, nyiwo waleasha ki-wulohi kilya ili wehamba ke iṟuka lyadu lilembutika wai, wakafurunjia maata mwidikye fowo.
55002019	Kya indi kiwanja kitumhari kya Ruwa kiikiwanzi kihoṟoki nakyo kii-kiṟehie mṟeho fui mṟehie fuhambie, “Mndumii aichi wai wake,” na lingi, “Orio mndu ekesenda rina lya Mndumii nalekane na wumbafu.”
55002020	Indi kiidi mba ing'anyi kuwode nzohoṟa tsa orio mbari. Tsingi nyi tsa sahabu na pesa tupu tsingi tsa mbau ang'u tsa teri. Na kyatso kwipfo tsiwode iṟunda lya kyaanya na tsingi iṟunda lyingi.
55002021	Wulalu-le kokoya mndu akuhaṟamisha amonyi kalekana na shindo sho shoose shiteṟefutsie mrima o echiwa kichoṟe kya ichopa kii kiilishe kyeṟundya orio iṟunda icha lyose.
55002022	Dicha malang'a halya ha ki-wanake, indi uwingye wuhoṟotsu na wuidiki na makundano na ofoṟo urianyi na wandu walya waiterewa Mndumii wawode ngoo tsiharami.
55002023	Indi mawesoweso halya ha wutondo halawode wuṟango ulekane naho kipfa uichi kye ho hekeende shiloyo.
55002024	Indi mṟundi o Mndumii nalawe moloya. Kya indi kimbaṟi naololye wandu wose nawe mlosha mcha akutirisie shiwicho shilya aiwutio.
55002025	Echidedya kiomboho walya walehanyi nao kulako Ruwa echiwailachia mhie nawaenenge idumbuya na imanya kii-wulohi wawuye isanjika mdo.
55002026	Mhie yawo mcha iwawuuye-se; waturuchuke ipfo mshihodinyi fulya fo Satana wai wapfunge nyio kyewatana iindia shilya akundi.
55003001	Kumbuo imanya kye mkonu iya ya mainukyonyi maheri hechiwa herohya.
55003002	Kyamba wandu wechikukunda wawenyii wai wa kiṟaṟi wakuwi wekuwa fesa, waṟahiṟahi, wai na tumbe, weruma Ruwa; wemiina wafee, wala fanyi, wai wambafu.
55003003	Wa ngarama, walaichi mma, weduo wengi sumu, wapfupfunae mrima, washimbi, wasuo orio kii kicha kyose.
55003004	Waṟingi, waḏimidimi, wakutimbishye timbishi, kindo wakundi nyi wuseṟeeṟi na seko tsa nyama kota ikunda Ruwa.
55003005	Kya ora lo nja cha wandu wawode wuindi wakufananyishie wuindi woindya Ruwa indi pfinya ya iwikaho wuindi lohi iipfopfo. Iwo wai wado uwadiche.
55003006	Na kyawo maata waikuṟoṟowya na mba tsa wandu wakaduo mawaka mafafa mapfungo hawo. Naho nyiho hai malamye nyi manyamaṟo hai maṟahisheṟahishe nyi lango tsa orio mbari.
55003007	Mawaka haikupfunda-pfunda halaidime ikoya imanya wurango wo lohi ma indi.
55003008	Chando Yane na Yambire walelemana na Mose na wudo iwa walemanyi na kiwulohi, nyiwo wandu wapfulukio mhie fowo walakia kiheshyonyi kya wuidiki.
55003009	Indi wechishika haleshepfo kyamba wutondo wowo wumanyikie koose na pata chando kiwei na ko Yane na Yambire.
55003010	Kya indi iyo omeosha kiloshio kyako, uwerianyi na wupfundi woko na wuteteṟi na wuitiki wo ikuhoṟotsya haa-hateṟye na wuidiki woko, na wuleeli woko; wuhoṟotsu na wukundi woko, na wutirisi woko.
55003011	Na shiterengyo na mawawyo halenjihoya ipfo Antiokia na ipfo Ikonio na ipfo Lisitra. Shiterengyonyi shilya njileshikarishia-ho na Mndumii alenjiletsa nasho shose.
55003012	Na wudo na iwa waitambahanye moo kui wuindi woindia Ruwa wo Kristo-hu Yesu wechiterengyo wose.
55003013	Indi wandu walya wawicho na walembi wo wechiitika ihenda wichuo wechilemba wandu nawo wawenyi wai walembe.
55003014	Indi iyo utsinde na shilya sha lohi ulekulosha na ishiidikia nakamu komeshidambikyo; uichi kye nyi wakyi walekulosha.
55003015	Uichi na Maṟehyo halya Maele nyi wokya wututu wopfo, naho heidima ikuwonya wuṟango woimanya okiio luwukye wuidikinyi wukuwode na Kristo Yesu.
55003016	Maṟehyo hose Maele hai mahomoye nyi Ruwa hai mecha hepfunda na hededya na heheluo na hetoṟishya wandu wuhorotsunyi.
55003017	Kundu mndu o Ruwa nawe mtsane aa mteseheṟye kya iwuta oryo wuto icha lyose.
55004001	Ngakuwawasa oshangunyi lo Ruwa na lo Kristo Yesu moanduya walya wai na moo na walya wapfie, ngaṟingishia ishi shiwi kye nyi echikuloṟa amonyi ai na Mangi.
55004002	Onguo idedo-lyo, kuilikye-ho (kui-ho mwaanya mcha ang'u kulai-ho) Dedya, ikimba, isima wandu kui wuleeli wuhoṟotsu na wuloshi wucha wose.
55004003	Kyamba kochicha kiheri welechiidimana na kiloshyo kya lohi kyechiṟa mrima, kya indi wechikufeṟya wawenyi walosha waidikyanyi na lango tsawo tsiinjenyi, chando madu hawo hakundi.
55004004	Wechihutsa macha heicho kiilohi kilya, indi waadanye mhambo ya wongo.
55004005	Kakye iyo ukae na osaaṟe kya orio kindo, kukarishie mawinenyi, ṟunda iṟunda icha lya mwongoyi o Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio, ochiawutsia necha wupfuṟukanyi wopfo.
55004006	Kyamba inyi njikuṟeheṟie iwiko kidaso, kiheri kya iinuka lyako kyamafukya.
55004007	Ngammaa ikapana ngapano iya ncha, ngamaa iinutsya ohendo lulya, ngameringa wuidiki wulya.
55004008	Kitsuhae nyi iṟiko oṟo ya wuchopi wo wuwinzi wuhoṟotsu wo moo njimsuṟumye. Nyiyo Mndumii mletsi mhoṟotsu echinjiimaya nayo mkonu fulya. Indi echinjiimanya nayo inyi njimonyi tupupfo, indi na walya woose wawodo nyi macha ha ikuloṟa lyake.
55004009	Iitika icha na koko owinyi.
55004010	Kyamba Demasi alenjida amhenda ikunda wuyana wu wo kiwulalu kahenda Tesalonyikye. Kiresike alehenda Galatia. Tito kawehenda Dalmatia.
55004011	Ichu ai na inyi nyi Luka amonyi. Ira Marko muche nao kipfa echiidima injitarama mnu iṟunda-li lyako kui.
55004012	Tikiko njilemduma Efeso.
55004013	Ili ochicha unjiendie ikoti lilya njileda ipfo Troa ko Karipo keweende na shitabu shilya na masaṟa halya heṟehya, nyiho njilangie mnu.
55004014	Aleksandria mpfuru ulya alenjiwutia mawicho hafoi Mndumii echimtaa kisumhanye mawuto hake.
55004015	Ukuṟise na iyo kyake, kyamba alelemana mnu na madedo hadu.
55004016	Ipfo mwanduyenyi fo kuwoka fo mondu foko kuwei-pfo ma umu alenjihoṟokyapfo kya indi walenjida wose. Ruwa nalawaitalie ideko-lyo.
55004017	Indi Mndumii alenjikaya-ho kanjikapya owanzo. Iki kileenenga ngaidima ionguo mwongoye fuhende imariso necha wamkambo wakafuicho wose, na inyi ngaashuka ianduyo lya opfu.
55004018	Mndumii nechinletsa echinjiwuta mawuto mawicho hoose, nenjikiṟa enjiduo kipuo Wumanginyi woke wo ipfo ruwehu. Nyio ai mokaa echiichiko maheri hose halunganyi. Amenyi.
55004019	Iṟikiṟa Pirisika na Akila, hamu na wa mba ya Onesiforo.
55004020	Erasto alekaa ipfo Korinto, indi Tirofimo njilemda ipfo Mileto aluo.
55004021	Kambiṟa icha kisie kilamaasa. Eubulo wakauiṟikiṟa na Pudensi na Lino na Klaudio na wanawawama wose.
55004022	Mndumii nakae mrimenyi fopfo. Wutonga wukae nanyo.
56001001	Inyi Paulo njii singa lya Ruwa na msu o Yesu Kristo moṟundya mwidikye fo wasambuṟe wa Ruwa na mmanyishie fo wu-kilohi wusumhanye wuindi.
56001002	Njikuwode na owedo loiweda moo fo mlungana ifu Ruwa chu alai mowongo alemteseheṟya matsika halya maheri halunganyi halawemche.
56001003	Kya indi matika halya haweshikie nyi alemanyisha idedo lyake kui mwongoye njiimdambikye inyi na wuitiki wo iwawasa lya mletsi odu Ruwa.
56001004	Ngaiṟikiṟa Tito mana ichu oko o lohi kui wuidiki luwode wumu luwawi. Wutonga wuwe wopfo na ofoṟo lowuka ko Ruwa Wande na Kristo Yesu mkiṟi odu.
56001005	Kitewe kilennenga ngakuda kulya Kreta nyi kundu umarise isungusia shilya shiwetsuhae shesungusia nohende iwika-pfo wameku oryo mṟinyi yose njia iya njilekuwawasya.
56001006	Kokoya kuwode ai mteechi, mii o mka umu, awode wana waidikye walaende mondu fo wuṟahi ma walawode okuchu.
56001007	Kyamba moambuya siṟi kimbari nawe mndu mteechi akerye Ruwa cha mwiṟichi alawode tumbe, alai mlang'a ma makinango ma manzina ma mongula.
56001008	Kya indi nawe mokunda wahenu, achihianyi na hai mecha, mndu o osaaṟe mhoṟotsu, menyi wuindi, mndu msanze.
56001009	Nawe mokuwada na idedo liidikyanyi necha na kiloshyo kilya, kundu naidime iikimba na mweke fo wupfundi wochiṟa mrima na iwinga walya wekefurunja mbonyi.
56001010	Kyamba kwipfo wafoi wawode okuchu wenyi madedo ha melemele wai walembi, mnu nyi walya wa mkambo mdine.
56001011	Kyawo na kikaki wahende ifunjo olimi. Nyiwo wandu wekepihisa nja tsa wandu tsii nsanze ili wailosha shindo shilasumhanyi wai watewe nyi ngula tsawo.
56001012	Umu owo, mwikimbi owo wa wenyi awehambie wai; Wakreta wai wawongo na kamu, mando malang'a, mandeu madoko.
56001013	Kiṟingishyo ki kikeri lohi. Nkyo kitewe uwadedye kyumu kundu wahendechia wuidikinyi.
56001014	Walahendekuwada na mhambo ya Kiyuda na mawawaso ha wandu iwa weindukya kiwulohi mhongo.
56001015	Shose shiharamie iwo waharami, indi kya walya wafanyi walaidikye kwipfo kiwaharamie ma kimupfo, kya indi wai wafanyitse na mhie ya mdo na ngo tsa mrima.
56001016	Wekehamba ke waichi Ruwa wai, indi nyi imkana wakeri kui mawuto halya. Wada owicho, wandu walehi walawa iṟunda kindo ki kicha ma kimu.
56002001	Kake iyo udede kiidikyanyi na wupfundi wulya wochiṟa mrima.
56002002	Ke wameku wakuachie, wawe wasanze wenyi osaṟe wachia kui wuidiki na kui mkundanyie na kui mkutirisie.
56002003	Na wudo wakeku wakae na orie lusumhanye waele, walahende iduo mndu sumu, walahende iṟahishyo nyi wukuwu wo wari, wawe wechilosha shindo shii shicha.
56002004	Kundu wapfudishe waka walya wakoho wakunde wamii wawo wawekunda wana.
56002005	Wakae na osaaṟe wenyi sonu njicha, wahidi wa kanyi, waleki, waidikie necha wamii wawo, kundu dedo lya Ruwa lilahende irumo.
56002006	Na wudo ututumye womi walya wakoho wakae na chile tsa shindo shose.
56002007	Henda ikuwika-ho kumonyi kichano kya mawuto mecha ui na wusalari wo ipfo wupfundinyi, na mkuachie,
56002008	na idedo liwe lyechiṟa mrima lilechiwa iwingo kundu ichu ai o ohambenyi lungi napfie sonu ili alakuwonya kii kiwicho kyadu kyeanduya kyakyo.
56002009	Masinga hakuwike shi ya wanene waho hakuwakundishye na shindo shose, halaambiṟane nawo.
56002010	Walaṟoṟokuo, kya indi wamanyishieho wuhendeli wucha wose, kundu wawikye wupfundi wo mkiṟi odu Ruwa kiṟumi kicha kui shindo shose.
56002011	Kyamba kulemboneka-ho wutonga wo Ruwa wuendie wandu wose okiio.
56002012	Wolutoṟisha so, kundu lulehane na mbaṟi ii ya imina Ruwa na lango tsilya tsa ki-wuyana, lupfudie lui na moo fo chile na wuhoṟotsu na wuindi mandi ha kiwulalu.
56002013	Lochiweda kiwedyo kilya kiende macha ngesa kya iwoneka lya wuitoṟi wo Ruwa ichu mnene amonyi nyio mkiṟi odu Kristo Yesu.
56002014	Nyio alekudambika amonyi hando hadu, kundu naluletse na msefu fo mrima fose nakuhaṟamishie mkambo fui foke amonyi fuiaaka iwuta mawuto mecha.
56002015	Kya ishi udede, uikimbe, ututume na wuitiki wose. Kulakae-pfo ekumina.
56003001	Uwatamuṟye ke wakae wakuwike shi ya wanene wai wenyi-menge wechiwaidikya. Wakae wakuteseheṟye orio ṟunda icha lyose.
56003002	Walarumane na mndu, wakae walawode mondu, wawiṟie mndu owinyi, wawonesye wandu wose wuhoo wuwenyi.
56003003	Kyamba naso ili kacha luwei watahi, wandu wataicho wadetse, luweisingya wulang'a na lango tsa mbaṟi nliwe na nliwe luwehendekye lui na wumbafu na wunyenyi luwesukie lochisuana luwenyi na wenyi.
56003004	Matika na halya kulembonekaho woloṟu wo mkiṟi odu Ruwa na mkundie foke akundye nafo wandu aleluwonya okio.
56003005	Lulauwike na mawuto ha wuhoṟotsu so luwewuta, indi nyi lo osaṟio lulya loke kui kisambyo kya ifeo lya kawi na ilawuo nyi Mumuyo mwele.
56003006	Ichu alemlusumba echimfeṟa na mweke fo Yesu Kristo mkiṟi odu.
56003007	Kundu luwe waoṟi wa moo fo mlungana fuiwedyo lui wasumhantse kui wutonga woke.
56003008	Idedo lyeidikya lyo ilyo. Na njikundi utambahanye iṟingishya kyalyo shose, kundu iwa wai waidikishye Ruwa wawinye iwika-ho mawuto mecha. Ishi shachia wandu shiwaendie ngaya.
56003009	Kya indi mawesoweso ha wutondo na maitumano ha marika na mandeda na maloyo ha kiwuwawaso, ho uhadiche. Cha kipfa halai na mbucha, nyi ha maai.
56003010	Mndu mtindili, komaa imdedya limu na lya kawi, wuta-ho mdo.
56003011	Nomanye mndu ai adi amekuṟuka echinyamaṟa amekuwonya owingo amonyi.
56003012	Mandi njechikudumya Aritemanyi ang'u Tikiko uitike icha na koko ipfo Nikopoli, kyamba na hondo njilesambuṟa itsinda-ho kiheri kya kisie.
56003013	Senanyi, mlaanyi o wuwawaso, na Apolo, uwasame owinyi newasungusia walawuṟie kindo.
56003014	Na iwa wai wadu wakupfunde iwika-ho maṟunda mecha hewinya-ho shilya shilechiwa iwuṟo kundu walakae-ho wawakye ikidi ilaikumbia.
56003015	Iwa wai kunu koko wakuiṟikiṟa wose. Iṟikiṟya walya walukundi kui wuidiki. Wutonga wukae nanyo mose.
57001001	Inyi Paulo njii-mpfunge kya Kristo Yesu, so na Timoteo manowama lokuiṟikiṟa iyo Filemonyi mkunde ui mṟundi kyimu naso.
57001002	Lokuiṟikiṟa na iyo Apifia ui mshiki lowekuiṟikiṟa na Arikipo mondaro odu, hamu na siṟi iya ikeri ya mba yapfo.
57001003	Wutonga wukae nanyo na ofoṟo shiwukie ko Ruwa Ndeyadu na Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
57001004	Njikeri iana Ruwa oko mandi hose njekukumbuo iyo Filemonyi shiterewonyi shako.
57001005	Ili ngaicho kya ikunda lyapfo ko wandu wose wa Ruwa na kya wuidiki uwode wo iwadana na Mndumii Yesu.
57001006	Ngaterewa kundu mawadano ha wuidiki wopfo hawe hechiṟunda heitsa wuṟangonyi woimanya orio kicha kyose kii nanyo kyeṟundya Kristo.
57001007	Kyamba njiwewodo mnu nyi sia na iwihiṟyo moo kipfa kya ikunda lyapfo uleloṟa wandu walya wa Ruwa iyo manowama!
57001008	Nkyo kyatewa ma ili njii na wutumbe wa Kristo-hu wonnenga mwaanya fokuwawasa iki kyakukoya, nyi kinjichihiṟye kota.
57001009	Kye njikuterewe kimaduma kya ikunda inyi Paulo njii meku wulalu na mfunge o Kristo Yesu.
57001010	Ili njii njido ngakuterewa kya Onesmo (Mchihiri) mana ichu oko njilemfee njii kipfungonyi.
57001011	Nao nyio Onesmo ulya ili kuwoka alawekuchihiṟie, indi wulalu ai mchihiṟi opfo na oko, achihiṟye necha.
57001012	Nyio amonyi ngamkuwihiṟya wulalu, nao kimu cha ngoo yako iinjenyi.
57001013	Njiwekundi nakae na inyi kundu nanjipfuṟukanye handu hapfo ili njiimfunge na mshe kimaduma kya Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio.
57001014	Indi njilekunda iwuta kindopfo chila onnenga momu, kundu iki kicha kyapfo kilawe cha kya mkoromu kya indi kiwe kui mweke fo ikunda. Njilakundi ikuitikya untarame.
57001015	Kyamba ili alewuka kopfo lya oweṟe kulako nyi kilemwutika kundu umbade se nakae na iyo mlungana.
57001016	Alakeri-se cha isinga, kya indi nawe cha kota isinga, nyi manowama odu mkunde. Kanjiwia kiira king'anyi mnu ado inyi; kopfo iyo nechikuwiia mcha ngoseṟa cha isinga kui mbihu na kui Mndumii-hu.
57001017	Kyasia kokoya unjiwode njii mokyando opfo kye-mwambye-wo cha ili nyio inyi.
57001018	Indi kokoya alekudetsya kindo ang'u nyi sile alelya kopfo, ikyo unjiitalie inyi.
57001019	Inyi Paulo ngamṟehia iki kui owoko loko. Inyi Paulo njechikitaa, (ipfo kundo njekiṟa ihamba, italenyi lyapfo, kipfa na iyo kumonyi ui mosile oko.)
57001020	Ee manowama oko, kyekunjiwutia kudo kui rina lya Mndumii. Kewihiṟya-wo ngoo yako moo ui manowama kui Kristo.
57001021	Ngamṟehya njido njikusirie na wuadanyi wopfo njichi nyi ochiwuta king'anye ishi ngakuterewa.
57001022	Handu hamu na isho njiteseherya kiṟiha mbenyi ya wahenu, kyamba njikusirie icha na konu. Kui shiterewo shanu cha ili Ruwa kakunda njechicha imuiṟikiṟa.
57001023	Kwipfo wakuiṟikiṟa, nyi Epafra ichu ai mfunge na inyi kya Kristo Yesu.
57001024	Na woko Marko, na Aristariko, na Demasi na Luka, wakyando wako wakuiṟikiṟa.
57001025	Wutonga wo Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo wukae na Mumuyo fonu.
58001001	Mbaṟi tsiweipfo tsifoi na njia natso Ruwa alemdeda na waku wadu kui waikimbi walya.
58001002	Ili lyefurumia lya suku tsi alededa naso kui Mana, chu alembika mokyoṟya echioṟa shose. Nao nyio alembika nao na mandi halya.
58001003	Nyio ngela ya wuitoṟi woke na otambahalukio lo orie loke akamadie shose kui dedo lya pfinya yake; ili alemaa iwikaho kidaso kyeoloṟa mondu fo manyamaṟo kakudamiṟa owokonyi lo kulyo lo mng'ano ipfo huye.
58001004	Finya alewa moidya nayo wasu walya waele isumhanye rina aledumbuyo kui kyoṟa ling'anye hawo.
58001005	Kyamba nyi o ku o wasu walya waele alehenda imbia ma indi ke, “Iyo ui manoko, nyi inu ngamekufee.” Na lingi ke; “Inyi njechimbia Wande nao echinjiwiia Mana.”
58001006	Na iliindi aitsa ichu oke o wee ipfo mkambonyi fo wuyana ahambie, “Na wasu wa Ruwa wapfirie ndi oshangunyi loke wose.”
58001007	Kya wasu walya nyi ahambie, “Atana wasu wake mkuma na waṟundi wake awatana olewo lo modo.”
58001008	Indi kya Mana nyi kii-le, “Loṟika lopfo, hoi Ruwa, luikaa maheri halunganyi, na msenge fo wuhoṟotsu mfo msenge fo wumangi wopfo.
58001009	Ulekunda wuhoṟotsu kowesuo wumbafu. Nkyo kimarete Ruwa alekushimbuo, nyio Ruwa opfo kakushimbuo na mafuda hekapyo ngoru tsiidye waodoya wapfo.”
58001010	Lingi ke, “Hoi Mndumii, mandi ha mawokyonyi nyi iyo ulemwaala wanda ii, na maruwehu halya hai mawike nyi mawoko hapfo.
58001011	Ho hechisia, indi iyo ochikaa. Hechikuo hose cha nguwo ii nṟae.
58001012	Na cha nguwo ya ikonya ochihaoṟowya. Nyi hechilachika fana. Kya indi iyo ui ulya ulya na maka yapfo yechisenedapfo.”
58001013	Nyi alembie o ku o wasu walya waele ke, “Kudamiṟye owokonyi loko lo kulyo itane ngalaṟa wakituwa wapfo shi ya madende hapfo?”
58001014	Chi wai mumuyo yaṟunda wose iii-mme yeekyana na walya wai wateṟie okiio kyoṟa kyawo?
58002001	Nkyo kyaluitika kya ngoseṟa ke luchunguṟie shilya lomeicho kundu lulahende yeeko ma indi.
58002002	Kyamba kokoya idedo lilya liwee-lidede nyi wasu liwewangi lido na orio wutahachi na orio wulehi wo okuchu wuleambya wudeheli wowo wuhoṟotsu.
58002003	Nyi wuda lochituruchukia-ho so ili loilaala okiio lung'anyi ludi? Nalo kimaenyi kyalo nyi ipfo kundo luleongoyo nyi Mndumii lukaweluwanzio so nyi walya walemwicho.
58002004	Luwerianyi na kiṟingishyo kii kiwike nyi Ruwa kui shichano na maṟiho na pfinya tsa mbaṟi tsifoi na mahawio ha Mumuyo Mwele shisumhanye mkundie foke.
58002005	Kyamba mkambo fo wuyana ifu lodeda kyafo ke nyi icha fui chi alefuwika shi ya wasu walyapfo.
58002006	Kya indi kwipfo kundo mndu mliwe aleṟingishia ahambye, “Mndu nyi o ki ili uimkumbuo. Ang'u mana o mndu ili uimwambuya?
58002007	Omemnyiṟya wasu kheri kyangu. Komruwa mdohu foke wuitoṟi na kiichiko.
58002008	Kombika shose shi ya madende hake.” Kyamba imbikya shose shi yake lyo lyahamba ke kutolyo-ho ma kimu kilawewikyo shi yakepfo. Indi wulalu lulandewona shilya shose shii-shiwike shi yake.
58002009	Indi ichu awemnyiṟye wasu kiheri kyangu lumbonyi nyio Yesu ai mruwie mdohu foke wuitoṟi na kiichiko kimaduma kya mawawio ha opfu, ili esonja opfu akaya-ho wose kui wutonga wo Ruwa.
58002010	Kyamba ichu awikye shose shiwe shake awewikye shose kui pfinya yake nyio kiwemsumhanye ili arie iduo wana wafoi wuitoṟinyi naitse msongoru o okiio lowo kiawutsyonyi kui mawawyo.
58002011	Kyamba ichu mwilishi na iwa weilisha wapaṟikye ko ichu wose. Nkyo kimarete alapfia sonu yewalaha wanawawama.
58002012	Ili ahambie, “Njechiongoya wanawawama wako rina lyapfo. Njechikuimbya makiidi hawi ha siṟi.”
58002013	Na lingi, “Inyi njechiwa mokusirya na iyo.” Na lingi, “Ambuya, lui-ho so na wana wa, Ruwa alenjienenga.”
58002014	Cha kipfa ili wana wakuwode na samu na nyama, na wudo alekuwada natso kimu nawo kundu nawute wuitoṟinyi kui opfu ichu aitoṟie opfu, nyio mkumbi ulya.
58002015	Na iletsa naletse iwa wawedekie wusingenyi kui wuowu woowuo opfu kiheri wawei na moo kyose.
58002016	Alewo chi wasu waele awawinyiepfo, kya indi nyi mbeu ya Abrahamu nyiyo aiwinyie.
58002017	Kipfa kya iki kiwembaṟi ifanana na wanawawama kui shindo shose kundu nawe mowaichio wukiwa nawewiia na Ruwa mkohanyi ang'anyi sa mhendeli mowonya manyamaṟo ha mkambo mhoṟie.
58002018	Kyamba ipfo kundo alekurohya adi amonyi echihesho, nyi hondo aidima yekya walya waihesho.
58003001	Nkyo kimaduma nyo wanawawama waele mui waodoya wa ndaho ya kiruwehu, ringenyi mdume ulya na mkohanyi ang'anyi luimhamba nyio Yesu.
58003002	O awei mhendeli mohendelya ichu mombika-ho kimu chando Mose awei o ipfo mba yake yose.
58003003	Nao aambikie wuitoṟi kota Mose kimu cha ili mowika mba awode wunene kota mba iya.
58003004	Kyamba orio mba yekewiko nyi mndu indi mowika shose nyio Ruwa.
58003005	Na Mose nyi awei mhendeli o ipfo mba ya ichu, kawa mtarami moṟingishia shilya shiwerie ihambo.
58003006	Indi Kristo nyi Mana sumuhana na mba ii yake. Mba ii yake nyiso, kokoya lokaa luṟamkie luikuwada tsee na iṟumisha owedo lulya itane lochiawutsio.
58003007	Kihendekye chando Mumuyo Mwele ahambie, “Ili moicho inu ṟu lyake.
58003008	Ma mulaumiṟe ngoo tsanu cha ili mandi ha mapusenyi mkonu fulya fo kihesho fo ipfo olelenyi.
58003009	Hondo waku wo wanu walenjihesha kui kiseengo.
58003010	Nawo walemewona mawuto hako maka makumi haana. Nkyo kimaduma njilelulia rika lyo lyose ngahamba, Suku tsose wakeri tangatanga na ngoo tsawo. Indi njia tso tsako wo watsiichipfo.
58003011	Kyo kilenenga njilelya nyamu kui rihima lyako, ke walashike yangya hawode olele loko.”
58003012	Kuṟisenyi wanawawama, kulawone mndu ai kiidi kyanu menyi ngoo njiporu ilaidikye, nayo yechilekana na Ruwa menyi moo.
58003013	Kya indi ke kuikimbyanenyi orio mkonu mandi haihambo inu hose, kundu ipfo konu kulaumiṟyo mndu mrima echilembo nyi wunyamaṟi.
58003014	Kyamba so lomba wenyi-kita na Kristo lukakaa lochikuwada tsee na kiwanja kilya handu luwokye itane maawutsyonyi.
58003015	Ili kohambo, Ili moicho inu ṟu lyake ma mulaumiṟe ngoo tsanu cha ili mandi ha mapusenyi.
58003016	Nyi wa ku weadanya wakapusa? Chi iwa walewuka ipfo Misiri wakadao nyi Mose wose?
58003017	Nyi wa ku alewa mowalulia maka makumi haana? Chi iwa wawenyamaṟie, na shiwungo shawo shikalekana ipfo kundo kuwode sehusa?
58003018	Nyi wa ku alewalia nyamu kehamba, walashike yangya hawode olele loke? Chi iwa walelema iidikya?
58003019	Natso na lowona walalekuidimya yangya-ho kipfa kya wulemi wulya.
58004001	Iki kiluhoye fowa tseowuo kundu kulawone ipfo konu kuwoneke-pfo echiasha yanga lilya, ili indi kiteṟyo kilya kyekuangya ipfo kundo kuwode olele loke kii-kideye-se.
58004002	Kyamba naso luiwaongoye ndumi ya sia chawo. Indi idedo lilya waleliicho lilewaekya kindopfo kipfa yadanya lyawo lilawelungyo mwidikye.
58004003	Kyamba yanga loangya ipfo hando kuwode olele kokoya lomeidikya, kisumhanye kilya ahambie, “Njilelya nyamu kui rihima lyako, ke Walashike yangya hawode olele loko.” Na lya heri mawiko halemba iwiko hamu na kiwanja kya wuyana.
58004004	Kipfa kuwode hando Ruwa ahambie, “Kya mkonu fo mfungade mawiko hake hose.”
58004005	Na iya kiwungi ke, Walashike yangya hawode olele loko.
58004006	Ikyo kimanyishye ke kodeo maanya fo wandu wechikuangya-ho indi walya walesonguo yongoyo ndumi ya sia wo walawekuangya-ho kitewe nyi wulemi wulya.
58004007	Nkyo kyanenga ateseheṟa lingi mkonu kui inu echideda kui Dawidi maheri hamsia mengi chando kulesonguo ihamba, “Ili moicho inu ṟu lyake, ma mulaumiṟe ngoo tsanu.”
58004008	Kyamba kima Yosua alembaangishia olelenylulya awechideda-se kiheri kya numa kya mkonu fungipfo.
58004009	Kikuwukye-ho kyehamba ke kwipfo-se maanya foonyonya fumtsuhaṟye mkambo fo Ruwa.
58004010	Kyamba moangya ipfo kundu kuwode olele loke nyio aonyonya kya mawuto hake chando Ruwa aleonyonya kya halya hai hake.
58004011	Nakyo kiluitike luwinye ikuangya ipfo hando kuwode olele lulya, kundu ma kulakae-ho echihutso nyi kitewe kya wulemi wulya.
58004012	Kipfa dedo lya Ruwa lirie moo lii na pfinya lii liohi kota oryo oshu lulie kuwi, lii soka itana lyapaṟa mrima na mumuyo na mawungo na moongo liileelia mahio na macha hakeri ngoonyi.
58004013	Ma kuipfo kindo kii kiwike kiwode kundo kulawono odatsinyi lokepfo; indi shii kitaṟe shii shialie na pata mesonyi hake shose. Nyio amonyi luimhamba.
58004014	Kyasia ili lui na mkohanyi ang'anyi ichu alekuidya maruwehu halya nyio Yesu Mana chu o Ruwa lukuwade na imhamba.
58004015	Kipfa lulawode mkohanyi mnene alawechiidima iluichio wukiwa kya wufafa wodu indi ai mheshe kui shindo shose awehianyi naso wuta-pfo wunyamaṟi.
58004016	Ikyo kiluenenge luitikirie kidembo kilya kya wutonga lui na wutumbe, kundu luambye-ho osaṟio luweshika ikoya-pfo wutonga woluendie ngaya yetambachuo liwe lya heri.
58005001	Kyamba oryo mkohanyi aimtunge kiidi kya wandu awiko-ho mokaya wandu kya kiheo kyeṟundia Ruwa, kundu namdambikye njooko na shidaso sheoloṟa manyamaṟo.
58005002	Echiidima ikapa na itsitsa walya walaichi kindo wechitangatanga, ili nao amonyi arie wufafa.
58005003	Na kimaduma kyawo kimbaṟi nawike-ho kidaso kyeoloṟa manyamaṟo, kiwe kido kipfa kya wandu kiwewa kido na kipfa kyake amonyi.
58005004	Ma kwipfo awada wunene wu kui pfinya yake amonyipfo, kya indi ashika ilaho nyi Ruwa cha Aron.
58005005	Na wudo Kristo chi o amonyi alekuwikya wuitoṟi wu nawe mkohanyi mnenepfo, kya indi ichu alembia, “Mana chu oko nyio iyo, nyi inu ngakufee.”
58005006	Na wudo ahambie handu hengi, “Iyo ukeri mkohanyi o mlungana o kamba lya Melkisedeki.”
58005007	Nao mafiri halya awei nyiamenyi tsake nyi aledasya ichu aleidima imletsa opfu shiterewo na sheeṟeṟo na shifuhio echimlilia malilio ha pfinya na imtonyitsya mchenyeṟe kashika iidikyo na iletso wuowu wuwembode.
58005008	Manya ai Mana na ipfo kundo aweiwawyo hakuwutia-ho ikulosha iidikya.
58005009	Ili alemaa yawutsio adi, lyo likamtana moendie iwa wamwidikye okiio lo mlungana wose.
58005010	Kaichimbiṟo nyi Ruwa mkohanyi o kamba lya Melkisedeki.
58005011	Kyake o kuweipfo shifoi shededa indi shirohie idambuya cha kipfa nyo muhombie mnu maadanyionyi.
58005012	Kyamba na kiheri kilemkuidya kiwemtana walosha, na muwuṟie-se lingi muhende losho shichano sha mbonyi tsa Ruwa sha kuwoka, mukawemba wandu wawuṟie oseṟi chi shelya shumu.
58005013	Kyamba oryo mndu monyo oseṟi aichiwie mbonyi tsa wuhoṟotsupfo, nyi akeri ndaka.
