58005014	Indi shelya shumu shisumhanye wandu watimie, nyiwo wandu wawode pfinya tsetichia shindo tsii njiohishe kui mwichiwie tsewa iletsa kicha na kiwicho.
58006001	Nkyo kitewe luleke isenda mbonyi tsa Kristo hando tsiasie, luhende itambahanya tsilya tseawutsia; lulakiwike-se kiwanja lya kawi kii kya mdumbuye fowuta-ho macha ipfo mawutonyi haende opfu, kii kya mwidikye foyalukya Ruwa.
58006002	Kii kya wupatiso na kya ihekya mawoko, na kya iṟuka lya wapfu na kya mwanduye of mlungana.
58006003	Na ikyo lochiwuta kokoya Ruwa aluikaya.
58006004	Cha kipfa iwa waleimikyo limu wakasonja kisumbo kilya kiiruwehu wakawehawyo Mumuyo Mwele.
58006005	Wakawesonja dedo lya Ruwa lilya icha na pfinya tsilya tsa mandi halya hechicha.
58006006	Kokoya iwo wawuka kambenyi nyi kyalema iwalawuya mdumbuye lya kawi ili wai wandu wamewuya ikukapya Mana chu o Ruwa msalabenyi wakawemselya mnyeri.
58006007	Kyamba teri iya yechionga mvuo yekeikapa kafoi ikadosa mboha yechihiṟa iwa ikeri idemyo kyawo nyiyo yaonyisho nyi Ruwa.
58006008	Indi iya ingi yekeende msha na maduo iwode kiweṟepfo, ikeri afui iseso yechifurumia ikumbyo modo.
58006009	Indi nyo wakunde, kyanu lokusirya kii kiwungi kii kicha kirianyi na okiio ma ili lodeda ludi.
58006010	Kyamba Ruwa alai mlemeshi awechihadima wina lyanu na kunda lyanu muwewonye rina lyake ili indi muweipfuṟukanya waele walya, na iwapfuṟukanya mui.
58006011	Na lulalakye mnu ke oryo mndu onu ose nawe momanyishya-ho wuitiki wu wumu wo mfeṟa fo owedo lulya shika mawutsyonyi.
58006012	Kundu mulahombye kya indi mukuwaakishane na walya waoṟa shiteṟio shilya kui mwidikye na mkutirisie.
58006013	Kyamba Ruwa alewikya Abrahamu kyasa, nao ili alawewode ungi awechiidama ilya nyamu kui ilya lyake kahenda kulia nyamu koke amonyi.
58006014	Kehamba, “Nyi lohi yonyisha njechikuonyisha, ipfumbutsa njechikupfumbutsa pfumbu.”
58006015	Nao kakutirisia ado kashika ikoya kyasa kilya kyaawutsyo.
58006016	Kyamba wandu wekelya nyamu kui ichu awang'anye, na nyamu nyi mṟasa fo oryo nganu ipfo kowo yechiwanza dedo.
58006017	Na wudo Ruwa ili alekunda iloṟa weoṟa kyasa kilya wutumuhari wo kyama kyake kui wuitiki wung'anyi kasanzia-ho ilya nyamu.
58006018	Kundu lukae wakarishe kui pfinya lukuwode na njowiko tsiwi tsihoṟoki tsilawewa iwiko nyi Ruwa tsa wongo lochiwingya ikuwada na owedo lulya lui wasumbe.
58006019	Lo lulukerye kipfunga mrima kiwangi kitumuhaa kikeri ikuhendya ora lo kya mba ipfo kundu kiṟikishya kilya kiishingya-ho.
58006020	Nyi hondo Yesu alekuidya-ho molusongoya-ho so kawa mkohanyi mnene kui kamba lya Melkisedeki.
58007001	Na Melkisedeki cho awei mangi ya Salemu mkohanyi o Ruwa ichu o huyashose. Nao kahenda yambya Abrahamu ili indi alewuka ngapanonyi iya yewinza wamangi walya, kamkumbuhana kembikya ona.
58007002	Nyio Abrahamu kahenda imlekia kilya kyeshitsa ikumi kya shindo shilya shose. Nao asonguo ihambo mangi menyi wuhoṟotsu kawehambo lingi mangi ya Salemu lyo lihambye mangi menyi ofoṟo.
58007003	Alaimsende ma kui wande ma kui wama ma kui kiriterite kya waku, alawode ma kiheri mkonu yake iwokye-ho ma kiheri moo foke fuinukye nakyo. Aimbaakishye Mana chu o Ruwa akaa mkohanyi o kitsitsi.
58007004	Keambuyenyi-wo ichu chando ang'anyi Abrahamu mku chu mnene kamnengya kilya keshitsa ikumi kya madambiko halya.
58007005	Lohi na walya wa wana wa Lewi waiwadambikye wukohanyi wulya, wo wawode iwawaso lyewesa mkambo shilya shishitsye ikumi shiidikyanyi na wuwawaso. Nafo nyi fui fo wanawawama wawo wapaṟikye kitsi-hu kya Abrahamu.
58007006	Kya indi ichu alawa isendo na kiriterite kya waku ipfo kowo, o aleambya kilya kishitsye ikumi kya shilya sha Abrahamu kawikya ichu awembikye shiteṟyo shilya ona.
58007007	Indi kii-ho kilechiwa iteshuo nyi kikeri kidi, ke kilya kii kitutu kyo kyechiwikyo ona nyi kilya king'anyi.
58007008	Na iya nyi wakukerye wadi wandu wepfa waambya shilya sheshitsa ikumi, indi ulya handu akukerye aimṟingishye ke nyi ai na moo.
58007009	Ngahamba kyehambika ke nao Lewi chu moambya sheshitsa ikumi alembeso kishitsye kya ikumi kui Abrahamu.
58007010	Kipfa awei-se kitsinyi kya mku oke mandi akumbuhananye Melkisedeki.
58007011	Mkambo fo wandu fomewawasyo wukohanyi-hu wo ki-Lewi, kya indi kima nyiwo wuweawutsya wuawutsi nyi ki kilekiitika-se iwika-ho mkohanyi ungi arianyi na kamba lya Melkisedeki, alasendo na kamba lya Aron?
58007012	Kyamba ipfo kundo wukohanyi wolacho kokuwukya-ho na wuitiki woilacha wuwawaso.
58007013	Kyamba ichu aihambo na isho nyi apaṟikye osharinyi lungi hondo kulawewukie echiṟunda rasionyi.
58007014	Kumanyikye na pata ke hando Mndumii odu apaṟikye ipfo ko Yuda, na oshari lu Mose alelusendya wukohanyipfo.
58007015	Na iki kyakishika itambahaluka-se kya ngoseṟa ili kowiko-ho mkohanyi ungi ai-mbaakishye Melkisedeki.
58007016	Alawewa adi kui owiko loliwawasya na njia ya kii-nyama, kya indi kawewa adi kui pfinya ya moo fulechipaṟakana.
58007017	Kyamba aṟingishyo, ke iyo ui mkohanyi o mlungana kui kamba lya Melkisedeki.
58007018	Lyo nyi lyawuta-ho iwawaso lisongoe-ho cha kipfa liweifafaa lilawewa. Kyamba wuwawaso wulaleawutsia ma kindo kiawukiepfo.
58007019	Kukaitso-ho owedo lu ucha kota, lyo lyaluduo oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
58007020	Kinene-ho nyi nyamu iya. Wo wawekewa wukohanyi tare nyamu.
58007021	Indi ichu kawiko-ho kui nyamu ya mohenda imbia; “Mndumii alelya nyamu, ma alechieweṟo kyayo kehamba, Iyo ui mkohanyi o mlungana.”
58007022	Ipfo kundo alawewiko-ho tare nyamu nyi hondo Yesu kawa mwiṟichi moiṟicha owiko lochia kota lulya lungi.
58007023	Nawo wai wafoi wawewa wakohanyi cha kipfa nyi walechikaa wai wadumbuo nyi opfu.
58007024	Indi ichu ili ekaa mlungana awode wukohanyi wulechiteshuka.
58007025	Ikyo kyaenenga aidima iwonya iwa waichea Ruwa wakuwawie nao okiio lo mlungana, kipfa ekaa na moo maheri hose mowaterewya-ho.
58007026	Na mkohanyi mnene ai ado nyio alusumhanye kawa menyi wuindi mkeha ose, alawode huya maruwehu.
58007027	O alamwitike mfiri yose cha wakohanyi wanene walya wesonguo iwika-ho shidaso sheoloṟa manyamaṟo hawo waweny wechifurumia na shilya sha ha mkambo, Kyamba ikyo amaa ikiwuta limu echikudambika-ho amonyi.
58007028	Kyamba wuwawaso wulya wotana wandu wakohanyi wanene wawode wunyonge, indi dedo lya nyamu iya iitumanyi wuwawaso lyawika-ho Mana mokaa mlungana aawukie kose.
58008001	Indi kilya kikeri mdo-hu kiidye ishi lomaa ihamba shose kikeri kidi; ke luwode mkohanyi ai mnene adi akudamiṟye ora lo kulyo lo kidembo kya wuitoṟi wo Ipfo maruwehu.
58008002	Aiipfo moiṟicha shilya shii sheele na hema lilya lya lohi Mndumii aleliwika-ho amonyi, chi mndu o wandupfo.
58008003	Kyamba oryo mkohanyi mnene ekewiko kundu nadambikye-ho njodambiko na shidaso. Na ichu nawudo kimbaṟi nakae awode kyedasya-ho.
58008004	Kima aweiya sangenyi chi awewa mkohanyipfo kimaduma kuwode wekedambkya-ho njodambiko tsilya tsiinjiwawase nyi wuwawaso.
58008005	Nyiwo wekeṟundya mfano na mangeṟingesha ha shilya shikeri ruwehu, chando Mose aleshika itutumyo ili indi awerie isungusia hema lilya. Kyamba ahambie ke, “Ambuya mnu ochitana shose kui mfano fulya uleloṟo ipfo fumvu-hu lilya.”
58008006	Indi wulalu amkoya wuiṟichi wung'anyi wo ngoseṟa wuwukye ipfo kundo akukerie-ho mombele o owiko lochia kya ngoseṟa ilu luiilikishye mengenyi ya shiteṟio shicha kota shilya.
58008007	Kyamba kima lulya lo kuwoka luwechia lulawewa idedya kuwechipfulo-ho otende lungipfo.
58008008	Kyamba awadedya kehamba, “Mndumii ahambie, Ambuya, mkonu ikeri icha njechiwikya mba ya Israeli na mba ya Yuda owiko luhya.
58008009	Nalo lulawaakye owiko lulya njilewikya wande yawo mkonu fulya ngamewateteṟa na owoko njewashuo ipfo orukenyi lo Misiri, kyamba wo walawekaa owikonyi lo loko na inyi ngamewaseheṟa. Nyi wudo Mndumii ahambie.
58008010	Na owiko, Mndumii ahambie, ilu njechiwikya mba ii ya Israeli ili indi mkonu iya yamesia lukeriludi; ke njechihomoya njowawaso tsako ipfo mhienyi yawo njechitsiṟehya ipfo ngoonyi tsawo. Na inyi njechiwawiia Ruwa nawo wechinjiwia mkambo.
58008011	Ma kochikaa-pfo echilosha odoya ma ihenda iwia odoya manya Mndumii-pfo. Kipfa wechinjimanya wose wokya ichu ai mtutu owo shika ichu ang'nyi.
58008012	Kyamba njechiwa mowasaṟia madeko hawo, na manyamaṟo hawo njechihakumbuo-sepfo.”
58008013	Ili indi ahambye, luhya, nyi alekuṟa lulya lo kuwoka. Indi kilya kii kikuṟe kiikifoye wuku kyo kiitikirie afui na ihenda saramaya.
58009001	Owiko lu lo kuwoka na luwewode sungusihu tsalo tsa wuindi sanza na yele lilya lya wanda ii.
58009002	Kyamba hema lilealyo-ho lilya lya kuwoka. Napfondo kuwei kiwawa njolewo kilya na mesa na mkate iya iwei-maalye Ruwa. Nalyo lii idumbuye rina, Lyo yele.
58009003	Indi mbele ya isulya lyeshikya mongo lilya lya kawi kuweei-pfo hema lilya lihambo maele.
58009004	Lyo liwewode rasio lya sahabu lyedasya-ho shidaso sha opfamo na isanduku lya owiko lulya liwei ikapye mawala ha sahabu nyora tsose, lyo liwei na nungu ya sahabu liwode manna iya na olio lo Aron ilululembuya yoṟa, na maho halya ha kipala ha owiko lulya.
58009005	Indi huyalyo kuwewode Wakerubimu wenyi-ngeela weruwya kiaala mhoṟie iria. Kuiho kyededa kyasho kimu kimu wulalupfo.
58009006	Ishi shikamesungusio shido wakohanyi wawekehenda hemenyi lilya lya kuwoka mkonu yose wewuta shiheo sha wuindi.
58009007	Indi ihenda hemenyi lilya lingi nyi mkohanyi ulya mnene alekuhendya-pfo oryo maka limu o amonyi kulawode alarie samu aidambikye-ho iwe yemkaya o iwemkaya na mkambo fose kya madeko hawo.
58009008	Lyo nyi lya Mumuyo Mwele amanyishye nalyo ke njia yeduo wuelenyi ilandeshika ipfunguka, ili indi hema lya kuwoka likihoṟoki-seho.
58009009	Lyo lii mfanano fotungya maheri ha halemcha. Nafo fuwei na njodambiko na shidaso shiwekeendo ma shilaweidima iwanza sheko sha mrima fo mowika nasho wuindi.
58009010	Shiwekuwode na shelya na shenyo shiishenyi na maolyo ha mbaṟi ii na ii, sha sungusihu tsa shinyama tsiweindikye tseringa kiheri kya wusumhanzo itane kishike iwoneka.
58009011	Kya indi Kristo amekuchea ai mkohanyi ang'any o mecha hai-mateṟye kakuidya hemenyi lilya ling'anyi liawukye kota lilya li-itane na mawoko, lyo lihambie ke lilai lya mtsanye fo ki-wulalu.
58009012	Kakuidya-ho chi kui samu ya oṟo ang'u ya mahache, kya indi nyi kui samu yake ii njenyi kahenda hando halya haele ili limu kechiwika ndalai yekaa mlungana.
58009013	Alewo kokoya samu ya oṟo na ya chau sanza na mtsiri fo taho nkoṟe sheolya wawode paṟi shekeilisha mndu shimbonye-se wukeha wo kii-nyama.
58009014	Nyi wuda kya ngoseṟa samu ya Kristo ichu alekudambikya Ruwa amonyi ai mkeha kui mumuyo molungana echiilisha sheko shilya sha mrima yanu iletsano na matendo ha opfu, iwe yepfuṟukanya Ruwa menyi mo?
58009015	Ikyo kyanenga ai moitsa-ho owiko luhya kundu walya wai walahe wahendeambya kyoṟa kilya kiweikiteṟye kii kya mlungana, ipfa lilya likamewa lyechiwuta-ho matahachyo haweitano ipfo kiwanjehu kya owiko lo kuwoka.
58009016	Kyamba ipfo kundo kuwudo owiko lui lo kyoṟa nyi kiwaṟi ipfa lya mowika litane liṟingishyo.
58009017	Kipfa owiko loshika iwanga mandi ipfa lilya lyamhoya, indi lolaa wanda kiheri mowika aiho-se.
58009018	Nkyo kitewe manya lulya lo kuwoka lulehoṟotso-ho chila samu iwei-hopfo.
58009019	Cha kipfa mandi Mose alemaa iwia mkambo fulya mawawaso haitumananyi ipfo wuwawasonyi hose kawada samu ya mahache na oṟo sanza na mṟinga na pamba ya king'aring'ari na iṟa lyeola kaolya nasho kitabu kilya kiikyenyi na mkambo fulya fose.
58009020	Kahamba, “Aii samu ya owiko lu Ruwa amtutumye.”
58009021	Na wudo kaweolya na hema lilya na shihia sha wuindi shose samu.
58009022	Kala nyi kufui shindo shose shekeilisho na samu woidikya wuwawaso; na shila samu yapusuo kowonyo mhoṟyepfo.
58009023	Nkyo kyaitika ke ili mfano iya ya shindo shii maruwehu yakunda iilisho idi, shilya sha maruwehu shii shenyi shikundi shidaso shiidimikye kota shilya.
58009024	Kyamba Kristo alawehenda hando haele hai-hawike na mawoko hahambie halya ha lohi kui mfano, kya indi kahenda ruwehu kwenyi nakuloṟe oshangunyi lo Ruwa wulalu echiluhoṟokya-ho so.
58009025	Manya alawehenda-ho kundu nakudambikie amonyi kafoi chando mkohanyi mnene ekehenda hando halya haele oryo maka arie samu ilawei yake.
58009026	Kima nao na wudo nyi aweitika iwawyo kafoi wokya mandi wuyana wulembiko. Indi wulalu alewoneka-ho limu mainutsyonyi ha maheri nawute-ho wunyamaṟi kui ikudasa amonyi.
58009027	Nakyo kirianyi na kya wandu ili kiwawaṟi wapfe limu. Likamewa washike yanduyo.
58009028	Na wudo na Kristo nyi aledambiko-ho limu lyewuta-ho manyamaṟo ha wandu wafoi; Ili lingi echikuloṟa na walya waimbedya kya okiio alawinye wunyamaṟi.
58010001	Kyamba wuwawaso wusongoṟye kiṟishe kya mecha hawerie icha wulaweende fana ya matendo. Na shidaso shilya shimu wekeshiende maka yose shilunganyi sho shaidima ishitsa wadambiki kikunyi ma indipfo.
58010002	Chila wudo chi shiwesia yendo kipfa wadambiki walawekitautau kya manyamaṟo kya indi wawei waharamishe na limu?
58010003	Kya wulalu nyisho shiwatamuṟye manyamaṟo maka na maka.
58010004	Kyamba samu ya chau na ya oṟo ilai na pfinya yewuta-ho manyamaṟo.
58010005	Nkyo kimaduma o ilindi achee wuyana ahambie, “Iyo uwekundi ma kidaso ma odambikopfo. Indi nyi mbihu ulefunjitanya.
58010006	Shiaalo shikoṟe na shidaso sheoloṟa wunyamaṟi shiwekuchihiṟyepfo.
58010007	Nkyo kyannenga ngahamba, Ambuya ngacha; ipfo kitabunyi kilya kinene nyi ku-kuṟehye kyako ke njiwe njiwute kyama kyapfo, hoi Ruwa.”
58010008	Hando heasa ideda nyi ahambye, Uwekundi ma shidaso ma njodambiko ma shiialo shikoṟe ma shidaso sheoloṟa wunyamaṟipfo ma shiwekuchihiṟyepfo, ishi shekedambikyo kui wuwawaso wulya.
58010009	Kashika oo kahamba, Ambuya, ngacha njiwe njewuta kyama kyapfo. Kawuta-ho lya kuwoka kundu nailikishye-ho lilya lya kawi.
58010010	Kui kyama ki luiwailishe na limu likawa na odambiko lo mbihu fo Yesu Kristo.
58010011	Na oryo mkohanyi ekehoṟoka-ho mkonu kawa mowika wuindi echidambikya-ho shidaso shilya shimu kafoi na kafoi, nasho shilai na pfinya yewutaho wunyamaṟi.
58010012	Indi ichu alemdambika kidaso kimu mfi kiwewa kimaduma kya manyamaṟo kikae-ho mlungana kakudamiṟa owokonyi lo kulyo lo Ruwa.
58010013	Kaitsa-ho mweke fo iweda itane wakituwa wake washika ilaṟo shi ya madende hake.
58010014	Kyamba iwa weilisha nyi alewashitsa kikunyi kui odambiko lumu mfi lochikaa mlungana.
58010015	Indi na Mumuyo Mwele aluṟingishie adi; kyamba ili amaa ihamba.
58010016	“Ilo nyilo owiko njechiwawikya mkonu iya iya yamsia”, nyi Mndumii ahambie, “Njechihomoya njowawaso tsako ipfo ngoon tsawo, na iṟehya njechitsiṟehya ipfo mhienyi yawo.
58010017	Na manyamaṟo hawo na njotahachi tsawo sho njechishitamuo-sepfo.”
58010018	Kya indi ipfo kundo sho shii shihoṟye mpfondo kukiwode-se odambiko lo kimaduma kya wunyamaṟipfo.
58010019	Kyasia wanawawama, lui na wutumbe kui samu ya Yesu wo kihendesha na ipfo kundo kwenyi wuele.
58010020	Nyi yo njia ameluipfunguya ikeri njihya iwode moo iitsye kiṟikishyenyi kilya nyinyitso nyama tsake.
58010021	Ili lui ludi na mkohanyi ang'anyi ai mbawasie kanyi ka Ruwa.
58010022	Luhendetikiria-ho luwode ngoo nlalutsu lui na welu ya mwidikye lui-waolye ngo tsa mrima tsilakikae makufaṟe lui-wasanje mbihu na mṟinga mharami.
58010023	Lutsinde lochiṟi ngishya kilya luiweda ma lulalemo, kyamba mokiteṟya nyio m mhendeli.
58010024	Na lukae lochiringana luwenyi na wenyi luhende yaaka kui makundano na mawuto mecha.
58010025	Lulalembeṟye shisanzyo shadu chando waliwe waichiwie, kya indi lulahane naho. Luitike iwuta ludi ili luwonyi ke mkonu fulya fulya fuitikiria icha.
58010026	Kyamba kokoya so ili lomma ipfunguyo kilya kii lohi lokedekyo hando luwonyi kochitsuhase kidaso kingi kyewuta-ho wunyamaṟipfo.
58010027	Shila yambya mndumbuye iya ioweshye na modo fulya foaka pala fochilya walemeshi walya.
58010028	Mndu afunja wuwawaso wo Mose koka wangochi wai-ho wawi ang'u waṟaṟu wewikya mndumbuye pfinya nyi ashikahenda iwoho alawa iichio wukiwa.
58010029	Chi mochihamba, A nyi wuda wo ngoseṟa wudeheli wuwe wochihoya ichu achuma-chuma Mana chu o Ruwa ekitana samu ya owiko lulya ya mpurya, nyi yo ametano nayo mwele kawa motaluo mumuyo moende wutonga.
58010030	Kyamba luichi ichu ahambie, “Idehelya mndu lyankoya inyi, nyio inyi njechitaa kiṟache.” Kukawehambo lingi, “Mndumii echidedya mkambo foke.”
58010031	Nyi koweshye munu yolokya mawokonyi ha Ruwa menyi moo.
58010032	Wuyenyi ikumbuo mkonu iya mulekutirisia ngapanonyi njumu ya mawawyo.
58010033	Ili limu muwei walahe patehu mochipiṟo na ituro, ili lingi muwedaṟanyi na walya waweiwutyo wado.
58010034	Kyamba nanyo muleichio wapfunge walya wukiwa, na iliindi mulesoko masaa hanu nyi mulekukarishya muwekaa na sia, kipfa muweichi ke nyi muwode mkae fungi fui mcha fochikaa.
58010035	Ma mulawone mokumba wutumbe wu wonu wanda wui na wuṟundi wung'anyi wudi.
58010036	Nyi muwuṟie ikaa na mrima msanze kundu muhende iduo kilya kii kiteṟye mukamaa iwuta kilya Ruwa akundi.
58010037	Kyamba oweṟe luipfo sa lutung'tu. Mocha echicha alechikeleo.
58010038	“Na mosumhana oko echiwada moo fuṟukye wuidikinyi. Indi kokoya awuya numa mrima foko fochihio kyakepfo.”
58010039	Indi so lulai wandu wewuya numa lochihenda ideka, kya indi lui waidiki lochiletsa-ho mrima.
58011001	Wuidiki nyii wukeri ikuwada na shilya shiiedyo, wo nyiwo mhomoye fohomoya shindo shilawono.
58011002	Na walya wa mboko ili wawei nawo wukeri wudi nyihondo walekuwutya-ho ihenda iwikyo kiṟingishyo.
58011003	Nyi wuidiki woluenenga imanya ke wuyana wu wometano nyi idedo lya Ruwa, na kilya kiwono chi ipfo handu heambuya kipaṟikyepfo.
58011004	Nyi wuidiki wuleenenga Abeli adambikye Ruwa kidaso kichihianyi nao kota kya Kain, kashika ihenda iṟingishyo ke nyi ai mndu asumhana kimaduma kyawo. Kiṟingishyo ki nyi Ruwa aweṟingishye kikuwode na njodambiko tsake. Nawo (wuidiki wo) womenenga aideda-se mandi alemshikahenda ipfa.
58011005	Nyi wuidiki wuleenenga Enoki ametakuwo alawona opfu. Nyi alekiwonose ma handopfo kipfa nyi Ruwa alemtakuo. Kyamba mandi itakuo lilya lilandehenda iwa kashika iwikyo kiṟinghishyo ke nyi awechihianyi na Ruwa.
58011006	Indi kundo kulawode wuidiki koidima ichihianapfo. Kyamba kiwaṟi mndu motikirya Ruwa nawe mwidiki moidikya ke o aiho na walya waimpfula nyi echiwasumba.
58011007	Nyi wuidiki wuleenenga Noe amepeesuyo shindo shilawendewoneka kawa mwikimbe esungusia sanduku lilya ling'anyi liwe kyekiṟa wa mba yake kawewonya na mweke fowo wuyana wu owingo kaweioṟa wusumhanyi wuoshanyi na wuidiki.
58011008	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Abrahamu ilindi amshikahenda ilaho aleleshyaho madu kesamya hando hawei hateṟie hembia kyoṟa, kahenda isama kulawode aweichi handu halya heshika-ho.
58011009	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga alekapa pata ipfo sangenyi lya kiteṟyo kilya cha ili liwei lihenu kahenda ilaa mahemenyi. Na Isaki na Yakobo na wudo wawerianyi nao iduo kyoṟa kya kiteṟyo kilya kilya.
58011010	Kyamba aweiwedya mṟi fulya mikare fushike iwiko kiwanje-hu kya maho ha ngina, mtsanyi ofo nao Ruwa mofusungusia.
58011011	Nyi wuidiki nawo wukaenenga Sara alewada pfinya yeembeṟa mbeu amekuo wuku wulakiwona-se katana moteṟya kiteṟyo kilya mokusirio.
58011012	Nkyo kimaduma ko ichu umu kuwepaṟikye luwa lifoi cha nyenyeri tsa ngine-hu na cha mbuṟusanga fo ohambehu lo nduwa ya wuyana fulawa italo, nao alepfa kui ifee.
58011013	Iwa wose walemhenda wekaa na wuidiki ma walawekudaya shiteṟyo shilya, indi waleshiwona shikeri kundo ko isonguo wakashiindya wekuhambya na pata ke wakeri wahenu, wandu wekuidya-ho tupu ipfo teri-hu-ii.
58011014	Kyamba iwa waideda wadi nyi wamanyishye ke nyi kiku kyawo waikipfula.
58011015	Kima wawekumbuo-ho kilya walekisama naa wawewode mwaanya foiwuya napfo.
58011016	Indi wulalu nyi kilya kicha kota walekikuleshya, nakyo nyi kya ruwehu. Nkyo kimaduma Ruwa alawepfia sonu isendo Ruwa owo, kyamba nyi alewawikya mṟi.
58011017	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Abrahamu aleshika idasa Isaki ilindi aweihesho kadambikya-ho ichu oke kimumu mfi. Nao nyi awei mteṟye shiteṟyo shilya.
58011018	Nyio amewio; ke nyi Isaki echiwa msendo fo mbeu yapfo.
58011019	Nao nyio kahamba ke Ruwa ai na pfinya yeṟutsa mndu na ipfo wapfunyi. Nakyo kyamnenga alembihiṟyo nawe mfano.
58011020	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga isaki alewikya Yakobo na Esau ona kawasendya shindo shewoneka.
58011021	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Yakobo ilindi aweihenda ipfa alewikya oryo ose o wana wa Yosefu ona keindya akulemye mdo-hu fo ndichi yake.
58011022	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Yosefu ipfo mainukyonyi hake alehenda ikumbuo kya isama lya wana wa Israeli kawawasya kya mafuo hake.
58011023	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Mose kafeo kaṟiko nyi wafee wake meri iṟaṟu kipfa nyi walewona kimana kiwewode lole, nkyo kiletewa walaweowuo iwawaso lilya lya mangi.
58011024	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Mose ili amtoṟika kaleha isendo mana o mpfu o Farao.
58011025	Kasambuṟa ihenda ituro hamu na mkambo fo Ruwa, kyo kiwemchihiṟye kota ikaa na seko tsa oweṟe tsiwukye wunyamaṟinyi.
58011026	Nyi alehamba isutso kimaduma kya Kristo lyo liende wusuṟi kota shisa sha Wamisiri, kyamba nyi aleringa wuṟundi wulya.
58011027	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga aleda Misiri alechiowuo rihima ya mangi kyamba alekukarisha na ichu alawono cha ili ambonyi.
58011028	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga alewika Pasaka (nyi mwidio fulya) na yoola lilya lya samu, kundu mkombetsi ulya nalahende ipaya wawee wawo.
58011029	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga waleambadya ipalipali lya king'aring'ari cha ili nyi kundu kuhadutsu mpfondo Wamisiri, ilindi walehesha iwika chawo, walekuwutya-ho ihenda imeṟo.
58011030	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga njomombo tsa Yeriko tsilewunduka tsiwei mtengetie mfiri mfungade.
58011031	Nyi wuidiki wukaenenga Rahabu mka ulya o njia alawesanzo irumatso kimu na walemeshi walya kipfa nyi aleambya wa lokitala walya kui ofoṟo.
58011032	Na iki njihambe-se kingi ngesa? Kyamba nyi saa tsiwenjiwuṟye tsehamba sha Gedeon na Barakia na Samson na Yefita na Dawidi na Samueli na waikimbi walya.
58011033	Wonyiwo walelaṟa maumangi kui wuidiki wakaende wusumhanyi, wakashika ikoya shilya shileteṟyo wakapfunga madumbu ha miso.
58011034	Wakaṟumisha modo furie pfinya ing'anyi wakaturuchuka madumbu ha oshu wakahomoyo pfinya ili wawei wufafenyi, wakawa wawahanyi ipfo shidenyi, wakadichiṟa siṟi tsa mesa.
58011035	Waka wakaambya wawo walepfa wamshika iṟuka, indi womi wengi wakahenda ifunjo-funjo mafuo walaweleshya ndalai iya mawoko kundu washike ikoya iṟuka lingi lii icha.
58011036	Indi wengi wakawonyo italwo na ikapo na shiteecho wesanzyo ihenda ipfungo na ikumbo kipfungyonyi.
58011037	Wakakumbyo maho, wakaitso wudenyi wakapaṟopaṟo, wakapfa wewooho na oshu, wakaṟahaṟaha waṟee masaṟa ha machondi na ha mburu, wawei wandu wadee, wapotse, waṟohye.
58011038	Nyiwo wuyana wu wulawewasumhanye. Wawekeṟahaṟaha weowa ko olele na ipfo mafumvunyi na ipfo njopangenyi na mṟeshenyi ya wanda ii.
58011039	Na iwo wose ma ili waleṟingishyo wadi kui wuidiki wulya ma walemkudaya kilya kiwei-kiteṟyepfo.
58011040	Kipfa kilya Ruwa alesonguo iluwonya kiwe kicha kota, ke walashike yawutsyo chila hamu naso.
58012001	Nkyo kimaduma naso ili lui na ipuchi lya waṟingishi lilutengetie lidi luleṟye wanda oryo wulami na wunyamaṟi wu wokiṟa iluoṟowya owinyi, lochiengeṟa ihenda ira ngapano iii njiwawasye yadu lukuhode-ho necha.
58012002	Lochifunya Yesu meso ichu ai mboki na moawutsi o wuidiki wu. O handu ha sia iwei mbiike oshangunyi loke kahenda ikuwada na msalaba nalaṟise wusutsu kashika ikudamiṟa ora lo kulyo lo loṟikehu lo wusuṟi wo Ruwa.
58012003	Keringenyi-ng'u wo ichu alekukarishia wulemi wulya wo wanyamaṟi walya wolemana nao amonyi, kundu mulahende ilemo, mrima yanu ilalolome.
58012004	Ipfo ngapanonyi yelehana na wunyamaṟi mulemekuhode itane moewa samupfo.
58012005	Nanyo mulemaa ihadima wukarishi wulya, ipfondo modedyo mui wana, “Manoko, ma kulamine ihenda itsano nyi Mndumii. Ma kulalolome ili odedyo nyio.
58012006	Kyamba ichu Mndumii amkundi nyi ekemtsana. Kechikapa oryo mana aimwambya.”
58012007	Kutirisienyi mochitsano. Ruwa aimkumbuhananya-ho mui wana. Kyamba nyi mana uhya wande alaimtsana?
58012008	Alewo kokoya mulahenda itsano wutsanyi wuwei kita kya wose nyi mukeri wenyi pari mulai wana.
58012009	Kyasia ili luwewode wande yadu wa kui nyama wechilutsana lukawewahoya chi kiluwaṟi mnu kya ngoseṟa luhende ikulaṟya Wande chu ai menyi mamumuyo lukuwutie-ho iwonyo moo?
58012010	Kyamba wo walelutsana kiheri kyangu wutsanyi wurianyi na mhie yawo, indi o ailutsana awode kitewe kilya kicha kyeluwonya kita nao kya wuele woke.
58012011	Oweṟe lu oryo wutsanyi wuiho wufanyi siapfo, kya indi nyi wukiwa, ili lya numa-le woenenga iwa waiwatoṟishe nyiwo wusumuhanyi wuwikye-ho ofoṟo.
58012012	Nkyo kimwenenge muhende ikarisha mawoko halya hai-masotse owaa na ndi tsilya mulakae marehe.
58012013	Mutanye madende hanu osenge luhoṟotsu, kundu kilya kiirichahia kilarendemke, indi kikunde henda chia.
58012014	Wingyenyi hamu na wose ikaa na ofoṟo na wuilisho, kipfa kulaipfo echiwona Mndumii alai mwilishe.
58012015	Muwe mochiambuya mnu, kundu kulawoneke-ho echiwuka wutongehu wo Ruwa, manya kulaalukye-ho mri fuipusa fochirohya fuweshika ifanyitsa wafoi.
58012016	Kulakae-pfo ai mndu o melumelu ang'u mndu mtaicho cha Esau alekumba wuwee woke kya kilayo kimu.
58012017	Kyamba muichi ke nyi ili lya numa alewuya ilanga iduo ona lulya kyoṟa kyake kashika ileho. Kyamba alawekoya kundo mdo fomelacho ma kawekipfula echitonyitsya machenyeṟe.
58012018	Kyamba nyo mulaweshika itikiria hando hepaya kuwei na modo foaaka na nruwe na meema na otanu.
58012019	Na irunduma lya ombe na ṟu lya modeda, kyalyo weliicho waleterewa ke, Ma walakihendewio dedo.
58012020	Kyamba walaweidimana na iwawaso liwe lyehamba, “Ma indo liwe likakuwasha na fumvu li lyechikumbyo maho lipfe.”
58012021	Ma Mose kahamba, Ngawuko m madima njidedema. Kilya kilewonyo-ho nyi wudo kiweioweshye.
58012022	Kya indi nyo momshika itikiria fumvu lya Sionyi na mṟi fo Ruwa menyi moo, nyifo Yerusalemu ya kiruwehu na matorito ha wasu waele halawa italo.
58012023	Na renge na siṟi ya wawee waiwaṟehie ipfo ruwehu na Ruwa moanduya wandu wose na mumuyo ya wasumhanyi walya wai-waawutsie.
58012024	Na Yesu moende owiko lulya luhya na samu iya ya maolya ikeri ideda kuichyo kota iya ya Abeli.
58012025	Keringenyi-ng'u-wo mulawone mochilekana na ichu ai-pfo modeda. Kyamba kokoya walya walaweikia wechilehana na ichu modeda kyake ipfo sangenyi, nyi hanga kawi so, kokoya lokumbya ichu mhongo aideda akeri ruwehu.
58012026	Nyio ṟu lyake lilemdedemesha wanda ii mandi halya, indi wulalu amemanyisha kehamba, “Nyi limu-se njechidihinyisha lingi chi wanda ii tupupfo, indi na ipfo ruwehu.”
58012027	Idedo ili; limu-se lingi, lyahamba necha ke shilya shii shidedemeshe shehenda ilachika cha kipfa shiwei-shiwumbe, kundu kukae-pfo shilawa idedemesho.
58012028	Nakyo kienenge so ili luiambya wumangi wulechiteshuka luwike-pfo mwaano lochipfuṟukanya nafo Ruwa kyemchihiṟa luwodo nyi wuindi na wuowu.
58012029	Kyamba Ruwa odu ai modo fuilya fochimaa.
58013001	Kaenyi mochikundana na wanawawama.
58013002	Mulahadime iambya wahenu na kanyi konu. Kyamba ili kuweipfo wewika wadi nyi waleambya wasu waele ma walawichi.
58013003	Muwe mochikumbuo walya wai wapfunge cha ili mompfungo hamu nawo, muwekumbuo waiwature muwode mbihu chawo.
58013004	Wasangi wo wasanze wali wumu wuhendelyo nyi wose na kisima kyawo kilahendesutso. Kyamba wamelumelu na waṟuhui nyio Ruwa echiwaanduya.
58013005	Mbuka yanu ilafane wueehi, kilya kyanu kii-ho kyo kimshikye. Kyamba o amonyi awehambie, “Njechikuda manya-lepfo, njechiwuta macha ipfo kofo ma indipfo.”
58013006	Nkyo kyalukarisha luihamba, “Iricha oko nao Mndumii, njechiowuo kindopfo Mndu o wandu anjiidima ki?”
58013007	Kaenyi mochikumbuo wasongoru wanu iwo walembia idedo lya Ruwa. Muwe mochikapya mainukyo ha ohendo lowo meso mukuwaakishye wuidiki iwu.
58013008	Yesu kristo awei adi wukowu ai adi na inu echikaa adi mlungana.
58013009	Mulahende patsyo nyi mapfundo maliwe hai ha kihenu. Kyamba kilya kii kicha kyechiwanza ngoo nyi wutonga chi chonga; tso tsiweendie walya wawekekurohya natso mbuchapfo.
58013010	So luwode rasio, kyayo walya waisingya hema lilya wawode momu foilya kilya kii-hopfo.
58013011	Kyamba nyama tsa mando halya, samu yaho yekeendo nyi mkohanyi mnene ipfo hando halya haele yeoloṟa wunyamaṟi, tso tsahenda ikoṟo ora lo kya nja lo otiṟiwe lulya.
58013012	Nkyo kitewe na Yesu alewawiṟo ora lo nja lo kichumi kya mṟi fulya kundu nailishe mkambo foke kui samu yake.
58013013	Hondo lukuwutie tewe so luwuke otiṟiwenyi lulya lusangane nao nja iya lochikudika na wusutsu wulya awei-mwendie o.
58013014	Kyamba lulawode iya mṟi fokukaya-ho, kya indi nyi lukeri iwingya fulya fungi fochikuwiia-ho.
58013015	Lutsinde lochidambikya Ruwa odambiko lo mwano fochiwa lui nao fui momu-hu yechiichika rina lyake.
58013016	Indi mulahadime ilekia na ihawya wengi, kyamba njodambiko tsa mbaṟi ii tsichihiṟye Ruwa.
58013017	Muhendelye wasongoru wanu na iwahoya, kyamba wo walaa chowe wechiwinya mrima yanu wai wandu warie ihenda weso kyayo, kundu wahendehaluo-ho wawodo n sia walawone wechisumukya. Kikamba kido kiwemfurunjikia.
58013018	Ke luterewyenyi-ng'u-wo. Kyamba so lukusirie ke ngo tsadu tsa mrimenyi tsii nhoṟotsu loitika ihendekya wose kui wusumhanyi.
58013019	Kyanjiitika kawi njimtutumye iwuta iki nyi kundu njihede iwihiṟo konu owinyi.
58013020	Indi Ruwa ai menyi-ofoṟo nyi aletambachuo mlisi o machondi ipfo ko wapfu ichu ang'anyi kuisamu yewika-ho owiko lo mlungana, Mndumii odu Yesu.
58013021	Ruwa chu namsumbe pfinya ya oryo kii kicha kyose muwe mowuta shilya akundi. Nao nyio ai-msanze nanyo echiwa mowuta kilya kichihianyi nao kikawa kui Yesu Kristo. Nyio nawe mowikyo mng'ano maheri hose halunganyi. Amenyi.
58013022	Indi ngamtutuma nyo wana wa wama ke ambyenyi necha idedo li lya wuikimbi, kyamba njilemṟehya nyo njido ngamdumbuo owinyi.
58013023	Manyenyi ke manowama odu Timoteo amelekio; kokoya acha owinyi njishike iwonana nanyo njirianyi nao.
58013024	Munjiiṟikiṟye wasongoru wanu wose na waele wose. Walya wai ipfo Italia wamudikye shiṟikiṟo shawo.
58013025	Wutonga wukae nanyo mose.
59001001	Inyi Yakobo njii singa lya Ruwa na lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo ngaiṟikiṟa njoshari tsilya ikumi na tsiwi tsilee wahenunyi.
59001002	Wanawawama wako, kokoya moshika ihoyo shihesho shiwe na shiwe, iki mukitane sia ii njenyi.
59001003	Mochimanya ke kilya kiihesha wuidiki wonu kiende wukuhodi.
59001004	Indi wukuhodi wu wumarisie iṟunda lyawo ipfo kundo nyo mochiawukya muhendechia wyoo mulapfuwae ma kya iki ma kya iki.
59001005	Indi kokoya ipfo konu kwipfo atoṟowae wuṟango, o naterewe Ruwa chu ekenengya wose alasambuṟa alechideda mndu na echienengo.
59001006	Indi naterewe ai mwidiki nalawone apfio nyi mdo; kyamba mopfio nyi mdo afananyi na isinanu lya ipalipali likeri isingitso-singitso nyi otanu lyechipongaikapongika.
59001007	Mndu amba adi ma nalahambe ke nyi echienengo kindo nyi Mndumii.
59001008	Ai mndu o mrima iwi awa motangatanga njiehu tsake tsose.
59001009	Indi manowama chu mtutu nakuṟumishe kya mng'ano foke.
59001010	Indi ichu msuṟi nawekuṟumisha kya wututu woke kipfa echisia cha kiwaṟo kya maṟenyi.
59001011	Kyamba manengeṟi fodo fuiwaa na mbaṟi fukanaṟa maṟa, na shiwaṟo shaho shikaanama na lole yasho ikadeka. Na wudo mndu msuṟi echikoṟosoka njohendonyi tsake.
59001012	Nanga mndu msoṟo aikuhoda kiheshyonyi, kipfa ili ambangohoda echiambya oṟo iya nchope, nyiyo moo fu Ruwa alemteṟya walya wamkundi.
59001013	Mndu aihesho ma nalahambe, ke nyi Ruwa anjihesha. Kyamba Ruwa alahesheka na shindo shiwicho, nao amonyi ahesha mndupfo.
59001014	Indi oryo mndu ose ahenda ihesho nyi lango tsake tsi njenyi tsechimkuruo-kuruo na imhomuo-homuo.
59001015	Ilindi lango yamaa yambya yafee wunyamaṟi, indi wunyamaṟi wukamaa itano woende opfu.
59001016	Wanawawama wako wakunde, ma muladekesho.
59001017	Oryo kisumbo kyose kii kicha, oryo kinego kyose kii kya sungusihu kichee huye, kisokie kyechiwuka ko Wande mowika sa tsose. Na ipfo koke kuwode ma mhaluye mliwe manya mṟishe mangu fo masehyanopfo.
59001018	Nyio alekunda kalufee so kui idedo lya kii-lohi kundu lukae-pfo lui odambiko lulya lo wuwee lusongoe mawumbe hake.
59001019	Iki mukiichi, wanawawama wako wakunde. Indi oryo mndu nawe mwangu kui yadanya na mlemeri kui ideda na mlemeri kui idosa nyashi.
59001020	Kyamba nyashi ya mndu ilekeṟundya wusumhanyi wo Ruwa.
59001021	Nkyo kimwenenge muhende kuatuo oryo ngafu yose na wumbafu wufo wudo.
59001022	Na idedo lyo lii iwaye konyu lyo muliwade mui muwe watanyi wa idedo, mulakae weliadanya tupu mochikulemba muwenyi.
59001023	Kipfa kokoya mndu aadanya idedo alawa mtanyi nyio ai cha kilolenyi.
59001024	Kyamba o ili amekuambuya alewuka-ho kahenda ihadima na limu fana iya awefanyi.
59001025	Indi ichu alekulemya wuwawaso-hu wu wusumhanye njora tsose iwu wo ikuachia, o awa mokaika kechiwuambuya, alai moadanya kya ihadima indi ai mtanyi motana kindo lohi-nyio echiwa mosumbo sia ipfo mbutienyi yake.
59001026	Kokoya mndu ahamba ke ai menyi-wuindi nao alaapfinya olimi loke indi alemba ngoo yake, wuindi wu woke wukeri wo wulya.
59001027	Wuindi wuharami wulafanyi oshangunyi lo Ruwa Wande wukeri wule, isenguda wana wangoeda na waka wa kusu iwa wai walise wukiwa na ikuṟisa ihenda fanytso nyi wuyana wu.
59002001	Wanawawama wako, na mulasanze wuidiki woidikya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo menyi wuitoṟi na ikundya wandu.
59002002	Kyamba kokoya ipfo kisanzyonyi kyanu kukawecha napfo mndu msoṟo aṟee rachi tsa sahabu na nguo njiili pang'a, indi kuwecha napfo na mndu mkiwa aṟee nguo tsiteṟe-fukye.
59002003	Nanyo muwechiringa ulya aṟee nguwo njiili pang'a muwembia, damya aa kundo kuu kucha; na ichu mkiwa muwembia, iyo hoṟoka ipfo, ang'u damya tsindenyi ya kitima kyako kyehekya-ho madende.
59002004	Mukawika mudo chi mowiluo ipfo kiidi kyanu mochiwa modumbuya mndu na mahio mawicho?
59002005	Wanawawama wako wakunde, kundenyi yadanya. Ruwa chi alesambuṟa iwa wai wakiwa na wa iya wuyana kawatana wasuṟi wenyi-wuidiki na waoṟi wa wumangi wu alewuteṟya walya wamkundi?
59002006	Indi nyo momleha iindya ichu mkiwa. Chi wasuṟi wekemwapfinya, chiwo wekemduo mengenyi?
59002007	Chi iwo wekeruma rina li icha mui-wasende nalyo?
59002008	E-wo kokoya moawutsia necha iwawaso lilya lya kiwumangi lii-iṟehye bibilienyi lyehamba, “Kunda odoo cha ili okukunda kumonyi,” nyihondo mowuta kya wusumhanyi.
59002009	Indi kokoya mokekundia wandu, nyi mowika-ho wunyamaṟi mohenda iwonyo owingo nyi wuwawaso ke mui watahachi.
59002010	Kyamba ili mndu akuwode na wuwawaso wose indi kafunja ili limu nyi mtahachi motahachya hose.
59002011	Kyamba ichu ahambie, “Ma kulaṟuhuye,” nao nyio awehambie, “Ma kulawahe.” Indi kokoya odumbuya kya iṟuhuya, indi kohenda iwaha nyi hondo omba mtahachi motahachia wuwawaso.
59002012	Ikyo muideda na wudo kiwe na ikyo muiwuta na wudo kiwewa mui wandu wakunda idumbuyo na meke fo wuwawaso wo ikuachia.
59002013	Kyamba mndu alekesaṟya, mdumbuye ii yechimhoya inletsane na isaṟya. Isaṟia lyashika iwikyo kiṟumi na ipfo mdumbuyenyi.
59002014	Wanawawama wako, kiira nyi kiki kechiwuka ipfo kundo mndu ahambye wai ke ai na wuidiki, indi mawuto alahawode? Alewo wuidiki wu wochiidima imletsa ko?
59002015	Kokoya mndu manowama ang'u mshiki waipfo wai kitaṟe wawuṟie na mlie fo inu.
59002016	Na umu o kiidi kyanu kawawia, Kuhendyenyi na ofoṟo muhende ioda modo muweihuda indi alawaenengya shelela mbihu iki nyi kiwataramie ki ngesa?
59002017	Na wudo wuidiki wukeri, kokoya wulai na mwatuo nyi wukeri wupfu kowo wuwenyi.
59002018	Kulako kwipfo ehamba, Iyo ui na wuidiki na inyi njii na mawuto halya. Njiloṟa wuidiki wu wopfo wuta-ho mawuto halya na inyi njekuloṟa wuidiki wulya ipfo kundo mawuto hako hai.
59002019	Iyo uidikye ke Ruwa nyio umu. Kowika kudo kyachia. Na waṟufu waidikye iki wechidedema.
59002020	A iyo mndu mohuukya, kokunda imanya ke wuidiki wulai na matendo nyi wukeri kitendo?
59002021	Abrahamu mku odu chi alesumhanzo kui mawuto kechiaala mana chu oke Isaki ipfo rasionyi-hu?
59002022	Nyi owona wuidiki wuiṟunda ipfo kundo mawuto hake haiwuto, na wuidiki wuleshika yawukia ipfo mawutonyi halya.
59002023	Kukashika iinutsyo-ho kilya ki-kiṟehye kyehamba, Abrahamu aweidikye Ruwa nakyo kilemsendyo kya wusumhanyi kalaho mbuya ya Ruwa.
59002024	Muwonyi ke mndu ahenda isumuhanzo kui mawuto chi kui wuidiki wuwenyi.
59002025	Na wudo na Rahabu mka ulya o njia chi aleshika itano asumhanyi kui mawuto ili aleambya wasu walya na iwasama na njia ingi?
59002026	Kyamba chando mbihu fulai na mumuyo fukeri mpfu na wudo wuidiki wuwuṟye mawuto nyi wui wupfu.
59003001	Wanawawama wako, mulafo mudi mochiwa walosha, ili muichi ke mdumbuye lochidumbuyo so nyi yechiwa ya wutichi kawi.
59003002	Kyamba so lose piu lokedeko kafoi. Kokoya kwipfo aladeko ili echideda ichu awei msoṟo msanze na kamu aidima yaapfinya na mbihu fose.
59003003	Kokoya lowika ngowa madumbunyi ha frasi kundu tsiluhoye, nyi mbihu fotso luifuduo fose.
59003004	Ambuya merikebu tsing'anyi tsidi tsikeri ihendesho-hendesho nyi njotanu tsa owira nyi tsekehaluyo nyi mlo mwangu ora lulya moichilia akunda kui wulami wo owoko.
59003005	Olimi na wudo lukeri kiwungo kitutu, na shilya luikusenda nasho sa shing'anyi. Ambuya kimodo kitutu nyi kyahenda ikoṟa ingeṟa chando ling'anyi.
59003006	Nalo olimi nyi modo, nyi lui wumangi wuichuo wumbafu. Olimi lukukerye kiidi kya shiwungo shadu kifanyitsa mbihu fose kiweatsa kidung'anyitso kya mbuka lui-waatse nyi Gehena.
59003007	Kyamba mbika ya mando ha nja yose na ya sherunduka huye na ya sheafuo wanda anda na ya shikuṟembye ipalipalinyi yahooro wanda na ikamaa ihooṟo nyi mbika ya mndu o wandu.
59003008	Indi kwipfo ma umu o wandu aidima ihooṟa olimipfo. Lo kiwicho kilya kilatsia loichuo uṟoi loende opfu.
59003009	Na mweke folo lokeṟumisha mndumii na Wande, na mweke folo lokeruma wandu wai-wawike kui ofano lo Ruwa.
59003010	Nyi ipfo dumbunyi ili limu-ho kukuwukye-ho ona na oseso. Wanawawama wako, isho chi kisumhanyi shihendeke shidopfo.
59003011	Alewo kuwode soka kuweṟukye mṟinga foloda na fopusa ipfo kiṟukyonyi kyayo ki kimu?
59003012	Ma mkuyu foidima iwika ndunda tsa msinepfupfo, manya msabibu fowika tsi tsa mkuyupfo. Na wudo kundo ko mbalenyi koende mringa folodafo.
59003013	Nyi wu o konu ai mṟango amba mndu mṟeheṟi? O nawike-ho mawuta hechiwa na mbaye fusumhanyi kui wuṟango wo ipfudia.
59003014	Indi kokoya muwode wunyeng'i wuwawa na wulang'a wo ndeda ipfo ngoonyi tsanyu ma mulakuṟumishe mowongisha kilya kii-lohi.
59003015	Iwu wukeri wudi chi wuṟango wuwukye ipfo huyepfo, indi wukeri wo shi, wo ki-wandu, wo ki-waṟupfu.
59003016	Kyamba ipfo kwipfo wupirisi na wumbafu wose.
59003017	Indi wuṟango wu wowuka ipfo huye, wo wosonguo imanyika wui wukeha wukaengeṟa imanyisha ikunda ofoṟo na isehyana wanawawama wochikaa na wuindi wuwelukie welu masaṟia na mawiko mecha wulahenda iira mndu ma wulakulembetseṟye.
59003018	Indi mbeu yende ofoṟo yekeolyo kundo kuwode ofoṟonyi walya weitsa-ho ofoṟo.
59004001	Ngapano na maanduyano shikeri ipfo konu nyi hanga shikuchee ngesa? Chi ipfo kundo lango tsanu tsikuwode tsechiamtsa shida ipfo shiwungonyi shanu?
59004002	Mukeri ilalakia, indi moshika iwadapfo. Muiwahana na ilang'aa indi moidima ikoyapfo. Moira ngapano na ikumba-pfo moo. Indi mowona kindopfo kipfa muleketerewa.
59004003	Moterewa mulaambya nyi kipfa moketerewa owicho kundu mushifole-fole mochilisiṟa nasho lango tsanu.
59004004	Nyo wafunji wa wusangi, mulaichi ko, ke iwada mbuya na wuyana wu lyo liende kituwa na Ruwa? Kyasia ichu akunda iwa mbuya ya wuyana nyi akutana mkutuwa o Ruwa.
59004005	Ang'u mohamba biblia yadeda kya wulya kehamba, “Mumuyo alefusamiṟya konu nyi folalakya na iṟisaṟisa?
59004006	Indi aenenga wutonga wo mwengeṟia.” Nkyo kimaduma ihambie, “Ruwa alemana na walya wekutimbisha wawenyi, indi walya wakusotsa, awawonya wutonga.”
59004007	Nkyo kimitike muhoye Ruwa. Lemanenyi na Satana nao echimdicha.
59004008	Mutikirie Ruwa nao echimtikiria nanyo. Haramishenyi mawoko, nyo wanyamaṟi, ketanenyi-ng'u wo ngoo tsanu ngeha, nyo wenyi mrima iwi.
59004009	Hendenyi mukuwiṟishe, mukuinadye na ilia. Seko tsanu tsihaluke tsiwe shilio, na sia ihaluke iwe ṟenze.
59004010	Kunyiṟyenyi Mndumii nao echimwira.
59004011	Muladedane, wanawawama. Ichu aideda manowama ang'u aidumbuo manomae nyi ekededa wuwawaso na idumbuo wuwawaso. Indi kokoya odumbuo wuwawaso nyi ukeri mtanyi motana wuwawasopfo indi nyi ui modumbuo.
59004012	Ichu ai umu nyio mowika wuwawaso na mowudumbuo. Nao nyio menyi pfinya yekiṟa na yerumatsa indiiyo nyi o wu kodumbuo mokingana na iyo?
59004013	Akawo nyo mokehamba, Inu ang'u ngama lochihenda mṟinyi mliwe lutsinde ipfo maka lochiṟimiṟya-ho na ifeṟa mbucha.
59004014	Nanyo mui wandu mulamanya kilya kyewutika ngama. Moo fonu nyi fo kiki? Nyi mui mtsu fukeri iwono-ho oweṟe fa ili lingi fualakiwono-se.
59004015	Nyi hondo hawemsumhanya ihamba, Mndumii kakunda nyi lochikaa-ho lushike iwuta kiwe na kiwe.
59004016	Na wulalu mokekushela na maseṟeṟi hanu. Oryo ikushela lya mbaṟi ii lii liwicho.
59004017	Kyasia mndu kamanya kilya kii kicha kyewuta nao ada aleekiwuta, nakyo kyechimbiia wunyamaṟi.
59005001	Kendeng'u-wo wulalu nyo mui wasuṟi, muhende lia na ifuha kya marohyo hanu hechimhoya.
59005002	Wusuṟi wu wonu womepuo na maṟaye hanu ha-malie nyi kase.
59005003	Sahabu na fesa yanu yamekapa ngama na ngama ii yechimbiia kiṟingishyo yahenda ilya nyama tsanu cha modo. Mukamaa ikuwumbya kisa kya masaa mfiri ifurumi.
59005004	Ambuya, wuṟundi wo waṟundi walya walemnyo nyiwo wuifuha, na shifuha sha wawehi walya shamaa ishika henda madunyi ha Mndumii menyi matoṟito.
59005005	Nyo momepfokya ipfo orukenyi na ikusetsa owicho na wusuṟi wose mukawelisiṟa ngoo tsanu mkonu fo kishinjo.
59005006	Nyi momewonya mti ichu asumhanyi mukawehenda imbaha alawehodana nanyo.
59005007	Tsindenyi mochikukarishya itane Mndumii echikuloṟa. Ambuya, mndu mdemi akeri iwedya kilimu kicha kya sanga echikukarishya kyakyo itane kyaambya mvuo yesonguo na mvuo yainutsya.
59005008	Nanyo kekukarishyenyi-ng'u mudo mochidamiṟa madima hanu, kyamba nyi kufui Mndumii echikuloṟa.
59005009	Wanawawama, mulanunuwiane muwenyi-na wenyi, kundu mulahende yanduyo. Ambuya, moanduo aakya ipfo shichuminyi.
59005010	Wanawawama, mukuwade na waikimbi walya walededa kui rina lya Mndumii, wawe mtaato fonu mpfunge, fo ihenda iwawiṟo owicho na fo ikukarishya-ho.
59005011	Ambuya lokesendya nanga iwa walemkutirisia. Mukameicho ikutirisia lya Yobu na ipfo kundo Mndumii aleliinutysa mukamkuwona. Kipfa Mndumii ekesaṟya wandu saṟi ewaichio wukiwa.
59005012	Indi kisongoe shingi shose, wanawawama wako, kikeri ki-le, ke mulalye nyamu, manya so ruwehu manya so sanga manya so ki. Indi mukahamba, e, iwe ee lohi mukahamba, ote, iwe ote lohi, kundu mulahendewonyo mti ipfo kyanduyonyi kilya.
59005013	Kokoya konu kuwode ai na sia, o nawe moimba.
59005014	Kokoya konu kwipfo aluo, o nalahe wameku wa siṟi, wahende imterewya-ho na imshia mafuda kui rina lya Mndumii.
59005015	Na kiterewo kilya kii-kiwike kui wuidiki kyechichiṟa moluo ulya, na Mndumii echimheluo. Kawuta wunyamaṟi nyi echihoṟyo.
59005016	Kyasia tochianenyi njonyamaṟo muwenyi-na wenyi mochiterewiana kundu muhende ichia. Iterewa lya mndu asumhanyi lyaidima kindo king'anyi liwe li-iwike na mrima msanze.
59005017	Elia awei mndu o wandu o mbika imu naso. Nao aleterewa kundu kulakapeho mvuo. Na mvuo ikada ilawekapa maka iṟaṟu na meri iṟandaṟu.
59005018	Kawuya katerewa-se na ngina ikawelekia mvuo na teri ii ikawealutsia-se maalutsio hayo.
59005019	Wanawawama wako, kokoya o konu umu-ho adekyo kilya kiilohi na ungi amhaluya-se naapfo.
59005020	Kemanyenyi mowihiṟa mnyamaṟi njienyi ya odeko loke nyi echiletsa mrima foke opfu na ishikya mfeṟa fo manyamaṟo.
60001001	Inyi Petro njii msu o Yesu Kristo ngamwiṟikiṟa nyo wasambure wa Ruwa wande mulee mataṟataṟa ipfo Ponto na Galatia na Kapadokia na Asia na Bitinia muipfo mui cha wahenu.
60001002	Kui kyama kya Ruwa Wande kiwesongoe kilemnenga kamusambuṟa moilisho nyi Mumuyo Mwele kyemwidikishya Yesu Kristo na imwolya samu yake. Wutonga na ofoṟo shimuwelukie welu.
60001003	Kuichiko Ruwa ichu ai Nde o Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo! Ili amelusaṟya osaṟio lung'anyi kalufee feo lya kawi luwedye owedi luende moo kui iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo lya ipfo ko wafu.
60001004	Koikyo kuiiwedia iwona mboṟa tsilya Ruwa ateseheṟie wandu wakye ipfo Ruwehu tsilesia tsilai na mbaka tsilechiuma tsinjikoome ipfo ruwehu.
60001005	Mui-waringe muwodo nyi pfinya ya Ruwa kui wuidiki, muhendewonyo okiio luiluteseheṟe iwoneka kiheri kyefurumya.
60001006	Chihionyi kya ikyo mochikapa ngululu, ma ili muiliso wukiwa kui shiheshyo shiwe na shiwe kipfa kimuwaṟi kiheri ki kyangu.
60001007	Kitewe nyi kundu kihesha mwidikye fonu kiende kiṟumi kicha kota kilya kyehesha sahabu iya yechisia nayo yekyemanyisho modonyi, kishikye iwono kyechiende kiichiko na wuitoṟi na kiṟumi mandi halya Yesu Kristo echiwonekya.
60001008	Nao nyio mumkundi mulalemembone, mumwidikye mulambonyi, nyi mochikapa ngululu muwodo nyi sia ilechiwa ihambo ii-njilishe idi.
60001009	Kipfa mochikudaya kilya wuidiki wonu wuṟungye na ipfo nyilo okiio lo mrima yo yanu.
60001010	Okiio na ilu waikimbi wawe ipfulapfula na ihana-hana kyalo wechideda kui Mumuyo wehongia wutonga wu mleinengo nyo.
60001011	Nyi waweihana-hana kye kiheri nyi ikyi na lya iindi Mumuyo ichu o Kristo awei nawo alimanyishye-ho ilindi awesonguo iṟingishya mawawyo halya hehoya Kristo na mawusuṟi kirumi kilya kechiitumana naho.
60001012	Wakashika iwonesyo kye shindo shi weshikuwinya wo wa wenyipfo indi kitewe n nyo. Nashonyisho muleshiongoyo wulalu nyi walya walemwendie nyo Ndumi ya Sia ya okiio kui Mumuyo Mwele aa-mdume awuka ruwehu, sho sheamtsya na wasu wa ruwehu macha hemehya-ho.
60001013	Nkyo kitewe mukae na mhie yanu msanze cha wandu wakufungye kitsinyi na ilaa dembo. Mukuotoye mochikuwedya na macha wutonga wu mochiendyo ilindi Yesu Kristo echowenekya.
60001014	Mui wana wa Ruwa wawode wuindi, mlakioshe-se manyale lango njiwicho tsilya muwewode kacha lyilya muwei watondo.
60001015	Kya indi chando ichu alemlaha ai mwele na wudo nanyo muwe waele kui mhendekie fonu fose.
60001016	Kipfa kii-kiṟehie, “Muwe waele kipfa nyio inyi njii mwele.”
60001017	Nanyo ili muisenda Ruwa nyio Wande ichu ai modumbuya oryo mndu ose mdumbuye isumhanye mawuto hakye alechiambuya oshangu; Chumienyi ohendo lonu kiheri kyi kitsuhacho mui wahenu mochiindia Ruwa.
60001018	Kyamba muichi mochimanya kye chi kui shindo shesia ma fesa ma sahabu mulemhenda italao nasho mhendekienyi fonu fo shindo sha mai furianyi na shido sha waku walya wanupfo.
60001019	Kya indi nyi muiwatalae kui samu iya njiele ya wuhuru ikeri ya ichondi lilafanyi lilai na kitendo, nyio Kristo.
60001020	Nyio awemsambuṟe nyi Ruwa matika wuyana-wu wulawendewiko, indi nyi alemanyishio iheri li lifurumi lya maheri hose kimaduma kyanu.
60001021	Nyo mui-waenengye nyio mochiidikya Ruwa chu alemṟutsa wapfunyi kamsumba wuitoṟi. Nkyo kyatewa wuidiki wu wonu wurie na owedi lowedya Ruwa.
60001022	Mukamaa isanjika mrimenyi yanu kui wuhoyi wo ihoya kilya kii lohi kyemwinenga ikundana na wanawawama lilakulembetseṟye muwe mochikundana mnu necha nyo muwenyi na wenyi kui mrima fose.
60001023	Kyamba mui-wafee lya kawi feo lilawukie ndeo echikaa napfe kya indi ipfo ko ndeo elechipfa, nyi kui dedo lya Ruwa lii na moo lyechikaa mlungana.
60001024	Chando kukuṟehye: Oryo mndu ai cha maṟa. Na oryo kiṟumi kyakye kyose kikeri cha kiwaṟo kya ngeṟenyi. Maṟa hakameuma na kiwaṟo kikaweoloka.
60001025	Indi idedo lya Mndumii lyekaa mlungana. Nalyo nyilyo dedo lilemwongoyo konu lyemwendie Ndumi ya Sia.
60002001	Kuatuonyi oryo mawicho hose wongo, na oryo maokya mtambo; na makulembetseṟi; na mawunyeng'a masutsa hose.
60002002	Ili mui cha wanangu wai wafee wulalu mulalakie oseṟi lu lo kimumuyo, lulalulongye wongo, kundu mushike ikoya kui pfinya yalo mkura ya okiio.
60002003	Mukoye mulemshika isonjyo wucha wo Mndumii.
60002004	Nyio Mdumii muimchea ai iho lii na moo lii-lyimine nyi wandu; indi lii-isambuṟe nyi Ruwa, lii-iwikye wuindi ipfo koke.
60002005	Na wudo nanyo mui maho hai na moo muhende iwiko mba ikeri Mumuyo ya wukohanyi wuele wodambikya-ho shidaso sha kimumuyo shichihiṟie Ruwa kui Yesu Kristo.
60002006	Nkyo kiikiṟehye ipfo Biblienyi kyehamba, “Ambuya. Ngawika ipfo Sionyi iho liwanzi yose; iho lii-isale lii-iwikye wuindi. Na mndu moidikya-ho akuwode nalyo echihoyo sonupfo.”
60002007	Wulalu kyanu nyo mui waidiki nyi lya wuhuri wunganyi, nyi wuindi, indi walya walaidikye kyawo, “Nyi lyo iho wewika mba walelileha nalyo lyammba iho lisonguo ipfo ndumbenyi.
60002008	Kiṟehio kyahambase: Nyilo iho lya mtulia na piita ya yeolotsa wandu.” Nyi wakukapaho kipfa walaidikia idedo lyo. Nakyo nyi kyawo wai-wateṟye wokya mawokionyi.
60002009	Indi nyo mukeri oshari luu-usambuṟe wamangi wadasi, Wakohanyi wa Mangi wa mkambo fui mwele, wandu wa Ruwa amonyi msanzie fo watale wandu wa Ruwa; kundu muwe mochionguo mawuto mecha ha Ruwa ichu alemlaha ipfo meemenyi kamduo senyi yake iṟihishye idi.
60002010	Ili kacha muwei wandu walai mkambo fo Ruwa, indi wulalu mui mkambo fo Ruwa. Ili kacha mulawesaṟyo nyi Ruwa, indi wulalu momemaa isaṟyo.
60002011	Wanawawama, ngamtutuma mui cha wahenu wakuidya-iya wuyana kye mukuotoye lango tsa nyamenyi tsikeri ikapana na mrima.
60002012	Mochichumia ipfo kiidi kya wandu walaichi Ruwa ohendo lucha lusumhanyi kundu wo, ipfondo waimsutsa cha ili mui wambafu nyi hondo wakuwutie-ho iṟumisha Ruwa mkonu fo yanduo wechiambuya mawuto halya hanu mecha.
60002013	Kuwikenyi shi ya sungusihu yose ikeri ya kiwandu kimaduma kya Mndumii.
60002014	Ma ili nyi mangi ya mkambo ma kokoya nyi wachili wai wadume nyio ianduya wewuta shiwicho na kyeana walya wewuta shii shicha.
60002015	Kipfa nkyo kindo Ruwa akundi kye muwe mochiwuta sha wusumhanyi mutoṟomishe nasho wutondo wo wandu walaichi kindo.
60002016	Mui wekuachia muwenyi. Ma mulawone mochiwada ikuachia lyo liwe lyeṟikya-ho wumbafu, indi mukae nalyo mui masinga ha Ruwa.
60002017	Wikyenyi wandu wose wuindi, mukunde wanawawama wa siṟi, muhende iindia na yowuo Ruwa, muindye mangi.
60002018	Nyo mui waṟundi wa kanyi ko wandu, mukuwikye shi ya waitoṟi wanu kui wuowu wose wowaowuo chi iwa wai wecha wenunyia tupupfo indi na walya wepfulutsa nyashi.
60002019	Kyamba kichihianyi na Ruwa nyi kokoya mndu akukarishya ngaponyi tsilya ekapo tsilawode mti kimamduma kya ngo tsa mrima tsii-njiwike nyi Ruwa.
60002020	Kyamba kiṟumi kyanu kyawa kya ikyiwo kokoya mokukarishya mochikapo nzina kipfa momnyamaṟa? Indi kokoya mokukarishya mandi moterengyo kipfa kya iwuta wusumuhanyi, ikyo kichihianyi na Ruwa, Ruwa nechimusaṟia kipfa kya ikyo.
60002021	Isho nsho muiwalahie; kipfa nao Kristo alewawiṟo kipfa kyanu kamdea mtaato mpfunge kundu muoshe njayo tsake.
60002022	O nyio alawetahachie kindo, alekoyo atambie kindona dumbu yakepfo.
60002023	Nao ili arumo aletaa erumapfo kawawiṟo alasese; kakidea Ruwa ichu modumbuo kya wusumhanyi.
60002024	O amonyi kasanzya mbihu-hu foke manyamaṟo hadu kahadosya msalabehu hamu nafo, kundu so lukae lui waletsane na manyamaṟo lukapye moo foṟundya wuhoṟotsu. Nyi ichenje lyake lilemchiṟa.
60002025	Kyamba muwei waṟahi-ṟahi indi wulalu momekuhalukya Mlisi chu ai moambuya mrima yanu.
60003001	Nyo waka kuwikyenyi shi ya wamii wanu. Ma kokoya waipfo wasoṟo walasoṟa idedo lya Ruwa, wahende iliidikia kipfa kya mkao yo yanu mcha. Ma chi kui madedo-pfo.
60003002	Wechiambuya mchumie fonu mkeha mui na wuowuo woowu Ruwa.
60003003	Wuchopi wonu wulawe wo ora lo nja cha wo yokya njui na iṟaa sahabu na ikuṟaya manguo.
60003004	Kya indi wuwe wo mndu o mrima achia ora lo kya mba aṟee wuchopi wu wulechisia wo mumuyo mhoo fupfudie, nyifo fui na kiweṟe oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
60003005	Kyamba na wudo waka walya wawekyeṟundia Ruwa wawekyekuchopa ili kacha wekusirya na Ruwa wakahooya wamii wawo.
60003006	Chando Sara awehendelye Abrahamu kamsenda mndumii. Nanyo momba wana wake wa nguwo yake mukambuta kilya kii kicha mulaweowuo shiende fowa ma kimu-ho.
60003007	Na wudo, nyo womi mukae na waka wanu kui imanya kye mka ai msangi mfafa kota mii mochiwawikya wuindi kyamba nawo wechiduo kyoṟa kya moo fuu-mbike-ho nyi Ruwa kui wutonga. Kundu shiterewo shanu shilakoye-pfo tunja.
60003008	Lya inutsya ngahamba, mukae mochihia kimu mose, muwe mochiichio wengi wukiwa mukundane, muwe mosaṟya, mukunyiṟe muwenyi.
60003009	Shiwicho mowutyo nyo, ma mulataaye na shiwicho shingi. Ma mularume ili momrumo nyo. Indi kaenyi ora lungi muwe mowikya ona, kipfa kilya mui-walahie nyi Ruwa kundu muhendeduo ona luwe kyoṟa kyanu.
60003010	Madedo maele hahambie, “Kyamba mndu akunda moo fuchihiane nao, nawone mkonu ihende imchihia, o naringe olimi loke mawicho naweringa momu yake kundu iladede mtambo.
60003011	Nadiche mawicho nahende iwuta kii kicha. Nawe mopfula ofoṟo na iluwingya.
60003012	Kipfa meso ha Mndumii nyi haiambuya walya wasumhanyi na madu hake haiadanyia shiterewo shawo. Indi oshangu lo Mndumii luichihie ko walya wewuta mawicho-pfo.”
60003013	Nyi wu echimbutya kindo kiwicho ili mowa mokapanya kilya kii kicha?
60003014	Kya indi kokoya mohenda iwawiṟo kipfa mowuta kya wusumhanyi, nanga nyo. Ma mulaowuo mndu oose, ma iwuko m madima.
60003015	Indi Mndumii Kristo nyio mumtane mwele ipfo ngonyi tsanu. Mukae mochikuṟeheṟya itambahaluya oryo mndu mowesana nanyo kya owedi ilu lumbode.
60003016	Indi mumhaluo muwodo nyi wuhoo na wuowu. Ngoo tsa mrima yanu tsii njicha, kundu na ipfo kundo waimsutsa washike ipfia sonu walya waideda owicho kya, ohendo lonu lochia ludi kui Yesu Kristo.
60003017	Kyamba nanga iwawiṟo kipfa kya iwuta mecha kui kyama kya Ruwa, kota hando iwawiṟo kipfa kya iwuta mawicho.
60003018	Kipfa nao Kristo alepfa limu kipfa kya manyamaṟo hadu. Ichu asumhanyi alekaya walasumhanyi kundu naluduo ko Ruwa alewoho kui nyama indi kawewanzio moo kui mumuyo.
60003019	Ili awei adi kahenda ko mumuyo iya ikeri kipfungyonyi kawaongoya ndumi.
60003020	Nawo nyiwo wawelemye iidikya mandi halya wuleeli wo Ruwa wuweilelya mfiri iya ya Noe matika isanduku ilya liwekeri itano. Na ipfo kiidi kyalyo nyi wandu sa waangu, wandu nyanya walekiṟo kulya mṟingenyi.
60003021	Fui mfano fo ifu fuimletsa nanyo wulalu fui wupatiso. Wo wulakeri iwuta-ho oko lui nyame-hu, kya indi wukeri iterewa Ruwa owanzo lohoṟotsa necha ngo tsa mrima kui pfinya ya iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo.
60003022	Nyio akukerye ipfo owokonyi lo kulyo lo Ruwa ili amaa idoya ruwehu ipfondo amshika ilaṟyo wasu wa ruwehu na waitoṟi na waapfinya.
60004001	Wulalu ili Kristo amaa iwawyo kimbihu nanyo kimuwaṟi muṟae shisha muhie kimu nao. Kipfa mndu amerohyo nyamenyi awodese kita na wanyamaṟi-pfo.
60004002	Nkyo kimwenenge mulakikapye-se moo kui wuitiki wo lango tsa ki-wandu, kya indi muwe mofukapya kui wuitiki wo kilya Ruwa akundi matika-ha hamtsuhae.
60004003	Kyamba kiheri kyashika na kamu iki kilemsia mandi muweiwuta shindo shilya wandu walaichi Ruwa wakundi. Muwehendekye kui wulala, na wumeluki, na wunanzi na wukuwu wo mlie na wo mnyoe na wuindi woindya maruwa ha wongo wutahachie wudi.
60004004	Lyo liwaṟihishye wandu wo Walaichi Ruwa wechimruma-ruma ili mulaichumia-se nawo ipfo wumelukinyi wowo.
60004005	Wo wechianduyo nyi Ruwa-chu akuṟeheṟye idumbuo kya walya wai na moo na walya wapfie.
60004006	Kyamba ikyi kyamenenga na wapfu waleongoyo Ndumi ya Sia nyi kundu wakae wai wahoṟuo nyame-hu chandu kiwaṟi orio mndu, indi wahende iwada moo kui Mumuyo kui njia ya Ruwa.
60004007	Mainutsyo ha shindo shose hamcha afui. Ko ikyo kaenyi na osaaṟe mochikuotoya kundu muidime iterewa.
60004008	Ngoseṟa ya shingi shose kundanenyi nyo muwenyi na wenyi kui mrima foose. Mukuwade tsee kipfa ikunda li lishikye na mfeṟa fo manyamaṟo.
60004009	Muambyane necha kanyi konu kulaipfo mununuwo.
60004010	Muwe mochipfuṟukanyana muwenyi na wenyi oryo mndu ose kui kisumbo kya wutonga ameinengo nyi Ruwa, mui waiṟichi wecha weiṟichya-ho wutonga wo Ruwa wui-wuhawie-ho wo mbaṟi ii na ii.
60004011	Kuwode modeda lyo liwe lya mbiia tsa Ruwa, kuwode mopfuṟukanya lyo liwe lyechiwutika kui pfinya ii injiende nyi Ruwa, kundu Ruwa nakuwutie-ho iṟumisho na ishi shose kui Yesu Kristo. O ai menyi wuitoṟi na wukolonyi wochikaa mlungana! Amenyi.
60004012	Nyo mui wakunde, ma mulaṟihisho nyi wuhyu wulya woaka konu wochimhesha cha ili wombiia wuhenu.
60004013	Kya indi ili muisanzyo Kristo mawawio hakye ikyo kimwenenge muhende ichihio kya sia yanu ya ipfo mawonesyonyi ha wuitoṟi woke lyondi mochikapa ngululu.
60004014	Nanga nyo kokoya moilo kipfa kya rina lya Kristo, kipfa Mumuyo fo wuitoṟi, nyifo fo Ruwa fuimsokya.
60004015	Mndu onu manya nalaliso wukiwa kipfa ai mbahi ang'u mwiwi ang'u mbafu ang'u mṟiingi.
60004016	Indi kokoya ailiso wukiwa kipfa ai mkristo nalaṟeenze indi nawikye Ruwa kiṟumi kui rina lyo.
60004017	Kyamba heri lyamshika lyewokya yanduo mondu liwookie ipfo na wana wa Ruwa. Indi kokoya fuwokye kodu so nyi kyechiwa kida ko walya walaidikye Ndumi ya Sia ya Ruwa?
60004018	Na kokoya ichu asumhanyi aumiṟyo ikiṟo, ichu mlemeshi ai mnyamaṟi nyi hanga echikuloṟa ngesa?
60004019	Nkyo kimaduma iwo waiwawiṟo kui wuitiki wo Ruwa wadambikye mrima yawo mtsanyi chu mhendeli wechiwuta kilya kii kicha.
60005001	Wulalu wameku walya wakeri ipfo konu wo ngawatutuma njii meku chawo na moriso o mawawyo ha Kristo na mokita o wuitoṟi wulya wurie ihenda itambaṟukyo.
60005002	Ngawatutuma, kye lisiṟenyi poo lilya lya Ruwa lii konu chi cha ili mui-waitike-pfo kya indi kui macha ha Ruwa, mulapfule-ho mbucha indi muliwade na kuimbeṟe.
60005003	Mulachilie iwa wai wawikye kui wulang'a indi muwe mlodo ya poo.
60005004	Mukamba mudo nyi mochikudaya oṟo ilechinaa yehamba wuitoṟi matika na halya mlisi chu ang'anyi ewonekya.
60005005	Na wudo nyo mui wakoho kyekuhooyenyi wameku. Indi nyo mose mupfungane nguwo muwenyi na wenyi nyi yo mkunyiiṟye yanu. Kipfa Ruwa awikye walya wekyekung'nyisha tunja indi walya wekyekunyiiṟa wo nyi awawonye wutonga.
60005006	Ikyo kimwenenge mukae shi ya owoko lo Ruwa lui na pfinya kundu namwire heri lilya.
60005007	Mumdambikye mawina hanu hose kipfa nyi kimbode o kipfa kyanu.
60005008	Kuotoyenyi, mulae chowe. Mkituwa onu Satana aitengetatengeta cha miiso yerunduma ai mopfula mndu aidima immeṟa.
60005009	O mumleme mochikuhoda ipfo wuidiki-hu ili muichi necha kye mawawyo iha na iha hakeri iinutsyo ipfo dembonyi lya wanawawama wanu lya iya wuyana.
60005010	Indi o Ruwa menyi wutonga wose ichu alemlahya wuitoṟi woke wulunganyi kui Kristo nyio echimlumbisha nyo muiwawyo kiheri kyangu echiwa moṟihika na ikahaṟa.
60005011	Woke nyi wukolonyi wu wokaa mlungana. Amenyi.
60005012	Ngamṟehya baruo ii ngahamba ikeri mfui ngamdikya kui owoko lo Silwano manowama ichu mhendeli njetutuma na iṟingishya kye ipfo kundo muhoṟoki kuwode na wutonga wo Ruwa iwu wo lohi.
60005013	Siṟi ya iya Babilon ii-nsambuṟe nyi Ruwa kimu na yanu yo yamdikya shiiṟikiṟo, na Marko manoko na wudo.
60005014	Keiṟikiṟanenyi muwenyi na wenyi kui omimindo lo makunda. Ofoṟo lukae nanyo mui Kristo-hu mose.
61001001	Inyi Simeon Petro njii isinga lya Yesu Kristo na msu oke ngaiṟikiṟa iwa wai-watomokye wudiki wumu na iwu wodu wuitikisi nawo tichi kui wusumhanyi wo Ruwa chu odu na mkiṟa Yesu Kristo.
61001002	Wutonga na ofoṟo shimuwelukye welu kui imanya Ruwa na Mndumii odu Yesu.
61001003	Chando pfinya yake ya ki-Ruwa, Ruwa ammaa iluwonya shiende moo na wupfudi shose kui imanya ichu alelulaha na mweke fo wuitoṟi na wucha woke o amonyi.
61001004	Sho shatewa luinengo shasa sa shing'ianyi shiwode macha, kundu shimtane muwe wa-kita kimu mbika ya ki-Ruwa muweturuchukye odetso luwukye ipfo wulangenyi wo wuyana.
61001005	Nakyo nyikyo kimwenenge muitike-ho na kamu yende mbuka ncha ipfo wuidikinyi wonu; indi na ipfo mbukenyi ncha muende-ho wulaanyi.
61001006	Na ipfo wulanyi muendeho ikutumhaṟa, na ipfo kikutumhaṟyonyi muendeho ikutirisia na ipfo kikutirisionyi muende-ho wu-pfundi.
61001007	Na ipfo wupfundinyi muende-ho ikundana na wawawama, na ipfo ikundanenyi na wanawawama muende-ho ikunda lilya ling'anyi.
61001008	Kyamba kokoya ishi shikeri konu shechiengeṟeka, shechimwinenga muwe watanyii na iwonaho kiira kya imanya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo.
61001009	Kyamba ulya alawode isho o ai mpfu meso eidima iwonapfo na nahadimie imanya mandi kye alemsanjo manyamaṟo hake ha kacha.
61001010	Ili nyi wudo kii, nyo wanawawam, kimwamtse kawi muitike iwanza nadaho na msambuṟye iya mulelahio nyi Ruwa iwe ya kiheri kyoose. Kyamba kokoya mochiwa wewuta shilya shilya mochiho ma indi-pfo.
61001011	Mukamba mudo nyi mochiengeṟyo necha kimwitsa wumanginyi wo Mndumii na Mkiṟa odu Yesu Kristo wokaa mlungana.
61001012	Nkyo kimaduma njechiwa momkumbuṟa kya shila shilya mfiri yose ma ili mushiichi mui-waṟihike nyi kii-lohi iki muleambia.
61001013	Indi ngahamba nyi kisumhanyi njiwe njechimwamtsa-amtsa kui imkumbuṟya ilindi njikeri iya wuyana.
61001014	Kipfa njichi kye nyi kufui njileṟie mmbihu fu fooepfa mbai chando Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo alenjimanyishya.
61001015	Indi njechipfuṟukana imuloṟa muidime ikukumbuṟya isho na oryo kiheri kyose, ilindi njemaa ipfa.
61001016	Kyamba so lulawerianyi na shihano shii-shihanehane ilindi lulemwongoya pfinya ya icha lya Mndumii odu Yesu Kristo na mkae fokye fui nao. Kya indi lulewona na meso hadu wunene woke.
61001017	Kyamba o aleambya wuindi na wuitoṟi wuwukye ko Ruwa Wande, matika halya ṟu lilemchea liche ipfo wuitoṟinyi wo huya shose likadeda lidi, “Ichu ai Manoko sa mkunde, achihianyi na inyi.”
61001018	Na ṟu-lyo luleliicho lichee ruwehu mandi luwei handu hamu nao ipfo kitonyohu kya fumvu lilya yeele.
61001019	Na lukuwode tapu na idedo lya wuikimi. Mowuta kicha mochiliwada likeri kimui kyewaa ipfo kundo kukiwa itane kukye na nyenyeṟi ya hera idoe ipfo ngoonyi tsanu.
61001020	Ngoseṟa ya isho, manyenyi ikyi kya kuwoka, kye oryo Wuikimbi wo Biblia wochiwa idambuyo kui njia ya ki-wandupfo.
61001021	Kyamba kuipfo wuikimbi wulemendo kui kyama kya wandu manya-lepfo. Kya indi wandu waweipfo walededa kiwukye ko Ruwa wawewodo nyi Mumuyo Mwele.
61002001	Indi kuweipfo na waikimbi wa wongo ipfo kiidi kya wandu. Chando na ipfo konu kochiwa wai walosha wa wongo. Wechilosha moshie mbicho fonyamaṟa na ikana Ruwa-alewakiṟa. Na Mnene ichu alewatalaa nyi wechimkana wekutumukishya wadi kiwadetsa owinyi.
61002002	Na wandu wafoi wechiwingya njia-tso tsawo njiwicho. Nyiwo wechitewa njia ya kii-lohi ihende irumo.
61002003	Ili wawodo nyi wuehi wechikapa nanyo mbucha kui sumu tsawo tsa wongo. Indi kui kiheri kileshe Moanduya owo nakuṟeheṟie, na Morumatsa owo nawonyi.
61002004	Kyamba ma Wasu walya wa ruwehu walemdekyo Ruwa alewahoria-pfo. Kya indi kawakumbalya modonyi fo Gehena hando hadekye wanda na kamu hashingikye meema puti wakae-pfo wai wapfunge itane weshika yanduyo.
61002005	Manya Ruwa alesaṟia wuyana wulya wo mboko-pfo, indi naleende mfu fung'anyi kulya orukyenyi lo wandu walempiṟa. Indi nyi Noe mwongoyi o wusumuhanyi na walya wake mfungade Ruwa nalewakiṟa kechiendye wuyana wo walemeshi mfu fulya fowarumatsa.
61002006	Na mṟi ya Sodoma na Gomora Ruwa kaikombetsa kombi kaikoṟa na modo kiwe kicharo kya shindo shechihoya wandu wechikaa wapiṟe Ruwa.
61002007	Ruwa nalekiṟa na Loti ulya asumhanyi awei-mrohie adi nyi mhendekye fo walemeshi walya fuwei fo melu-melu.
61002008	Kyamba Loti nawei kiidi kyawo, na kafoi mrima fokye fukasukio mnu kya mawuto halya hawo mawicho, halachihianyi na Ruwa. Sho shiwekeri itura mrima foke fusumhanyi.
61002009	Mndumii aichi iletsa wandu wamwidikie kiheshionyi kyawo, indi iwa walasumhanyi nyi aichi iwasuṟumya ngapo mfiri foanduo waipfo wechidehelyo.
61002010	Ngoseṟa mnu nyi walya wewingya seko tsa mbihu wawodo nyi wulangi wuteṟefutsie wakapiṟa wunene. Wo wandu waami, wakahakaha walaowuo iruma waapfinya wa ipfo huye na iwaisalucha.
61002011	Napfo kundo wamalaika wa ruwehu wenyi pfinya na wuumi kota walosha wo wa wongo walaendeho mdumbuye yewaruma oshangunyi lo Mndumii.
61002012	Indi wanduwo wai cha mando halai na wurango, hekeshao na lyefurumia hekyeshinjo, nyi wekeruma ishi walaichi. Wo wechirumatso kipfa kya wuwicho wowo wawenyi.
61002013	Wuṟundi wechikudaya nyi wusumhanye wumbafu wowo. Sia yawo nyi iwuta napata tena mfiri kui na sa ikyo kyoose kya wuseṟeṟi wo wo kimbihu. Wo nyi walaala na wusutsu konu ili wechikaa nanyo ili wakeri ilya nanyo.
61002014	Meso hawo haichuo wuṟuhui, walaida wunyamaṟi. Wekyetuusa mrima ya wafafa ilai-mdamiṟe. Mrima yawo iichwo lango tsa masaa, wai wana wa oseso lo Ruwa.
61002015	Waleda njia njihoṟotsu wakaṟahaṟaha wewingya njia ya Beleamu mana o Beori alelanga wuṟundi wo wumbafu wulya.
61002016	Indi nyi alewonyo-ho owingo lo wutahachi woke wuwenyi. Nzoi ilekyededa lilededa na ṟu lya mndu o wandu, likakanga mhie fo mwikimbi ulya fuwei-mpfuluye fudi.
61002017	Nawo nyiwo wakeri cha soka tsilaṟukie mṟinga na cha mapuchi hamawiwite nyi otanu. Kilya kii-kiṟeheṟye-ho kyawo nyi kulya ṟungunyi lya meema.
61002018	Kyamba wo wekyekushela na madedo ha maai; wechituusa na lango njiwicho tsa nyamenyi kui mamelukameluka wandu, walya wamelekana msanzie fo wechumia kipfuṟi.
61002019	Wekewateṟya ikuachia, nawo mwawenyi wai masinga ha wunyamari. Kyamba mndu nai isinga lya ikyo kyoose kimchilie.
61002020	Kyamba kokoya iwa waledicha ngafu tsa wuyana kui imanya Mndumii na Mkiṟi odu Yesu Kristo, na numa wakaidikia iwingo na ichilia nyi wechioṟowyo nyitso lingi kyawo kifurumi kyechiwichuo ngoseṟa kota kya kuwoka.
61002021	Kyamba kyawo kiwechia kima walawemanya njia yo ya wusumhanyinyi, kota hando wameimanya wakaikumba mhongo wakaleha iwawaso lilya yele waleliambia.
61002022	Kikawewahoya kya mfanano fulya fohamba, “Kite kyekewuya-madaiko hakyo kimenyi na kila kingi kyehamba,” “Nguwe nsanje yekusinga kundo kupochikye.” Nyi wudo kii kowo.
61003001	Nyo mui wakunde wako, baruo ii ngamṟehya nyo nyi ya kawi. Njimwamtsie natso mhie fulya msalari njechimtamuṟya-ho mbonyi tsi.
61003002	Muwe mochikumbuo madedo halya halehambo nyi waikimbi walya waele na iwawaso lilya lya Ndumi Mkiṟi lii-yende nyi wasu walya wanu.
61003003	Kisongoye shoose manyenyi kiheri kyefurumia kochicha wandu wetaluo, mchumie yawo inchilie nyi lango tawo njiwicho. Kochicha-pfo wetaluo wai wapirisi wenyi-wupiṟi wechichumia waiwaṟaishe nyi lango tsawo wawenyi.
61003004	Wekehamba, “Kyasa kya iwuya lyake kilemawutsyo hanga ngesa?” Wokya mandi waku wamepfa, shindo shose shii chando shiwei lyilya shilewiko iya wuyanenyi.
61003005	Ili wandu wa wakutimbishye, wakahadima imanya kye Ruwa nalededa, ruwehu na wuyana shikawumbo. Wuyana wulewiko mṟingenyi kui mṟinga mṟingenyi kui dedo lya Ruwa iwewangiho na mweke fo mṟinga.
61003006	Na kui mṟinga, mfu fulya funganyi fo mṟinga, wuyana wo kiheri kilya natso tsikakusanza tsekombetsa mkambo fo wandu fose wakarumatso nyi mṟinga.
61003007	Indi ngina ya ki-wulalu na wanda ii shishiṟihikye nyi idedo lya Ruwa, tso tsikeri nteṟye modo kui idedo li lya Ruwa tsiinkoomye mkonu fo maanduo halya hang'anyi forumatsa wandu walya wenyi-wulemeshi.
61003008	Nyo mui wakunde wako, mlahadime kindo kyimu, kye mkonu fumu fukukerye Ruwa cha ili fui maka kyiku, na maka kyiku cha ili ikeri mkonu fumu.
61003009	Mndumii akeleṟye yawutsa kyasapfo chando waipfo wandu wafoi wakusaṟie aikikeleṟa. Kya indi ai momleelya nyo kipfa alakundi kuedekye mndu manya umu indi washike idumbuya na ihaluka wose.
61003010	Kochicha mkonu fo Mndumii oweṟe faa cha mwiiwi. Nafo nyifo ngina yechisaramaya neduika ling'anyi na shiṟaana shayo shechipaṟakana shii-shirokye m modo, na wanda ii na wudo yechihenda ikoṟo hamu na shiwike shii nayo.
61003011	Na wudo ili shose shakunda isalaṟo apa mkoṟomu fuimkoromuo nyo mukae mochihendeka mhendekye mwele fuwode wuindi woindia Ruwa wose.
61003012	Muwe mochiweda iwoneka lya Mkonu fukeri fo Ruwa mofuwingya. Mfo fochitewa ngina yechipaṟatsano modonyi na shiṟaana shechisalaṟo shii-shii-rohie m mrike.
61003013	Indi so kui kyaasa kyake luiwedya ngina njihya na wanda njihya ii na wusumhanyi luidikyanyi na kyasa kyake.
61003014	Nyo mui-wakunde wako, nkyo kimaduma ili muiweda isho, mukutambahanye muhende ikoyo-ho mulai na paṟi ma limu mulawa ihoyo owingo oshangunyi lo Ruwa mui na ofoṟo.
61003015	Kimuwaṟi muwone na wuleeli wo Mndumii odu muwuhendelye womwendie okiio chando na manowama odu mkunde Paulo amaa imṟehya kui wuṟango wulya alesumbo nyi Ruwa.
61003016	Isho nyisho aideda baṟuonyi tsakye tsose ili ashike ipaaya-ho isho. Ipfo kiidi kyatso kwipfo shindo, maata shi shiumu imanyika owinyi. Nyisho wandu wai matondo, walai wapfunde walai wawanze wekeshipfuluopfuluo chando wekyepfuluo Madedo hengi Maele, na mṟehie ingi wakakuwutya-ho ihenda ikudetsa wawenyi.
61003017	Nahong'u, nyo mui wakunde wako, ili mulesonguo na samanya Mukuṟise kundu mulawone mochieko nyi odeko lulya lo watahachi wo muwechitaṟasha hando mokuilikishya-ho.
61003018	Kya indi muhende ikung'anya ipfo kiidi kya wutonga na wulaanyi womanya Mndumii odu Mkiṟi Yesu Kristo. Wuitoṟi wui woke mandi ha wulalu shika mfiri fo mlungana. Amenyi.
62001001	So nyi lukeri imuṟehya kilya kiweepfo wuka mawookyonyi nyikyo lulekiicho lulekiwona na meso hadu, lulekiambuya na ikiwadawada na mawoko hadu, lyo Ideda lilya likeri moo.
62001002	Na moo-fu fulecha naso lukafuwona. Nyifo luifumṟingishia na imwongoya kye moo-fu nyi fo mlungana, fuwekeri ko Wande fukashika iluwonesyo so.
62001003	Ikyi lulekiwona na ikiicho nyi kyo luimwongoya nanyo kundu muwade kita kimu naso. Indi kita-ki kyadu lukiwode na Wande na Manoke Yesu Kristo.
62001004	Na ishi luimṟehya kundu sia-yo yadu iweluke welu.
62001005	Na ndumi-ii lulemwicho ipfo ko Yesu luimwongoya nyo nyi ikeri ii-le, ke Ruwa ai sa. Ma meema fui nao manyalepfo.
62001006	Kokoya luhambie ke luwode kita nao, indi luhendekye hando hai meema nyi luihamba wongo na kilya kii lohi luikiwutapfo.
62001007	Indi kokoya luhendekye hando hai sa chando o ai na sa, nyi luwode kita so luwenyi na wenyi. Na samu ya Yesu Kristo Manoke, yalusanja wunyamaṟi wose.
62001008	Kokoya lokehamba kye lulai wanyamaṟi nyi lokulemba luwenyi na kilya kii-lohi kikeri nasopfo.
62001009	Indi lukatocha manyamaṟo hadu o Ruwa ai mhendeli asumhany nechiluhoṟya manyamaṟo-ha na ilusanja hando hose lufanyi.
62001010	Kokoya so lokehamba kye lulawenyamaṟye hando, nyi hondo lomtana o Ruwa mowongo na idedo lyake likeri nasopfo.
62002001	Shiwana shako, ngamṟehia isho kundu mulahende iwuta wunyamaṟi hando. Na kokoya kwipfo mndu anyamaṟa hando, luwode mombele ipfo ko Wande, nyio Yesu Kristo asumuhanyi.
62002002	Nao Kristo menyi akeri njoko iinjiwike kya manyamaṟo hadu, indi chi kya njonyamaṟo tsandu tupupfo, na kya wunyamaṟi-wu wo wuyana wose.
62002003	Na hando lokuwutya-ho imanya kye lomemmanya o nyi ili luihendelya mawawaso ha Ruwa.
62002004	Mndu kahamba, “Njimwichi,” na mawawaso halya hake alahahendelye, nyi ai mowongo, na kilya kii-lohi kikeri naopfo.
62002005	Indi Mokihendelya dedo lyake lohi, ipfo kokye ikunda Ruwa lyamshika yawukya. Lyo lyaluenenga imanya kye lohi lukulungye nao.
62002006	Mokihamba ke akaa ai msanze nao kimbaṟi nawe mohendekya mhendekye fumu na fulya a menyi awefuhendekye.
62002007	Nyo muiwakunde, iwawaso ili ngamṟehya chi lihyapfo, kya indi nyi iwawaso lilya lya kacha muweliwoda mawokyonyi. Iwawaso li lya kacha lyo idedo-li momeliicho.
62002008	Ma kudo, iwawaso li ngamṟehya likeri lihya, lyo lii lohi ipfo ko Kristo na konyu, da kyamba meema-fu fuisia; na sa-ii ya kii-lohi yamewoka iwaa.
62002009	Mokihamba kye nyi ipfo senyi ai, nao awa mosuo manomae o akeri meemenyi.
62002010	Mokikunda manomae awa mokaapfo senyi, na kilahutsa kilarianyi nao.
62002011	Indi mokisuo manomae akeri meemenyi, na ipfo meenyi ahendekye alamanya hando akuhendya, kipfa meema-fu fuwahie meso hake.
62002012	Njikeri imṟehya nyo mui wana kipfa mui wahoṟye manyamaṟo kui rina lyake.
62002013	Njikeri iṟehya nyo mui wandee wa wandu kipfa muichi ichu ai o mawokyonyi. Njikeri imṟehya nyo mui wanake kipfa mombinza ichu mbicho.
62002014	Ngamṟehya nyo mui wana kipfa muichi Wande. Ngamṟehya nyo, mui wandee wa wandu ipfa muichi ichu ai o mawookyonyi. Ngamṟehya nyo mui wanake, kipfa mui na pfinya na idedo lya Ruwa likaananyo mukamaa winza mbicho.
62002015	Ma mulakunde wuyana-wu ma ishi shikeri nawo. Ichu akundi wuyana wu, ikunda lyekunda Wande lii naopfo.
62002016	Kyamba ishi shose shii sha wuyana shikeri shidi, nyi lango tsa nyamenyi na lango tsa meso na useṟeṟi wo moo. Nasho shiwukye ipfo ko Wandepfo, indi nyi ipfo wuyana.
62002017	Indi wuyana-wu wochisia na lango tsawo daa. Indi ichu awa mowuta iki Ruwa akundi o echikaa mlungana.
62002018	Wana, saa ifurumi iipfo. Iki muleicho ke iimakristo echicha. Na wulalu komba wafoi wai mamakristo. Nyihondo lokuwutyaho imanya ke saa ifurumi iipfo.
62002019	Nyi wammbuka kambenyi lyadu, kya indi walawepaṟikye kodu. Kyamba kima wawepaṟikye kodu wawechikaa naso. Indi kilehendeka kido kundu washike imanyika na pata ke chi wose wapaṟikye kimu nasopfo.
62002020	Nanyo mshimbuo nyi fonu ifu fuwukye ko ichu ai mwele mukaṟanguo mui waichi mose.
62002021	Chi ngamṟehya cha ili mulaichi kilya kii-lohipfo, kya indi nyi kipfa mukiichi na kipfa oryo kii-wongo kilapaṟikye ko kilya kii-lohi.
62002022	Nyi o ku ai mowongo chila ichu ai mokana Yesu ai Kristo? Nao nyio iima-kristo-chu mokana Wande na Mana.
62002023	Oryo ose mokana Mana ma akuwode na Wandepfo. Mokihamba Mana nyio na Wande akuwode nao.
62002024	Lilya mulemwicho lya mawokyonyi likae nanyo. Lilya momeliicho lya mawokyonyi likakaa nanyo nyi mochikaa na Mana na Wande.
62002025	Na kiteṟyo kilya ameluteṟya o, kyo kiiteṟyo-ho moo fo mlungana.
62002026	Isho ngamaa imṟehya kya walya warie imlahutsa.
62002027	Nanyo, mshimbuo-fu momwambya fuwukye ipfo koke mfo fookaa nanyo. Nanyo muwuṟye mndu mompfundapfo. Kya indi chando mshimbuo foke fuimlosha kya shoose nafo fui lohi fulai wongo, na chando fulemlosha nyo kaenyi nafo.
62002028	Na wulalu, wana, kaenyi mukuwode na Mndumii kundu mandi echiwoneka, lukae-ho na wulalutsu lulahutsyo sonu nyio ipfo machee hake.
62002029	Mukamanya ke o ai menyi wusumhanyi, kuwutyenyi-ho imanya ke oryo ose awa momanyisha wusumuhanyi wu kui iwuta lyake, o amefeo nyio.
62003001	Ambuyenyi kunda lya Ruwa chando ling'anyi, likaluenenga lusendo wana wa Ruwa, na lui wana. Nkyo kimaduma wuyana wu wulalumanya so, kipfa wulalemmanya Ruwa.
62003002	Nyo mui wakunde wako, lukeri wana wa Ruwa wulalu. Indi mbika lochikaa nayo ilemewonekye-pfo. Luichi kye iliindi Kristo echicha nyi lochifanana nao, kyamba nyi lochimbona mbuka yake yose.
62003003	Na oryo ose akuwode nao kui owedi-lu nyi aikuilisha amonyi naile chando Kristo amwili weṟu.
62003004	Oryo mowuta wunyamaṟi nyi afunja iwawaso lya Ruwa, na wunyamaṟi nyiwo wufurunji.
62003005	Nanyo muichi kye Kristo nalecha kundu nawute-ho manyamaṟo hadu, na wunyamaṟi wukeri naopfo.
62003006	Oryo ose mokaa nao Kristo ekewuta kya wunyamaṟipfo. Oryo mokinyamaṟa ma alemembone manyale-pfo manya immanyapfo.
62003007	Wana, wako, mulahendedetso nyi mndu. Mokiwuta wusumhanyi nyio asumhanyi arianyi na Kristo menyi asumhanyi.
62003008	Mokiwuta wunyamaṟi apaṟikye ko Satana, kyamba Satana akeri monyamaṟa wokya mawokyonyi. Kiletewa Mana o Ruwa kacha wuyana nyi kundu nafunje irunda lya Satana.
62003009	Oryo ose alefeo nyi Ruwa awuta wunyamaṟipfo kyamba mbeu yake ikaa nao. Nao alaidima inyamaṟa nyi kipfa nyi amfee nyi Ruwa.
62003010	Nyihondo komanyika na pata iwa wai wana wa Ruwa na iwa wai wana wa Satana, Oryo mndu ose ada alawa mowuta wusumhanyi apaṟikye ko Ruwapfo ang'u alakundi manomae.
62003011	Kyamba ndumi-ii momwicho wuka mawokyonyi nyi ikeri ii-le: Lukundane luwenyi na wenyi!
62003012	Lulawe cha Kain awei o ichu mbicho kahenda iwaha manomae. Na kitewe alembaha nyiki ngesa? Nyi kipfa mawuto hake halewichuo indi halya ha manomae ho hawei mecha.
62003013	Wanawawama, ma mulaṟihio ili wuyana-wu womsuo.
62003014	So luichi ke lomsama alya hai-haitoṟye nyi opfu, lomhenda kusamya ha-haitoṟye m moo kyamba so lukundi wanawawama wadu. Mndu ada alawa mowakunda o akaa opfunyi.
62003015	Oryo Mndu ose mosuo manomae nyi akeri mbahi mowaha wandu. Nanyo muichi kye oryo mbahi ose awode moo fo mlungana fochikaa naopfo.
62003016	Hando lulekuwutya-ho imanya ikunda, nyi ili o Kristo alereka moo foke kimaduma kyaduso. Natso Kiluwaṟi lureke moo yadu hando ha wanawawama wadu.
62003017	Indi kokoya kwipfo awode shichoṟe shewanza moo fo wuyana-wu nao kaambuya manomae ashiwuṟye nao kampfungya ngoo, nyi wuda ikunda Ruwa lyekaa nao ngesa?
62003018	Wana wako, lulakundane kui dedo ma kui olimi, kya indi lukundane kui mawuto na kui kii-lohi.
62003019	Na hondo lochikuwutya-ho imanya ke lukeri wandu wa kii-lohi. Na ipfo oshangunyi lo Ruwa nyi lochikarishya-ho ngoo tsadu.
62003020	Kipfa kokoya ngoo yadu yalusesa, luichi Ruwa ang'anye ngoo tsadu kemanya shindo shose.
62003021	Wakunde wako, kokoya ngoo ilalusesa lui na wulalutsu oshangunyi lo Ruwa.
62003022	Na kokoya luimterewa kindo lochikiambya ipfo koke, kipfa luihendelya mawawaso hake na iwuta shilya shichihianyi nao.
62003023	Na iwawaso lyake nyi lii-le ke luidikye rina lya Manoke Yesu Kristo luwekundana luwenyi na wenyi chando o ameluwawasya.
62003024	Na mokihendelya mawawaso ha Ruwa nyi aka amlunge na Ruwa, nao Ruwa alunganyi nao. Na kilya kyalutarama imanya kye luiwalunge na Ruwa nyi mumuyo fu Ruwa ameluenengya.
62004001	Wakunde wako, ma mulaidikye oryo mndu mohamba nawode mumuyo mliwe, kya indi mutume mnu kokoya mndu-chu nario nyi Mumuyo fo Ruwa ang'u ote. Kyamba waikimbi na wongo wafoi wamecha kunu wuyana.
62004002	Kimwenengya imanya Mumuyo o Ruwa kiwe kii-le, ke oryo Mumuyo ose awa mohamba Yesu Kristo amcha kui nyama nyio apaṟikye ko Ruwa.
62004003	Na orio mndu alaiṟingishia kye Yesu Kristo alecha kui nyama, ario nyi Mumuyo fo Ruwapfo. Nyio akeri mkituwa o Kristo. Kyake nyi mulemwicho nyi echicha. Na wulalu alemmaacha kunu wuyana.
62004004	Nyo, wana, mupaṟikye ko Ruwa mulemmaa iwinza waikimbi. Kipfa ichu akeri nanyo nyi ang'anyi kota ichu ai kunu wuyana mulemmaa iwinza waikimbi-wo wa wongo.
62004005	Walya nyi wapaṟikye kunu wuyana. Nkyo kyatewa wekededa sha kunu-wuyana na wuyana wu wukawaicho.
62004006	So nyi ipfo ko Ruwa lupaṟikye. Mokimanya Ruwa nyi aluicho. Ichu alapaṟikye ko Ruwa ekeluichopfo. Lyo nyilyo lyaluinengya imanya Mumuyo o kii-lohi na mumuyo fo wongo.
62004007	Wakunde wako, luitike ikundana luwenyi-na-wenyi. Kipfa mkundye fumenyi nyi ipfo ko Ruwa fupaṟikye. Na oryo menyi-mkundye amefeo nyi Ruwa na imanya kamanya Ruwa.
62004008	Mndu alawode mkundye aichi Ruwapfo. Kipfa Ruwa nyi ikunda.
62004009	Hando kunda lya Ruwa lyammanyikya-ho na pata ipfo kidi kyadu, nyi ili Ruwa aleduma Mana-chu oke kimumu mfi kunu wuyana kundu luhende iwonyo moo nyio.
62004010	Hando mkundye fukukerye-ho chi kodu cha ili so luwekundi Ruwapfo, kya indi nyi koke ili o amelukunda kaduma Manoke kamtana njoko yeoloṟa manyamaṟo hadu.
62004011	Wakunde wako, na ili Ruwa amelukunda so nyi kiluwaṟi naso lukundane luwenyi na wenyi.
62004012	Kuwode mndu alemewona Ruwa ma indipfo. Ilindi lukundanyi luwenyi na wenyi lyo lyaenenga Ruwa akaa naso, na ikunda Ruwa likaawukya ichia kodu.
62004013	Hando lokuwutya-ho imanya ke nyi lokaa nao nao menyi akeri naso nyi ili ameluenenga Mumuyo oke.
62004014	Natso lomba wariso lochiṟingishya-ho ke o Wande ameduma Mana kamtana mkiṟi mokiṟa wuyana.
62004015	Ipfo kundo mndu awa mohamba ke Yesu ai Mana o Ruwa nyihondo Ruwa ekaa nao nao akeri na Ruwa.
62004016	Natso lomemanya mkundye fu Ruwa alukundi nafo lukawefuidikya. Ruwa nyi ikunda motsinda echikaa mkundyenyi-fu nyio awa mokaa na Ruwa na Ruwa awa mokaa nao.
62004017	Ikunda-li luliwode lyashika yawukya ipfondo luwode wulalutsu mkonu fo mwanduye, kyamba chando o ai na wudo so lui kunu wuyana.
62004018	Wuowu wukukerye mkundyenyipfo, kya indi mkundye fu-mwawutsie mfo fofunya wuowu wose nja, kyamba wuowu wuwode ṟowa. Mndu mowado nyi wuowu aawukye mkundyepfo.
62004019	So nyi luwode ikunda, kyamba o Ruwa alesonguo ilukunda.
62004020	Kokoya kwipfo mohamba, “Njikundi Ruwa”, nao asuo manomae, nyi mndu mowongo. Kipfa mndu ada alakunda manomae awonyo, eidima ikunda Ruwa alambonyi-pfo.
62004021	Nalyo nyi iwawaso luwode liwukye ko Kristo, Mokunda Ruwa nawekunda na manomae.
62005001	Oryo mndu ose aidikya ke Yesu ai Kristo nyi alefeo nyi Ruwa. Na oryo ose ili akundi ichu momfee awa mokunda na ichu alemfeo nyio.
62005002	Hando lokuwutya-ho imanya ke lukundi wana wa Ruwa, nyi iliindi lukundi Ruwa lochiwuta shilya aluwawasye.
62005003	Kipfa ikunda Ruwa lii-pfo ipfo kundo luihendelya mawawaso hake. Na mawawaso hake hai malemeripfo.
62005004	Kyamba oryo kii-kifee kipaṟikye ko Ruwa kikeri iwinza wuyana-wu. Na kiwinza kilya kyechiwinza nakyo wuyana-wu nyi mwidikye fodu.
62005005	Mmbinzi mowinza wuyana-wu nyi-wu, shila nyi ichu aidikye kye Yesu ai Mana o Ruwa?
62005006	Yesu Kristo nyio ichu alecha kui mṟinga fo wupatiso wokye na kui samu ya opfu lokye. Chi alecha kui mṟinga tupupfo, kya indi kui mṟinga na kui samu. Na Mumuyo alewa-moṟingishya, kyamba Mumuyo nyi akeri kii-lohi kilya.
